# language_name:        Kabyle
# closest ISO 639-3:    kab
# ISO_15924:            Latn
# year_short:           
# year_long:            
# vernacular_title:     
# english_title:        The New Testament in Kabyle
# URL:                  http://unbound.biola.edu/index.cfm?method=downloads.showDownloadMain
# copyright_short:      
# copyright_long:       
# notes:                Many wordending in 'f.' are leftovers of footnotes (but not all!). Plus symbols alos point to errors.
40001001	A ten-an izuṛan n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yellan si dderya n Sidna Dawed akk-d Sidna Ibṛahim :
40001002	Sidna Ibṛahim yeǧǧa-d Isḥaq , Isḥaq yeǧǧa-d Yeɛqub , Yeɛqub yeǧǧa-d Yahuda d watmaten-is .
40001003	Yahuda akk-d Tamaṛ ǧǧan-d Fares , akk-d Ziraḥ ; Fares yeǧǧa-d Ḥesrun , Ḥesrun yeǧǧa-d Aram .
40001004	Aram yeǧǧa-d Ɛaminadab , Ɛaminadab yeǧǧa-d Naḥsun , Naḥsun yeǧǧa-d Salmun .
40001005	Salmun d Raḥab ǧǧan-d Buɛaz , Buɛaz akk-d Rut sɛan-d Ɛubed , Ɛubed yeǧǧa-d Yassa .
40001006	Yassa yeǧǧa-d Sidna Dawed , Sidna Dawed yuɣal d agellid , yeǧǧa-d ɣer tmeṭṭut n Uryaḥ Sidna Sliman .
40001007	Sidna Sliman yeǧǧa-d Raḥabɛam , Raḥabɛam yeǧǧa-d Abiya , Abiya yeǧǧa-d Asaf ,
40001008	Asaf yeǧǧa-d Yehucafat ; Yehucafat yeǧǧa-d Yihuram ; Yihuram yeǧǧa-d Ɛuzya ;
40001009	Ɛuzya yeǧǧa-d Yuṭam ; Yuṭam yeǧǧa-d Aḥaz ; Aḥaz yeǧǧa-d Ḥizeqya ;
40001010	Ḥizeqya yeǧǧa-d Mennac ; Mennac yeǧǧa-d Ɛamun ; Ɛamun yeǧǧa-d Yuciya ;
40001011	Yuciya yeǧǧa-d Yixunya akk-d watmaten-is , di lweqt i deg iqaldiyen wwin at Isṛail d imeḥbas ɣer tmurt n Babilun .
40001012	Mbeɛd lweqt n usgiǧǧi ɣer tmurtn Babilun , Yixunya yeǧǧa-d Calatyel ; Calatyel yeǧǧa-d Zurubabil .
40001013	Zurubabil yeǧǧa-d Abihud . Abihud yeǧǧa-d Ilyaqim ; Ilyaqim yeǧǧa-d Ɛazuṛ ;
40001014	Ɛazuṛ yeǧǧa-d Saduq ; Saduq yeǧǧa-d Yaxin ; Yaxin yeǧǧa-d Ilihud .
40001015	Ilhud yeǧǧa-d Ilɛazaṛ ; Ilɛazaṛ yeǧǧa-d Mattan ; Mattan yeǧǧa-d Yeɛqub .
40001016	Yeɛqub yeǧǧa-d Yusef , d Yusef agi i d argaz n Meryem i d-yeǧǧan Sidna Ɛisa i gețțusemman Lmasiḥ .
40001017	Si lweqt n Sidna Ibṛahim armi d lweqt n Sidna Dawed , ɛeddan ṛbeɛṭac n leǧyal . Ɛeddan daɣen ṛbeɛṭac n leǧyal si lweqt n Sidna Dawed armi d lweqt n usgiǧǧi ɣer tmurt n Babilun . Si lweqt-agi n usgiǧǧi armi d lweqt n Lmasiḥ ɛeddan daɣen ṛbeɛṭac n leǧyal .
40001018	Atan wamek i d-ilul Sidna Ɛisa : yemma-s Meryem tella tețwaxḍeb i yiwen wergaz ițțusemman Yusef . S tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , terfed s tadist uqbel aț-țeddu ț-țislit .
40001019	Yusef axḍib-is , yellan d argaz n ṣṣwab , ur yebɣi ara a ț-țicemmet , dɣa yeqsed ad imsefṛaq yid-es s tuffra .
40001020	Akken yețxemmim i waya , yers-ed ɣuṛ-es lmelk n Ṛebbi di targit yenna-yas : A Yusef ! A mmi-s n Dawed ! Ur țțaggad ara aț-țesɛuḍ Meryem ț-țameṭṭut-ik , axaṭer llufan yellan di tɛebbuṭ-is , yusa-yas-d s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
40001021	A d-tesɛu aqcic , a s-tsemmiḍ Ɛisa , axaṭer d nețța ara iselken lumma-s si ddnubat-nsen .
40001022	Ayagi akk yedṛa iwakken ad ițwakemmel wayen i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi seg imi n nnbi Iceɛya :
40001023	Ațan tɛezrit aț-țerfed tadist , a d-tesɛu aqcic ad ițțusemmi Imanuwil yeɛni : « Ṛebbi yid-nneɣ . »
40001024	Mi i d-yuki Yusef , ixdem ayen i s-d-yenna lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi , yeqbel Meryem aț-țili ț-țameṭṭut-is ; yewwi-ț-id ɣer wexxam-is .
40001025	Meɛna ur ț-innul ara armi i d-tesɛa mmi-s iwumi isemma Ɛisa .
40002001	Sidna Ɛisa ilul di taddart n Bitelḥem , di tmurt n Yahuda di lweqt n ugellid Hiṛudus ameqqran , kra n imusnawen usan-d si cceṛq ɣer temdint n Lquds , iwakken ad steqsin :
40002002	anda ilul llufan-nni ara yilin d agellid n wat Isṛail ? Axaṭer nwala-d itri-ines si cceṛq , nusa-d a t-neɛbed .
40002003	Agellid Hiṛudus akk-d imezdaɣ n temdint n Lquds meṛṛa dehcen , yerwi lxaṭer-nsen mi slan s lexbaṛ-agi .
40002004	Hiṛudus yesnejmaɛ-ed akk lmuqedmin d lɛulama n wegdud , isteqsa-ten ɣef wemkan anda ara d-ilal Lmasiḥ ara d-yasen .
40002005	Nnan-as : Ahat di tmurt n Yahuda di taddart n Bitelḥem ! Axaṭer atan wayen i gura nnbi Mixa :
40002006	I kemm a taddart n Bitelḥem , ur telliḍ ara ț-țaneggarut ger temdinin n Yahuda , axaṭer seg-em ara d-iffeɣ ugellid ara yeksen at Isṛail agdud-iw .
40002007	Hiṛudus yessawel i imusnawen nni s tuffra , isteqsa-ten si melmi i walan itri-nni .
40002008	Dɣa iceggeɛ-iten ɣer Bitelḥem , yenna-yasen : Nadit lexbaṛ n ṣṣeḥ ɣef weqcic-agi , m'ara t-tafem , init-iyi-d iwakken ad ṛuḥeɣ ula d nekk a t-ɛabdeɣ .
40002009	Mi slan i ugellid , ṛuḥen . AAkken kan i ffɣen , walan itri-nni i ẓran di cceṛq yezwar , iteddu zdat-sen . MMi gewweḍ sennig wemkan anda yella weqcic-nni , yeḥbes .
40002010	Feṛḥen aṭas mi walan itri-nni .
40002011	Kecmen ɣer wexxam-nni , walan llufan akk-d yemma-s Meryem ; tɛeǧben s weqcic-nni dɣa seǧǧden zdat-es . FFsin tiyemmusin-nsen , fkan-as tirezfin : ddheb , lebxuṛ akk-d leɛṭeṛ ɣlayen .
40002012	Sidi Ṛebbi ixebbeṛ-iten-id di targit ur țțuɣalen ara ɣer Hiṛudus , dɣa uɣalen ɣer tmurt-nsen seg ubrid nniḍen .
40002013	Mi ṛuḥen , lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi idheṛ-as-ed i Yusef di targit , yenna-yas-ed : — Kker , ddem aqcic akk-d yemma-s , rewlet ɣer tmurt n Maṣeṛ , qqimet dinna alamma nniɣ-ak-ed a d-tuɣaleḍ , axaṭer Hiṛudus ad iqelleb ɣef weqcic-agi iwakken a t-ineɣ .
40002014	Yusef ikker yewwi aqcic-nni akk-d yemma-s deg iḍ , yerwel ɣer tmurt n Maṣeṛ .
40002015	Yeqqim dinna armi yemmut Hiṛudus , iwakken ad idṛu wayen i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi seg imi n nnbi Huceɛ : Ssawleɣ-as i Mmi a d-iffeɣ si tmurt n Maṣer .
40002016	Mi gwala Hiṛudus belli kelxen-t imusnawen-nni , ikcem-it zzɛaf d ameqqran , iceggeɛ ɣer taddart n Bitelḥem akk-d ț-țmura i s-d-izzin , ad nɣen arrac meṛṛa yesɛan si sin iseggasen d akessar , s wakken yella leḥsab i s-d-fkan imusnawen-nni .
40002017	Dɣa yețwakemmel wayen i d yenna nnbi Irmiya :
40002018	Yekker leɛyaḍ di taddart n Rama , nesla i imeṭṭawen d umeǧǧed , d Ṛaḥil i gețrun ɣef warraw-is , tegguma aț-țesbeṛ fell-asen , axaṭer mmuten .
40002019	Mi gemmut Hiṛudus ameqqran , lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi iweḥḥa-d i Yusef di targit mi gella di tmurt n Maṣer ,
40002020	yenna-yas : Kker , ddem aqcic d yemma-s tuɣaleḍ ɣer tmurt n wat Isṛail , axaṭer wid yebɣan ad nɣen aqcic-nni , mmuten .
40002021	Yusef iddem aqcic-nni d yemma-s , yuɣal ɣer tmurt n wat Isṛail
40002022	Meɛna mi gesla belli d Aṛxilyus mmi-s n Hiṛudus , i gellan d agellid ɣef tmurt n Yahuda , yuggad . SSidi Ṛebbi iɛeggen-as-ed di targit , iṛuḥ ɣer tmurt n Jlili ,
40002023	izdeɣ deg yiwet n taddart ițțusemman Naṣaret , iwakken ad yedṛu wayen i d-nnan lenbiya : Ad ițțusemmi Anaṣari .
40003001	Deg wussan-nni , iban-ed Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas , yețbecciṛ deg unezṛuf n tmurt n Yahuda ,
40003002	iqqaṛ-ed : Tubet , beddlet tikli , axaṭer tagelda n igenwan tqeṛṛeb-ed .
40003003	Fell-as i d-immeslay nnbi Iceɛya mi d-yenna : Ț-țaɣect n win ițɛeggiḍen di lxali : Heggit abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi , ssemsawit iberdan-is .
40003004	Yeḥya yelsa llebsa yețwaxedmen s ccɛeṛ n welɣem , tabagust n weglim ɣef wammas-is , tamɛict-is d ibẓaẓ akk-d tament n lexla .
40003005	Imezdaɣ meṛṛa n temdint n Lquds , tamurt n Yahuda akk-d tmura i d-yezzin i wasif n Urdun , țțasen-d ɣuṛ-es
40003006	iwakken a d-qiṛṛen s ddnubat nsen , nețța yesseɣḍas-iten deg wasif nni n Urdun .
40003007	Mi gwala aṭas n at ifariziyen d isaduqiyen i d-ițasen ad țwaɣeḍsen , yenna-yasen : A ccetla n izerman , anwa i kkun isfaqen belli tzemrem aț-țrewlem i lḥisab i d-iteddun ?
40003008	Sbeggnet-ed s lecɣal-nwen belli tettubem , tbeddlem tikli .
40003009	Ur qqaṛet ara i yiman-nwen : « Sidna Ibṛahim d jeddi-tneɣ » ! Axaṭer , a wen-iniɣ : SSidi Ṛebbi yezmer a d-ye dderya i Ibṛahim seg idɣaɣen-agi .
40003010	Ațan ihi tcaquṛt thegga ɣer izuṛan n ttjuṛ , yal ttejṛa ur d-nețțak ara lfakya lɛali , aț-țețwagzem , aț-țețwaḍeggeṛ ɣer tmes .
40003011	Nekk sseɣḍaseɣ-kkun deg waman iwakken aț-țetubem , lameɛna a d-yas yiwen yesɛan tazmert akteṛ-iw , ur uklaleɣ ara a s-fsiɣ ula d arkasen is . Nețța a kkun-yesseɣḍes s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ț-țmes .
40003012	Tazzert deg ufus-is , ad yebrez annar-is , ad ijmeɛ irden-is ɣer ikuffan , ma d alim a t-yesseṛɣ di tmes ur nxețți .
40003013	Sidna Ɛisa yusa-d si tmurt n Jlili ɣer wasif n Urdun iwakken a t-yesseɣḍes Yeḥya .
40003014	Yeḥya yugi , yenna-yas : D nekk i geḥwaǧen ad iyi-tesɣeḍseḍ , kečč tusiḍ-ed ɣuṛ-i iwakken a k-sɣeḍseɣ !
40003015	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Anef tura ! Akkagi i glaq a nexdem lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi ! DDɣa Yeḥya yunef-as .
40003016	Mi gețwaɣḍes Sidna Ɛisa , yeffeɣ-ed seg waman ; imiren kan ldin igenwan , yers-ed fell-as Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi s ṣṣifa n tetbirt .
40003017	Tekka-d yiwet n taɣect seg igenwan , tenna-d : « ` Wagi d Mmi ameɛzuz , deg-s i gella lfeṛḥ-iw ! »
40004001	Imiren Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yewwi Sidna Ɛisa ɣer unezṛuf iwakken a t-ijeṛṛeb Cciṭan .
40004002	Mi guẓam ṛebɛin wussan d ṛebɛin wuḍan , yuɣal yelluẓ .
40004003	Iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es Yeblis yenna-yas : Ma d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i telliḍ , ini-yasen i yedɣaɣen-agi ad uɣalen d aɣṛum .
40004004	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yura di tira iqedsen : Mačči s weɣṛum kan ara iɛic wemdan , lameɛna s mkul awal i d-ițasen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
40004005	Cciṭan yewwi-t ɣer temdint n Lquds issers-it ɣef yixef n lǧameɛ iqedsen ,
40004006	yenna-yas : Ma d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i telliḍ , ḍeggeṛ iman-ik d akessar , anaɣ yura : Sidi Ṛebbi ad ye lameṛ i lmalayekkat-is fell-ak , aa k-awint ger ifassen-nsent iwakken ad ḥadrent aḍar-ik ɣef yedɣaɣe n .
40004007	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yura daɣen : Ur tețjeṛṛibeḍ ara Sidi Ṛebbi IIllu-inek .
40004008	Cciṭan yewwi-t daɣen ɣef wedrar ɛlayen , isken-as-ed tigeldiwin meṛṛa n ddunit d lɛaḍima-nsent , yenna-yas :
40004009	A k-tent-fkeɣ meṛṛa ma yella tseǧǧdeḍ zdat-i a yi-tɛebdeḍ .
40004010	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Beɛɛed akkin fell-i a Cciṭan , axaṭer yura : Anagar Sidi Ṛebbi-inek ara tɛebdeḍ , i nețța kan iwumi ara tseǧdeḍ .
40004011	Dɣa Cciṭan iṭṭaxeṛ fell-as . Imiren usant-ed lmalayekkat ɣuṛ-es , iwakken a s-qedcent .
40004012	Mi gesla s Yeḥya yețwaḥbes , Sidna Ɛisa yuɣal ɣer tmurt n Jlili .
40004013	Iffeɣ si taddart n Naṣaret , iṛuḥ ad izdeɣ di Kafernaḥum ; ț-țamdint yyellan rrif n lebḥeṛ di leǧwahi n tmura n Zabulun d Nefṭali ,
40004014	iwakken ad yedṛu wayen yenna nnbi Iceɛya :
40004015	A tamurt n Zabulun akk-d Nefṭali , a timura iqeṛben lebḥeṛ akkin i wasif n Urdun , a tamurt n Jlili i deg zedɣen leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail ,
40004016	agdud-nni yezgan di ṭṭlam , iwala tafat tameqqrant , wid izedɣen di ṭṭlam n lmut , tceṛq-ed fell-asen tafat !
40004017	Seg imiren , Sidna Ɛisa yebda yețbecciṛ yeqqaṛ : Tubet , uɣalet-ed ɣer webrid , axaṭer tagelda n igenwan tqeṛṛeb-ed .
40004018	Mi gțeddu Sidna Ɛisa ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ n Jlili , iwala sin iḥewwaten : SSemɛun ițțusemman Buṭrus akk-d gma-s Andriyus . Llan ṭeggiṛen icebbaken-nsen ɣer lebḥeṛ , țṣeggiḍen .
40004019	Yenna-yasen : Ddut-ed yid-i , a kkun-rreɣ d iṣeggaḍen n yemdanen .
40004020	Dɣa imiren kan , ǧǧan icebbaken nsen , ddan yid-es .
40004021	Mi gerna yelḥa kra , iwala sin watmaten nniḍen : Yeɛqub d Yuḥenna yellan d arraw n Zabadi . LLlan akk-d baba-tsen di teflukt , țxiḍin icebbaken-nsen .
40004022	Yessawel-asen , imiren kan ǧǧan dinna baba-tsen , taflukt-nni , ṛuḥen ddan yid-es .
40004023	Syenna , Sidna Ɛisa yekka-d tamurt n Jlili meṛṛa , yesselmad di leǧwameɛ n wat Isṛail , yețbecciṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n tgeldit n Ṛebbi , isseḥlay yal aṭan d yal leɛyubat n lɣaci .
40004024	Slan yis ula di tmurt n Surya meṛṛa ; țțawin-as-ed imuḍan i ghelken si mkul aṭan : wid ițwamelken , wid iwumi yețṛuḥu leɛqel akk-d wukrifen . Sidna Ɛisa isseḥla-ten akk .
40004025	D izumal n lɣaci i t-id-itebɛen si tmurt n Jlili , si ɛecṛa n temdinin-nni , si temdint n Lquds , si tmurt n Yahuda akk-d leǧwahi yellan agemmaḍ i wasif n Urdun .
40005001	Mi gwala annect-nni n lɣaci , Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer wedrar iqqim . Inelmaden-is qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es ,
40005002	dɣa ibda isselmad-iten :
40005003	D iseɛdiyen wid ițeddun s neyya , aaxaṭer tagelda n igenwan d ayla-nsen !
40005004	D iseɛdiyen wid ițrun , axaṭer ad țwaṣebbṛen !
40005005	D iseɛdiyen wid ḥninen , aaxaṭer ad weṛten tamurt i sen-iwɛed Sidi Ṛebbi !
40005006	D iseɛdiyen wid illuẓen , iffuden lḥeqq , axaṭer ad ṛwun !
40005007	D iseɛdiyen wid yesɛan ṛṛeḥma deg wulawen-nsen , aaxaṭer ad iḥunn fell-asen Sidi Ṛebbi !
40005008	D iseɛdiyen wid iwumi yeṣfa wul , axaṭer ad walin Sidi Ṛebbi !
40005009	D iseɛdiyen wid i d-isrusun talwit , aad țțusemmin d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi !
40005010	D iseɛdiyen wid ițțuqehṛen ɣef lḥeqq , aaxaṭer ddewla igenwan d ayla-nsen !
40005011	D iseɛdiyen ara tilim , m'ara kkun-regmen , mm'ara tețwaqehṛem , m'ara xedmen deg-wen lbaṭel ɣef ddemma-w .
40005012	Feṛḥet , ilit di lfeṛḥ , axaṭer ṛṛezq-nwen d ameqqran deg igenwan , aakka i țwaqehṛen lenbiya i kkun-id izwaren .
40005013	D kunwi i d lmelḥ n ddunit , lameɛna ma tṛuḥ-as lbenna i lmelḥ , s wacu ara s-ț-id-nerr ? Yelha kan ma nḍeggeṛ-it ɣer beṛṛa a t-rekkḍen yemdanen .
40005014	D kunwi i ț-țafat n ddunit ; taddart yellan ɣef wudrar ulamek ara teffer !
40005015	Akken daɣen , ur nceɛɛel ara taftilt iwakken a ț-nɣumm s kra , meɛna a ț-nessers ɣef lmeṣbeḥ , iwakken aț-țfeǧǧeǧ i wid akk yellan deg wexxam .
40005016	Akka i glaq aț-țecceɛceɛ tafat-nwen zdat yemdanen , iwakken ad walin lecɣal-nwen ilhan , yerna ad ḥemden Baba-twen yellan deg igenwan .
40005017	Ɣuṛ-wat aț-țɣilem usiɣ-ed ad sseɣliɣ ayen i d-tenna ccariɛa d wayen i d-nnan lenbiya ! Ur d-usiɣ ara ad sseɣliɣ , lameɛna usiɣ-ed ad snekmaleɣ .
40005018	A wen-iniɣ tideț : skud mazal igenwan d lqaɛa , ula d yiwen wawal neɣ usekkil n ccariɛa ur imeḥḥu , alamma yedṛa wayen akk yuran deg-s .
40005019	Win ur nqudeṛ ara ula d yiwen n lameṛ amecṭuḥ n ccariɛa , yerna isselmad i wiyaḍ ad xedmen am nețța , ad ițwaḥseb d amecṭuḥ akk di tgelda n igenwan . MMa d win ixeddmen ayen i d-tenna ccariɛa , yerna isselmad i wiyaḍ ad xedmen akken , ad yili d ameqqran di tgelda n igenwan .
40005020	Axaṭer a wen-iniɣ , ma yella ur tuɣem ara awal i Sidi Ṛebbi akteṛ n wakken tețțaɣem awal i yimusnawen n ccariɛa d ifariziyen , ur tkeččmem ara tagelda n igenwan .
40005021	Teslam daɣen s leqwanen i d-ițțunefken i lejdud-nneɣ : Ur tneqqeḍ ara tamgeṛt , WWin ara yenɣen tamgeṛṭ , ad iɛeddi di ccṛeɛ , ad ițwaḥkem fell-as .
40005022	Ma d nekk a wen-iniɣ : kra n win ara izeɛfen ɣef gma-s , ad iɛeddi di ccṛeɛ . Win ara yinin i gma-s : « ay abuhal , » ad ibedd zdat wesqamu n ccraɛ . Win ara yinin i gma-s : « ay amehbul , » yuklal ad ikcem ɣer ǧahennama .
40005023	M'ara tțedduḍ aț-țefkeḍ lweɛda i Sidi Ṛebbi , temmektaḍ-ed zdat n wemkan n iseflawen belli gma-k iṭṭef-ak cceḥna ,
40005024	eǧǧ dinna lweɛda-nni , tṛuḥeḍ uqbel aț-ḍelbeḍ ssmaḥ i gma-k , d wamek ara tefkeḍ lweɛda-k i Sidi Ṛebbi .
40005025	Ma yella iḍlem-ik yiwen , tedduklem di sin ɣer wexxam n ccṛeɛ , ɣiwel msefham kečč yid-es deg ubrid , m'ulac axṣim-ik a k-yawi ɣer lḥakem , lḥakem a k-ye i wɛessas , aɛessas-nni , a k-yerr ɣer lḥebs .
40005026	A k-iniɣ tideț : ur d-țeffɣeḍ ara syenna alamma txellṣeḍ aṣurdi aneggaru n ṭṭlaba-inek .
40005027	Teslam belli qqaṛen-d : ur xeddem ara asekkak yeɛni zzna .
40005028	Lameɛna , nekkini a wen-d-iniɣ : win ara imuqlen tameṭṭut , imenna deg ul-is ad iznu yid-es , atan am akken izna yid-es .
40005029	Daymi ma yella ț-țiṭ-ik tayeffust i k-ițawin ɣer leḥṛam , qleɛ-iț , ḍeggeṛ-iț akkin fell-ak . Axaṭer axiṛ-ak a k-iṛuḥ yiwen si lemfaṣel-ik wala aț-țkecmeḍ s lekmal-ik ɣer ǧahennama .
40005030	Ma yella s ufus-ik ayeffus i txeddmeḍ leḥṛam , gzem-it , tḍegṛeḍ-t akkin fell-ak , axiṛ-ak a k-ixaṣ ufus wala ma tkecmeḍ s lekmal-ik ɣer ǧahennama .
40005031	Qqaṛen-d daɣen : Win ara yebrun i tmeṭṭut-is , a s-ye lkaɣeḍ n berru .
40005032	Lameɛna nekkini a wen-iniɣ : win ara yebrun i tmeṭṭut-is , yili ur tezni ara , d nețța i ț-iwelhen ɣer zzna ma tezweǧ d wayeḍ . Daɣen win yuɣen tameṭṭut innebran , ula d nețța yezna .
40005033	Teslam daɣen s wayen i d-nnan i lejdud-nneɣ : Ur ḥennet ara , lameɛna ayen i tɛuhdeḍ s limin zdat Sidi Ṛebbi , ilaq a t-txedmeḍ .
40005034	Meɛna nekk a wen-iniɣ : ur țgallat ara maḍi ! Ur țgallat s igenni , axaṭer d amkan n lḥekma n Sidi Ṛebbi ,
40005035	ur țgallat s lqaɛa axaṭer fell-as i gesrusu iḍaṛṛen-is , neɣ s Lquds imi ț-țamdint n ugellid ameqqran .
40005036	Ur țgallat ara daɣen : « s yixef n uqeṛṛuy-nwen » axaṭer ur tezmirem ara aț-țerrem ula d yiwen wenẓad d aberkan neɣ d amellal .
40005037	Init « ih » ma ilaq aț-ținim ih , neɣ « xaṭi » ma ilaq aț-ținim xaṭi ; ayen akk ara ternum d zzyada , s ɣuṛ Cciṭan i d-ițas .
40005038	Teslam s wayen i d-qqaṛen : Tiṭ s tiṭ , tuɣmest s tuɣmest .
40005039	Meɛna nekk a wen-iniɣ : ma yella win i wen-ixedmen cceṛ ur țțarat ara țțaṛ . Ma iwwet-ik yiwen ɣer lḥenk ayeffus , sken-as lḥenk nniḍen .
40005040	Ma yebɣa yiwen a k-isiweḍ ɣer ccṛeɛ iwakken a k-ikkes aqenduṛ-ik , rnu-yas ula d abeṛnus-ik .
40005041	Ma yella iḥṛes-ik walebɛaḍ a s-tbibbeḍ taɛkumt azgen webrid-is , kečč awi-yas-ț armi d axxam .
40005042	Efk-as ayen yeḥwaǧ i win i k-d-issutren , ur reggel ara ɣef win ibɣan ad yerḍel s ɣuṛ-ek .
40005043	Teslam i wayen i d-qqaṛen : Ḥemmel amdakkel-ik , tkeṛheḍ aɛdaw ik .
40005044	Nekk a wen-iniɣ : ḥemmlet iɛdawen-nwen i kkun ițqehhiṛen . BBarket wid i kkun-ineɛlen , xedmet lxiṛ i wid i kkun-ikeṛhen , dɛut s lxiṛ i wid i kkun-iḍelmen , akk-d wid i kkun-ițqehhiṛen .
40005045	S wakka ara d-tbanem d arraw n Baba-twen yellan deg igenwan , axaṭer nețța icṛeq-ed iṭij-is ama ɣef wid yelhan ama ɣef yemcumen , yețțak-ed ageffur ( lehwa ) ama i wid ixeddmen lxiṛ , ama i wid ixeddmen cceṛ .
40005046	Ma yella tḥemmlem kan wid i kkun-iḥemmlen , d acu n lfayda ara tesɛum ? Ula d imekkasen n tebzert ( leɣṛama ) xeddmen akenni .
40005047	Ma yella tețțemsalamem d watmaten-nwen kan , d acu n lxiṛ i txedmem ? Ula d imednuben xeddmen akken .
40005048	Sfut ihi akken yeṣfa Baba-twen n igenwan .
40006001	Ayen txeddmem i Sidi Ṛebbi , ur t-id-sbegginet ara iwakken a kkun-walin medden , m'ulac ur tseɛɛum ara lfayda ɣer Baba-twen yellan deg igenwan .
40006002	M'ara tseddqeḍ , ur țberriḥ ara am akken xeddmen at sin wudmawen di leǧwameɛ neɣ deg iberdan , iwakken ad sɛun ccan ɣer yemdanen . A wen iniɣ tideț : d ayagi kan i d lfayda-nsen .
40006003	Ma d kečč m'ara tseddqeḍ , ilaq afus-ik ayeffus ur ițwali ara wayen ixeddem ufus-ik azelmaḍ ;
40006004	iwakken ssadaqa-inek aț-țeqqim di sser , akka ara tețwaqebleḍ ɣer Baba Ṛebbi yețwalin ayen txeddmeḍ di sser .
40006005	M'ara tețẓallam , ur xeddmet ara am at sin wudmawen iḥemmlen ad ẓallen s ibeddi di leǧwameɛ neɣ deg iberdan iwakken a ten-walin medden . AA wen-iniɣ tideț : d ayagi kan i d lfayda-nsen .
40006006	Ma d kečč m'ara tebɣuḍ aț-țẓalleḍ , ṛuḥ ekcem ɣer texxamt-ik , sekkeṛ tawwurt , tedɛuḍ di sser ɣer Baba Ṛebbi , nețța yețwalin ayen yellan di sser , a k-id-iqbel .
40006007	M'ara tețẓallam , ur sṭuqqutet ara lehduṛ am akken xeddmen at ddunit , ɣilen s lketṛa n imeslayen ara d țwaqeblen .
40006008	Ur ten-țɛanadet ara , axaṭer Baba Ṛebbi yeẓra d acu teḥwaǧem uqbel a s-t-tessutrem .
40006009	Atah wamek ilaq aț-țețẓallam : AA Baba-tneɣ yellan deg igenwan , iisem-ik ad ițwaqeddes ,
40006010	lḥekma n tgeldit-ik a d-tass , llebɣi-k ad idṛu di lqaɛa aakken yedṛa deg igenwan .
40006011	Efk-aɣ-d mkul ass tamɛict-nneɣ .
40006012	Semmeḥ-aɣ ddnubat-nneɣ aakken i nețsamaḥ i wid i ɣ-iḍelmen .
40006013	Ssebɛed fell-aɣ ajeṛṛeb , ssellek-aɣ si tḥila n Cciṭan . AAxaṭer ɣuṛ-ek i tella tgeldit , ttazmert d lɛaḍima i dayem . Amin !
40006014	Ma yella tețsamaḥem i yemdanen ii wen-ixeddmen cceṛ , Baba Ṛebbi yyellan deg igenwan a wen-isameḥ uula i kunwi .
40006015	Lameɛna ma yella kkunwi ur tețsamaḥem ara i wiyaḍ , aatan Baba Ṛebbi ur a wen-ițsamaḥ aara ula i kunwi ddnubat-nwen .
40006016	Asmi ara tuẓummem , ur d tesbegginet ara iman-nwen tḥeznem am at sin wudmawen issexsaṛen udmawen-nsen iwakken a ten-țwalin yemdanen belli uẓamen . A wen-iniɣ tideț : d ayagi kan i d lfayda-nsen .
40006017	Ma d kečč , m'ara tuẓumeḍ , ssired udem-ik , tdehneḍ aqeṛṛuy-ik s rriḥa ,
40006018	iwakken yiwen ur k-iɛeqqel belli tuẓameḍ . Ilaq ayagi ad iqqim gar-ak d Baba Ṛebbi ițwalin ayen yellan di sser , nețța a k-id-iqbel .
40006019	Ur ssexzanet ara igerrujen di ddunit anda ara ten-yečč ubeɛɛuc d ṣṣdiḍ , anda ara ten-akren wid ifettken leḥyuḍ .
40006020	Meɛna sxeznet axiṛ igerrujen deg igenwan anda ur llin ibeɛɛac d ṣṣdiḍ isserkuyen , anda ur zmiren ara imakaren ad fetken neɣ ad akren .
40006021	Axaṭer anda yella ugerruj-ik , dinna ara yili wul-ik .
40006022	Allen , ț-țiftilin n lǧețța , ma yella seḥḥant wallen-ik , aț-țilliḍ s lekmal-ik di tafat .
40006023	Lameɛna , ma yella allen-ik ur seḥḥant ara , aț-țiliḍ di ṭṭlam . Ma yella dɣa allen-ik ur seḥḥant ara , tafat yellan deg-k d ṭṭlam , acḥal ihi berrik ṭṭlam i deg telliḍ .
40006024	Ur izmir yiwen ad iqdec ɣef sin imɛellmen deg yiwet n tikkelt . Ma iḥemmel yiwen , ad ikṛeh wayeḍ ; ma yeṭṭef deg yiwen , ad iḥqeṛ wayeḍ . Ur tezmirem ara ihi aț-țɛebdem Ṛebbi akk-d idrimen !
40006025	Daymi i wen-d-qqaṛeɣ : ur țḥebbiṛet ara i tudert-nwen , ɣef wayen ara teččem d wayen ara teswem akk-d wayen ara telsem . Acu i gesɛan azal , ț-țudert neɣ d lqut ? D lǧețța neɣ d llebsa ? Tudert tugar lqut , lǧețța tugar llebsa !
40006026	Walit igṭaṭ ( ifṛax ) deg igenwan : ur zerrɛen , ur meggren , ur jemmɛen ula d acemma ɣer ikuffan , meɛna Baba-twen yellan deg igenwan , yețțak-asen-d tamɛict-nsen . Eɛni ur teswim ara akteṛ n yefṛax ?
40006027	Anwa i gzemren s uḥebbeṛ , ad yernu kra n wussan i leɛmeṛ-is ?
40006028	Iwacu ara tḥebbṛem ɣef llebsa ? Walit amek i gemmun ijeǧǧigen n lexla : ur zeṭṭen , ur țellmen ,
40006029	lameɛna a wen-iniɣ : ula d agellid Sliman s yiman-is di ccan-is ameqqran , ur yelsi am yiwen seg-sen .
40006030	Ma yella Ṛebbi islusuy akka leḥcic yellan di lexla ass-agi , azekka ad ițwadeggeṛ ɣer tmes , amek ur kkun-islusu ara ula d kunwi ay imdanen ixuṣṣen di liman ?
40006031	Kkset anezgum i yiman-nwen , ur qqaṛet ara : d acu ara nečč , d acu ara nsew neɣ d acu ara nels ?
40006032	Axaṭer ayagi d imejhal i gețḥebbiṛen fell-as . Ma d Baba-twen yellan deg igenwan , yeẓra ayen akk teḥwaǧem !
40006033	Nadit uqbel ɣef tgeldit n Sidi Ṛebbi d wayen yellan d lḥeqq , ayen nniḍen meṛṛa d nețța ara wen-t-id yefken .
40006034	Ur țḥebbiṛet ara ihi i uzekka , axaṭer azekka s unezgum-is weḥd-es . Yal ass s leɛtab-ines !
40007001	Ur țḥasabet ara wiyaḍ iwakken ur kkun-ițḥasab ula d yiwen .
40007002	Akken tețḥasabem wiyaḍ ara kkun-iḥaseb Sidi Ṛebbi . A wen-d-iktil s lkil s wayes tețțektilim i wiyaḍ .
40007003	Acuɣeṛ tețmuqquleḍ axeclaw yellan di tiṭ n gma-k , kečč ur nețwali ara tigejdit yellan di tiṭ-ik ?
40007004	Amek ara tiniḍ i gma-k : « Eǧǧ-iyi ad kkseɣ axeclaw-nni yellan di tiṭ-ik , » kečč yesɛan tigejdit di tiṭ-ik ?
40007005	A bu sin wudmawen ! Ekkes uqbel tigejdit yellan di tiṭ-ik , imiren aț-țwaliḍ amek ara d-tekkseḍ axeclaw yellan di tiṭ n gma-k .
40007006	Ur țțaket ara ayen yeṣfan i yeqjan , ur ṭeggiṛet ara tiɛeqcin ɣlayen zdat yilfan , m'ulac a ten ṛekḍen yerna a d-zzin fell-awen a kkun-gezren .
40007007	Ssutret , a wen-d-ițune ! Nadit , aț-țafem ! Sqerbebbet , a wen-d-ldin !
40007008	Axaṭer kra n win ara issutren , a s-d-ițțune ! Win ițnadin , ad yaf ! A s-d-teldi tewwurt i win ara isṭebṭben .
40007009	Anwa deg-wen ara yefken ablaḍ i mmi-s ma yessuter-as-d aɣṛum ?
40007010	Neɣ , anwa deg-wen ara yefken azrem i mmi-s ma yella yessuter-as-d aslem ?
40007011	Ma yella kunwi yellan d imcumen tessnem aț-țefkem ayen yelhan i warraw-nwen , amek Baba twen yellan deg igenwan ur d-ițțak ara ayen yelhan i wid ara s-t-issutren ?
40007012	Ihi , xedmet i wiyaḍ ayen i tebɣam a wen-t-xedmen i kunwi , axaṭer akka i ɣ-d-tweṣṣa ccariɛa n Musa akk-d lenbiya .
40007013	Kecmet si tewwurt iḍeyqen ! Axaṭer acḥal tewseɛ tewwurt , acḥal yeshel webrid yețțawin ɣer nnger , yerna aṭas i gețɛeddayen syenna .
40007014	Meɛna acḥal teḍyeq tewwurt , acḥal yewɛeṛ webrid yețțawin ɣer tudert yerna drus i gețɛeddayen syenna .
40007015	Ḥadret iman-nwen si lenbiya n lekdeb ! Țțasen-d ɣuṛ-wen am izamaren , nutni ɣer daxel d uccanen .
40007016	A ten-tɛeqlem s lecɣal-nsen . UUr d-nțekkes ara tiẓurin seg inijel , neɣ lexṛif seg isennanen .
40007017	Ttejṛa yelhan , tețțak-ed lfakya yelhan , yir ttejṛa tețțak-ed lfakya n diri .
40007018	Ttejṛa yelhan ur tezmir ara a d-te yir lfakya , akken daɣen yir ttejṛa ur tezmir ara a d-te lfakya yelhan .
40007019	Yal ttejṛa ur d-nețțak ara lfakya lɛali aț-țețwagzem , aț-țețwaḍeggeṛ ɣer tmes .
40007020	S wakka , s lecɣal-nsen ara tɛeqlem lenbiya n lekdeb .
40007021	Mačči d wid kan i yi-d-iqqaṛen : « A Sidi , a Sidi » ara ikecmen ɣer tgelda n igenwan , meɛna d wid ixeddmen lebɣi n Baba yellan deg igenwan .
40007022	Aṭas ara yi-d-yinin ass n lḥisab : « a Sidi a Sidi , s yisem-ik i nbecceṛ imeslayen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi , s yisem-ik i nessufeɣ leǧnun , s yisem-ik i nexdem aṭas n lbeṛhanat ! »
40007023	Dɣa a sen-d-rreɣ : beɛdet akkin fell-i a wid ixeddmen cceṛ , ur kkun ssineɣ ara !
40007024	Akka , s kra n win yesmeḥsisen i wawal-iw yerna ixeddem-it , ițemcabi ɣer wemdan aɛeqli yebnan lsas n wexxam-is ɣef wezṛu .
40007025	Ageffur ( lehwa ) yeɣli-d , isaffen ḥemlen-d , aḍu ihubb-ed ɣef wexxam-nni , meɛna ur yeɣli ara , axaṭer lsas-is yers ɣef wezṛu .
40007026	Ma d win ismeḥsisen i wawal iw , ur nxeddem ara wayen i d-qqaṛeɣ , icuba ɣer wemdan ur nețxemmim ara , i gebnan axxam-is ɣef ṛṛmel ;
40007027	yeɣli-d ugeffur , ḥemlen-d isaffen , ihubb-ed waḍu ɣef wexxam-nni , imiren yeɣli . Lexsaṛa-s ț-țameqqrant !
40007028	Mi gfukk Sidna Ɛisa aselmed , lɣaci akk wehmen deg imeslayen-ines ,
40007029	axaṭer isselmad-iten s tissas , mačči am lecyux-nsen .
40008001	Mi d-yuder Sidna Ɛisa seg udrar , aṭas n lɣaci i t-id-itebɛen .
40008002	Ataya yiwen wemdan ihelken lbeṛs yusa-d ɣuṛ-es , iseǧǧed zdat-es , yenna-yas : A Sidi , ma yella tebɣiḍ , tzemreḍ a yi-tseḥluḍ .
40008003	Sidna Ɛisa yessers afus-is fell-as , yenna-yas : Bɣiɣ ! Ili-k teḥliḍ ! IImiren kan iḥla wergaz-nni si lbeṛs-ines , yeṣfa weglim-is .
40008004	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ḥader aț-țeḥkuḍ ula i yiwen ɣef wayagi , meɛna ṛuḥ ɣer yiwen si lmuqedmin a k-iẓer , ad iwali belli teṣfiḍ , tefkeḍ lweɛda-nni n tezdeg s wayes i wen-d-yumeṛ nnbi Musa , iwakken ayagi a sen-yili d țbut .
40008005	Akken i gekcem Sidna Ɛisa ɣer temdint n Kafernaḥum , ataya yiwen umeqqran n lɛeskeṛ n Ṛuman iqeṛṛeb ed ɣuṛ-es , iḥellel-it , yenna yas :
40008006	A Sidi , aqeddac-iw yenṭer , atan iḍleq deg wexxam , yekref !
40008007	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ad ṛuḥeɣ a t-sseḥluɣ .
40008008	Ameqqran n lɛeskeṛ yerra-yas : A Sidi , ur uklaleɣ ara aț-țkecmeḍ ɣer wexxam-iw , meɛna ini-d kan yiwen n wawal , aqeddac-iw ad iḥlu .
40008009	Axaṭer nekk s yiman-iw akken sɛiɣ wid iḥekmen fell-i , i sɛiɣ wid yellan seddaw n lḥekma-w . Ad iniɣ i yiwen ṛuḥ ad iṛuḥ , ad iniɣ i wayeḍ aṛwaḥ a d-yas , ad iniɣ daɣen i uqeddac-iw : xdem aya , a t-ixdem .
40008010	Mi gesla Sidna Ɛisa imeslayen-agi itɛeǧǧeb , yenna i wid yellan dinna : A wen-iniɣ tideț , ger wat Isṛail meṛṛa ur ufiɣ ara liman am wagi .
40008011	A wen-iniɣ daɣen : aṭas ara d-yasen si cceṛq d lɣeṛb , ad ṭṭfen imukan ɣer tama n Ibṛahim , n Isḥaq akk-d Yeɛqub di tgelda n igenwan .
40008012	Meɛna aṭas seg wid i gɣilen ad weṛten tagelda ara yețwaḍeggṛen ɣer beṛṛa , ɣer ṭṭlam anda ara ilin imeṭṭawen , nndama tameqqrant akk-d weqṛac n tuɣmas .
40008013	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i umeqqran-nni n lɛeskeṛ : Ṛuḥ , imi tumneḍ atan wayen i tḍelbeḍ a k-id-yaweḍ ! DDi teswiɛt-nni , yeḥla uqeddac-is .
40008014	Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ ɣer wexxam n Buṭrus , yufa taḍeggalt n Buṭrus deg usu tuɣ-iț tawla .
40008015	Innul afus-is , dɣa teffeɣ-iț tawla-nni . Imiren kan tekker-ed , tebda tqeddec-asen .
40008016	Mi geɣli yiṭij , wwin-d i Sidna Ɛisa aṭas n yemdanen ițwamelken . S wawal-is , issufeɣ seg-sen leǧnun yerna yesseḥla imuḍan meṛṛa .
40008017	Ixdem ayagi iwakken ad ițwakemmel wawal i d-yenna nnbi Iceɛya : Yewwi leɛyub-nneɣ , iɛebba lehlakat-nneɣ .
40008018	Sidna Ɛisa mi gwala annect-nni n lɣaci yezzi-yas-d , yumeṛ i inelmaden-is ad zegren ɣer ugemmaḍ n lebḥeṛ .
40008019	Yiwen lɛalem n ccariɛa iqeṛṛeb ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , yenna-yas : A Sidi , anda teddiḍ ad dduɣ .
40008020	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Uccanen sɛan lɣiṛan , ifṛax n igenni sɛan leɛcuc , ma d Mmi-s n bunadem ur yesɛi ara anda ara yessers aqeṛṛuy-is .
40008021	Yiwen seg inelmaden-is , yenna-yas : A Sidi , semmeḥ-iyi ad ṛuḥeɣ ad meḍleɣ baba .
40008022	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ddu yid-i eǧǧ wid yemmuten ad meḍlen lmegtin-nsen .
40008023	Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer teflukt , ddan yid-es inelmaden-is .
40008024	Deg yiwet n teswiɛt , tekker-ed tbuciḍant di lebḥeṛ armi tɣumm teflukt-nni s lemwaji . Sidna Ɛisa yella iṭṭes .
40008025	Qeṛṛben-d ɣuṛ-es inelmaden-is , ssakin-t-id , nnan-as : A Sidi , sellek-aɣ m'ulac a nemmet !
40008026	Yenna-yasen : Acimi tuggadem , a wid iwumi ixuṣṣ liman ! IImiren ikker , yumeṛ i waḍu d lebḥeṛ ad rsen dɣa ters-ed talwit ț-țameqqrant .
40008027	Wid iḥedṛen , tɛeǧǧben qqaṛen : Anwa-t wagi ? Ula d aḍu d lebḥeṛ țțaɣen-as awal !
40008028	Mi gewweḍ Sidna Ɛisa agemmaḍ i lebḥeṛ , ɣer tmurt n at Gadaṛa , a ten-aya sin yergazen yețwazedɣen , ffɣen-d si tmeqbeṛt , mmugren-t-id . Yiwen ur izmir ad iɛeddi seg webrid-nni axaṭer weɛṛen aṭas .
40008029	Bdan țɛeggiḍen : D acu i tebɣiḍ ɣuṛ-nneɣ a Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ? Tusiḍ-ed iwakken a ɣ-tɛețbeḍ uqbel lweqt ?
40008030	Di leǧwahi-nni , tella yiwet n tqeḍɛit tameqqrant n yilfan i gkessen dinna .
40008031	Leǧnun-nni țḥellilen Sidna Ɛisa , qqaṛen-as : Ma tessufɣeḍ-aɣ , ceggeɛ-aɣ ɣer tqeḍɛit-ihina n yilfan .
40008032	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet ! FFfɣen-d si sin-nni n yemdanen , kecmen deg yilfan-nni . IImiren kan , grarben ɣer daxel n lebḥeṛ , ɣeṛqen , mmuten akk .
40008033	Imeksawen-nni rewlen , ṛuḥen ɣer temdint ad ḥkun ayen akk yedṛan d yergazen-nni yețwamelken .
40008034	Imezdaɣ akk n temdint ffɣen-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa ; mi d-wwḍen ɣuṛ-es , ḥellelen-t ad iffeɣ si tmurt-nsen .
40009001	Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer teflukt , yezger lebḥeṛ yuɣal ɣer temdint n Kafernaḥum .
40009002	Wwin-as-d yiwen wukrif iḍleq ɣef wusu . MMi gwala liman n yemdanen-agi , yenna i wukrif-nni : Ur țțaggad ara a mmi , țwaɛeffan ak ddnubat-ik .
40009003	Llan dinna kra si lɛulama țxemmimen deg wulawen-nsen qqaṛen : Argaz-agi yekfeṛ !
40009004	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran ayen țxemmimen , yenna-yasen : Acuɣeṛ yir axemmem-agi deg ulawen-nwen ?
40009005	D acu i gsehlen a t-id-iniɣ : « Țwaɛfan-ak ddnubat-ik neɣ kker telḥuḍ » ?
40009006	Meɛna iwakken aț-țeẓrem belli Mmi-s n bunadem yesɛa tazmert di ddunit-agi ad yeɛfu ddnubat . . . YYenna i wukrif-nni : Ekker , ddem usu-inek tṛuḥeḍ ɣer wexxam-ik !
40009007	Imiren , argaz-nni yekker , iṛuḥ ɣer wexxam-is .
40009008	Mi walan ayagi , lɣaci akk ikcem-iten lxuf , țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi , imi i d-ifka tazmert am tagi i yemdanen .
40009009	Mi gɛedda zdat wexxam anda țxelliṣen tabzert , ( leɣṛama ) Sidna Ɛisa iwala yiwen umekkas isem-is Matta , yenna-yas : Ddu-d yid-i ! IImiren kan ikker Matta , yedda yid-es .
40009010	Mi llan tețțen deg wexxam n Matta , aṭas n imekkasen akk-d yir imdanen i d-yusan , qqimen akk-d Sidna Ɛisa d inelmaden-is , tețțen yid-sen .
40009011	Ifariziyen mi walan ayagi nnan i inelmaden-is : Acuɣeṛ Ssid-nwen iteț akk-d imekkasen d yir imdanen ?
40009012	Sidna Ɛisa yesla i wayen i d nnan , yerra-yasen : Mačči d wid iseḥḥan i geḥwaǧen ṭṭbib , meɛna d wid ihelken .
40009013	Meyzet ɣef lmeɛna n wawal-agi yellan di tira iqedsen : D ulawen yeṣfan i bɣiɣ mačči d iseflawen n lmal . AAxaṭer ur d-usiɣ ara ad ssiwleɣ i iḥeqqiyen iwakken a d uɣalen ɣer webrid , meɛna i imednuben .
40009014	Inelmaden n Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas usan-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Acuɣeṛ nukkni akk-d ifariziyen nețțuẓum ma d inelmaden-ik ur țțuẓumen ara ?
40009015	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Eɛni inebgawen n tmeɣṛa zemren ad ilin di leḥzen skud yella yesli yid-sen ? A d-yas wass i deg ara sen-ițwakkes yesli , imiren ad uẓummen .
40009016	Ur nezmir ara a nxiḍ tafaweț tajḍiṭ i uceṭṭiḍ aqdim , axaṭer tafaweț-nni tajḍiṭ aț-țejbed aceṭṭiḍ-nni aqdim , acerrig-nni ad innerni .
40009017	Ur nețɛemmiṛ ara daɣen iyeddiden iqdimen s ccṛab ajdid , neɣ m'ulac ad fellqen , ccṛab ad inɣel , iyeddiden ad xesṛen ; meɛna a nerr ccṛab ajdid deg yeddiden ijdiden , s wakkenni ccṛab d uyeddid ad țwaḥerzen .
40009018	Mazal Sidna Ɛisa ițmeslay , yusa-d yiwen n ccix n lǧameɛ iseǧǧed zdat-es , yenna-yas : Tura kan i temmut yelli , di leɛnaya-k as-ed aț-țserseḍ afus-ik fell-as , a d-teḥyu !
40009019	Sidna Ɛisa ikker yedda yid-es nețța d inelmaden-is .
40009020	Ațaya yiwet n tmeṭṭut yuḍnen ssiq tnac iseggasen aya , tekka-yas-d si deffir , tennul tacḍaṭ n ubeṛnus-is ,
40009021	axaṭer teqqaṛ deg ul-is : « lemmer zemreɣ ad nnaleɣ ɣas ula ț-țacḍaṭ n ubeṛnus-is , ad ḥluɣ . »
40009022	Sidna Ɛisa yezzi ɣer deffir , mi ț-iwala yenna-yas : Ur țțaggad a yell-i , liman-im isseḥla-kkem . SSeg imiren tameṭṭut-nni teḥla .
40009023	Mi gewweḍ Sidna Ɛisa ɣer wexxam n ccix-nni , yufa lɣaci țmeǧǧiden , yerna nhewwalen meṛṛa . Yenna-yasen :
40009024	Ffɣet syagi , taqcict ur temmut ara , d iḍes kan i teṭṭes . DDɣa țmesxiṛen fell-as .
40009025	Mi ssufɣen lɣaci , ikcem , yeṭṭef-ed taqcict-nni seg ufus , dɣa tekker-ed .
40009026	Yeffeɣ lexbaṛ-agi di tmurt meṛṛa .
40009027	Mi gṛuḥ Sidna Ɛisa syenna , tebɛen-t sin iderɣalen , țɛeggiḍen : A mmi-s n Sidna Dawed , ḥunn fell-aɣ !
40009028	Mi gewweḍ ɣer wexxam , iderɣalen-nni kecmen ɣuṛ-es , dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Tumnem belli zemreɣ a wen xedmeɣ ayen i yi-d-tessutrem ? RRran-as : Ih a Sidi numen !
40009029	Innul allen-nsen , yenna : A wen-ițwaxdem s wakken yella liman-nwen !
40009030	Dɣa yuɣal-asen-d yeẓri . Sidna Ɛisa yeggul deg-sen : Ɣuṛ-wat ad iffeɣ lexbaṛ ɣef wayagi !
40009031	Meɛna akken kan ffɣen , bdan aberreḥ , lexbaṛ-nni yekka-d meṛṛa tamurt .
40009032	Mi ṛuḥen sin-nni , a ten-aya wiyaḍ wwin-as-d yiwen wergaz i gesgugem uṛuḥani .
40009033	Akken issufeɣ Sidna Ɛisa aṛuḥani-nni , agugam-nni yebda ițmeslay . Lɣaci akk tɛeǧben , qqaṛen : Leɛmeṛ neẓri ayagi di tmurt n wat Isṛail !
40009034	Lameɛna ifariziyen qqaṛen : S tezmert n ugellid n leǧnun i ten-issufuɣ .
40009035	Sidna Ɛisa yekka-d ɣef temdinin ț-țudrin meṛṛa , yesselmad di leǧwameɛ nsen , yețbecciṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n tgeldit n Sidi Ṛebbi , isseḥlay mkul aṭan d mkul lɛib .
40009036	Sidna Ɛisa tegzem tasa-s mi gwala annect-nni n lɣaci ɛyan , feclen , ḥeznen am ulli ur nesɛi ameksa .
40009037	Dɣa yenna i inelmaden-is : Tamegra meqqṛet , meɛna drus ifellaḥen i gellan .
40009038	Ḥellelet ihi bab n tmegra a d iceggeɛ ixeddamen ɣer tmegra-s .
40010001	Sidna Ɛisa yessawel i tnac inelmaden-is , yefka-yasen tazmert s wayes ara ssufuɣen leǧnun , ara seḥluyen mkul aṭan d mkul lɛib .
40010002	Atnan yismawen n tnac-nni inelmaden n Sidna Ɛisa : Amezwaru d Semɛun ițțusemman Buṭrus akk-d gma-s Andriyus , Yeɛqub mmi-s n Zabadi akk-d gma-s Yuḥenna ,
40010003	Filibus d Bartelmay , Suma akk-d Matta amekkas n tebzert , Yeɛqub mmi-s n Ḥalfi akk-d Taddi ;
40010004	Semɛun awaṭani , Yudas n Qeṛyut , win akken ixedɛen Sidna Ɛisa .
40010005	Sidna Ɛisa iceggeɛ tnac inelmaden-is , iweṣṣa-ten : Ur țṛuḥut ara ɣer tmura tibeṛṛaniyin , ur keččmet ara ɣer temdinin n at Samarya ;
40010006	ṛuḥet axiṛ ɣer wat Isṛail yellan am ulli iḍaɛen .
40010007	M'ara tețțeddum , țbecciṛet qqaṛet : « Ațaya tgeldit n igenwan tqeṛṛeb-ed » !
40010008	Sseḥlut imuḍan , sseḥyut-ed lmegtin , ssizdeget wid ihelken lbeṛs , ssufɣet leǧnun . Akken i wen-d-ițțune mbla idrimen , fket ula d kunwi mbla idrimen .
40010009	Ur țțawit yid-wen ama d ddheb , ama d lfeṭṭa , ama d idrimen ;
40010010	ur țțawit yid-wen agrab neɣ sin iqendyaṛ , ur țțawit irkasen neɣ aɛekkaz , axaṭer axeddam yuklal lqut-is .
40010011	Di yal tamdint neɣ taddart anda ara tkecmem , steqsit ma yella win ara yesṭerḥben yis-wen , qqimet ɣuṛ-es alamma tekkrem aț-țṛuḥem .
40010012	M'ara tkecmem ɣer yiwen wexxam , sellmet fell-asen ,
40010013	ma sṭerḥben yis-wen , lehna-nwen aț-țers fell-asen ; ma yella ur sṭerḥben ara yis-wen , lehna-nwen aț-țeqqim ɣuṛ-wen .
40010014	M'ur qbilen ara ad sṭreḥben yis-wen neɣ ad semḥessen i wawal , ffɣet seg wexxam-nni neɣ si temdint nni , zwit ula d aɣebbaṛ seg iḍaṛṛen nwen .
40010015	A wen-iniɣ tideț : ass n lḥisab , imezdaɣ n temdint-agi ad țțuɛaqben akteṛ n temdinin n Sudum akk-d Gumuṛ .
40010016	Atan , a kkun-ceggɛeɣ am ulli ger wuccanen , ḥeṛcet ihi am izerman , sɛut neyya am yetbiren .
40010017	Ḥadret ɣef yiman-nwen , axaṭer kra n yemdanen a kkun-sbedden ɣer ccṛeɛ ; yerna a kkun-wten s ujelkaḍ di leǧwameɛ-nsen .
40010018	Ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw , a kkun-sbedden zdat lḥekkam akk-d igelliden , iwakken am nutni am at leǧnas nniḍen , ad slen s yisem-iw .
40010019	M'ara kkun-ṭṭfen , ur țḥebbiṛet ara ɣef wamek ara temmeslayem , neɣ ɣef wayen ara d-tinim , imeslayen ara d-tinim , a wen-d-țțunefken di teswiɛt nni kan .
40010020	Axaṭer mačči d kunwi ara imeslayen , meɛna d Ṛṛuḥ n Baba Ṛebbi ara d-imeslayen seg-wen .
40010021	Amdan ad ye gma-s ɣer lmut , ababat ad ye mmi-s , dderya a d kkren ɣer imawlan-nsen , a ten ssiwḍen ɣer lmut .
40010022	A kkun-keṛhen irkul ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw , meɛna win ara yeṭṭfen alamma ț-țaggara , ad ițțusellek .
40010023	M'ara tețwaqehṛem deg yiwet n temdint , rewlet ɣer tayeḍ . A wen-iniɣ tideț : Mmi-s n bunadem a d-yuɣal uqbel a d-tekkem tudrin meṛṛa n tmurt n wat Isṛail .
40010024	Ulac anelmad yugaren ccix-is neɣ aqeddac yellan sennig umɛellem is .
40010025	Akken ițwaḥseb ccix ara yețwaḥseb unelmad-is . Daɣen akken yella wemɛellem ara yili uqeddac-is . MMa semman i bab n wexxam Balzabul iḥekkmen ɣef leǧnun , amek ur țsemmin ara akkenni i wat wexxam-is !
40010026	Ur ten-țaggadet ara ihi ! Axaṭer kra n wayen yeffren a d-iḍheṛ , kra n lbaḍna yellan a d-tban .
40010027	Ayen i wen-qqaṛeɣ deg iḍ , init-eț ɛinani deg wass , ayen slan imeẓẓuɣen-nwen di sser , berrḥet-eț deg iberdan .
40010028	Ur țțaggadet ara wid ineqqen lǧețța lameɛna ur zmiren ara ad nnɣen ṛṛuḥ , aggadet win izemren ad iḍeggeṛ ṛṛuḥ akk-d lǧețța ɣer ǧahennama .
40010029	Eɛni ur znuzun ara sin iẓiwcen s uṣuṛdi ? Meɛna ula d yiwen deg-sen ur d-iɣelli ɣer lqaɛa mbla lebɣi n Baba Ṛebbi .
40010030	Ula d anẓaden uqeṛṛuy-nwen țwaḥesben irkulli .
40010031	Ihi ur țțaggadet ara : tesɛam azal akteṛ n waṭas n iẓiwcen !
40010032	Kra win ara yessetḥin s yisem-iw zdat yemdanen , ula d nekk , ad ssetḥiɣ yis zdat Baba yellan deg igenwan .
40010033	Kra win ara yi-nekṛen zdat yemdanen , a t-nekkṛeɣ ula d nekk zdat Baba yellan deg igenwan .
40010034	Ɣuṛ-wat aț-țɣilem d lehna i d wwiɣ ɣer ddunit ; mačči d lehna i d-wwiɣ , meɛna d ccwal i d-wwiɣ .
40010035	Axaṭer wwiɣ-d lfiṛaq ger weqcic d baba-s , ger teqcict d yemma-s , ger teslit ț-țemɣaṛt-is ,
40010036	a d-kkren yeɛdawen seg at wexxam .
40010037	Win iḥemmlen baba-s d yemma-s neɣ mmi-s d yelli-s akteṛ iw ur yuklal ara ad yili d anelmad-iw .
40010038	Kra win ur neqbil ara ad inɛețțab ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw iwakken ad iyi-itbeɛ , ur yuklal ara ad yili d anelmad-iw .
40010039	Win iḥerzen taṛwiḥt-is , a s-tṛuḥ , ma d win ara isebblen taṛwiḥt-is ɣef ddemma-w ad yuɣal a ț-yaf .
40010040	Win isṭerḥben yis-wen , yis-i i gesṭerḥeb , win isṭerḥben yis-i , isṭerḥeb s win i yi-d-iceggɛen .
40010041	Win isṭerḥben s nnbi imi s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-yusa a s-d-ițțune wayen yuklal nnbi , win isṭerḥben s uḥeqqi imi d aḥeqqi i gella , a s-d-ițune wayen yuklal uḥeqqi .
40010042	Kra win ara yefken lkas n waman isemmaḍen i yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi imi d anelmad-iw i gella , a wen-iniɣ tideț : ur a s-ițṛuḥ ara lḥeqq yuklal .
40011001	Mi gweṣṣa tnac-nni inelmaden is , Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ syenna ad ibecceṛ di tudrin n leǧwahi-nni .
40011002	Yeḥya yellan di lḥebs , yesla s lecɣal n Lmasiḥ , iceggeɛ ɣuṛ-es inelmaden is iwakken a s-inin :
40011003	D kečč i d win akken ara d yasen neɣ ilaq-aɣ a nerǧu wayeḍ ?
40011004	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen-d : Ṛuḥet ssiwḍet-as lexbaṛ i Yeḥya ɣef wayen twalam d wayen teslam :
40011005	Iderɣalen țwalin , iquḍaren leḥḥun , ibeṛsiyen ṣeffun , iɛeẓẓugen sellen , lmegtin ḥeggun-d , lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ițțubecceṛ i yimeɣban .
40011006	D aseɛdi win iwumi ur țțiliɣ ara d sebba n tuccḍa ( ugur ) !
40011007	Mi ṛuḥen inelmaden-is , Sidna Ɛisa yebda iheddeṛ i lɣaci ɣef Yeḥya : D acu i tṛuḥem a t-id-teẓrem deg unezṛuf ? D aɣanim yețhuzzu waḍu ?
40011008	Ɣer wacu i tṛuḥem aț-țfeṛǧem ? ƔƔer yiwen wergaz yelsan llebsa ifazen ? Wid yețlusun llebsa ifazen , deg ixxamen n igelliden i țțilin .
40011009	Anwa i ɣer tṛuḥem a t-id-teẓrem ihi ? D yiwen n nnbi ? Țideț ih , d nnbi ! A wen-iniɣ : yugar nnbi .
40011010	Axaṭer d nețța i ɣef yura : Atan zewwreɣ zdat-ek amceggeɛ-inu , iwakken ad iheggi abrid zdat-ek .
40011011	A wen-iniɣ tideț : ulac mmi-s n tmeṭṭut yugaren Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas . Lameɛna , amecṭuḥ maḍi di tgelda n igenwan , meqqeṛ akteṛ-is .
40011012	Seg wussan-nni i deg ițbecciṛ Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas armi ț-țura , imdanen țnaɣen ɣef tgelda n igenwan , bɣan a ț-țkecmen s ddreɛ .
40011013	Axaṭer ccariɛa n Musa d lenbiya hedṛen-d ɣef tgelda n igenwan armi d lweqt n Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas .
40011014	Ma tebɣam aț-țfehmem , d nețța i d Ilyas-nni ilaqen a d-yas .
40011015	Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen , isel-ed !
40011016	Ɣer wuɣuṛ ara metleɣ lǧil-agi ? Icuba ɣer warrac yeqqimen deg uzniq , ssawalen i warrac nniḍen , qqaṛen asen :
40011017	Newwet ajewwaq uur tecḍiḥem ara , nnecna cnawi n leḥzen uur tmeǧdem ara .
40011018	Axaṭer Yeḥya yusa-d , ur iteț ur itess , tennam : « izdeɣ-it uṛuḥani . »
40011019	Mmi-s n bunadem yusa-d , iteț , itess am wiyaḍ , teqqaṛem : « ` Ițxemmim kan ɣef wučči ț-țissit , d amdakkul n imekkasen ixeddaɛen akk-d yir imdanen » lameɛna tideț tban-ed s lecɣal-is .
40011020	Sidna Ɛisa ibda ițlumu timdinin nni i deg ixdem aṭas n lbeṛhanat , axaṭer imezdaɣ-is ur d-uɣalen ara ɣer webrid n Ṛebbi .
40011021	A nnger-im a tamdint n Kurazim ! A nnger-im a tamdint n Bitsayda ! Axaṭer lemmer lbeṛhanat yedṛan deg-kkunt dṛan di temdinin n Sur akk-d Sidun , tili imezdaɣ-nsent aṭas aya i sburren tacekkaṛt n leḥzen , qqimen ɣef yiɣiɣden iwakken a d sbegnen belli ndemmen uɣalen-d ɣer ubrid n Ṛebbi .
40011022	Daymi , imezdaɣ n temdinin-agi ad țuɛaqben akteṛ n wid n temdinin n Sur akk-d Sidun .
40011023	Ula d kemm a tamdint n Kafernaḥum , tɣileḍ aț-țaliḍ ɣer igenni ? Xaṭi ! Aț-țețwaḍeggreḍ ɣer laxeṛt ; axaṭer lemmer di temdint n Sudum i dṛan lbeṛhanat i gedṛan ɣuṛ-em , tili mazal-iț ar ass-a !
40011024	Daymi , ass n lḥisab anegaru aț-țețțuɛaqbeḍ akteṛ n tmurt n Sudum .
40011025	Di lweqt-nni , Sidna Ɛisa inṭeq yenna : Ḥemmdeɣ-k a Baba Ṛebbi , a Bab igenwan d lqaɛa , imi i d tessekneḍ i imecṭaḥ ayen i teffreḍ i imusnawen d lɛuqal .
40011026	Ih a Baba Ṛebbi ! Ḥemmdeɣ-k imi d wagi i d lebɣi-k .
40011027	Baba Ṛebbi yerra-d kullec ger ifassen-iw . YYiwen ur yessin Mmi-s n Ṛebbi anagar Baba Ṛebbi ! Yiwen ur issin daɣen Baba Ṛebbi anagar Mmi-s akk-d win iwumi yebɣa Mmi-s a s-t-id-isken .
40011028	Aset-ed ɣuṛ-i a wid akk yeɛyan , iɛebban taɛekkumt ẓẓayen , a wen-fkeɣ talwit d westeɛfu .
40011029	Refdet ɣef tuyat-nwen azaglu inu tlemdem s ɣuṛ-i , axaṭer ul-iw yeččuṛ d ṛṛeḥma yerna d aḥnin , aț-țafem talwit i teṛwiḥin-nwen .
40011030	Azaglu-inu yeshel , taɛekkumt-iw fsuset .
40012001	Yiwet n tikkelt , deg wass n ssebt yellan d ass n westeɛfu , Sidna Ɛisa izger igran n yirden . Inelmaden-is lluẓen , bdan țekksen-d tigedrin , tețțen-tent .
40012002	Ifariziyen mi ten-walan , nnan i Sidna Ɛisa : Acuɣeṛ inelmaden-ik xeddmen ayen iḥeṛmen deg wass n westeɛfu ?
40012003	Meɛna Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Eɛni ur teɣṛim ara wayen yexdem ugellid Dawed , mi gelluẓ nețța d wid yellan yid-es ?
40012004	Mi gekcem ɣer wexxam iqedsen , yečča seg weɣṛum-nni yețțunefken d lweɛda i lmuqedmin yerna yefka seg-s i imdukkal-is !
40012005	Eɛni ur teɣṛim ara di tektabt n ccariɛa n Musa belli lmuqedmin xeddmen ɣas akken d ass n westeɛfu yerna mačči d leḥṛam fell-asen ?
40012006	Ihi a wen-d-iniɣ : yella dagi win yugaren axxam iqedsen .
40012007	Lemmer tfehmem d acu i d lmeɛna n wawal-agi : D ulawen yesɛan ṛṛeḥma i bɣiɣ mačči d isflawen n lmal ttili ur tḥekkmem ara s lmut ɣef wid ur neḍlim ara !
40012008	Axaṭer Mmi-s n bunadem , d nețța i gḥekmen ɣef wass n westeɛfu .
40012009	Syenna , yerra ɣer yiwen n lǧameɛ ,
40012010	yella dinna yiwen wergaz iwumi yekref ufus . Ifariziyen steqsan-t nnan-as : Eɛni iḥlel useḥlu deg wass n westeɛfu ? SSteqsan-t akka , iwakken a s-d-afen sebba s wayes ara t-sḍelmen .
40012011	Yerra-yasen : Anwa deg-wen yesɛan yiwet n tixsi kan , ma yella teɣli ɣer tesra deg wass n westeɛfu ur ț-id-issalay ara ?
40012012	Eɛni tixsi teswa akteṛ n wemdan ? Ihi , yeḥlel a nexdem lxiṛ deg wass n westeɛfu !
40012013	Imiren Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas i wergaz-nni : Sleq-ed afus-ik ! YYeḍleq afus-is , dɣa yuɣal iṣeḥḥa am ufus nniḍen .
40012014	Ifariziyen ffɣen , ṛuḥen mcawaṛen wway gar-asen amek ara a s-d-afen sebba s wayes ara t-nɣen .
40012015	Mi gesla bɣan a t-nɣen , Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ syenna . Aṭas i geddan yid-es , yesseḥlay imuḍan meṛṛa ,
40012016	iqqaṛ-asen : Ɣuṛ-wat aț-țessufɣem lexbaṛ !
40012017	Iwakken ad idṛu wayen yenna nnbi Iceɛya :
40012018	Ataya uqeddac-iw i xtaṛeɣ , win eɛzizen fell-i , deg-s i gella lfeṛḥ-iw . A d-yers Ṛṛuḥ-iw fell-as , ad ibecceṛ lḥeqq i leǧnas .
40012019	Ur iskkaray ara ccwal , ur ițɛeggiḍ ara , ur ițḥettim ara iman-is ɣef wiyaḍ .
40012020	Ur ițkemmil ara i uɣanim iceqqeqen , ur isnusuy ara taftilt yețmețțaten , alamma yesbedd lḥeqq .
40012021	Imiren leǧnas meṛṛa ad ssirmen ɣuṛ-es , fell-as ara țeklen .
40012022	Wwin-d i Sidna Ɛisa yiwen wergaz i gesgugem , i gesderɣel uṛuḥani . Yesseḥla-t , yuɣal wergaz-nni iheddeṛ , yețwali .
40012023	Lɣaci meṛṛa wehmen di Sidna Ɛisa qqaṛen : Mačči d wagi i d mmi-s n Sidna Dawed , win akken ara d-yasen ?
40012024	Mi sen-slan ifariziyen nnan : Argaz-agi yessufuɣ leǧnun s tezmert n Balzabul iḥekkmen ɣef leǧnun .
40012025	Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran ayen i țxemmimen , yenna-yasen : Yal tagelda anda țnaɣen lɣaci wway gar-asen , aț-țuɣal aț-țenger . YYal taddart neɣ yal axxam i deg țnaɣen imezdaɣ wway gar-asen , ur d-yețɣimi ara .
40012026	Ma yella Cciṭan issufuɣ Cciṭan , atan yebḍa d yiman-is ! Amek ihi ara d-tdum ddewla-s ?
40012027	Ma yella nekkini ssufuɣeɣ leǧnun s tezmert n Balzabul , i warraw nwen s wacu i ten ssufuɣen ? Daymi , d arraw-nwen ara kkun-iḥasben !
40012028	Meɛna ma yella nekkini s Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i ssufuɣeɣ leǧnun , ihi tagelda n Ṛebbi ațan tewweḍ-ed armi d ɣuṛ-wen .
40012029	Yiwen ur yezmir ad ikcem ɣer wexxam n wergaz iǧehden iwakken a s-iddem ayla-as ma yella ur t-yuriz ara uqbel , meɛna m'ara t-yarez , imiren ad yizmir ad iddem ayen akk yellan deg wexxam-is .
40012030	Win ur nelli ara yid-i , ixulef-iyi ; win ur d-njemmeɛ ara yid-i ițḍeggiɛ !
40012031	Daymi i wen-qqaṛeɣ : Mkul ddnub d mkul rregmat zemren ad țwasemmḥen i yemdanen , ma d rregmat ɣef Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ur țwasemmaḥent ara !
40012032	Yal win ara iregmen di Mmi-s n bunadem , a s-ițwasameḥ , ma d win ara iregmen Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , ur s-ițwasamaḥ ara ama di lweqt-agi , ama di lweqt i d-iteddun .
40012033	Ɛeqlet ttejṛa ɣer lfakya-s : ma telha ttejṛa , a d-te lfakya yelhan , ma yella diri-ț , a d-te lfakya n diri !
40012034	A ccetla n izerman , amek ara d-tinim ayen yelhan ma yella kunwi diri-kkun ? Axaṭer d ayen yellan deg ul i d-ițeffɣen seg imi !
40012035	Argaz lɛali yessufuɣ-ed ayen yelhan seg ugerruj yellan deg ul-is ma d amcum yessufuɣ-ed ayen n diri si lexzin n diri yellan deg ul-is !
40012036	Aql-i nniɣ-awen-t : ass n lḥisab , ad țțuḥasben yemdanen ɣef yal awal ur nesɛi lmeɛna i d-iffɣen seg yimi-nsen ;
40012037	axaṭer ɣef leḥsab n imeslayen-ik ara tețțuḥasbeḍ , d imeslayen-ik ara d-isbeggnen ma d aḥeqqi i telliḍ neɣ d amcum .
40012038	Dɣa kra n lɛulama n ccariɛa akk-d ifariziyen nnan i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi , nebɣa a k-nwali txedmeḍ yiwen n lbeṛhan .
40012039	Sidna Ɛisa yerra yasen : Lǧil am-agi ijehlen ixedɛen Ṛebbi , yessutur lbeṛhan , ur a sen d-yețțunefkay ara lbeṛhan nniḍen anagar win n nnbi Yunes .
40012040	Axaṭer akken yesɛedda nnbi Yunes tlata wussan d tlata wuḍan deg uɛebbuḍ n uḥewtiw ameqqran di lebḥeṛ , akken daɣen ara yesɛeddi Mmi-s n bunadem tlata wussan d tlata wuḍan zdaxel n wakal .
40012041	Ass n lḥisab , imezdaɣ n temdint n Ninebi a d-kkren ɣer yemdanen n lǧil-agi ad ccetkin fell-asen iwakken ad țțuḥasben , axaṭer nutni uɣalen-d ɣer webrid mi slan i ubecceṛ n nnbi Yunes . AA wen-d-iniɣ : atan yella dagi win yugaren nnbi Yunes !
40012042	Ass n lḥisab , tagellit n tmurt n Ḥabac a d-tekker ɣer yemdanen n lǧil-agi aț-țeccetki fell-asen iwakken ad țțuḥasben , axaṭer tusa-d seg yixef n ddunit iwakken aț-țsel i tmusni n ugellid Sliman . AAtan nniɣ-awen yella dagi win yugaren agellid Sliman !
40012043	M'ara yețwaqecceɛ uṛuḥani seg yiwen wemdan , ad ițezzi deg imukan yexlan , ad ițqellib anda ara yaf ṛṛaḥa ur yețțaf ara .
40012044	Dɣa ad yini : Ad uɣaleɣ ɣer umkan ansi i d-ffɣeɣ ! MMi guɣal ɣer wemdan-nni , ad yaf amkan d ilem , zeddig yerna iseggem .
40012045	Imiren ad iṛuḥ a d-yawi sebɛa iṛuḥaniyen nniḍen i gweɛṛen akteṛ-is , ad kecmen ɣer dinna , ad zedɣen . Lḥala n wergaz-nni aț-țenṭaṛ akteṛ n tikkelt tamezwarut . Akka ara tedṛu d lǧil-agi ijehlen .
40012046	Mazal Sidna Ɛisa yețmeslay i lɣaci , mi d-yusa yiwen wergaz yenna-yas : Yemma-k d watmaten-ik atnan di beṛṛa , bɣan a k-ẓren .
40012047	
40012048	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Anta i d yemma , anwi i d atmaten-iw ?
40012049	Iwehha s ufus-is ɣer inelmaden is yenna : D wigi i d yemma d watmaten-iw !
40012050	Axaṭer win ixeddmen lebɣi n Baba yellan deg igenwan , d winna i d gma , i d weltma , i d yemma .
40013001	Ass-nni kan , Sidna Ɛisa yeffeɣ-ed seg wexxam , iṛuḥ ad iqqim rrif n lebḥeṛ ,
40013002	d izumal n lɣaci i s-d-izzin , dɣa yuli ɣer teflukt , yeqqim . LLɣaci ibedd ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ ,
40013003	nețța yebda isselmad-iten s lemtul iqqaṛ-asen : Yiwen ufellaḥ yeffeɣ ad izreɛ .
40013004	Mi gzerreɛ , ɣlin-as kra n iɛeqqayen rrif n webrid , usan-d igṭaṭ ( ifṛax igenni ) ččan-ten .
40013005	Kra iɛeqqayen nniḍen ɣlin deg wakal yeččuṛen d izṛa , mɣin-d s lemɣawla axaṭer ulac aṭas n wakal .
40013006	Mi gebda wezɣal , yezlef imɣan nni dɣa qquṛen , axaṭer ur sɛin ara izuṛan lqayen .
40013007	Kra iɛeqqayen nniḍen ɣlin ger isennanen . Isennanen-nni gman dɣa ɣummen-ten .
40013008	Meɛna kra iɛeqqayen ɣlin deg wakal yelhan : fkan-d tigedrin , ta tefka-d meyya iɛeqqayen , ta sețțin , tayeḍ tlatin .
40013009	Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen isel-ed !
40013010	Inelmaden-is qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es , nnan-as : Acimi i sen-theddṛeḍ s lemtul ?
40013011	Yerra-yasen : Kunwi yețțunefk-awen-d aț țissinem lbaḍna n tgelda igenwan , ma d wiyaḍ , ur sen-d-ițțune ara .
40013012	Axaṭer win yesɛan a s-d-nernu alamma yella di tawant , ma d win ur nesɛi ara , a s-nekkes ula d ayen yesɛa .
40013013	Daymi i sen-țmeslayeɣ s lemtul , axaṭer țmuqulen ur țwalin , țḥessisen ur sellen , ur fehhmen .
40013014	S wakka , yedṛa-d yid-sen wayen i d-ixebbeṛ fell-asen nnbi Iceɛya : Aț-țsellem s imeẓẓuɣen-nwen , ur tfehhmem ara , aț-țmuqulem s wallen-nwen , ur tețwalim ara ,
40013015	Imi agdud-agi qquṛen wulawen-nsen , qeflen imeẓẓuɣen-sen , qqnen allen-nsen , iwakken ur țwalin , ur sellen ; sseɣṛen ulawen nsen , ugin ad fehmen , axaṭer lemmer tuben , uɣalen-d ɣer webrid , tili sseḥlaɣ ten .
40013016	Ma d kunwi amarezg-nwen ! Axaṭer allen-nwen țwalint , imeẓẓuɣen nwen sellen .
40013017	Aql-i nniɣ-awen tideț , aṭas si lenbiya akk-d imdanen iḥeqqiyen i gebɣan ad walin ayen tețwalim , ur t-walan , ad slen ayen tsellem , ur t-slin .
40013018	A wen-d-iniɣ lmeɛna n lemtel n win izerrɛen :
40013019	m'ara isel wemdan i wawal yeɛnan tageldit n igenwan , ur t-yefhim ara , ițemcabi ɣer yiri n webrid i ɣer tɣelli zzerriɛa ; d Cciṭan i d-ițasen ad iqleɛ ayen izerɛen deg ul-is .
40013020	Wayeḍ ițemcabi ɣer wakal-nni yeččuṛen d izṛa anda teɣli zzerriɛa . M'ara isel i wawal n Ṛebbi , iqebbel-it s lfeṛḥ ,
40013021	meɛna ur t-yețțaǧǧa ara ad iger izuṛan deg-s , ur yețțaṭṭaf ara . MM'ara d-tass lmeḥna neɣ aqehheṛ ɣef ddemma n wawal n Ṛebbi , ad yeǧǧ imiren kan liman-is .
40013022	Wayeḍ daɣen ițemcabi ɣer zzerriɛa yeɣlin ger isennanen . M'ara isel i wawal n Ṛebbi , iɣeblan n ddunit d ṭṭmeɛ n rrbeḥ țɣummun awal-nni , dɣa ur d-ițțak ara lfakya .
40013023	Wayeḍ icuba daɣen ɣer zzerriɛa yeɣlin deg wakal yelhan , m'ara isel i wawal n Ṛebbi , ifehhem-it , daymi i d-ițțak lfakya ! YYal aɛeqqa ițțak-ed : wa tlatin , wa sețțin , wa meyya n tɛeqqayin .
40013024	Sidna Ɛisa yefka-yasen-d lemtel nniḍen : Tagelda n igenwan tcuba ɣer yiwen wergaz i gzerɛen irden deg iger-is .
40013025	Yiwen yiḍ mi ṭṭsen akk medden , yusa-d weɛdaw-is izreɛ aẓekkun ger yirden , imiren iṛuḥ .
40013026	Mi d-gman yirden-nni fkan-d tigedrin , aẓekkun-nni ula d nețța igma-d .
40013027	Iqeddacen n bab n iger-nni , usan-d ɣuṛ-es nnan-as : A Sidi , eɛni mačči d irden i tzerɛeḍ deg iger-ik ? Ansi i d-ikka ihi uẓekkun-agi ?
40013028	Yerra-yasen : D yiwen weɛdaw i gxedmen akka ! IIqeddacen-nni nnan-as : Ihi tebɣiḍ a nṛuḥ a neqleɛ aẓekkun-agi ?
40013029	Yerra-yasen : Xaṭi ! Axaṭer m'ara tekksem aẓekkun , tzemrem a d-teglum s yirden .
40013030	Anfet-asen ad gmun di sin alamma ț-țamegra . Ass-nni , a sen iniɣ i wid imeggren : qelɛet-ed uqbel aẓekkun , cuddet-eț ț-țadliwin iwakken a tent-nesseṛɣ ma d irden jemɛet țen-id ɣer ikuffan-iw .
40013031	Sidna Ɛisa yefka-yasen-d lemtel nniḍen : Tagelda n igenwan tcuba ɣer yiwen uɛeqqa n uxerḍel i d-iddem yiwen wergaz iwakken a t-izreɛ deg iger-is .
40013032	Aɛeqqa-yagi d nețța i d amecṭuḥ meṛṛa ger zzerriɛat yellan , lameɛna mi gețwazreɛ , igemmu yețțali alamma yekka-d sennig akk yemɣan n tebḥirt , yeggar-ed ifurkawen d imeqqranen , ula d ifṛax n igenni , bennun leɛcuc-nsen s ufella-s .
40013033	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen-d lemtel nniḍen : Tagelda n igenwan tețțemcabi ɣer temtunt ( yiɣes n temtunt ) ara d-teddem tmeṭṭut a t-tsexleḍ i tlata lkilat n uwren , s wakka arukti-nni meṛṛa ad yali .
40013034	Sidna Ɛisa ițmeslay-ed i lɣaci anagar s lemtul .
40013035	Ițmeslay-asen-d akka iwakken ad yedṛu wayen i d-nnan lenbiya : A sen-mmeslayeɣ s lemtul , a sen-beccṛeɣ tiɣawsiwin yeffren seg wasmi i d-texleq ddunit . cc
40013036	Mi gekfa Sidna Ɛisa ameslay , lɣaci ṛuḥen , nețța ikcem ɣer wexxam . Inelmaden-is qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es nnan-as : Ssefru-yaɣ-d lemtel n uẓekkun deg iger .
40013037	Yerra-yasen-d : Win izerrɛen irden d Mmi-s n bunadem ;
40013038	iger , d ddunit ; irden , d wid ițekkan di tgelda n igenwan ; ma d aẓekkun , d widak ițekkan d Cciṭan ;
40013039	aɛdaw i gzerrɛen aẓekkun , d Cciṭan ; tamegra , ț-țaggara nddunit ; ma d wid imeggren , d lmalayekkat .
40013040	Akken ara qellɛen aẓekkun ṭeggiṛen-t ɣer tmes , ara tedṛu di taggara n ddunit .
40013041	Mmi-s n bunadem a d-iceggeɛ lmalayekkat-is , ad ssufɣen si tgelda-s wid akk yesseɣlayen wiyaḍ di ddnub akk-d wid ixeddmen cceṛ ,
40013042	dɣa a ten-ḍeggṛen ɣer tmes anda ara yilin imeṭṭawen d nndama tameqqrant ;
40013043	ma d wid iḍuɛen Ṛebbi ad feǧǧeǧen am yiṭij di tgelda n Baba Ṛebbi . Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen isel-ed !
40013044	Tagelda n igenwan tețțemcabi ɣer ugerruj yeffren deg yiwen n yiger . Yiwen wergaz yufa-t , yuɣal iffer-it . Si lfeṛḥ-nni i gefṛeḥ , iṛuḥ izzenz ayen akk yesɛa iwakken ad yaɣ iger-nni .
40013045	Tagelda n igenwan tețțemcabi daɣen ɣer yiwen umetjaṛ ițqelliben tiɛeqcin ifazen .
40013046	Mi gufa yiwet ifazen ɣef tiyaḍ , iṛuḥ izzenz ayen akk yesɛa , yuɣal-ed yuɣ-iț .
40013047	Tagelda n igenwan tețțemcabi daɣen ɣer ucebbak ițwadeggṛen ɣer lebḥeṛ , iwakken a d-iṭṭef iselman ( lḥut ) n mkul ṣṣenf .
40013048	M'ara yeččaṛ , iḥewwaten a t-id-jebden ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ , dɣa ad qqimen iwakken ad fernen iselman , ad jemɛen wid yelhan , ad ḍeggṛen wid n diri .
40013049	Akka ara tedṛu di taggara n ddunit : lmalayekkat a d-asent a d ddment imcumen si ger iḥeqqiyen ,
40013050	iwakken a ten-ḍeggṛent ɣer tmes anda llan imeṭṭawen d nndama tameqqrant .
40013051	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Tfehmem ayagi meṛṛa ? RRran-as : Anɛam a Sidi , nefhem !
40013052	Yerna-yasen : Ihi , yal amusnaw n ccariɛa ara ifehmen tagelda n igenwan , icuba ɣer bab n wexxam i d-ițekksen seg ugerruj-is tiɣawsiwin tijdidin , akk-d ț-țɣawsiwin tiqdimin .
40013053	Mi d-yenna lemtul-agi , Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ syenna .
40013054	Yerra ɣer taddart i deg ițțuṛebba . Isselmad di lǧameɛ nsen , lɣaci akk iḥedṛen wehmen , qqaṛen : Ansi i s-d-tekka tmusni-yagi akk d tezmert s wayes ixeddem lbeṛhanat agi ?
40013055	Mačči d nețța i d mmi-s n win ineǧṛen ijegwa ? Eɛni yemma-s mačči ț-țin iwumi qqaṛen Meryem ? AAtmaten-is mačči d Yeɛqub , Yusef , Semɛun akk-d Yuda ?
40013056	Yessetma-s daɣen , mačči gar aneɣ i llant ? Ansi i s-d-ikka ihi wannect-agi ?
40013057	Ɣef wayagi akk i sen-yella d sebba n tuccḍa , ugin ad amnen yis . DDɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Nnbi yețwaḥqeṛ anagar di tmurt-is akk-d wexxam-is .
40013058	Sidna Ɛisa ur yexdim ara aṭas n lbeṛhanat dinna , axaṭer ugin ad amnen .
40014001	Di lweqt-nni , Hiṛudus i gḥekmen ɣef tmurt n Jlili mi gesla s Sidna Ɛisa
40014002	yenna i iqeddacen-is : D Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas ! D nețța i-d iḥyan si ger lmegtin , daymi i gesɛa tazmert s wayes ixeddem lbeṛhanat .
40014003	D agellid Hiṛudus i gefkan yakan lameṛ ad qnen Yeḥya s ssnasel , a t-rren ɣer lḥebs . Ayagi ɣef sebba n Hiṛudyad , tameṭṭut n Filibus yellan d gma-s n Hiṛudus .
40014004	Axaṭer Yeḥya yella yeqqaṛ i Hiṛudus : D leḥṛam fell-ak aț-țesɛuḍ Hiṛudyad ț-țameṭṭut-ik !
40014005	Seg imiren , Hiṛudus ițqellib ad ineɣ Yeḥya , meɛna ikukra agdud n wat Isṛail axaṭer ḥesben-t akk d nnbi .
40014006	Ass n lɛid n umulli n Hiṛudus , yelli-s n Hiṛudyad tecḍeḥ zdat inebgawen , teɛǧeb-as aṭas i Hiṛudus ,
40014007	armi i s-iɛuhed , a s-ye ayen ara s-d tessuter .
40014008	Tweṣṣa-ț yemma-s a s-tini : Awi-yi-d ɣer dagi aqeṛṛuy n Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas deg uḍebsi .
40014009	Agellid Hiṛudus iḥzen aṭas , yemmuɣben , lameɛna ɣef ddemma n limin i geggul zdat inebgawen-is , issendeh a s-t-id-awin .
40014010	Iceggeɛ a s-d-gezmen aqeṛṛuy i Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas di lḥebs ;
40014011	wwin-as-t-id i teqcict-nni deg uḍebsi , nețțat tefka-t i yemma-s .
40014012	Inelmaden n Yeḥya usan-d ad awin lǧețța-s iwakken a ț-meḍlen ; imiren ṛuḥen ssawḍen-as lexbaṛ i Sidna Ɛisa .
40014013	Mi gesla s lexbaṛ n lmut n Yeḥya , Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer teflukt , iṛuḥ iwakken ad iḍeṛṛef iman-is . Akken slan lɣaci s wemkan i ɣer iteddu , ffɣen-d si tudrin , tebɛen-t ɣef wuḍar .
40014014	Sidna Ɛisa yers-ed si teflukt , iwala annect-nni n lɣaci , dɣa gezmen tasa-s ; ibda yesseḥlay imuḍan-nsen .
40014015	Mi geɣli yiṭij , inelmaden n Sidna Ɛisa qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es , nnan-as : Amkan-agi yexla yerna iṛuḥ lḥal ; ini-yasen i lɣaci-yagi ad ṛuḥen ɣer tudrin iwakken a d-aɣen ayen ara ččen .
40014016	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Acuɣeṛ ara ṛuḥen , fket-asen kunwi ad ččen !
40014017	Nnan-as : Ɣuṛ-nneɣ anagar xemsa teḥbulin n weɣṛum , d sin iselman ( iḥutiwen ) .
40014018	Yerra-yasen : Awit-țen-id ɣer dagi !
40014019	Yenna i lɣaci ad qqimen ɣef leḥcic , iddem-ed xemsa teḥbulin-nni n weɣṛum d sin iselman-nni , yerfed allen-is ɣer igenni , iḥmed Ṛebbi . YYebḍa aɣṛum-nni , yefka-t i inelmaden-is , feṛqen-t i lɣaci .
40014020	Sčan akk armi ṛwan , yerna inelmaden-is ččuṛen-d tnac iqecwalen n wayen i d-yegran .
40014021	Ad ilin azal n xemsa alaf n yergazen i geččan , mbla tilawin d warrac .
40014022	Imiren kan , Sidna Ɛisa iḥṛes inelmaden-is ad alin ɣer teflukt iwakken ad zwiren ɣer rrif nniḍen n lebḥeṛ , ma d nețța ad yerr lɣaci-nni .
40014023	Mi ṛuḥen akk lɣaci-nni , yuli weḥd-es ɣer wedrar iwakken ad iẓẓall , dɣa yeɣli-d yiḍ .
40014024	Taflukt-nni tella di tlemmast n lebḥeṛ , lemwaji kkatent-eț axaṭer aḍu iqubel-iten-id .
40014025	Mi qṛib ad yali wass , ataya Sidna Ɛisa iteddu-d ɣef wuḍar s ufella n waman .
40014026	Akken i t-walan ileḥḥu ɣef waman , inelmaden-is xelɛen qqaṛen : D lexyal ! BBdan țɛeggiḍen s lxuf .
40014027	Meɛna imiren kan Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen-d : Ur xellɛet ara , d nekk ! Ur țțaggadet ara !
40014028	Dɣa Buṭrus yenna-yas : A Sidi , ma yella d keččini , efk-ed lameṛ a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-ek ɣef wuḍar s ufella n waman .
40014029	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : As-ed ! BBuṭrus yers-ed si teflukt , ileḥḥu ɣef waman , iteddu ɣer Sidna Ɛisa .
40014030	Meɛna mi gwala yekker-ed waḍu , ikcem-it lxuf , yebda izedder , dɣa iɛeggeḍ : A Sidi , sellek-iyi !
40014031	Imiren kan , Sidna Ɛisa yeḍleq afus-is , ijbed-it-id yenna-yas : A win iwumi ixuṣṣ liman ! Acuɣeṛ i k-ikcem ccekk ?
40014032	Ulin ɣer teflukt di sin , dɣa yers waḍu-nni .
40014033	Inelmaden-nni yellan di teflukt seǧǧden zdat Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Ț-țideț , d kečč i d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi !
40014034	Zegren lebḥeṛ-nni , armi wwḍen ɣer tmurt n Jiniṣaret .
40014035	Imezdaɣ n lǧiha nni ɛeqlen Sidna Ɛisa , dɣa ceggɛen ɣer yal lǧiha n tmurt , wwin-as-d imuḍan nsen meṛṛa .
40014036	Ḥellelen-t iwakken a ten-yeǧǧ ad nalen ɣas ula ț-țacḍaṭ uqenduṛ-is . Wid akk i t-innulen , ḥlan .
40015001	Kra ifariziyen , d kra n imusnawen n ccariɛa , usan-d si temdint Lquds ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as :
40015002	Acuɣeṛ inelmaden-ik țṛuẓun lɛadda i d-ǧǧan lejdud-nneɣ ? M'ara qeṛṛben ɣer lqut , ur ssiriden ara ifassen-nsen .
40015003	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : I kunwi , acimi tețṛuẓum lumuṛat n Ṛebbi iwakken aț-țxedmem ṛṛay nwen ?
40015004	Yak d ṣṣeḥ , Ṛebbi yenna-d : Qadeṛ baba-k d yemma-k , yyenna daɣen : Kra win ara ineɛlen baba-s d yemma-s , ad yețwaḥkem fell-as s lmut .
40015005	Meɛna kunwi teqqaṛem : win yefkan d lweɛda i Ṛebbi ayen s wacu i glaq ad iɛiwen imawlan-is ,
40015006	am akken d imawlan-is i gɛawen . SS wakka , tbeddlem awal n Ṛebbi , iwakken aț-țesɛeddim lɛaddat-nwen .
40015007	Ay at sin wudmawen ! Ț-țideț i d-yenna nnbi Iceɛya mi d-icar fell awen :
40015008	Y enna-d Ṛebbi : agdud-agi , ițɛuzzu-yi s wawal kan , ma d ul-is yebɛed fell-i .
40015009	L eɛbada-nsen ur tesɛi ara azal axaṭer sselmaden ayen i d-yekkan seg imdanen .
40015010	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yessawel i lɣaci yenna-yasen : Semḥesset-d tfehmem ayagi :
40015011	mačči d ayen i gkeččmen seg imi n wemdan i t-yessamasen , meɛna d ayen i d-ițeffɣen seg-s .
40015012	Inelmaden qeṛṛben-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Ifariziyen iɣaḍ-iten lḥal ɣef yimeslayen-nni i d-tenniḍ !
40015013	Yerra-yasen : Yal imɣi ur yeẓẓi ara Baba yellan deg igenwan , ad yețwaqleɛ .
40015014	Anfet-asen , d iderɣalen iteṭṭfen afus i iderɣalen nniḍen ; ma yella aderɣal yeṭṭef afus i wayeḍ , ad ɣlin i sin ɣer tesra .
40015015	Buṭrus yenṭeq-ed yenna-yas : Ssefhem-aɣ-d lemtel-agi .
40015016	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i inelmaden-is : Eɛni ula d kunwi txuṣṣ-ikkun lefhama ?
40015017	Ur tefhimem ara belli ayen ikeččmen seg imi n wemdan yețțara ɣer uɛebbuḍ-is , mbeɛd ad ițwadeggeṛ ɣer beṛṛa .
40015018	Lameɛna ayen i d-iteffɣen seg imi itekk-ed seg wul , d annect-agi i gessenǧasen amdan .
40015019	Axaṭer seg wul i d-tekken : yir ixemmimen , timegṛaḍ , zzna ( lɛaṛ ) , yir tikli , tukerḍa , cchada n ẓẓuṛ akk-d rregmat .
40015020	Atan wayen yessenǧasen amdan , mačči d učči mbla tarda n ifassen i t-yessenǧasen .
40015021	Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ syenna , iteddu ɣer tmura n Sur akk-d Sidun .
40015022	Yiwet n tmeṭṭut n at Kenɛan i gzedɣen dinna tusa-d ɣuṛ-es tețɛeggiḍ : A Sidi , a mmi-s n Sidna Dawed , ḥunn fell-i ! Ațan yelli izdeɣ-iț uṛuḥani , iɛețțeb-iț aṭas .
40015023	Sidna Ɛisa ur as-d-yerri ula d yiwen wawal . Inelmaden-is qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es nnan-as : Err-as awal , axaṭer tugi aț-țeḥbes leɛyaḍ deffir-nneɣ .
40015024	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Țțuceggɛeɣ-ed anagar ɣer wulli iḍaɛen n wat Isṛail !
40015025	Lameɛna tameṭṭut-nni teɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa tenna-yas : A Sidi ɛiwen-iyi di leɛnaya-k !
40015026	Yenna-yas : Ur ilaq ara ad ițwakkes weɣṛum i warrac , ad ițwadeggeṛ i yeqjan .
40015027	Tenna-yas : Ț-țideț a Sidi , lameɛna ula d iqjan tețțen tifețțitin i d-iɣellin si ṭṭabla n imawlan-nsen .
40015028	Imiren Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Liman-inem d ameqqran a tameṭṭut ! A m-yețwaxdem wayen tebɣiḍ ! IImiren kan yelli-s teḥla .
40015029	Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ syenna , yerra ɣer leǧwahi n lebḥeṛ n Jlili , yuli ɣer wedrar yeqqim .
40015030	Usan-d ɣuṛ-es lɣaci d izumal , wwin-as-d iquḍaren , iderɣalen , ineɛyuba , igugamen d waṭas imuḍan nniḍen . Ssersen-ten ɣer zdat iḍaṛṛen-is dɣa isseḥla-ten .
40015031	Imdanen meṛṛa tɛeǧben mi walan igugamen heddṛen , ineɛyuba ḥlan , iquḍaren leḥḥun , iderɣalen țwalin , dɣa bdan țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi Illu n wat Isṛail .
40015032	Sidna Ɛisa yessawel-asen i inelmaden-is yenna-yasen : Ɣaḍen-iyi lɣaci-agi axaṭer tlata wussan aya segmi llan yid-i , yerna ur sɛin d acu ara ččen . Ur bɣiɣ ara a ten-rreɣ akka lluẓen neɣ m'ulac ad feclen deg webrid .
40015033	Inelmaden nnan-as : Ansi ara ɣ-d-yekk deg umkan-agi yexlan , weɣṛum ara isseṛwun annect agi n lɣaci ?
40015034	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Acḥal n teḥbulin n weɣṛum i tesɛam ɣuṛ-wen ? RRran-as : Sebɛa n teḥbulin akk-d kra n iselman ( iḥutiwen ) .
40015035	Imiren yenna i lɣaci ad qqimen ɣer lqaɛa .
40015036	Yeddem-ed tiḥbulin-nni n weɣṛum d iselman-nni , iḥmed Ṛebbi , yebḍa-ten , yefka-ten i inelmaden-is iwakken a ten-feṛqen i lɣaci .
40015037	Sčan akk armi ṛwan , yerna ččuṛen sebɛa n tqecwalin n wayen i d-yegran .
40015038	Ger wid yeččan , llan azal n ṛebɛa alaf n yergazen mbla tilawin d warrac .
40015039	Mi gerra lɣaci , Sidna Ɛisa yerkeb di teflukt , iṛuḥ ɣer tmurt n Magadan .
40016001	Ifariziyen d isaduqiyen qeṛṛben ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , ssutren-as lbeṛhan iwakken a t-jeṛben .
40016002	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : M'ara yeɣli yiṭij , twalam igenni d azeggaɣ , teqqaṛem ad yelhu lḥal .
40016003	Akken daɣen taṣebḥit , teqqaṛem a d-iwwet ugeffur ( lehwa ) axaṭer yella usigna . AAmek ! Tesnem aț-țfehmem lḥala n igenni , ur tezmirem ara aț-țfehmem licaṛat yeɛnan lweqt-agi !
40016004	Lǧil am agi ijehlen ixedɛen Ṛebbi , yessutur lbeṛhan ! Meɛna ur as-d-ițțunefkay ara lbeṛhan nniḍen anagar win n nnbi Yunes ! DDɣa iṛuḥ , yeǧǧa-ten .
40016005	Mi zegren agummaḍ i lebḥeṛ , inelmaden-is țțun ur wwin ara yid-sen aɣṛum .
40016006	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Ḥadret iman-nwen seg iɣes n temtunt n ifariziyen d isaduqiyen !
40016007	Inelmaden xemmemen deg yiman-nsen , nnan : Ahat imi ur d-newwi ara yid-nneɣ aɣṛum i ɣ-d-yenna akka !
40016008	Sidna Ɛisa iẓra ɣef wacu i țxemmimen yenna-yasen : A wid i gxuṣṣen di liman ! Tɣilem imi ur d-tewwim ara aɣṛum i wen-d-nniɣ akka ?
40016009	Mazal ur tefhimem ara ? Eɛni tețțum yakan xemsa teḥbulin-nni n weɣṛum i bḍiɣ i xemsa alaf n yergazen ? D wacḥal n tqecwalin i d-yegran ?
40016010	Ur tecfim ara daɣen ɣef sebɛa teḥbulin-nni n weɣṛum i bḍiɣ i ṛebɛa alaf n yemdanen , d wacḥal n tqecwalin i d-yegran ?
40016011	Amek akka ur tefhimem ara belli mačči ɣef weɣṛum i wen-d-țmeslayeɣ ? ḤḤadret iman-nwen seg iɣes n temtunt n ifariziyen d isaduqiyen !
40016012	Imiren inelmaden-is fehmen belli mačči ɣef yiɣes n temtunt i sen-d-immeslay , lameɛna ad ḥadren iman-nsen ɣef wuselmed n ifariziyen d isaduqiyen .
40016013	Mi gewweḍ Sidna Ɛisa ɣer tmurt n Qiṣarya n Filibus , isteqsa inelmaden is , yenna-yasen : D acu i-d-qqaṛen medden ɣef Mmi-s n bunadem ?
40016014	Rran-as : Kra qqaṛen d Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas , wiyaḍ qqaṛen d nnbi Ilyas , wiyaḍ daɣen d nnbi Irmiya neɣ d yiwen ger lenbiya .
40016015	I kunwi , d acu-yi ɣuṛ-wen ?
40016016	Buṭrus yerra-yas : Kečč d Lmasiḥ , Mmi-s n Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren !
40016017	Yenṭeq ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : Amarezg-ik , a Buṭrus a mmi-s n Yunes , axaṭer mačči s tmusni-inek i tfehmeḍ ayagi , meɛna d Baba Ṛebbi yellan deg igenwan i k-t-id-isbegnen .
40016018	Ihi nekk a k-iniɣ : kečč a Buṭrus d azṛu , yerna ɣef wezṛu-agi ara bnuɣ tajmaɛt-iw , ula ț-ținezmarin n lmut ur țțaṭṭafent ara zdat-es !
40016019	Ad a k-fkeɣ tisura n tgelda n igenwan , ayen ara teqneḍ neɣ ayen iwumi ara tserrḥeḍ di ddunit , ad yețwaqbel deg igenwan .
40016020	Imiren yumeṛ i yinelmaden-is ur qqaṛen ula i yiwen belli d nețța i d Lmasiḥ .
40016021	Seg imiren , Sidna Ɛisa yebda issefham i inelmaden-is belli ilaq ad yali ɣer temdint n Lquds , anda ara yenneɛtab aṭas ger ifassen n lmuqedmin akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa ad ḥekmen fell-as s lmut , ass wis tlata a d-iḥyu si ger lmegtin .
40016022	Buṭrus ijbed-it weḥd-es , yenna yas : A k-imneɛ Ṛebbi a Sidi , a wer d-yedṛu wayagi yid-ek !
40016023	Sidna Ɛisa idewweṛ ɣuṛ-es , yenna-yas : Beɛɛed akkin fell-i a Cciṭan ! Tebɣiḍ aț-țiliḍ d ugur deg webrid-iw ! Ixemmimen-ik ur d-kkan ara s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi , lameɛna d ixemmimen n yemdanen .
40016024	Imiren Sidna Ɛisa yenna i inelmaden-is : Kra win yebɣan ad iddu yid-i , ilaq-as ur yețḥebbiṛ ara ɣef yiman-is , ad iqbel ad inɛețțab ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw , a yi-d-itbeɛ .
40016025	Kra win yebɣan ad isellek taṛwiḥt-is , a s-tṛuḥ ; ma d win iseblen taṛwiḥt-is ɣef ddemma-w ad yuɣal a ț-yaf .
40016026	D acu n lfayda ara yesɛu wemdan di rrbeḥ n ddunit meṛṛa , ma yella yesṛuḥ taṛwiḥt-is ? Neɣ d acu i gezmer a t-ye wemdan iwakken a d-ifdu taṛwiḥt-is ?
40016027	Axaṭer Mmi-s n bunadem a d-yas nețța d lmalayekkat-is di lɛaḍima n Baba-s , ad ye i yal yiwen ayen yuklal , yal yiwen ɣef leḥsab n lefɛayel-is .
40016028	A wen-iniɣ tideț : llan kra seg wid yellan dagi , ur țmețțaten ara alamma ẓran Mmi-s n bunadem yusa-d am ugellid .
40017001	Mi ɛeddan sețța wussan , Sidna Ɛisa yewwi yid-es Buṭrus , Yeɛqub akk-d gma-s Yuḥenna , ulin ɣer wedrar eɛlayen , anda qqimen ḍeṛfen iman-nsen .
40017002	Taswiɛt kan ibeddel ṣṣifa zdat sen , walan udem-is yețfeǧǧiǧ am yiṭij , llebsa-s tuɣal ț-țamellalt , tecceɛceɛ am tafat .
40017003	A ten-aya dehṛen-asen-d Sidna Musa akk-d Sidna Ilyas țmeslayen d Sidna Ɛisa .
40017004	Buṭrus inṭeq yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi , yelha ma neqqim dagi , ma tebɣiḍ ad sbeddeɣ tlata iqiḍunen : yiwen i kečč , yiwen i Sidna Musa , wayeḍ i Sidna Ilyas .
40017005	Mazal-it ițmeslay mi d-ters yiwet n tagut ițfeǧǧiǧen tɣumm-iten . Si tagut-nni tenṭeq-ed yiwet n taɣect , tenna-d : Wagi d Mmi eɛzizen deg-s i gella lfeṛḥ-iw , smeḥsiset-as !
40017006	Mi slan i taɣect-nni , inelmaden ikcem-iten lxuf , ɣlin ɣef wudem .
40017007	Sidna Ɛisa yessers afus-is fell-asen , yenna-yasen : Ur țțaggadet ara , kkret !
40017008	Mi refden allen-nsen , ur walan ula d yiwen nniḍen anagar Sidna Ɛisa .
40017009	Akken i d-țadren seg wedrar , Sidna Ɛisa yumeṛ-iten yenna-yasen : Ur qqaṛet i yiwen wayen akka twalam alamma yeḥya-d Mmi-s n bunadem si ger lmegtin .
40017010	Inelmaden steqsan Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Iwacu imusnawen n ccariɛa qqaṛen-d : « Ilaq a d-yas nnbi Ilyas d amezwaru ? »
40017011	Yerra-yasen : Ț-țideț ilaq a d-yas nnbi Ilyas d amezwaru , iwakken ad iseggem kullec .
40017012	Ma d nekk aql-i nniɣ awen-d : nnbi Ilyas yusa-d yakan , lameɛna imdanen ur t-ɛqilen ara yerna xedmen deg-s akken i sen ihwa . Akka daɣen ara inɛețțab Mmi-s n bunadem ger ifassen-nsen !
40017013	Inelmaden fehmen imiren belli ițmeslay-asen-d ɣef Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas .
40017014	Mi wwḍen ɣer wanda llan lɣaci , yiwen wergaz iqeṛṛeb-ed ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , yeɣli ɣef tgecrar zdat-es yenna yas :
40017015	A Sidi , ḥunn ɣef mmi ! Atan kkaten-t imsigman , yenneɛtab aṭas ! Acḥal d abrid i geɣli ɣer tmes neɣ ɣer waman ,
40017016	wwiɣ-t-id i inelmaden-ik , meɛna ur zmiren ara a t-sseḥlun .
40017017	Inṭeq Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : A lǧil ijehlen , iɛewjen ! Ar melmi ara yiliɣ yid-wen ? Ar melmi ara wen-sebṛeɣ ? Awit-iyi-d aqcic-agi ɣer dagi !
40017018	Sidna Ɛisa iɛeggeḍ ɣef lǧen-nni , yumeṛ-as ad iffeɣ seg weqcic-nni . Imiren kan , aqcic-nni yeḥla .
40017019	Mi llan inelmaden iman-nsen , qeṛṛben ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Acuɣeṛ nukkni ur nezmir ara a t-nessufeɣ ?
40017020	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Axaṭer txuṣṣem di liman ! Aql-i nniɣ-awen , lemmer tesɛim liman annect n uɛeqqa n uxerḍel , tili a s tinim i wedrar-agi , qleɛ iman-ik sya ɣer dihin ad iqleɛ . Ulac wayen iwumi ur tețțizmirem ara .
40017021	Sṣenf-agi n leǧnun țeffɣen anagar s tẓallit d uẓummu .
40017022	Mi llan di tmurt n Jlili , Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Mmi-s n bunadem ad ițțusellem ger ifassen n yemdanen ;
40017023	a t-nɣen , meɛna ass wis tlata a d-iḥyu si ger lmegtin . DDɣa inelmaden ikcem-iten leḥzen d ameqqran .
40017024	Mi gewweḍ Sidna Ɛisa akk-d inelmaden-is ɣer Kafernaḥum , imekkasen n lǧameɛ qeṛṛben-d ɣer Buṭrus nnan-as : Eɛni Ssid-nwen ur ițxelliṣ ara tabzert n lǧameɛ ?
40017025	Yerra-yasen Buṭrus : Ih , ad ixelleṣ ! Imiren kan mi gekcem Buṭrus ɣer wexxam , Sidna Ɛisa iluɛa-t , yenna-yas : D acu twalaḍ a Buṭrus ? Anwa i glaqen ad ixelleṣ tabzert i igelliden n ddunit-a , d arraw-nsen neɣ d ibeṛṛaniyen ?
40017026	Buṭrus yerra-yas : D ibeṛṛaniyen ! DDɣa Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas-d : Ihi arraw n tmurt ur țxelliṣen ara !
40017027	Lameɛna iwakken ur ten-yețɣaḍ ara lḥal , ṛuḥ , ḍeggeṛ tasennaṛt ɣer lebḥeṛ , aslem ( aḥewtiw ) amezwaru ara d-teṭṭfeḍ , ldi-yas imi , aț-țafeḍ deg-s aṣurdi n lfeṭṭa , efk-asen-t d lexlaṣ n tebzert-nneɣ nekk yid-ek .
40018001	Di lweqt-nni , inelmaden n Sidna Ɛisa qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es nnan-as : — Anwa i d ameqqran di tgelda n igenwan ?
40018002	Sidna Ɛisa yessawel i yiwen weqcic isbedd-it di tlemmast-nsen , yenna :
40018003	A wen-d-iniɣ tideț ; ma yella ur d-tuɣalem ara ɣer webrid , m'ur teqbilem ara aț-țilim . am arrac imecṭuḥen , ur tkeččmem ara ɣer tgelda n igenwan !
40018004	Daymi , win ara yeṣṣemẓin iman-is am weqcic-agi amecṭuḥ , d nețța ara yilin d ameqqran di tgelda n igenwan .
40018005	Kra win ara yestṛeḥben s weqcic am-agi ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw , yis-i i gesṭerḥeb .
40018006	Win ara yesseɣlin di ddnub ula d yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi yumnen yis-i , axiṛ-as a s-cudden aɣaṛef n tsirt ɣer temgeṛṭ-is , a t-ḍeggṛen ɣer lebḥeṛ ad iɣṛeq .
40018007	A tawaɣit n ddunit-a , imi qwant tsebbiwin n tuccḍa ! Axaṭer tisebbiwin n tuccḍa ulamek ur d-țilint ara . Meɛna a nnger n win ara yilin d sebba-nsent .
40018008	Ma yella d afus-ik neɣ d aḍaṛ-ik ara k-yesseɣlin di ddnub , gzem-iten , ḍeggeṛ-iten akkin fell-ak , axiṛ-ak aț-țiliḍ di ddunit d aɛiban wala aț-țesɛuḍ sin iḍaṛṛen neɣ sin ifassen , aț-țwaḍeggṛeḍ ɣer tmes ur nxețți .
40018009	Ma yella daɣen ț-țiṭ-ik ara k-yawin ɣer ddnub , qleɛ-iț ḍeggeṛ-iț akkin fell-ak ; axiṛ-ik aț-țiliḍ di ddunit s yiwet n tiṭ wala aț-țesɛuḍ snat wallen , aț - țwaḍeggṛeḍ ɣer tmes n ǧahennama .
40018010	Ɣuṛ-wat aț-țḥeqṛem yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi axaṭer aql-i nniɣ awen-t : lmalayekkat-nsen deg igenwan , zgant daymen zdat Baba Ṛebbi .
40018011	[ Axaṭer Mmi-s n bunadem yusa-d ad isellek wid i gḍaɛen ! ]
40018012	D acu twalam ? Ma yella win yesɛan meyya wulli dɣa teɛṛeq-as yiwet deg-sent , ur ițțaǧa ara țesɛa uțesɛin-nni nniḍen di lexla iwakken a d-inadi ɣef tin i s-iɛeṛqen ?
40018013	A wen-iniɣ tideț : ma yufa-ț , ad ifṛeḥ yis akteṛ n țesɛa uțesɛin-nni nniḍen ur neɛṛiq ara .
40018014	Akken daɣen Baba-twen Ṛebbi yellan deg igenwan , ur yebɣi ara a s-iṛuḥ ula d yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi .
40018015	Ma yella twalaḍ gma-k idneb , ṛuḥ ṭṭef-it weḥd-es , nhu-t . Ma yuɣ-ak awal , atan trebḥeḍ-ed gma-k !
40018016	Meɛna ma igumma a k-d-isel , awi yiwen neɣ sin yemdanen yid-ek , iwakken ad ilin d inigan m'ara tefru temsalt , akken i d-tenna ccariɛa .
40018017	Ma yugi a sen-isel , ssiweḍ tamsalt ɣer tejmaɛt n watmaten , m'ur iḥess ara ula i tejmaɛt-nni , ḥseb-it am akken d akafriw neɣ d amekkas axabit !
40018018	A wen-iniɣ tideț : ayen akk ara teqnem neɣ iwumi ara tserrḥem di ddunit , ad yețwaqbel deg igenwan .
40018019	A wen-iniɣ daɣen s tideț : ma yella sin seg-wen ddukklen iwakken ad ssutren kra di tẓallit , Baba Ṛebbi yellan deg igenwan , a sen-t-id-ye .
40018020	Axaṭer anda ara dduklen sin neɣ tlata s yisem-iw , ad ḥedṛeɣ gar-asen !
40018021	Imiren Buṭrus iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : A Sidi , acḥal n tikkal ilaq ad semḥeɣ i gma ma yeḍlem-iyi , armi d sebɛa n tikkal ? SSidna Ɛisa yerra yas :
40018022	Xaṭi ! Ur k-d-nniɣ ara alamma d sebɛa tikkal , meɛna alamma d sebɛin iberdan sebɛa tikkal !
40018023	Daymi , tagelda n igenwan tețțemcabi ɣer yiwen ugellid yebɣan ad imḥasab nețța d iqeddacen-is .
40018024	Akken yebda leḥsab , wwin-as-d yiwen uqeddac iwumi yețțalas imelyunen .
40018025	Imi ur yesɛi ara s wacu ara ixelleṣ , agellid-nni ifka lameṛ a ten-zzenzen d aklan , s nețța s tmeṭṭut-is , s warraw-is d wayen akk yesɛa , iwakken ad ixelleṣ ṭṭlaba-ines .
40018026	Aqeddac-nni yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen n ugellid , iḥellel-it yenna-yas : « ` A Sidi , ṣṣbeṛ kra wussan , ad uɣaleɣ a k-xellṣeɣ ayen akk i yi tețțalaseḍ . »
40018027	Imi i t-iɣaḍ aṭas , agellid-nni isumeḥ-as ṭṭlaba-ines iserreḥ-as ad iṛuḥ .
40018028	Akken kan i d-iffeɣ uqeddac-nni immuger-ed yiwen seg imdukkal-is ixeddmen yid-es , iwumi yețțalas kra n iṣurdiyen . IIkker ɣuṛ-es yeṭṭef-it si temgeṛṭ yeqqaṛ-as : « Err-iyi-d ayen i k țțalaseɣ ! »
40018029	Amdakkel-is yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is iḥellel-it , yenna-yas : « Sṣbeṛ kra n wussan , ad uɣaleɣ a k-xellṣeɣ ! »
40018030	Lameɛna ur yeqbil ara ad isbeṛ , yerra-t ɣer lḥebs , alamma tețwaxelleṣ ṭṭlaba-ines .
40018031	Iqeddacen nniḍen mi walan ayen yedṛan , iɣaḍ-iten lḥal , dɣa ṛuḥen ṣṣawḍen lexbaṛ i ugellid .
40018032	Agellid iceggeɛ ɣer uqeddac-nni akken a d-yas , dɣa yenna-yas : « A yir amdan ! Mi tețḥellileḍ deg-i , eɛni ur k-sumḥeɣ ara akk ṭṭlaba-inek ?
40018033	Acuɣeṛ ihi ur as-tsumḥeḍ ara i wemdakkel-ik akken i k-sumḥeɣ nekkini ? »
40018034	Agellid-nni yezɛef aṭas , yerra aqeddac-nni ɣer lḥebs , iwakken ad inɛețțab alamma tețwaxelleṣ ṭṭlaba ines .
40018035	Akken daɣen ara wen-yexdem Baba Ṛebbi yellan deg igenwan ma ur tețsamaḥem ara i watmaten-nwen seg ul .
40019001	Mi gekfa lewṣayat-agi , Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ si tmurt n Jlili ɣer tmurt n Yahuda ɣer leǧwahi n wasif n Urdun .
40019002	Aṭas n lɣaci i t-iḍefṛen ɣer dinna , dɣa yesseḥla wid akk ihelken .
40019003	Kra ifariziyen qeṛṛben-d ɣuṛ-es iwakken a t-jeṛben , nnan-as : Eɛni ccariɛa-nneɣ tsumeḥ-as i wergaz ad yebru i tmeṭṭut-is ɣef yal sebba yellan ?
40019004	Yerra-yasen : Ur teɣṛim ara ayen i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa : di tazwara Sidi Ṛebbi ixleq-ed argaz ț-țmeṭṭut ,
40019005	yenna-d : AArgaz ad yeǧǧ baba-s d yemma-s , iiwakken ad iɛic nețța ț-țmeṭṭut-is , ddɣa di sin yid-sen , ad uɣalen d yiwen .
40019006	S wakka ur llin ara d sin , meɛna uɣalen d yiwen . Ur as-ilaq ara ihi i wemdan ad ifṛeq ayen yesdukkel Sidi Ṛebbi !
40019007	Nnan-as : Acuɣeṛ ihi Sidna Musa yeǧǧa yaɣ-d lqanun belli m'ara yebru wergaz i tmeṭṭut-is , a s-ye lkaɣeḍ n berru ?
40019008	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Ɣef ddemma n wulawen-nwen yeqquṛen i wen-iserreḥ nnbi Musa aț-țebrum i tilawin-nwen . Meɛna di tazwara mačči akka i gella lḥal .
40019009	Ma d nekk a wen-d-iniɣ : kra n win ara yebrun i tmeṭṭut-is yili ur tezni ara , iwakken ad yaɣ tayeḍ , d nețța i geznan !
40019010	Inelmaden nnan-as : Ma yella akka i d lḥala n wergaz ɣer tmeṭṭut , ulac lfayda di zzwaǧ !
40019011	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Mačči d imdanen meṛṛa i gzemren ad qeblen aselmed agi lameɛna anagar wid iwumi i d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi lefhama i gzemren ad qeblen annect-agi .
40019012	Aṭas n sebbat i gqeḍɛen zzwaǧ i wemdan . Llan wid i d-ilulen si tɛebbuṭ n yemma-tsen ur sɛin ara ddunit , wiyaḍ d imdanen i sen-ț-ikksen . LLlan daɣen wid iḥeṛmen iman-nsen ɣef zwaǧ , ɣef ddemma n tgelda n igenwan . Win i gzemren ad ifhem aselmed agi a t-yefhem !
40019013	Kra yemdanen țawin-d i Sidna Ɛisa arrac imecṭuḥen iwakken ad issers afus-is fell-asen a ten-ibarek , meɛna inelmaden-is țțaran-ten .
40019014	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Anfet-asen i warrac a d-asen ɣuṛ-i , ur sen-qeṭṭɛet ara abrid , axaṭer tagelda n igenwan thegga i nutni akk-d wid yellan am nutni !
40019015	Yessers afus-is fell-asen , iburek iten , dɣa iṛuḥ syenna .
40019016	Imiren yiwen wergaz iqeṛṛeb-ed ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , yenna-yas : A Sidi , d acu i yi-ilaqen a t xedmeɣ n wayen yelhan iwakken ad sɛuɣ tudert n dayem ?
40019017	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Acuɣeṛ i yi-testeqsayeḍ ɣef wayen yelhan ? AAnagar yiwen i gelhan ! Ma tebɣiḍ aț-țesɛuḍ tudert-agi , xdem lumuṛat yellan di ccariɛa . YYerra-yas-ed weqcic-nni : Anwi i d lumuṛat ara tebɛeɣ ?
40019018	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ur tneqqeḍ ara tamgeṛṭ , ur tzennuḍ ara , ur tețțcehhideḍ ara s ẓẓur , ur tețțakkṛreḍ ara ,
40019019	qadeṛ baba-k d yemma-k , tḥemmleḍ lɣiṛ-ik am yiman-ik !
40019020	Aqcic-nni yerra-yas-ed : Ayagi akk xedmeɣ-t , d acu i yi-ixuṣṣen ?
40019021	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ma tebɣiḍ ihi aț-țkemleḍ deg webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi , ṛuḥ , zzenz akk ayen i tesɛiḍ , tefkeḍ idrimen-nni i yimeɣban , s wakka aț-țesɛuḍ agerruj deg igenwan ! Imiren as-ed , aț-țedduḍ yid-i .
40019022	Mi gesla i yimeslayen-agi , ilemẓi-nni yeḥzen aṭas dɣa iṛuḥ , axaṭer d ameṛkanti ameqqran i gella .
40019023	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i inelmaden-is : A wen-iniɣ s tideț : iwɛeṛ aṭas i umeṛkanti ad ikcem ɣer tgelda n igenwan !
40019024	A wen-iniɣ daɣen : ma yella iwɛeṛ i welɣem ad iɛeddi di tiṭ n tissegnit , iwɛeṛ akteṛ i umeṛkanti ad ikcem ɣer tgelda n igenwan !
40019025	Mi slan i imeslayen-agi , inelmaden-is dehcen aṭas , nnan-as : Anwa i gzemren ad ițțusellek ihi ?
40019026	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa imuqel-iten , yenna : Imdanen s yiman-nsen ur zmiren ara , meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yezmer i kullec .
40019027	Buṭrus inṭeq , yenna-yas : Aql-aɣ nukkni neǧǧa kullec iwakken a k-netbeɛ , d acu ara yedṛun yid-nneɣ ?
