40019028	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : A wen-iniɣ s tideț , asm'ara d-ḥyun lmegtin ɣer ddunit tajḍiṭ , asm'ara yeqqim Mmi-s n bunadem ɣef wukersi n lḥekma di lɛaḍima-s , ula d kunwi yeddan yid-i , aț-țeqqimem di tnac yid-wen ɣef yikersiyen n lḥekma iwakken aț-țḥasbem tnac n leɛṛac n wat Isṛail .
40019029	Yerna , kra win ara yeǧǧen ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw axxam-is neɣ atmaten-is , yessetma-s neɣ baba-s , yemma-s , arraw-is neɣ tiferkiwin-is , ad as-d-yețțune akteṛ n wayen yeǧǧa , yerna a t-id-tṣaḥ tudert n dayem .
40019030	Aṭas seg wid yellan d imezwura ad uɣalen d ineggura , aṭas daɣen seg wid yellan d ineggura ad uɣalen d imezwura .
40020001	Tagelda n igenwan teṭṭemcabi ɣer yiwen numɛellem yeffɣen ṣṣbeḥ zik , iwakken a d-yawi ixeddamen ara d-yekksen tiẓurin di tfeṛṛant-is .
40020002	Imsefham yid-sen a ten-ixelleṣ s twizeț n lfeṭṭa i wass , dɣa iceggeɛ-iten ɣer tfeṛṛant-is .
40020003	Iffeɣ daɣen ɣef țesɛa n ṣṣbeḥ , iwala wiyaḍ qqimen di beṛṛa mbla lxedma .
40020004	yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet ula d kunwi aț-țxedmem di tfeṛṛant-iw , a wen-fkeɣ ayen tuklalem .
40020005	Dɣa ṛuḥen . Bab n tfeṛṛant-nni yexdem akken daɣen ɣef tnac n wass akk-d ț-țlata n tmeddit .
40020006	Iffeɣ daɣen ɣef lxemsa n tmeddit , yufa wiyaḍ qqimen di beṛṛa yenna-yasen : Acuɣeṛ i tețɣimim ass kamel mbla lxedma ?
40020007	Nnan-as-ed : Ulac win i ɣ-d-ifkan lxedma ! YYenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet ula d kunwi aț-țxedmem di tfeṛṛant-iw !
40020008	Mi i d-tewweḍ tmeddit , bab n tfeṛṛant yenna i lewkil-is : Ssiwel i ixeddamen txellseḍ-ten yiwen yiwen . Zwir seg ineggura tessegriḍ imezwura .
40020009	Usan-d wid yebdan lxedma ɣef lxemsa n tmeddit , ixelleṣ-iten s ssuma n yiwen wass ,
40020010	mi i d-tewweḍ nnuba n wid ibdan lxedma ɣef țesɛa n ṣṣbeḥ , ɣilen ad țwaxelṣen akteṛ n wiyaḍ , meɛna ula d nutni țwaxellṣen s ssuma n yiwen wass .
40020011	Mi ṭṭfen lexlaṣ-nsen , iɣaḍ-iten lḥal , nnan i bab n tfeṛṛant-nni :
40020012	Ixeddamen-agi ineggura xedmen yiwet n ssaɛa kan , txellṣeḍ ten am nukkni yenɛețțaben ass kamel i wezɣal ?
40020013	Meɛna yerra-yas i yiwen seg sen : Ay amdakkel , acuɣeṛ i k-iɣaḍ lḥal ? Eɛni ur nemsefham ara ɣef lexlaṣ-nwen ad yili tawizeț n lfeṭṭa d ssuma n yiwen wass ?
40020014	Awi lḥeqq-ik tṛuḥeḍ . I ma yella bɣiɣ ad fkeɣ i uneggaru annect i k-fkiɣ i kečč ?
40020015	Eɛni ur zmireɣ ara ad xedmeɣ akken bɣiɣ s idrimen-iw ? Neɣ iɣaḍ-ik lḥal imi ur lliɣ ara d amecḥaḥ ?
40020016	S wakka aṭas ineggura ara yuɣalen d imezwura , aṭas n imezwura ara yuɣalen d ineggura .
40020017	Mi țeddun ad alin ɣer temdint n Lquds , Sidna Ɛisa iṭṭef tnac-nni inelmaden-is weḥḥed-sen , yenna yasen :
40020018	Ḥesset-ed : atan a nali ɣer temdint n Lquds , anda ara ițțusellem Mmi-s n bunadem ger ifassen n lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa . Ad ḥekmen fell-as s lmut ,
40020019	yerna a t-sellmen ger ifassen nn ikafriwen iwakken ad stehzin fell-as , a t-jelkḍen ( a t-cellṭen ) , a t-semmṛen ɣef wumidag , ass wis tlata a d-iḥyu si ger lmegtin .
40020020	Imiren yemma-s n Yeɛqub d Yuḥenna , arraw n Zabadi , tqeṛṛeb-ed ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nețțat d warraw-is , tseǧǧed ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is .
40020021	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : D acu i tebɣiḍ ? Tenna-yas : Di leɛnaya-k a Sidi , efk-asen imukan i sin-agi n warraw-iw di tgelda-inek , iwakken ad qqimen wa ɣer uyeffus-ik , wa ɣer uzelmaḍ-ik .
40020022	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Ur teẓrim ara ayen akka i d tessutrem ! Eɛni tzemrem aț-țeswem si tbuqalt-agi n lemṛaṛ ara sweɣ ? NNnan-as : Ih a Sidi , nezmer !
40020023	Yerra-yasen : Ț-țideț , aț-țeswem si tbuqalt-agi , meɛna ɣef wayen yeɛnan imukan ɣer tama-w tayeffust neɣ tazelmaṭ , mačči d nekk ara ten-ifken , ad țțunefken i wid iwumi i ten-ihegga Baba Ṛebbi .
40020024	Ɛecṛa n inelmaden-nni mi slan ayagi , ikcem-iten zzɛaf ɣef ddemma n sin-nni watmaten .
40020025	Sidna Ɛisa yessawel-asen , yenna-yasen : Walit igelliden n yegduden nniḍen akk-d imeqqranen-nsen amek ḥeṛsen yerna ḥeqṛen lɣaci-nsen !
40020026	Ur ilaq ara ad yili wannect-agi gar-awen . Ma yella yiwen seg-wen yebɣa ad yuɣal d ameqqran , ilaq ad yili d aqeddac-nwen .
40020027	Akken daɣen , win yebɣan ad yili d amezwaru , ilaq ad yuɣal d akli-nwen .
40020028	Daymi Mmi-s n bunadem ur d-yusi ara iwakken ad qedcen fell-as , meɛna yusa-d iwakken ad yili d aqeddac , yerna ad isebbel tudert-is iwakken ad isellek aṭas n yemdanen .
40020029	Mi d-ffɣen si temdint n Yiriku , aṭas n lɣaci i d-iḍefṛen Sidna Ɛisa .
40020030	Llan sin iderɣalen qqimen rrif n webrid , mi slan belli d Sidna Ɛisa i d-iɛeddan bdan țɛeggiḍen : A Sidi ! A mmi-s n Sidna Dawed ! Ḥunn fell-aɣ !
40020031	Lɣaci-nni țlumun-ten , qqaṛen asen ad ssusmen , ma d nutni țkemmilen leɛyaḍ : Ḥunn fell-aɣ a Sidi , a mmi-s n Sidna Dawed !
40020032	Sidna Ɛisa iḥbes , issawel-asen , yenna-yasen : D acu i tebɣam a wen-t-xedmeɣ ?
40020033	Rran-as : Nebɣa a ɣ-d-yuɣal yeẓri a Sidi !
40020034	Ɣaḍen aṭas Sidna Ɛisa , yennul allen-nsen , imiren kan yuɣal-iten-id yeẓri , dɣa ddan yid-es .
40021001	Mi qṛib ad kecmen ɣer temdint n Lquds , wwḍen ɣer yiɣil n uzemmur yellan tama n taddart n Bitfaji , Sidna Ɛisa iceggeɛ sin inelmaden-is ,
40021002	yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet ɣer taddart yellan ɣer zdat , dinna aț-țafem taɣyult akk-d mmi-s , brut-asen-d , tawim-iyi-ten-id .
40021003	Ma yella win i wen-d-yennan kra , init-as : d Ssid-nneɣ i ten-iḥwaǧen , imiren a sen-d-iserreḥ .
40021004	Ayagi yedṛa-d am akken i t-id yenna nnbi Zakarya di tira iqedsen :
40021005	Init i wat wedrar n Siyun : AA taya ugellid-nwen iteddu-d ɣuṛ-wen s wannuz , irkeb-ed ɣef weɣyul amecṭuḥ mmi-s n teɣyult .
40021006	Inelmaden-nni ṛuḥen , xedmen ayen i sen-d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa .
40021007	Wwin-d taɣyult-nni d mmi-s , sburren-asen llebsa-nsen , dɣa srekben Sidna Ɛisa .
40021008	Aṭas n lɣaci ssan iceṭṭiḍen-nsen deg ubrid , wiyaḍ țṛuẓun-d tiseḍwa si ttjuṛ , țessun-tent ula d nutni deg ubrid .
40021009	Lɣaci yezwaren zdat Sidna Ɛisa d wid i t-id-iḍefṛen , țɛeggiḍen s lfeṛḥ qqaṛen : Ḥusana i mmi-s n Sidna Dawed ! Ițțubarek win i d-yusan s yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi ! Ḥusana deg imukan eɛlayen .
40021010	Mi gekcem Sidna Ɛisa ɣer temdint n Lquds , imezdaɣ meṛṛa nhewwalen , qqaṛen : Anwa-t wagi ?
40021011	Lɣaci-nni țțaran-asen : D Sidna Ɛisa , nnbi-nni n taddart n Naṣaret i d-yusan si tmurt n Jlili !
40021012	Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen , iqecceɛ meṛṛa wid yețțaɣen znuzun dinna deg ufrag n lǧameɛ . Iqleb-asen ṭṭwabel i wid yețbeddilen idrimen akk-d wid yeznuzun itbiren .
40021013	dɣa yenna-yasen : Yura : Axxam-iw ad ițțusemmi d axxam n tẓallit , ma d kunwi terram-t d lɣaṛ n imakaren .
40021014	Di lǧameɛ-nni , qeṛṛben-d ɣuṛ-es iderɣalen d iquḍaren , dɣa yesseḥla ten .
40021015	Lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɛulama n ccariɛa rfan mi walan leɛǧayeb i gxeddem akk-d warrac ițɛeggiḍen di lǧameɛ : Ḥusana i mmi-s n Sidna Dawed !
40021016	Imiren nnan i Sidna Ɛisa : Tesliḍ d acu i d-qqaṛen ? SSidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Sliɣ ih ! Eɛni ur teɣṛim ara imeslayen-agi yuran di tira iqedsen : Tessufɣeḍ-ed leḥmadi seg imawen n warrac akk-d wid n llufanat iteṭṭḍen .
40021017	Imiren yeǧǧa-ten dinna , yeffeɣ si temdint , iṛuḥ ɣer taddart n Bitanya , dinna i gensa .
40021018	Azekka-nni taṣebḥit mi d-yuɣal ɣer temdint , Sidna Ɛisa yelluẓ ;
40021019	iwala yiwet n tneqleț rrif n webrid , iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es , ur yufi deg-s acemma anagar afriwen ; dɣa yenna-yas : Seg wass-a , ur tețțuɣaleḍ ara a d-tefkeḍ lfakya ! IImiren kan , taneqleț-nni teqquṛ .
40021020	Inelmaden-is mi walan ayagi tɛeǧben , nnan : Amek akka teqquṛ tneqleț-agi deg yiwet n teswiɛt ?
40021021	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : A wen-iniɣ tideț , ma yella tesɛam liman ur tețcukkum ara , aț-țizmirem aț-țxedmem akteṛ n wayen xedmeɣ i tneqleț-agi ! AAț-ținim i wedrar-agi qleɛ iman-ik syagi tḍeggṛeḍ iman-ik ɣer lebḥeṛ , ayagi a d-yedṛu !
40021022	Ayen akk ara tessutrem s liman di tẓallit , a wen-d-ițune !
40021023	Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ɣer lǧameɛ ibda yesselmad . Lmuqedmin akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es nnan-as : Ansi i k-d-tekka tezmert s wayes i txeddmeḍ ayagi ? Anwa i k-d-yefkan tazmert-agi ?
40021024	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : A wen-fkeɣ asteqsi ula d nekk , yiwen kan ; ma tǧawbem-iyi-d , ula d nekk a wen-iniɣ ansi i yi-d-tekka tezmert-agi .
40021025	Aɣḍas n Yeḥya , s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-ikka neɣ s ɣuṛ yemdanen ? DDɣa bdan qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Ma nenna-yas seg igenwan , a ɣ-d-yini acuɣeṛ ihi ur tuminem ara yis ,
40021026	ma nenna-yas daɣen seg imdanen , nuggad lɣaci-agi , axaṭer ḥesben akk Yeḥya d nnbi .
40021027	Dɣa nnan-as i Sidna Ɛisa : Ur neẓri ara ! YYerra-yasen : Ihi ula d nekk ur wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ara ansi i yi-d-tekka tezmert s wayes i xeddmeɣ ayagi !
40021028	D acu twalam ? Yiwen wergaz yesɛa sin warraw-is , yenṭeq ɣer umezwaru , yenna-yas : A mmi , ṛuḥ aț-țxedmeḍ ass-agi di tfeṛṛant-iw .
40021029	Yerra-yas : Ur țṛuḥuɣ ara ! MMeɛna yuɣal yendem , iṛuḥ ad ixdem di tfeṛṛant .
40021030	Yenna-yas daɣen i mmi-s wi sin ad iṛuḥ ad ixdem , yerra-yas-d : Ih a baba ad ṛuḥeɣ ! MMeɛna ur iṛuḥ ara .
40021031	Anwa deg sen i gxedmen lebɣi n baba-s ? RRran-as-ed : D amezwaru a Sidi ! SSidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : A wen-d-iniɣ tideț , imekkasen imakaren akk-d yir tilawin a kkun zwiren ɣer tgelda n igenwan !
40021032	Axaṭer Yeḥya yusa-d ɣuṛ-wen yesken-awen-d abrid n tideț , meɛna ur t-tuminem ara ; ma d imekkasen d yir tilawin umnen yis . Yerna ɣas akken twalam ayagi , ur d-tuɣalem ara ɣer webrid teggumam aț-țamnem yis .
40021033	A wen-d-rnuɣ daɣen lemtel nniḍen : yella yiwen umɛellem , yeẓẓa tafeṛṛant , izzi-yas-ed s zzeṛb , yeɣza amkan i tɛeṣṣart n tẓurin , yebna taɛrict i tɛessast , issekra tafeṛṛant-is i ixemmasen , imiren iṛuḥ ɣer lɣeṛba .
40021034	Mi d-yewweḍ lweqt n tẓurin , iceggeɛ iqeddacen-is ɣer ixemmasen nni iwakken a s-d-fken amur-is n lɣella .
40021035	Meɛna ixemmasen-nni ṭṭfen iqeddacen-nni , wa wten-t , wa nɣan-t , wayeḍ ṛejmen-t .
40021036	Iceggeɛ-asen daɣen tarbaɛt nniḍen n iqeddacen yugaren tamezwarut . Meɛna tedṛa yid-sen am imezwura-nni .
40021037	Taggara , iceggeɛ-asen mmi-s , yenna : Ahat imi d mmi a t-qadṛen !
40021038	Lameɛna mi walan mmi-s , ixemmasen-nni nnan wway gar-asen : Ataya win ara iweṛten , kkret a t-nenneɣ iwakken a nawi lweṛt-is .
40021039	Sṭfen-t , ḍeggṛen-t ɣer beṛṛa n tfeṛṛant , dɣa nɣan-t .
40021040	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i lɣaci : Ihi tura , m'ara d-yas bab n tfeṛṛant-nni , d acu ara sen-yexdem i ixemmasen-agi ?
40021041	Rran-as-ed : Ad ineɣ ixemmasen imcumen , ma ț-țafeṛṛant a ț-issekru i ixemmasen nniḍen ara s-d-ifken amur-is di lweqt n lɣella .
40021042	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Leɛmeṛ teɣṛim imeslayen-agi i d-nnant tira iqedsen : Adɣaɣ-nni i ḍeggṛen wid ibennun , d nețța i guɣalen d azṛu alemmas , WWin yeṭṭfen lebni . AA yagi yekka-d s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi , d ayen i ɣ-istɛeǧben .
40021043	Daymi i wen-qqaṛeɣ : Tagelda n igenwan a wen tețwakkes , aț-țețțune i leǧnas nniḍen ara d-ifken lɣella .
40021044	Win ara yeɣlin ɣef wusalas-agi ad yerreẓ , daɣen win i ɣef ara d-yeɣli usalas-agi ad yețwamḥeq .
40021045	Mi slan i imeslayen-agi , ifariziyen d lmuqedmin imeqqranen fehmen belli fell-asen i d-iheddeṛ Sidna Ɛisa .
40021046	Meɛna ɣas akken bɣan a t-ṭṭfen , ur zmiren ara axaṭer uggaden lɣaci-nni i t-iḥesben d nnbi .
40022001	Sidna Ɛisa imeslay-asen-d daɣen s lemtel , yenna-yasen : —
40022002	Tagelda n igenwan tcuba ɣer yiwen ugellid i gxedmen tameɣṛa i mmi-s .
40022003	Iceggeɛ iqeddacen-is ad ssiwlen i wid yețwaɛeṛden , meɛna ugin a d-asen .
40022004	Yerna iceggeɛ-asen iqeddacen nniḍen a sen-inin : Heggaɣ imensi , zliɣ izgaren-iw d wakraren-iw , kullec ihegga , aset-ed ɣer tmeɣṛa !
40022005	Meɛna widak-nni ițwaɛeṛḍen ur s-fkin ara azal , yal yiwen yelha d ccɣel-is , wa iṛuḥ ɣer yiger-is , wa ɣer ssuq-is .
40022006	Wiyaḍ ṭṭfen iqeddacen-nni , regmen-ten , nɣan-ten .
40022007	Agellid-nni ikcem-it zzɛaf d ameqqran , dɣa iceggeɛ lɛeskeṛ-is nɣan iqettalen-nni , sseṛɣen tamdint-nsen .
40022008	Imiren yenna i iqeddacen-is : Imensi n tmeɣṛa ihegga , meɛna widak-nni ițwaɛeṛḍen ur t-uklalen ara ;
40022009	ṛuḥet ɣer izenqan , tɛeṛḍem-d ɣer tmeɣṛa wid akk ara tafem deg iberdan .
40022010	Iqeddacen-nni ṛuḥen ɣer izenqan jemɛen-d wid akk ufan , ama d amcum ama d win yelhan , s wakka axxam n tmeɣṛa yeččuṛ-ed d lɣaci .
40022011	Mi d-ikcem ugellid ad iwali inebgawen , iwala yiwen wergaz ur yelsi ara llebsa n tmeɣṛa .
40022012	yenna-yas : Ay amdakkel , amek i d-tkecmeḍ ɣer dagi mbla llebsa n tmeɣṛa yețwaheggan i yinebgawen ? AArgaz-nni yessusem , ur yufi d acu ara s-yini .
40022013	Agellid-nni yefka lameṛ i iqeddacen-is yenna-yasen : Cuddet-as ifassen d iḍaṛṛen , tḍeggṛem-t ɣer ṭṭlam n beṛṛa , anda llan imeṭṭawen d nndama tameqqrant .
40022014	Axaṭer aṭas i gețwaɛerḍen , meɛna drus ara yețwaqeblen .
40022015	Imiren ṛuḥen ifariziyen ad mcawaṛen amek ara d-sseɣlin Sidna Ɛisa deg wawal .
40022016	Ceggɛen-as kra seg inelmaden-nsen akk-d kra si terbaɛt n Hiṛudus , nnan-as : A Sidi , neẓra-k d bab n lḥeqq i telliḍ , tesselmadeḍ iberdan n Ṛebbi s tideț , ur tuggadeḍ ula d yiwen , ur txeddmeḍ ara lxilaf ger yemdanen .
40022017	Ini-yaɣ-d ihi d acu twalaḍ : d leḥlal neɣ d leḥṛam a nxelleṣ tabzert ( leɣṛama ) i ugellid Qayṣar ( yestɛemṛen tamurt-nneɣ ) ?
40022018	Meɛna Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran ayen i țxemmimen , yenna-yasen : Ay at sin wudmawen ! Acuɣeṛ tebɣam a yi-tjeṛbem ?
40022019	Seknet-iyi-d aṣurdi s wacu țxelliṣen tabzert ! FFkan-as-d aṣurdi n lfeṭṭa .
40022020	Dɣa isteqsa-ten : Udem akk-d tira yellan deg uṣuṛdi-agi , wi ten-ilan ?
40022021	Rran-as : N Qayṣer ! IImiren yenna-yasen : Erret ihi i Qayṣer ayen yellan n Qayṣer , terrem i Ṛebbi ayen yellan n Ṛebbi !
40022022	Mi slan i imeslayen-agi , wehmen , dɣa ṛuḥen ǧǧan-t .
40022023	Ass-nni , isaduqiyen i gellan d imdanen ur nețțamen ara s ḥeggu n lmegtin , usan-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , steqsan-t , nnan-as :
40022024	A Sidi , Sidna Musa yenna-d : ma yella yemmut wergaz d amengur , ilaq gma-s ad yaɣ taǧǧalt-nni iwakken a d-isɛu yid-es dderya ara iweṛten gma-s-nni yemmuten .
40022025	Yuɣ lḥal llan ɣuṛ-nneɣ sebɛa watmaten , amezwaru izewǧen yemmut ur d-yeǧǧi dderya , dɣa gma-s yerra ( yuɣa ) tameṭṭut-nni .
40022026	Akkenni i tedṛa d wis sin , d wis tlata , armi d wis sebɛa .
40022027	Mi mmuten irkulli , temmut ula ț-țameṭṭut-nni ;
40022028	ass n ḥeggu n lmegtin anwa deg-sen ara ț-yesɛun ț-țameṭṭut-is imi i ț-uɣen di sebɛa yid-sen ?
40022029	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Tɣelṭem ! Axaṭer ur tefhimem tira iqedsen , ur tessinem tazmert n Ṛebbi .
40022030	Ass n ḥeggu n lmegtin , irgazen ț-țilawin ur zeggjen ara , meɛna ad uɣalen am lmalayekkat deg igenni .
40022031	Ɣef wayen yeɛnan ḥeggu n lmegtin , ur teɣṛim ara acu i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi ? :
40022032	D nekk i d Illu n Ibṛahim , n Isḥaq , n Yeɛqub . Sidi Ṛebbi mačči d Ṛebbi n lmegtin , meɛna d Ṛebbi n wid yeddren .
40022033	Mi s-slan , lɣaci qqimen țweḥḥiden deg imeslayen-is !
40022034	Mi slan ifariziyen belli Sidna Ɛisa yeɣleb isaduqiyen deg wawal , nnejmaɛen wway gar-asen .
40022035	Yiwen seg-sen d lɛalem n ccariɛa , isteqsa-t iwakken a t-ijeṛṛeb :
40022036	A Sidi , anwa i d lameṛ ameqqran meṛṛa di ccariɛa ?
40022037	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : — Aț-țḥemleḍ Illu Sidi Ṛebbi-inek seg wul-ik , s teṛwiḥt-ik , s wayen yellan di tezmert-ik .
40022038	D wagi i d lameṛ yellan d amezwaru yerna d ameqqran akk di ccariɛa .
40022039	Atan wayeḍ yesɛan azal annect umezwaru-agi : Aț-țḥemleḍ lɣiṛ-ik am yiman-ik .
40022040	D sin lumuṛat-agi i d lsas n ccariɛa akk-d lenbiya .
40022041	Mi llan ifariziyen nnejmaɛen , Sidna Ɛisa isteqsa-ten yenna :
40022042	D acu ara d-tinim ɣef Lmasiḥ ? Ansi ara d-yekk , yeɛni anwi i d lejdud-is ? NNnan-as : D mmi-s n Sidna Dawed .
40022043	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Amek ihi i s-isemma Dawed s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen « Sidi » mi genna :
40022044	Sidi Ṛebbi yenna i Ssid-iw : ṭṭef amkan ɣer tama-w tayeffust , alamma rriɣ iɛdawen-ik seddaw iḍaṛṛen-ik .
40022045	Ma yella ihi Dawed yessawel-as « Sidi » amek ara yili ihi d mmi-s ?
40022046	Yiwen deg-sen ur izmir a s-d yerr awal , seg wass-nni țțaggaden a t-steqsin .
40023001	Imiren Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq ɣer lɣaci d inelmaden-is yenna yasen :
40023002	Lɛulama d ifariziyen sselmaden ccariɛa n Musa .
40023003	Xedmet ayen akk ara wen-d-inin , meɛna ur xeddmet ara wayen xeddmen nutni , axaṭer ayen i d-qqaṛen ur t-xeddmen ara .
40023004	Țcuddun tiɛekkmin ẓẓayen țɛebbin-tent ɣef tuyat n yemdanen , ma d nutni țțagin a ten-ɛiwnen ula s yixef n iḍuḍan-nsen .
40023005	Ayen akk i xeddmen , xeddmen-t iwakken a ten-walin yemdanen , țɛelliqen tiḥerztin ț-țeɣṛisin ɣef yiman-nsen .
40023006	Ḥemmlen ad ṭṭfen imukan imezwura ama di tmeɣṛiwin ama di leǧwameɛ , ḥemmlen m'ara țsellimen fell-asen yemdanen di tejmuyaɛ akk-d leswaq ;
40023007	ḥemmlen daɣen m'ara sen-qqaṛen yemdanen : « a Sidi » .
40023008	Ma d kunwi ɣuṛ-wat a wen qqaṛen : « a Sidi » axaṭer d atmaten i tellam yerna yiwen kan i d Ssid-nwen .
40023009	Ur qqaṛet ula i yiwen di ddunit : « Baba » axaṭer anagar yiwen i d baba-wen , d Baba Ṛebbi yellan deg igenwan .
40023010	Ur qebblet ara aț-țețțusemmim : « imeqqranen » axaṭer anagar yiwen i d ameqqran : d Lmasiḥ !
40023011	Ameqqran deg-wen , d win iqeddcen fell-awen .
40023012	Kra n win issimɣuṛen iman-is a d-yers , ma d win issimẓiyen iman is ad ițwarfed !
40023013	A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa , ay at sin wudmawen ! AAxaṭer tmeddlem tiwwura n igenwan i yemdanen , ur tkeččmem kunwi , ur tețțaǧǧam ad kecmen wid yebɣan !
40023014	A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa , ay at sin wudmawen ! Axaṭer tettețțem ayla n tuǧǧal , tesṭuqqutem awal di tẓallit-nwen iwakken a d-tesbegnem iman-nwen telham . Ɣef wayagi , lɛiqab i kkun-ițṛaǧun d ameqqran !
40023015	A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa , ay at sin udmawen ! Tețnadim timura , tzeggrem lebḥuṛ iwakken a d-rebḥem ɣas ula d yiwen ɣer ddin i tettabaɛem ; mi t-id-rnam ɣuṛ-wen , tețțaram-t d win yuklalen ǧahennama akteṛ-nwen !
40023016	A nnger-nwen ay iderɣalen iteṭṭfen afus i wiyaḍ ! Teqqaṛem : « Ma yella yeggul bunadem s lǧameɛ iqedsen , ɣas yeḥnet ulac fell-as ; ma d win ara yegallen s ddheb yellan di lǧameɛ , ur s-ilaq ara ad iḥnet , ilaq ad iṭṭef di limin-ines ! »
40023017	Ay imehbal , ay iderɣalen ! D acu i gesɛan azal , d ddheb neɣ d lǧameɛ i gețțarran ddheb-nni d imqeddes ?
40023018	Teqqaṛem daɣen : « Win ara yegallen s udekkan n iseflawen , ɣas iḥnet ulac fell-as , ma d win ara yegallen s iseflawen nni , ur s-ilaq ara ad iḥnet , ilaq ad iṭṭef di limin-ines . »
40023019	Ay iderɣalen ! Anwa i gesɛan azal , d iseflawen neɣ d udekkan-nni i gerran iseflawen d imqedsen ?
40023020	Win ara yegallen s udekkan n iseflawen , yeggul s udekkan-nni d wayen akk yersen fell-as .
40023021	Win ara yegallen daɣen s lǧameɛ , yeggul s lǧameɛ akk-d Win i gellan deg-s .
40023022	Win ara yegallen s igenwan , yeggul daɣen s igenwan akk-d Sidi Ṛebbi iḥekkmen deg-sen .
40023023	A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa , ay at sin udmawen ! tețțakem leɛcuṛ ɣef nneɛneɛ , abesbas d lkemmun , lameɛna tețțaǧǧam ɣer deffir lḥeqq , ṛṛeḥma d laman . DD annect-agi i gețṛaǧu deg-wen Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țezwirem deg-sen a ten-txedmem , mbla ma terram deg idis ayen nniḍen .
40023024	Ay iderɣalen iteṭṭfen afus i wiyaḍ ! Tețṣeffim tissit-nwen ɣef yizi , tesseblaɛem alɣem .
40023025	A nnger-wen ay ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa , ay at sin wudmawen ! Axaṭer tessizdigem taqbuct d uḍebsi s ufella kan , meɛna ɣer daxel-nsen ččuṛen ț-țukeṛdiwin d ṭṭmeɛ .
40023026	Ay afarizi aderɣal ! Ssizdeg uqbel daxel n teqbuct d uḍebsi , iwakken ula s ufella-nsen ad izdigen !
40023027	A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa , ay at sin udmawen ! TTețțemcabim ɣer iẓekwan isebɣen s lǧir ; s ufella cebḥen , ɣer daxel ččuṛen d iɣsan n lmegtin d rekku .
40023028	Akka ula d kunwi , tețbegginem-d iman-nwen telham ɣer yemdanen , lameɛna zdaxel teččuṛem d leɣruṛ d cceṛ .
40023029	A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa , ay at sin wudmawen ! Tbennum iẓekwan n lenbiya , tețcebbiḥem iẓekwan n wid iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi ,
40023030	teqqaṛem lemmer i nɛac di zzman n lejdud-nneɣ , tili ur neqbil ara a nțekki yid-sen deg ussizel n idammen n lenbiya .
40023031	S wakka tețcehhidem belli kunwi ț-țarwa n wid ineqqen lenbiya
40023032	yerna kunwi tețkemmilem ayen xedmen lejdud-nwen !
40023033	A ccetla n izerman ! Amek ara tmenɛem si lɛiqab n ǧahennama ?
40023034	Daymi ara wen-d-ceggɛeɣ lenbiya , imusnawen akk-d lɛulama . KKra seg-sen a ten-tenɣem , kra a ten-tsemmṛem ɣef wumidag , kra nniḍen a ten-tejlekḍem di leǧwameɛ nwen yerna a ten-tețqehhiṛem si temdint ɣer tayeḍ .
40023035	Ihi , idammen n iḥeqqiyen yuzzlen di lqaɛa , si Habil aḥeqqi mmi-s n Adem armi d Zakarya mmi-s n Birikya , i tenɣam ger lǧameɛ iqedsen d udekkan iseflawen , a d-uɣalen ɣer yiri-nwen .
40023036	A wen-d-iniɣ tideț : ayagi meṛṛa a d-yeɣli ɣef lǧil-agi !
40023037	A tamdint n Lquds ! A tamdint n Lquds ineqqen lenbiya , ireǧǧmen wid i m-d-ițuceggɛen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi , acḥal n tikkal i bɣiɣ a d-jemɛeɣ arraw-im akken tjemmeɛ tyaziṭ ifṛax-is ddaw wafriwen-is , meɛna tegummaḍ !
40023038	Ihi atan wexxam-im ad yexlu !
40023039	Axaṭer aql-i a wen-iniɣ : ur tețțuɣalem ara a yi-twalim , alamma d ass i deg ara d-tinim : Yețțubarek win i d-yusan s yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi !
40024001	Mi d-iffeɣ si lǧameɛ iqedsen , Sidna Ɛisa iteddu ad iṛuḥ . Inelmaden-is qeṛṛben-d ɣuṛ-es , țwehhin-as iwakken ad yerr ddehn-is ɣer cbaḥa akk-d lebni n lǧameɛ iqedsen .
40024002	Meɛna Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Twalam annect-agi meṛṛa ? A wen-iniɣ tideț : ur d-yețɣimi wezṛu ɣef wayeḍ , kullec ad ihudd .
40024003	Yuli ɣer yiɣil n uzemmur iqqim weḥd-es , inelmaden-is usan-d a t-steqsin nnan-as : Melmi ara d-idṛu wayen i d tenniḍ , amek ara neɛqel ass ameqqran n tuɣalin-ik akk-d taggara n ddunit ?
40024004	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Ɣuṛ-wat win ara wen-ikellxen !
40024005	Axaṭer aṭas n yemdanen ara d-yasen s yisem-iw , a d-inin : « ` D nekk i d Lmasiḥ ! » Yerna ad kellxen aṭas n lɣaci .
40024006	Aț-țeslem s ṭradat ț-țegrawliwin , meɛna ɣuṛ-wat a kkun-iffeɣ leɛqel . Ur țțaggadet ara , axaṭer ilaq a d-yedṛu wannect-a , meɛna mazal mačči d nnger n ddunit .
40024007	Agdud ad yennaɣ d wayeḍ , tagelda aț-țeẓdem ɣef tayeḍ , a d-yili laẓ d zzelzlat deg waṭas n imukan .
40024008	Ayagi akk ara yedṛun , ad yili am lqeṛḥ amezwaru n tmeṭṭut iṭṭfen addud .
40024009	Imiren a kkun-fken iwakken aț-țețțuɛetbem , a kkun-nɣen , leǧnas meṛṛa a kkun-keṛhen ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw .
40024010	Aṭas ara yeǧǧen liman-nsen , ad msekṛahen , ad țemyexdaɛen wway gar-asen .
40024011	A d-nnulfun lenbiya n lekdeb , ad ɣuṛṛen aṭas n lɣaci ,
40024012	simmal ad yețzad lbaṭel , simmal lmaḥibba n waṭas n yemdanen aț-țenqes .
40024013	Ma d win ara yeṭṭfen di liman-is alamma ț-țaggara , ad ițțusellek .
40024014	Lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ ɣef tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi , ad ițțubecceṛ di ddunit meṛṛa iwakken leǧnas ad slen yis . Imiren ara d-taweḍ taggara n ddunit .
40024015	M'ara twalim deg wemkan iqedsen win iwumi semman lmuṣiba issengaren i ɣef d-ihḍeṛ nnbi Danyel ; ( win ara yeɣṛen taktabt-agi n nnbi Danyel ad ifhem ! )
40024016	Imiren , wid ara yilin di tmurt n Yahuda ilaq ad rewlen ɣer idurar ,
40024017	win ara yilin s ufella n ssqef , ur ilaq ara ad ikcem ɣer wexxam iwakken a d-iddem lqecc-is ,
40024018	win daɣen ara yilin di lexla , ur ilaq ara ad yuɣal ɣer deffir iwakken a d-iddem abeṛnus-is !
40024019	A tawaɣit n tilawin ara yilin s tadist akk-d țid ara yessuṭuḍen deg ussan-nni !
40024020	Dɛut ɣer Ṛebbi iwakken tarewla agi-nwen ur d-tdeṛṛu ara di ccetwa neɣ deg wass n westeɛfu .
40024021	Axaṭer « ad yili yiwen n leɛtab ur d-nelli seg wasmi d-tebda ddunit ar ass-a yerna ur ițțuɣal ara a d-yili ! »
40024022	Lemmer ur issenqes ara Sidi Ṛebbi deg wussan-nni , tili yiwen ur imenneɛ , meɛna ɣef ddemma n wid yextaṛ ara yeṣṣenqes i wussan-agi .
40024023	Imiren ma yenna-yawen-d yiwen : Lmasiḥ atan dagi neɣ atan , dihin , ur țțamnet ara !
40024024	Axaṭer a d-asen wid ara yerren iman-nsen d Lmasiḥ neɣ d lenbiya , ad xedmen lbeṛhanat d leɛǧayeb akk-d licaṛat iwakken ad kelxen ma zemren ula d wid yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
40024025	Atan nniɣ-awen-t-id ihi :
40024026	ma nnan-awen Lmasiḥ atan deg unezṛuf , ur țṛuḥut ara , neɣ ma nnan-awen walit , atan deg umkan-ihin yeffren , ur țțamnet ara .
40024027	Axaṭer asm'ara d-yas Mmi-s n bunadem , ad yili am tafat n lbeṛeq m'ara d-tfeǧǧeǧ si cceṛq alamma d lɣeṛb .
40024028	Anda yella umuṛḍus ( lǧifa ) , dinna ara nnejmaɛen igudar .
40024029	M'ara ɛeddin wussan-nni n leɛtab , iṭij ad inqes , aggur ur d-ițțak ara tiziri-ines , itran a d-ɣlin seg igenni , tizmar n igenwan ad rgagint .
40024030	Imiren a d-iban Mmi-s n bunadem deg igenni , leɛṛac meṛṛa n ddunit ad meǧden , a d wwten deg idmaren-nsen m'ara walin Mmi-s n bunadem deg igenwan , yusa-d ɣef wusigna s tezmert akk-d lɛaḍima tameqqrant .
40024031	A d-iceggeɛ lmalayekkat-is ad berrḥent s ṣṣut n lbuq , a d snejmaɛent wid akk yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , si yal amkan , seg ixef n ddunit ɣer wayeḍ .
40024032	Meyzet ɣef lemtel n tneqleț : mi lqaqit isegman-is , fsan wafriwen-is , teḥsam yewweḍ-d unebdu !
40024033	Ula d kunwi , m'ara twalim yewweḍ-ed wannect-agi meṛṛa , ḥṣut belli Mmi-s n bunadem ițeddu-d , atan ɣer tewwurt .
40024034	A wen-d-iniɣ tideț : lǧil-agi ur ițɛedday ara alamma ideṛṛu-d wannect agi meṛṛa .
40024035	Igenni d lqaɛa ad fnun , ma d imeslayen-iw ur fennun ara !
40024036	Meɛna ɣef wayen yeɛnan ass neɣ ssaɛa n wannect-agi meṛṛa , yiwen ur ten-issin , ama d lmalayekkat n igenwan , ama d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi , anagar Baba Ṛebbi i geẓran .
40024037	Am akken i tedṛa di zzman n nnbi Nuḥ , akken daɣen ara tedṛu di lweqt n Mmi-s n bunadem .
40024038	Axaṭer deg ussan-nni uqbel a d-neflen waman ɣef ddunit , imdanen llan tețțen , tessen , țemyezwaǧen , zeggjen i warraw-nsen , armi d ass i deg yekcem nnbi Nuḥ ɣer lbabuṛ .
40024039	Yiwen ur ifaq s wacemma armi d-ḥemlen waman i ten-yewwin , snegren-ten akk . AAkken ara tedṛu di lweqt n tuɣalin n Mmi-s n bunadem !
40024040	Imiren , ger sin yergazen ara yilin deg iger , yiwen ad ițwarfed wayeḍ a d-iqqim .
40024041	Ger snat n tilawin yeẓẓaden s tsirt , yiwet aț-țețwarfed tayeḍ a d-teqqim !
40024042	Ɛasset ihi ur ɣefflet ara ! Axaṭer ur teẓrim ara lweqt i deg ara d-yas Ssid-nwen !
40024043	Rret ddehn-nwen ɣer wayagi : lemmer yeẓri bab n wexxam lweqt i deg ara d-yas umakar , tili ad iɛiwez ur iggan ara , iwakken ur t-țțakren ara .
40024044	Daymi ula d kunwi heggit iman-nwen axaṭer di lweqt i ɣef ur tebnim ara , ara d-yas Mmi-s n bunadem .
40024045	Anwa i d aqeddac aɛeqli i ɣef ara yețkel bab n wexxam ? D win ara iwekkel ɣef wat wexxam-is meṛṛa , iwakken a sen-ye lqut-nsen di lawan .
40024046	Amarezg n uqeddac-agi ara d-yaf bab n wexxam m'ara d-yaweḍ , yelha d ccɣel-nni .
40024047	A wen-iniɣ tideț : a t-yerr d lewkil ɣef wayla-s meṛṛa !
40024048	Meɛna ma yella axeddam-agi diri-t , ad yini deg ul-is : bab n wexxam iɛeṭṭel , mazal ur d-ițas ara ;
40024049	dɣa ad ibdu ad ikkat iqeddacen n wexxam-nni , ad iteț , ad itess nețța d isekṛanen .
40024050	Bab n wexxam a d-yas deg wass i ɣef ur ibni ara uqeddac-nni , di lawan ur yeẓri .
40024051	A t-iqecceɛ , a t-iɛaqeb akken țwaɛaqben at sin udmawen : imiren ara yilin imeṭṭawen d nndama tameqqrant .
40025001	Daymi deg wussan-nni , tagelda n igenwan aț-țecbu ɣer ɛecṛa telmeẓyin i geddmen tiftilin-nsent iwakken ad ṛuḥent ad mmagrent isli .
40025002	Xemsa seg-sent ț-țuḥṛicin , xemsa nniḍen ț-țungifin .
40025003	Mi d-ddment tungifin-nni tiftilin nsent , ur d-wwint ara zzit yid-sent .
40025004	Ma ț-țuḥṛicin-nni , wwint-ed yid-sent tiqbucin n zzit .
40025005	Imi i gɛeṭṭel yesli , tilmeẓyin-nni nuddment dɣa ṭsent .
40025006	Di tlemmast n yiḍ , yiwet n taɣect tɛeggeḍ-ed : Ataya yesli iteddu-d , ffɣemt a t-temmagremt !
40025007	Imiren kan ukint-ed akk telmeẓyin-nni , heggant tiftilin-nsent .
40025008	Tungifin-nni nnant i tuḥṛicin : Fkemt-aɣ-d kra si zzit-nkunt , tiftilin-nneɣ qṛib ad xsint .
40025009	Tuḥṛicin rrant-asent : Ulamek , ur aɣ-d-tkeffu ara i nekkunti d kunemti , ṛuḥemt a d taɣemt i yiman-nkunt ɣer wid yeznuzun .
40025010	Mi ṛuḥent a d-aɣent , isli yewweḍ-ed , tuḥṛicin-nni iheggan iman-nsent kecment yid-es ɣer wexxam n tmeɣṛa , dɣa rran-d tawwurt .
40025011	Mi i d-wwḍent tungifin-nni , bdant țɛeggiḍent : A Sidi , a Sidi ldi-yaɣ-d tawwurt .
40025012	Meɛna nețța yerra-yasent-ed : A kunt-iniɣ tideț : ur kkunt ssineɣ ara !
40025013	Daymi a wen-iniɣ : Ɛasset , imi ur teẓrim ass , ur teẓrim lweqt .
40025014	Ass n tuɣalin n Mmi-s n bunadem ad yili daɣen am yiwen wergaz i gțeddun ad iṛuḥ ɣer lɣeṛba , yesnejmaɛ-ed iqeddacen-is , iwekkel iten ɣef wayen akk yesɛa .
40025015	Ifka i umezwaru xemsmeyya twiztin n ddheb , wi sin yefka-yas mitin , wis tlata yefka-yas meyya ; yefka i yal yiwen s wakken tella tezmert-is , dɣa iṛuḥ .
40025016	Imiren kan , aqeddac-nni iwumi yefka xemsmeyya twiztin , iṛuḥ yetjeṛ yis-sent , irbeḥ-ed xemsmeyya nniḍen .
40025017	Ula d win iwumi yefka mitin , ixdem akken , irbeḥ-ed mitin nniḍen .
40025018	Ma d win iwumi yefka meyya , iṛuḥ yeɣza di lqaɛa , yeffer tiwiztin-nni i s-d-ifka umɛellem-is .
40025019	Mi gɛedda lweqt , yuɣal-ed umɛellem-nni , isnejmaɛ-iten-id iwakken ad imḥasab yid-sen .
40025020	Win akken iwumi yefka xemsmeyya twiztin , yusa-d yewwi-d yid-es xemsmeyya twiztin nniḍen , yenna-yas : A Sidi tefkiḍ-iyi-d xemsmeyya twiztin n ddheb , a tent-ih xemsmeyya nniḍen i d-rebḥeɣ yis-sent .
40025021	Amɛellem-is yenna-yas : D ayen yelhan i txedmeḍ ay aqeddac unṣiḥ , imi deg-ek laman ɣef tɣawsiwin timecṭuḥin , sya d asawen a k-wekkleɣ ɣef timeqqranin ! Ili-k di lfeṛḥ yid-i !
40025022	Aqeddac-nni iwumi yefka mitin twiztin n ddheb , iqeṛṛeb-ed ula d nețța , yenna-yas : A Sidi tefkiḍ-iyi mitin twiztin n ddheb , a tent-ih mitin nniḍen i d-rebḥeɣ yis-sent .
40025023	Amɛellem-is yenna-yas : D ayen yelhan i txedmeḍ , ay aqeddac unṣiḥimi deg-k laman ɣef tɣawsiwin timecṭuḥin , sya d asawen a k-wekkleɣ ɣef timeqqranin ! Ili-k di lfeṛḥ yid-i !
40025024	Iwweḍ-ed win akken iwumi yefka meyya twiztin , yenna yas : A Sidi ẓriɣ-k d argaz iweɛṛen , tmeggreḍ anda ur tezriɛeḍ , tjemmɛeḍ seg wennar ayen ur tesrewteḍ ,
40025025	dɣa uggadeɣ-k , daymi i ṛuḥeɣ ffreɣ deg wakal tiwiztin-nni i yi-tefkiḍ . Atan wayla-k , ddem-it !
40025026	Amɛellem-is yenna-yas : Ay aqeddac amcum , ameɛdaz ! Imi iyi-teẓriḍ meggreɣ-d anda ur zriɛeɣ , jemmɛeɣ-ed daɣen anda ur srewteɣ ,
40025027	acuɣeṛ ihi ur tessekraḍ ara idrimin-iw iwakken m'ara d-uɣaleɣ a ten-id-erreɣ s lfayda .
40025028	Imiren amɛellem-nni yumeṛ i iqeddacen-is yenna-yasen : Kkset-as meyya-nni twiztin ternum-tent i win yesɛan ɛecṛa alef n twiztin !
40025029	Axaṭer kra win yesɛan , a s-nernu ad yili di tawant , ma d win ur nesɛi ara , a s-nekkes ula d ayen yesɛa .
40025030	Ma d aqeddac-agi ur nemɛin , ḍeggṛet-eț ɣer ṭṭlam n beṛṛa anda ara yilin imeṭṭawen d nndama tameqqrant .
40025031	Asm'ara d-yas Mmi-s n bunadem di tmanegt-is nețța d lmalayekkat meṛṛa , ad iḥkem di lɛaḍima-s ;
40025032	leǧnas meṛṛa a d-nnejmaɛen zdat-es , a ten-ifṛeq am umeksa iɛeSlen ulli ɣef tɣeṭṭen .
40025033	Ad yerr ulli ɣer uyeffus-is , tiɣeṭṭen ɣer uzelmaḍ-is .
40025034	Imiren agellid ad yini i wid yellan ɣer uyeffus-is : Aset-ed a kunwi iburek Baba , aț-țweṛtem tagelda i wen-ițțuheggan seg wasmi i tebda ddunit .
40025035	Axaṭer lliɣ lluẓeɣ tefkam-iyi ččiɣ , ffudeɣ tefkam-iyi swiɣ , usiɣ-ed d abeṛṛani testeṛḥbem yis-i ,
40025036	lliɣ d aɛeryan tesselsem-iyi , d amuḍin telham-d yid-i , lliɣ daɣen d ameḥbus tusam-d teẓram-iyi .
40025037	Imiren iḥeqqiyen a s-d-rren : A Sidi melmi i k-neẓra telluẓeḍ , nefka-yak teččiḍ ? Neɣ neẓra-k teffuḍeḍ nefka-yak teswiḍ ?
40025038	Melmi daɣen i d-tusiḍ d abeṛṛani nesṭeṛḥeb yis-ek , neɣ melmi i k-nwala d aɛeryan , nessels-ik ?
40025039	Melmi i k-neẓra d amuḍin neɣ di lḥebs nusa-d ɣuṛ-ek ?
40025040	Agellid a sen-d-yerr : A wen-iniɣ tideț , yal tikkelt i deg txedmem ayagi i yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi yellan d atmaten-iw , i nekk iwumi t-txedmem .
40025041	Imiren ad yini i wid yellan ɣer uẓelmaḍ-is : Beɛdet akkin fell-i a kunwi yețwaneɛlen , ṛuḥet ɣer tmes n dayem yețwaheggan i Cciṭan d wid i t-tebɛen .
40025042	Axaṭer lliɣ lluẓeɣ ur iyi tesseččem ara , ffudeɣ ur iyi-tefkim ara ad sweɣ ,
40025043	usiɣ-ed d abeṛṛani ur tesṭerḥbem ara yis-i , lliɣ d aɛeryan ur iyi tesselsem ara , lliɣ daɣen d amuḍin , d ameḥbus , ur d-tusim ara aț-țesteqsim fell-i .
40025044	Imiren ula d nutni a s-d-rren : A Sidi , melmi i k-neẓra telluẓeḍ neɣ teffudeḍ d abeṛṛani neɣ d aɛeryan , d amuḍin neɣ d ameḥbus , ur d-nelhi ara yid-ek ?
40025045	Nețța a sen-d-yerr : A wen-iniɣ tideț : yal tikkelt i deg ur texdimem ara ayagi i yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi , i nekk iwumi ur t-texdimem ara .
40025046	Imiren widak-agi ad kecmen ɣer lɛiqab ur nfennu , ma d iḥeqqiyen ad kecmen ɣer tudert n dayem !
40026001	Mi gfukk Sidna Ɛisa imeslayen-agi , yenna i inelmaden-is : —
40026002	Mazal sin wussan i lɛid n Tuffɣa , Mmi-s n bunadem ad ițțuzenz iwakken ad ițuṣemmer ɣef wumidag .
40026003	Dɣa lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud nnejmaɛen deg ufrag n Kayef , i gellan d lmuqeddem ameqqran .
40026004	Msefhamen ad ṭṭfen Sidna Ɛisa s tḥila iwakken a t-nɣen .
40026005	Meɛna nnan : « mačči deg ussan-agi n lɛid n Tuffɣa ara t-neḥbes , neɣ m'ulac ad yekker ccwal ger lɣaci . »
40026006	Mi gella Sidna Ɛisa di taddart n Bitanya , deg wexxam n Semɛun abeṛsi ,
40026007	ațaya yiwet n tmeṭṭut tewwi-d tabuqalt yețwaxedmen s wedɣaɣ amellal , teččuṛ d leɛṭeṛ ɣlayen . Mi geqqim Sidna Ɛisa ɣer ṭṭabla , tameṭṭut-nni tusa-d tesmar leɛṭeṛ-nni ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-is .
40026008	Mi walan ayagi , inelmaden iɣaḍ-iten lḥal , nnan : Iwumi lexsaṛa-yagi ?
40026009	Lemmer nezzenz leɛṭeṛ-nni , tili yewwi-d ssuma tameqqrant ara nefṛeq i igellilen !
40026010	Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran wayen nnan wway-gar-asen , yenna-yasen : Acuɣeṛ i tesḥeznem tameṭṭut agi ? D ayen yelhan i yi-texdem !
40026011	Axaṭer aț-țesɛum daymen igellilen yid-wen , meɛna nekk ur țțiliɣ ara daymen yid-wen .
40026012	Mi d-tesmar leɛṭeṛ-agi fell-i , d lǧețța-w i thegga i temḍelt-iw .
40026013	A wen-iniɣ tideț : di yal amkan n ddunit i deg ara ițțubecceṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , a d țmektayen tameṭṭut-agi d wayen texdem .
40026014	Imiren Yudas n Qeṛyut , yiwen si tnac-nni inelmaden n Sidna Ɛisa , iṛuḥ ɣer lmuqedmin imeqqranen ,
40026015	yenna yasen : Ma wwiɣ-kkun ɣuṛ-es a t-id teṭṭfem , d acu ara yi-tefkem ? FFkan-as tlatin iṣurdiyen n lfeṭṭa .
40026016	Seg imiren , Yudas yețɛassa tagniț i deg ara yizmir ad izzenz Sidna Ɛisa .
40026017	Ass amezwaru n lɛid n weɣṛum mbla iɣes n temtunt , inelmaden usan-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : A Sidi , anda tebɣiḍ a k-nheggi imensi n lɛid n Izimer n leslak ?
40026018	Yerra-yasen : Ṛuḥet ɣer temdint , ɣer leflani , init-as : yenna-yak Ssid-nneɣ , lweqt-iw yewweḍ-ed , deg uxxam-ik ara sɛeddiɣ lɛid n Izimer n leslak nekk d inelmaden-iw .
40026019	Inelmaden-nni xedmen ayen i sen-yenna Sidna Ɛisa , heggan imensi n lɛid n Izimer n leslak .
40026020	Mi d-teɣli tmeddit , Sidna Ɛisa yeqqim ad yečč nețța d inelmaden-is .
40026021	Mi llan tețțen yenna-yasen : A wen-iniɣ tideț : yiwen seg-wen ad iyi-izzenz .
40026022	Mi d-yenna ayagi , ikcem-iten akk leḥzen d ameqqran , bdan qqaṛen as yiwen yiwen : Neɣ mačči d nekk a Sidi ?
40026023	Yerra-yasen : Win igren afus-is yid-i deg uḍebsi , d nețța ara yi-izzenzen .
40026024	Ad yedṛu d Mmi-s n bunadem akken yura fell-as ; mmeɛna a nnger n win ara t-izzenzen , lemmer ur d-ilul ara axiṛ-is .
40026025	Yudas ara t-ixedɛen yenṭeq yenna-yas : Eɛni d nekk a Sidi ? SSidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Atan tenniḍ-t-id !
40026026	Mi llan tețțen , Sidna Ɛisa yeddem-d aɣṛum , iḥmed Ṛebbi , icekkeṛ-it , dɣa yebḍa-t , ifṛeq-it i inelmaden-is , yenna-yasen : Eččet aɣṛum-agi : d lǧețța-w .
40026027	Iddem-ed daɣen taqbuct , iḥmed Ṛebbi , icekkeṛ-it , yefka-yasen-ț , yenna-yasen : Swet akk si teqbuct-agi ,
40026028	axaṭer ayagi d idammen-iw , d idammen n lemɛahda ara yazzlen ɣef yizumal n lɣaci ɣef ddemma n leɛfu n ddnubat-nsen .
40026029	A wen-d-iniɣ : ur țțuɣaleɣ ara ad sweɣ seg waman-agi n tẓurin alamma d ass i deg ara ten-sweɣ d ijdiden yid-wen , di tgelda n Baba Ṛebbi .
40026030	Mi ḥemden Sidi Ṛebbi s ccnawi d isefra , ṛuḥen ulin ɣer yiɣil n uzemmur ,
40026031	dinna Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Iḍ-agi ad a wen-iliɣ akk d sebba n tuccḍa , axaṭer yura di tira iqedsen ad wwteɣ ameksa , ulli n tqeḍɛit-is ad rewlent ɣer yal tama .
40026032	Meɛna m'ara d-ḥyuɣ si ger lmegtin , ad iyi-tafem zwareɣ ɣer tmurt n Jlili .
40026033	Buṭrus yenṭeq , yenna : Ɣas a sen-tiliḍ d sebba n tuccḍa i wiyaḍ akk , nekk d lmuḥal ad ccḍeɣ .
40026034	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : A k-iniɣ tideț : deg iḍ-agi uqbel ad iskkuɛ uyaziḍ , ad iyi-tnekṛeḍ tlata iberdan .
40026035	Buṭrus yerra-yas : Ɣas lukan d lmut ara mmteɣ yid-ek , d lmuḥal a k-nekkṛeɣ ! UUla d inelmaden nniḍen , nnan-as am nețța .
40026036	Imiren Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ yid-sen ɣer yiwen wemkan ițțusemman Jitsimani , yenna i inelmaden-is : Qqimet dagi , nekk ad ṛuḥeɣ ad dɛuɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
40026037	Yewwi yid-es Buṭrus akk-d sin warraw-nni n Zabadi ; yebda ikcem-it leḥzen d leɣben d ameqqran .
40026038	Dɣa yenna-yasen : Ḥusseɣ s leḥzen n lmut , qqimet dagi , ɛiwzet yid-i !
40026039	Iṛuḥ yeɣli ɣef wudem , ibda yețẓalla yeqqaṛ : A Baba Ṛebbi , ma yella wamek , ssebɛed fell-i leɛtab-agi ! Meɛna akken tebɣiḍ keččini , mačči akken bɣiɣ nekkini .
40026040	Yuɣal-ed ɣer inelmaden-is , yufa-ten-id ṭṭsen , yenna i Buṭrus : Ur tezmirem ara aț-țɛiwzem yid-i ula d yiwet n ssaɛa ?
40026041	Ɛiwzet , ẓallet , iwakken ur tɣellim ara deg ujeṛṛeb ! Axaṭer ṛṛuḥ n wemdan yeǧhed ma d lǧețța ur tezmir ara !
40026042	Ibɛed akkin tikkelt tis snat iwakken ad iẓẓal , yenna : A Baba , ma yella ulamek ara tesbeɛdeḍ fell-i leɛtab-agi , ma ilaq ad iyi-d-yaweḍ ! Ad yedṛu lebɣi-k !
40026043	Mi d-yuɣal , yufa-ten-id daɣen ṭṭsen , iɣleb-iten nuddam .
40026044	Yeǧǧa-ten , issebɛed iman-is daɣen fell-asen , yedɛa tikkelt tis tlata am tikkelt-nni tamezwarut .
40026045	Mi d-yuɣal ɣer inelmaden-is , yufa-ten-id mazal-iten ṭṭsen ; yenna yasen : Lweqt i deg ara yețwasellem Mmi-s n bunadem ɣer ifassen n yemcumen iwweḍ-ed , kunwi mazal ikkun teṭṭsem ?
40026046	Dɣa yenna-yasen : Ekkret fell-awen , ataya iteddu-d win i yi-izzenzen !
40026047	Mazal-it ițmeslay mi d-iwweḍ Yudas yellan d yiwen si tnac-nni inelmaden . Ddan-d yid-es aṭas n lɣaci s iɛekkzan d ijenwiyen , ceggɛen ten-id imeqqranen n lmuqedmin akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud .
40026048	Win akken i t-izzenzen , imsefham yid-sen , yenna-yasen : Win i ɣef ara selmeɣ , d win ara teṭṭfem !
40026049	Imiren , iqeṛṛeb ɣer Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Sslam fell-ak a Sidi ! DDɣa isellem fell-as .
40026050	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ay amdakkel , ayen ɣef i d-tusiḍ a t-txedmeḍ , xdem-it ! DDɣa lɣaci-nni qeṛṛben ɣer Sidna Ɛisa ṭṭfen-t .
40026051	Yiwen seg wid yeddan d Sidna Ɛisa ijbed-ed ajenwi-ines , yewwet aqeddac n lmuqeddem ameqqran , igzem-as-d ameẓẓuɣ-is .
40026052	Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq yenna-yas : Err ajenwi-inek ɣer wemkan-is , axaṭer kra win ara irefden ajenwi , ad immet s ujenwi !
40026053	Eɛni tɣileḍ ur zmireɣ ara ad ssutreɣ i Baba ad iyi-d-iceggeɛ luluf n lmalayekkat ?
40026054	Amek ihi ara țwakemlent tira iqedsen i d-ixebbṛen belli ilaq a d-yedṛu wayagi meṛṛa ?
40026055	Imiren Sidna Ɛisa yenna i lɣaci : Kull ass țțiliɣ yid-wen di lǧameɛ sselmadeɣ , ur iyi-teṭṭifem ara , ass-agi tusam-d ɣuṛ-i s iɛekkzan d ijenwiyen am akken d bu tmegṛaḍ i lliɣ !
40026056	Meɛna annect-agi meṛṛa yedṛa-d iwakken ad țwakemlent tira n lenbiya . IImiren , inelmaden meṛṛa ǧǧan-t , yal yiwen ɣer wanda yerwel .
40026057	Wid yeṭṭfen Sidna Ɛisa wwin-t ɣer Kayef , ameqqran n lmuqedmin , anda i nnejmaɛen lɛulama n ccariɛa d imeqqranen n wegdud .
40026058	Buṭrus iḍfeṛ-it , ikcem ɣer wefrag n lmuqeddem ameqqran , yeqqim akk-d iɛessasen n lǧameɛ iwakken ad iẓer amek ara tefru temsalt .
40026059	Imiren lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d usqamu n imeqqranen n ccariɛa , țnadin inigan ara icehden fell-as s ẓẓuṛ , iwakken ad ḥekmen fell-as s lmut ,
40026060	meɛna ur s-d-ufin ara sebba , ɣas akken aṭas i d-icehden fell-as .
40026061	A ten-aya sin yergazen qeṛṛben d nnan : D wagi i d-yennan : « zemreɣ ad huddeɣ lǧameɛ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi , a s-ɛiwdeɣ lebni di tlata wussan . »
40026062	Ameqqran n lmuqedmin ikker , yenna-yas : Ulac ayen ara d-terreḍ ɣef wayen akka i d-ccetkan fell-ak ?
40026063	Sidna Ɛisa yessusem . Dɣa ameqqran n lmuqedmin yenna-yas : Wekkleɣ-ak Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren , m'ur aɣ-d-tenniḍ ma d kečč i d Lmasiḥ , Mmi-s n Sidi Ṛebbi !
40026064	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Tenniḍ-t-id ! Yerna a wen-iniɣ , ssya d asawen : Mmi-s n bunadem aa d iḥkem ɣɣ er uyeffus n Bab n tezmert , a t-twalim iteddu-d ɣef wusigna seg yigenni .
40026065	Imiren ameqqran n lmuqedmin icerreg aqenduṛ-is yenna : Ikfeṛ ! Iwumi neḥwaǧ inigan tura ? Teslam akk d acu i d-yenna ! D acu tennam ?
40026066	Rran-as-d : Yuklal lmut !
40026067	Dɣa bdan ssusufen-t , țțaken-as tiyitiwin d ibeqqayen ,
40026068	qqaṛen-as : Eɛqel a Lmasiḥ , ini-yaɣ-d anwa i k-iwwten !
40026069	Buṭrus yella yeqqim deg ufrag , tqeṛṛeb-ed ɣuṛ-es yiwet n tqeddact tenna-yas : Ula d kečč telliḍ d Ɛisa ajlili !
40026070	Meɛna yenkeṛ zdat-sen meṛṛa yenna-yas : Ur ẓriɣ ara d acu tebɣiḍ a d tiniḍ !
40026071	Akken ițeddu ɣer tewwurt , twala-t tqeddact nniḍen , tenna i wid akk yellan dinna : Wagi yella akk-d Ɛisa anaṣari !
40026072	Inkeṛ daɣen s limin : Qqaṛeɣ-awen ur ssineɣ ara argaz-agi !
40026073	Taswiɛt kan , wid yellan dinna qeṛṛben daɣen ɣer Buṭrus nnan-as : Mbla ccekk , kečč telliḍ seg-sen , tameslayt-ik tbeggen-ed belli d ajlili i telliḍ !
40026074	Ibda yețgalla irennu : Di leɛmeṛ ur ssineɣ argaz-agi ! IImiren kan yeskkuɛ uyaziḍ .
40026075	Dɣa Buṭrus immekta-d imeslayen-nni i s-d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa : uqbel ad iskkuɛ uyaziḍ , ad iyi-tnekṛeḍ tlata n tikkal . Yeffeɣ ɣer beṛṛa s nndama tameqqrant , iṭṭerḍeq d imeṭṭawen .
40027001	Taṣebḥit , nnejmaɛen-d akk imeqqranen n lmuqedmin akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud , mcawaṛen iwakken ad nɣen Sidna Ɛisa .
40027002	Dɣa urzen-t , wwin-t i Bilaṭus , yellan d lḥakem n Ṛuman yesteɛemṛen tamurt .
40027003	Mi gwala ḥekmen ɣef Sidna Ɛisa , Yudas-nni i t-ixedɛen yendem . DDi nndama-nni-ines tameqqrant , iṛuḥ ɣer imeqqranen n lmuqedmin d imeqqranen n wegdud , yerra-yasen tlatin-nni twiztin n lfeṭṭa , dɣa
40027004	yenna yasen : Denbeɣ , nekk i wen-d-izzenzen amdan aḥeqqi . RRran-as-d : Ur aɣ-d-tewqiɛ ara lmeɛna , wagi d ccɣel-ik .
40027005	Yudas iḍeggeṛ tiwiztin-nni di lǧameɛ iqedsen , imiren iṛuḥ iɛelleq iman-is .
40027006	Imeqqranen n lmuqedmin leqḍen-d tiwiztin-nni n lfeṭṭa , nnan : Ur yeḥlil ara a tent-nerr ɣer usenduq n lǧameɛ iqedsen , imi d lexlaṣ n temgeṛt .
40027007	Mi mcawaṛen d acu ara xedmen s twiztin-nni , msefhamen iwakken ad aɣen iger n yiwen wergaz ixeddmen afexxaṛ , iwakken a t-erren ț-țimeqbeṛt i ibeṛṛaniyen .
40027008	Daymi iger-agi ițțusemma ar ass-a : « Iger n idammen » .
40027009	S wakka i gedṛa wayen i d-yenna nnbi Irmiya : Ddmen-d tlatin n twiztin n lfeṭṭa , d wagi i d azal i s-fkan warraw n wat Isṛail ;
40027010	uɣen-d yis iger ɣer win ixeddmen afexxaṛ , akken i yi-d-yumeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
40027011	Sidna Ɛisa ibedd zdat lḥakem Bilaṭus . Yesteqsa-t lḥakem-nni yenna-yas : D kečč i d agellid n wat Isṛail ? SSidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Tenniḍ-t-id !
40027012	Lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud sseḍlamen deg-s , ma d nețța ur sen-d-yerri ula d acemma .
40027013	Bilaṭus yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : Eɛni ur tesliḍ ara ayen akk ɣef i d-țcetkin fell-ak ?
40027014	Sidna Ɛisa yessusem , ur as-d yerri ula d yiwen wawal , ayagi d ayen iswehmen lḥakem .
40027015	Lḥakem yennum di mkul lɛid n Tuffɣa ițserriḥ-ed i yiwen umeḥbus i gextaṛ lɣaci .
40027016	Yella yakan yiwen umeḥbus mechuṛen , ițțusemman Barabas .
40027017	Mi d-nnejmaɛen akk lɣaci , Bilaṭus isteqsa-ten : Anwa i tebɣam a s-d-serrḥeɣ : i Barabas neɣ i Ɛisa ițțusemman Lmasiḥ ?
40027018	Axaṭer yeẓra s tismin i s-d-wwin Ɛisa .
40027019	Mi gella Bilaṭus ițcaṛaɛ , tceggeɛ-as-d tmeṭṭut-is , tenna-yas-d : Ur ssekcam ara iman-ik di temsalt n uḥeqqi-agi , axaṭer ass-agi targit urgaɣ fell-as terwi-yi .
40027020	Imeqqranen n lmuqedmin akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud sḥeṛcen-d lɣaci iwakken ad ssutren a d-serrḥen i Barabas , ad nɣen Sidna Ɛisa .
40027021	Lḥakem yenna-yasen : Anwa ger sin-agi iwumi tebɣam ad serrḥeɣ ? RRran-as : I Barabas ! Serreḥ-ed i Barabas !
40027022	Bilaṭus yenna-yasen : D acu ara xedmeɣ ihi i Ɛisa ițțusemman Lmasiḥ ? RRran-as-d akk : Ad ițțusemmeṛ ɣef wumidag !
40027023	Lḥakem yenna : D acu i gexdem n diri ? RRnan țɛeggiḍen : Semmeṛ-it ɣef wumidag !
40027024	Mi gwala lɣaci ugin a s-d ḥessen , yerna ccwal simmal yețțimɣuṛ , Bilaṭus yeddem-ed aman , issared ifassen-is zdat lɣaci , yenna : Nekk ur țekkiɣ ara di tazzla n idammen n uḥeqqi-agi , wagi d ccɣel-nwen .
40027025	Lɣaci meṛṛa nnan-as : Tazzla n idammen-is a d-tuɣal ɣef yirawen-nneɣ d yirawen n warraw-nneɣ .
40027026	Imiren Bilaṭus iserreḥ-ed i Barabas , jelkḍen Sidna Ɛisa , dɣa yefka lameṛ a t-semmṛen ɣef wumidag .
40027027	Iɛsekṛiyen n lḥakem ssufɣen Sidna Ɛisa ɣer ufrag , snejmaɛen-d akk iɛsekṛiyen nniḍen , zzin-as .
40027028	Imiren kksen-as llebsa-s , sselsen as abeṛnus azeggaɣ .
40027029	Zḍan taɛeṣṣabt s isennanen , ssersen-as-ț ɣef wuqeṛṛuy is , fkan-as aɣanim ɣer ufus-is ayeffus . Bdan kennun zdat-es , stehzayen fell-as , qqaṛen-as : Sslam fell-ak ay agellid n wat Isṛail !
40027030	Ssusufen-t , kkaten-t s uɣanim ɣer uqeṛṛuy .
40027031	Mi ɛyan deg ustehzi fell-as , kksen-as abeṛnus-nni , rran-as llebsa-s , wwin-t a t-semmṛen ɣef wumidag .
40027032	Mi d-ffɣen , mlalen-d yiwen wergaz n tmurt n Qiṛwan , isem-is semɛun , ḥettmen fell-as ad ibbib amidag n Sidna Ɛisa .
40027033	Mi wwḍen ɣer yiwen wemkan ițțusemman Gulguṭa , yeɛni « amkan n uxecxuc » ,
40027034	fkan-as ad isew ccṛab i deg yexleḍ yiwen uɛeqqaṛ aṛzagan . Iɛreḍ-it , yugi a t-isew .
40027035	Mi t-semmṛen ɣef wumidag , gren tasɣaṛt iwakken ad feṛqen llebsa-ines , s wakka , yedṛa-d wayen yuran di tira iqedsen : feṛqen llebsa-w , gren tasɣart ɣef wuqenduṛ-iw .
40027036	Imiren qqimen a t-ɛassen ,
40027037	ɛelqen sennig uqeṛṛuy-is talwiḥt i ɣef uran sebba n lmut-is : Wagi d Ɛisa , agellid n wat Isṛail
40027038	Țwasemmṛen yid-es sin imcumen , yiwen ɣer uyeffus-is wayeḍ ɣer uẓelmaḍ-is .
40027039	Imsebriden țhuzzun iqeṛṛay-nsen reggmen-t ,
40027040	qqaṛen-as : A win ițhuddun lǧameɛ iqedsen ibennu-t di tlata wussan , sellek iman-ik ma d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i telliḍ , ers-ed seg umidag-nni .
40027041	Imeqqranen n lmuqedmin , lɛulama n ccariɛa akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud , stehzayen fell-as ula d nutni , qqaṛen :
40027042	Isellek wiyaḍ ur yezmir ad isellek iman-is ! Ma d agellid n wat Isṛail i gella , a d-yers ihi seg umidag iwakken a namen yis .
40027043	Yețkel ɣef Ṛebbi , a t-isellek ihi Ṛebbi ma iḥemmel-it aaxaṭer yenna-d : « Nekk d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi . »
40027044	Ula d imcumen-nni ițțusemmṛen yid-es , regmen-t am wiyaḍ .
40027045	Deg uzzal si tnac armi d țlata n tmeddit , yeɣli-d ṭṭlam ɣef ddunit meṛṛa .
40027046	Ɣef leǧwahi n țlata , Sidna Ɛisa iɛeggeḍ s tɛibṛanit , yenna : Ilya , Ilya , lama sabaqtani ? Yeɛni : Illu-iw , Illu-iw , acuɣeṛ i yi-teǧǧiḍ ?
40027047	Kra seg wid iḥedṛen dinna slan d acu i genna , qqaṛen : Issawal i nnbi Ilyas !
40027048	Imiren kan yiwen seg-sen yuzzel yeddem-ed ameččim n taḍuṭ isselxes-it di lxell , icudd-it ɣef wuɣanim yefka-yas ad isew .
40027049	Wiyaḍ qqaṛen : Anfet-as , a nwali ma yella a d-yas nnbi Ilyas a t-isellek .
40027050	Sidna Ɛisa iɛeggeḍ tikkelt nniḍen , dɣa iffeɣ-it Ṛṛuḥ .
40027051	Imiren kan abeḥnuq n leḥjab yellan di lǧameɛ iqedsen icerreg ɣef sin , seg ixef ufella armi d akessar . Lqaɛa tergagi , idurar ceqqeqen ,
40027052	iẓekwan ldin , aṭas seg iḥeqqiyen yemmuten , ḥyan-d
40027053	ffɣen-d seg iẓekwan-nsen . Mi d-iḥya Sidna Ɛisa , kecmen ɣer temdint iqedsen , aṭas n lɣaci iwumi i d-ḍehṛen .
40027054	Lḥakem yellan d aqeṛṛuy ɣef meyya iɛsekṛiyen akk-d iɛsekṛiyen iɛussen Sidna Ɛisa , tekcem-iten tugdi mi walan tergagi lqaɛa d wayen akk yedṛan , nnan : Ț-țideț , argaz-agi d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi !
40027055	Aṭas n tilawin i gellan dinna , țmuqulent-ed si lebɛid . Ț-țiggad-nni i d-yeddan d Sidna Ɛisa si tmurt n Jlili iwakken a s-qedcent .
40027056	Tella gar-asent Meryem tamagdalit , Meryem yemma-s n Yeɛqub d Yusef akk-d d yemma-s n warraw n Zabadi .
40027057	Mi d-tewweḍ tmeddit , yusa-d yiwen umeṛkanti n temdint n Arimati isem-is Yusef , ula d nețța d anelmad n Sidna Ɛisa .
40027058	Iṛuḥ ɣer Bilaṭus yessuter-as lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa . Bilaṭus yumeṛ ad a s-ț-id-fken .
40027059	Yusef yeddem-ed lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa , ițțel-iț di lekfen zeddigen ,
40027060	issers-iț deg yiwen uẓekka ajdid , i geɣza deg uzṛu . Yeɣleq tawwurt n uẓekka-nni s weblaḍ ameqqran , dɣa iṛuḥ .
40027061	Meryem tamagdalit akk-d Meryem-nni nniḍen , llant dinna qqiment , qublent-ed aẓekka .
40027062	Azekka nni yellan d ass n uheggi n wass n westeɛfu , imeqqranen n lmuqedmin d ifariziyen ṛuḥen ɣer Bilaṭus
40027063	nnan-as : A Sidi , necfa ɣef wayen i d-yenna ukeddab-agi asmi yedder , yenna-d : Ad ɛeddin tlata wussan , a d-ḥyuɣ si ger lmegtin .
40027064	Ceggeɛ iɛessasen ad ɛassen aẓekka-s alamma d ass wis tlata , iwakken inelmaden-is ur d-țasen ara ad akren lǧețța-s , ad inin i wegdud : « iḥya-d si ger lmegtin . » Neɣ m'ulac lekdeb-agi aneggaru ad yaggar amezwaru .
40027065	Bilaṭus yenna-yasen-d : Awit iɛessasen , ṛuḥet ɛasset-ț akken tebɣam .
40027066	Ṛuḥen , zemmemen aken ilaq tawwurt n uẓekka-nni s weblaḍ , imiren sbedden taɛessast zdat-es .
40028001	Mi gɛedda wass n westeɛfu , taṣebḥit n wass amezwaru n dduṛt , Meryem tamagdalit akk-d meryem-nni nniḍen , ṛuḥent a d-ẓuṛent aẓekka n Sidna Ɛisa .
40028002	Deg yiwet n teswiɛt , tergagi lqaɛa ; ataya yiwen n lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi , iṣubb-ed seg igenni , iqeṛṛeb ɣer uẓekka , iswexxeṛ ablaḍ-nni , yeqqim fell-as .
40028003	Ițfeǧǧiǧ am lebṛaq , llebsa-s ț-țamellalt am udfel .
40028004	Iɛessasen yellan dinna , ikcem-iten lxuf d ameqqran , qquṛen amzun mmuten .
40028005	Yenṭeq lmelk ɣer tilawin-nni , yenna-yasent : Kunemti ur țțaggademt ara , axaṭer ẓriɣ ɣef Ɛisa i yețțusemmṛen ɣef wumidag i tețnadimt .
40028006	Ulac-it dagi , iḥya-d si ger lmegtin akken i t-id-yenna . Asemt-ed aț-țwalimt amkan anda akken yeḍleq !
40028007	Azlemt aț-ținimt i inelmaden-is belli yeḥya-d si ger lmegtin . Atan a kkun-yezwir ɣer tmurt n Jlili ; dinna ara t-teẓrem . AAtan nniɣ-akunt-ț-id !
40028008	Imiren kan , ṛuḥent seg uẓekka-nni s lfeṛḥ d ameqqran ɣas akken uggadent . Uzzlent ad awint lexbaṛ i inelmaden n Sidna Ɛisa .
40028009	Ataya Sidna Ɛisa imuger-itent-id , yenna-yasent : Sslam fell-akunt ! QQeṛṛbent , seǧǧdent zdat-es , ssudnent iḍaṛṛen-is .
40028010	Imiren Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasent : Ur țțaggademt ! Ṛuḥemt inimt i watmaten-iw ad ṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n Jlili , dinna ara yi-ẓren .
40028011	Mi țeddunt deg ubrid , kra seg iɛessasen-nni n uẓekka kecmen ɣer temdint , xebbṛen imeqqranen n lmuqedmin ɣef wayen akk yedṛan .
40028012	Mi nnejmaɛen imeqqranen n wegdud akk-d imeqqranen n lmuqedmin , msefhamen ad fken i iɛessasen-nni ssuma tameqqrant n yedrimen ,
40028013	nnan-asen : Init belli d inelmaden-is i d-yusan deg yiḍ , ukren lǧețța-s mi nella neṭṭes .
40028014	Ma yella yewweḍ lexbaṛ-agi ɣer lḥakem , d nukkni ara t-iqablen iwakken ur awen-ixeddem ula d acemma .
40028015	Iɛsekṛiyen-nni ṭṭfen idrimen-nni , xedmen ayen akk i sen-d-nnan lmuqedmin . Tamsalt-agi țɛawaden-ț-id wat Isṛail ar ass-a .
40028016	Ḥdac inelmaden-nni ṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n Jlili , ɣer wedrar-nni anda i sen-yenna Sidna Ɛisa ad mlilen .
40028017	Mi t-walan seǧǧden zdat-es , meɛna kra seg-sen mazal țcukkuten .
40028018	Sidna Ɛisa iqeṛṛeb-ed ɣuṛ-sen , yenna-yasen : Tețțunefk-iyi-d tezmert ama di lqaɛa ama deg igenwan .
40028019	Ṛuḥet ɣer tmura meṛṛa n ddunit , slemdet imdanen iwakken ad uɣalen d inelmaden-iw , ad țwaɣedṣen s yisem n Baba Ṛebbi , s yisem n Mmi-s akk-d yisem n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
40028020	Slemdet-asen ad tebɛen ayen akk i wen-slemdeɣ . MMa d nekk ad iliɣ yid-wen yal ass alamma ț-țaggara n ddunit .
41001001	Akka i gebda lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , Mmi-s n Ṛebbi .
41001002	Am akken yura di tektabt n nnbi Iceɛya : Ad zzewreɣ zdat-ek amceggeɛ-iw , a k-ifres abrid .
41001003	? - țaɣect n win yețɛeggiḍen deg unezṛuf : heggit abrid i Sidi Ṛebbi , ssemsawit iberdan-is !
41001004	Iban-ed Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas deg unezṛuf , yesseɣḍas lɣaci deg waman , yeqqaṛ-asen : Beddlet tikli , aset-ed aț-țețwaɣeḍsem iwakken a wen-yeɛfu Sidi Ṛebbi .
41001005	Imezdaɣ meṛṛa n tmurt n Yahuda d wid n temdint n Lquds țṛuḥun-d ɣuṛ-es , țqiṛṛin s ddnubat-nsen zdat lɣaci dɣa Yeḥya yeṣṣeɣḍas-iten deg wasif n Urdun .
41001006	Yelsa llebsa yețwaxedmen s ccɛeṛ n welɣem , yebges tabagust n weglim ɣef wammas-is . Lqut-is d ajṛad akk-d țament n lexla .
41001007	Yețbecciṛ yeqqaṛ : Win ara d-yasen deffir-i yugar iyi , yesɛa tazmert akteṛ-iw ; ur uklaleɣ ara ad knuɣ a s-fsiɣ ula d lexyuḍ n warkasen-is .
41001008	Nekk sseɣḍaseɣ-kkun deg waman , lameɛna nețța a kkun-isseɣḍes s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
41001009	Deg wussan-nni , Sidna Ɛisa yusa-d si taddart n Naṣaret ɣer tmurt n Jlili . Yesseɣḍes-it Yeḥya deg wasif n Urdun .
41001010	Akken i d-iffeɣ seg waman , iwala igenwan ldin , Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen iṣubb-ed fell-as s ṣṣifa n tetbirt .
41001011	Yiwet n taɣect tekka-d seg igenwan tenna-d : Kečč d Mmi eɛzizen ; deg-k i gella lfeṛḥ-iw !
41001012	Imiren kan , Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yewwi-t ɣer uneẓruf ,
41001013	anda i t-ijeṛṛeb Cciṭan ṛebɛin wussan . Yețɛic ger lewḥuc n lɣaba , lmalayekkat qeddcent fell-as .
41001014	Mi gețwaḥbes Yeḥya , Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ ɣer tmurt n Jlili ; yețbecciṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi , yeqqaṛ :
41001015	Tageldit n Ṛebbi tqeṛṛeb-ed ! Yewweḍ-ed lweqt-is ! Uɣalet-ed ɣer webrid tamnem s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ !
41001016	Mi gella ileḥḥu rrif n lebḥeṛ n tmurt n Jlili , iwala Semɛun akk-d gma-s Andriyus ṭeggiṛen acebbak ɣer lebḥeṛ , axaṭer d iṣeggaḍen i llan .
41001017	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Ddut-ed yid-i , a kkun-rreɣ d iṣeggaḍen n yemdanen .
41001018	Imiren kan , ǧǧan icebbaken nsen , ddan yid-es .
41001019	Ikemmel abrid-is , iwala Yeɛqub akk-d gma-s Yuḥenna yellan d arraw n Zabadi , qqimen di teflukt-nsen țxiḍin icebbaken .
41001020	Yessawel-asen , imiren kan ǧǧan baba-tsen akk-d ixeddamen-is di teflukt , ddan d Sidna Ɛisa .
41001021	Sidna Ɛisa d inelmaden-is wwḍen ɣer temdint n Kafernaḥum . Deg wass n ssebt yellan d ass n westeɛfu , Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ɣer lǧameɛ yebda yesselmad .
41001022	Lɣaci i s-ițḥessisen wehmen deg uselmed ines axaṭer imeslayen-is sɛan tissas ( lhiba ) , mačči am uselmed n lɛulama n ccariɛa .
41001023	Yella di lǧameɛ-nni yiwen n wergaz i gezdeɣ uṛuḥani , yebda yețɛeggiḍ yeqqaṛ :
41001024	D acu tebɣiḍ ɣuṛ-nneɣ a Ɛisa anaṣari ? Tusiḍ-ed a ɣ-tesnegreḍ ? ? riɣ d acu-k , kečč d Imqeddes n Ṛebbi !
41001025	Sidna Ɛisa iɛeggeḍ fell-as yenna : Ssusem ! Effeɣ seg wergaz-agi !
41001026	Aṛuḥani ihucc argaz-nni s lǧehd , yeffeɣ seg-s s leɛyaḍ .
41001027	Lɣaci meṛṛa xelɛen , wa yeqqaṛ i wa : D acu-t wayagi ? D acu-t uselmed-agi ajdid yesɛan lhiba ? Argaz-agi yeḥkem ula ɣef yiṛuḥaniyen yerna țțaɣen-as awal !
41001028	Seg imiren , Sidna Ɛisa yețwassen di tmurt n Jlili meṛṛa .
41001029	Mi d-ffɣen si lǧameɛ , ṛuḥen ɣer wexxam n Semɛun d Andriyus , yedda Yeɛqub d Yuḥenna .
41001030	Taḍeggalt n Semɛun tuḍen , tuɣ-iț tawla ; hedṛen-as fell-as i Sidna Ɛisa .
41001031	Iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es , yeṭṭef-as afus , yeskker-iț-id . Imiren kan teffeɣ-iț tawla-nni , tekker tqeddec-asen .
41001032	Tameddit mi geɣli yiṭij , wwin-as-d aṭas n imuḍan akk-d wid zedɣen iṛuḥaniyen .
41001033	Lɣaci n temdint meṛṛa nnejmaɛen-d zdat tewwurt .
41001034	Sidna Ɛisa yesseḥla aṭas n imuḍan i ghelken yal aṭan ; yessufeɣ aṭas n iṛuḥaniyen yerna ur ten-yețțaǧa ara a d-mmeslayen , axaṭer nutni ẓran d acu-t .
41001035	? ṣbeḥ zik uqbel ad yali wass , Sidna Ɛisa yeffeɣ ɣer lexla iwakken ad yedɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
41001036	Semɛun d imdukkal-is ffɣen ad nadin fell-as ;
41001037	mi t-ufan , nnan-as : A Sidi , medden akk țnadin fell-ak .
41001038	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Eyyaw a nṛuḥet ɣer tudrin iqeṛben axaṭer ilaq ad beccṛeɣ daɣen dinna . ? ef wannect-agi i d-usiɣ .
41001039	Dɣa iṛuḥ ɣer tmurt n Jlili , yețbecciṛ di leǧwameɛ , yessufuɣ leǧnun .
41001040	Yiwen wergaz ihelken lbeṛs yusa-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , yeɣli ɣef tgecrar , iḥellel-it yenna-yas : A Sidi , ma tebɣiḍ , tzemreḍ a yi-tesseḥluḍ .
41001041	Sidna Ɛisa iɣaḍ-it wergaz-nni , dɣa yeẓẓel afus-is innul-it , yenna yas : Bɣiɣ , ili-k teḥliḍ !
41001042	Imiren kan , yeḥla si lbeṛs-nni , yuɣal yeṣfa .
41001043	Sidna Ɛisa iserreḥ-as ad iṛuḥ , iweṣṣa-t s lḥeṛs yenna-yas :
41001044	Sel-iyi-d mliḥ ! Ur țɛawad i yiwen ayen yedṛan , lameɛna ṛuḥ a k-iẓer lmuqeddem , tawiḍ asfel ɣef ṣeffu-inek akken i t-id-iweṣṣa Musa .
41001045	Meɛna akken kan iṛuḥ , argaz-nni yebda yețberriḥ di mkul amkan , ayen yedṛan yid-es . Daymi Sidna Ɛisa ur yezmir ara a d-isbeggen iman-is di temdint , meɛna yețɣimi di beṛṛa deg imukan iḍeṛfen . Lɣaci țțasen-d ɣuṛ-es si mkul tama .
41002001	Ɛeddan kra wussan , Sidna Ɛisa yuɣal-ed ɣer Kafernaḥum ; yeffeɣ lexbaṛ belli deg wexxam-nni i gella .
41002002	Aṭas n lɣaci i d-innejmaɛen , armi ur d-yeqqim wemkan ula zdat tewwurt . Nețța yețbecciṛ-asen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi .
41002003	A ten-aya ṛebɛa yergazen wwin-d yiwen wukrif i Sidna Ɛisa .
41002004	Akken walan ur zmiren ara a t-ssiwḍen ɣuṛ-es si lɣaci-nni , kkan-d si ssqef , kksen iqermuden sennig wanda yella Sidna Ɛisa , syenna ssadren-d ukrif-nni deg wusu-ines .
41002005	Mi gwala liman-nsen , Sidna Ɛisa yenna i wukrif-nni : ? waɛeffan-ak ddnubat-ik a mmi .
41002006	Llan dinna kra lɛulama qqimen țxemmimen deg ulawen-nsen qqaṛen :
41002007	Amek armi yessaweḍ a d-yini imeslayen-agi ? Wagi d lekfeṛ ! Anwa i gzemren ad yeɛfu ddnubat anagar Sidi Ṛebbi ?
41002008	Imiren kan Sidna Ɛisa yeẓra ayen țxemmimen deg ulawen-nsen , yenna yasen : Acuɣer tețxemmimem akkagi deg ulawen-nwen ?
41002009	D acu i gsehlen a s-t-iniɣ i wukrif-agi : țwaɛfan-ak ddnubat-ik , neɣ kker ddem usu-inek telḥuḍ ?
41002010	Ihi bɣiɣ aț-țeẓrem belli Mmi-s n bunadem yezmer ad yeɛfu ddnubat di ddunit . Yenna i wukrif-nni :
41002011	Kker , ddem usu-inek tṛuḥeḍ ɣer wexxam-ik !
41002012	Imiren kan , yekker yeddem usu-ines , yeffeɣ zdat-nsen irkul . Lɣaci wehmen deg wayen yedṛan , țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi , qqaṛen : Werǧin ( di leɛmeṛ ) neẓri ayagi !
41002013	Sidna Ɛisa yuɣal ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ . Aṭas n lɣaci i d-ițasen ɣuṛ-es dɣa yesselmad-iten .
41002014	Mi gɛedda , iwala yiwen umekkas yeqqim ițeṭṭef leɣṛama , isem-is Lewwi d mmi-s n ? alfi . Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ddud-d yid-i ! Lewwi yekker , yedda yid-es .
41002015	Mi llan tețțen deg wexxam n Lewwi nețța d inelmaden-is , qqimen-d yid-sen imekkasen akk-d yir imdanen , axaṭer aṭas i t-ittabaɛen .
41002016	Lɛulama d ifariziyen mi t-walan itețț d imekkasen akk-d yir imdanen , nnan i inelmaden-is : Acuɣer Ssid-nwen itețț d imekkasen akk-d imednuben ?
41002017	Mi sen-yesla Sidna Ɛisa , yenna yasen : Mačči d wid iṣeḥḥan i geḥwaǧen ṭṭbib , meɛna d imuḍan . Ur d-usiɣ ara ad ssiwleɣ i iḥeqqiyen , meɛna i imednuben .
41002018	Inelmaden n Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas akk-d ifariziyen llan țțuẓummen . Usan-d ad steqsin Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Acuɣer inelmaden n Yeḥya d inelmaden n ifariziyen țțuẓummen , ma d inelmaden-ik ur țțuẓummen ara ?
41002019	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Eɛni zemren inebgawen n tmeɣṛa ad uẓummen ma yella yid-sen yesli ? Kra ara yekk yesli yid-sen ur zmiren ara ad uẓummen .
41002020	A d-yas lweqt i deg ara sen yețwakkes yesli , deg wass-nni ad uẓummen .
41002021	Yiwen ur yețxiḍi tafaweț tajdiṭ i uceṭṭiḍ aqdim , neɣ m'ulac tafaweț-nni ara s-nernu aț-țesseɣṛes aceṭṭiḍ-nni aqdim dɣa acerrig-nni ad innerni .
41002022	Yiwen ur ițțačaṛ iyeddiden ( tiyelwin ) iqdimen s ccṛab ajdid , neɣ m'ulac ccṛab-nni ad ifelleq iyeddiden ; ccṛab ad inɣel , iyeddiden-nni ad qqeṛsen . Meɛna ccṛab ajdid ilaq ad immir ɣer iyeddiden ijdiden !
41002023	Yiwen wass n ssebt yellan d ass n westeɛfu , Sidna Ɛisa yezger igran n yirden . Inelmaden-is teddun țekksen tigedrin .
41002024	Ifariziyen nnan-as : Acuɣer xeddmen inelmaden-ik ayen ur nelli ara d leḥlal deg wass n ssebt ?
41002025	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Di leɛmeṛ teɣṛim wayen yexdem ugellid Dawed asmi i ten-yeṭṭef laẓ nețța d irfiqen-is ?
41002026	Yekcem ɣer wexxam n Sidi Ṛebbi deg wussan i deg yella Abyaṭar d lmuqeddem ameqqran , yečča nețța d irfiqen-is tiḥbulin-nni n weɣṛum yețțunefken d lweɛda , ɣas akken aɣṛum-nni i lmuqedmin kan iwumi yeḥlel .
41002027	Yenna-yasen : Ass n westeɛfu yețwaxdem i wemdan , mačči d amdan i gețwaxedmen i wass n westeɛfu .
41002028	Daymi Mmi-s n bunadem yeḥkem ula ɣef wass n westeɛfu .
41003001	Sidna Ɛisa yuɣal ɣer lǧameɛ . Yella dinna yiwen wergaz iwumi yekref ufus .
41003002	Wid yellan dinna țɛassan deg-s ad walin m' ad isseḥlu deg wass n westeɛfu , iwakken ad ccetkin fell-as .
41003003	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i wergaz-nni iwumi yekref ufus : Ekker tbeddeḍ dagi di tlemmast .
41003004	Imiren yenna i wid yețmuqulen : D acu i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa-nneɣ ɣef wayen yeɛnan ass n westeɛfu ? A nexdem lxiṛ neɣ a nexdem cceṛ ? A nsellek taṛwiḥt n wemdan neɣ a t-neǧǧ ad immet ? Lameɛna nutni ssusmen meṛṛa , ur zmiren ara a d-rren awal .
41003005	Sidna Ɛisa imuqel-iten s wurrif , yerna yeḥzen aṭas fell-asen imi qquṛen wulawen nsen . Yenna i wergaz-nni : ? leq-ed ( eẓẓel-ed ) afus-ik ! Iḍleq-it dɣa yeḥla ufus-is .
41003006	Imiren ifariziyen ffɣen , ṛuḥen ad mcawaṛen nutni d ihiṛudiyen amek ara t-nɣen .
41003007	Sidna Ɛisa ijbed iman-is nețța d inelmaden-is ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ n tmurt n Jlili . Aṭas n lɣaci i t-id-itebɛen . Usan-d si mkul tama n tmurt n Jlili , si tmurt n Yahuda ,
41003008	si temdint n Lquds , si tmurt n Idum , si tmurt akkin i wasif n Urdun , si leǧwahi n temdinin n ? ur akk-d Sidun . Mi slan s wayen ixeddem , aṭas n lɣaci i d-yețțasen ɣuṛ-es .
41003009	Sidna Ɛisa iweṣṣa inelmaden-is a s-heggin taflukt , akken ur t-iḥeṛṛes ara lɣaci .
41003010	Ladɣa imi yețdawi aṭas n imuḍan , wid akk yuḍnen ẓeddmen fell-as iwakken a t-nnalen .
41003011	Iṛuḥaniyen m'ara t-walin , ɣellin zdat-es qqaṛen-as : « Kečč d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ! »
41003012	Meɛna nețța yețgalla deg-sen iwakken ur d-qqaṛen ara anwa-t .
41003013	Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer yiwet n tiɣilt , yessawel i wid yebɣa dɣa usan-d ɣuṛ-es .
41003014	Yextaṛ tnac deg-sen ad ilin d ṛṛusul ad țeddun daymen yid-es , iwakken a ten-iceggeɛ ad beccṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ,
41003015	a sen-ye tazmert akken ad ssuffuɣen leǧnun .
41003016	A ten-ah tnac-nni yextaṛ : Semɛun iwumi isemma Buṭrus ,
41003017	Yeɛqub akk-d gma-s Yuḥenna yellan d arraw n Zabadi iwumi isemma Buneṛǧes ( yeɛni arraw n ṛṛɛud ) .
41003018	Andriyus , Filbas , Bartelmay , Matta , Tuma , Yeɛqub mmi-s n ? alfi , Taddi , Semɛun akenɛani ( awaṭani )
41003019	akk-d Yudas n Qeṛyut , win akken ixedɛen Sidna Ɛisa .
41003020	Imiren , Sidna Ɛisa yuɣal ɣer wexxam . Nnejmaɛen-d daɣen ɣuṛ-es lɣaci ḥeṛsen-t nețța d inelmaden-is armi ur zmiren ara ad ččen .
41003021	Mi gewweḍ lexbaṛ ɣer imawlan is , ṛuḥen-d a t-awin axaṭer ɣilen yedderwec !
41003022	Imusnawen n ccariɛa i d-yusan si temdint n Lquds qqaṛen : D Balzabul iḥekkmen ɣef leǧnun i t-izedɣen , s tezmert-is i gessufuɣ leǧnun !
41003023	Sidna Ɛisa yessawel-asen , ihdeṛ asen s lemtul , yenna-yasen : Amek yezmer Cciṭan ad issufeɣ Cciṭan ?
41003024	Ma yella țnaɣen imezdaɣ n tmurt wway gar-asen , tamurt-nni ur tețdum ara .
41003025	Ma yella yekker ccwal ger wat wexxam , axxam-nni ad yeɣli ur yețbeddad ara .
41003026	Ihi ma yella Cciṭan yețnaɣ d yiman-is tebḍa tgeldit-is , tazmert-is aț-țeɣli dɣa aț-țefnu .
41003027	Yiwen ur izmir ad ikcem ɣer wexxam n wergaz iǧehden iwakken a d-yaker ayla-s , m'ur t-yuriz ara uqbel ! M'ara t-yarez , imiren yezmer ad yaker axxam-is meṛṛa !
41003028	A wen-d-iniɣ tideț : a sen țwasemmḥen i yemdanen meṛṛa ddnubat-nsen d rregmat-nsen ,
41003029	ma d win ireggmen Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , d lmuḥal ad yețțusemmeḥ ; ddnub-is ad yeqqim ɣef yir-is i dayem .
41003030	Yenna-d annect-agi axaṭer qqaṛen-as : Izdeɣ-it Cciṭan .
41003031	Wwḍen-d watmaten n Sidna Ɛisa akk-d yemma-s . Qqimen di beṛṛa , ceggɛen ɣuṛ-es a d-yas .
41003032	Nețța yella zdaxel n wexxam yezzi-yas aṭas lɣaci ; nnan-as : A Sidi , yemma-k d wayetma-k akk-d yessetma-k , atnan di beṛṛa țnadin fell-ak .
41003033	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Anta i d yemma , anwi i d aytma ?
41003034	Dɣa imuqel meṛṛa wid i s-d yezzin yenna : Ațah yemma , atnah wayetma .
41003035	Axaṭer win ixeddmen lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi , d win i d gma , i d weltma , i d yemma !
41004001	Sidna Ɛisa yebda daɣen yețbecciṛ rrif n lebḥeṛ n tmurt n Jlili . Imi i d-innejmaɛ ɣuṛ-es waṭas n lɣaci , yuli ɣer teflukt yeqqim . Taflukt-nni tella s ufella n waman , lɣaci yeqqim ɣer lqaɛa , rrif n lebḥeṛ .
41004002	Yebda yesselmad iten s lemtul , yeqqaṛ-asen :
41004003	Selt-iyi-d ! Yiwen ufellaḥ yeffeɣ ad izreɛ .
41004004	Mi gella izerreɛ , ɣlin kra iɛeqqayen deg webrid : ṛuḥen-d igṭat ( ifṛax ) leqḍen-ten .
41004005	Kra iɛeqqayen nniḍen ɣlin ger idɣaɣen anda ulac aṭas n wakal , dɣa mɣin-d imiren , axaṭer tissi n wakal ur lqayet ara .
41004006	Mi d-yuli yiṭij , yezlef imɣan-nni dɣa qquṛen , imi izuṛan-nsen ur lqayit ara .
41004007	Kra iɛeqqayen nniḍen ɣlin ger isennanen ; mi gman isennanen-nni ɣummen-ten dɣa ur d-fkin ara lfakya .
41004008	Kra iɛeqqayen nniḍen ɣlin deg wakal yelhan , mi gman , nnernan fkan-d tigedrin ; ta tefka-d tlatin n tɛeqqayin , tayeḍ sețțin , tayeḍ meyya .
41004009	Yenna-yasen : Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen , isel-ed !
41004010	Mi gebɛed ɣef lɣaci , wid i s-d yezzin akk-d tnac-nni inelmaden ssutren-as a sen-yessefhem lemtul i sen d-yewwi .
41004011	Yerra-yasen : Kunwi yețțunefk-awen aț - țissinem sser n tgeldit n Ṛebbi , ma d wiyaḍ sellen i mkul lḥaǧa s lemtul ,
41004012	iwakken : ? as țmuqulen ur țwalin ara , ɣas sellen ur fehhmen ara ; m'ulac a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid dɣa Ṛebbi a sen-yeɛfu ddnubat-nsen !
41004013	Yenna-yasen daɣen : M'ur tefhimem ara lmeɛna n lemtel-agi , amek ara tfehmem lemtul nniḍen ?
41004014	Afellaḥ-nni , d win izerrɛen awal n Ṛebbi .
41004015	Kra yemdanen cban iri n webrid anda yețwazreɛ wawal n Ṛebbi . Akken kan i s-slan , yusa-d Cciṭan iqleɛ-ed awal-nni i gețwazerɛen deg ulawen-nsen .
41004016	Wiyaḍ cban akal yeččuṛen d idɣaɣen , akken ara slen i wawal n Ṛebbi , qebblen-t s lfeṛḥ ;
41004017	lameɛna ur t-țțaǧan ara ad ye izuṛan deg ulawen-nsen , ṭṭfen deg-s kra lweqt kan . Mi d-yewweḍ leɛtab d uqehheṛ ɣef ddemma n wawal n Ṛebbi , țțuɣalen ɣer deffir , țaǧǧan liman-nsen .
41004018	Wiyaḍ țemcabin ɣer wakal yeččuṛen d isennanen , sellen i wawal n Ṛebbi ,
41004019	meɛna iɣeblan , ṭṭmeɛ , lerbaḥ akk-d zzhu n ddunit-agi , skuffuren ( țkemmimen ) awal-nni , ur d-yețțawi ara lfayda .
41004020	Wiyaḍ cban akal yelhan anda teɣli zzerriɛa , sellen i wawal n Ṛebbi , qebblen-t , țțaken-d lfayda . Mkul aɛeqqa yeggar-ed wa tlatin , wa sețțin , wa meyya .
41004021	Yenna-yasen daɣen : Eɛni yella win ara iceɛlen taftilt iwakken a ț-yerr seddaw lḥila neɣ seddaw n wusu ? Mačči iwakken a ț-issers s ufella n lmeṣbeḥ ?
41004022	Ulac ayen yeffren ur d-nețban , ulac ayen iɣummen ur d-tețbeggin tafat .
41004023	Smeḥset-ed mliḥ , ma tesɛam imeẓẓuɣen isellen !
41004024	Yerna yenna-yasen : ? adret ɣef wayen tsellem ! Axaṭer akken i tețțektilim i wiyaḍ ara wen-d-ițwaktil i kunwi , yerna a wen-d ițwaktil s zzyada .
41004025	Axaṭer win yesɛan a s-rnun , ma d win ur nesɛi ara a s-yețwakkes ula d ayen yesɛa .
41004026	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen daɣen : Tageldit n Sidi Ṛebbi tețțemcabi ɣer yiwen ufellaḥ i gzerɛen iger .
41004027	Ama yeṭṭes ama ur yeṭṭis , am yiḍ am ass , zzerriɛa tețțemɣay tgemmu , ur yeẓri amek .
41004028	Akal yețțak-ed s yiman-is lɣella . Tazwara d imɣi ad yuɣal ț-țigdert , taggara tigdert-nni aț-țeččaṛ d iɛeqqayen .
41004029	Mi wwan yirden , afellaḥ-nni a d-yas a ten-yemger , axaṭer yewweḍ ed lweqt n tmegra .
41004030	Yenna daɣen : ? er wacu i nezmer a nmettel tageldit n Ṛebbi , neɣ anwa lemtel ara d-nawi fell-as ?
41004031	Ițemcabi ɣer uɛeqqa n uxerḍel . M'ara t-nezreɛ , d nețța i d aɛeqqa amecṭuḥ meṛṛa ger zzerriɛat n ddunit .
41004032	Mi gețwazreɛ , igemmu yețțali alamma yekka-d sennig akk yemɣan n tebḥirt , yeggar ed ifurkawen imeqqranen , ula d igṭaṭ ( ifṛax ) n igenni , țruḥun-d ad ddarin ( ddurqen ) seddaw tili-ines .
41004033	S waṭas n lemtul am wigi i sen ițbecciṛ awal n Ṛebbi , akken i tella lefhama n mkul yiwen .
41004034	Ițmeslay-asen anagar s lemtul , meɛna m'ara yili akk-d inelmaden-is , yessefham-asen kullec .
41004035	Ass-nni kan mi geɣli yiṭij , Sidna Ɛisa yenna i inelmaden-is : Eyyaw a nzegret agummaḍ n lebḥeṛ .
41004036	Mi gerra lɣaci-nni , iṛuḥ yid-sen di teflukt i deg yella . Ddant yid-es kra teflukin nniḍen .
41004037	Tekker-ed yiwet n tbuciḍant , tessalay-ed lemwaji ɣer teflukt tețțacaṛ-iț .
41004038	Sidna Ɛisa yella yeṭṭes di teflukt deffir n inelmaden-is , yessers aqeṛṛuy-is ɣef tsumta . Sakin-t-id nnan-as : A Sidi , eɛni ur ak-tewqiɛ ara ma nemmut ?
41004039	Sidna Ɛisa yekker-ed iɛeggeḍ ɣef waḍu , yenna i lebḥeṛ : Ssers iman-ik ! Ssusem ! Yers waḍu-nni , dɣa tuɣal-ed talwit .
41004040	Yenna i inelmaden-is : Acuɣer i tuggadem akka ? Mazal ur tuminem ara ?
41004041	Meɛna ikcem-iten akk lxuf d ameqqran , qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Anwa-t wagi iwumi țțaɣen awal ula d aḍu d lebḥeṛ ?
41005001	Usan-d seg ugemmaḍ n lebḥeṛ ɣer tmurt n ijiṛaziyen .
41005002	Akken kan i d-yers Sidna Ɛisa si teflukt , ataya yiwen wergaz yezdeɣ uṛuḥani , yeffeɣ-ed si tjebbant iteddu-d ɣuṛ-es .
41005003	Yezdeɣ ger iẓekwan , yiwen ur izmir a t-yarez ula s ssnesla
41005004	axaṭer acḥal d abrid i t-qqnen s ixelxalen n wuzzal deg iḍaṛṛen , s ssnasel deg ifassen , meɛna yesseɣṛas-iten akk , daymi ur yezmir yiwen a t-iṭṭef .
41005005	Iḍ d wass nețța deg uneẓruf , yețɛeggiḍ , ijerreḥ iman-is s iblaḍen .
41005006	Mi gwala Sidna Ɛisa si lebɛid , yuzzel-ed yeɣli ɣef tgecrar zdat-es .
41005007	Iɛeggeḍ s lǧehd : D acu i tebɣiḍ ɣuṛ-i a Ɛisa , a mmi-s n Ṛebbi ɛlayen ? Di leɛnaya-k , ɣef wudem n Ṛebbi ur iyi-țɛețțib ara !
41005008	Axaṭer Sidna Ɛisa yeqqaṛ-as : Effeɣ seg umdan-agi ay aṛuḥani !
41005009	Yesteqsa-t yenna-yas : Isem-ik ? Yerra-yas-d : Isem-iw tarbaɛt , axaṭer deg waṭas yid-nneɣ i nella .
41005010	Dɣa țḥellilen deg-s rennun iwakken ur ten-yessufuɣ ara si tmurt-nni .
41005011	Yuɣ lḥal tella dinna yiwet n tqeḍɛit n yilfan kessen ;
41005012	ḥellelent nnan-as : Di leɛnaya-k , ǧǧaɣ a nekcem deg yilfan-agi .
41005013	Iserreḥ-asen , dɣa ffɣen seg wergaz-nni , kecmen deg ilfan-nni , imiren grarben seg wedrar ɣer lebḥeṛ , llan deg wazal n walfin yid-sen , ɣeṛqen meṛṛa .
41005014	Wid ikessen ilfan-nni rewlen , ssawḍen lexbaṛ ɣer temdint akk-d tudrin dɣa lɣaci ṛuḥen-d ad walin ayen yedṛan .
41005015	Mi d-wwḍen ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , walan win akken tezdeɣ terbaɛt n iṛuḥaniyen yeqqim , yelsa llebsa , yuɣal-ed ɣer leɛqel-is ; imiren ikcem-iten lxuf .
41005016	Wid i gḥeḍren ḥekkun-d i wiyaḍ ayen yedṛan d win yețwazedɣen akk-d țqeḍɛit-nni n yilfan .
41005017	Imiren bdan țḥellilen Sidna Ɛisa ad iffeɣ si tmurt-nsen .
41005018	Akken iteddu Sidna Ɛisa ad yali ɣef teflukt , win akken yellan yețwazdeɣ yețḥellil deg-s yeqqaṛ-as : Di leɛnaya-k eǧǧ-iyi ad dduɣ yid-ek .
41005019	Lameɛna Sidna Ɛisa yugi , yenna-yas : Uɣal ɣer wexxam-ik d leḥbab-ik , teḥkuḍ-asen ayen i k-ixdem Sidi Ṛebbi .
41005020	Iṛuḥ , yebda yețberriḥ di ɛecṛa n temdinin-nni ayen akk i s-yexdem Sidna Ɛisa . Kra win i s-yeslan yetɛeǧǧeb .
41005021	Sidna Ɛisa yuɣal s teflukt ɣer ugemmaḍ n lebḥeṛ . Innejmaɛ-ed daɣen lɣaci ɣuṛ-es mi gella rrif n lebḥeṛ .
41005022	Yiwen seg lecyux n lǧameɛ , isem-is Jayṛus , akken i gwala Sidna Ɛisa , yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is ,
41005023	ițḥellil deg-s irennu , yeqqaṛ-as : A Sidi , di leɛnaya-k ! Yelli tețmețțat , ddu-d yid-i ssers ifassen-ik fell-as iwakken aț-țeslek , ur tețmețțat ara !
41005024	Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ yid-es . Aṭas n lɣaci i t-itebɛen , ḥerṣen-t si mkul tama .
41005025	Tella dinna yiwet n tmeṭṭut tehlek , tnac iseggasen nețțat tețțazal d idammen .
41005026	Tenɛețțab aṭas ger ifassen n ṭṭeba , texṣeṛ ayen akk i tesɛa , meɛna ur teḥli ara , terna tenṭer akteṛ .
41005027	Mi tesla heddṛen ɣef Sidna Ɛisa , tṛuḥ-ed deffir-es ger lɣaci , tennul ajellab-is .
41005028	Axaṭer teqqaṛ deg iman-is : ma nnuleɣ ulamma d icuḍaḍ n ubeṛnus-is , ad ḥluɣ .
41005029	Imiren kan ḥebsen idammen-nni , tḥulfa ( tḥuss ) i yiman-is teḥla seg waṭan-is .
41005030	Di teswiɛt-nni Sidna Ɛisa iḥuss i yiwet n tezmert teffeɣ seg-s . Yezzi ɣer lɣaci-nni yenna : Anwa i d-innulen ajellab-iw ?
41005031	Inelmaden-is rran-as : Aql-ik ger lɣaci ḥeṛsen-k-id si mkul tama , teqqaṛeḍ anwa i yi-d innulen ?
41005032	Nețța yețmuqul di lɣaci i s-d yezzin iwakken ad iwali tameṭṭut-nni .
41005033	Tameṭṭut-nni , mi twala ayen yedṛan yid-es texleɛ , tețțergigi ; tṛuḥ-ed teɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa tenna-yas akk tideț .
41005034	Yenna-yas : A yell-i , d liman-im i kkem-yesseḥlan ; ṛuḥ di lehna , aql-ikkem teṣfiḍ si lehlak-im .
41005035	Mazal-it yețmeslay , a ten-aya usan-d kra yergazen seg wexxam n Jayṛus ccix-nni n lǧameɛ , nnan-as : Yelli-k temmut , ur țɛețțib ara Sidna Ɛisa .
41005036	Lameɛna Sidna Ɛisa mi gesla i imeslayen-nni , yenna i ccix-nni : Ur țțaggad ara , amen kan !
41005037	Ur yeǧǧi yiwen ad yeddu yid-es anagar Buṭrus , Yeɛqub akk-d gma-s Yuḥenna .
41005038	Mi wwḍen ɣer wexxam n ccix-nni n lǧameɛ , Sidna Ɛisa yufa lɣaci yenhewwal , țrun , țmeǧǧiden .
41005039	Yekcem ɣer wexxam yenna-yasen : Iwacu lehwel d imeṭṭawen-agi ? Taqcict ur temmut ara , teṭṭes kan .
41005040	Stehzayen fell-as . Dɣa yessufeɣ iten akk , yewwi imawlan n teqcict-nni akk-d tlata-nni inelmaden , yekcem ɣer texxamt anda tella teqcict-nni ;
41005041	yeṭṭef afus n teqcict-nni yenna-yas : Talita , qumi ! ( Yeɛni : « A taqcict , ekker ! » )
41005042	Imiren kan , tekker-ed teqcict-nni tebda tleḥḥu . Fell-as tnac iseggasen . Wid yellan dinna xelɛen tɛeǧǧben deg wayen walan .
41005043	Sidna Ɛisa iweṣṣa-ten ur țɛawaden i yiwen ayen yedṛan ; dɣa yenna-yasen : Fket-as aț-țečč .
41006001	Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ syenna ɣer tmurt-is , ddan yid-es inelmaden is .
41006002	Akken i d-yewweḍ wass n westeɛfu , yebda yesselmad di lǧameɛ . Aṭas i gwehmen seg wid i s-isellen , qqaṛen : Ansi i s-d-yekka wayagi ? D acu-ț lefhama-yagi i s-d ițțunefken ? Ansi i s-d-tekka tezmert s wayes ixeddem lbeṛhanat-agi meṛṛa ?
41006003	Mačči d wagi i d aneǧǧaṛ-nni , mmi-s n Meryem , gma-s n Yeɛqub , n Yuses , n Yuda akk-d Semɛun ? Anaɣ yessetma-s gar-aneɣ i țɛicint ? Ayagi yella-yasen d ugur daymi ur uminen ara yis .
41006004	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Anagar di tmurt-is ger imawlan is d wat wexxam-is i gețwaḥqeṛ nnbi .
41006005	Ur yexdim dinna ula d yiwen n lbeṛhan , anagar kra imuḍan i ɣef yessers ifassen-is yesseḥla-ten .
41006006	Yewhem deg-sen imi ugin ad amnen . Dɣa ileḥḥu , yesselmad di tudrin iqeṛben tamdint n Naṣaret .
41006007	Sidna Ɛisa yessawel i tnac-nni inelmaden , iceggeɛ-iten sin sin , yefka yasen tazmert ad ssufɣen iṛuḥaniyen .
41006008	Iweṣṣa-ten , yenna-yasen : Ur țțawit yid-wen acemma i webrid , ama d aɣṛum , ama d agrab ama d aṣurdi deg waggus , anagar aɛekkaz deg ufus .
41006009	Elset irkasen , meɛna ur țțawit ara yid-wen aqenduṛ wis sin .
41006010	Yenna-yasen daɣen : Axxam anda stṛeḥben yis-wen qqimet ɣuṛ-sen alamma tṛuḥem .
41006011	Ma yella wanda ur sṭerḥben ara yis-wen , ur bɣin ara a wen-slen , ṛuḥet syenna , zwit aɣebbaṛ n warkasen-nwen , ddnub i yirawen-nsen .
41006012	Ṛuḥen țbecciṛen i yemdanen iwakken a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid .
41006013	Ssufuɣen aṭas n leǧnun , dehhinen s zzit aṭas n imuḍan , sseḥlayen-ten .
41006014	Yuɣal yisem n Sidna Ɛisa mechuṛ di tmurt meṛṛa , yewweḍ lexbaṛ-is ɣer ugellid Hiṛudus . Kra qqaṛen : D Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas i d-iḥyan si ger lmegtin , daymi i gezmer ad ixdem lbeṛhanat .
41006015	Wiyaḍ qqaṛen : D nnbi Ilyas . Wiyaḍ daɣen qqaṛen-as : D nnbi am lenbiya nniḍen .
41006016	Meɛna mi gesla Hiṛudus s wannect-agi , yeqqaṛ : D Yehya-nni iwumi kkseɣ aqqeṛṛuy , i d-iḥyan !
41006017	Axaṭer d Hiṛudus s yiman-is i gerran Yeḥya ɣer lḥebs yeqqen-it s ssnasel , mi t-ilum imi guɣ Hiṛudyad yellan ț-țameṭṭut n gma-s Filbas .
41006018	Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas yella yeqqaṛ-as : D leḥṛam fell-ak aț-țaɣeḍ tameṭṭut n gma-k !
41006019	Daymi i t-tekṛeh Hiṛudyad , yerna tețqellib amek ara t-tneɣ lameɛna ur s-tufi ara abrid ;
41006020	axaṭer Hiṛudus yețqadaṛ Yeḥya imi i t-iẓra d argaz yeṣfan , d aḥeqqi , daymi i gețḥunnu fell-as . Iḥemmel ad ismeḥses i wawal-is , meɛna m'ara s-isel iɛewweq .
41006021	Ațaya teɣli-yas-d sebba i Hiṛudyad . . . Ass n lɛid n tlalit-is , Hiṛudus iɛreḍ-ed ɣer imensi imeqqranen n tgelda-s , imeqqranen n lɛeskeṛ akk-d imdebbṛen n tmurt n Jlili .
41006022	Tekcem-ed yelli-s n Hiṛudyad tecḍeḥ , dɣa teɛǧeb-as i Hiṛudus d inebgawen-is . Agellid yenna i teqcict-nni : Ssuter-iyi-d ayen tebɣiḍ a m-t-id fkeɣ .
41006023	Yerna yeggul-as : Ssuter-ed ayen tebɣiḍ a m-t-id fkeɣ , ɣas d azgen di tgelda-w .
41006024	Teffeɣ tenna i yemma-s : D acu ara s-ssutreɣ ? Terra-yas : Ssuter-as aqeṛṛuy n Yeḥya .
41006025	Tekcem ɣer ugellid tenna-yas : Efk-iyi-d tura kan aqeṛṛuy n Yeḥya deg uḍebsi !
41006026	Agellid-nni yeḥzen mačči d kra , lameɛna imi s-yeggul zdat inebgawen is , ur yezmir ara ad iḥnet .
41006027	Iceggeɛ imiren kan yiwen uɛessas , yumeṛ-it a s-d-yawi aqeṛṛuy n Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas . Aɛessas-nni iṛuḥ ɣer lḥebs , ikkes-as aqeṛṛuy i Yeḥya .
41006028	Yewwi-t-id deg uḍebsi , yefka-t i teqcict-nni , ma d nețțat tewwi-t i yemma-s .
41006029	Mi slan s wayagi , inelmaden n Yeḥya usan-d wwin lǧețța-s meḍlen-ț .
41006030	Uɣalen-d inelmaden , nnejmaɛen ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , ḥkan-as ayen akk xedmen d wayen slemden .
41006031	Imi aṭas n lɣaci i gețṛuḥun țțuɣalen-d , ur sɛin ara lweqt ad ččen , dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Eyyaw a nṛuḥet ɣer wemkan iḍeṛfen iwakken aț-țesteɛfum .
41006032	Rekben di teflukt , ṛuḥen ad stuṛṛfen iman-nsen .
41006033	Aṭas i ten-iwalan mi ṛuḥen , ɛeqlen-ten , imiren uzzlen-d ɣef wuḍar si mkul tamdint . Zwaren-ten ɣer wanda akken i teddun .
41006034	Mi d-yers si teflukt , iwala ayendin n lɣaci ; dɣa ɣaḍen-t imi cban taqeḍɛit n wulli ur nesɛi ameksa . Yebda yesselmad-iten deg waṭas n lecɣal .
41006035	Mi qṛib ad yeɣli wass , usan-d inelmaden-is nnan-as : Amkan-agi yexla yerna iṛuḥ lḥal ,
41006036	serreḥ i lɣaci ad ṛuḥen ɣer leɛzayeb ț-țudrin i d-iqeṛben iwakken a d-aɣen ayen ara ččen .
41006037	Yerra-yasen : Fket-asen kunwi ayen ara ččen ! Nutni rran-as : Eɛni tebɣiḍ a nṛuḥ a d-naɣ aɣṛum s wazal n mitin alef iwakken a nessečč annect-agi n lɣaci ?
41006038	Dɣa yenna-yasen : Acḥal n teḥbulin n weɣṛum i tesɛam ? Ṛuḥet aț-țwalim . Mi d-ẓran , nnan-as : ? uṛ-nneɣ xemsa n teḥbulin n weɣṛum d sin iḥewtiwen ( iselman ) .
41006039	Imiren , Sidna Ɛisa yenna i inelmaden-is ad sɣimen lɣaci ț-țirebbaɛ ɣef leḥcic .
41006040	Qqimen ț-țirebbaɛ n meyya akk d xemsin .
41006041	Yeddem xemsa n teḥbulin-nni n weɣṛum d sin iḥewtiwen , yerfed allen-is ɣer igenni yeḥmed Ṛebbi . Yebḍa aɣṛum-nni , yefka-t i inelmaden a t-feṛqen i lɣaci . Ifṛeq-asen ula d sin-nni iḥewtiwen .
41006042	? čan akk armi ṛwan ,
41006043	jemɛen-d tnac iḍellaɛen n weɣṛum akk-d lḥut i d-yegran .
41006044	Wid yeččan si lqut-nni llan di xemsa alef yid-sen .
41006045	Imiren kan , iḥettem ɣef yinelmaden-is ad zegren s teflukt agummaḍ i lebḥeṛ , ad zwiren ɣer temdint n Bitsayda , ma d nețța ad iqqim ad yerr lɣaci .
41006046	Mi gemfaṛaq yid-sen , yuli ɣer wedrar iwakken ad iẓẓall .
41006047	Mi d-tewweḍ tmeddit , taflukt nni tella di tlemmast n lebḥeṛ , ma d Sidna Ɛisa yeqqim weḥd-es di lberr .
41006048	Iwala ṛwan lḥif mi kkaten imeqdafen , axaṭer aḍu yețțara-ten ɣer deffir . Mi qṛib ad yali wass iṛuḥ ɣuṛ-sen , iteddu ɣef waman , yebɣa a sen-iɛeddi .
41006049	Mi t-walan ileḥḥu ɣef waman , nwan-t d lexyal , bdan țɛeggiḍen ,
41006050	xelɛen axaṭer țwalin-t akk . Imiren iluɛa-ten yenna-yasen : Ur xellɛet ara , d nekk ; ur țțaggadet ara !
41006051	Akken kan yekcem ɣer teflukt ɣuṛ-sen , yers waḍu-nni .
41006052	Inelmaden dehcen nezzeh , axaṭer ur fhimen ara lbeṛhan-nni n weɣṛum , imi ulawen nsen qquṛen .
41006053	Kemmlen abrid-nsen , ffɣen ɣer tmurt n Jiniṣaret , rsen dinna .
41006054	Mi d-ṣubben si teflukt , lɣaci yeɛqel Sidna Ɛisa imiren kan ,
41006055	dɣa uzzlen di mkul amkan n tmurt , bdan țțawin-as-ed imuḍan deg wusu-nsen ɣer yal amkan anda yella .
41006056	Di mkul amkan anda iṛuḥ , ama ț-țaddart ama ț-țamdint neɣ d izuɣaṛ , țțawin-as-ed imuḍan ɣer imukan n tejmaɛin , țḥellilen-t iwakken a ten-yeǧǧ ad nnalen ulamma d icuḍaḍ n ujellab-is . Wid akk i t-ițnalen ḥellun
41007001	Ifariziyen d kra lɛulama n ccariɛa i d-yusan si temdint n Lquds , nnejmaɛen-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa .
41007002	Walan kra seg inelmaden-is tețțen aɣṛum mbla ma ssarden ifassen-nsen , akken tella di lɛadda-nsen .
41007003	Axaṭer ifariziyen akk-d wat Isṛail ur tețțen ara uqbel ad ssirden ifassen-nsen , imi ṭṭfen di lɛadda n lejdud-nsen .
41007004	M'ara d-uɣalen si ssuq , ur tețțen ara alamma uɣen luḍu . ? ṭfen daɣen deg waṭas n lɛaddat nniḍen : tarda n yeqbac , n tbuqalin , akk-d lḥilat meṛṛa n nnḥas .
