41007005	Ifariziyen d lɛulama steqsan-t , nnan-as : Acuɣer inelmaden-ik ur ṭṭifen ara di lɛaddat i ɣ-d-ǧǧan lejdud nneɣ , atan tețțen s ifassen yumsen ?
41007006	Yerra-yasen : Ay at sin wudmawen ! Fell-awen i d-yura nnbi Iceɛya mi d-yenna : Lǧil-agi țɛebbiden-iyi s yimi-nsen kan , lameɛna deg ulawen-nsen beɛden fell-i aṭas .
41007007	Aɛebbed-agi i yi-țɛebbiden ur yesɛi ara lqima , imi ayen sselmaden mačči s ɣuṛ-i i d-yekka meɛna d lɛaddat n yemdanen kan .
41007008	Tețțaǧǧam lumuṛat i d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi akken aț-țtebɛem leɛwayed n yemdanen .
41007009	Sidna Ɛisa yenna daɣen : Tețțarram di ṭṭerf lumuṛ n Ṛebbi , iwakken aț-țeṭṭfem di leɛwayed-nwen .
41007010	Axaṭer Musa yenna-d qadeṛ baba-k d yemma-k . Yenna-d daɣen : Win ara ineɛlen baba-s d yemma-s , ad ițwaḥkem fell-as s lmut .
41007011	Ma d kunwi tesselmadem belli yezmer yiwen ad yini i baba-s neɣ i yemma-s : « Ayen s wacu ilaq a kkun-refdeɣ , fkiɣ-t d lqeṛban , ( yeɛni d lweɛda i Ṛebbi ) . »
41007012	S wakka tserrḥem-as ur yețɛawan ara imawlan-is .
41007013	Atah wamek i tețbeddilem awal n Ṛebbi s lɛaddat-nwen yerna aṭas n temsalin nniḍen i txeddmem am tigi .
41007014	Yessawel daɣen i lɣaci yenna yasen : Smeḥset-iyi-d akk , tfehmem :
41007015	Mačči d ayen ikečmen ɣer daxel n wemdan ara t-yesneǧsen , meɛna d ayen i d-ițeffɣen seg ul-is .
41007016	Ma tesɛam imeẓẓuɣen isellen , slet-ed !
41007017	Mi geǧǧa lɣaci-nni , yekcem ɣer yiwen wexxam , inelmaden-is ssutren as a sen-d-issefhem lemtel nni .
41007018	Yenna-yasen : Eɛni ula d kunwi ur tefhimem ara ayen bɣiɣ a wen-t-id-iniɣ ? Ur teẓrim ara belli mačči d ayen i gkeččmen ɣer daxel n wemdan i t-yessenǧasen ?
41007019	Axaṭer ayagi ur ikeččem ara ɣer wul-is , meɛna ɣer uɛebbuḍ-is , dɣa ad ițwadeggeṛ ɣer beṛṛa . S wakka , i gesseḥlel Sidna Ɛisa yal lqut .
41007020	Yerna yenna : D ayen i d-ițeffɣen seg wemdan i t-yessenǧasen .
41007021	Axaṭer si zdaxel n wul-is i d-țeffɣen yir ixemmimen : asefsed , tukerḍa , timegṛaḍ ,
41007022	zzna , yir ccehwat , cceṛ , tiḥila , lexdeɛ , tismin , lekfeṛ , zzux , d wayen akk yellan d lehbala .
41007023	Ayagi akk ițeffeɣ-ed seg ul n wemdan yessenǧas-it .
41007024	Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ syenna ɣer leǧwahi n temdint n ? ur . Yekcem ɣer yiwen wexxam . Ur yebɣi ara a t-ẓren medden anda yella , lameɛna ur yezmir ara ad iffer fell-asen .
41007025	? - țideț , akken kan yewweḍ , ațaya yiwet n tmeṭṭut yesɛan yelli-s izdeɣ-iț uṛuḥani ; tesla s Sidna Ɛisa dɣa tusa-d teɣli ɣer idaṛṛen-is .
41007026	Tameṭṭut-agi ț-țagrikit , tusa-d si leǧwahi yellan ger tmurt n Surya d Finisya . Tessuter-as ad issufeɣ aṛuḥani izedɣen yelli-s .
41007027	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Eǧǧ uqbel arrac n wexxam ad ṛwun , axaṭer ur ilaq ara a nḍeggeṛ aɣṛum n warrac i yeqjan imecṭaḥ .
41007028	Terra-yas : Ih a Sidi , meɛna iqjan imecṭaḥ ddaw ṭṭabla , tețțen tifețțitin iɣellin i warrac .
41007029	Imiren yenna-yas : ? ef wawal-agi i d-tenniḍ , ṛuḥ , yelli-m yeffeɣ-iț uṛuḥani .
41007030	Mi tewweḍ ɣer wexxam-is , tufa yelli-s teḍleq ɣef wussu , yeffeɣ-iț uṛuḥani .
41007031	Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ si lǧiha n temdint n ? ur , iɛedda-d ɣef temdint n Sidun , yezger tamurt n ɛecṛa-nni n temdinin i deg llant ɛecṛa temdinin-nni , yewweḍ ɣer lebḥeṛ n Jlili .
41007032	Wwin-as-d yiwen wergaz d aɛeẓẓug , d ameqmaq ; ḥellelen-t iwakken ad issers afus-is fell-as .
41007033	Sidna Ɛisa yewwi-t yid-es , issebɛed-it ɣef lɣaci ; mi gessekcem iḍuḍan-is deg imeẓẓuɣen n wergaz nni , idhen iḍuḍan-is s imetman , yennul-as iles-is yis-sen ,
41007034	dɣa yerfed allen-is ɣer igenni , yerra-d nnehta yenna : Effataḥ ! ( Yeɛni : eldi )
41007035	Imiren kan , imeẓẓuɣen-is ldin , iles-is iserreḥ , yebda yețmeslay akken ilaq .
41007036	Sidna Ɛisa iweṣṣa-ten ur țɛawaden i yiwen ayagi ; meɛna simmal yețweṣṣi deg-sen , simmal nutni țberriḥen lexbaṛ .
41007037	Lɣaci wehmen , tɛeǧǧben deg wayen ixeddem , qqaṛen-as : Ayen ixeddem akk igerrez ; yețțarra-d ula ț-țimesliwt i iɛeẓẓugen yessenṭaq-ed ula d igugamen !
41008001	Deg wussan-nni , innejmaɛ-ed daɣen waṭas n lɣaci , ur sɛin ara ayen ara ččen . Sidna Ɛisa yessawel i inelmaden-is , yenna-yasen :
41008002	Tejreḥ tasa-w ɣef lɣaci-agi , tlata wussan aya i qqimen yid-i , yerna ulac ayen ara ččen .
41008003	Ma yella rriɣ-ten ansi i d-kkan i laẓ , ad nezfen deg webrid axaṭer kra deg-sen usan-d si lebɛid .
41008004	Inelmaden-is rran-as-d : Ansi ara ɣ-d-yekk weɣṛum ara ten-yesseṛwun deg wemkan-agi yexlan ?
41008005	Sidna Ɛisa yesteqsa-ten : Acḥal n teḥbulin n weɣṛum i tesɛam ? Rran-as-ed : ? uṛ-nneɣ sebɛa teḥbulin !
41008006	Yenna i lɣaci ad qqimen ɣer lqaɛa . Dɣa yeddem-ed sebɛa teḥbulin-nni n weɣṛum , yeḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi , yebḍa-tent , yefka-tent i inelmaden-is feṛqen-tent i lɣaci .
41008007	Sɛan daɣen kra iselman ( iḥewtiwen ) imecṭaḥ . Yeḥmed daɣen Sidi Ṛebbi , yenna-yasen a ten-feṛqen i lɣaci .
41008008	? čan armi ṛwan . Rnan sagren-d azal n sebɛa iqecwalen .
41008009	Llan deg wazal n ṛebɛa alaf n yemdanen . Mi fukken lmakla , iserreḥ-asen ad uɣalen ɣer ixxamen-nsen .
41008010	Imiren kan yuli ɣer teflukt nețța d inelmaden-is , ṛuḥen ɣer leǧwahi n Dalmanuta .
41008011	Ṛuḥen-d ifariziyen , bdan țmeslayen d Sidna Ɛisa iwakken a t-jeṛṛben , ssutren-as ad ixdem lbeṛhan ara d-iṣubben seg igenni .
41008012	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-d nnehta , yenna : Acuɣer i yi-d-ssuturen lbeṛhan yemdanen n lǧil-agi ? S tideț aql-i nniɣ-awen : d lmuḥal a s-d-ițune lbeṛhan i lǧil-agi !
41008013	Dɣa yeǧǧa-ten , yerkeb daɣen di teflukt iwakken ad izger agummaḍ .
41008014	Inelmaden țțun ur wwin ara aɣṛum anagar yiwet n teḥbult i gellan ɣuṛ-sen di teflukt .
41008015	Sidna Ɛisa iweṣṣa-ten , yenna-yasen : ? adret iman-nwen ɣef temtunt ( iɣes ) n ifariziyen akk-d win n Hiṛudus .
41008016	Inelmaden qqaṛen wway gar asen : « Yenna-yaɣ-d ayagi imi ur d newwi ara aɣṛum . »
41008017	Mi geẓra ayen țxemmimen , yenna-yasen : Acuɣer tețxemimem ɣef weɣṛum ? Urɛad tfaqem ? Mazal ur tefhimem ara ?
41008018	Eɛni qquṛen wulawen-nwen ? Tesɛam allen ur tețwalim ara , tesɛam imeẓẓuɣen ur tsellem ara ?
41008019	Ur tecfim ara mi bḍiɣ xemsa teḥbulin-nni n weɣṛum i xemsa alaf n yergazen , acḥal n iḍellaɛen n tsigar i tjemɛem ? Rran-as : Tnac iḍellaɛen .
41008020	I wasmi bḍiɣ sebɛa teḥbulin n weɣṛum i ṛebɛa alaf n yemdanen , acḥal n tqecwalin yeččuṛen ț-țisigar i d-tjemɛem ? Nnan-as : Sebɛa n tqecwalin .
41008021	Dɣa yenna-yasen : Werɛad tefhimem ihi ?
41008022	Ewwḍen ɣer temdint n Bitsayda . Wwin-as-d yiwen uderɣal , ḥellelen-t iwakken a t-yennal .
41008023	Sidna Ɛisa yeṭṭef afus i uderɣal-nni , yewwi-t beṛṛa n taddart . Yessers imetman ɣef wallen n uderɣal-nni , yessers ifassen is fell-as yesteqsa-t : Yella kra tețwaliḍ ?
41008024	Yerfed allen-is yenna : ? waliɣ imdanen am akken d ttjuṛ i gleḥḥun .
41008025	Sidna Ɛisa iɛawed issers-as ifassen ɣef wallen , mi gemmuqel uderɣal-nni , yuɣal-it-id yeẓri , ițwali akken ilaq .
41008026	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa iceggeɛ-it ɣer wexxam-is , yenna-yas : Ur keččem ara ɣer taddart .
41008027	Sidna Ɛisa akk-d inelmaden-is ṛuḥen ɣer tudrin n Qiṣarya n Filibus . Deg webrid , yesteqsa-ten yenna yasen : D acu-yi ɣer lɣaci ?
41008028	Rran-as-d : Kra deg-sen qqaṛen d Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas i telliḍ , wiyaḍ qqaṛen d Sidna Ilyas , ma d wiyaḍ ḥesben-k d yiwen si lenbiya .
41008029	Yerna yesteqsa-ten : I kunwi , d acu-iyi ɣuṛ-wen ? Buṭrus yerra-yas : Keččini d Lmasiḥ . ( yeɛni win yextaṛ Ṛebbi )
41008030	Yumeṛ-iten iwakken ur țɛawaden i yiwen ayagi .
41008031	Sidna Ɛisa yebda yesselmad-iten yeqqaṛ : Mmi-s n bunadem ilaq ad yenɛețțab aṭas ; a t-nekkṛen lecyux d lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa . A t-nɣen , m'ara ɛeddin tlata wussan , a d-iḥyu si ger lmegtin .
41008032	Yenna-yasen-d ayagi ɛinani . Buṭrus ijbed-it weḥd-es , ilumm fell-as .
41008033	Sidna Ɛisa yezzi , imuqel inelmaden-is , yenna i Buṭrus : Wexxeṛ akkin fell-i a Cciṭan ! Ixemmimen-ik mačči n Ṛebbi , meɛna n yemdanen !
41008034	Sidna Ɛisa yessawel i lɣaci akk-d inelmaden-is , yenna-yasen : Ma yella win yebɣan ad iddu yid-i , ur ilaq ara ad ixemmem ɣef yiman-is , meɛna ilaq ad iqbel leɛtab ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw , ad ibbib amidag-is , a yi-d-itbeɛ .
41008035	Axaṭer win yebɣan ad isellek taṛwiḥt-is , a s-tṛuḥ ; ma d win ara yesṛuḥen tarwiḥt-is ɣef ddemma-w akk-d lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , a ț-isellek .
41008036	Ma yella irbeḥ-ed wemdan ddunit meṛṛa , acu n lfayda i gesɛa ma yesṛuḥ tudert-is ?
41008037	D acu ara ye wemdan iwakken ad icafeɛ taṛwiḥt-is ?
41008038	Ma yella win yessetḥan yis-i akk-d imeslayen-iw ger lǧil-agi amednub , ifesden , ula d Mmi-s n bunadem ad issetḥi yis m'ara d-yas akk-d lmalayekkat iqedsen di lɛaḍima n baba-s .
41009001	Sidna Ɛisa yenna daɣen : — S tideț a wen-d-iniɣ , kra seg wid yellan dagi , ur țmețțaten ara alamma walan tagelda n Ṛebbi tusa-d s tmanegt tameqqrant .
41009002	Mi ɛeddan sețța wussan , Sidna Ɛisa yewwi yid-es Buṭrus , Yeɛqub d Yuḥenna , ulin ɣer yiwen wedrar ɛlayen . Mi llan dinna weḥḥed-sen , tenbeddal ṣṣifa-s zdat-sen ,
41009003	llebsa-s tuɣal ț-țamellalt tețfeǧǧiǧ , ula d yiwen di ddunit ur izmir a ten yessimlul akken .
41009004	? ehṛen-asen-d nnbi Ilyas akk-d Sidna Musa , țmeslayen d Sidna Ɛisa .
41009005	Yenṭeq Buṭrus yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi , yelha imi nella dagi . A nesbedd tlata iqiḍunen ; yiwen i kečč , wayeḍ i Sidna Musa wayeḍ i Sidna Ilyas .
41009006	Ur yeẓri d acu i d-yeqqaṛ axaṭer tekcem-iten lxelɛa ț-țameqqrant .
41009007	Taswiɛt kan ters-ed yiwet n tagut tɣumm-iten , si tagut-nni tenṭeq-ed yiwet n taɣect tenna-d : Wagi d Mmi ameɛzuz , smeḥsiset as !
41009008	Imiren kan , inelmaden muqlen ɣer mkul tama , ur walan ula d yiwen , anagar Sidna Ɛisa yellan yid-sen .
41009009	Mi d-ṣubben seg udrar , Sidna Ɛisa iweṣṣa-ten : Ur ḥekkut i yiwen ayen teẓram , alamma yeḥya-d Mmi-s n bunadem si ger lmegtin .
41009010	Uɣen-as awal , d acu kan țemsteqsayen , qqaṛen : Acu i d lmeɛna n ḥeggu si ger lmegtin ?
41009011	Inelmaden steqsan-t nnan-as : Acuɣer lɛulama n ccariɛa qqaṛen-d : ilaq a d-yas uqbel Sidna Ilyas ?
41009012	Yerra-yasen : ? - țideț , a d-yas uqbel Ilyas , iwakken ad iseggem kullec . lameɛna acuɣer yețwakteb ɣef Mmi-s n bunadem belli ilaq ad yenɛețțab aṭas yerna ad yețwaqehheṛ ?
41009013	Aql-i nniɣ-awen : Ilyas yusa-d , xedmen deg-s akken bɣan , am akken yețwakteb fell-as di tira iqedsen .
41009014	Mi d-ṣubben seg udrar , ufan-d lɣaci akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa zzin i inelmaden nniḍen , țmeslayen yid-sen .
41009015	Mi d-walan Sidna Ɛisa , dehcen , uzzlen ad selmen fell-as .
41009016	Sidna Ɛisa yesteqsa-ten : ? ef wacu i tețmeslayem akka yid-sen ?
41009017	Yiwen wergaz si lɣaci-nni yerra-yas-d : A Sidi , wwiɣ-ak-d mmi axaṭer yesgugem-it uṛuḥani .
41009018	Kra wanda ara t-yeṭṭef , yesseɣlay-it ɣer lqaɛa ; aqcic yessufuɣ-ed tikufta , yețqeṛṛic tuɣmas , yețțuɣal d asemmaḍ . ? elleleɣ inelmaden-ik a t-ssufɣen seg-s meɛna ur zmiren ara .
41009019	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : A lǧil i gxuṣṣ liman ! Ar melmi ara yiliɣ yid-wen ? Ar melmi ara wen-ṣebṛeɣ ? Awit-ed aqcic-agi ! Wwin-as-t-id ;
41009020	akken kan iwala Sidna Ɛisa , aṛuḥani-nni yebda yețhuccu aqcic-nni , yesseɣli-t ɣer lqaɛa yessemṛareɣ-it armi i s-d yessufeɣ tikufta .
41009021	Sidna Ɛisa yesteqsa baba-s n weqcic-nni yenna-yas : Si melmi i d-ideṛṛu yid-es wayagi ? Yerra-yas-d : Seg wasmi yella d amecṭuḥ .
41009022	Acḥal d abrid i t-idemmer uṛuḥani-agi ɣer tmes d waman iwakken a t-ineɣ . Tura , ma yella wayen iwumi tzemreḍ , ḥunn fell-aɣ , ɛiwen-aɣ !
41009023	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Teqqaṛeḍ : ma tzemreḍ . . . ? Win yețțamnen yezmer i kullec !
41009024	Imiren kan , baba-s n weqcic-nni yenna : Umneɣ ! Meɛna sseǧhed-iyi axaṭer xuṣṣeɣ di liman .
41009025	Sidna Ɛisa mi gwala lɣaci uzzlen-d ɣuṛ-sen , yumeṛ i uṛuḥani-nni , yenna-yas : Ay aṛuḥani ! yesgugumen yesɛuẓẓugen , effeɣ seg weqcic-agi ur țɛawad ara aț-țkecmeḍ deg-s !
41009026	Imiren iɛeggeḍ , ihucc-it nezzeh , dɣa yeffeɣ seg-s . Aqcic-nni yuɣal am lmegget , daymi aṭas i s-yeqqaṛen : « yemmut . »
41009027	Meɛna Sidna Ɛisa yeṭṭef-as afus , isekker-it-id , ibedd .
41009028	Mi kecmen ɣer wexxam , inelmaden-is steqsan-t : Acuɣer ur nezmir ara nukni a nessufeɣ aṛuḥani-nni ?
41009029	Yenna-yasen : Iwakken aț-țessufɣem iṛuḥaniyen am wigi , ilaq aț-țețțuẓumem yerna aț-țețẓallam .
41009030	Ṛuḥen syenna , zegren tamurt n Jlili . Sidna Ɛisa ur yebɣi ara ad ẓren lɣaci anda i gella ,
41009031	axaṭer yesselmad inelmaden-is , yenna-yasen : Mmi-s n bunadem ad ițțusellem ger ifassen n yemdanen , a t-nɣen , meɛna tlata wussan mbeɛd lmut-is a d-iḥyu .
41009032	Inelmaden-is ur fhimen ara lmeɛna n wawal-agi , yerna kukran a t-steqsin .
41009033	Mi ewwḍen ɣer temdint n Kafernaḥum . llan deg wexxam , Sidna Ɛisa yesteqsa-ten : ? ef wacu i tețmeslayem deg webrid ?
41009034	Lameɛna ssusmen akken ma llan , axaṭer deg webrid țmesteqsayen anwa i d ameqqran gar-asen .
41009035	Sidna Ɛisa yeqqim , yessawel i tnac-nni inelmaden-is , yenna-yasen : Win yebɣan ad yili d amezwaru , ilaq ad yeqqim d aneggaru , ad yuɣal d aqeddac i mkul yiwen .
41009036	Yeddem-ed yiwen weqcic amecṭuḥ , yesbedd-it zdat-sen dɣa yerfed-it ger ifassen-is , yenna-yasen :
41009037	Win iqeblen aqcic amecṭuḥ am wagi ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw , d nekk i geqbel , win i yi-qeblen mačči d nekk i geqbel lameɛna yeqbel Win i yi-d iceggɛen .
41009038	Yuḥenna yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi , nwala yiwen wergaz yessufuɣ leǧnun s yisem-ik ; nugi-yas imi ur iteddu ara yid-nneɣ .
41009039	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Aneft-as , imi ulac win izemren ad ixdem lbeṛhan s yisem-iw , imiren ad yehdeṛ ayen n diri fell-i .
41009040	Win ur nelli ara d aɛdaw-nneɣ , yid-nneɣ i gella .
41009041	Kra win ara wen-d-yefken lkas n waman imi d inelmaden n Lmasiḥ i tellam , a wen-iniɣ s tideț , lxiṛ-is ur s-yețwankaṛ ara .
41009042	Win ara yilin d sebba n tuccḍa i yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi yumnen yis-i , axiṛ-as a s-ɛelqen ɣer temgeṛṭ aɣaṛef n tsirt , a t-ḍeggṛen ɣer lebḥeṛ .
41009043	Ma yella d afus-ik i d sebba n tuccḍa , gzem-it ; axiṛ-ak aț-țkecmeḍ ɣer tudert n dayem s yiwen ufus wala aț-țkecmeḍ s sin ifassen ɣer ǧahennama , aț-țețwaḍeggreḍ ɣer tmes ur nxețți .
41009044	[ Dinna awekkiw itețțen lǧețțat ur yețmețțat ara , times ur txețți ara maḍi . ]
41009045	Ma yella d aḍaṛ-ik i d sebba n tuccḍa , gzem-it ; axiṛ-ak aț-țkecmeḍ ɣer tudert n dayem s yiwen uḍar wala aț-țkecmeḍ s sin iḍaṛṛen ɣer ǧahennama , aț-țețwaḍeggreḍ ɣer tmes ur nxețți .
41009046	[ Dinna awekkiw itețțen lǧețțat ur yețmețțat ara , times ur txețți ara maḍi . ]
41009047	Daɣen ma yella ț-țiṭ-ik i gellan d sebba n tuccḍa , qleɛ-iț-id ; axiṛ-ak aț-țkecmeḍ ɣer tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi s yiwet n tiṭ , wala aț-țwaḍeggṛeḍ s snat wallen ɣer ǧahennama .
41009048	Dinna awekkiw itețțen lǧețțat ur yețmețțat ara , times ur txețți ara maḍi .
41009049	Axaṭer mkul amdan ilaq ad yețwamelleḥ s tmes .
41009050	Lmelḥ , d ayen yelhan ; meɛna ma tṛuḥ-as lbenna-s , s wacu ara t-tmellḥem ? Sɛut lmelḥ deg yiman-nwen , tɛicem wway gar-awen di lehna .
41010001	Sidna Ɛisa yeṭṭef abrid ɣer tmurt n Yahuda agummaḍ i wasif n Urdun . Nnejmaɛen-d daɣen ɣuṛ-es aṭas n lɣaci . Yebda yesselmad-iten akken yennum .
41010002	Ifariziyen qesden-t-id a t-jeṛṛben . Steqsan-t nnan-as : Yeḥlel i wergaz ad yebru i tmeṭṭut-is neɣ ala ?
41010003	Yerra-yasen : Acu n lameṛ i wen-d-yeǧǧa Musa ?
41010004	Nnan-as : Sidna Musa issereḥ-aɣ a nebru i tmeṭṭut-nneɣ ma nefka-yas leɛqed n berru .
41010005	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : ? ef ddemma n wulawen-nwen yeqquṛen i wen-d-yeǧǧa lameṛ-agi .
41010006	Lameɛna di tazwara , Sidi Ṛebbi ixleq-ed argaz ț-țmeṭṭut .
41010007	Daymi : Argaz ad yeǧǧ baba-s akk-d yemma-s , iwakken ad iɛic ț-țmeṭṭut-is .
41010008	Imiren , di sin yid-sen ad uɣalen d yiwet n lǧețța . S wakka , ur llin ara d sin meɛna ad uɣalen d yiwen .
41010009	Ihi , ur feṛqet ara wayen yesdukkel Ṛebbi .
41010010	Mi llan deg wexxam , steqsan-t daɣen inelmaden-is ɣef wannect-nni .
41010011	Yerra-yasen : Kra win ara yebrun i tmeṭṭut-is yuɣ tayeḍ , ixdeɛ tameṭṭut tamezwarut , yezna .
41010012	Akken daɣen , tameṭṭut ara yebrun i wergaz-is aț-țaɣ wayeḍ , tezna .
41010013	Kra yemdanen wwin-as-d arrac imecṭuḥen iwakken ad yessers ifassen-is fell-asen , meɛna inelmaden țțaran-ten .
41010014	Mi ten-iwala Sidna Ɛisa , yezɛef fell-asen yenna-yasen : Anfet i warrac a d-asen ɣuṛ-i ! Ur ten-țțarrat ara , axaṭer tagelda n Ṛebbi i wid yellan am nutni .
41010015	A wen-iniɣ tideț : kra win ur neqbil ara tagelda n Ṛebbi am weqcic amecṭuḥ , ur ț-ikeččem ara .
41010016	Imiren issuden-iten , yessers ifassen-is fell-asen , dɣa iburek-iten .
41010017	Akken iteddu Sidna Ɛisa ad iṛuḥ , ataya yiwen ilemẓi yeɣli ɣef tgecrar zdat-es , yenna-yas : A ccix yelhan , d acu ilaqen a t-xedmeɣ iwakken ad sɛuɣ tudert n dayem ?
41010018	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Acuɣeṛ i yi-tsemmaḍ « win yelhan » ? Ulac win yelhan , anagar Ṛebbi weḥd-es .
41010019	Tessneḍ ccariɛa n Musa : Ur tneqqeḍ ara , ur tzennuḍ ara , ur tețțakṛeḍ ara , ur tețcehhiḍeḍ ara s ẓẓur , ur txeddɛeḍ ( tețḍuṛuḍ ) ara , aț-țqadṛeḍ baba-k d yemma-k .
41010020	Yerra-yas : A Sidi , ayagi akk xedmeɣ-t seg wasmi lliɣ d ameẓyan .
41010021	Sidna Ɛisa imuqel-it s leḥnana yenna-yas : Txuṣṣ-ik kan yiwet n lḥaǧa : ṛuḥ , zzenz akk ayen tesɛiḍ , tseddqeḍ-t i imeɣban iwakken aț-țesɛuḍ agerruj deg igenni ; imiren as-ed tbeɛ-iyi-d .
41010022	Mi gesla ilemẓi-nni i imeslayen n Sidna Ɛisa , yennuɣna . Iṛuḥ s leḥzen axaṭer yesɛa aṭas n cci .
41010023	Sidna Ɛisa imuqel wid i s-d-izzin , yenna i inelmaden-is : Acḥal i gewɛeṛ i wid yesɛan cci ad kecmen ɣer tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi !
41010024	Inelmaden-is dehcen mi slan imeslayen-agi . Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen daɣen : Acḥal i gewɛeṛ unekcum ɣer tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi a tarwa !
41010025	Ishel-as i welɣem ad iɛeddi di tiṭ n tissegnit wala i umeṛkanti ad ikcem ɣer tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi .
41010026	Ayagi issewhem inelmaden akteṛ , qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Ihi , anwa i gzemren ad ițțusellek ?
41010027	Sidna Ɛisa imuqel-iten , yenna yasen : Ayen yellan d lmuḥal i wemdan yeshel i Sidi Ṛebbi , imi Sidi Ṛebbi yezmer i kullec .
41010028	Buṭrus yenna-yas : Aql-aɣ neǧǧa kullec yerna netbeɛ-ik .
41010029	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : A wen-d-iniɣ tideț : win yeǧǧan axxam-is , ayetma-s , yessetma-s , yemma-s , baba-s , arraw-is , tiferkiwin-is ( akal-is ) , ɣef ddemma-w akk-d ddemma n ubecceṛ n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ,
41010030	a s-d-yețțune meyya iberdan akteṛ di lweqt-agi : ixxamen , atmaten , tiyestmatin , tiyemmatin , dderya akk-d tferkiwin meɛna s waṭas n uqehheṛ ; di lweqt i d-iteddun a s-d-tețțune tudert n dayem .
41010031	Aṭas seg imezwura ara yuɣalen d ineggura , aṭas seg ineggura ara yuɣalen d imezwura .
41010032	Llan leḥḥun iwakken ad alin ɣer temdint n Lquds , Sidna Ɛisa yezwar zdat-nsen . Inelmaden-nni xelɛen , ma d wid i d-itebɛen deffir-sen , ikcem iten lxuf . Sidna Ɛisa yewwi daɣen yid-es tnac-nni n inelmaden , ixebbeṛ-iten s wayen ara yedṛun yid-es .
41010033	Yenna-yasen : Atan a nali ɣer temdint n Lquds , Mmi-s n bunadem ad ițwasellem ger ifassen n lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɛulama , ad ḥekmen fell-as s lmut , a t-sellmen ger ifassen n ikafriwen .
41010034	Ad ḍsen fell-as , a t-ssusfen , a t-wten s ujelkkaḍ , a t-nɣen , m'ara ɛeddin tlata wussan , a d-iḥyu si ger lmegtin .
41010035	Yeɛqub d Yuḥenna yellan d arraw n Zabadi qeṛṛben ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : A Sidi , nebɣa a ɣ-txedmeḍ ayen akka ara k-d-nessuter .
41010036	Yenna-yasen : D acu tebɣam a wen-t-xedmeɣ ?
41010037	Nnan-as : Efk-aɣ imukan di lɛaḍima-k , wa ɣer tama-k tayeffust , wa ɣer tama-k taẓelmaṭ .
41010038	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Ur teẓrim ara ayen akka i yi-d tessuturem . Eɛni tzemrem aț-țeswem lkas-agi n lemṛaṛ ara sweɣ ? Neɣ tzemrem a d-tɛeddim seg weɣḍas-agi s wayes ara țwaɣeḍseɣ ?
41010039	Nnan-as : Ih a Sidi , nezmer . Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : ? - țideț , aț-țeswem lkas-agi n lemṛaṛ ara sweɣ , yernu aț-țɛeddim seg weɣḍas s wayes ara țwaɣeḍseɣ .
41010040	Ma yella d ayen yeɛnan imukan ɣer uyeffus-iw neɣ ɣer uzelmaḍ-iw , mačči deg ufus-iw i gella , meɛna ad țțunefken i wid iwumi țwaheggan .
41010041	Mi slan i waya , ɛecṛa n inelmaden nniḍen rfan ɣef Yeɛqub akk-d Yuḥenna .
41010042	Sidna Ɛisa yessawel asen yenna-yasen : Twalam ayen iḍeṛṛun di ddunit : wid nețwali d igelliden akk-d d imeqqranen n yegduden țqehhiṛen lɣaci-nsen yerna ḥekkmen fell-asen s ẓẓur !
41010043	Ur ilaq ara ad yili wannect-a gar-awen . Meɛna win yebɣan ad yili d ameqqran gar-awen ilaq ad yuɣal d aqeddac-nwen .
41010044	Win yebɣan daɣen amkan amezwaru , ilaq ad yili d aqeddac-nwen meṛṛa .
41010045	Axaṭer Mmi-s n bunadem ur d-yusi ara iwakken ad qedcen fell-as wiyaḍ , meɛna d nețța ara iqedcen fell-asen , yerna ad ye tudert-is d asfel ɣef waṭas n yemdanen .
41010046	Sidna Ɛisa akk-d inelmaden-is wḍen ɣer temdint n Yiriku . Mi d-ffɣen si temdint , ddan-d yid-sen aṭas n lɣaci . Ataya yiwen uderɣal isem-is Baṛtimay mmi-s n Timay , yeqqim ṭṭerf n webrid yessutur tin n Ṛebbi .
41010047	Mi gesla belli d Ɛisa anaṣari i d-iɛeddan , yebda yețɛeggiḍ yeqqaṛ : A Ɛisa , a Mmi-s n Sidna Dawed , ḥunn fell-i !
41010048	Aṭas i gețɛeggiḍen fell-as iwakken ad issusem , meɛna nețța yețsuɣu akteṛ yeqqaṛ : A mmi-s n Sidna Dawed , ḥunn fell-i !
41010049	Sidna Ɛisa iḥbes yenna : Siwlet-as . Ssawlen-as , nnan-as : Ur țțaggad ara , kker fell-ak , atan yessawel-ak-ed .
41010050	Aderɣal-nni iḍeggeṛ abeṛnus-is , ijelleb-ed , yusa-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa .
41010051	Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : D acu tebɣiḍ a k-t-xedmeɣ ? Aderɣal-nni yenna-yas : A Sidi , bɣiɣ a yi-d-yuɣal yeẓri .
41010052	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ṛuḥ , liman-ik isellek-ik . Imiren kan , yuɣal-it-id yeẓri , yetḍfer Sidna Ɛisa deg webrid .
41011001	Mi qṛib ad awḍen ɣer temdint n Lquds , zdat n tuddar n Bitfaji akk-d Bitanya ɣer tama n yiɣil n uzemmur , Sidna Ɛisa iceggeɛ sin seg inelmaden-is
41011002	yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet ɣer taddart-nni yellan zdat-wen , m'ara tawḍem aț-țafem aɣyul d amecṭuḥ yeqqen , leɛmeṛ yerkeb fell-as ula d yiwen . Fsit-as-ed cced tawim-t-id .
41011003	Ma yella win i wen-d-yennan : « acimi txeddmem ayagi ? » Innit-as : « yeḥwaǧ-it Ssid-nneɣ , taswiɛt kan a wen-t id-yerr . »
41011004	Ṛuḥen inelmaden-nni ufan aɣyul deg webrid yeqqen ɣer tewwurt n yiwen n wexxam , fsin-as ccedd .
41011005	Kra seg wid yellan dinna nnan asen : D acu txeddmem akka ? Acuɣer i d-tserḥem i weɣyul-agi ?
41011006	Rran-asen akken i sen-d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa , dɣa ǧǧan-ten .
41011007	Wwin-d aɣyul-nni i Sidna Ɛisa , ssersen fell-as llebsa-nsen iwakken ad yerkeb fell-as .
41011008	Aṭas i s-ițessun llebsa-nsen deg webrid , ma d wiyaḍ țessun-as tiseḍwa i d-ge ? men si lexla .
41011009	Wid yezwaren d wid yettabaɛen țɛeggiḍen : « ? usana , ad yețțubarek win i d-yusan s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi !
41011010	Tețțubarek tgeldit i d-yusan , tageldit n Sidna Dawed baba-tneɣ ! ? usana ( tamanegt ) deg imukan ɛlayen . »
41011011	Sidna Ɛisa yewweḍ ɣer temdint n Lquds , yekcem ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen . Imuqel ayen akk i gdeṛṛun dina , imiren mi geẓra ifut lḥal , iṛuḥ ɣer taddart n Bitanya nețța d tnac inelmaden-is .
41011012	Azekka-nni akken ffɣen si taddart n Bitanya , Sidna Ɛisa yelluẓ .
41011013	Iwala si lbeɛd tameɣṛust yesɛan iferrawen , iṛuḥ ad iqelleb kra ibakuṛen ara yečč . Mi gqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es , yufa deg-s anagar iferrawen , axaṭer mačči d lawan n lexṛif .
41011014	Yenṭeq ɣuṛ-es zdat n inelmaden-is , yenna-yas : Ur tețțuɣaleḍ ara a d-tefkeḍ lfakya !
41011015	Mi wwḍen ɣer temdint n Lquds , Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen , yebda itellif wid yețțaɣen znuzun dinna . Yeqleb ṭṭwabel d ikersiyen n wid ițbeddilen idrimen akk-d wid yeznuzun itbiren .
41011016	Ur yeǧǧi ula d yiwen ad yawi yid-es lḥaǧa ɣer daxel n lǧameɛ .
41011017	Dɣa yesselmed lɣaci s imeslayen-agi : Eɛni ur yețwakteb ara : Axxam-iw ad ițțusemmi d axxam n tẓallit i leǧnas meṛṛa , ma d kunwi terram-t d axxam n imakaren !
41011018	Mi s-slan , lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɛulama uggaden-t , imiren țnadin amek ara t-nɣen , axaṭer lɣaci meṛṛa wehmen deg uselmed-ines .
41011019	Mi d-yeɣli yiḍ , Sidna Ɛisa d inelmaden-is ffɣen si temdint .
41011020	Azekka-nni ṣṣbeḥ mi d-ɛeddan syenna , inelmaden-is walan tameɣṛust nni teqquṛ armi d iẓuran .
41011021	Buṭrus yemmekta-d ayen iɛeddan , yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi , muqel ! Tameɣṛust-nni iwumi tedɛiḍ teqquṛ !
41011022	Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq yenna : A wen-d-iniɣ tideț :
41011023	ma yenna walebɛaḍ i wedrar-agi « qleɛ syenna tḍeggṛeḍ iman-ik ɣer lebḥeṛ » ma yumen ur icukket ara , atan a d-yedṛu wayen i d-yenna .
41011024	Daymi i wen-qqaṛeɣ : kra wayen ara tessutrem i Ṛebbi di tẓallit , amnet belli yewweḍ-ikkun-id yerna a wen-d-ițțune .
41011025	M'ara tekkrem aț-țẓallem yili teṭṭfem cceḥna i walebɛaḍ , semmḥet-as , iwakken baba-twen yellan deg igenwan a wen-isemmeḥ ula i kunwi ddnubat nwen .
41011026	[ Meɛna ma yella ur tețsemmiḥem ara i wiyaḍ , baba-twen yellan deg igenwan ur wen-ițsemmiḥ ara ddnubat-nwen daɣen i kunwi . ]
41011027	Uɣalen ɣer temdint n Lquds . Di teswiɛt-nni , Sidna Ɛisa yella itezzi di Lǧameɛ iqedsen ; lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɛulama akk-d lecyux , qeṛṛben-d ɣuṛ-es
41011028	nnan-as : Ansi i k-d-tekka lḥekma-agi ? Anwa i k-d-yefkan tazmert aț - țxedmeḍ ayagi ?
41011029	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Ula d nekk a kkun-steqsiɣ s yiwen usteqsi kan , ma terram-iyi-d , a wen-d-iniɣ ansi i yi-d-tekka lḥekma s wayes i xeddmeɣ ayagi :
41011030	Anwa i d-iceggɛen Yeḥya ad isseɣḍes deg waman , d Ṛebbi neɣ d imdanen ? Erret-iyi-d !
41011031	Bdan țemcawaṛen wway gar asen qqaṛen : ma nerra-yas : « d Ṛebbi i t-id iceggɛen » , a ɣ-d-yini : « acimi ihi ur tuminem ara s Yeḥya ? »
41011032	Ma nenna-d : « d imdanen i t-id iceggɛen . . . » Uggaden ma nnan-d akken , axaṭer lɣaci umnen akk belli Yeḥya d nnbi .
41011033	Ihi rran-as i Sidna Ɛisa : Ur neẓri ara ! Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Ula d nekk ur wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ara ansi i yi-d-tekka lḥekma s wayes xeddmeɣ ayagi .
41012001	Sidna Ɛisa yebda ițmeslay-asen s lemtul : Yiwen wergaz yeẓẓa tafeṛṛant , izeṛṛeb-iț , yeɣza amkan i tɛeṣṣart n tẓurin yerna yebna taxxamt n tɛessast . Issekra-ț i ixemmasen n tfeṛṛant imiren iṛuḥ ad yinig .
41012002	Mi d-yewweḍ lweqt n tẓurin , iceggeɛ aqeddac-is ɣer ixemmasen-nni iwakken a s-d-fken amur-is .
41012003	Meɛna ṭṭfen aqeddac-nni , wwten-t , qecɛen-t ifassen-is d ilmawen .
41012004	Iceggeɛ-asen aqeddac wis sin , reggmen-t yerna wwten-t ula d nețța ɣer uqeṛṛuy .
41012005	Iceggeɛ-asen aqeddac wis tlata , wagi nɣan-t . Iceggeɛ-asen aṭas iqeddacen nniḍen , kra nɣan-ten kra wten-ten .
41012006	Yeqqim-as-d anagar mmi-s ameɛzuz . Iceggeɛ-it d aneggaru ɣuṛ-sen , yenna : « ahat a t-qadṛen imi d mmi . »
41012007	Meɛna ixemmasen-agi nnan wway gar-asen : « atan win ara iweṛten ! Ekkret a t-nenneɣ iwakken lweṛt nni ad yuɣal d ayla-nneɣ ! »
41012008	? ṭfen-t-id wwten-t armi yemmut , imiren ḍeggṛen-t ɣer beṛṛa n tfeṛṛant .
41012009	D acu ara yexdem tura bab n tfeṛṛant ? A d-yas nețța s yiman-is , ad ineɣ ixemmasen-nni ad yernu ad iwekkel tafeṛṛant-nni i wiyaḍ .
41012010	Eɛni ur teɣṛim ara awal-agi n tira iqedsen ? Adɣaɣ i ḍeggṛen wid ibennun , d nețța i guɣalen d azṛu alemmas yeṭṭfen lebni .
41012011	Ayagi yekka-d s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , yerna ɣer ɣuṛ-nneɣ d ayen i gessewhamen !
41012012	Faqen belli fell-asen i d-yewwi lemtel-agi . Bɣan a t-ṭṭfen imiren , lameɛna uggaden lɣaci ; dɣa ǧǧan-t , ṛuḥen .
41012013	Kra ifariziyen akk-d kra seg wid yellan si terbaɛt n Hiṛudus , ceggɛen ɣer Sidna Ɛisa iwakken a t-id-sseɣlin deg wawal akken a t-ṭṭfen s imeslayen-is .
41012014	Usan-d nnan-as : A Sidi , neẓra belli theddṛeḍ ṣṣeḥ , ur txeddmeḍ ara lxilaf ger yemdanen , tesselmadeḍ abrid n Ṛebbi s tideț . Ini-yaɣ-d : d leḥlal neɣ d leḥṛam fell-aɣ ma nxelleṣ tabzert i wugellid Qayṣer ( yesṭeɛmeṛen tamurt-nneɣ ) ?
41012015	Sidna Ɛisa ifaq i tḥila-nsen , yenna-yasen : Acuɣer i yi-d-tneddim tifxeț ? Awit-iyi-d aṣurdi iwakken a t-ẓreɣ .
41012016	Fkan-as-d aṣurdi dɣa yenna yasen : Udem-agi d wayen yuran fell-as wi ten-ilan ? Nnan-as : N Qayṣer . Imiren Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen :
41012017	Erret ihi i Qayṣer ayen yellan n Qayṣeṛ , terrem i Ṛebbi ayen yellan n Ṛebbi . Qqimen wehmen deg-s .
41012018	Isaduqiyen yellan d wid ur nețțamen ara s ḥeggu n lmegtin , usan-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa steqsan-t :
41012019	A Sidi , atan wayen i ɣ-d yeǧǧa Sidna Musa di ccariɛa : Ma yella yemmut wergaz yeǧǧa-d tameṭṭut-is , m'ur yesɛi ara dderya , ilaq gma-s ad yerr tameṭṭut-nni iwakken a d-yesɛu dderya i gma-s yemmuten .
41012020	Llan ihi sebɛa watmaten : amezwaru yezweǧ yuɣal yemmut ur d-yeǧǧi ara dderya .
41012021	Wis sin yuɣ taǧǧalt-nni , yemmut ula d nețța mbla ma yeǧǧa-d dderya . Akken daɣen i tedṛa d wis tlata ,
41012022	ula d yiwen si sebɛa-nni i gzewǧen yid-es ur d-yeǧǧi dderya . ? er taggara , ula ț-țameṭṭut-nni temmut .
41012023	Asmi ara d-ḥyun lmegtin , anwa si sebɛa watmaten-nni ara ț-yesɛun ț-țameṭṭut-is imi i ț-uɣen di sebɛa yid-sen ?
41012024	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Tɣelṭem ! Ur tefhimem tira iqedsen , ur tessinem tazmert n Ṛebbi .
41012025	Axaṭer ass n ḥeggu n lmegtin , irgazen ț-țlawin ur țemyezwaǧen ara , lameɛna ad ilin am lmalayekkat deg igenwan .
41012026	Ma d ayen yeɛnan ḥeggu n lmegtin , leɛmeṛ ur teɣṛim di tektabt n Musa , mi t-id-iluɛa Sidi Ṛebbi zdat udarnu ireqqen ? Yenna-yas-d : Nekk d Illu n Ibṛahim , d Illu n Isḥaq , d Illu n Yeɛqub .
41012027	Ihi Ṛebbi mačči d Illu n lmegtin i gella , lameɛna d Illu n wid yeddren . S tideț , atan tɣelṭem aṭas .
41012028	Yiwen n umusnaw n ccariɛa mi geẓra Sidna Ɛisa ijaweb akken ilaq , iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : Anwa i d lameṛ ameqqran di ccariɛa ?
41012029	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Atah lameṛ ameqqran : ? ess-ed ay agdud n Isṛail ! Sidi Ṛebbi-nneɣ d yiwen .
41012030	Ilaq aț-țḥemmleḍ Sidi Ṛebbi s wul-ik , s teṛwiḥt-ik akk , s wayen yellan di tezmert-ik akk-d lɛeqliya-k meṛṛa .
41012031	Atah wis sin : Ilaq aț-țḥemleḍ lɣiṛ-ik am yiman-ik . Ulac lameṛ yugaren wigi .
41012032	Lɛalem-nni yenna-yas : ? - țideț a Sidi ! Ayen i d-tenniḍ d ṣṣeḥ ; Ṛebbi d yiwen ulac wayeḍ .
41012033	Yerna ma nḥemmel-it s wul-nneɣ , s lɛeqliya-nneɣ , akk-d wayen yellan di țezmert-nneɣ meṛṛa , ma nḥemmel daɣen lɣiṛ-nneɣ am yiman-nneɣ , annect-agi axiṛ n iseflawen akk-d lewɛadi .
41012034	Sidna Ɛisa mi t-iwala ijaweb-ed s tmusni , yenna-yas : Ur tebɛideḍ ara ɣef tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi . Ulac win i s-d-yernan asteqsi nniḍen .
41012035	Mi gella Sidna Ɛisa yesselmad di lǧameɛ iqedsen yenna : Amek armi imusnawen n ccariɛa qqaṛen-d belli Lmasiḥ d mmi-s n Sidna Dawed ?
41012036	S Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-yenna Dawed s yiman-is : Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d i Sidi : Qqim ɣer tama-w tayeffust alamma rriɣ iɛdawen-ik seddaw iḍaṛṛen-ik .
41012037	Dawed s yiman-is issawel-as « a Sidi » , amek ihi yezmer ad yili d mmi-s ? Aṭas n lɣaci i s-yesmeḥsisen s lfeṛḥ .
41012038	Sidna Ɛisa yesselmad lɣaci yeqqaṛ-asen : ? adret daɣen iman-nwen ɣef yimusnawen n ccariɛa i gḥemmlen ad ḥewwsen s ijellaben iɣezfanen , ḥemmlen daɣen ad selmen fell-asen medden di leswaq ;
41012039	țextiṛin imukan imezwura di leǧwameɛ akk-d imukan lɛali di tmeɣṛiwin , lameɛna
41012040	tețțen ayla n tuǧǧal ; ssiɣzifen taẓallit iwakken a ten-id-walin yemdanen . Lɛiqab-nsen ad yili d ameqqran !
41012041	Sidna Ɛisa yella yeqqim deg umkan iqublen asenduq i deg srusun lewɛadi , yețmuqul amek srusuyen lɣaci lewɛadi-nsen . Aṭas n imeṛkantiyen yeggaren xiṛella n yedrimen .
41012042	Tusa-d yiwet n taǧǧalt tigellilt tessers sin iṣurdiyen yesɛan azal n ṛebɛa twiztin n lfeṭṭa .
41012043	Sidna Ɛisa yessawel i inelmaden-is , yenna yasen : A wen-d-iniɣ tideț : lweɛda i tessers taǧǧalt-agi taẓawalit , tugar akk lewɛadi i ssersen wiyaḍ .
41012044	Axaṭer wiyaḍ seddqen seg wayen sɛan d zzyada , ma d nețțat tseddeq ciṭṭuh-nni s wacu ara tɛic .
41013001	Mi d-iffeɣ Sidna Ɛisa si lǧameɛ iqedsen , yiwen seg inelmaden-is yenna-yas : A Sidi , muqel acḥal yecbeḥ lebni-agi ! Acḥal cebḥen yedɣaɣen-is !
41013002	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Deg wayagi irkul i tețwaliḍ , ur d-yețɣimi yiwen wedɣaɣ ɣef wayeḍ ; kullec ad ihudd .
41013003	Sidna Ɛisa yeqqim deg iɣil uzemmur iqublen lǧameɛ iqedsen . Buṭrus , Yeɛqub , Yuḥenna akk-d Andriyus i gellan yid-es , steqsan-t :
41013004	Ini-yaɣ-d melmi ara d-yedṛu wayagi ; d acu ara ɣ-d-isbeggnen lweqt i deg ara yedṛu wannect-a .
41013005	Imiren , Sidna Ɛisa yebda yețweṣṣi ten : ? uṛ-wat win ara kkun-ikellxen !
41013006	Axaṭer aṭas ara d-yasen s yisem-iw , a wen-d-inin : « D nekk i d Lmasiḥ » ad kellxen i waṭas n lɣaci .
41013007	M'ara teslem s tegrawliwin i d-ideṛṛun di mkul amkan akk-d țid i d-iteddun , ur țțaggadet ara axaṭer ilaq a d-yedṛu wannect-nni , lameɛna mačči ț-țaggara n ddunit i d-yewḍen .
41013008	Agdud a d-yekker ɣer wayeḍ , tageldit aț-țennaɣ ț-țayeḍ , a d-ilint zzelzlat di kra imukan , a d-yili laẓ ; akkagi ara d-yebdu leɛtab di ddunit .
41013009	? adret ɣef yiman-nwen ; atan a kkun-caṛɛen zdat lɛulama n ccariɛa , a kkun-wten di leǧwameɛ . ? ef ddemma-w , a kkun-sbedden zdat wid i gḥekmen tamurt akk-d igelliden iwakken aț-țilim d inigan-iw zdat-nsen .
41013010	Lameɛna di tazwara ilaq lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ad ițwabecceṛ uqbel i leǧnas meṛṛa .
41013011	M'ara kkun-ẓẓuɣṛen a kkun awin ɣer ccṛeɛ , ur xeddmet ara anezgum ɣef wayen ara tinim ; init-ed kan ayen ara wen-d-yasen di teswiɛt-nni , axaṭer mačči d kunwi ara imeslayen lameɛna d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
41013012	Yiwen ad ye gma-s ɣer lmut , wayeḍ ad ye mmi-s ; dderya a d-kkren ɣer imawlan-nsen a ten-ssiwḍen ɣer lmut .
41013013	A kkun-keṛhen irkul ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw . Lameɛna win ara yeṭṭfen alamma ț-țaggara ad ițwasellek .
41013014	Ass m'ara twalim lmuṣiba tameqqrant tella deg umkan anda ur ilaq ara aț-țili , « win ara yeɣṛen ayagi ilaq ad imeyyez ! » ass-nni wid ara yilin di tmurt n Yahuda ad rewlen ɣer idurar ;
41013015	win ara yilin s ufella n ssqef , ur ikeččem ara ɣer wexxam-is iwakken a d-iddem leḥwayeǧ-is .
41013016	Akken daɣen win ara yilin di lexla , ur yețțuɣal ara ɣer deffir iwakken a d-yawi abeṛnus-is .
41013017	A tawaɣit n tilawin ara yilin s tadist akk-d țid ara yeṣṣuṭuḍen deg wussan-nni .
41013018	Dɛut ɣer Ṛebbi iwakken ur d-ideṛṛu ara wannect-nni di ccetwa ,
41013019	axaṭer deg wussan-nni , ad yili yiwen n leɛtab ur neẓri seg wasmi i d-texleq ddunit ar ass-a , yerna d ayen ur nețțuɣal a d-yedṛu .
41013020	Lemmer ur yessenqes ara Sidi Ṛebbi kra seg wussan-nni , yiwen ur yezmir ad imneɛ . Meɛna issenqes seg-sen ɣef ddemma n wid yextaṛ .
41013021	Di lweqt-nni ma yenna-yawen walebɛaḍ : « Lmasiḥ atah dagi » neɣ « atan dihin » , ur t-țțamnet ara .
41013022	Axaṭer a d-asen wid ara yerren iman-nsen d Lmasiḥ neɣ d lenbiya , ad xeddmen lbeṛhanat akk-d licaṛat , iwakken ad kellxen ma zemren ula d wid yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
41013023	Atah nniɣ-awen-d annect-agi uqbel a d-yeḍru . —
41013024	M'ara ɛeddin wussan n twaɣit-nni , tafat n yiṭij aț-țenqes , aggur ur d-yețțak ara tiziri-ines ,
41013025	itran daɣen a d-ɣlin seg igenni , t inezmarin n igenwan ad rgagint .
41013026	Imiren , ad anwali Mmi-s n bunadem yusa-d s ufella n usigna s tezmert tameqqrant d lɛaḍima .
41013027	A d-iceggeɛ lmalayekkat-is ɣer yal amkan n ddunit , a d-snejmaɛen seg yixfawen n ddunit wid i gextaṛ meṛṛa .
41013028	Meyyzet ihi ɣef lemtel n tmeɣṛust : mi lqaqit isegman-is , fsan , fkan-d iferrawen , teẓram iqeṛṛeb-ed unebdu .
41013029	Akken ula d kunwi , m'ara twalim ayagi meṛṛa yewweḍ-ed , ḥṣut belli yusa-d lweqt , Mmi-s n bunadem atan ɣer tewwurt .
41013030	A wen-d-iniɣ tideț : lǧil-agi ur ițɛeddi ara alamma yedṛa-d wayagi meṛṛa .
41013031	Igenni d lqaɛa ad fnun ma d imeslayen-iw ur fennun ara .
41013032	? ef wayen yeɛnan ass akk-d lweqt-nni yiwen ur ten-yessin , ama d lmalayekkat deg igenwan ama d Mmi-s n bunadem , anagar Baba Ṛebbi i ten-isnen .
41013033	Ur gganet ara , ɛasset iman-nwen imi ur teẓrim ara melmi ara d-yaweḍ lweqt-nni .
41013034	Ad yili wass-nni am yiwen wergaz ara yinigen ɣer lebɛid , ad iwekkel axxam-is i iqeddacen-is , yal yiwen s ccɣel-is , imiren ad iweṣṣi aɛessas n tewwurt ad iɛiwez .
41013035	Ɛiwzet ihi , axaṭer ur teẓrim ara melmi ara d-yas bab n wexxam , ama tameddit neɣ țnaṣfa n yiḍ , m'ara yeskkuɛ uyaziḍ neɣ taṣebḥit .
41013036	? adret a kkun-id-yaf teṭṭsem imi ur teẓrim ara melmi ara d-yas .
41013037	Ayen akka i wen-d-nniɣ , nniɣ t-id i mkul yiwen deg-wen : ɛiwzet !
41014001	Qqimen-d sin wussan i Tfaska n izimer n leslak i deg xeddmen aɣṛum mbla tamtunt ( iɣes ) . Lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɛulama , țnadin s tḥila , sebba s wayes ara ḥebbsen Sidna Ɛisa iwakken a t-nɣen .
41014002	Qqaṛen : Ur nezmir ara a t-nessekcem ɣer lḥebs deg wass n lɛid , neɣ m'ulac lɣaci ad sekkren ccwal .
41014003	Sidna Ɛisa yella di taddart n Bitanya , deg wexxam n Semɛun ihelken lbeṛs ; mi qqimen ad ččen , ațaya yiwet n tmeṭṭut tekcem-ed , tewwi-d yid-es taqbuct ițwaxedmen s wezṛu amellal , teččuṛ d leɛṭeṛ yeṣfan ɣlayen . Teṛẓa taqbuct-nni , tesmar-iț ɣef wuqeṛṛuy n Sidna Ɛisa .
41014004	Kra deg-sen zeɛfen nnan : Acuɣer i tessexṣeṛ leɛṭeṛ-agi ?
41014005	Lemmer i t-nezzenz , a d-yawi akteṛ n telt meyya twiztin n lfeṭṭa ara nefṛeq i igellilen ! Dɣa rfan ɣef tmeṭṭut-nni .
41014006	Sidna Ɛisa yenna : Anfet-as acimi i ț-tesnuɣnayem ? Ayen akka i yi-texdem d ayen yelhan !
41014007	Igellilen ad ilin daymen gar-awen , tzemrem a ten-tɛiwnem melmi i wen yehwa ; ma d nekkini ur țɣimiɣ ara daymen yid-wen .
41014008	Ayen tezmer a t-texdem texdem it : tedhen lǧețța-w thegga-ț i temḍelt .
41014009	A wen-d-iniɣ tideț : di mkul amkan n ddunit anda ara yețțubecceṛ lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ , a d-țmektayen tameṭṭut-agi d wayen akka texdem .
41014010	Yudas n Qeṛyut yiwen si tnac inelmaden , iṛuḥ ɣer imeqqranen n lmuqedmin , yemsefham yid-sen amek ara sen yezzenz Sidna Ɛisa .
41014011	Feṛḥen aṭas mi s-slan , ɛuhden-t a s-fken idrimen . Imiren Yudas ițqellib tagniț i deg ara sen-t-yezzenz .
41014012	Ass amenzu n Tfaska n weɣṛum mbla tamtunt ( iɣes ) , i deg zellun izimer n leslak , inelmaden nnan i Sidna Ɛisa : Anda tebɣiḍ a nheggi imensi n Tfaska ?
41014013	Iceggeɛ sin seg inelmaden-is , yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet ɣer temdint , a d-temlilem d yiwen wergaz yewwi-d tacmuxt n waman , tebɛet-eț ɣer wanda ara yekcem ,
41014014	init i bab n wexxam-nni : Ssid-nneɣ yenna-yak : « anda-ț texxamt i deg ara ččeɣ imensi n Tfaska n izimer nekk d inelmaden-iw ? »
41014015	A kkun-yessali ɣer yiwet n tɣuṛfeț tameqqrant iwesɛen , kullec yella deg-s . Dinna ara theggim imensi n Tfaska .
41014016	Inelmaden ṛuḥen , mi wwḍen ɣer temdint , ufan kullec akken i sen-t yenna . Dɣa heggan imensi n Tfaska .
41014017	Mi d-teɣli tmeddit , Sidna Ɛisa yusa-d akk-d tnac-nni inelmaden .
41014018	Mi qqimen ad ččen , Sidna Ɛisa yenna yasen : A wen-iniɣ tideț : yiwen seg-wen itețțen yid-i , ad iyi-ixdeɛ .
41014019	Yeɣli-d leḥzen fell-asen , bdan steqsayen-t yiwen yiwen qqaṛen-as : A Sidi , neɣ mačči d nekk ?
41014020	Yenna-yasen : D yiwen seg-wen , yessasnen yid-i talqimt n weɣṛum deg uḍebsi .
41014021	? - țideț , Mmi-s n bunadem ad iṛuḥ akken yețwakteb fell-as di tira iqedsen ; meɛna a nnger n wergaz-nni ara t-ixedɛen . Axiṛ-as lemmer ur d-ilul ara ɣer ddunit !
41014022	Mi bdan tețțen , Sidna Ɛisa yeddem-d aɣṛum , yeḥmed Ṛebbi , yebḍa-t , ifṛeq-it i inelmaden-is , yenna yasen : ? čet-eț , ayagi d-lǧețța-w .
41014023	Yeddem-ed daɣen lkas n ccṛab , yeḥmed Ṛebbi , yefka-yasen , swan meṛṛa seg-s .
41014024	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Ayagi d idammen n leɛqed amaynut , d idammen-iw ara yazlen ɣef waṭas n yemdanen .
41014025	S tideț nniɣ-awen : ur țuɣaleɣ ara ad sweɣ si lfakya n tẓurin , alamma d ass i deg ara sweɣ ccṛab ajdid di tgelda n Ṛebbi .
41014026	Mi cnan isefra n ? abur , ulin ɣer yiɣil n uzemmur .
41014027	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : A kkun-yewwet akk wugur akken yețwakteb : Ad ewwteɣ ameksa , ulli ad rewlent ɣer mkul lǧiha .
41014028	Yerna-yasen-d : Meɛna m'ara d-ḥyuɣ si ger lmegtin a wen-zwireɣ ɣer tmurt n Jlili .
41014029	Buṭrus yenna-yas : ? as ad ccḍen akk , nekkini ur țeccḍeɣ ara .
41014030	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : A k-d-iniɣ tideț : iḍ-agi uqbel ad yeskkuɛ uyaziḍ snat n tikkal , kečč a i-tnekṛeḍ tlata iberdan .
41014031	Meɛna Buṭrus yenna-yas daɣen : Ad qebleɣ ad dduɣ yid-ek ula ɣer lmut wala a k-nekkṛeɣ . Inelmaden nniḍen nnan-d meṛṛa akken .
41014032	Mi wwḍen ɣer tmazirt n Jitsimani , Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen i inelmaden-is : Qqimet dagi , ma d nekk ad ṛuḥeɣ ad ẓalleɣ .
41014033	Yewwi yid-es Buṭrus , Yeɛqub akk-d Yuḥenna . Yetḥeyyeṛ , tekcem-it tugdi .
41014034	Yenna-yasen : ? usseɣ s leḥzen n lmut ; qqimet dagi , ɛiwzet !
41014035	Issebɛed iman-is fell-asen , iḍeggeṛ iman-is ɣer lqaɛa , yedɛa ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ma yella wamek ara yessebɛed fell-as taswiɛt-nni n leɛtab .
41014036	Yeqqaṛ-as : A baba , a baba Ṛebbi ! Kečč tzemreḍ i kullec ; ssebɛed fell-i lkas-agi n leɛtab . Lameɛna d lebɣi-k kan ara yedṛun mačči d lebɣi-w .
41014037	Yuɣal-ed ɣer inelmaden-is , yufa-ten-id ṭṭsen . Yenna i Buṭrus : A Semɛun , teṭṭseḍ ? Ur tezmireḍ ara aț-țɛiwzeḍ ula d ssaɛa ?
41014038	Ɛiwzet tẓallem , iwakken ur tɣellim ara deg ujeṛṛeb . Ṛṛuḥ yeǧhed yerna yebɣa , meɛna lǧețța ur tezmir ara , tulwa .
41014039	Issebɛed iman-is daɣen , iɛawed i tẓallit-nni .
41014040	Mi d-yuɣal yufa-ten daɣen ṭsen , iɣleb-iten nuddam . Ur ẓrin d acu ara s-d-erren .
41014041	Yuɣal-ed tikkelt tis tlata yenna yasen : Mazal-ikkun teṭṭsem , testeɛfam ! Dayen tura , tewweḍ-ed teswiɛt-nni ! Mmi-s n bunadem ițusellem ger ifassen n imednuben .
41014042	Kkret fell awen a nṛuḥet ! Win i yi-izzenzen yewweḍ-ed .
41014043	Mazal-it iheddeṛ , mi d-yewweḍ Yudas , yiwen si tnac-nni . Ddan-d yid-es aṭas n lɣaci s iɛekkzan d ijenwiyen , ceggɛen-ten-id lɛulama n ccariɛa , imeqqranen n lmuqedmin akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud .
41014044	Win akken i gzenzen Sidna Ɛisa yemsefham yid-sen , yenna-yasen : Win i ɣef ara selmeɣ , d nețța ; ṭṭfet-eț tefkem-t i iɛessasen a t-awin .
41014045	Akken kan i d-yewweḍ , iqeṛṛeb ed ɣer Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : A Sidi ! Dɣa isellem fell-as .
41014046	Imiren lɣaci mmɣen ɣef Sidna Ɛisa , ṭṭfen-t .
41014047	Yiwen seg wid yellan dinna ijbed-ed ajenwi , yewwet aqeddac n lmuqeddem ameqqran , igzem-as ameẓẓuɣ .
41014048	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Teffɣem-d ɣuṛ-i s ijenwiyen d iɛekzan am akken d amcum i lliɣ ?
41014049	Mkul ass lliɣ yid-wen sselmadeɣ di lǧameɛ , yiwen ur yessers afus-is fell-i . Meɛna ayagi yedṛa-d , iwakken ad nnekmalent tira iqedsen .
41014050	Imiren ǧǧan-t akk inelmaden-is , rewlen .
41014051	Yiwen ilemẓi yelsan anagar timelḥe itbeɛ-it . Emmɣen fell-as a t-ṭṭfen ,
41014052	meɛna iserreḥ i tmelḥeft-nni , yerwel akken d aɛeryan .
41014053	Wwin Sidna Ɛisa ɣer wexxam n lmuqeddem ameqqran , anda nnejmaɛen imeqqranen n lmuqedmin , lɛulama n ccariɛa akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud .
41014054	Buṭrus itbeɛ-it s lebɛid , armi d azniq n wexxam n lmuqeddem ameqqran . Yeqqim ger iɛessasen , yesseḥmuy ɣer tmes .
41014055	Lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d tejmaɛt n ccṛeɛ , țnadin cchada iṣṣeḥan s wacu ara ḥekmen fell-as s lmut , lameɛna ur ufin ara .
41014056	Aṭas i gcehden fell-as s ẓẓur , lameɛna cchadat-nsen ur ṣṣeḥant ara .
41014057	Kra deg-sen kkren-d ad cehden fell-as s ẓẓur , nnan :
41014058	Nesla-yas mi d-yenna : « ad huddeɣ lǧameɛ-agi iqedsen yebnan s ufus n wemdan ; di tlata wussan , ad bnuɣ wayeḍ ur nețwabennuy ara s ufus n wemdan . »
41014059	Lameɛna ula ɣef wayagi cchadat nsen ur ṣṣeḥant ara .
41014060	Lmuqeddem ameqqran ibedd di tlemmast n tejmaɛt , yesteqsa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ur d-tețțaraḍ ara awal ? Acu akka i d-qqaṛen yemdanen-agi i d-icehden fell-ak ?
41014061	Sidna Ɛisa yessusem ur d-yerri acemma . Ameqqran n lmuqedmin iɛawed isteqsa-t yenna-yas : Kečč , d Lmasiḥ Mmi-s n Ṛebbi yețțubarken ?
41014062	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : ? - țideț , d nekk ! Yerna aț-țeẓrem Mmi-s n bunadem yeqqim ɣer tama tayeffust n Bab n tezmert ; a t-twalim asmi ara d-yas seg igenwan ɣef wusigna .
41014063	Lmuqeddem ameqqran icerreg aqenduṛ-is yenna : Ur nuḥwaǧ ara inigan nniḍen !
41014064	Teslam akken yekfeṛ ? D acu twalam ? ? ekmen fell-as s lmut akken ma llan .
41014065	Kra seg-sen ssusufen-t , țɣummun-as udem-is , kkaten-t s lbunyat qqaṛen-as : Eɛqel anwa i k-id-yewten ! Iɛessasen-nni wwin-t , kkaten-t s ibeqqayen .
41014066	Buṭrus mazal-it deg ufrag n wexxam n lmuqeddem ameqqran ; ațaya yiwet n tqeddact ,
41014067	twala-t yesseḥmay , tmuqel-it nezzeh , tenna yas : Ula d kečč telliḍ akk-d Ɛisa anaṣari .
41014068	Inkeṛ yenna : Ur ẓriɣ , ur fhimeɣ ayen i d-teqqaṛeḍ . Dɣa yeffeɣ , iṛuḥ ɣer wesqif . Imiren kan yeskkuɛ uyaziḍ .
41014069	Twala-t daɣen tqeddact-nni , tenna i wid yellan dinna : Argaz-agi d yiwen seg-sen ! Yenkeṛ tikkelt tis snat .
41014070	Taswiɛt kan , wid yellan dinna nnan daɣen i Buṭrus : Mbla ccekk ula d kečč telliḍ seg-sen , axaṭer d ajlili i telliḍ .
41014071	Yebda yețgalla yeqqaṛ : A yi-inɛel Ṛebbi ma skaddbeɣ ! Ur ssineɣ ara argaz-agi i ɣef tețmeslayem .
41014072	Imiren kan yeskkuɛ uyaziḍ tikkelt tis snat , imiren Buṭrus yemmekta-d awal i s-d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa : « uqbel ad yeskuɛ uyaziḍ tikkelt tis snat , a yi-tnekkṛeḍ tlata iberdan . » Dɣa yeṭṭerḍeq d imeṭṭawen .
41015001	? ṣbeḥ zik , lmuqedmin imeqqranen ruḥen mcawaṛen akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud , lɛulama n ccariɛa akk dusqamu n ccṛeɛ . Urzen Sidna Ɛisa , wwin-t sellmen-t i Bilaṭus .
41015002	Bilaṭus yesteqsa-t yenna yas : D kečč i d agellid n wat Isṛail ? Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Tenniḍ-t-id .
41015003	Lmuqedmin imeqqranen ccetkan fell-as ɣef waṭas n temsalin .
41015004	Bilaṭus yerna yesteqsa-t : Ur d-tețțaraḍ ara awal ? Ur tesliḍ ara ayen akk s wayes i d-țcetkin fell-ak ?
41015005	Meɛna Sidna Ɛisa ur d-yerri acemma ; Bilaṭus yewhem deg-s .
41015006	Di mkul lɛid , Bilaṭus ițserriḥ-ed i yiwen umeḥbus , win ara s-ssutren lɣaci .
41015007	Yella yiwen umeḥbus isem-is Barabas , yețwaḥbes nețța akk-d imcewwlen nniḍen ɣef ddemma n ccwal i d-yeskker , yerna yenɣa tamgeṛṭ .
41015008	Lɣaci ulin ɣer Bilaṭus iwakken a s-ssutren ayen yennum ixeddem-asen-t .
41015009	Bilaṭus yerra-yasen-d : Tebɣam a wen-d-serrḥeɣ i ugellid n wat Isṛail ?
41015010	Axaṭer ifaq belli s tismin i s-t-id-wwin lmuqedmin imeqqranen .
41015011	Lameɛna lmuqedmin imeqqranen sḥeṛcen lɣaci iwakken ad inin i Bilaṭus : « d Barabas iwumi ara d-tserrḥeḍ . »
41015012	Bilaṭus yenna-yasen daɣen : D acu tebɣam ad xedmeɣ s win iwumi teqqaṛem agellid n wat Isṛail ?
41015013	? ɛeggiḍen-as : ? emmeṛ-it ɣef wumidag !
41015014	Bilaṭus yenna-yasen : D acu i gexdem n diri ? Rnan țɛeggiḍen akteṛ : ? emmeṛ-it ɣef wumidag !
41015015	Imi i gebɣa Bilaṭus ad yeddu di lebɣi i lɣaci , iserreḥ-ed i Barabas , ma d Sidna Ɛisa yefka lameṛ a t-ewten s ujelkkaḍ , syenna a t-semmṛen ɣef wumidag .
41015016	Lɛeskeṛ wwin Sidna Ɛisa ɣer wefrag n lbeṛj , ssawlen-d i terbaɛt nsen .
41015017	Sburren-as abeṛnus azeggaɣ , xedmen-d taɛeṣṣabt s isennanen ssersen-ț ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-is .
41015018	Stehzayen fell-as qqaṛen-as : Azul fell-ak , ay agellid n wat Isṛail !
41015019	Kkaten-t s uɣanim ɣer uqeṛṛuy , ssusufen-t , kerfen tigecrar iwakken ad seǧǧden zdat-es .
41015020	Mi stehzan fell-as , kksen-as abeṛnus-nni azeggaɣ , rran-as lqecc-is , imiren wwin-t ɣer beṛṛa iwakken a t-ṣemmṛen ɣef lluḥ .
41015021	Iɛedda-d syenna yiwen umsebrid i d-yuɣalen si lexla , isem-is Semɛun n Qiṛwan , baba-s n Alexandrus akk-d Rufus ; ḥeṛsen-t lɛeskeṛ iwakken ad ibbib amidag n Sidna Ɛisa .
41015022	? ẓuɣṛen Sidna Ɛisa armi d yiwen n wemkan ițțusemman Gulguṭa , yeɛni « tiɣilt n uqeṛṛuy . »
41015023	Fkan-as ad isew ccṛab ixelḍen s uselɣaɣ n lmuṛ , lameɛna yugi a t-isew .
41015024	Semmṛen-t ɣef lluḥ , gren tasɣaṛt iwakken ad feṛqen llebsa-s .
41015025	Aț-țili d țesɛa n ṣṣbeḥ mi t-ṣemmṛen ɣef wumidag .
41015026	Uran sebba ɣef wacu i t-semmṛen : « Wagi d agellid n wat Isṛail . »
41015027	Semmṛen daɣen sin yemcumen , yiwen ɣer uyeffus-is wayeḍ ɣer uẓelmaḍ-is .
41015028	S wakka , yețwakemmel wayen yuran di tira iqedsen : Seddan-t di lehṣab n yemcumen .
41015029	Kra n wid yețɛeddayen syenna reggmen-t , țhuzzun iqeṛṛay-nsen , qqaṛen-as : Hey ! a win yețhuddun lǧameɛ iqedsen , ibennu-t di tlata wussan ,
41015030	sellek iman-ik ! ers-ed seg umidag-ik !
41015031	Ula d imeqqranen n lmuqedmin d lɛulama n ccariɛa țaḍsan fell-as , qqaṛen gar-asen : Isellek wiyaḍ , ur yezmir ad isellek iman-is .
41015032	A d-iṣubb ihi tura seg umidag , Lmasiḥ . . . Agellid n wat Isṛail ! A nwali iwakken a namen . Ula d wid ițțuṣemmṛen yid-es reggmen-t .
41015033	Aț-țili d leǧwahi n tnac mi d yeɣli ṭṭlam ɣef ddunit meṛṛa , armi d tlata n tmeddit .
41015034	? ef tlata n tmeddit , Sidna Ɛisa iɛeggeḍ s ṣṣut ɛlayen : Eluwa , Eluwa , Lama sabaqtani ? Yeɛni : Illu-iw ! Illu-iw ! acuɣer i yi teǧǧiḍ ?
41015035	Kra seg wid yellan dinna slan-as , nnan : Slet-as , atan yessawal i Sidna Ilyas !
41015036	Yiwen seg-sen iṛuḥ yesselxes-ed ameččim n taḍuṭ di lxell , icudd-it ɣer tɣanimt , imekken-as-t iwakken ad isew , yenna : Aṛǧut a nwali ma yella a d-yas Sidna Ilyas a t-id-iṣṣub seg umidag !
41015037	Meɛna Sidna Ɛisa iɛeggeḍ imiren kan , dɣa yessufeɣ taṛwiḥt .
41015038	Leḥjab n wemkan iqedsen n lǧameɛ , icerreg ɣef sin seg yixef ufella , armi d ixef n wadda .
41015039	Yiwen umeqqran n lɛeskeṛ ibedd zdat Sidna Ɛisa ; mi gwala amek i gessufeɣ taṛwiḥt , yenna : ? - țideț , argaz-agi d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi !
41015040	Kra tilawin țmuqulent si lebɛid . Llant gar-asent Meryem tamagdalit , Meryem yemma-s n Yeɛqub ameẓyan , n Yuses akk-d Salumi .
41015041	Llant daɣen tilawin-nni meṛṛa i t-ittabaɛen , i s-iqeddcen mi gella di tmurt n Jlili akk-d waṭas n tilawin nniḍen i d-yeddan yid-es ɣer temdint n Lquds .
41015042	Mi d-teɣli tmeddit , yewweḍ-ed Yusef n temdint n Arimati , yellan d argaz mucaɛen aṭas di tejmaɛt n ccṛeɛ ; ula d nețța yessaram a d-tass tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi .
41015043	? - țameddit n wass i deg țheggin iman-nsen i wass n westeɛfu , daymi Yusef ur ikukra ara ad iṛuḥ ɣer Bilaṭus iwakken ad issuter lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa .
41015044	Mi gesla s Sidna Ɛisa yemmut , Bilaṭus yewhem . Yessawel i umeqqran n meyya iɛsekṛiwen , isteqsa-t ma yella aṭas aya segmi yemmut .
41015045	Mi s-d-yerra lexbaṛ , Bilaṭus iserreḥ-as i Yusef ad yawi lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa .
41015046	Yusef iṛuḥ yuɣ-ed lekfen , iṣubb-ed lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa , ikfen-it , yewwi-t issers-it deg yiwen uẓekka yeɣzan deg wezṛu am lɣaṛ , imiren yessegrareb azṛu ɣef yimi uẓekka-nni .
41015047	Meryem tamagdalit d Meryem yemma-s n Yeɛqub , țmuqulent iwakken ad ẓren-t anda i t-ssersen .
41016001	Mi gɛedda wass n westeɛfu , Meryem tamagdalit d Meryem yemma-s n Yeɛqub d Salumi uɣent-ed leɛṭeṛ iwakken ad dehnent lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa .
41016002	Ass amezwaru n dduṛt , ṣṣbeḥ zik mi d-yecṛeq yiṭij , ṛuḥent ɣer uẓekka .
41016003	Qqaṛent wway gar-asent : Anwa ara ɣ-yekksen azṛu-nni ɣef yimi uẓekka ?
41016004	Mi refdent allen-nsent , walant azṛu-nni ameqqran yegrareb akkin .
41016005	Kecment ɣer daxel uẓekka , walant yiwen ilemẓi yeqqim ɣer lǧiha tayeffust , yelsa llebsa tamellalt ; dehcent .
41016006	Yenna-yasent : Ur xellɛemt ara ! Tețnadimt ɣef Ɛisa anaṣari win yețwasemmṛen ɣef wumidag ? Ulac-it dagi , yeḥya-d si ger lmegtin . Muqlemt , atan wemkan anda i t-ssersen .
41016007	Ṛuḥemt tura , inimt-asen i inelmaden-is akk-d Buṭrus : atan yezwar ɣer tmurt n Jlili ; dinna ara t-teẓrem akken i wen-t-yenna .
41016008	Ffɣent-ed seg uẓekka-nni , rewlent s tergagit d lxelɛa , iffeɣ-itent leɛqel , daymi ur ɛawdent i yiwen ayen yedṛan .
41016009	Sidna Ɛisa yeḥya-d si ger lmegtin ass amezwaru n dduṛt , ass i d-yernan ɣef wass n westeɛfu . Di tazwara isbeggen-ed iman-is i Meryem tamagdalit , seg i d-issufeɣ sebɛa n leǧnun .
41016010	Wid akk iteddun d Sidna Ɛisa , mazal-iten di leḥzen d imeṭṭawen , mi d-tewwi Meryem lexbaṛ i inelmaden .
41016011	Mi slan yis yeḥya-d si ger lmegtin yerna twala-t , ur ț-uminen ara .
41016012	Yesbeggen-ed iman-is s ṣṣifa nniḍen , i sin seg inelmaden iteddun ɣer lexla .
41016013	Uɣalen-d xebbṛen inelmaden nniḍen , lameɛna ula d nutni ur ten uminen ara .
41016014	Yesbeggen-ed iman-is i ḥdac-nni inelmaden mi llan tețțen . Ilumm-iten ɣef lqella n liman-nsen d wulawen nsen yeqquṛen , imi ur uminen ara wid akk i t-yeẓran yeḥya-d .
41016015	Dɣa yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet beccṛet di ddunit meṛṛa , lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i yemdanen di mkul amkan .
41016016	Win ara yamnen , ara yețwaɣeḍsen , ad ițțusellek ; ma d win ur nețțamen ara , ur yețwasellak ara .
41016017	Atnah lbeṛhanat ara xeddmen wid yețțamnen yis-i : S yisem-iw ad ssufuɣen leǧnun , ad heddṛen timeslayin nniḍen ,
41016018	ɣas ṭṭfen izerman neɣ swan ssem , ur sen-ixeddem acemma ; ad srusun ifassen-nsen ɣef yimuḍan a ten sseḥlun .
41016019	Mi gekfa yid-sen ameslay , Sidna Ɛisa yețwarfed ɣer igenni , yeqqim ɣer uyeffus n Sidi Ṛebbi .
41016020	Inelmaden ṛuḥen ad beccṛen di mkul amkan ; Sidi Ṛebbi yețțili yid sen , yețbeggin-ed s waṭas lbeṛhanat , tideț n wayen țbecciṛen .
42001001	Imi aṭas i gebdan tira ɣef wayen yedṛan gar-aneɣ ,
42001002	akken i ɣ-t-id ɛawden wid yellan d inigan si tazwara , iwalan kullec s wallen-nsen ; uɣalen d iqeddacen n wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi .
42001003	Steqsaɣ ula d nekk akken ilaq ɣef wayen akk yedṛan seg wass amezwaru , ufiɣ d ayen yelhan a k-t-id aruɣ a Tawfilus ,
42001004	iwakken aț-țissineḍ tideț ɣef wayen i tesliḍ meṛṛa .
42001005	Di zzman n Hiṛudus , agellid n tmurt n Yahuda , yella yiwen n lmuqeddem si tejmaɛt n Abya , isem-is Zakarya . Tameṭṭut-is Ilicaba , seg izuṛan n Haṛun .
42001006	D iḥeqqiyen i llan i sin , ḥerzen yerna ḍuɛen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi .
42001007	Ur sɛin ara dderya , meqqṛit i sin di leɛmeṛ yerna Ilicaba ț-țiɛiqeṛt .
42001008	Mi d-tewweḍ nnuba n leqdic n wedrum n Zakarya di lǧameɛ iqedsen
42001009	akken i tella di lɛadda n lmuqedmin , gren tasɣaṛt , tṣaḥ-ed Zakarya iwakken ad ikcem ɣer wemkan iqedsen ad isseṛɣ lebxuṛ .
42001010	Mi gella isseṛɣay lebxuṛ di lǧameɛ , lɣaci meṛṛa yeqqimen di beṛṛa deɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
42001011	Iḍheṛ-as-d yiwen lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi , ibedd ɣer tama tayeffust n udekkan-nni anda sseṛɣayen lebxuṛ .
42001012	Mi t-iwala Zakarya , yedhec ikcem-it lxuf .
42001013	Lmelk-nni yenna yas - ed : Ur țțagad ara a Zakarya , ayen i tessutreḍ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi yețwaqbel . Tameṭṭut-ik Ilicaba ad a k-d-tesɛu aqcic , a s-tsemmiḍ Yeḥya .
42001014	Aț-țfeṛḥeḍ yis , a k-yili d sebba n sseɛd ; imdanen meṛṛa ad feṛḥen s tlalit-is .
42001015	Ad yesɛu ccan d ameqqran ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , a d-iččaṛ d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen si tɛebbuṭ n yemma-s , ur itess ccṛab , ur itess ayen nniḍen isekkṛen .
42001016	A d-yerr aṭas n wat Isṛail ɣer webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi .
42001017	Ad ilḥu s leɛnaya n Sidi Ṛebbi , s ṛṛuḥ ț-țezmert n nnbi Ilyas . Ad issemlil imawlan d warraw-nsen , a d-yerr wid ijehlen ɣer webrid n iḥeqqiyen , akken ad iheggi i Sidi Ṛebbi agdud ara t-iḍuɛen .
42001018	Zakarya yenna i lmelk : Amek ara ɛeqleɣ belli ayen akka i d-tenniḍ ț-țideț ? Nekk d amɣaṛ , ula ț-țameṭṭut-iw meqqṛet di leɛmeṛ !
42001019	Lmelk-nni yerra-yas-d : Nekk d Jebrayil , d aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi ; usiɣ-ed s ɣuṛ-es iwakken a k-d-awiɣ lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ .
42001020	Lameɛna imi ur tumineḍ ara s yimeslayen-iw atan aț-țeggugmeḍ , ur d-ițeffeɣ ara wawal seg yimi-k alamma d asmi ara d-yedṛu wannect-agi . Meɛna ḥṣu belli ayen akka i k-d-nniɣ ad yedṛu deg wass-is .
42001021	Lɣaci-nni yețṛaǧun Zakarya deg ufrag , wehmen acuɣeṛ iɛeṭṭel deg umkan iqedsen n lǧameɛ .
42001022	Mi d-iffeɣ , yeggugem , ur izmir ara a d-yessufeɣ awal ; lɣaci-nni fehmen belli iweḥḥa-yas-ed kra Sidi Ṛebbi . Yebda ițwehhi-yasen-d s ifassen-is , yeqqim d agugam .
42001023	Mi kfan wussan n lxedma-s di lǧameɛ , Zakarya yuɣal ɣer wexxam-is .
42001024	Ɛeddan kra n wussan , tameṭṭut-is Ilicaba terfed tadist ; dɣa tesseḥjeb iman-is xemsa wagguren , teqqaṛ :
42001025	Atan Sidi Ṛebbi yerra-d ddehn-is ɣuṛ-i , ikkes-iyi lɛib zdat yemdanen .
42001026	Aggur wis sețța , Sidi Ṛebbi iceggeɛ-d lmelk Jebrayil ɣer taddart n Naṣaret , di tmurt n Jlili .
42001027	Iceggeɛ-it-id ɣer yiwet n tlemẓit i gexḍeb yiwen wergaz isem-is Yusef , yellan seg izuṛan n Sidna Dawed . Tilemẓit-agi isem-is Meryem .
42001028	Ikcem lmelk ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : Sslam fell-am a tin iburek Sidi Ṛebbi ! Sidi Ṛebbi yella yid-em .
42001029	Meryem tedhec , tenna : D acu i d lmeɛna n imeslayen agi ?
42001030	Lmelk yenna-yas : Ur țțaggad ara a Meryem ! S ṛṛeḥma-s tameqqrant , Sidi Ṛebbi yextaṛ-ikem .
42001031	Atan aț-țrefdeḍ tadist , a d-tesɛuḍ aqcic , semmi-yas Ɛisa , ( yeɛni : « Amsellek » )
42001032	Ad yesɛu ccan d ameqqran , ad ițțusemmi Mmi-s n Sidi Ṛebbi ɛlayen . Sidi Ṛebbi a t-yerr d agellid akken i t-yella Sidna Dawed , yiwen si lejdud-is .
42001033	Ad iḥkem ɣef tarwa n Yeɛqub i dayem , tageldit-is ur tfennu ara .
42001034	Meryem tenna i lmelk-nni : Amek ara d-idṛu yid-i wayagi nekk ur nezwiǧ ara ?
42001035	Lmelk yerra-yas : Atan a d-yers fell-am Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ; tazmert n Sidi Ṛebbi ɛlayen a kem-tɣumm am tili , daymi aqcic-agi imqeddes ara d-ilalen ad ițțsemmi « Mmi-s n Ṛebbi » .
42001036	Ilicaba i m-ițțilin , ula d nețțat ațan s tadist a d-tesɛu aqcic ɣas akken meqqṛet di leɛmeṛ . Tin akken iwumi semman tiɛiqeṛt , ațan deg waggur wis sețța ,
42001037	imi ulac wayen iwumi ur izmir Sidi Ṛebbi .
42001038	Meryem tenna : Aql-i ț-țaqeddact n Sidi Ṛebbi , ad idṛu yid-i wayen i d-tenniḍ . Imiren Lmelk-nni yeǧǧa-ț , iṛuḥ .
42001039	Deg wussan-nni , Meryem tekker tṛuḥ s lemɣawla ɣer yiwet n taddart yellan deg idurar n tmurt n Yahuda .
42001040	Tekcem ɣer wexxam n Zakarya , tsellem ɣef Ilicaba .
42001041	Akken i tesla Ilicaba i sslam n Meryem , yefrawes llufan yellan di tɛebbuṭ-is ; imiren teččuṛ d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ,
42001042	tɛeggeḍ tenna : A Meryem , tețțubarkeḍ ger tilawin meṛṛa , ițțubarek daɣen win yellan di tɛebbuṭ-im .
42001043	D acu-yi , iwakken a d-terzef ɣuṛ-i yemma-s n Ssid-iw ?
42001044	Akken kan i sliɣ i sslam-im , llufan yellan di tɛebbuṭ-iw yefrawes s lfeṛḥ .
42001045	? - țaseɛdit kemm yumnen s wayen i m-d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi !
42001046	Meryem tenna : Taṛwiḥt-iw teḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi ,
42001047	ul-iw yeččuṛ d lfeṛḥ imi d nețța i d amsellek-iw ,
42001048	axaṭer iwala-yi-d nekk taqeddact-is tameɣbunt ur nesɛi azal . Sya d asawen si lǧil ɣer lǧil a yi-qqaṛen : « ț-țaseɛdit » ,
42001049	imi Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert , yexdem yis-i ayen issewhamen . Isem-is d imqeddes .
42001050	Ṛṛeḥma-s tețdum si lǧil ɣer lǧil ɣef wid akk i t-iḍuɛen .
42001051	Isken-ed tazmert n yiɣil-is , isseɛṛeq iberdan i wid yețzuxxun ;
42001052	yessers-ed imeqqranen seg imukan eɛlayen , yerfed wid yețwaḥeqṛen ;
42001053	yesseṛwa-yasen leṛẓaq i wid yelluẓen , ma d imeṛkantiyen yerra-ten ifassen d ilmawen .
42001054	Isellek tarwa n wat Isṛail yellan d iqeddacen-is , ur ițțu ara Ṛṛeḥma-s ,
42001055	i gewɛed i Sidna Ibṛahim d warraw-is i dayem akken i t-yenna i lejdud-nneɣ .
42001056	Meryem teqqim ɣer Ilicaba azal n tlata wagguren d wamek i tuɣal ɣer taddart-is .
42001057	Yewweḍ-ed lweqt i deg ara d-tarew Ilicaba , tesɛa-d aqcic .
42001058	Imawlan-is d lǧiran-is feṛḥen aṭas mi slan s ṛṛehma i d-issers fell-as Sidi Ṛebbi .
42001059	Mi wwḍen tmanya n wussan ɣef weqcic-nni , usan-d a s-sḍehṛen , bɣan a s-semmin s yisem n baba-s : Zakarya .
42001060	Dɣa tenṭeq-ed yemma-s tenna-yasen : Xaṭi ! A s-nsemmi Yeḥya !
42001061	Nnan-as : Ula d yiwen deg wedrum-nwen ur yesɛi isem-agi .
42001062	Steqsan baba-s s uwehhi amek yebɣa ad isemmi i mmi-s .
42001063	Issuter asen-d talwiḥt , yura-yasen-d deg-s : « Yeḥya i d isem-is » . Dɣa wehmen meṛṛa .
42001064	Imiren kan iserreḥ yiles-is , yebda iheddeṛ , yețḥemmid Ṛebbi ițcekkiṛ-it .
42001065	Imezdaɣ n lǧiha-nni meṛṛa wehmen , tɛeǧǧben . Deg idurar n tmurt n Yahuda țmeslayen akk ɣef wayen yedṛan .
42001066	Wid akk yeslan imeslayen-nni , ḥerzen-ten deg wulawen-nsen , qqaṛen : d acu ara d-iffeɣ weqcic-agi ? Axaṭer s tideț afus n Sidi Ṛebbi yella fell-as .
42001067	Zakarya , baba-s n weqcic-nni , iččuṛ d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , icar-ed s imeslayen-agi :
42001068	Ad ițțubarek Sidi Ṛebbi , Illu n wat Isṛail imi d-yerra ddehn-is ɣer wegdud-is iwakken a t-isellek .
42001069	Yefka-yaɣ-d yiwen wemsellek d ameqqran seg izuṛan n Sidna Dawed aqeddac-is ,
42001070	am akken i t-id-ixebbeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi si zzman iɛeddan , seg yimi n lenbiya iqedsen :
42001071	Ad yili d amsellek ara ɣ-imenɛen seg yiɛdawen-nneɣ , si ger ifassen n wid akk i ɣ-ikeṛhen .
42001072	Isbeggen ṛṛeḥma-s i lejdud-nneɣ , yemmekta-d lemɛahda-s iqedsen
42001073	i gefka i jeddi-tneɣ Sidna Ibṛahim .
42001074	M'ara nețțusellek seg ufus n yeɛdawen-nneɣ , a neɛbed Sidi Ṛebbi mbla lxuf ,
42001075	s lḥeqq , s ṭṭaɛa d wannuz deg wussan n ddunit-nneɣ meṛṛa .
42001076	Ma d kečč a mmi , aț-țețțusemmiḍ d nnbi n Sidi Ṛebbi eɛlayen axaṭer aț-țedduḍ zdat-es iwakken aț-țheggiḍ iberdan-is ,
42001077	aț-țesfehmeḍ agdud-is ɣef leslak n Sidi Ṛebbi s leɛfu n ddnubat-nsen .
42001078	Axaṭer Ṛebbi-nneɣ d aḥnin , s Ṛṛeḥma-ines a d-icṛeq fell-aɣ tafat-is am tin n yiṭij seg yigenwan .
42001079	Tafat-is a d-tecṛeq ɣef wid yellan di ṭṭlam n lmut , ad aɣ-yawi deg webrid n lehna .
42001080	Aqcic-nni ițțimɣuṛ yețnerni di leɛqel . Iɛac deg unezṛuf armi d ass i deg i d-ibeggen iman-is i wat Isṛail .
42002001	Deg ussan-nni , yeffeɣ-ed yiwen n lqanun s ɣuṛ Qayṣeṛ ameqqran ; yefka lameṛ ad țțujerrden imezdaɣ meṛṛa yellan di tmura-ines .
42002002	Ajerred-agi amezwaru yedṛa asmi yella Kirinyus d lḥakem n tmurt n Surya .
42002003	Imdanen meṛṛa ṛuḥen ad țțujerden mkul yiwen di taddart n lejdud-is .
42002004	Yusef yellan seg izuṛan n Sidna Dawed , yuli ula d nețța si taddart n Naṣaret n tmurt n Jlili ɣer Bitelḥem , taddart n lejdud-is yellan di tmurt n Yahuda .
42002005	Iṛuḥ ad ițțujerred nețța ț-țxedibt-is Meryem yellan s tadist .
42002006	Mi ten-yuɣ lḥal dinna , yewweḍ-d lweqt i deg ara terbu ( tarew ) Meryem .
42002007	Tesɛa-d mmi-s amenzu , tețțel-it , tessegen-it di lmedwed , imi ur ufin ara amkan deg wexxam n yemsafren .
42002008	Di tmurt-nni , llan imeksawen ițnusun di lexlawi , țɛassan lmal-nsen deg yiḍ .
42002009	Ataya lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi iḍheṛ-asen-d , tamanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi tecceɛceɛ tezzi-yasen-d , ikcem-iten lxuf d ameqqran .
42002010	Lmelk yenna-yasen : Ur țțagadet ! Aql-i wwiɣ-awen-d lexbaṛ lxiṛ ara isfeṛḥen wugdud meṛṛa .
42002011	Ass-agi di taddart n Sidna Dawed , ilul-awen-d yiwen wemsellek , d nețța i d Lmasiḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi !
42002012	Atan wamek ara t-tɛeqlem : aț-țafem llufan yețțel , yeṭṭes di lmedwed .
42002013	Imiren kan , ț-țirebbaɛ n lmalayekkat i d-yernan ɣer lmelk nni , cennunt țḥemmident Sidi Ṛebbi , qqaṛent :
42002014	Lḥemd i Sidi Ṛebbi deg imukan eɛlayen , lehna di ddunit ɣef yemdanen eɛzizen fell-as .
42002015	Akken uɣalent lmalayekkat-nni ɣer yigenni , imeksawen nnan wway gar-asen : Kkret a nṛuḥet ɣer Bitelḥem , a nẓer ayen i gedṛan , d wayen akka s wayes i ɣ-d-ixebbeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
42002016	Imiren kan ṛuḥen , ufan dinna Meryem d Yusef akk-d llufan-nni yeṭṭes di lmedwed .
42002017	Mi walan aqcic-nni , ḥkan-d wayen i sen-d-yenna lmelk fell-as .
42002018	Wid akk yeslan s wayen i d-ḥkan imeksawen-nni , dehcen .
42002019	Meryem teḥrez imeslayen-nni deg wul-is , tețxemmim fell-asen .
42002020	Mi uɣalen imeksawen-nni , țḥemmiden țcekkiṛen Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wayen slan d wayen ẓran , imi ufan kullec akken i sen-d-ițțuxebbeṛ .
42002021	Yewweḍ-ed wass wis tmanya i deg ara s-sḍehṛen i weqcic-nni ; semman-as Ɛisa , isem-nni i s-yefka lmelk uqbel ad yili di tɛebbuṭ n yemma-s .
42002022	Asmi wwḍen ṛebɛin wussan ɣef tlalit n weqcic-nni , Yusef d Meryem wwin-t ɣer temdint n Lquds iwakken ad ițțuqeddem i Sidi Ṛebbi ,
42002023	akken yura di ccariɛa n Sidna Musa : yal aqcic amenzu , ilaq ad ițțuqeddem i Sidi Ṛebbi .
42002024	Yerna ṛuḥen iwakken ad fken d asfel snat n tmilliwin neɣ sin yetbiren imeẓyanen akken yella di ccariɛa n Sidna Musa .
42002025	Di temdint n Lquds yella yiwen wergaz isem-is Semɛun . Argaz-agi d aḥeqqi , iḍuɛ Sidi Ṛebbi , yețṛaǧu amsellek n wat Isṛail , Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yețțili yid-es .
42002026	Iweḥḥa-yas-ed belli ur ițmețțat ara alamma yeẓra Lmasiḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi .
42002027	Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi iwelleh Semɛun ad iṛuḥ ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen . Atnaya kecmen-d Yusef d Meryem , wwin-d llufan-nni iwakken ad xedmen wayen i d-tenna ccariɛa n Musa fell-as .
42002028	Semɛun yeṭṭef aqcic-nni ger ifassen-is , iḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi yenna :
42002029	Tura a Sidi Ṛebbi ɣas ad mmteɣ aql-i di lehna imi amsellek i ɣ-tweɛdeḍ ,
42002030	yewweḍ-ed yerna walaɣ-t s wallen-iw :
42002031	win akken i theggaḍ i leǧnas meṛṛa ,
42002032	d nețța ara yessalin ccan n wat Isṛail agdud-ik , ara yilin ț-țafat ara d-icceɛceɛen ula ɣef leǧnas nniḍen .
42002033	Baba-s d yemma-s n weqcic-nni tɛeǧǧben ɣef wayen i d-qqaṛen fell-as .
42002034	Semɛun iburek-iten , yenna i Meryem , yemma-s n weqcic-nni : Atan weqcic-agi ad yili i kra seg wat Isṛail d sebba n tuccḍa , ma d wiyaḍ a ten-id-yerr ɣer webrid . ? ef ddemma-s ara yili lxilaf ger yemdanen ;
42002035	s wakka ara d-banen ixemmimen n diri deg wulawen , ma d kemm aț-țejreḥ tasa-m , am akken tețwet s ujenwi .
42002036	Tella daɣen yiwet n tmeṭṭut isem-is ? anna , meqqṛet di leɛmeṛ , ula d nețțat si lenbiya , d yelli-s n Fanwil n wedrum n Azir . Seg wasmi i tedda ț-țislit , tɛac d wergaz is sebɛa n yiseggasen
42002037	dɣa teǧǧel . Di leɛmeṛ-is ṛebɛa utmanyin n yiseggasen . Am yiḍ am ass ur teṭṭixiṛ si lǧameɛ iqedsen , tɛebbed Sidi Ṛebbi , tețțuẓum , tețẓalla .
42002038	Ula d nețțat tewweḍ-ed di teswiɛt-nni , teḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi , theddeṛ ɣef weqcic-nni i wid akk yețṛaǧun leslak n temdint n Lquds .
42002039	Mi fukken imawlan n Ɛisa ayen akk i d-tenna ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi , uɣalen ɣer taddart-nsen Naṣaret yellan di tmurt n Jlili .
42002040	Aqcic-nni yețțimɣuṛ yețnerni di tmusni , lbaṛaka n Sidi Ṛebbi tella fell-as .
42002041	Imawlan n Sidna Ɛisa țṛuḥun mkul aseggas ɣer temdint n Lquds iwakken ad sɛeddin Tafaska n izimer n leslak .
42002042	Asmi yesɛa Ɛisa tnac yiseggasen , yedda akk-d imawlan-is ɣer temdint n Lquds , akken tella di lɛadda n lɛid .
42002043	Mi tɛedda Tafaska , lɣaci țțuɣalen ɣer yexxamen-nsen , ma d Ɛisa yeqqim di temdint Lquds , imawlan-is ur d-wwin ara s lexbaṛ ,
42002044	ɣilen yedda-d ț-țerbaɛt nniḍen . Lḥan ass kamel dɣa bdan țqelliben fell-as . Steqsan wid akk i sen-yețțilin d wid meṛṛa ssnen ,
42002045	lameɛna ur t-ufin ara . Uɣalen ɣer temdint n Lquds iwakken ad qellben fell-as .
42002046	Ass wis tlata , ufan-t di lǧameɛ iqedsen yeqqim ger lecyux , ismeḥsis asen , isteqsay-iten .
42002047	Wid akk i s isellen wehmen di lefhama-s d wayen i d-ițarra i yesteqsiyen-nsen .
42002048	Mi t-walan imawlan-is , qqimen wehmen , dɣa tenna-yas yemma-s : A mmi , acuɣeṛ i ɣ-txedmeḍ akka ? Nekk d baba-k neṛwa aḥebbeṛ , acḥal i nqelleb fell-ak !
42002049	Nețța yenna-yasen : Acuɣeṛ i tețqellibem fell-i ? Eɛni ur teẓrim ara ilaq-iyi ad xedmeɣ lecɣal n baba ?
42002050	Lameɛna nutni ur fhimen ara ayen i sen-d-yenna .
42002051	Ɛisa yedda d imawlan-is ɣer temdint n Naṣaret , yețțaɣ-asen awal . Yemma-s teḥrez annect-agi meṛṛa deg wul-is .
42002052	Ɛisa ițțimɣuṛ , yetɛeqqil ; eɛziz ɣer Ṛebbi , eɛziz ɣer yemdanen .
42003001	Deg wuseggas wis xemseṭṭac n tgeldit n Qayṣer Tibeṛyus , llan ṛebɛa lḥekkam di tmurt n Falisṭin . Bunṭus Bilaṭus d lḥakem n tmurt n Yahuda , Hiṛudus Antifas yeḥkem ɣef tmurt n Jlili , Filbas gma-s n Hiṛudus , ɣef tmura n Iturya akk-d Tṛaxunit , ma d Lisanyas yeḥkem ɣef tmurt n Abilan .
42003002	Di lweqt-nni , ? ennan akk-d Qayif llan d lmuqedmin imeqqranen . Awal n Sidi Ṛebbi ițwaxebbeṛ-as-ed i Yeḥya , mmi-s n Zakarya , deg unezṛuf .
42003003	Iṛuḥ ițnadi timura i d-izzin i wasif n Urdun , yețberriḥ yeqqaṛ : Beddlet tikli , uɣalet-ed ɣer webrid , aset-ed aț-țețwaɣeḍsem iwakken Sidi Ṛebbi a wen-isemmeḥ ddnubat-nwen !
42003004	Akken i d-ițțuxebeṛ di tektabt n nnbi Iceɛya : ? - țaɣect n win ițɛeggiḍen deg wunezṛuf : Heggit abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi , ssemsawit iberdan-is !
42003005	Iɣezṛan , idurar ț-țɣaltin ad uɣalen d izuɣaṛ ! Iberdan iɛewjen ad țțuseggmen , wid ixesṛen ad qeɛden .
42003006	Imdanen meṛṛa ad ẓren leslak n Sidi Ṛebbi .
42003007	Yeḥya yeqqaṛ i lɣaci i d-ițțasen iwakken ad țwaɣeḍsen deg waman : A ccetla n yizerman , anwa i kkun-isfaqen belli tzemrem aț - țrewlem i lɛiqab i d-iteddun ?
42003008	Deg wayen akk txeddmem , sbeggnet-ed belli ṣfan wulawen nwen ! Ur qqaṛet ara kan deg yiman-nwen : jeddi-tneɣ d Sidna Ibṛahim , axaṭer a wen-iniɣ : seg idɣaɣen-agi , Sidi Ṛebbi yezmer a d-issufeɣ dderya i Ibṛahim .
42003009	Ațan ihi tcaquṛt thegga ɣer izuṛan n ttjuṛ , yal ttejṛa ur d-nețțak ara lfakya lɛali , aț-țețwagzem , aț-țețwaḍeggeṛ ɣer tmes .
42003010	Lɣaci steqsan-t nnan-as : D acu i ɣ-ilaqen a t-nexdem ihi ?
42003011	Yerra-yasen : Win yesɛan sin iqendyaṛ ad ye yiwen i win ur nesɛi ara ; win yesɛan ayen ara yečč , ad ye i win ur nesɛi ara .
42003012	Usan-d ula d imekkasen itețțen ayla n medden iwakken ad țwaɣeḍsen deg wasif , nnan-as : A Sidi , i nukkni yellan d imekkasen n tebzert ( leɣṛama ) d acu ara nexdem ?
42003013	Yenna-yasen : Ur țnadit ara sennig wayen i d-yenna lqanun .
42003014	Iɛeskṛiwen daɣen steqsan-t : I nukkni , d acu ara nexdem ? Yerra-yasen : Ur xeddmet ara lbaṭel , ur țțaṭṭafet ara tajɛelt , setqenɛet kan s lexlaṣ nwen .
42003015	Yuɣ lḥal lɣaci meṛṛa llan țṛaǧun qqaṛen deg ulawen-nsen : Ahat d nețța i d Lmasiḥ !
42003016	Yeḥya yenna-yasen : Nekk sseɣḍaseɣ-kkun deg waman , meɛna a d-yas win yesɛan tazmert akteṛ-iw ; ur uklaleɣ ara ad fsiɣ ula d lexyuḍ n warkasen-is . Nețța a kkun-isseɣḍes s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ț-țmes .
42003017	Yeṭṭef tazzart deg wufus-is , ad yessizdeg tirect deg wennar-is , a d-ijmeɛ irden ɣer yikufan , ma d alim a t-isseṛɣ di tmes ur nxețți .
42003018	Yeḥya ițbecciṛ i lɣaci lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , inehhu-ten s waṭas n yimeslayen nniḍen .
42003019	Yesseḍlem ula d agellid Hiṛudus , yeqqaṛ-as : mačči d lḥeqq fell-ak aț-țaɣeḍ Hiṛudyad tameṭṭut n gma-k ! Ilumm-it daɣen ɣef lecɣal nniḍen n diri i gxeddem .
42003020	Hiṛudus ikemmel di txeṣṣarin-is , yessekcem Yeḥya ɣer lḥebs !
42003021	Mi țwaɣeḍsen lɣaci deg waman , Sidna Ɛisa yețwaɣḍes ula d nețța . Akken i gdeɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , igenni yeldi-d ,
42003022	Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yers-ed fell-as s ṣṣifa icuban titbirt . Yiwet n taɣect tekka-d seg yigenni tenna-d : Kečč , d mmi eɛzizen , deg-k i gella lfeṛḥ-iw .
42003023	Mi gebda Sidna Ɛisa aselmed , ad yili yesɛa tlatin iseggasen di leɛmeṛ-is . ? er yemdanen yella : d mmi-s n Yusef atnan lejdud-is : Heli ,
42003024	Matta , Lewwi , Melki , Yennay , Yusef ,
42003025	Matatya , Ɛamus , Naḥun , ? esli , Naggay ,
42003026	Maḥat , Matatya , Camɛi , Yusef , Yuda ,
42003027	Yuḥanan , Rica , Zurubabil , Calatyel , Niri ,
42003028	Melki , Addi , Qusam , Elmudan , Ɛir ,
42003029	Yusa , Elyazer , Yurim , Matta , Lewwi ,
42003030	Semɛun , Yahuda , Yusef , Yuna , Elyaqim ,
42003031	Melya , Menna , Mattata , Natan , Dawed ,
42003032	Yassa , Ɛubed , Buɛaz , Salmun , Naḥsun ,
42003033	Ɛaminadab , Admin , Aram , ? esṛun , Fares , Yahuda ,
42003034	Yeɛqub , Isḥaq , Ibṛahim , Teraḥ , Naḥur ,
42003035	Saruǧ , Raɛu , Faleǧ , Ɛaber , Salaḥ ,
42003036	Kenan , Arfaksad , Cam , Nuḥ , Lamek ,
42003037	Matusalaḥ , ? anux , Yared , Mahalalyel , Kenam ,
42003038	Inuc , Cit , Adem illan d mmi-s n Ṛebbi .
42004001	Mi d-yuɣal Sidna Ɛisa seg wasif n Urdun , Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yewwi-t ɣer unezṛuf .
42004002	Ṛebɛin wussan ur yečči , Cciṭan yețjeṛṛib deg-s . Mi ɛeddan wussan-nni , yuɣal illuẓ .
42004003	Cciṭan yenna-yas : Ma d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i telliḍ , ini-yas i wedɣaɣ-agi a d-yuɣal d aɣṛum .
42004004	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yura di tektabt iqedsen : amdan ur yețɛic ara s weɣṛum kan meɛna s mkul awal i d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
42004005	Yuɣal Cciṭan yewwi-t ɣer yiwen wemkan eɛlayen , deg yiwet n teswiɛt yesken-as-ed akk tigeldiwin n ddunit ,
42004006	yenna-yas : Ad a k-d-fkeɣ lḥekma d ccan n ddewlat-agi meṛṛa , axaṭer țțunefkent iyi-d . Zemreɣ a tent-fkeɣ i win i yi-ihwan ;
42004007	ma tseǧǧdeḍ zdat-i ad uɣalent akk d ayla-k .
42004008	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yura : Anagar Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-inek ara tɛebdeḍ , i nețța kan iwumi ara tseǧǧdeḍ .
42004009	Cciṭan yewwi-t daɣen ɣer temdint n Lquds , yessers-it ɣef yixef n lǧameɛ iqedsen , yenna-yas : Ma d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i telliḍ , ḍeggeṛ iman-ik d akessar ,
42004010	axaṭer yura : Ad ye lameṛ i lmalayekkat-is iwakken ad ḥarbent fell-ak ,
42004011	yerna a k-awint ger ifassen-nsent , ad ḥadrent iḍaṛṛen-ik ɣef wedɣaɣ .
42004012	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yura daɣen : Ur țjeṛṛib ara Sidi Ṛebbi , Illu-inek .
42004013	Mi i t-ijeṛṛeb s waṭas n tḥila ur s-yufi ara abrid , Iblis yeṭṭaxeṛ fell-as alamma ț-țikkelt nniḍen .
42004014	Sidna Ɛisa yuɣal ɣer tmurt n Jlili yeččuṛ ț-țazmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , slan yis di mkul tama n tmurt-agi .
42004015	Ikeččem ɣer leǧwameɛ n wat Isṛail yesselmad , imdanen meṛṛa țcekkiṛen-t .
42004016	Iṛuḥ ɣer taddart n Naṣaret anda yețțuṛebba ; akken innum , ikcem ɣer lǧameɛ deg wass n westeɛfu .
42004017	Mi gekker a d-iɣeṛ , fkan-as-d taktabt n nnbi Iceɛya , yeldi-ț , yufa amkan anda yura :
42004018	Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi yers-ed fell-i , axaṭer yextaṛ-iyi iwakken ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i yimeɣban , ad beccṛeɣ i yimeḥbas tilelli , iwakken a d-rreɣ iẓri i yiderɣalen , a d kkseɣ lḥif ɣef wid ițwaḍelmen ,
42004019	ad beccṛeɣ ɣef wuseggas i deg ara d-issers Sidi Ṛebbi ṛṛeḥma ines .
42004020	Ijmeɛ taktabt-nni , yerra-ț i uqeddac , imiren yeqqim . Wid akk yellan di lǧameɛ ččan-t s wallen .
42004021	Dɣa yenna-yasen : Ayen i wen-d-ɣṛiɣ akka , atan yedṛa-d gar-awen ass-agi !
42004022	Wehmen atas , tɛeǧǧben deg yimeslayen i d-ițeffɣen seg yimi-s , qqaṛen : Amek ? Mačči d mmi-s n Yusef wagi ?
42004023	Dɣa yenna-yasen : ? riɣ belli a yi-d-tinim lemtel-agi : « A ṭṭbib sseḥlu iman-ik , » neɣ « xdem dagi di tmurt-ik ayen i nesla txedmeḍ-t di temdint n Kafernaḥum . »
42004024	Yenna-yasen daɣen : S tideț a wen-iniɣ : ulac nnbi yețwaqeblen di tmurt-is .
42004025	A wen-iniɣ tideț : Di zzman n nnbi Ilyas , tlata yiseggasen d wezgen ur d-tewwit lehwa dɣa yeɣli-d laẓ d ameqqran ɣef tmurt meṛṛa . Deg wussan-nni , aṭas n tuǧǧal i gellan di tmurt n wat Isṛail .
42004026	? as akken , Sidi Ṛebbi ur iceggeɛ ara nnbi Ilyas ɣer yiwet deg-sent , anagar ɣ er yiwet n taǧǧalt yellan di taddart n ? urfat di tmurt n Sidun .
42004027	Llan daɣen aṭas n wid ihelken lbeṛs di tmurt n wat Isṛail di zzman n nnbi Ilyaceɛ , meɛna ula d yiwen deg-sen ur iḥli anagar Neɛman n tmurt n Surya .
42004028	Mi slan imeslayen-agi , lɣaci meṛṛa yellan di lǧameɛ yenɣa-ten lɣecc .
42004029	Kkren ɣuṛ-es , ssufɣen-t si taddart , ssawḍen-t armi d ixef n wedrar i ɣef tebna taddart-nsen iwakken a t-ssegrirben d akessar ;
42004030	lameɛna nețța iɛedda gar-asen , iṛuḥ .
42004031	Sidna Ɛisa iṣubb ɣer tamdint n Kafernaḥum , illan n at Jlili , anda yesselmad lɣaci deg wass n westeɛfu .
42004032	Imdanen wehmen aṭas deg wuselmed-ines axaṭer imeslayen-is sɛan tissas .
42004033	Di lǧameɛ , yella yiwen wergaz izdeɣ-it uṛuḥani , iɛeggeḍ s lǧehd n taɣect-is :
42004034	D acu i tebɣiḍ ɣuṛ-nneɣ a Ɛisa Anaṣari ? Tusiḍ-ed iwakken ad aɣ tesnegreḍ ? ? riɣ d acu-k , kečč d Imqeddes n Ṛebbi !
42004035	Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : Ssusem ! Effeɣ seg wergaz-agi ! Aṛuḥani iḍeggeṛ argaz-nni ɣer lqaɛa di tlemmast-nsen , dɣa iffeɣ seg-s mbla ma iḍuṛṛ-it .
42004036	Lɣaci ikcem-iten akk lxuf , qqaṛen wway gar-asen : D acu-ten yimeslayen-agi ? Yesɛa tazmert s wayes iḥekkem ula ɣef leǧnun ! Akken kan ara sen-ye lameṛ ad ffɣen !
42004037	Di yal tama n tmurt slan s lexbaṛ n Sidna Ɛisa .
42004038	Iffeɣ-ed si lǧameɛ , yerra ɣer wexxam n Semɛun . Yuɣ lḥal taḍeggalt n Semɛun tuɣ-iț tawla ț-țameqqrant , ḥellelen Sidna Ɛisa iwakken a ț-yesseḥlu .
42004039	Yekna ɣuṛ-es , yumeṛ i tawla aț-țeffeɣ seg-s , dɣa teffeɣ-iț ; imiren kan tekker teqdec-asen-d .
42004040	Tameddit mi geɣli yiṭij , kra n win yesɛan amuḍin n mkul aṭan , yewwi-yas-t-id . Mkul win i ɣef yessers afus-is yeḥla ! Yesseḥla-ten meṛṛa !
42004041	Llan daɣen leǧnun i d-ițeffɣen seg waṭas n yemdanen , țɛeggiḍen qqaṛen : « Kečč d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ! » Lameɛna Sidna Ɛisa ițɛeggiḍ fell-asen , ur ten-ițțaga ara a d-hedṛen , axaṭer nutni ẓran d nețța i d Lmasiḥ .
42004042	Mi guli wass , iffeɣ si temdint , yerra ɣer yiwen wemkan yexlan . Aṭas n lɣaci ṛuḥen țqelliben fell-as . Mi t-ufan , ḥellelen-t iwakken ad yeqqim ɣuṛ-sen , ur ițṛuḥu ara .
42004043	Lameɛna nețța yenna-yasen : Ilaq-iyi ad ṛuḥeɣ ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n tgeldit n Ṛebbi i temdinin nniḍen ! ? ef wayagi i d țțuceggɛeɣ !
42004044	Imiren iṛuḥ ițbecciṛ di leǧwameɛ n tmurt n Yahuda .
42005001	Yiwen wass , Sidna Ɛisa yella ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ n Jiniṣaret . Lɣaci meṛṛa zzin-as-d , mčuččaɛen-d akken ad slen i wawal n Ṛebbi .
42005002	Iwala snat n teflukin rrif n lebḥeṛ , iḥewwaten rsen-d iwakken ad ssirden icebbaken nsen .
42005003	Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer yiwet si teflukin-nni , tin yellan n Semɛun , yenna-yas ad ibɛed acemma ɣef rrif . Yeqqim , yebda yesselmad-ed lɣaci syenna .
42005004	Mi gfukk aselmed yenna i Semɛun : Sbeɛdet taflukt ɣer wemkan lqayen , tḍeggṛem icebbaken-nwen aț-țṣeggdem .
42005005	Semɛun yenna-yas : A Sidi , iḍ kamel nukni d aṣeggeḍ ur d-neṭṭif acemma ; lameɛna ɣef wawal-ik a nexdem akken i d-tenniḍ , a nḍeggeṛ icebbaken .
42005006	Mi xedmen akken i sen-yenna Sidna Ɛisa , ṭṭfen-d aṭas n iselman ( lḥut ) , armi qṛib ad qeṛsen icebbaken nsen .
42005007	Ssawalen , țwehhin i yemdukkal nsen yellan di teflukt nniḍen a d-asen a ten-ɛiwnen . Mi d-usan , ččuṛen snat-nni n teflukin armi qṛib ad ɣeṛqent .
42005008	Semɛun-Buṭrus , mi gwala ayagi , yuɣal ɣef tgecrar zdat Sidna Ɛisa , yenna-yas : Beɛɛed fell-i a Sidi axaṭer d amednub i lliɣ .
42005009	Ikcem-it lxuf nețța d wid yellan yid-es , dehcen imi i d-ṭṭfen annect-nni n yiselman .
42005010	Ula d Yeɛqub akk-d Yuḥenna , arraw n Zabadi yellan d imdukkal n Semɛun wehmen . Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq ɣer Semɛun yenna-yas : Ur țțagad ara , sya d asawen mačči d iselman ara d-țṣeggideḍ , meɛna d imdanen .
42005011	Imiren rran-d tiflukin-nsen ɣer rrif , ǧǧan kullec dinna , ddan d Sidna Ɛisa .
42005012	Mi gella Sidna Ɛisa deg yiwet n taddart n at Jlili , yusa-d yiwen wergaz ihelken lbeṛs , mi gwala Sidna Ɛisa , yuzzel ɣuṛ-es yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is , yenna-yas : A Sidi , ma tebɣiḍ , tzemreḍ a yi-tesseḥluḍ .
42005013	Sidna Ɛisa issers afus-is fell-as , yenna-yas : Bɣiɣ ! Ili-k teḥliḍ ! Imiren kan , argaz-nni ikkes-as lbeṛs , yeṣfa weglim-is .
42005014	Sidna Ɛisa iweṣṣa-t ur iqqaṛ i yiwen ayen yedṛan yid-es . Yenna-yas : Ṛuḥ ɣer lmuqeddem a k-iwali , tefkeḍ lweɛda ɣef ṣeffu-inek , akken yura di ccariɛa n Musa . Lweɛda-nni a sen-tili d țbut ɣef ḥellu-inek .
42005015	Simmal ițwassen Sidna Ɛisa , simmal țnejmaɛen-d ɣuṛ-es lɣaci iwakken ad slen i wawal-is yerna a ten-isseḥlu si lehlakat-nsen ;
42005016	meɛna nețța iṭeṛṛif iman-is , ițṛuḥu ɣer yimukan yexlan iwakken ad iẓẓall .
42005017	Yiwen wass Sidna Ɛisa yella yesselmad . Llan dinna ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa , usan-d si tuddar n at Jlili , n at Yahuda akk ț-țemdint n Lquds , qqimen smeḥsisen-as . Tazmert n Sidi Ṛebbi yellan yid-es tesseḥlay imuḍan .
42005018	Atnaya kra n yemdanen wwin-d yiwen wukrif akken deg wusu-ines . ? qelliben amek ara t-skecmen iwakken a t-ssersen zdat Sidna Ɛisa .
42005019	Imi aṭas n lɣaci i gellan , ur ufin ara ansi ara t-sɛeddin ; ulin ɣef ssqef , kksen kra n iqermuden , ṣubben-t-id s wusu-ines ɣer tlemmast n lɣaci , zdat Sidna Ɛisa .
42005020	Mi gwala liman-nsen , yenna i umuḍin-nni : Ay argaz , țwaɛeffan-ak ddnubat ik !
42005021	Lɛulama akk-d ifariziyen bdan țxemmimen qqaṛen : Amek yezmer a d-yini imeslayen agi ? Wagi d lekfeṛ ! Anwa i gzemren ad iɛfu ddnubat anagar Sidi Ṛebbi ?
42005022	Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran ayen i țxemmimen , yenna-yasen : Acuɣeṛ tețxemmimem akka deg ulawen-nwen ?
42005023	D acu i gsehlen a s-t-iniɣ ? « ? waɛeffan-ak ddnubat-ik » neɣ « ekker telḥuḍ ? »
42005024	Ilaq-awen aț-țeẓrem belli Mmi-s n bunadem yesɛa tazmert ad yeɛfu ddnubat di ddunit-agi ! Yezzi ɣer wukrif-nni , yenna-yas : Kker ddem usu-inek tuɣaleḍ ɣer wexxam-ik !
42005025	Imiren kan ukrif-nni yekker zdat-sen , yeddem usu i deg yeḍleq , yuɣal ɣer wexxam-is , ițḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi .
42005026	Wehmen meṛṛa lɣaci , țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi , ikcem-iten lxuf qqaṛen : Ass-agi neẓra ayen werǧin neẓri !
42005027	Mi geffeɣ Sidna Ɛisa , iwala yiwen umekkas isem-is Lewwi yeqqim di texxamt anda țxelliṣen tabzert ( leɣṛama ) , iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : Ddu yid-i .
42005028	Lewwi yekker , yeǧǧa kullec yedda yid-es .
42005029	Lewwi yeɛṛeḍ Sidna Ɛisa ɣer wexxam-is , ihegga-yas imensi . Aṭas n yimekkasen d yemdanen nniḍen i geqqimen yid-sen ad ččen .
42005030	Ifariziyen d lɛulama n ukabar-nsen iɣaḍ-iten lḥal , nnan i yinelmaden is : Acuɣeṛ i tețțem , tessem akk-d imekkasen imakaren d imednuben ?
42005031	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Mačči d wid iṣeḥḥan i geḥwaǧen ṭṭbib , i t-iḥwaǧen d imuḍan .
42005032	Ur d-usiɣ ara ad ssiwleɣ i iḥeqqiyen , usiɣ-ed ɣer yimednuben iwakken a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid .
42005033	Nnan-as daɣen : Inelmaden n Yeḥya d wid n ifariziyen țțuẓummen acḥal d abrid yerna țẓallan , ma d inelmaden-ik tețțen tessen .
42005034	Sidna Ɛisa yenna yasen : Eɛni tzemrem a sen-tinim i yinebgawen n yesli ad uẓummen ass n tmeɣṛa ? Ur tezmirem ara !
42005035	Ad asen wussan i deg ara sen-ițwakkes yesli , ass-nni ad uẓummen .
