42005036	Yerna-yasen-d lemtel-agi : Yiwen ur d-itekkes tafaweț si llebsa tajdiṭ iwakken a ț-ixiḍ ɣef llebsa taqdimt , neɣ m'ulac llebsa-nni tajdiṭ aț-țcerreg ; tafaweț-nni tajdiṭ ur d-țezgay ara ɣef llebsa-nni taqdimt .
42005037	Daɣen yiwen ur ismaray ccṛab ajdid ɣer yiyeddiden iqdimen , neɣ m'ulac ccṛab-nni ajdid ad icerreg iyeddiden nni ; ur d-ițɣimi ccṛab ur d-țɣimin iyeddiden .
42005038	Ihi ccṛab ajdid , ilaq a t-nesmir ɣer iyeddiden ijdiden .
42005039	Akken daɣen win yennumen d ccṛab aqdim ur issutur ara ajdid axaṭer yeqqaṛ « d aqdim i gelhan . »
42006001	Yiwen wass , Sidna Ɛisa akk-d inelmaden-is zegren igran n yirden deg wass n westeɛfu . Tekksen d tigedrin , țḥukkun-tent ger ifassen nsen , tețțen-tent .
42006002	Kra n ifariziyen nnan-asen : Acuɣeṛ i txeddmem ayen ur neḥlil deg wass n westeɛfu ?
42006003	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Ur teɣṛim ara ayen yexdem ugellid Dawed asmi yelluẓ nețța d imdukkal-is ,
42006004	d wamek i gekcem ɣer wexxam iqedsen anda keččmen anagar lmuqedmin ! Iddem-ed aɣṛum n lweɛda , yečča yerna yefka i wid yellan yid-es ɣas akken aɣṛum-nni i lmuqedmin kan iwumi yeḥlel !
42006005	Sidna Ɛisa yerna-yasen-d : Mmi-s n bunadem , d nețța i gḥekkmen ɣef wass n westeɛfu !
42006006	Ass n westeɛfu nniḍen , Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ɣer lǧameɛ , yebda yesselmad . Yella dinna yiwen wergaz iwumi yekref ufus ayeffus .
42006007	Lɛulama n ccariɛa d ifariziyen țɛassan Sidna Ɛisa , ad ẓren ma ad isseḥlu deg wass n westeɛfu iwakken a s-d-afen sebba s wacu ara ccetkin fell-as .
42006008	Lameɛna Sidna Ɛisa yessnen ixemmimen-nsen , yekker yenna i wergaz-nni iwumi yekref ufus : Ekker tbeddeḍ dagi di tlemmast n lɣaci . Argaz-nni yekker ibedd .
42006009	Sidna Ɛisa yenna : A kkun-steqsiɣ : d acu yellan d leḥlal deg wass n westeɛfu , a nexdem lxiṛ neɣ a nexdem cceṛ ? A nsellek amdan neɣ a t-neǧǧ ad immet ?
42006010	Yerfed allen-is ɣer wid akk i s-d-yezzin , dɣa yenna i wergaz nni : Eḍleq afus-ik ! Ukrif-nni yeḍleq afus-is , yeḥla .
42006011	Nutni yenɣa-ten lɣecc , bdan țemcawaṛen wway gar-asen amek ara xedmen i Sidna Ɛisa .
42006012	Deg ussan-nni , Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer wedrar akken ad iẓẓall . Yeqqim iḍ kamel nețța ideɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
42006013	Mi yuli wass , yessawel i yinelmaden is , yextaṛ seg-sen tnac iwumi isemma « ṛṛusul » yeɛni « imceggɛen . »
42006014	Yella Semɛun iwumi isemma Buṭrus akk-d gma-s Andriyus , Yeɛqub , Yuḥenna , Filbas , Bartelmay ,
42006015	Matta , ? uma , Yeɛqub mmi-s n ? alfi , Semɛun iwumi qqaṛen awaṭani ,
42006016	Yahuda mmi-s n Yeɛqub d Yudas n taddart n Qeṛyut win yuɣalen d axeddaɛ .
42006017	Sidna Ɛisa iṣubb-ed yid-sen seg wedrar , ḥebsen di luḍa anda nnejmaɛen aṭas n yinelmaden-is d waṭas n lɣaci i d-yusan si tmurt n Yahuda , si temdint n Lquds , si temdinin n ? ur akk-d Sidun yellan rrif n lebḥeṛ .
42006018	Usan-d iwakken ad slen i wawal-is yerna a ten-isseḥlu si lehlakat-nsen ; wid akk zedɣen leǧnun , ḥlan .
42006019	Lɣaci meṛṛa țqelliben a t-nalen ( a t-massen ) axaṭer tețțeffeɣ-ed seg-s tezmert i ten-isseḥlayen akk .
42006020	Sidna Ɛisa yerfed allen-is ɣer inelmaden-is yenna : Amarezg-nwen kunwi yellan d iẓawaliyen , tagelda n Sidi Ṛebbi d ayla-nwen .
42006021	Amarezg-nwen kunwi yelluẓen tura , a d-yas wass i deg ara teṛwum . Amarezg-nwen kunwi yețrun tura , a d-yas wass i deg ara tilim di lfeṛḥ .
42006022	D iseɛdiyen ara tilim m'ara kkun-keṛhen yemdanen , m'ara kkun-qecɛen , m'ara kkun-regmen , ad rren isem-nwen amzun d lɛaṛ ɣef ddemma n Mmi-s n bunadem .
42006023	Ass-nni ilit di lfeṛḥ , friwset s lfeṛḥ axaṭer d ṛṛezq ameqqran i kkun-ițṛaǧun deg igenni ! Imi akka i xedmen lejdud-nsen i lenbiya .
42006024	Ma d kunwi ay imeṛkantiyen , a tawaɣit-nwen axaṭer rrbeḥ-nwen tesɛam-t tura .
42006025	A tawaɣit-nwen kunwi yeṛwan tura , aț-țuɣalem aț-țellaẓem . A tawaɣit-nwen kunwi yețțaḍṣan tura axaṭer aț-țilim di leḥzen d yimeṭṭawen .
42006026	A tawaɣit nwen asm'ara kkun-cekkṛen yemdanen , axaṭer akka i xedmen lejdud-nsen i lenbiya n lekdeb .
42006027	Ma d nekk a wen-iniɣ i kunwi i d-ițḥessisen : ḥemmlet iɛdawen-nwen , xedmet lxiṛ i wid i kkun-ikeṛhen .
42006028	Barket wid i kkun-ineɛlen , dɛut s lxiṛ i wid i kkun-iḍelmen .
42006029	Ma yewwet-ik yiwen ɣer lḥenk , sendi-yas lḥenk nniḍen . Ma yekkes-ak yiwen abeṛnus-ik , anef-as ad yernu ula d aqenduṛ-ik .
42006030	Efk-as ayen yuḥwaj i win i k-id-yessutren ; win i k-ikksen kra , ur țṛaǧu ara a k-t-id-yerr .
42006031	Xedmet i wiyaḍ ayen i tebɣam a wen-t xedmen i kunwi .
42006032	Ma yella tḥemmlem kan wid i kkun-iḥemmlen , d acu n lxiṛ i txedmem ? Ula d imcumen ḥemmlen wid i ten-iḥemmlen .
42006033	Ma yella txeddmem lxiṛ i wid kan i wen ixeddmen lxiṛ , d acu n lxiṛ i txedmem ? Ula d imcumen xeddmen akka .
42006034	Ma yella tṛeṭṭlem i wid kan i teẓram a wen-d-rren , d acu i trebḥem ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ? Imcumen daɣen ṛeṭṭlen i imddukal-nsen iwakken ad afen aṛeṭṭal ula d nutni .
42006035	Lameɛna kunwi : ḥemmlet iɛdawen-nwen , xedmet lxiṛ , ṛeḍlet mbla ṭṭmeɛ , akka ara tesɛum lfayda tameqqrant , ara tilim d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi ɛlayen . Axaṭer Ṛebbi d aḥnin ula ɣef yemcumen akk-d wid inekkṛen lxiṛ .
42006036	Iḥninet , sɛut ṛṛeḥma akken i ț-isɛa Baba-twen .
42006037	Ur țḥasabet ara wiyaḍ iwakken Sidi Ṛebbi ur kkun-ițḥasab ara . Ur ḥekkmet ara ɣef wiyaḍ iwakken Sidi Ṛebbi ur iḥekkem ara fell-awen . Semmḥet i wiyaḍ iwakken a wen isameḥ Sidi Ṛebbi .
42006038	Seddqet , a wen d-yuɣal s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi . Ma tseddqem mbla lkil , a wen-d yuɣal s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi mbla lkil ; axaṭer a wen-d-ițwaktal s lkil s wacu tektalem .
42006039	Yewwi-yasen-d lemtel nniḍen , yenna-yasen : Aderɣal ur izmir ara ad iṭṭef afus i uderɣal nniḍen , neɣ m'ulac ad grirben i sin ɣer yeɣzeṛ ;
42006040	anelmad werǧin yugar ccix-is , lameɛna anelmad ara yawḍen am ccix-is di tmusni , ad yili am nețța .
42006041	Acuɣeṛ tețwaliḍ axeclaw yellan di tiṭ n gma-k ur tețwaliḍ ara tigejdit yellan di tiṭ-ik ?
42006042	Amek ara tiniḍ i gma-k : eǧǧ-iyi ad kkseɣ axeclaw yellan di tiṭ-ik kečč ur neẓri tigejdit yellan di tiṭ-ik ? A bu sin wudmawen , ekkes uqbel tigejdit yellan di tiṭ-ik , imiren aț-țwaliḍ amek ara tekkseḍ axeclaw yellan di tiṭ n gma-k .
42006043	Ulac ttejṛa lɛali i d-ițțaken lfakya n diri . Ulac daɣen ttejṛa n diri i d-ițțaken lfakya lɛali .
42006044	Ihi mkul ttejṛa , tețwaɛqal s lfakya-ines . Ur d-ntekkes ara lexṛif seg isennanen , ur d-ntekkes ara daɣen tiẓurin seg inijel .
42006045	Argaz yelhan issufuɣ-ed ayen yelhan seg wugerruj yellan deg wul-is , ma d amcum d ayen n diri yellan deg ul-is i d-issufuɣ . Axaṭer d ayen yellan deg wul n wemdan i d-ițeffɣen seg imi-s .
42006046	Acuɣer i yi-d-tessawalem « A Sidi , a Sidi » , ur txeddmem ara ayen i wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ?
42006047	A wen-d-iniɣ ar wuɣuṛ ițemcabi wemdan i d-ițțasen ɣuṛ-i , isellen i wawal-iw yerna yeṭṭafaṛ-it :
42006048	ițemcabi ɣer yiwen n wemdan yebnan axxam . Yeɣza , yeɣza deg wakal iwakken ad issers lsas-is ɣef wezṛu ; iḥmel-ed wasif , infel-ed ɣef wexxam-nni , meɛna ur t-issenhezz ara imi lsas-is yerṣa , yebna ɣef wezṛu akken ilaq .
42006049	Ma d win isellen i wawal-iw ur netbiɛ ara ayen i d-nniɣ , ițemcabi ɣer wemdan yebnan axxam ɣef ṛṛmel mbla lsas : iḥmel-ed wasif , infel-ed ɣef wexxam-nni , imiren kan yeɣli , lexsaṛa-s ț-țameqqrant !
42007001	Mi gekfa awal zdat widak i s-d-ismeḥsisen , yekcem ɣer temdint n Kafernaḥum .
42007002	Yiwen lqebṭan aṛumani yesɛa aqeddac i gḥemmel aṭas ; aqeddac-agi yuḍen , ițmețțat .
42007003	Mi gesla s Sidna Ɛisa , iceggeɛ ɣuṛ-es kra seg yimeqqranen n wat Isṛail iwakken a d-yas ad isseḥlu aqeddac-is .
42007004	Mi wwḍen ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , ḥellelen-t nnan-as : A Sidi ! Yuklal a s-txedmeḍ lxiṛ agi ,
42007005	axaṭer iḥemmel agdud nneɣ ; d nețța i gebnan lǧameɛ-nneɣ .
42007006	Sidna Ɛisa yedda yid-sen . Mi qṛib ad yaweḍ ɣer wexxam , lqebṭan-nni iceggeɛ imdukkal-is a s-inin : A Sidi , ur țɛețțib ara iman-ik , ur uklaleɣ ara a d-tkecmeḍ axxam-iw .
42007007	Nekk s yiman-iw daɣen walaɣ ur uklaleɣ ara a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-ek ; ini-d kan yiwen wawal , aqeddac-iw ad iḥlu .
42007008	Axaṭer sɛiɣ wid i gṭebbiṛen fell-i , sɛiɣ daɣen lɛeskeṛ seddaw lḥekma-w . Ad iniɣ i yiwen ṛuḥ ad iṛuḥ ; i wayeḍ as-ed , a d-yas ; ad iniɣ i wqeddac-iw xdem ayagi , a t-ixdem .
42007009	Mi gesla Sidna Ɛisa i yimeslayen-agi , itɛeǧǧeb deg-sen . Yezzi ɣer lɣaci yeddan yid-es , yenna-yasen : A wen-d-iniɣ : di tmurt n wat Isṛail meṛṛa ur ufiɣ ara liman yecban wagi .
42007010	Widak-nni i d-ițwaceggɛen , mi uɣalen ɣer wexxam ufan aqeddac-nni yeḥla .
42007011	Azekka-nni , Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ ɣer yiwet n taddart isem-is Naɛim . Ddan yid-es inelmaden-is d waṭas n lɣaci .
42007012	Mi gewweḍ ɣer tewwurt n taddart , atnaya lɣaci wwin-d lmegget a t-meḍlen , d mmi-s n yiwet n taǧǧalt , anagar nețța i tesɛa . Aṭas n imezdaɣ n taddart-nni i d-iddan yid-es .
42007013	Mi ț-iwala Sidna Ɛisa , tɣaḍ-it , yenna-yas : Ur țru ara !
42007014	Iqeṛṛeb ɣer usenduq n lmegget nni , iḍleq afus-is innul-it , dɣa widak i t-irefden ḥebsen . Yenna : Ay aqcic ! Ekker !
42007015	Dɣa lmegget-nni ikker-ed , yebda iheddeṛ . Sidna Ɛisa yerra aqcic-nni i yemma-s .
42007016	Ikcem-iten akk lxuf , bdan țḥemmiden Ṛebbi qqaṛen : « Sidi Ṛebbi yerra-d ddehn-is ɣer wegdud is , nnbi ameqqran ikker-ed gar-aneɣ . »
42007017	Slan s wannect-agi di tmurt n Yahuda meṛṛa akk ț-țmura i s-d izzin .
42007018	Inelmaden n Yeḥya xebbṛen-t ɣef wayen akk yedṛan .
42007019	Yeḥya iceggeɛ sin seg yinelmaden-is ɣer Sidna Ɛisa iwakken a s-inin ma d nețța i d win akken ara d-yasen , neɣ ilaq ad ṛǧun wayeḍ .
42007020	Ewwḍen ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Iceggeɛ-aɣ-ed ɣuṛ-ek Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas iwakken a k-nesteqsi ma d kečč i d win akken ara d-yasen neɣ ilaq a neṛǧu wayeḍ .
42007021	Di teswiɛt-nni ufan Sidna Ɛisa isseḥla aṭas n yemdanen si lehlakat nsen d leɛyubat-nsen , issufeɣ leǧnun seg wid yețwamelken , yerra-d iẓri i waṭas n yiderɣalen .
42007022	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i yinelmaden n Yeḥya : Ṛuḥet erret lexbaṛ i Yeḥya ɣef wayen teẓram d wayen teslam : iderɣalen țwalin , wid ikerfen teddun , wid ihelken lbeṛs ṣeffun , iɛeẓẓugen sellen , lmegtin ḥeggun-d , le xbaṛ n lxiṛ ițwabecceṛ i yigellilen .
42007023	D aseɛdi win iwumi ur țțiliɣ ara d ugur .
42007024	Mi ṛuḥen inelmaden-nni i d-iceggeɛ Yeḥya , Sidna Ɛisa yebda iheddeṛ i lɣaci ɣef Yeḥya yenna : D acu i tṛuḥem a d-teẓrem deg unezṛuf ? D aɣanim yețhuzzu waḍu ?
42007025	D acu i tṛuḥem a d-teẓrem ? D amdan yelsan llebsa ifazen ? Wid yețlusun llebsa ifazen , yețɛicin di rrbeḥ atnan di lebṛuj n yigelliden !
42007026	Anwa i tṛuḥem a t-id-teẓrem ihi ? D nnbi ? A wen-d-iniɣ . . . yugar nnbi !
42007027	Yeḥya d win i ɣef yura di tira iqedsen : Atan ad zzewreɣ amceggeɛ-inu zdat-ek iwakken a k-iheggi abrid .
42007028	Nniɣ-awen , ulac di ddunit amdan yugaren Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas . Lameɛna amecṭuḥ maḍi di tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi , d ameqqran fell-as .
42007029	Lɣaci meṛṛa mi slan i Yeḥya , setɛeṛfen s lḥeqq n Sidi Ṛebbi , qeblen ad țwaɣeḍsen deg waman , llan gar-asen ula d imekkasen n tebzert ( n leɣṛama ) .
42007030	Ma d ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa , ur qbilen ara ayen i sen yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi , ugin a ten yesseɣḍes Yeḥya .
42007031	? er wacu ara metleɣ imdanen n lǧil-agi ? ? er wuɣuṛ i țemcabin ?
42007032	? emcabin ɣer warrac yeqqimen di tejmaɛt , țemsawalen wway gar-asen qqaṛen : Newwet-awen-d ajewwaq ur tecḍiḥem ara , nerna newwi-yawen-d acewwiq n leḥzen ur trum ara .
42007033	Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas yusa-d ur itețț aɣṛum ur itess ccṛab , teqqaṛem ițwamlek .
42007034	Mmi-s n bunadem yusa-d itețț itess , teqqaṛem : ițxemmim kan ad yečč ad isew , d amdakkul n yimekkasen akk-d yemcumen .
42007035	Lameɛna lḥeqq n Sidi Ṛebbi ɛeqlen-t warraw-is , nutni qeblen-t .
42007036	Yiwen ufarizi yusa-d ad iɛṛrḍ Sidna Ɛisa ad yečč ɣuṛ-es . Idda yid-es , ikcem ɣer wexxam-is , yeqqim ad yečč .
42007037	Di taddart-nni tella yiwet n tmeṭṭut yellan d yir tameṭṭut ; mi tesla s Sidna Ɛisa yella deg wexxam n wufarizi-nni , tekcem tewwi yid-es tabuqalt n leɛṭer .
42007038	Tekka-d deffir Sidna Ɛisa , teɣli ɣer idaṛṛen-is tețru . Tessebzeg ( tesselxes ) iḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa s yimeṭṭawen-is , tesfeḍ-iten s ucebbub-is , tessudun-iten yerna tdehhin-iten s leɛṭeṛ-nni .
42007039	Afarizi-nni mi gwala annect-nni , ixemmem deg iman-is yenna : Lemmer argaz-agi d nnbi i gella , yili yeɛqel belli tameṭṭut-agi i t-ițnalen d yir tameṭṭut i tella .
42007040	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i ufarizi-nni : A Semɛun ! Bɣiɣ a k-d-iniɣ yiwen wawal ! Afarizi yerra-yas-d : Ini-d a Sidi !
42007041	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Illa yiwen umeṛkanti issekray idrimen . Ițțalas i sin yergazen , yiwen yețțalas-as xemsmeyyat alef , wayeḍ xemsin .
42007042	Imi ur sɛin ara i sin s wacu ara xelṣen , isemmeḥ-asen . Anwa deg-sen ara t-iḥemmlen akteṛ ?
42007043	Semɛun afarizi yerra-yas : Ahat d win iwumi i gsumeḥ ṭṭlaba tameqqrant . Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Tesɛiḍ lḥeqq !
42007044	Dɣa iwehha ɣer tmeṭṭut-nni , yenna i Semɛun : Twalaḍ tameṭṭut-agi ? Kecmeɣ-d ɣer wexxam-ik , ur iyi-d-tefkiḍ ara aman ad ssirdeɣ iḍaṛṛen-iw , nețțat tessared-iten s yimeṭṭawen-is terna tesfeḍ-iten s ucebbub-is .
42007045	Kečč ur d-tselmeḍ ara fell-i , nețțat segmi i d-tekcem tessudun deg iḍaṛṛen-iw .
42007046	Kečč ur tedhineḍ ara aqeṛṛuy-iw ula s zzit , ma d nețțat tesmar-ed leɛṭeṛ ɣef yiḍaṛṛen-iw .
42007047	A k-iniɣ : ddnubat-is meṛṛa țwaɛfan as daymi i d-tbeggen leḥmala tameqqrant . Ma d win iwumi yețwaɛfa ciṭuḥ , leḥmala-ines ț-țamecṭuḥt .
42007048	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i tmeṭṭut-nni : Atan țwaɛeffan-am ddnubat-im !
42007049	Inebgawen nniḍen bdan qqaṛen deg yiman-nsen : « d acu-t wergaz-agi i gessawḍen iman-is ad yeɛfu ula d ddnubat ? »
42007050	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i tmeṭṭut-nni : Imi tumneḍ yis-i tețțusellkeḍ , ṛuḥ di lehna .
42008001	Sidna Ɛisa iteddu yețbecciṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n tgeldit n Ṛebbi si temdint ɣer tayeḍ , si taddart ɣer tayeḍ . Tnac-nni yinelmaden-is ddan yid-es ,
42008002	ddant daɣen kra n tilawin i gesseḥla si lehlakat-nsent , tid iwumi yessufeɣ leǧnun . Tella gar-asent Meryem iwumi qqaṛen tamagdalit ițwasellken si sebɛa leǧnun ,
42008003	akk-d Yunna tameṭṭut n Cuza lewkil n ugellid Hiṛudus , Suzana akk ț-țilawin nniḍen i ten-ițɛawanen s wayen sɛant .
42008004	Lɣaci usan-d seg waṭas n tudrin . Mi d-nnejmaɛen ɣuṛ-es , Sidna Ɛisa yewwi-yasen-d lemtel-agi :
42008005	Yiwen ufellaḥ iffeɣ ad izreɛ irden . Mi gzerreɛ , kra n iɛeqqayen ɣlin ɣer webrid , țwaṛekḍen yerna ččan-ten yefṛax n igenni .
42008006	Amur nniḍen n zzerriɛa yeɣli ger yedɣaɣen , mi d-temɣi teqquṛ imi xuṣṣen waman .
42008007	Amur nniḍen yeɣli daɣen ger isennanen , mi d-temɣi zzerriɛa mɣin-d yid-es isennanen , ɣummen-ț .
42008008	Amur nniḍen daɣen yeɣli deg wakal lɛali ; mi d-mɣin , mkul aɛeqqa yefka-d meyya . Mi d-yenna ayagi , iɛeggeḍ yenna : Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen isel-ed !
42008009	Inelmaden-is ssutren-as d acu i d lmeɛna n lemtel-agi .
42008010	Yerra-yasen : Kunwi yețțunefk-awen-d aț țissinem lbaḍna n tgeldit n Ṛebbi , ma d wiyaḍ ițțunefk-asen-d a ț-issinen s lemtul kan iwakken ɣas ad ẓren s wallen-nsen ur țwalin ara , ɣas ma slan ur fehhmen ara .
42008011	Atah lmeɛna n lemtel-agi : zzerriɛa d awal n Ṛebbi .
42008012	Llan kra n yemdanen țemcabin ɣer webrid-nni anda teɣli zzerriɛa , m'ara slen i wawal , Cciṭan a d-yas a t-iqleɛ seg ulawen-nsen iwakken ur țțamnen ur țwasellaken .
42008013	Wiyaḍ țemcabin ɣer wakal yeččuṛen d idɣaɣen . M'ara slen i wawal a t-qeblen s lfeṛḥ lameɛna ur t-țaǧǧan ara ad iger izuṛan ; imiren kan ad amnen , m'ara d-yas lweqt n ujeṛṛeb țțuɣalen ɣer deffir .
42008014	Ayen yeɣlin ger isennanen , d wid isellen i wawal meɛna m'ara d-imɣi ur igemmu ara deg-sen axaṭer țțaǧan anezgum d rrbeḥ akk-d zzhu n ddunit ad iɣumm awal-nni .
42008015	Ma d ayen yețwazerɛen deg wakal lɛali , d wid isellen i wawal s wul yeṣfan d neyya ḥerzen-t yerna țțaǧan-d lxiṛ s ṣṣbeṛ-nsen .
42008016	Yiwen ur iceɛɛel taftilt iwakken a ț-iɣum s lḥila neɣ a ț-issedreg ; lameɛna a ț-issers ɣef lmeṣbeḥ iwakken kra n win ara d-ikecmen ad iwali tafat .
42008017	Kra n wayen yeffren a d-iban , kra n wayen yellan di ṭṭlam a t-id-tesban tafat .
42008018	Ɛasset iman-nwen ihi ɣef wayen i tsellem , axaṭer win i gḥerzen ayen yesɛa a s-nernu , ma d win ur nḥerrez ara a s-ițwakkes ula d ayen i gɣil yesɛa-t .
42008019	Yemma-s d watmaten n Sidna Ɛisa usan-d a t-ẓren , meɛna ur zmiren ara ad qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es imi aṭas n lɣaci i gellan dinna .
42008020	Ssawḍen-as lexbaṛ nnan-as : A Sidi , yemma-k d watmaten-ik atnan di beṛṛa , bɣan a k-ẓren .
42008021	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Yemma d watmaten-iw d widak ismeḥsisen i wawal n Ṛebbi yerna ttabaɛen-t .
42008022	Yiwen wass , Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer yiwet n teflukt nețța d yinelmaden-is . Yenna-yasen : Eyyaw a nzegret ɣer tama nniḍen n lebḥeṛ n Jlili . Dɣa ṛuḥen .
42008023	Mi teddun ɣef waman , Sidna Ɛisa yeṭṭes . Yekker-ed waḍu iǧehden di lebḥeṛ , taflukt tebda tețțačaṛ d aman , ikcem-iten lxuf ameqqran .
42008024	Inelmaden qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es , sekkren-t-id nnan-as : A Sidi , a Sidi , atan a neɣṛeq . Yekker-ed , dɣa yumeṛ i waḍu d lemwaji ad ḥebsen , imiren kan ters-ed talwit .
42008025	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Anida-t liman-nwen ? Tɛeǧǧben , țergigin , qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Anwa-t wagi ? Izmer ad ye lameṛ i waḍu d lebḥeṛ yerna țțaɣen as awal !
42008026	Wwḍen ɣer tama nniḍen n lebḥeṛ , ɣer tmurt n ijiṛaziyen iqublen tamurt n Jlili .
42008027	Mi d-yers Sidna Ɛisa , ataya yusa-d ɣuṛ-es yiwen wergaz n taddart nni , melken-t waṭas n leǧnun ; acḥal ur yelsi llebsa , ur yezdiɣ axxam , yețɛici di tmeqbeṛt ger iẓekwan .
42008028	Mi gwala Sidna Ɛisa , yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is iɛeggeḍ yenna : D acu i tebɣiḍ ɣuṛ-i a Ɛisa Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ɛlayen ? Di leɛnaya-k ur iyi-țɛețțib ara .
42008029	Yenna-yas-d akka axaṭer Sidna Ɛisa yefka lameṛ i uṛuḥani i t-izedɣen ad iffeɣ seg-s . Acḥal d abrid i s-cudden ifassen d iḍaṛṛen s ssnasel , nețța isseɣṛas-itent yerna aṛuḥani-nni yezzuɣuṛ-it ɣer yimukan yexlan .
42008030	Sidna Ɛisa isteqsa-t yenna-yas : Isem-ik ? yerra-yas : Tarbaɛt . Yenna-yas-d akka axaṭer aṭas n leǧnun i t-izedɣen .
42008031	? ḥellilen Sidna Ɛisa ur ten-ițceggiɛ ara ɣer yimukan n ṭṭlam .
42008032	Tella dinna yiwet n tqeḍɛit tameqqrant n yilfan kessen deg yiwet n tiɣilt . Leǧnun-nni țḥellilen Sidna Ɛisa a ten-yeǧǧ ad kecmen deg yilfan-nni ; Sidna Ɛisa iserreḥ-asen .
42008033	Imiren ffɣen seg wergaz-nni , kecmen deg yilfan , grarben seg ixef n tiɣilt ɣer lebḥeṛ , ɣeṛqen .
42008034	Imeksawen-nsen mi walan ayen yedṛan uzzlen ɣer taddart d lexlawi ad ssiwḍen lexbaṛ .
42008035	Usan-d lɣaci ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , ufan-d argaz-nni i seg d-ffɣen leǧnun yeqqim ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is , yuɣal-ed ɣer leɛqel-is , yelsa llebsa . Wehmen akk , tekcem-iten tugdi .
42008036	Wid iḥedṛen i wayen yedṛan , ḥkan amek yețwasellek umeǧnun-nni .
42008037	Imezdaɣ n tmurt uggaden , dɣa ssutren i Sidna Ɛisa ad ibɛed fell-asen . Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer teflukt iwakken ad iṛuḥ .
42008038	Argaz-nni i seg d-ffɣen leǧnun , issuter a t-yeǧǧ ad yeddu yid-es , meɛna Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas :
42008039	Uɣal ɣer wexxam-ik , teḥkuḍ ayen akk i k-ixdem Ṛebbi . Argaz-nni iṛuḥ , ikcem ɣer taddart , yeḥka meṛṛa wayen i s-ixdem Sidna Ɛisa .
42008040	Mi d-yuɣal Sidna Ɛisa , lɣaci meṛṛa i t-ițṛaǧun mmugren-t-id .
42008041	Yewweḍ-ed yiwen wergaz isem-is Jayrus , d ameqqran n lǧameɛ , yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa , yețḥellil deg-s iwakken ad iddu ɣer wexxam is
42008042	axaṭer yesɛa yelli-s tnac yiseggasen di leɛmeṛ-is , tețmețțat yerna anagar nețțat i gesɛa . Akken ițeddu Sidna Ɛisa ɣer dinna , ḥeṛsen-t-id lɣaci si mkul lǧiha .
42008043	Tella dinna yiwet n tmeṭṭut ihelken , tnac iseggasen nețțat tessaq d idammen . Texṣeṛ ayen akk i tesɛa ɣer ṭṭebba , yiwen ur ț-isseḥla .
42008044	Tekka-d deffir Sidna Ɛisa , teḍleq afus-is , tennul iri n ubeṛnus-is , imiren kan teḥla ḥebsen idammen-nni .
42008045	Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq yenna : Anwa akka i yi-d-innulen ? Imi ssusmen meṛṛa , Buṭrus yenna yas : A Sidi , lɣaci yezzi-yak-d yerna iḥṛes-ik-id si mkul tama , kečč teqqaṛeḍ anwa i k-id-innulen !
42008046	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yella yiwen i yi-d-innulen axaṭer ḥusseɣ i kra n tezmert teffeɣ seg-i .
42008047	Tameṭṭut-nni imi twala ulamek ara teffer , tusa-d tețțergigi teɣli ɣer yiḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa , teḥka-d zdat lɣaci meṛṛa acuɣeṛ i t-tennul d wamek teḥla imiren kan si lehlak-is .
42008048	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : A yell-i , imi tumneḍ yis-i teḥliḍ ! Ṛuḥ di talwit .
42008049	Mazal-it iheddeṛ , ataya yiwen wergaz yusa-d seg wexxam n Jayṛus , yewwi-yas-d lexbaṛ-agi : Yelli-k temmut ! Ur țɛețțib ara Sidna Ɛisa .
42008050	Sidna Ɛisa mi s-yesla i wergaz-nni , yenna i Jayṛus : Ur țțagad ara ! Amen kan , yelli-k aț-țeslek .
42008051	Mi gewweḍ ɣer wexxam , ur yeǧǧi yiwen ad ikcem yid-es anagar Buṭrus , Yuḥenna , Yeɛqub akk-d baba-s d yemma-s n teqcict-nni .
42008052	Wid yellan dinna țrun akk , țɣerriden ( țmeǧǧiden ) fell-as . Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Beṛka-kkun imeṭṭawen ! taqcict ur temmut ara ! D iḍes i teṭṭes .
42008053	Nutni ugin a s-d-ḥessen imi ẓran taqcict temmut .
42008054	Sidna Ɛisa yeṭṭef-iț-id seg wufus yenna-yas s taɣect ɛlayen : A taqcict , ekker !
42008055	Imiren kan yuɣal-iț-id ṛṛuḥ , tekker-ed . Sidna Ɛisa yumeṛ a s-fken ayen ara tečč .
42008056	Imawlan-is wehmen . Sidna Ɛisa iweṣṣa-ten ur țɛawaden i yiwen ayen yedṛan .
42009001	Sidna Ɛisa isnejmaɛ-ed tnac yinelmaden-is , yefka-yasen tazmert d lḥekma s wacu ara ssufɣen leǧnun , ara sseḥlun imuḍan .
42009002	Iceggeɛ-iten ad beccṛen tageldit n Ṛebbi , yerna ad sseḥlun imuḍan .
42009003	Yenna-yasen : Ur țțawit acemma yid-wen d aɛwin , ur țțawit aɛekkaz neɣ agrab ( aqwrab ) , ur țțawit aɣṛum neɣ idrimen , ur țțawit ara daɣen sin yiqendyaṛ .
42009004	Kra n win ara yestṛeḥben yis wen , qqimet deg wexxam-is alamma tṛuḥem .
42009005	Ma d anda ur stṛeḥben ara yis-wen , m'ara teffɣem si taddart-nni , zwit ula d aɣebbaṛ-is seg yiḍaṛṛen nwen , iwakken aț-țcehdem fell-asen belli d nutni i kkun-yugin .
42009006	Ṛuḥen , țeddun si taddart ɣer tayeḍ , țbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , sseḥlayen imuḍan di mkul amkan .
42009007	Hiṛudus lḥakem n tmurt n Jlili , yeɛweq mi gesla s wayen yedṛan meṛṛa , axaṭer kra n yemdanen qqaṛen : « d Yeḥya i d-iḥyan si ger lmegtin ! »
42009008	Wiyaḍ qqaṛen : « d Sidna Ilyas i d-yuɣalen ! » Neɣ : « ahat d yiwen si lenbiya n zik i d-iḥyan ! »
42009009	Lameɛna Hiṛudus yeqqaṛ : « Yeḥya kkseɣ-as aqeṛṛuy ! Anwa-t ihi wagi i ɣef selleɣ annect-agi ? » Dɣa ițqellib ad iẓer Sidna Ɛisa .
42009010	Mi d-uɣalen ṛṛusul n Sidna Ɛisa , bdan ḥekkun-as ayen akk i xedmen . Yewwi-ten yid-es ɣer yiwen wemkan , ɣer tama n taddart n Bitsayda akken ad qqimen weḥḥed-sen .
42009011	Mi slan anda yella lɣaci tebɛen-t . Nețța yesteṛḥeb yis-sen , yebda iheddeṛ-asen ɣef tgeldit n Ṛebbi , yesseḥla daɣen wid ihelken .
42009012	Akken qṛib ad yeɣli yiṭij , tnac-nni n ṛṛusul usan-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Serreḥ i lɣaci ad ṛuḥen ɣer temdinin ț-țudrin iqeṛben iwakken ad afen ayen ara ččen d wanda ara ṭsen , axaṭer aql-aɣ deg wemkan yexlan .
42009013	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Fket-asen kunwi s yiman-nwen ayen ara ččen . Erran-as : ? uṛ-nneɣ anagar xemsa teḥbulin n weɣṛum d sin yiselman . Neɣ tebɣiḍ a nṛuḥ nukni a d-naɣ ayen ara ččen lɣaci-agi ?
42009014	Llan dinna azal n xemsa alaf n yergazen . Sidna Ɛisa yenna i yinelmaden-is : Feṛqet lɣaci ț-țirebbaɛ n xemsin xemsin , tesɣimem-ten .
42009015	Ṛuḥen sɣimen-ten akken i sen-d yenna .
42009016	Sidna Ɛisa yerfed allen-is ɣer yigenni , yeḥmed Ṛebbi icekkeṛ-it , yeddem-ed xemsa-nni teḥbulin n weɣṛum d sin-nni iselman yebḍa-ten , yefka-ten i inelmaden-is a ten-feṛqen i lɣaci .
42009017	? čan akk armi ṛwan , yerna ččuṛen tnac yiḍellaɛen s wayen i d-yugran .
42009018	Yiwen wass Sidna Ɛisa yeqqim weḥd-es yețẓalla . Inelmaden-is qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es dɣa isteqsa-ten yenna-yasen : D acu-yi ɣer lɣaci ?
42009019	Rran-as : Kra qqaṛen d Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas ; wiyaḍ d Sidna Ilyas i d-yuɣalen ; ma d kra nniḍen qqaṛen d yiwen si lenbiya n zik i d-iḥyan si ger lmegtin .
42009020	Yenna-yasen : I kunwi , d acu-yi ɣuṛ-wen ? Yenṭeq Buṭrus yenna-yas : D kečč i d Lmasiḥ n Ṛebbi .
42009021	Sidna Ɛisa iweṣṣa-ten ur qqaṛen i yiwen belli d nețța i d Lmasiḥ .
42009022	Yenna-yasen daɣen : Ilaq Mmi-s n bunadem ad yeɛteb aṭas . A t-nekkṛen lecyux d lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa yerna a t-nɣen , lameɛna ass wis tlata a d-iḥyu si ger lmegtin .
42009023	Yenna daɣen i lɣaci : Win yebɣan ad iddu yid-i ur ilaq ara ad ixemmem ɣef tudert-is ; ilaq ad iqbel ad yenɛețțab yal ass ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw yerna ad yetbeɛ abrid-iw .
42009024	Axaṭer win yebɣan ad isellek tudert-is a s-tṛuḥ . Ma d win iwumi ara tṛuḥ ɣef ddemma-w ad yuɣal a ț-yaf .
42009025	D acu i d lfayda n wemdan ara irebḥen ddunit meṛṛa ma yesṛuḥ tudert-is neɣ issenger iman-is ?
42009026	Atan win issetḥan yis-i neɣ s yimeslayen iw , ad issetḥi yis Mmi-s n bunadem m'ara d-yas di tmanegt-is ț-țmanegt n Baba Ṛebbi akk-d lmalayekkat iqedsen .
42009027	A wen-d-iniɣ tideț , llan gar-awen wid ur nețmețțat ara alamma walan Tageldit n Ṛebbi .
42009028	Ɛeddan azal n tmanya wussan segmi i d-yenna imeslayen-agi . Sidna Ɛisa yewwi yid-es Buṭrus , Yuḥenna d Yeɛqub , yuli ɣer wedrar ad iẓẓall .
42009029	Mi gella ideɛɛu yenbeddal wudem-is , llebsa-s tuɣal ț-țamellalt tețfeǧǧiǧ am yiṭij .
42009030	Taswiɛt kan bedden-d ɣuṛ-es sin yergazen heddṛen yid-es : d Sidna Musa akk-d Sidna Ilyas .
42009031	Banen-ed di tafat tameqqrant , țmeslayen yid-es ɣef lmut-is ara yedṛun di temdint n Lquds .
42009032	Buṭrus d yimdukkal-is yewwi ten yiḍes . Mi d-endekwalen , walan tamanegt n Sidna Ɛisa akk-d wid yellan yid-es .
42009033	Mi kkren ad ṛuḥen sin-nni yergazen , yenṭeq Buṭrus ɣer Sidna Ɛisa yenna : A Sidi , acḥal yelha m'akka nella dagi ! Ma tebɣiḍ a nesbedd tlata yiqiḍunen , yiwen i kečč , yiwen i Sidna Musa wayeḍ i Sidna Ilyas . Yenna-d akka , axaṭer ur yeẓri d acu i d-iqqaṛ !
42009034	Mazal-it iheddeṛ mi ten-id-tɣumm yiwet n tagut . Buṭrus d imdukkal-is ikcem-iten lxuf d ameqqran .
42009035	Iffeɣ-ed yiwen n ṣṣut si tagut-nni yenna-d : Wagi d Mmi , d nețța i xtaṛeɣ , smeḥsiset-as .
42009036	Mi geḥbes ṣṣut-nni , walan anagar Sidna Ɛisa . Deg ussan-nni , inelmaden ur ḥkin i yiwen ayen ẓran .
42009037	Azekka-nni mi d-ṣubben seg wedrar , aṭas n lɣaci i d-immugren Sidna Ɛisa .
42009038	Atah yiwen wergaz iɛeggeḍ-ed si ger lɣaci yenna : A Sidi , di leɛnaya-k muqel-ed ɣer mmi , ala nețța i sɛiɣ !
42009039	Ikcem-it uṛuḥani , tiswiɛin m'ara t-ițhuccu , yețɛeggiḍ alamma ffɣent-ed tkufta seg imi-s , ur as-ițserriḥ ara alamma yerẓa-t akk .
42009040	? elleleɣ inelmaden-ik a t-ssufɣen seg-s , lameɛna ur zmiren ara .
42009041	Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq yenna : A lǧil ijehlen iɛewjen , ar melmi ara yiliɣ yid-wen , ara wen-sebṛeɣ ? Awi-d mmi-k ɣer dagi !
42009042	Akken i d-iqeṛṛeb weqcic-nni , aṛuḥani isseglallez-it di lqaɛa armi i d-țeffɣent tkufta seg yimi-s . Sidna Ɛisa yefka lameṛ i uṛuḥani-nni iwakken a t-iffeɣ . Aqcic-nni yeḥla , Sidna Ɛisa yerra-t i baba-s .
42009043	Lɣaci meṛṛa wehmen di tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi . Imi tɛeǧǧben akk s wayen i gxeddem , Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq ɣer yinelmaden-is yenna :
42009044	? esset-ed mliḥ i wayen ara wen-d-iniɣ tura : « Mmi-s n bunadem ad ițțusellem ger ifassen n yemdanen . »
42009045	Inelmaden-is ur fhimen ara imeslayen-agi , lmeɛna-ines tețwaffer fell-asen iwakken ur t-fehmen ara yerna kukran a t-steqsin .
42009046	Inelmaden țmeslayen wway gar-asen , țmesteqsayen anwa i d ameqqran deg-sen .
42009047	Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran ayen țxemmimen deg ulawen-nsen , ikker yeddem-ed yiwen weqcic isbedd-it zdat-es ,
42009048	yenna-yasen : Win iqeblen aqcic am wagi ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw d nekk i geqbel , win i yi-qeblen , yeqbel win i yi-d iceggɛen . Win yessimẓiyen iman-is gar-awen d nețța i d ameqqran .
42009049	Yuḥenna yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi , neẓra yiwen wergaz yessuffuɣ leǧnun s yisem-ik , nebɣa a s-neqḍeɛ imi ur k-itbiɛ ara am nukni .
42009050	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ur s-țțagit ara ! Win ur wen-d neffiɣ ara d aɛdaw , yid-wen i gella !
42009051	Mi qṛib a d-awḍen wussan i deg ara yețwarfed ɣer igenwan , Sidna Ɛisa yeqsed ad iṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Lquds .
42009052	Yessezwer imceggɛen zdat-es iwakken a s-heggin ayen ilaqen . Kecmen ɣer yiwet n taddart n yisamariyen ,
42009053	lameɛna ugin ad stṛeḥben yis imi slan ɣer temdint n Lquds i gteddu .
42009054	Yeɛqub d Yuḥenna mi ẓran ayagi , nnan : A Sidi , tebɣiḍ a ne lameṛ i tmes n yigenni a d-teɣli fell-asen a ten tessenger ?
42009055	Sidna Ɛisa yezzi ɣuṛ-sen , iɛeggeḍ fell-asen yenna : Acuɣeṛ i tețxemmimem akka ?
42009056	Mmi-s n bunadem ur d-yusi ara ad issenger imdanen lameɛna yusa-d a ten-isellek . Dɣa ṛuḥen ɣer taddart nniḍen .
42009057	Mi teddun deg webrid , yiwen wergaz yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi , anda teddiḍ ad dduɣ !
42009058	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Uccanen ɣuṛ-sen lɣiṛan , ifṛax n yigenni sɛan leɛcuc , ma d Mmi-s n bunadem ur yesɛi ara anda ara yessers aqeṛṛuy-is .
42009059	Dɣa yenna i yiwen nniḍen : Eyya-d aț-țedduḍ yid-i . Yerra-yas : A Sidi , serreḥ-iyi uqbel ad ṛuḥeɣ ad meḍleɣ baba .
42009060	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Eǧǧ wid yemmuten ad meḍlen lmegtin-nsen , ma d kečč eyya-d aț-țbecṛeḍ tageldit n Ṛebbi .
42009061	Wayeḍ yenṭeq yenna-yas : Ad dduɣ yid-ek a Sidi , lameɛna eǧǧ-iyi ad ṛuḥeɣ ad sellmeɣ ɣef wat wexxam-iw .
42009062	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Kra n win yeṭṭfen lmaɛun , yețmuqul ɣer deffir , ur yenfiɛ ara i tgelda n Ṛebbi .
42010001	Syenna , Sidna Ɛisa yextaṛ-ed tnin usebɛin yinelmaden nniḍen , iceggeɛ-iten sin sin ad ṛuḥen ɣer mkul taddart d mkul amkan anda ilaq ad iṛuḥ ula d nețța .
42010002	Yenna-yasen : Tamegra meqqṛet meɛna drus yixeddamen i gellan . Dɛut ihi ɣer Bab n tmegra iwakken a d-iceggeɛ ixeddamen ɣer yigran-is .
42010003	Atan a kkun-ceggɛeɣ am izamaren ger wuccanen .
42010004	Ur țțawit yid-wen idrimen , ur țțawit aɛwin neɣ tayuga nniḍen n yerkasen . Deg webrid-nwen ur sṛuḥuyet ara lweqt di sslam .
42010005	Kra n wexxam ara tkecmem init : sslam n Ṛebbi fell-awen ay at wexxam !
42010006	Ma yella dinna walebɛaḍ d imhenni , sslam-nwen ad yers fell-as , neɣ m'ulac lehna-nwen aț-țeqqim ɣuṛ-wen .
42010007	Qqimet deg wexxam-nni , ččet swet ayen ara wen-d-fken , axaṭer axeddam yuklal lexlaṣ-is . Ur țṛuḥut ara seg wexxam ɣer wayeḍ .
42010008	Mkul taddart ara tkecmem , ma stṛeḥben yis-wen ččet ayen ara wen-d-ssersen .
42010009	Sseḥlut imuḍan-nsen , init-asen : tageldit n Ṛebbi tewweḍ-ed ɣuṛ-wen .
42010010	Lameɛna mkul taddart ara tkecmem m'ur stṛeḥben ara yis-wen , effɣet ɣer yizenqan-nsen init :
42010011	« a nezwi ula d aɣebbaṛ n taddart-nwen i d-ineṭḍen deg yiḍaṛṛen nneɣ , meɛna ḥṣut belli tageldit n Ṛebbi tewweḍ-ed ɣuṛ-wen .
42010012	Aql-i nniɣ-awen , ass n lḥisab taddart-agi aț-țețțuɛaqeb akteṛ n temdint n ? udum .
42010013	A nnger-im a tamdint n Kurazim , a nnger-im a Bitsayda ! A lukan lbeṛhanat yețwaxedmen deg kkunt țwaxedmen di temdinin n ? ur akk-d Sidun , tili imezdaɣ-nsent acḥal aya segmi sburren ticekkaṛin n leḥzen , sexnunnsen iman-nsen deg iɣiɣden iwakken a d-beggnen belli ndemmen , uɣalen-d ɣer webrid .
42010014	? ef wannect-agi , ass n lḥisab a ț-țețțuɛaqbemt akteṛ n temdinin n ? ur d Sidun .
42010015	I kemmini a tamdint n Kafernaḥum , tɣileḍ aț-țaliḍ ɣer yigenni ? Xaṭi ! ? er tesra lqayen n laxeṛt ara tețwaḍeggṛeḍ .
42010016	Win i wen-ismeḥsisen ismeḥsis-iyi-d i nekk . Win ur kkun-neqbil d nekk ur geqbil ara , win ur iyi-neqbil ara , ur iqbil ara Win i yi-d-iceggɛen .
42010017	Tnin usebɛin-nni yinelmaden uɣalen-d ččuṛen d lfeṛḥ , nnan-as : A Sidi , ula d leǧnun țțagaden-aɣ s yisem-ik .
42010018	Yenna-yasen : Walaɣ Cciṭan yeɣli-d am lebṛaq seg yigenni .
42010019	Slet-ed i wayen ara wen-iniɣ : ț-țideț fkiɣ-awen tazmert s wayes ara tṛekḍem izerman ț-țɣerdmiwin , aț-țmeḥqem lǧehd n weɛdaw yerna ulac ayen ara wen-izemren ;
42010020	lameɛna ur feṛṛḥet ara imi i tḥekkmem ɣef leǧnun , feṛḥet imi ismawen-nwen țwajerden deg igenwan .
42010021	Imiren kan , Sidna Ɛisa yeččuṛ-it Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen s lfeṛḥ , yenṭeq yenna : Tanemmirt a Baba , kečč yellan d Bab n yigenwan d lqaɛa , imi ayen akk i teffreḍ ɣef lɛuqal d yimusnawen tbeggneḍ-t-id i yimecṭuḥen . Tanemmirt a Baba Ṛebbi aḥnin axaṭer d wagi i d lebɣi-k .
42010022	Baba yerra kullec ger ifassen-iw . Yiwen ur yeẓri d acu-yi anagar Baba Ṛebbi , yiwen ur issin Baba Ṛebbi anagar Mmi-s akk-d win iwumi yebɣa Mmi-s a t-id-isbeggen .
42010023	Dɣa yezzi ɣer yinelmaden-is yenna-yasen : Amarezg n wid iwalan ayen tețwalim !
42010024	Aql-i nniɣ-awen : aṭas n lenbiya d waṭas n yigelliden i gebɣan ad ẓren ayen i tẓerrem ur t-ẓrin , i gebɣan ad slen ayen i tsellem ur t-slin .
42010025	Ikred yiwen umusnaw n ccariɛa yebɣan ad ijeṛṛeb Sidna Ɛisa , yenna yas : A Sidi , d acu ara xedmeɣ iwakken ad sɛuɣ tudert n dayem ?
42010026	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : D acu yuran di ccariɛa n Musa ? D acu i tfehmeḍ deg-s mi ț-teɣriḍ ?
42010027	Yerra-yas-d : Aț-țḥemmleḍ Sidi Ṛebbi s wul-ik d ṛṛuḥ-ik , s wayen yellan di tezmert-ik akk-d lɛeqliya-k . Aț-țḥemmleḍ daɣen wiyaḍ am yiman-ik .
42010028	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ayen akka i d-tenniḍ ț-țideț , exdem akka aț-țesɛuḍ tudert n dayem !
42010029	Lɛalem-nni n ccariɛa yebɣan ad ye lḥeqq i yiman-is , yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : Anwa-ten wiyaḍ-agi ?
42010030	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yiwen wergaz iṣubb-ed si temdint n Lquds ɣer temdint n Yiriku ; sqaṭɛen-as yimakaren ɛerran-t rnan wten-t , ṛuḥen ǧǧan-t ur yemmut ur iddir .
42010031	Iɛedda-d syenna yiwen lmuqeddem n ccariɛa ; mi t-iwala iwwet iɛedda si tama nniḍen .
42010032	Iɛedda-d daɣen seg webrid-nni yiwen wemṛabeḍ n at Lewwi , iwala-t , ikemmel abrid-is iṛuḥ .
42010033	Ataya yiwen wubeṛṛani n tmurt n Samarya , iwweḍ-ed ɣuṛ-es , mi t-iwala iɣaḍ-it .
42010034	Iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es , idhen leǧruḥ-is s zzit d ccṛab , icudd iten ; isserkeb-it ɣef zzayla-s , yewwi-t ɣer yiwen wexxam n yemsafren , ilha-d yid-es .
42010035	Azekka-nni yefka sin yiṣurdiyen i bab n wexxam-nni , yenna-yas : « Bedd ɣuṛ-es , ayen ara tṣeṛṛfeḍ n zzyada fell-as , a k-t-id-kemmleɣ asm'ara d-uɣaleɣ . »
42010036	Di tlata-agi , anwa i gḥemmlen am yiman-is argaz-agi yețțuɛerran ?
42010037	Amusnaw n ccariɛa yerra-yas : D win akken iḥunnen fell-as , i s ixedmen lxiṛ . Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ṛuḥ ula d kečč exdem akken .
42010038	Deg webrid-nsen ɣer temdint n Lquds , Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ɣer yiwet n taddart . Yiwet n tmeṭṭut isem is Marṭa teɛṛeḍ-it ɣer wexxam-nsen .
42010039	Tesɛa weltma-s isem-is Meryem , teqqim-ed ɣer iḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa , tesmeḥsis i wawal-is .
42010040	Marṭa tqeddec yečča-ț ccɣel , tusa-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa tenna-yas : A Sidi , ur ak-tewqiɛ ara lmeɛna imi iyi-teǧǧa weltma ad qedceɣ weḥd-i ? Ini-yas aț-țekker a yi-tɛiwen .
42010041	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : A Maṛta , tețḥebbiṛeḍ tețqelliqeḍ iman-im ɣef waṭas n tɣawsiwin ;
42010042	lameɛna yiwet kan i gṣeḥḥan ! Meryem textaṛ ayen ilaqen yerna yiwen ur as-t-ițekkes .
42011001	Yiwen wass , Sidna Ɛisa yețẓalla deg yiwen wemkan . Mi gfukk , yiwen seg yinelmaden-is yenna-yas : A Sidi , selmed-aɣ amek ara neẓẓal akken yesselmed Yeḥya i yinelmaden-is .
42011002	Yenna-yasen : M'ara tẓallem , init : A Baba Ṛebbi , isem-ik ad ițwaqeddes , lḥekma n tgeldit-ik a d-tas .
42011003	Yal ass efk-aɣ-d aɣṛum-nneɣ .
42011004	Semmeḥ-aɣ ddnubat-nneɣ akken i nețsamaḥ ula d nukkni i wid i ɣ-ixedmen cceṛ , ur aɣ-țaǧǧa ara a neɣli deg wujeṛṛeb .
42011005	Yenna-yasen daɣen : Ma yella yiwen deg-wen yesɛa aḥbib , iṛuḥ ɣuṛ-es di țnaṣfa n yiḍ a s-yini : « Ay aḥbib ṛḍel-iyi-d tlata teḥbulin n weɣṛum ,
42011006	atan yusa-yi-d yiwen weḥbib i geṭṭef webrid , ur sɛiɣ d acu ara s-d-sserseɣ . »
42011007	Ma yerra-yas-d si zdaxel n wexxam : « Ur iyi-țɛețțib ara , tawwurt tsekkeṛ , nekk d warraw-iw aql-aɣ neṭṭes , ur zmireɣ ara a d-kkreɣ iwakken a k-d-fkeɣ aɣṛum . »
42011008	A wen-d-iniɣ : ma yeɛdez ur yebɣi ara a d-yekker ɣuṛ-es ɣas akken d aḥbib-is , a d-ikker a s-d-ye ayen akk i s-issuter axaṭer yusa-d ɣuṛ es di țnaṣfa n yiḍ yeṛṛez-as aqeṛṛuy-is .
42011009	Ma d nekk nniɣ-awen : ssutret a wen-d-ițune , qellbet aț-țafem , sqerbebbet di tewwurt a wen-d-ldin .
42011010	Axaṭer kra n win yessuturen a s-d ițune , win ițqelliben ad yaf , win yesṭebṭuben a s-d-ldin tawwurt .
42011011	Anwa deg-wen ara yefken i mmi-s adɣaɣ ma yessuter-as aɣṛum ? Neɣ a s-ye azrem ma yessuter-as aslem ?
42011012	Neɣ ma yessuter-as tamellalt a s-ye tiɣirdemt ?
42011013	Ma yella kunwi yellan d imcumen tessnem aț-țefkem ayen yelhan i warraw-nwen , amek Baba-twen yellan deg igenni ur d-ițțak ara Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i wid i s-t-issuturen ?
42011014	Yiwen wass ikker Sidna Ɛisa yessuffeɣ lǧen yesgugmen yiwen wergaz . Mi t-iffeɣ lǧen , argaz-nni yebda iheddeṛ ; lɣaci meṛṛa wehmen .
42011015	Lameɛna kra deg-sen nnan : « D Balzabul iḥekmen ɣef leǧnun i s-yefkan tazmert akken a ten issuffeɣ . »
42011016	Kra nniḍen bɣan a t-jeṛṛben , ssutren-as yiwen n lbeṛhan ara d-yasen seg yigenni .
42011017	Sidna Ɛisa yessnen ixemmimen-nsen yenna yasen : Yal tagelda i deg ara țnaɣen imezdaɣ-is wway gar-asen tețțeddu ɣer nnger , ixxamen-is ad ɣlin .
42011018	Ma yella Cciṭan yețnaɣ d yiman-is amek ara tdum tgelda-s ? Teqqaṛem s Balzabul i ssufuɣeɣ leǧnun !
42011019	Ma yella nekk s Balzabul i ten-ssufuɣeɣ , anwa ihi i sen-ițțaken tazmert i yinelmaden-nwen iwakken a ten-ssuffuɣen ? Daymi d nutni ara kkun-iḥasben .
42011020	Lameɛna ma yella s ufus n Ṛebbi i ten-ssuffuɣeɣ , ațan ihi tageldit n Ṛebbi tewweḍ-ed ɣuṛ-wen .
42011021	Argaz iǧehden yesɛan leslaḥ , ițɛassan ɣef wexxam-is , ṛṛezq-is ad yili di laman .
42011022	Ma yusa-d ɣuṛ-es yiwen iǧehden akteṛ-is iɣleb-it , a s-ikkes leslaḥ ɣef wacu yețkel , ad yernu ad ifṛeq i wiyaḍ ayen akk yesɛa .
42011023	Win ur nelli ara yid-i , d axṣim-iw ; win ur njemmeɛ ara yid-i , yețḍeggiɛ .
42011024	M'ara yeffeɣ uṛuḥani seg yiwen wergaz , ad iṛuḥ ɣer yimukan yexlan akken ad iqelleb ɣef ṛṛaḥa . M'ur yufi ara , ad yini : « ad uɣaleɣ ɣer tnezduɣt-iw ansi i d-ffɣeɣ . »
42011025	M'ara yaweḍ ɣer tnezduɣt-nni , a ț-yaf zeddiget , tqeɛɛed ;
42011026	imiren ad iṛuḥ a d-yawi sebɛa yiṛuḥaniyen nniḍen iweɛṛen akteṛ-is , ad kecmen ad zedɣen deg-s ; s wakka lḥala n wergaz-nni aț-țenṭeṛ akteṛ n tikkelt tamezwarut .
42011027	Mi d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa ayagi , yiwet n tmeṭṭut tenṭeq-ed s ṣṣut ɛlayen si ger n lɣaci tenna-yas : ? - țaseɛdit tmeṭṭut i k-id-yurwen , i k-issuṭṭḍen !
42011028	Lameɛna nețța yerra-yas : Iseɛdiyen , d wid ismeḥsisen i wawal n Ṛebbi , yerna ḥerzen-t .
42011029	Mi d-innejmaɛ ɣuṛ-es waṭas n lɣaci , Sidna Ɛisa yekker yenna-yasen : Lǧil-agi d lǧil amcum , yessutur lbeṛhan ! Ur as-d-ițunefkay ara lbeṛhan anagar win n nnbi Yunes !
42011030	Axaṭer akken yella nnbi Yunes d lbeṛhan i yimezdaɣ n temdint n Ninebi , ara yili Mmi-s n bunadem d lbeṛhan i lǧil-agi .
42011031	Ass n lḥisab tagellit n tmurt n usammer a d-tekker ɣer yemdanen n lǧil-agi a ten-tesseḍlem imi nețțat tusa-d seg yixef n ddunit iwakken aț-țsel i tmusni n ugellid Sliman . Atah yella gar-awen win yugaren agellid Sliman !
42011032	Ass n lḥisab a d-kkren daɣen imezdaɣ n temdint n Ninebi ɣer lǧil-agi a ten-sḍelmen , axaṭer nutni uɣalen-d ɣer webrid mi sen-ibecceṛ nnbi Yunes . Kunwi tesɛam dagi gar-awen win yugaren nnbi Yunes !
42011033	Yiwen ur iceɛɛel taftilt iwakken a ț-iffer neɣ akken a ț-iɣumm s lḥila , lameɛna a ț-issers ɣef lmeṣbeḥ iwakken kra n win ara d-ikecmen ad iwali tafat .
42011034	Tiṭ ț-țaftilt n wemdan . Ma yella tiṭ-ik tṣeḥḥa aț-țiliḍ di tafat , meɛna ma tedderɣel aț-țiliḍ di ṭṭlam .
42011035	? ader ihi aț-țuɣal tafat yellan deg-k d ṭṭlam .
42011036	Ma telliḍ di tafat s lekmal-ik , ur yețțili ara deg-k ṭṭlam , aț-țiliḍ di tafat am teftilt m'ara d-cceɛceɛ fell-ak .
42011037	Mi gfukk Sidna Ɛisa ameslay , iɛreḍ-it yiwen wufarizi ɣeṛ imensi .
42011038	Afarizi-nni yewhem mi gwala Sidna Ɛisa ur issared ara uqbel ad yečč , akken tella di lɛadda-nsen .
42011039	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Kunwi s yifariziyen tessiridem taqbuct d uḍebṣi s wufella kan ma zdaxel n wulawen teččuṛem d ṭṭmeɛ akk-d ddɣel .
42011040	A wid iɣeflen ! Eɛni win i d ixelqen ayen yellan s wufella , mačči d nețța i d-ixelqen ayen n daxel ?
42011041	Fket lweɛda s wulawen-nwen , imiren kullec ad awen-yeṣfu .
42011042	A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen ! Kunwi yețɛecciṛen nneɛneɛ d uwermi d wayen i d-ițemɣayen di tebḥirt , ma d lḥeqq d leḥmala n Sidi Ṛebbi tețțarram-ten ɣer deffir ; d annect-agi i gezwaren mbla ma tețțum ayen nniḍen .
42011043	A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen ! Tḥemmlem imukan imezwura di leǧwameɛ , tḥemmlem ad țsellimen fell-awen yemdanen deg iberdan .
42011044	A nnger-nwen , kunwi yecban iẓekwan i gɣumm wakal , ur d-nețban ara , ɛeffsen-ten yemdanen ur d-wwin s lexbaṛ .
42011045	Yenṭeq yiwen lɛalem n ccariɛa , yenna-yas : A Sidi , atan tregmeḍ-aɣ ula d nukkni s wayen i d-tenniḍ akka !
42011046	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : A nnger-nwen ula d kunwi a lɛulama n ccariɛa ! Tețɛebbim i wiyaḍ tiɛekkmin ẓẓayen , ma d kunwi ur tent-tețnalem ara ula s yiwen uḍaḍ .
42011047	A tawaɣit-nwen ! Lejdud-nwen nɣan lenbiya , kunwi tbennum-asen iẓekwan .
42011048	S wakka i d-tesbegnem belli tqeblem ayen i xedmen yerna tețkemmilem di tikli-nsen ; axaṭer nutni nɣan-ten , kunwi tbennum-asen iẓekwan .
42011049	? ef wayagi Sidi Ṛebbi yeẓran kullec yenna : a sen-ceggɛeɣ lenbiya d ṛṛusul , kra a ten-nɣen kra a ten qehṛen .
42011050	Daymi lǧil-agi ad ițțuḥaseb ɣef tazzla n yidammen n lenbiya seg wasmi i d-texleq ddunit ;
42011051	seg yidammen n Habil mmi-s n Adem armi d idammen n Zakarya i nɣan ger udekkan n iseflawen d lǧameɛ iqedsen . Lǧil-agi ad ițțuḥaseb ɣef ayagi meṛṛa .
42011052	A tawaɣit-nwen a lɛulama n ccariɛa ! Teṭṭfem tasaruț n tmusni , ur tekcimem kunwi , ur teǧǧim ad kecmen wid yebɣan .
42011053	Mi geffeɣ Sidna Ɛisa , lɛulama n ccariɛa d ifariziyen ḥeṛsen-t iwakken a d-immeslay ɣef waṭas n tɣawsiwin nniḍen ,
42011054	țqelliben amek ara t-id-sseɣlin deg wawal .
42012001	Di teswiɛt-nni kan , lɣaci yennejmaɛ-ed s luluf armi țemyeɛfasen . Sidna Ɛisa yenna i yinelmaden-is : ? adret iman-nwen ɣef temtunt ( iɣes ) n yifariziyen , axaṭer d at sin wudmawen .
42012002	Kra n wayen iɣummen a d-iban , kra n wayen yeffren ad yemẓer .
42012003	Ayen i thedṛem di ṭṭlam a t-slen di tafat , ayen i tennam ɣer umeẓẓuɣ di texxamt ad ițțuberreḥ deg yizenqan .
42012004	A wen-d-iniɣ i kunwi yellan d iḥbiben-iw : ur țțagadet ara wid ineqqen lǧețța , sennig lmut ur zmiren ad xedmen acemma nniḍen .
42012005	A wen-d-iniɣ anwa i glaq aț - țaaggadem : aggadet win izemren a kkun-ikkes si ddunit yerna a kkun-iḍeggeṛ ɣer ǧahennama . Atan nniɣ-awen-t-id , d nețța i glaq aț - țaggadem .
42012006	D acu i swan xemsa iẓiwcen ? Anaɣ sin iṣurdiyen kan ! Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ur itețțu ula d yiwen deg-sen .
42012007	Ula d anẓaden n iqeṛṛay-nwen țwaḥesben yiwen yiwen . Ur țțagadet ara ihi , teswam akteṛ n iẓiwcen .
42012008	A wen-d-iniɣ : kra n win ara d-icehden zdat yemdanen belli yumen yis-i , Mmi-s n bunadem ur t-inekkeṛ ara zdat lmalayekkat ,
42012009	ma d win ara yi-nekṛen zdat yemdanen , ula d nekk a t-nekkṛeɣ zdat lmalayekkat n Ṛebbi .
42012010	Kra n win ara yewten di Mmi-s n bunadem a s-ițusemmeḥ , ma d win ara iregmen Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ulac fell-as ssmaḥ .
42012011	M'ara kkun-awin ad ḥekmen fell-awen di leǧwameɛ zdat lecyux d lḥekkam , ur țxemmimet ara amek ara tsellkem iman-nwen neɣ ɣef wayen ara d-tinim ,
42012012	axaṭer d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ara wen-d-ifken di teswiɛt-nni ayen ilaqen a t-id-tinim .
42012013	Yiwen wergaz inṭeq-ed si ger n lɣaci yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi , ini-yas i gma ad ibḍu yid-i lweṛt i d-iǧǧa baba-tneɣ .
42012014	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ay argaz , anwa i yi-sbedden iwakken ad bḍuɣ gar-awen ?
42012015	Dɣa yenna i lɣaci : ? adret iman-nwen ɣef ṭṭmeɛ imi tudert n wemdan ur d-tekki ara seg wayen yesɛa ɣas akken di rrbeḥ ameqqran i gella .
42012016	Imiren yewwi-yasen-d lemtel agi : Yiwen umeṛkanti , yesɛa tamurt tefka-d aṭas n lɣella .
42012017	Ixemmem deg iman-is , yenna : « amek ara xedmeɣ imi ur sɛiɣ ara amkan anda ara jemɛeɣ leṛẓaq-iw ?
42012018	Ad huddeɣ ikuffan-iw , ad bnuɣ wiyaḍ d imeqqranen iwakken ad jemɛeɣ irden-iw d leṛẓaq-iw meṛṛa .
42012019	Imiren ad iniɣ i yiman-iw : « atan tesxezneḍ leṛẓaq i waṭas n iseggasen ; steɛfu tura , ečč , sew tezhuḍ . »
42012020	Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yenna yas-d : « a win iɣeflen ! Iḍ-agi ad a k-ddmeɣ ṛṛuḥ-ik ! Ayen meṛṛa i tjemɛeḍ , iwumi ara d-yeqqim ? »
42012021	Akka i tdeṛṛu d win ijemɛen leṛẓaq i yiman-is , wala ad ixdem ɣef laxeṛt-is , ad yili d ameṛkanti ɣer Ṛebbi .
42012022	Sidna Ɛisa yenna daɣen i yinelmaden-is : ? ef wayagi i wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ur țḥebbiṛet ara ɣef tudert-nwen , ɣef wayen ara teččem d wayen ara telsem .
42012023	Axaṭer tudert-nwen tugar lqut , lǧețța-nwen tugar llebsa .
42012024	Walit tigerfiwin , ur zerrɛent ur meggrent , ur sɛint akufi ur sɛint acbayli meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ițɛeyyic itent . Acḥal teswam akteṛ n yefṛax n igenni !
42012025	Anwa deg-wen i gzemren s uḥebbeṛ ad yessiɣzef leɛmeṛ-is ula s yiwen n wass ?
42012026	Imi ur tezmirem ara i tɣawsiwin timecṭuḥin , acuɣeṛ i tețḥebbiṛem ɣef wayen nniḍen ?
42012027	Walit amek gemmun ijeǧǧigen n lexla ! Ur țellmen ur ẓeṭṭen ! Atan qqaṛeɣ-awen : ula d agellid Sliman s yiman-is di ccan-is , ur yelsi am yiwen seg yijeǧǧigen-agi .
42012028	Ma yella Sidi Ṛebbi yeslusu akka leḥcic yellan ass-agi di lexla , azekka ad iṛeɣ di tmes , amek ur kkun-islusu ara kunwi , ay imdanen ixuṣṣen di liman !
42012029	Ur țḥebbiṛet ara ihi ! Ur țqellibet ara ɣef wayen ara teččem d wayen ara teswem ,
42012030	axaṭer d imdanen ur nețțamen ara s Ṛebbi i gețqelliben ɣef wayagi meṛṛa . Baba-twen yellan deg yigenwan yeẓra ayen teḥwaǧem .
42012031	Qellbet axiṛ ɣef tgeldit n Ṛebbi , ayen nniḍen meṛṛa d nețța ara wen-t-id ifken .
42012032	Ur țțagad ara a taqeḍɛit illan tamecṭuḥt , axaṭer iɛǧeb-as i Baba Ṛebbi a wen-d-ye tageldit-is .
42012033	Zzenzet ayen tesɛam , tsedqem-t . Heggit i yiman-nwen deg yigenwan agerruj ur nkeffu , ur nrekku , dinna ulac imakaren ara t-yakren , ulac ibeɛɛac ara t-iččen .
42012034	Axaṭer anda yella ugerruj-ik , dinna ara yili wul-ik .
42012035	Heggit iman-nwen , ɛiwzet , beggset ɣef yiman-nwen tceɛlem tiftilin-nwen !
42012036	Ilit am wid yețṛaǧun amɛellem nsen ara d-yuɣalen si tmeɣṛa ; akken kan ara d-yesqeṛbeb a s-ldin tawwurt .
42012037	Amarezg n yiqeddacen-agi ara d-yaf wemɛellem-nsen ɛawzen . A wen-d iniɣ tideț , ad ibeddel llebsa , a ten isɣim ɣer ṭṭabla iwakken a sen-ye ad ččen .
42012038	Ma yewweḍ-ed di țnaṣfa n yiḍ neɣ akteṛ , amarezg-nsen ma yufa-ten-id mazal țṛaǧun-t !
42012039	Fehmet ayagi : lemmer yeẓra bab n wexxam lweqt i deg ara d-yas umakar , tili a t-iɛass ur t-ițțaǧa ara ad ikcem axxam-is .
42012040	Heggit iman-nwen ula d kunwi imi di lweqt i ɣef ur tebnim ( tedmim ) ara a d-yas Mmi-s n bunadem .
42012041	Buṭrus inṭeq yenna-yas : A Sidi , i nukkni iwumi d-tenniḍ lemtel-agi neɣ i lɣaci meṛṛa ?
42012042	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Anwa i d lewkil iḥeṛcen i ɣef yella lețkal , ara iwekkel bab n wexxam ɣef wayla-s , iwakken ad ifṛeq i yiqeddacen amur-nsen n yirden di lweqt ilaqen ?
42012043	Amarezg n wuqeddac agi ara d-yaf bab-is ibedd ɣer cceɣl-is !
42012044	A wen-d-iniɣ tideț , a t iwekkel ɣef wayen akk yesɛa .
42012045	Lameɛna aqeddac-nni ma yeqqaṛ deg wul-is : « amɛellem-iw iɛeṭṭel ur d yuɣal ara » ! Yebda iḥeqqeṛ iqeddacen ț-țqeddacin , yekkat-iten , iteț itess alamma yeskkeṛ .
42012046	A d-yas umɛellem-is deg wass i ɣef ur yebni ara , di lweqt ur yessin ara , a t-iɛaqeb s lmut akken țțuɛaqben wid iɛuṣan Ṛebbi .
42012047	Aqeddac yessnen lebɣi n bab-is yerna ur t-ixdim ara , ad yečč tiɣṛit tameqqrant ,
42012048	ma d win ur nessin ara lebɣi n bab-is , ixdem ayen yuklalen tiɣṛit , ad yečč tiɣṛit tamecṭuḥt . Win iwumi nefka aṭas a s-nessuter aṭas , ma d win i ɣef nețkel aṭas a neṛǧu deg-s akteṛ .
42012049	Usiɣ-ed a d-awiɣ yiwet n tmes ɣer ddunit ! Acḥal ɣeṣbeɣ melmi ara tecɛel !
42012050	Yella yiwen n weɣḍas i yi-țṛaǧun . . . D leɛtab ameqqran yerna ɣeṣbeɣ melmi ara d-yas wass-nni !
42012051	Tɣilem d lehna i d-wwiɣ ɣer ddunit ? Xaṭi , d beṭṭu i d-wwiɣ !
42012052	Sya ɣer zdat ma llan xemsa deg yiwen wexxam , ad bḍun ; tlata a d-kkren ɣer sin , sin a d-kkren ɣer tlata .
42012053	Ababat a d-innaɣ d mmi-s , mmi-s a d-yekker ɣer baba-s ; tayemmaț aț-țennaɣ d yelli-s , yelli-s akk-d yemma-s ; tamɣaṛt aț-țennaɣ ț-țeslit-is , tislit akk-d temɣaṛt-is .
42012054	Sidna Ɛisa yenna daɣen i lɣaci : M'ara twalim asigna yekka-d si lɣeṛb , teqqaṛem atan a d-tewwet lehwa ; d ayen i gdeṛṛun .
42012055	M'ara d-iṣuḍ waḍu seg usammer teqqaṛem ad iḥmu lḥal ; d ayen i d-ideṛṛun daɣen .
42012056	Ay at sin wudmawen ! Imi tessnem aț-țɛeqlem lḥal n yigenni d lqaɛa , amek ur tezmirem ara aț-țɛeqlem zzman-agi ?
42012057	Acuɣeṛ ur tețmeyyizem ara s yiman-nwen ɣef wayen yellan d lḥeqq ?
42012058	M'ara k-yessiweḍ wexṣim-ik ɣer ccṛeɛ , eɛṛeḍ a ț-tefruḍ yid-es uqbel aț-țawḍem ɣer dinna , neɣ m'ulac a k-yawi ɣer lḥakem , lḥakem a k-ye i uɛessas , aɛessas a k-iḍeggeṛ ɣer lḥebs .
42012059	A k-d-iniɣ : ur d-tețțeffɣeḍ ara syenna alamma txellṣeḍ aṣurdi aneggaru n ṭlaba-inek .
42013001	Di lweqt-nni , kra n yemdanen usan-d a s-ḥkun i Sidna Ɛisa ɣef kra n yergazen n tmurt n Jlili i genɣa Bilaṭus , d wamek issexleḍ dammen-nsen d idammen n iseflawen nsen .
42013002	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Tɣilem belli imezdaɣ-agi n Jlili ițțuɛetben akka d imednuben akteṛ n wiyaḍ ?
42013003	Xaṭi , meɛna a wen-d-iniɣ : m'ur tbeddlem ara tikli aț-țemtem ula d kunwi .
42013004	Neɣ am tmenṭac-nni yergazen yemmuten mi d-yeɣli fell-asen ṣṣuṛ n Silwi , tɣilem d imednuben akteṛ n imezdaɣ nniḍen n temdint n Lquds ?
42013005	Xaṭi , meɛna nniɣ-awen : m'ur tbeddlem ara tikli aț-țemtem ula d kunwi .
42013006	Yewwi-yasen-d lemtel-agi : Yiwen wergaz yesɛa taneqleț teẓẓa deg yiger n tẓurin . Yusa-d iwakken a d-ikkes tibexsisin lameɛna ur yufi ara .
42013007	Yenna i uxeddam n yiger-nni : tlata n yiseggasen aya nekk țțaseɣ ed iwakken a d-kkseɣ lexṛif si tneqleț agi meɛna ur d-țțafeɣ ara , gzem-iț ihi ! Acuɣeṛ ara teṭṭef akal mbla nnfeɛ ?
42013008	Axeddam-nni yerra-yas : a Sidi , eǧǧ-iț aț-țernu aseggas-a ; aț-țneqceɣ , a s-rreɣ leɣbaṛ ,
42013009	sya d asawen ma tefka-d lfakya eǧǧ-iț , m'ulac qeleɛ - iț .
42013010	Sidna Ɛisa yesselmad deg yiwen n lǧameɛ deg wass n westeɛfu .
42013011	Tella dinna yiwet n tmeṭṭut ihelken tmenṭac yiseggasen aya ; d yiwen uṛuḥani i ț-ikerfen ur tezmir ara aț-țesbedd lqedd-is .
42013012	Mi ț-iwala Sidna Ɛisa , iluɛa-ț yenna-yas : A tameṭṭut , teḥliḍ seg wekraf-im .
42013013	Issers ifassen-is fell-as , imiren kan tesbedd lqedd-is , teḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi .
42013014	Ccix-nni n lǧameɛ iɣaḍ-it lḥal imi i ț-isseḥla Sidna Ɛisa deg wass n westeɛfu , yenna i lɣaci : Llan sețța wussan i deg ilaq a nexdem ; aset-ed ihi deg ussan-nni iwakken a kkun-isseḥlu mačči deg wass n westeɛfu !
42013015	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ay at sin wudmawen ! Anwa deg-wen ur d-nețserriḥ i wezger-ines neɣ i weɣyul-is iwakken a t-yawi a d-isew ɣas deg wass n westeɛfu ?
42013016	I tmeṭṭut-agi yellan si dderya n Ibṛahim , i gekref Cciṭan tmenṭac n yiseggasen aya , eɛni ur ilaq ara a s-nekkes akraf ɣas akka d ass n westeɛfu ?
42013017	Mi d-yenna imeslayen-agi , ixṣimen-is meṛṛa nneḥcamen ma d lɣaci feṛḥen s leɛǧayeb i gxeddem .
42013018	Yenna daɣen : ? er wacu i tețțemcabi tgeldit n Ṛebbi ? ? er wacu ara ț-metleɣ ?
42013019	Tețțemcabi ɣer uɛeqqa amecṭuḥ n zerriɛa n uxerḍel i geẓẓa yiwen wergaz di tebḥirt-is . Mi d-imɣi yuɣal d ttejṛa , ifṛax n igenni bnan leɛcuc deg ifurkawen-is .
42013020	Yenna daɣen : ? er wacu i zemreɣ ad metleɣ tageldit n Ṛebbi ?
42013021	Tețțemcabi ɣer ciṭṭuḥ yiɣes n temtunt i d-teddem tmeṭṭut , tger-it di tlata lkilat n uwren dɣa teǧǧa-t armi yuli meṛṛa .
42013022	Deg webrid-is ɣer temdint n Lquds , Sidna Ɛisa ițɛedday ɣef temdinin ț-țudrin , isselmad .
42013023	Isteqsa-t yiwen yenna-yas : A Sidi , drus n yemdanen ara yețțuselken ?
42013024	Yenna-yasen : Qellbet amek ara tkecmem si tewwurt iḍeyqen ; a wen-d-iniɣ : aṭas ara yebɣun ad kecmen lameɛna ur țțizmiren ara .
42013025	M'ara d-yekker bab n wexxam ad isekkeṛ tawwurt , wid i d-yufa lḥal di beṛṛa a d-bdun asqeṛbeb ad qqaṛen : « A Sidi ! A Sidi ! Ldi-yaɣ tawwurt » ! Nețța a wen-d-yerr : ur kkun-ssineɣ ur ẓriɣ ansi i d-tekkam ! ?
42013026	Kunwi ad as-tinim : « anaɣ nečča neswa yid-ek , teslemdeḍ deg yizenqan nneɣ ! »
42013027	Nețța a wen-d-yerr : Nniɣ-awen ur kkun-ssineɣ ara , beɛdet akkin fell-i a kunwi ixeddmen cceṛ !
42013028	Dinna ara yilin yimeṭṭawen d nndama tameqqrant m'ara twalim Ibṛahim , Isḥaq , Yeɛqub akk-d lenbiya di tgelda n yigenwan , ma d kunwi aț-țeqqimem di beṛṛa .
42013029	A d-asen si cceṛq d lɣeṛb , seg umalu d usammer , ad ṭṭfen imukan di tmeɣṛa n tgelda n igenwan .
42013030	Imiren ad ilin ineggura ara yuɣalen d imezwura , am akken daɣen ara yilin imezwura ara yuɣalen d ineggura .
42013031	Di teswiɛt-nni , kra n ifariziyen usan-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Ṛuḥ tixxeṛ syagi , atan Hiṛudus ițqellib a k-ineɣ .
42013032	Yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet init-as i wuccen-agi : ass-a d uzekka ad ssufɣeɣ leǧnun , ad sseḥluɣ imuḍan , ass wis tlata ad fakeɣ cceɣl-iw .
42013033	Lameɛna ilaq ad kemmleɣ tikli-inu ass-a , azekka d sellazekka , axaṭer ur s-ilaq ara i nnbi ad immet beṛṛa n temdint n Lquds .
42013034	A tamdint n Lquds ! A tamdint n Lquds ineqqen lenbiya , iṛeǧǧmen wid i m-d-ițwaceggɛen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi ! Acḥal d abrid i ɛerḍeɣ a d-jemɛeɣ arraw-im am tyaziṭ i d-ijemɛen ifṛax-is seddaw wafriwen-is , lameɛna ur tebɣim ara .
42013035	Atan ihi , axxam-nwen ad ixlu yerna nniɣ-awen , ur iyi-tẓerrem ara alamma d asmi ara tinim : Ad ițțubarek win i d-yusan s yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi .
42014001	Yiwen wass yellan d ass n westeɛfu , Sidna Ɛisa illa yețwaɛreḍ ɣer wexxam n yiwen seg yimeqqranen n yifariziyen iwakken ad yefteṛ . Wid yellan dinna țɛassan-t d acu ara yexdem .
42014002	Yella dinna yiwen wergaz yesɛan lehlak n ubezzug .
42014003	Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq ɣer lɛulama n ccariɛa d yifariziyen yenna-yasen : D acu twalam ? D leḥlal win ara isseḥlun deg wass n westeɛfu neɣ ala ?
42014004	Imi yiwen deg-sen ur d-yenṭiq , Sidna Ɛisa iqeṛṛeb ɣer umuḍin-nni , yesseḥla-t , iserreḥ-as ad iṛuḥ .
42014005	Dɣa yenna i wiyaḍ : Anwa deg-wen ma yeɣli-yas mmi-s neɣ wezger-ines ɣer lbir , ur t-id-ițekkes ara ɣas ma d ass n westeɛfu ?
42014006	Yiwen ur izmir a s-d-yerr awal .
42014007	Mi gwala wid yețwaɛerḍen bdan țextiṛin imukan imezwura , Sidna Ɛisa yewwi-yasen-d lemtel-agi yenna yasen :
42014008	M'ara k-id-yeɛreḍ yiwen ɣer tmeɣṛa , ɣurek ur țțaṭṭaf ara amkan amezwaru ! Axaṭer yezmer ad yili yiwen ger inebgawen yesɛan leqdeṛ akteṛ-ik ,
42014009	a d-yas win i kkun-iɛerḍen i sin a k-yini : « eǧǧ-as amkan-nni i wagi ! » Imiren aț-țenneḥcameḍ , aț-țṛuḥeḍ aț-țeṭṭfeḍ amkan aneggaru .
42014010	Lameɛna m'ara tețwaɛeṛḍeḍ , ṭṭef amkan aneggaru iwakken m'ara d-yas win i k-id-iɛerḍen , a k-yini : « ay aḥbib ɛeddi-d ɣer zdat ! » Imiren aț-țesɛuḍ leqdeṛ zdat inebgawen meṛṛa .
42014011	Axaṭer kra n win yessalayen iman-is a t-id-yessers Ṛebbi , ma d win yesrusuyen iman-is a t-yerfed .
42014012	Yenna daɣen i win i t-id iɛeṛḍen : M'ara tebɣuḍ aț-țseččeḍ , ur d-ɛeṛṛeḍ ara imdukkal-ik neɣ atmaten ik , ur d-ɛeṛṛeḍ ara imawlan-ik neɣ lǧiran-ik imeṛkantiyen ; m'ulac a k ɛerḍen ula d nutni iwakken a k-d-rren lxiṛ-ik .
42014013	Lameɛna m'ara txedmeḍ tameɣṛa , ɛṛeḍ-ed igellilen , ineɛyuba , iquḍaren d yiderɣalen .
42014014	Ili-k di lfeṛḥ imi ur zmiren ara a k-d-rren lxiṛ-ik , axaṭer lxiṛ-ik a k-id-yuɣal asm'ara d-ḥyun wid yellan d iḥeqqiyen ɣer Ṛebbi .
42014015	Mi gesla i imeslayen-agi , yiwen seg inebgawen inṭeq-ed yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : Amasseɛd n win ara yeččen tiremt di tgelda n yigenwan !
42014016	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yiwen wergaz ixdem imensi , iɛreḍ-ed aṭas lɣaci .
42014017	Lweqt n imensi , iceggeɛ aqeddac-is iwakken ad yini i inebgawen : aset-ed ! Kullec iwjed !
42014018	Akken ma llan ufan-d sebba . Amezwaru yenna-yas : « aql-i uɣeɣ iger , ilaq ad ṛuḥeɣ a t-id-ẓreɣ , di leɛnaya-k semmeḥ-iyi » .
42014019	Wayeḍ yenna-yas : « aql-i uɣeɣ-d xemsa n tyugiwin n yezgaren bɣiɣ ad ṛuḥeɣ a tent-ɛerḍeɣ , di leɛnaya-k semmeḥ iyi » .
42014020	Wayeḍ daɣen yenna-yas : « tura kan i zewǧeɣ , ulamek ara d aseɣ » .
42014021	Mi d-yuɣal uqeddac ɣer umɛellem-is , yeḥka-yas ayen akk i s-d-nnan . Bab n wexxam yerfa , yenna i uqeddac-is : « azzel , ṛuḥ ɣer yiberdan d yizenqan n temdint , tɛeṛḍeḍ-ed iẓawaliyen , ineɛyuba , iderɣalen d iquḍaren » .
42014022	Mi d-yuɣal uqeddac-nni yenna-yas : a Sidi , ayen i yi-d-tenniḍ xedmeɣ-t yerna mazal llan imukan .
42014023	Amɛellem yenna i uqeddac is : « effeɣ ɣer iberdan n tudrin d lexlawi ; wid akk ara tafeḍ , ḥṛeṣ-iten a d asen iwakken ad iččaṛ wexxam-iw . »
42014024	Atan nniɣ-awen : ula d yiwen seg wid-nni yețwaɛerḍen d imezwura ur iɛerreḍ imensi-inu .
42014025	Aṭas n lɣaci i geddan d Sidna Ɛisa . Yezzi ɣuṛ-sen yenna-yasen :
42014026	Kra n win ara d-yasen ɣuṛ-i , ma iḥemmel baba-s d yemma-s neɣ tameṭṭut-is d warraw-is neɣ ayetma-s d yessetma-s neɣ iḥemmel iman-is akteṛ-iw , ur izmir ara ad yili d anelmad-iw .
42014027	Kra n win ur neqbil ara ad yeɛteb ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw yerna ur iyi-d-itbiɛ ara , ur izmir ara ad yili d anelmad-iw .
42014028	Anwa deg-wen ma yebɣa ad ibnu lbeṛǧ , ur yețɣimi ara ad ixdem uqbel leḥsab-is , iwakken ad iẓer ma yezmer a t-ifak ?
42014029	Axaṭer ma yebda lsas yeǧǧa-t akken , kra n wid ara t-iẓren ad stehzin fell-as ad inin :
42014030	argaz-agi yebda lsas ur izmir ad ikemmel lebni .
42014031	Neɣ anwa agellid ara yekkren ad innaɣ d ugellid nniḍen , ur ixeddem ara uqbel leḥsab iwakken ad iẓer ma yezmer ad iqabel s ɛecṛa alaf iɛsekṛiwen win i d-iteddun ɣuṛ-es s ɛecrin alef iɛsekriwen ?
42014032	Ma iwala ur s-izmir ara , ad iceggeɛ ɣuṛ-es uqbel a d-yaweḍ , iwakken ad ifru yid-es tamsalt s lehna .
42014033	S wakka , yiwen ur yezmir ad yili d anelmad-iw m'ur yeqbil ara ad yeǧǧ ayen akk yesɛa .
42014034	Lmelḥ d ayen yelhan , lameɛna ma tṛuḥ-as lbenna-s amek ara s-ț-id-nerr ?
42014035	Ur yelhi i wakal , ur yelhi i leɣbaṛ , ilaq kan a t-nḍeggeṛ ɣer beṛṛa . Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen isellen , isel-ed ! . .
42015001	Imekkasen n tebzert akk-d yir imdanen țțasen-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa iwakken a s-slen .
42015002	Ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa iɣaḍ-iten lḥal qqaṛen wway garasen : « argaz-agi yesṭerḥib s imednuben yerna yețɣimi yid-sen ɣer lmakla » .
42015003	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yewwi-yasen-d lemtel-agi :
42015004	Anwa deg-wen ma yesɛa meyya wulli tṛuḥ-as yiwet deg-sent , ur yețțaǧa ara di lexla țesɛa uțesɛin nniḍen akken ad iṛuḥ a d-inadi ɣef tin i s-iɛeṛqen alamma yufa-ț ?
42015005	M'ara ț-yaf , a ț-id-ibibb ɣef tuyat-is s lfeṛḥ .
42015006	M'ara d-yaweḍ ɣer wexxam , ad issiwel i imdukkal-is d lǧiran-is , a sen-yini : feṛḥet yid-i , atan ufiɣ tixsi-nni i yi-iɛeṛqen .
42015007	S wakka nniɣ-awen : ad yili lfeṛḥ d ameqqran deg igenni ɣef yiwen umednub i d-yuɣalen ɣer webrid wala ɣef țesɛa uțesɛin nniḍen ur neɛṛiq ara .
42015008	Neɣ anta tameṭṭut ma tesɛa ɛecṛa n twiztin tṛuḥ-as yiwet , ur tceɛɛel ara taftilt , ur tberrez ara axxam akken aț-țqelleb fell-as alamma tufa-ț ?
42015009	Mi ț-tufa aț-țessiwel i tmeddukal-is ț-țǧiratin-is a sent-tini : ufiɣ tawizeț-nni i yi-ṛuḥen ! Feṛḥemt yid-i !
42015010	S wakka a wen-d-iniɣ : yețțili lfeṛḥ d ameqqran ɣer lmalayekkat ɣef yiwen umednub i d-yuɣalen ɣer webrid .
42015011	Yenna-yasen daɣen : Yiwen wergaz yesɛa sin warrac .
42015012	Ameẓyan deg-sen yenna i baba-s : a baba , efk-iyi-d amur i yi-d-iṣaḥen deg wayla-k . Dɣa baba-s yefka-yas amur-is .
42015013	Mi Ɛeddan kra n wussan , ikker ameẓyan-nni ijmeɛ-ed akk amur-is , izzenz-it , ibeddel tamurt , iṛuḥ ɣer yiwet n tmurt ibeɛden . Dinna yewwi-t zzhu , yesṛuḥ ayen akk yesɛa .
42015014	Mi i gṣeṛṛef akk idrimen is , yeɣli-d laẓ d ameqqran di tmurt nni , ula d nețța yuɣal yelluẓ .
42015015	Yufa lxedma ɣer yiwen umezdaɣ n tmurt nni , iceggeɛ-it ad yeks taqeḍɛit n yilfan .
42015016	Acḥal imenna ad yečč ulamma d axeṛṛub-nni i tețțen yilfan-nni , meɛna yiwen ur as-d-yefki .
42015017	Ihi yebda yețxemmim deg iman-is yenna : « acḥal n ixeddamen yellan ɣer baba ṛwan aɣṛum , nekk yenɣa-yi laẓ dagi .
42015018	Ad kkreɣ kan ad uɣaleɣ ɣer baba , a s-iniɣ : a baba ɛuṣaɣ Ṛebbi erniɣ-k keččini ;
42015019	ur uklaleɣ ara ad iliɣ d mmi-k , ḥseb-iyi am yiwen seg ixeddamen-ik »
42015020	Ikker iṛuḥ ɣer baba-s . Akken qṛib ad yaweḍ ɣer wexxam , baba-s iɛqel-it-id si lebɛid , iɣaḍ-it , yuzzel-ed ɣuṛ-es . Yeṭṭef-it ger iɣallen-is isellem fell-as .
42015021	Mmi-s yenna-yas : « a baba , ɛuṣaɣ Ṛebbi rniɣ-k keččini , ur uklaleɣ ara a yi-tḥesbeḍ d mmi-k » .
42015022	Lameɛna baba-s ikker yenna i iqeddacen-is : « ɣiwlet awit-ed abeṛnus-nni n leḥrir selset-as-t , qnet-as taxatemt i uḍaḍ-is ternum-as isebbaḍen i iḍaṛṛen-is .
42015023	Awit-ed agenduz-nni yeṭṭuqten tezlum-t a t-nečč , a nexdem tameɣṛa ;
42015024	axaṭer mmi-nni i ḥesbeɣ yemmut yuɣal-ed idder , yella yeɛṛeq tura iban-ed » . Dɣa bdan tameɣṛa .
42015025	Mmi-s amenzu yella di lexla . Mi d-yuɣal , akken qṛib a d-yaweḍ ɣer wexxam , yesla i ccna d ccḍeḥ .
42015026	Yessawel i yiwen seg iqeddacen , isteqsa-t ɣef wayen yedṛan .
42015027	Aqeddac nni yenna-yas : « d gma-k i d-yuɣalen , baba-k ifṛeḥ aṭas imi i d-yuɣal di lehna , yezla-yas agenduz-nni yeṭṭuqten .
42015028	Mi gesla i yimeslayen-nni , yerfa yugi ad ikcem ɣer wexxam . Baba-s yeffeɣ a t-iḥellel iwakken ad ikcem ,
42015029	lameɛna nețța yenna-yas : « acḥal iseggasen nekk qeddceɣ fell-ak , ula d yiwen webrid ur ɛuṣaɣ awal-ik , leɛmeṛ ur iyi-tefkiḍ ula d yiwen yiɣid a t-zluɣ iwakken ad feṛḥeɣ d imdukkal-iw .
42015030	ma d mmi-k-agi i gesṛuḥen ayen akk yesɛa ɣef yir tilawin , i nețța tezliḍ agenduz-nni yeṭṭuqten ! »
42015031	Ikker baba-s yenna-yas : A mmi , kečč kull ass tețțiliḍ yid-i , ayen akk sɛiɣ d ayla-k .
42015032	Lameɛna ilaq-aɣ a nefṛeḥ axaṭer gma-k i ḥesbeɣ yemmut atan yuɣal-ed idder , yella ijaḥ , tura iban-ed .
42016001	Sidna Ɛisa yenna daɣen i inelmaden-is : — Yiwen wergaz d ameṛkanti yesɛa lewkil ; lewkil-agi ccetkan fell-as ɣer umɛellem-is nnan-as : « lewkil-ik ițḍeggiɛ ayla-k » .
42016002	Amɛellem-is issawel-as yenna yas : « d acu-ten imeslayen-agi i sliɣ fell-ak ? Efk-iyi-d leḥsab ɣef wayen akk i d-teskecmeḍ d wayen i tessufɣeḍ , axaṭer sya d asawen ur tețțiliḍ ara d lewkil-iw » .
42016003	Lewkil-agi ixemmem deg iman-is yenna : d acu ara xedmeɣ imi amɛellem-iw ad iyi ikkes amkan-iw ? Ad xedmeɣ akal . . . Ur zmireɣ ara ! Ad țreɣ . . . . ssetḥaɣ !
42016004	? riɣ d acu ara xedmeɣ , iwakken m'ara yi-istixxeṛ umɛellem-iw , ad afeɣ wid ara yi-iɛiwnen !
42016005	Yessawel-asen yiwen yiwen i wid akk yesɛan ṭṭlaba ɣer umɛellem-is . Yenna i umezwaru : « Acḥal i k-ițalas umɛellem-iw ? »
42016006	Argaz-nni yerra-yas-d : « Meyya yecbuyla n zzit uzemmur . » Yenna-yas : « sellek awi-d leḥsab ik , qqim taruḍ xemsin » .
42016007	Yenna daɣen i wayeḍ : « i keččini , acḥal i k-ițalas ? » Yenna-yas-d : « meyya tcekkaṛin n yirden . » Yenna-yas : « awi-d leḥsab-ik , qqim taruḍ tmanyin » .
42016008	Amɛellem n lewkil-nni axeddaɛ icekkeṛ-it ɣef tiḥeṛci-ines axaṭer arraw n ddunit-agi ḥeṛcen di lecɣal wway gar-asen akteṛ n warraw n tafat .
42016009	Ma d nekk atan a wen-d iniɣ : sxedmet adrim n ddunit-agi iwakken aț-țesɛum imdukkal , s wakka asm'ara yefnu cci n ddunit , aț-țețțuqeblem di tmezduɣin n dayem .
42016010	Ma nesɛa laman deg yiwen ɣef tɣawsiwin timecṭuḥin , a nețkel fell-as ula ɣef tmeqqranin ; win yellan d axeddaɛ di tɣawsiwin timecṭuḥin , ad yili d axeddaɛ ula di tmeqqranin .
42016011	Ma yella tețḍeggiɛem leṛẓaq n ddunit-agi , anwa ara kkun-iwekklen ɣef leṛẓaq n tideț ?
42016012	Ma yella ulac daɣen laman deg-wen ɣef wayen i wen-iwekkel walebɛaḍ , amek ara wen-d-ye Sidi Ṛebbi ayen i wen-ihegga i kunwi ?
42016013	Ulac aqeddac ara iqedcen ɣef sin yemɛellmen : ma iḥemmel yiwen ad ikṛeh wayeḍ neɣ ma yeṭṭef deg yiwen ur yețțak ara lqima i wayeḍ . Ur tezmirem ara aț-țqedcem ɣef Ṛebbi ma yella tettabaɛem leṛẓaq n ddunit agi .
42016014	Ifariziyen i gesmeḥsisen i wayen i d-iqqaṛ Sidna Ɛisa , stehzayen fell-as axaṭer nutni ḥemmlen idrimen ;
42016015	ma d nețța yenna-yasen : Tesbegginem-d iman-nwen d iḥeqqiyen zdat medden , meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yessen ulawen-nwen ; ayen yesɛan ccan ɣer yemdanen di ddunit-agi , d ayen yețwakeṛhen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
42016016	Uqbel lweqt n Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas , kullec iteddu s ccariɛa n Musa d wayen i d-xebbṛen lenbiya . Tura , lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan tgelda n Ṛebbi ițțubecceṛ ; mkul yiwen yekkat amek ara ț-ikcem s ddreɛ .
42016017	Yeshel i igenni d lqaɛa ad fnun , ma d ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi ur ițțanqas seg-s ula d yiwen n usekkil .
42016018	Kra n win ara yebrun i tmeṭṭut-is iɛawed zzwaǧ , yezna ; kra n win ara yaɣen tameṭṭut yennebran , yezna daɣen .
42016019	Yiwen wergaz d ameṛkanti , ițlusu anagar llebsa ifazen n leḥrir aṛqaq ; mkul ass ixeddem tameɣṛa , ițɛici di zzhu d lfeṛḥ .
42016020	Yiwen igellil isem-is Laɛẓar , iččuṛ d ideddiyen , ițɣimi ɣer tewwurt n umeṛkanti-nni ,
42016021	iṭṭamaɛ deg-s ad yečč ɣas d ayen i gɣellin ɣer lqaɛa ; ula d iqjan țțasen-d ad mecḥen ideddiyen-is .
42016022	Asmi yemmut uẓawali-nni , ddment-eț lmalayekkat wwint-eț ɣer igenni ɣer wanda yella Ibṛahim . Ameṛkanti-nni yemmut ula d nețța , meḍlen-t .
42016023	Di laxeṛt yenɛețțab aṭas , yerfed allen-is , iwala mebɛid Ibṛahim akk-d Laɛẓar ɣer tama-s .
42016024	Iɛeggeḍ yenna-yas : « A baba Ibṛahim , ḥunn fell-i ceggeɛ-ed Laɛẓar ad iger ulamma d ixef n uḍad-is deg waman ad issismeḍ iles-iw , aql-i nneɛtabeɣ aṭas deg uḥǧaǧu-yagi n tmes . »
42016025	Ibṛahim yerra-yas : A mmi , mmekti-d belli tewwiḍ amur-ik di ddunit ; ma d Laɛẓar yeṛwa lehmum . Tura nețța yețțuṣebbeṛ yufa dagi lfeṛḥ , kečč iṣaḥ-ik-id lqeṛḥ .
42016026	Yerna yella gar-aneɣ yiwen yeɣzeṛ annect ila-t , wid yebɣan ad zegren sya ɣuṛ-wen , ur zmiren ara ; kunwi daɣen ur tezmirem ara a d-zegrem ɣuṛ-nneɣ .
42016027	Ameṛkanti-nni yenna-yas : Ihi a baba Ibṛahim di leɛnaya-k ceggeɛ Laɛẓar ɣer wexxam n baba ;
42016028	ad iɛeggen i xemsa-nni wayetma , iwakken ur d-țțasen ara ula d nutni ɣer wemkan-agi n leɛtab .
42016029	Ibṛahim yerra-yas : Atmaten-ik ɣuṛ-sen ccariɛa n Musa d lenbiya , a ten-tebɛen !
42016030	Ameṛkanti-nni yenna-yas-d : A baba Ibṛahim , ur țḥessisen ara i ccariɛa d lenbiya lameɛna ma yuɣal ɣuṛ-sen yiwen syagi , ad beddlen tikli .
42016031	Ibṛahim yerra-yas : M'ur semḥessen ara i ccariɛa n Musa d lenbiya , atan ɣas ma yuɣal yiwen si lmegtin ur as-smeḥsisen ara .
42017001	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i inelmaden is imeslayen-agi : — D lmuḥal ur d-țilint ara sebbat ara yesseɣlin imdanen di ddnub . A nnger n win ara yilin d sebba n uɣelluy ;
42017002	axiṛ a s-ɛelqen aɣaṛef n tsirt ɣer temgeṛṭ-is , a t-ḍeggṛen ɣer lebḥeṛ wala ad yesseɣli di ddnub yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi .
42017003	? adret ɣef yiman-nwen ! Ma yeḍlem gma-k ssefhem-it , ma yendem deg wayen ixdem semmeḥ as .
42017004	? as ma yeḍlem-ik sebɛa iberdan deg wass , ma yusa-d ɣuṛ-ek sebɛa tikkal a k-d-yini : « aql-i ndemmeɣ deg wayen xedmeɣ » , ilaq a s tsemmḥeḍ .
42017005	Ṛṛusul n Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : A Sidi ssemɣeṛ liman-nneɣ !
42017006	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Lemmer tesɛam liman ulamma annect n uɛeqqa n yired , aț-țizmirem aț-ținim i ttejṛa-yagi n țut qleɛ sya tṛuḥeḍ aț-țeẓẓuḍ iman-im di lebḥeṛ , a wen-taɣ awal .
42017007	Anwa deg-wen ara yesɛun axeddam ikerrzen neɣ ikessen lmal , ara s-yinin m'ara d-yuɣal si lexla : « lɛeslama-inek , qqim aț-țesteɛfuḍ , tura a k-d-awiɣ aț-țeččeḍ » .
42017008	Mačči akka ara s-yini , meɛna a s-yini : « ɣiwel beddel lqecc-ik tawiḍ-iyi-d ad ččeɣ ad sweɣ , mi ččiɣ ṛwiɣ , imiren aț-țeččeḍ aț-țesweḍ ula d keččini . »
42017009	Eɛni ad icekkeṛ axeddam-is imi gexdem ayen i s-yumeṛ ?
42017010	Kunwi daɣen m'ara txedmem ayen i wen-d yețwamṛen , init : d iqeddacen kan i nella , nexdem ayen ilaqen a t-nexdem .
42017011	Deg webrid-is ɣer temdint n Lquds , Sidna Ɛisa iɛedda ger tmurt n Samarya akk ț-țmurt n Jlili .
42017012	Mi gekcem ɣer yiwet n taddart , mmugren t-id ɛecṛa imuḍan ihelken lbeṛs , bedden mebɛid
42017013	ɛeggḍen nnan-as : A Sidna Ɛisa ! A Sidi ḥunn fell-aɣ !
42017014	Mi ten-iwala , Sidna Ɛisa yenna yasen : Ṛuḥet a kkun-walin lmuqedmin , a d-cehden belli teḥlam . Deg webrid-nsen mi ṛuḥen , akken walan iman-nsen ḥlan ṣfan ,
42017015	yiwen deg-sen yuɣal-ed seg webrid-nni yețḥemmid Ṛebbi s kra yellan di taɣect-is .
42017016	Yusa-d yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa , iseǧǧed zdat-es , icekkeṛ-it , yerna argaz-agi d aṣamari i gella .
42017017	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i lɣaci : Eɛni ur ḥlin ara di ɛecṛa yid-sen ? I țesɛa nniḍen anda llan ?
42017018	Anagar abeṛṛani-agi i d-yuɣalen ad yeḥmed Ṛebbi !
42017019	Dɣa yenna i usamari-nni : Kker fell-ak uɣal ɣer wexxam ik , imi tumneḍ yis-i , tețțusellkeḍ .
42017020	Ifariziyen steqsan Sidna Ɛisa melmi ara d-tas lḥekma n tgeldit n Sidi Ṛebbi . Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Lḥekma n Sidi Ṛebbi mačči d ayen țwalint wallen .
42017021	Ur nezmir ara a d-nini : ațan dagi neɣ ațan dihin , axaṭer lḥekma n Sidi Ṛebbi ațan gar-wen .
42017022	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i inelmaden-is : A d-yas lweqt i deg ara tmennim aț-țeẓrem Mmi-s n bunadem ulamma d yiwen wass lameɛna ur kkun-id-ițṣaḥ ara .
42017023	Imiren ma nnan-awen-d : atah dagi neɣ atan dihin ur țṛuḥut ara , ur țțazzalet ara ,
42017024	axaṭer am lebṛaq m'ara yewwet seg yixef n igenni ɣer wayeḍ , akken ara yili Mmi-s n bunadem ass n tuɣalin-is .
42017025	Tazwara ilaq ad yeɛteb aṭas , yerna lǧil-agi ur t-iqebbel ara .
42017026	D ayen yedṛan di zzman n Nuḥ ara yedṛun deg ussan n tuɣalin n Mmi-s n bunadem .
42017027	Imdanen llan tețțen , țessen , țemyezwaǧen , zeggjen i dderya-nsen , armi d asmi yekcem Nuḥ ɣer lbabuṛ ; yewwet-ed uḥemmal , neflen-d waman ɣef ddunit , imdanen meṛṛa mmuten .
42017028	D ayen yedṛan di zzman n Luṭ ara yedṛun daɣen : imdanen tețțen tessen , țțaɣen znuzun , țeẓẓun , bennun ;
42017029	asmi d-yeffeɣ Luṭ si temdint n ? udum , teɣli-d seg igenni tmes d ukebri i ten-isnegren akk .
42017030	Akken ara d-tedṛu asm'ara d-iban Mmi-s n bunadem .
42017031	Ass-nni win ara yilin sufella n wexxam ur ilaq ara ad yekcem a d-iddem lqecc-is ; win i d-yufa lḥal di lexla ur ilaq ara ad yuɣal ɣer deffir ;
42017032	mmektit-ed tameṭṭut n Luṭ .
42017033	Win ara yebɣun ad isellek tudert-is ad a s-tṛuḥ , win iwumi ara tṛuḥ ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw a ț-isellek .
42017034	Qqaṛeɣ-awen : deg iḍ-nni , ger sin ara yilin deg yiwen wusu , yiwen ad ițwarfed wayeḍ a d-yeqqim .
42017035	Ger snat n tilawin yeẓẓaden , yiwet aț-țețwarfed tayeḍ a d-teqqim .
42017036	Ger sin yergazen ara yilin di lexla , yiwen ad ițwarfed wayeḍ a d-yeqqim .
42017037	Inelmaden-is steqsan-t nnan-as : Anda ara yedṛu wayagi a Sidi ? Yenna-yasen : Anda yella umurḍus , dinna ara a d-nejmaɛen igudar .
42018001	Sidna Ɛisa yewwi-yasen-d lemtel-agi iwakken ad deɛɛun daymen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ur feččlen ara .
42018002	Yenna-yasen : Deg yiwet n temdint yella yiwen lqaḍi , ur ițțagad Ṛebbi ur yețqadaṛ imdanen .
42018003	Di temdint-nni tella daɣen yiwet n taǧǧalt tețṛuḥu ɣuṛ-es , teqqaṛ-as : « eḥkem s lḥeqq gar-i d wexṣim-iw . »
42018004	Aṭas i geqqim yegguma a s-ye lḥeqq , meɛna ixemmem deg yiman-is yenna : « taǧǧalt-agi eɛyiɣ deg-es ! ? as ur țțaggadeɣ Ṛebbi ur ḥsibeɣ yiwen
42018005	a s-fkeɣ lḥeqq akken ur d-tețțuɣal ara a yi-teṛṛeẓ aqeṛṛuy-iw . »
42018006	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna : Twalam ayen i d-yenna lqaḍi agi amesbaṭli !
42018007	Amek Sidi Ṛebbi ur d-yețțak ara lḥeqq i wid i gextaṛ , i gețɛeggiḍen ɣuṛ-es am yiḍ am ass ? A wen-d-iniɣ : ur yețɛeṭṭil ara iwakken a ten-iɛiwen , a sen-ye lḥeqq .
42018008	Meɛna Mmi-s n bunadem asm'ara d-yas , wissen ma d-yaf liman di ddunit ?
42018009	Yenna-d daɣen lemtel-agi ɣef kra n yemdanen iḥesben iman-nsen d iḥeqqiyen ɣer Ṛebbi , iḥeqqṛen wiyaḍ :
42018010	Sin yergazen ulin ɣer lǧameɛ ad ẓallen ; yiwen ( d ccix n lǧameɛ ) n ukabar n ifariziyen , wayeḍ d amekkas ( ixeddmen ɣer iṛumaniyen istɛemṛen tamurt ) .
42018011	Afarizi ibedd yețẓalla yeqqaṛ deg iman-is : a k-ḥemdeɣ a k-cekkṛeɣ a Sidi Ṛebbi imi ur lliɣ ara am wid yellan d imcumen , d ixeddaɛen , yețɛicin di zzna ; a k-cekkṛeɣ daɣen imi ur lliɣ ara am umekkas-agi .
42018012	? țuẓumeɣ sin wussan di dduṛt , țțakeɣ leɛcuṛ seg wayen sɛiɣ .
42018013	Amekkas-nni ibedd mebɛid , issetḥa ad yerfed ula d allen-is ɣer igenni , yekkat deg idmaren-is yeqqaṛ : « a Sidi Ṛebbi , ḥunn fell-i nekk yellan d amednub ! »
42018014	A wen-d-iniɣ : amekkas-nni yuɣal ɣer wexxam-is di lehna , yețwaqbel ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , ma d afarizi-nni ur yețwaqbel ara . Kra n win yessimɣuṛen iman-is a t-id-isres Sidi Ṛebbi ; ma d win yessimẓiyen iman-is a t-issaɛli .
42018015	Lɣaci țțawin-as-ed ula d llufanat iwakken ad issers afus-is fell-asen a ten-ibarek . Inelmaden-is mi walan ayagi , țnaɣen-ten .
42018016	Sidna Ɛisa issawel asen-d yenna : Anfet-asen i warrac imeẓyanen a d-asen ɣuṛ-i ur ten-țțarrat ara , axaṭer tagelda n Ṛebbi tețwahegga i wid yellan am nutni .
42018017	A wen-iniɣ tideț : kra n win ur neqbil ara tageldit n Sidi Ṛebbi am weqcic ameẓyan , ur ț-ikeččem ara .
42018018	Yiwen umeṛkanti isteqsa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ay argaz n lɛali , d acu i yi ilaqen a t-xedmeɣ iwakken ad sɛuɣ tudert n dayem ?
42018019	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Acuɣeṛ i yi-d-tenniḍ « ay argaz lɛali » ? Ulac win yellan d lɛali-t anagar Sidi Ṛebbi !
42018020	Tessneḍ ayen i d-tenna ccariɛa n Musa : ur xeddem ara zzna , ur neqq ara , ur țțaker ara , ur țcehhid ara s ẓẓur , qadeṛ baba-k d yemma-k .
42018021	Argaz-nni yenna-yas : Ayagi akk xeddmeɣ-t seg wasmi lliɣ d ameẓyan .
42018022	Mi gesla Sidna Ɛisa i imeslayen agi , yenna-yas : Ihi txuṣṣ-ik yiwet lḥaǧa kan : ṛuḥ zzenz ayen akk tesɛiḍ , seddeq-it i yigellilen iwakken aț-țesɛuḍ agerruj deg igenni , tuɣaleḍ-ed aț-țedduḍ yid-i .
42018023	Argaz-nni mi gesla i yimeslayen-agi yeɣli-d fell-as leḥzen imi d ameṛkanti i gella .
42018024	Mi t-iwala yeḥzen , Sidna Ɛisa yenna : Acḥal i sen-yewɛeṛ i wid yesɛan cci ad kecmen ɣer tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi !
42018025	Ishel i welɣem ad iɛeddi di tiṭ n tissegnit wala i umeṛkanti ad yekcem ɣer tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi .
42018026	Wid i s-yeslan , nnan-as : Anwa i gzemren ad ițțusellek ?
42018027	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Ayen yellan d lmuḥal i wemdan yeshel ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
42018028	Buṭrus yenna-yas : I nukkni yeǧǧan kullec iwakken a neddu yid-ek ?
42018029	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : A wen-iniɣ tideț : kra n win yeǧǧan axxam-is , tameṭṭut-is , ayetma-s , imawlan-is neɣ arraw-is ɣef ddemma n tgeldit n Ṛebbi ,
42018030	a s-d-ițune di ddunit-agi akteṛ n wayen yeǧǧa yerna ɣer zdat , ad yesɛu tudert n dayem .
42018031	Sidna Ɛisa ijmeɛ-ed ɣuṛ-es tnac-nni inelmaden-is yenna-yasen : Aql-aɣ a nali ɣer temdint n Lquds , ad idṛu wayen akk i d-uran lenbiya ɣef wayen yeɛnan Mmi-s n bunadem .
42018032	Ad ițțusellem ger ifassen n lkeffaṛ , ad ḍsen fell-as , ad kksen fell-as sser , a t-ssusfen .
42018033	A t-wwten s ujelkkaḍ ( s ucelliṭ ) , a t-enɣen ; ass wis tlata a d-iḥyu si ger lmegtin .
42018034	Inelmaden-is ur fhimen acemma deg wayen i sen-d-yenna , lmeɛna n imeslayen-agi tețwaffer fell-asen . Ur ẓrin ara d acu i gebɣa a t-id-yini .
42018035	Akken qṛib ad yaweḍ Sidna Ɛisa ɣer temdint n Yiriku , yiwen uderɣal yeqqim rrif n webrid yessutur tin n Ṛebbi .
42018036	Mi gesla i lɣaci țɛeddayen , yesteqsa d acu i gedṛan ;
42018037	nnan-as belli d Ɛisa Anaṣari i d-iɛeddan .
42018038	Dɣa iɛeggeḍ yenna : A Ɛisa , a mmi-s n Sidna Dawed , ḥunn fell-i !
42018039	Wid yezwaren țdemmiren-t ɣer deffir qqaṛen-as : Ssusem a k-ihdu Ṛebbi ! Meɛna nețța yețɛeggiḍ akteṛ : A mmi-s n Sidna Dawed , ḥunn fell-i !
42018040	Sidna Ɛisa yeḥbes , yefka lameṛ a s-t-id-awin . Mi d-yewweḍ ɣuṛ-es , yenna-yas :
42018041	D acu tebɣiḍ a k-t-xedmeɣ ? Yerra-yas-d : A Sidi , bɣiɣ a yi-d-yuɣal yeẓri !
42018042	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Wali ! Imi tumneḍ yis-i atan tețțusellkeḍ .
42018043	Imiren kan yuɣal-it-id yeẓri yețwali , yedda d Sidna Ɛisa , iḥemmed Ṛebbi . Mi walan ayagi , lɣaci meṛṛa ḥemden Ṛebbi .
42019001	Sidna Ɛisa iɛedda si temdint n Yiriku .
42019002	Yella dinna yiwen umeṛkanti isem-is Zaci , d ameqqran n imekkasen n ddewla .
42019003	Yebɣa ad iẓer anwa i d Sidna Ɛisa lameɛna ur yezmir ara a t-iwali imi aṭas lɣaci i gellan , yerna nețța d awezlan .
42019004	Yuzzel ɣer zdat , yuli ɣef ttejṛa iwakken a t-iwali m'ara d-iɛeddi syenna .
42019005	Mi gewweḍ Sidna Ɛisa ɣer wemkan-nni , yerfed allen-is yenna i Zaci : A Zaci , ɣiwel ers-ed syenna , ɣuṛ-ek ara nseɣ ass-agi .
42019006	Zaci yers-ed s lemɣawla ad yesteṛḥeb s Sidna Ɛisa .
42019007	Lɣaci mi walan ayagi smermugen wway gar asen qqaṛen : « ɣer yiwen umekkas ( axeddaɛ ) am wagi ara yens ! »
42019008	Zaci iqeṛṛeb-ed ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , yenna-yas : A Sidi , atan ad fkeɣ i igellilen azgen n wayen sɛiɣ , yerna ma ḍelmeɣ yiwen a s-rreɣ ṛebɛa imuren .
42019009	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ass-agi leslak ikcem-ed axxam agi , imi argaz-agi ula d nețța d mmi-s n Ibṛahim .
42019010	Axaṭer Mmi-s n bunadem yusa-d ad inadi ɣef wid iḍaɛen , a ten-isellek .
42019011	Sidna Ɛisa yerna-d yiwen n lemtel i wid i s ismeḥsisen , axaṭer qṛib ad awḍen ɣer temdint n Lquds , lɣaci ɣilen imiren kan ara d-tas tgeldit n Sidi Ṛebbi .
42019012	Yenna yasen : Yiwen wergaz imawlan-is muceɛen , ițeddu ad iṛuḥ ɣer yiwet n tmurt ibeɛden iwakken a t-sbedden d agellid ɣef tmurt-is , imiren a d-yuɣal .
42019013	Qbel ad iṛuḥ , yessawel i ɛecṛa seg iqeddacen-is ; yefka tawizeț i mkul yiwen deg-sen , yenna-yasen : « xedmet yis-sent tjaṛa alamma uɣaleɣ-ed » .
42019014	Arraw n tmurt-is i t-ikeṛhen , ceggɛen deffir-es kra n yemdanen ara yinin : « ur nebɣi ara ad yili wergaz agi d agellid fell-aneɣ . »
42019015	Mi t-sbedden d agellid , yuɣal ed ɣer tmurt-is ; yessawel i iqeddacen nni iwumi yefka tiwiztin iwakken ad isteqsi mkul yiwen deg-sen d acu i d-yerbeḥ yis-sent .
42019016	Amezwaru yusa-d , yenna : A Sidi , s twizeț-nni i yi-d-tefkiḍ rebḥeɣ-ed ɛecṛa nniḍen .
42019017	Agellid yenna-yas : D ayen yelhan ay aqeddac lɛali , imi deg-ek laman ɣef lḥaǧa tamecṭuḥt , a k-fkeɣ aț-țḥekmeḍ ɣef ɛecṛa n tudrin .
42019018	Aqeddac wis sin yusa-d yenna : A Sidi , rebḥeɣ-ed xemsa n twiztin s twizeț i yi-d-tefkiḍ .
42019019	Agellid yenna-yas : Ula d kečč a k-sbeddeɣ d lḥakem ɣef xemsa tudrin .
42019020	Yusa-d uqeddac wis tlata yenna : A Sidi , ațah twizeț-inek ! Freɣ-ț deg yiwen uceṭṭiḍ ;
42019021	uggadeɣ-k axaṭer tweɛṛeḍ , tețțeddmeḍ ayen ur tesriseḍ , tmeggreḍ ayen ur tezriɛeḍ .
42019022	Agellid yerra-yas : ? ef yimeslayen-ik ara k-ḥasbeɣ ay aqeddac amcum ! Teẓriḍ weɛṛeɣ , țeddmeɣ ayen ur sriseɣ , meggreɣ ayen ur zriɛeɣ ;
42019023	acuɣeṛ ihi ur tefkiḍ ara idrimen-iw i wid ara ten-isxedmen , iwakken m'ara d-uɣaleɣ a ten-id jebdeɣ s lfayda ?
42019024	Dɣa yenna i widak yellan dinna : Kkset-as tawizeț-nni , rnut-as-ț i win yesɛan ɛecṛa .
42019025	Nnan-as : A Sidi , yesɛa yakan ɛecṛa !
42019026	Yerra-yasen : Nniɣ-awen : win yesɛan a s nernu , ma d win ur nesɛi ara a s nekkes ula d ayen i gɣil yesɛa-t .
42019027	Ma d iɛdawen-nni-inu ur neqbil ara ad iliɣ d agellid fell-asen , awit-țen-id ɣer dagi tezlum-ten zdat-i .
42019028	Mi gekfa ameslay , Sidna Ɛisa yezwar ɣer zdat lɣaci iwakken ad yali ɣer temdint n Lquds .
42019029	Mi qṛib ad yaweḍ ɣer tuddar n Bitfaji akk-d Bitani , ɣer tama n yiwen yiɣil ițțusemman « Iɣil Uzemmur , » Sidna Ɛisa iceggeɛ sin seg inelmaden-is ,
42019030	yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet ɣer taddart ihin i ɣ-d iqublen , aț-țafem ajḥiḥ yeqqen , leɛmeṛ ur yerkib fell-as yiwen ; brut-as-ed , tawim-t-id .
42019031	Ma yella win i wen-d yennan : « acuɣeṛ i s-d-tebram ? » Init-as : yeḥwaǧ-it Ssid-nneɣ .
42019032	Imceggɛen-nni ṛuḥen , ufan kullec akken i sen-d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa .
42019033	Mi s-d-bran i wejḥiḥ-nni , bab-is yenna-yasen : I wacu i s-d-tebram ?
42019034	Rran-as : Yeḥwaǧ-it Ssid-nneɣ .
42019035	Wwin-d ajḥiḥ-nni , ssersen fell-as ibeṛnyas-nsen , srekben Sidna Ɛisa .
42019036	Akken i gteddu , lɣaci tessun-as-d ibeṛnyas-nsen deg webrid .
42019037	Mi qṛib ad awḍen ɣer temdint n Lquds , di tkessart-nni n yiɣil n uzemmur , inelmaden-is d lɣaci meṛṛa ččuṛen d lfeṛḥ , țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi s ṣṣut eɛlayen ɣef lbeṛhanat akk i walan .
42019038	Qqaṛen : Yețțubarek ugellid i d-yusan s yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi ! Lehna deg igenwan , tamanegt i Sidi Ṛebbi deg imukan ɛlayen .
42019039	Kra ifariziyen di tlemmast lɣaci nnan i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi , ini-yasen i inelmaden-ik ad ssusmen .
42019040	Yenna-yasen : A wen-iniɣ : ma ssusmen nutni , d idɣaɣen ara d-iɛeggḍen .
42019041	Mi qṛib ad yaweḍ ɣer temdint n Lquds , akken i ț-iwala , Sidna Ɛisa yețru fell-as ,
42019042	yenna : A tamdint n Lquds ! Lemmer teẓriḍ ass-agi ayen ara m-d-ifken lehna ! Lameɛna tura ayagi yeffer ɣef wallen-im !
42019043	A d-asen wussan anda ara d-zeḍmen fell-am yeɛdawen-im , a d-kecmen a m-d-zzin si mkul tama , a kem-ḥeṛsen ;
42019044	a kem-snegren kemm d warraw-im , ur țțaǧan deg-m azṛu ɣef wayeḍ ; axaṭer ur teɛqileḍ ara usan i deg i d-yusa leslak n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣuṛ-em .
42019045	Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ɣer wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen , yebda ițqecciɛ wid yeznuzun ,
42019046	yeqqaṛ-asen : Yura di tira iqedsen : Axxam-iw ad yili d axxam n tẓallit , kunwi terram-t d axxam n imakaren .
42019047	Sidna Ɛisa yesselmad mkul ass di lǧameɛ iqedsen . Lmuqedmin imeqqranen , lɛulama d imeqqranen n wegdud țnadin a t-nɣen ,
42019048	lameɛna ur s-ufin ara abrid axaṭer lɣaci meṛṛa smeḥsisen-as , yerna tɛeǧǧben deg yimeslayen-is .
