42020001	Yiwen wass deg ussan-nni , Sidna Ɛisa yella yesselmad lɣaci deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen yețbecciṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ; leḥqen-d lmuqedmin d lɛulama n ccariɛa akk d imeqqranen n wegdud ,
42020002	nnan-as : Di leɛnaya-k ! ansi i k-d-tekka lḥekma s wacu i txeddmeḍ annect agi ? Anwa i k-ț-id-yefkan ?
42020003	Yerra-yasen : A kkun-steqsiɣ ula d nekkini , init-iyi-d :
42020004	anwa i d-icegn , d Ṛebbi neɣ d imdanen ?
42020005	Bdan țemcawaṛen wway gar-asen , qqaṛen : Ma nenna-yas d Ṛebbi , a ɣ-d yini iwacu ihi ur tuminem ara yis ?
42020006	Ma nenna-yas d imdanen , lɣaci akk a ɣ-ṛejmen axaṭer umnen meṛṛa belli Yeḥya d nnbi .
42020007	Dɣa nnan i Sidna Ɛisa : Atan ur neẓri ara anwa i t-id iceggɛen .
42020008	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Ula d nekk ur awen-d-qqaṛeɣ ara ansi i yi-d-tekka lḥekma s wacu i xeddmeɣ annect-agi .
42020009	Dɣa yewwi-d lemtel-agi i lɣaci : Yiwen wergaz yeẓẓa tafeṛṛant ( iger n tẓurin ) issekra-ț i ixemmasen , iṛuḥ ɣer lɣeṛba , iɛeṭṭel dinna .
42020010	Mi d-yewweḍ lweqt n tẓurin , iceggeɛ ɣuṛ-sen aqeddac iwakken a s-d-fken amur-is ; lameɛna ixemmasen-nni wwten-t , rrant-id ifassen d ilmawen .
42020011	Iceggeɛ daɣen aqeddac nniḍen , lameɛna ula d nețța ewten-t , regmen-t , rrant-id ifassen d ilmawen .
42020012	Iceggeɛ-asen daɣen wis tlata , jerḥen-t rnan qecɛen-t-id syenna .
42020013	Amɛellem-nni n tfeṛṛant yenna : « d acu ara xedmeɣ tura ? A sen ceggɛeɣ mmi ameɛzuz , ahat nețța a t-qadṛen ! »
42020014	Lameɛna ixemmasen nni mi t-walan , mcawaṛen wway gar asen nnan : « ataya win ara iweṛten ! Kkret a t-nenneɣ iwakken aț-țuɣal tfeṛṛant d ayla-nneɣ . »
42020015	? eggṛen-t beṛṛa n tfeṛṛant , nɣan-t . D acu ara sen-yexdem tura bab n tfeṛṛant-agi ?
42020016	A d-yas ad ineɣ ixemmasen-nni , ad ye tafeṛṛant i wiyaḍ . Lɣaci mi slan annect-agi , nnan : A ɣ-imneɛ Ṛebbi !
42020017	Lameɛna Sidna Ɛisa imuqel-iten yenna : D acu i d lmeɛna n wawal-agi yuran : adɣaɣ i ḍeggṛen wid ibennun , yuɣal d win yeṭṭfen lebni .
42020018	Kra n win ara yeɣlin ɣef wedɣaɣ-agi ad yeṛṛez ; ma d win i ɣef ara d-yeɣli , ad ițwanɣed .
42020019	Lɛulama n ccariɛa d imeqqranen n lmuqedmin țqelliben a t-ṭṭfen imiren kan , axaṭer fehmen fell-asen i d-yenna lemtel-agi , lameɛna uggaden lɣaci .
42020020	Bdan țɛassan Sidna Ɛisa iwakken ma yeɣli-d deg wawal a t-ṭṭfen . Fkan tajɛelt i kra n yemdanen yerran iman-nsen d wid iḍuɛen Ṛebbi iwakken a t-zenzen ɣer lḥakem n tmurt .
42020021	Steqsan-t ihi s imeslayen-agi : A Sidi , neẓra ayen i d-teqqaṛeḍ d wayen i tesselmadeḍ d lḥeqq , yerna ur txeddmeḍ ara lxilaf ger yemdanen , tesselmadeḍ abrid n Ṛebbi s tideț .
42020022	Ini-yaɣ-d ma d leḥlal a nxelleṣ tabzert i Qayṣer ( isteɛmṛen tamurt ) ?
42020023	Sidna Ɛisa ifaqen i tḥila-nsen , yerra-yasen : Seknet-iyi-d aṣurdi .
42020024	Udem-agi d wayen yuran ɣef wuṣuṛdi-agi wi ten-ilan ? Rran-as : D udem n Qayṣer !
42020025	Dɣa yenna-yasen : Ihi erret i Qayṣer ayen yellan n Qayṣer , terrem i Ṛebbi ayen yellan n Ṛebbi .
42020026	Wehmen s wayen i sen-d-yerra dɣa ssusmen irkul , axaṭer ur ufin ara amek ara t-id-sseɣlin deg wawal zdat lɣaci .
42020027	Kra n isaduqiyen ur nețțamen ara s ḥeggu n lmegtin , qeṛṛben-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , steqsan-t nnan-as :
42020028	A Sidi , atah wayen i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa n Musa : Ma yemmut yiwen wergaz yeǧǧa-d tameṭṭut-is mbla dderya , ilaq gma-s ad yaɣ tameṭṭut-nni , ad yesɛu yid-es dderya iwakken a d-ixlef isem n gma-s yemmuten .
42020029	Ihi llan sebɛa watmaten : amezwaru yezweǧ , yemmut ur d yeǧǧi dderya .
42020030	Wis sin yuɣ taǧǧalt-nni , yemmut ula d nețța .
42020031	Yuɣ-iț daɣen wis tlata , akken armi d wis sebɛa ; mmuten meṛṛa , yiwen ur d-yeǧǧi yid-es dderya .
42020032	? er taggara temmut tmeṭṭut-nni ula d nețțat .
42020033	Ass n ḥeggu n lmegtin , anwa ara ț-yesɛun ț-țameṭṭut-is imi ț-uɣen yiwen yiwen di sebɛa yid-sen ?
42020034	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Irgazen akk-d tilawin n ddunit agi țemyezwaǧen wway gar-asen .
42020035	Lameɛna wid ara yuklalen a d-ḥyun si lmut ɣer tudert n dayem , ur țemyezwaǧen ara ,
42020036	axaṭer ur țțuɣalen ara ad mmten , ad ilin am lmalayekkat ; Sidi Ṛebbi a ten-yerr d arraw-is imi i d-ḥyan si ger lmegtin .
42020037	? ef wayen yeɛnan ḥeggu n lmegtin ula d nnbi Musa ihḍeṛ-ed fell-as mi gessawel i Sidi Ṛebbi zdat udarnu iṛeqqen : a Ṛebbi , Illu n Ibṛahim , Illu n Isḥaq , Illu n Yeɛqub .
42020038	Ṛebbi mačči d Ṛebbi n wid yemmuten meɛna d Ṛebbi n wid yeddren imi ɣuṛ-es ddren irkulli ɣas akken mmuten .
42020039	Kra n imusnawen n ccariɛa neṭqen-d nnan-as : A Sidi , d awal n lɛali i d-tenniḍ .
42020040	Kukran a s-rnun ula d yiwen usteqsi .
42020041	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Amek armi qqaṛen Lmasiḥ d mmi-s n Dawed ?
42020042	Dawed s yiman-is yenna-d di tektabt n ? abur : Sidi Ṛebbi yenna i Ssid-iw : qqim aț-țḥekmeḍ ɣer tama-w tayeffust
42020043	alamma rriɣ iɛdawen-ik seddaw iḍaṛṛen-ik .
42020044	Ma yella Dawed isemma i Lmasiḥ « Sidi » , amek i gezmer ad yili d mmi-s ?
42020045	Lɣaci meṛṛa llan smeḥsisen , Sidna Ɛisa yenna i inelmaden-is :
42020046	? adret iman-nwen ɣef lɛulama n ccariɛa i gḥemmlen ad țḥewwisen s ijellaben iɣezfanen , ḥemmlen ad țsellimen fell-asen yemdanen di leswaq , ad ṭṭfen imukan imezwura di leǧwameɛ d imukan lɛali di tmeɣṛa .
42020047	Tețțen ayla n tuǧǧal , ssiɣzifen taẓallit iwakken a ten-id-walin wiyaḍ . ? ef wannect-agi , Sidi Ṛebbi ihegga-yasen-d lɛiqab d ameqqran .
42021001	Sidna Ɛisa yerfed allen-is , iwala imeṛkantiyen srusun lewɛadi deg usenduq n lǧameɛ .
42021002	Ațaya yiwet n taǧǧalt taẓawalit tger sin iṣurdiyen ɣer usenduq-nni ,
42021003	dɣa yenna : A wen-iniɣ tideț : lweɛda n taǧǧalt-agi taẓawalit tugar akk tiyaḍ ;
42021004	axaṭer wiyaḍ fkan seg wayen sɛan d zzyada ma d nețțat tefka ciṭṭuḥ-nni s wacu ara tɛic .
42021005	Kra n yemdanen țmeslayen ɣef lǧameɛ iqedsen qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Acḥal yecbeḥ lebni n lǧameɛ-agi akk-d țɣawsiwin i s-d-yețțunefken d lweɛda ! Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen :
42021006	Deg wayen akka i tețwalim , a d-awḍen wussan anda kullec ad ihudd , ur d-yețɣimi wedɣaɣ ɣef wayeḍ .
42021007	Steqsan-t nnan-as : A Sidi , melmi ara d-yedṛu wannect-a ? Anta licaṛa ara d isbegnen belli qṛib a d-yedṛu waya ?
42021008	Yenna-yasen : ? uṛ-wat a kkun-kellxen , axaṭer aṭas ara d-yasen s yisem-iw a d inin : d nekk i d Lmasiḥ ! Neɣ a wen-d-inin : lweqt yewweḍ-ed ! Ur ten-țțamnet ara !
42021009	M'ara teslem heddṛen ɣef tegrawliwin d ṭradat ur țțagadet ara , axaṭer ilaq a d-yedṛu uqbel wayagi , lameɛna mačči imiren i ț-țaggara n ddunit .
42021010	Yenna-yasen daɣen : A d-yekker wegdud ɣer wayeḍ , a d-tekker tagelda ɣer tayeḍ .
42021011	A d-tilint zzelzlat timeqqranin , a d-ɣlin di yal lehlakat i gderrɛen ( i gneṭṭḍen ) akk-d laẓ , a d-tilint leɛǧubat yessexlaɛen akk-d licaṛat timeqqranin deg igenni .
42021012	Lameɛna uqbel a d-yedṛu wannect-a , kunwi s inelmaden-iw a kkun-ṭṭfen , a kkun qehṛen , ad ḥekmen fell-awen di leǧwameɛ , a kkun-ḍeggṛen ɣer leḥbus , a kkun-sbedden zdat igelliden d lḥekkam ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw .
42021013	A d-yedṛu wannect-a yid-wen iwakken aț-țilim d inigan-iw zdat-sen .
42021014	Ur țḥebbiṛet ara amek ara tsellkem iman-nwen ,
42021015	axaṭer a wen-d-fkeɣ imeslayen d leɛqel s wacu ara tqablem iɛdawen nwen , ur țizmiren ara ad bedden zdat-wen neɣ a kkun-xalfen .
42021016	Ula d imawlan-nwen akk-d atmaten-nwen d imdukkal-nwen a kkun-zzenzen yerna ad nɣen aṭas seg-wen .
42021017	A kkun-keṛhen yemdanen meṛṛa ɣef ddemma-w ,
42021018	lameɛna yiwen wenẓad n uqeṛṛuy-nwen ur yețṛuḥu .
42021019	? ebṛet , axaṭer s ṣṣbeṛ-nwen ara tsellkem tiṛwiḥin-nwen .
42021020	M'ara teẓrem tamdint n Lquds zzin-as-d lɛeskeṛ n yeɛdawen-is , ḥṣut belli nnger-is yewweḍ-ed .
42021021	Ass-nni ilaq wid ara yilin di temdint n Lquds ad ffɣen , wid ara yilin di lexla ur keččmen ara ɣer temdint , wid ara yilin di tmurt n Yahuda ad rewlen ɣer idurar .
42021022	Axaṭer ussan-nni d ussan n twaɣit deg wacu ara yedṛu meṛṛa wayen yuran .
42021023	A nnger n tilawin ara yilin s tadist neɣ tid ara yessuṭuḍen deg ussan-nni axaṭer a d-teɣli cedda ț-țameqqrant ɣef tmurt , a d-yeɣli wurrif n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wegdud ,
42021024	imezdaɣ-is ad mmten s ujenwi , a ten-awin d imeḥbas ɣer tmura nniḍen . Tamdint n Lquds a ț-ṛekḍen leǧnas ur nețțamen ara s Sidi Ṛebbi , alamma yețwakemmel lweqt i sen-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi , imiren ad yezzi ɣef leǧnas-nni , a ten-iɛaqeb .
42021025	A d-tbanent licaṛat deg iṭij , deg waggur d yitran . Di ddunit , imdanen meṛṛa a ten-iffeɣ leɛqel , ur ẓerren ara d acu ara xedmen m'ara slen i ṣṣut n lemwaji d lebḥuṛ .
42021026	Ad ilin wid ara yemten si lxuf m'ara walin lmuṣibat ara d-yeɣlin ɣef ddunit ; igenwan d kra yellan deg-sen ad rgagin .
42021027	Imiren imdanen ad walin Mmi-s n bunadem iteddu-d ɣef wusigna s tezmert d lɛaḍima tameqqrant .
42021028	M'ara yebdu wannect-agi iḍeṛṛu , sbeddet lqedd-nwen trefdem iqeṛṛay-nwen axaṭer leslak-nwen yewweḍ-ed .
42021029	Yewwi-yasen-d lemtel-agi : Walit taneqleț neɣ ttjuṛ nniḍen !
42021030	M'ara bdunt fessunt , teẓram qṛib a d-yaweḍ unebdu .
42021031	Kunwi daɣen m'ara twalim yewweḍ-ed wannect-agi ḥṣut belli tageldit n Ṛebbi teqṛeb-ed .
42021032	A wen-iniɣ tideț : lǧil-agi ur yețmețțat ara alamma yedṛa wannect-agi meṛṛa .
42021033	Igenni d lqaɛa ad fnun ma d awal-iw ur ifennu ara .
42021034	Ɛasset ɣef yiman-nwen , ḥadret a kkun-iɣuṛṛ zzhu n ddunit ; ɛasset iman-nwen ɣef tissit n ccṛab d iɣeblan , neɣ m'ulac a d-yeɣli fell awen wass-nni ur tebnim fell-as .
42021035	Ass-nni a d-yeɣli am ucebbak ɣef yemdanen n ddunit meṛṛa .
42021036	Ɛiwzet ihi , deɛɛut dayem ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi a wen-d-ye tazmert ara kkun-imenɛen seg wayen i d-iteddun , s wayes ara tbeddem zdat Mmi-s n bunadem .
42021037	Deg wass , Sidna Ɛisa yesselmad di lǧameɛ iqedsen ma deg iḍ , yețṛuḥu ad yens deg yiwen yiɣil ițțusemman : « Iɣil n uzemmur » .
42021038	? ṣbeḥ zik , lɣaci meṛṛa țṛuḥun ɣuṛ-es ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen iwakken ad slen i wawal-is .
42022001	Lɛid i deg xedmen aɣṛum mbla iɣes n temtunt ițțusemman « Tafaska n izimer n leslak » tqeṛb-ed .
42022002	Lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɛulama n ccariɛa țqelliben amek ara nɣen Sidna Ɛisa lameɛna uggaden lɣaci .
42022003	Yudas n Qeṛyut yiwen si tnac-nni n inelmadenis , ikcem-it Cciṭan .
42022004	Iṛuḥ ad yemcawaṛ d lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d lḥekkam iɛessasen n lǧameɛ iqedsen , iwakken a sen izzenz Sidna Ɛisa .
42022005	Nutni feṛḥen yerna ɛuhden-t a s-fken idrimen .
42022006	Yudas yefra awal yid-sen syenna yebda yețqellib amek ara sen-t-yezzenz s tuffra ɣef lɣaci .
42022007	Yewweḍ-ed wass n Tfaska n weɣṛum mbla iɣes n tamtunt i deg ilaq ad zlun izimer n leslak .
42022008	Sidna Ɛisa iceggeɛ Buṭrus d Yuḥenna , yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet a ɣ-theggim imensi n Tfaska .
42022009	Nnan-as : Anda tebɣiḍ a t-nheggi a Sidi ?
42022010	Yerra-yasen : M'ara tkecmem ɣer temdint , a d-temmagrem yiwen wergaz yerfed tacmuxt n waman ; tebɛet-eț ɣer wexxam anda ara yekcem .
42022011	Init i bab n wexxam-nni : yeqqaṛ-ak-d Ssid nneɣ , anda ara nečč imensi n Tfaska nekk d inelmaden-iw ?
42022012	A wen-d-isken yiwet n tɣuṛfeț tameqqrant iwejden , dinna ara theggim imensi n Tfaska .
42022013	Mi ṛuḥen , ufan kullec akken i sen-t-id-yenna , dɣa heggan imensi n Tfaska .
42022014	Mi d-yewweḍ lweqt n imensi , Sidna Ɛisa yeqqim ad yečč nețța d Ṛṛusul-is ,
42022015	yenna-yasen : Acḥal i mennaɣ ad ččeɣ imensi n Tfaska-agi yid-wen uqbel ad nneɛtabeɣ !
42022016	A wen-d-iniɣ : atan ur țțuɣaleɣ ara maḍi a t-ččeɣ alamma tețwakemmel lmeɛna-ines di tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi .
42022017	Yeddem-d tabuqalt n waman n tẓurin , yeḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi yenna : Axet tabuqalt-agi , feṛqet-eț wway gar-awen ,
42022018	a wen-d-iniɣ : sya d asawen ur țțuɣaleɣ ara ad sweɣ seg waman-agi n tẓurin alamma tewweḍ ed tgeldit n Sidi Ṛebbi .
42022019	Yeddem-ed daɣen aɣṛum , iḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi , yebḍa-t yefka-yasen-t , yenna : Aɣṛum-agi d lǧețța-w ara fkeɣ fell-awen , feṛqet-eț gar-awen . Sya d asawen xeddmet akkagi akken ad iyi-d-tețmektayem .
42022020	Mi gfukk imensi , yeddem-ed tabuqalt n waman n tẓurin , yefka yasen-ț yenna : Tabuqalt-agi , d leɛqed ajdid s idammen-iw ara yazzlen fell-awen .
42022021	Ma d win ara yi-zzenzen atan yeqqim-ed yid-i ɣer lmakla .
42022022	Mmi-s n bunadem ad immet akken yura fell-as di tira iqedsen , lameɛna a nnger n wemdan agi ara t-izzenzen !
42022023	Ṛṛusul bdan țmesteqsayen wway gar-asen anwa-t wagi ara t-ixedɛen .
42022024	Inelmaden bdan țemjadalen wway gar-asen iwakken ad ẓren anwa deg-sen ara ițwaḥesben d ameqqran .
42022025	Sidna Ɛisa yenna yasen : Imeqqranen n ddunit ḥekmen s ddreɛ ɣef yigduden-nsen yerna țțusemman d at lxiṛ .
42022026	Kunwi xḍut i wannect-agi . Ameqqran deg-wen ad yili am umeẓyan , win iḥekmen ad yili am win iqeddcen .
42022027	Anwa i d ameqqran , d amɛelem yeqqimen ad yečč neɣ d win i s iqeddcen ? Yak d win yeqqimen ad yečč ! Ma d nekk , aql-i gar-awen am win iqeddcen .
42022028	Kunwi aql-ikkun tṣebṛem yid-i di lmeḥnat-iw .
42022029	Akken i yi-d-ihegga Baba tagelda , ula d nekk a wen-ț-id heggiɣ i kunwi
42022030	iwakken aț-țeččem aț-țeswem yid-i di tgelda-inu . Aț-țeqqimem ɣef yikursiyen n lḥekma , aț-țḥekmem ɣef tnac leɛṛac n wat Isṛail .
42022031	Sidna Ɛisa yenna : A Semɛun sel-iyi-d ! Cciṭan yessuter a kkun-isserwet am yirden ,
42022032	lameɛna dɛiɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi fell-ak akken ur tfeččleḍ ara di liman . Ma d kečč m'ara d-tuɣaleḍ ɣuṛ-i , sseǧhed atmaten-ik .
42022033	Buṭrus yenna-yas : Aql-i heggaɣ iman-iw ad kecmeɣ yid-ek ɣer lḥebs , ad dduɣ yid-ek ula ɣer lmut .
42022034	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : A k-d-iniɣ a Buṭrus , ass-a uqbel ad iskkuɛ uyaziḍ ad iyi-tnekṛeḍ tlata iberdan , aț-ținiḍ ur iyi-tessineḍ ara !
42022035	Yenna-yasen daɣen : M'akken i kkun-ceggɛeɣ mbla idrimen , mbla agrab , mbla arkasen , yella kra i kkun-ixuṣṣen ? Rran-as : Ur aɣ-ixuṣṣ wacemma !
42022036	Yenna-yasen : Ihi tura win yesɛan idrimen neɣ agrab yawi-ten , win ur nesɛi ara ajenwi ad izzenz abeṛnus-is iwakken a d-yaɣ yiwen .
42022037	Axaṭer qqaṛeɣ awen : Ilaq ad yedṛu yid-i wayen yuran . « Ițțuneḥsab seg yembaṣiyen , » yerna ayen yuran fell-i , atan yewweḍ ed .
42022038	Inelmaden-is nnan-as : A Sidi , atnan sin ijenwiyen ! Yenna-yasen : D ayen tura , beṛka !
42022039	Akken yuɣ tannumi , Sidna Ɛisa yeffeɣ , iṛuḥ ɣer yiɣil n uzemmur ; inelmaden-is tebɛen-t .
42022040	Mi gewweḍ ɣer wemkan-nni , yenna-yasen : Dɛut ɣer Ṛebbi akken ur tɣellim ara deg ujeṛṛeb .
42022041	Dɣa yessebɛed iman-is fell-asen azal n kra n lmitrat , yeqqim ɣef tgecrar ideɛɛu i Ṛebbi yeqqaṛ :
42022042	A Baba , ma tebɣiḍ ssebɛed fell-i leɛtab-agi i yi-țṛaǧun ; lameɛna d lebɣi-k ara yedṛun mačči d lebɣi inu .
42022043	Yiwen n lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi iḍheṛ-as-d a t-yesseǧhed .
42022044	Iḍaq wul-is , ikețțeṛ di tẓallit armi tuɣal tidi-ines d idammen yețqiṭṭiren ɣer lqaɛa .
42022045	Mi gekfa , yuɣal-ed ɣer inelmaden-is , yufa-ten-id yewwi-ten yiḍes axaṭer yeɣli-d fell-asen leḥzen ameqqran ;
42022046	dɣa yenna-yasen : Acuɣeṛ i tegnem ? Kkret , dɛut ɣer Ṛebbi akken ur tɣellim ara deg ujeṛṛeb .
42022047	Mazal-it iheddeṛ , atnaya wwḍen d lɣaci . Yudas , yiwen si tnac-nni inelmaden-is yezwar-ed zdat-sen , iqeṛṛeb ɣer Sidna Ɛisa ad isellem fell-as .
42022048	Sidna Ɛisa yenna yas : A Yudas , s sslam ara txedɛeḍ Mmi-s n bunadem !
42022049	Wid yellan d Sidna Ɛisa , mi walan ayen ara yedṛun nnan-as : A Sidi , a newwet s ijenwiyen ?
42022050	Yiwen deg-sen yewwet aqeddac n lmuqeddem ameqqran , igzem-as ameẓẓuɣ ayeffus .
42022051	Sidna Ɛisa yenna yasen : ? ebset ! Dayen tura ! Yessers afus-is ɣef wemkan n umeẓẓuɣ n uqeddac-nni , yerra-yas-t akken yella .
42022052	Dɣa yezzi ɣer wid i d-yusan a t-ḥebsen , ɣer lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɛuqal akk-d lḥekkam n iɛessasen n lǧameɛ iqedsen yenna yasen : Tusam-d ɣuṛ-i s ijenwiyen d iɛekzan am akken d amakar i lliɣ .
42022053	Mkul ass țțiliɣ yid-wen di lǧameɛ iqedsen yiwen ur d-yerfid afus-is ɣuṛ-i . Lameɛna taswiɛt-agi ț-țaswiɛt nwen , ț-țaswiɛt n tezmert n ṭṭlam .
42022054	Mi ṭṭfen Sidna Ɛisa , wwin-t ɣer wexxam n lmuqeddem ameqqran . Buṭrus itbeɛ-iten s lebɛid .
42022055	Ceɛlen times di tlemmast n wefrag , qqimen . Buṭrus yella yid-sen .
42022056	Yiwet n tqeddact twala-t-id yeqqim yeẓẓiẓin , tmuqel-it tenna : Argaz-agi daɣen yella yid-es .
42022057	Lameɛna Buṭrus yenkeṛ , yenna : Ur t-ssineɣ ara a tameṭṭut !
42022058	Cwiṭ akka , iwala-t-id yiwen nniḍen , yenna : Kečč daɣen d yiwen seg-sen . Buṭrus yerra-yas , yenna : Ur lliɣ ara seg-sen ay argaz !
42022059	Iɛedda wazal n ssaɛa , yenṭeq-ed yiwen nniḍen yenna : Mbla ccekk argaz-agi yella yid-es axaṭer d ajlili .
42022060	Buṭrus yerra-yas : Ur ẓriɣ ara d acu i d-teqqaṛeḍ ay argaz ! Werɛad yekfi ameslay . . . yeskkuɛ uyaziḍ .
42022061	Sidna Ɛisa yezzi ɣuṛ-es , immuqel-it . Dɣa Buṭrus yemmekta-d wayen i s-d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa : « Ass-agi , uqbel ad iskkuɛ uyaziḍ ad iyi-tnekṛeḍ tlata iberdan . »
42022062	Yeffeɣ ɣer beṛṛa iṭṭerḍeq s imeṭṭawen axaṭer yendem .
42022063	Irgazen-nni i gɛussen Sidna Ɛisa , stehzayen fell-as kkaten-t .
42022064	? ɣummun-as udem-is , rnan qqaṛen-as « eɛqel ihi anwa i k-id yewten » .
42022065	Rnan regmen-t s mkul rregmat yellan .
42022066	Mi guli wass , tajmaɛt n lɛuqal n wegdud , lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɛulama n ccariɛa nnejmaɛen . Wwin-d Sidna Ɛisa ɣer usqamu n ccṛeɛ .
42022067	Steqsan-t nnan-as : Ma d kečč i d Lmasiḥ , ini yaɣ t-id . Yerra-yasen : Atan ma nniɣ-awen-t-id ur iyi tețțamnem ara ,
42022068	ma steqsaɣ-kkun-id ur iyi-d-țarram ara .
42022069	Lameɛna a wen-d-iniɣ , sya ɣer zdat , Mmi-s n bunadem ad yeḥkem ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert .
42022070	Kkren-d akken ma llan nnan : Ihi kečč d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ? Nețța yerra-yasen : Tennam-t-id , d nekk !
42022071	Imiren ɛeggḍen nnan : Dayen ur neḥwaǧ ara inigan , yenna-t-id s yimi-s , nesla-yas s imeẓẓuɣen-nneɣ .
42023001	Tajmaɛt meṛṛa tekker , wwin Sidna Ɛisa ɣer lḥakem Bilaṭus .
42023002	Bdan țcetkin fell-as , qqaṛen : — Nufa argaz-agi yeskker ccwal ger lɣaci-nneɣ , yeqqaṛ-asen : « ur țxelliṣet ara leɣṛama i Qayṣer » , yeqqaṛ daɣen : « d nețța i d Lmasiḥ , i d agellid » .
42023003	Bilaṭus isteqsa-t s imeslayen-agi : D kečč i d agellid n wat Isṛail ? Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Tenniḍ-t-id .
42023004	Bilaṭus yenna i lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɣaci : Ur s-d-ssukkseɣ acemma i wergaz-agi .
42023005	Nutni țkemmilen qqaṛen : Yeskker ccwal ger lɣaci s wayen yesselmad ; yebda-d si tmurt n Jlili , yuɣal ɣer tmurt n Yahuda meṛṛa , tura yewweḍ-ed ɣer dagi .
42023006	Bilaṭus , mi gesla bedren-d tamurt n Jlili , yesteqsa ɣef Sidna Ɛisa ma d ajlili i gella .
42023007	Mi geẓra belli Sidna Ɛisa ajlili , n tmurt i ɣef yeḥkem Hiṛudus , iceggeɛ-as-t i Hiṛudus yellan ula d nețța di temdint n Lquds ussan-nni .
42023008	Hiṛudus ifṛeḥ aṭas mi geẓra Sidna Ɛisa , axaṭer acḥal segmi yebɣa a t-iẓer ɣef ddemma n wayen yesla fell-as . Yețmenni a t-iwali yexdem lbeṛhan ,
42023009	isteqsa-t aṭas , lameɛna Sidna Ɛisa ur as-d-yerri acemma .
42023010	Lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa yellan dinna țcetkayen fell-as s lɣecc .
42023011	Hiṛudus d lɛeskeṛ-is ḥeqṛen-t , stehzayen fell as , selsen-as yiwen ubeṛnus ifazen , imiren rran-t i Bilaṭus .
42023012	Seg wass-nni , Bilaṭus d Hiṛudus uɣalen d imdukkal nutni yellan zik d iɛdawen .
42023013	Imiren Bilaṭus yesnejmaɛ-ed lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɛulama akk-d lɣaci ,
42023014	yenna-yasen : Tewwim-iyi-d argaz-agi , tennam d yeskker ccwal ger lɣaci ; atan steqsaɣ-t zdat-wen ur ufiɣ ara deg-s ayen akka s wayes i d-teccetkam fell as .
42023015	Ula d Hiṛudus ur s-d yessukkes acemma imi i ɣ-t-id-yerra . Ihi argaz-agi ur yexdim ara ayen yuklalen lmut .
42023016	A s-fkeɣ tiɣṛit imiren a s-serrḥeɣ .
42023017	Mkul Tafaska n izimer n leslak Bilaṭus yețserriḥ-ed i yiwen umeḥbus .
42023018	Lɣaci meṛṛa țɛeggiḍen qqaṛen : Enɣ-it , tserḥeḍ-ed i Barabas !
42023019	Barabas-agi yețwaḥbes ɣef ccwal i gexdem di temdint-nni akk ț-țemgeṛṭ i genɣa .
42023020	Bilaṭus yebɣan a d-iserreḥ i Sidna Ɛisa ihḍeṛ-ed tikkelt nniḍen i lɣaci ,
42023021	lameɛna nutni țɛeggiḍen qqaṛen : Semmeṛ-it , semmeṛ-it ɣef wumidag .
42023022	Bilaṭus inṭeq-ed tikkelt tis tlata , yenna-yasen : D acu n cceṛ i gexdem ? Ur ufiɣ ara deg-s ayen yuklalen lmut . Atan ihi a s-fkeɣ tiɣṛit , imiren a s-serrḥeɣ .
42023023	Lameɛna nutni ḥeṛsen-t s leɛyaḍ qqaṛen : Semmeṛ-it ɣef lluḥ ! ? elben-t s leɛyaḍ-nsen
42023024	dɣa Bilaṭus yeqbel ayen i s-ssutren .
42023025	Iserreḥ-as-d i umeḥbus-nni issekren ccwal yerna yenɣa tamgeṛṭ ; ma d Sidna Ɛisa yefka-yasen-t ad xedmen yis ayen bɣan .
42023026	Mi wwin Sidna Ɛisa , mmugren-d yiwen wergaz n temdint n Qiṛwan ițțusemman Semɛun , yuɣal-ed si lexla ; ḥettmen fell-as ad ibbib amidag-nni , ad iddu deffir Sidna Ɛisa .
42023027	Aṭas n lɣaci i d-itebɛen deffir nsen , llant gar-asen tilawin kkatent deg idmaren-nsent , țrunt fell-as .
42023028	Sidna Ɛisa yezzi-d ɣuṛ-sent yenna-yasent : A yessi-s n temdint n Lquds ur țrumt ara fell-i , țrumt ɣef yiman-nkunt d warraw-nkunt ,
42023029	axaṭer atan a d-asen wussan i deg ara yinin : « ț-țiseɛdiyin tid ur nezmir ara a d-sɛunt dderya , ț-țiseɛdiyin tid ur d-nuriw ara , ur nessuṭeḍ ara . »
42023030	Imiren imdanen ad bdun ad qqaṛen : ay idurar ɣlit-ed fell-aɣ , a tiɣaltin ffremt-aɣ .
42023031	Axaṭer ma xedmen annect-a i wesɣaṛ akken d azegzaw amek ara tedṛu d uquṛan ?
42023032	Wwin daɣen sin n yemcumen iwakken a ten-semmṛen akk-d Sidna Ɛisa .
42023033	Mi wwḍen ɣer yiwen wemkan ițțusemman « Iɣil Uqeṛṛuy » , semmṛen Sidna Ɛisa ɣef lluḥ , nețța d sin-nni yembaṣiyen , yiwen ɣer tama-s tayeffust wayeḍ ɣer tama-s tazelmaṭ .
42023034	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq-ed yenna : A Baba eɛfu-yasen imi ur ẓrin ara d acu i xeddmen . Iɛsekṛiwen-nni gren tasɣaṛt ad feṛqen gar-asen llebsa-ines .
42023035	Lɣaci i gbedden dinna țfeṛṛiǧen ; lmuqedmin țmesxiṛen fell-as qqaṛen : Isellek wiyaḍ , ad isellek iman-is tura ma yella ț-țideț d Lmasiḥ i gextaṛ Ṛebbi .
42023036	Iɛsekṛiwen daɣen țmesxiṛen fell as , qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es bɣan a s-sswen lxell ,
42023037	qqaṛen-as : Ma d agellid n wat Isṛail i telliḍ , sellek iman-ik .
42023038	Ddmen-d daɣen yiwet n telwiḥt , semmṛen-ț sennig uqeṛṛuy-is , uran deg-s : « wagi d agellid n wat Isṛail » .
42023039	Yiwen seg seg imbaṣiyen-nni ițțusemmṛen ɣef lluḥ , ireggem Sidna Ɛisa , yeqqaṛ-as : Ma d Lmasiḥ i telliḍ sellek iman ik tsellkeḍ-aɣ ula d nukkni .
42023040	Lameɛna wayeḍ ilumm-it yenna yas : Ur tuggadeḍ ara Ṛebbi , kečč ițțusemmṛen am nețța ?
42023041	Nukni ma ḥekmen fell-aɣ d lḥeqq axaṭer nuklal lmut s wayen i nexdem ; lameɛna nețța ur yexdim acemma n wayen n diri .
42023042	Yezzi ɣer Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : A Ɛisa , mmekti-yi-d m'ara d-tas lḥekma n tgeldit-ik .
42023043	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : A k-iniɣ tideț , ass-agi aț-țiliḍ yid-i di lǧennet .
42023044	Aț-țili d leǧwahi n tnac , yeɣli-d ṭṭlam ɣef tmurt meṛṛa armi d țlata n tmeddit .
42023045	Leḥjab yellan deg umkan iqedsen di lǧameɛ , icerreg di tlemmast .
42023046	Sidna Ɛisa iɛeggeḍ s ṣṣut ɛlayen : A Baba Ṛebbi , atan ṛṛuḥ-iw ger ifassen-ik . Mi genna imeslayen-agi , yeffeɣ-it ṛṛuḥ .
42023047	Lqebṭan mi geẓra ayen yedṛan yețweḥḥid Ṛebbi yenna : ? - țideț , amdan-agi d aḥeqqi .
42023048	Lɣaci akk i gḥedṛen dinna , mi walan ayen yedṛan ḥeznen , uɣalen syenna kkaten deg idmaren-nsen .
42023049	Wid akk iḥemmlen Sidna Ɛisa qqimen deg lebɛid țmuqulen ayen yedṛan , llant gar-asen tilawin i d yeddan yid-es si tmurt n Jlili .
42023050	Yella yiwen wergaz ger lmuqedmin imeqqranen n usqamu n ccṛeɛ , isem-is Yusef , n taddart n Arimati n at Yahuda . Ur iqbil ṛṛay-nsen , ur iqbil lecɣal-nsen , d argaz n lɛali yerna d aḥeqqi , yețṛaǧu tageldit n Ṛebbi .
42023051	
42023052	Iṛuḥ ɣer Bilaṭus yessuter-as lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa .
42023053	Iṣubb-it-id seg umidag , yețțel-it di lekfen , yessers-it deg uẓekka yeɣzan deg wezṛu anda ur yemḍil ula d yiwen .
42023054	Ass-nni d ass n lǧemɛa i deg țheggin lɣaci iman-nsen i wass n ssebt yellan d ass n westeɛfu .
42023055	Tilawin-nni i d-yeddan d Sidna Ɛisa si tmurt n Jlili , ddant d Yusef ɣer uẓekka , walant amek i ssersen lǧețța-s .
42023056	Syenna uɣalent ɣer yexxamen nsent iwakken ad heggint leɛṭeṛ d wayen xeddmen i lmegtin , i lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa . Azekka-nni n ssebt , steɛfant akken i d-tenna ccariɛa .
42024001	Ass n lḥedd ṣṣbeḥ zik , tilawin nni ṛuḥent ɣer uẓekka , wwint yid-sent leɛṭeṛ i d-heggant .
42024002	Ufant azṛu-nni iqeflen aẓekka , yegrareb akkin .
42024003	Mi kecment ɣer daxel , ur ufint ara lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa ;
42024004	qqiment wehment . Atnaya ḍehṛen-asent-id sin yergazen s llebsa yețfeǧǧiǧen .
42024005	Ikcem itent lxuf , brant i wallen nsent ɣer lqaɛa ; irgazen-nni nnan-asent : Acuɣeṛ tețqellibemt deg uẓekka win yeddren ?
42024006	Ulac-it dagi , yeḥya-d si ger lmegtin . Ur tecfimt ara ɣef wayen i wen-d-yenna di tmurt n Jlili ?
42024007	« Ilaq Mmi-s n bunadem ad ițwasellem ger ifassen n yemcumen , ad ițusemmeṛ ɣef wumidag , ass wis tlata a d-iḥyu si ger lmegtin . »
42024008	Dɣa mmektant-ed imeslayen n Sidna Ɛisa .
42024009	Fɣent seg uẓekka iwakken ad ssiwḍent lexbaṛ ɣef wayen yedṛan , i ḥdac-nni yinelmaden d wid yellan yid-sen .
42024010	Llant gar-asent Meryem-nni tamagdalit , Yunna , Meryem yemma-s n Yeɛqub akk-d tidak nniḍen yeddan yid-sent ; ḥkant kullec i inelmaden .
42024011	Lameɛna ayen i sen-ḥkant iban asen-d am tmacahuț , ur tent-uminen ara .
42024012	Dɣa Buṭrus yekker yuzzel ɣer uẓekka . Mi gewweḍ , imuqel ɣer daxel , iwala anagar lekfen di lqaɛa . Yuɣal syenna , iwhem deg wayen yedṛan .
42024013	Ass-nni , sin inelmaden teddun ɣer yiwet n taddart isem-is Amawes , taddart-agi tebɛed ɣef temdint n Lquds azal n snat sswayeɛ n tikli .
42024014	? eddun țmeslayen wway gar-asen ɣef wayen akk yedṛan .
42024015	Akken llan țmeslayen , Sidna Ɛisa iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-sen , yedda yid-sen .
42024016	Lameɛna nutni ur t-eɛqilen ara .
42024017	Yenna-yasen : ? ef wacu i tețmeslayem akka deg webrid ? D acu i d yesseɣlin fell-awen leḥzen ?
42024018	Yiwen deg-sen , isem-is Klufas , yenna-yas : Eɛni anagar kečč ur neẓri ara ayen yedṛan ussan-agi di temdint n Lquds ?
42024019	Nețța yenna-yasen : D acu yedṛan akka ? Rran-as : Ayen yedṛan d Ɛisa anaṣari nnbi-nni , yesɛan tazmert tameqqrant deg wayen ixeddem d wayen i d-iqqaṛ zdat Ṛebbi akk-d yemdanen .
42024020	Lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lḥekkam-nneɣ sellmen-t ɣer ifassen n iṛumaniyen , ḥekmen fell-as s lmut , semmṛen-t ɣef wumidag .
42024021	Nukni neḍmeɛ d nețța ara isellken wat Isṛail ; ass-agi d ass wis tlata segmi yedṛa wannect-a .
42024022	? - țideț , kra si tilawin-nneɣ swehment-aɣ ! Mi ṛuḥent ṣṣbeḥ zik ɣer uẓekka
42024023	ur ufint ara lǧețța-s . Uɣalent-ed nnant-aɣ-ed belli ḍehṛen asent-ed snat n lmalayekkat i sent id-yennan « atan yedder . »
42024024	Kra seg-neɣ ṛuḥen ɣer uẓekka ufan kullec akken i t-id-nnant tilawin nni ; lameɛna nețța ur t-ẓrin ara .
42024025	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : A wid iɣeflen ! Acimi tețɛeṭṭilem aț-țamnem s wayen i d-nnan lenbiya ?
42024026	Eɛni ur ilaq ara ad yenɛețțab Lmasiḥ akka uqbel ad yekcem di tmanegt-is ?
42024027	Dɣa yessefhem-asen ayen meṛṛa yuran fell-as di tira iqedsen ; yebda-d si tektabin n Sidna Musa , armi ț-țid n lenbiya meṛṛa .
42024028	Mi qṛib ad awḍen ɣer taddart i ɣer teddun , Sidna Ɛisa yerra iman-is am akken yebɣa ad ikemmel abrid-is .
42024029	Lameɛna nutni ḥellelen-t nnan-as : Qqim yid-nneɣ , atan ț-țameddit , qṛib a d-yeɣli yiḍ . Sidna Ɛisa ikcem ad yeqqim yid-sen .
42024030	Mi qqimen ɣer imensi , yeddem ed aɣṛum , yeḥmed Ṛebbi , yebḍa-t , ifṛeq-asen-t .
42024031	Dɣa ldint-ed wallen nsen , ɛeqlen-t , imiren kan yețwaṛfeɛ gar-asen .
42024032	Bdan qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Ur nḥuss ara i kra iṛeqqen deg wulawen-nneɣ mi ɣ-d-iheddeṛ deg ubrid yerna yessefham-aɣ-d ayen yellan di tira iqedsen ?
42024033	Imiren kan , kkren-d uɣalen ɣer temdint n Lquds . Ufan ḥdac-nni inelmaden akk-d imdukkal-nsen nnejmaɛen .
42024034	Nnan-asen-d : ? - țideț Sidna Ɛisa iḥya-d , yesban ed iman-is i Semɛun .
42024035	Nutni daɣen bdan ḥekkun-asen ayen yedṛan yid-sen deg webrid d wamek i t-ɛeqlen mi sen-ifṛeq aɣṛum .
42024036	Mazal-iten țmeslayen , Sidna Ɛisa s yiman-is ibedd-ed gar-asen . Yenna yasen : Sslam fell-awen .
42024037	Ikcem-iten akk lxuf , ɣilen d lexyal i d-ibedden ɣuṛ-sen .
42024038	Nețța yenna-yasen : Acuɣeṛ i tuggadem ? D acu-t ccekk-agi deg ulawen-nwen ?
42024039	Walit ifassen-iw akk-d iḍaṛṛen iw , d nekk s yiman-iw ! Nnalet-iyi-d , walit ! Lexyal ur yesɛi aksum ur yesɛi iɣsan , akken tețwalim sɛiɣ-ten !
42024040	Mi sen-yenna ayagi , yesken-asen ifassen-is d iḍaṛṛen-is .
42024041	Wehmen , ččuṛen wulawen-nsen d lfeṛḥ armi ur zmiren ara ad amnen ayen țwalin , dɣa yenna-yasen : Yella dagi wayen ara ččeɣ ?
42024042	Fkan-as-d aftat n lḥut ikenfen .
42024043	Iddem-it-id , yečča-t zdat-sen .
42024044	Yenna yasen : Atah wayen i wen-d-nniɣ mi lliɣ yid-wen : « ilaq ad yedṛu wayen akk yuran fell-i di ccariɛa n Musa , d lenbiya akk-d ? abur » .
42024045	Dɣa yeldi-yasen leɛqel iwakken ad fehmen tira iqedsen ,
42024046	yenna yasen : Atah wayen yuran tira iqedsen : « ilaq Lmasiḥ ad yeɛteb , a d-iḥyu ass wis tlata si ger lmegtin ,
42024047	țțuba d leɛfu n ddnubat ad țwabeccṛen s yisem-is i leǧnas meṛṛa , a d-bdun si temdint n Lquds » .
42024048	Aql-ikkun d inigan-iw .
42024049	Atan a d-ceggɛeɣ fell-awen wayen i wen yewɛed Baba Ṛebbi . Qqimet di temdint-agi alamma ters-ed fell-awen tezmert n Ṛebbi ara d-yasen seg igenni .
42024050	Sidna Ɛisa yewwi inelmaden-is armi d leǧwahi n taddart n Bitani . Yerfed ifassen-is , iburek-iten .
42024051	Di teswiɛt-nni yemfaṛaq yid-sen , yețwarfed ɣer igenni ,
42024052	ma d nutni ɣlin ɣef tgecrar , țḥemmiden-t ; imiren uɣalen ɣer temdint n Lquds s lfeṛḥ .
42024053	Yal ass țțilin deg wufrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen , țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi .
43001001	Di tazwara yella win yellan d Awal n Ṛebbi , yella akk-d Ṛebbi , d nețța i d Ṛebbi .
43001002	Si tazwara , yella akk-d Ṛebbi ,
43001003	kullec yețwaxleq seg-s ; deg wayen meṛṛa yețwaxelqen , ulac ayen ur d-nekki ara s ɣuṛ-es .
43001004	Deg-s i tella tudert ; tudert-agi tella ț-țafat i yemdanen .
43001005	Tafat tețfeǧǧiǧ di ṭṭlam , yerna ṭṭlam ur ț-iqbil ara .
43001006	Yella yiwen wergaz yețwaceggeɛ ed s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi , argaz-agi isem-is Yeḥya ;
43001007	yusa-d ad yili d inigi n tafat iwakken imdanen meṛṛa ad amnen s cchada-ines .
43001008	Mačči d nețța i ț-țafat , nețța yusa-d d inigi n tafat .
43001009	Tafat-agi ț-țafat n tideț , tusa-d ɣer ddunit iwakken aț-țecṛeq ɣef yal amdan .
43001010	Win yellan d Awal n Ṛebbi yella yakan si tazwara di ddunit , imi d nețța i ț-ixelqen lameɛna ddunit ur t-teɛqil ara .
43001011	Yusa-d ɣer lumma-s lameɛna nețțat ur t-teqbil ara .
43001012	Ma d wid i t-iqeblen yumnen yis , widak iɛuzz-iten , uɣalen d arraw n Ṛebbi ,
43001013	mačči seg wemdan i d-lulen , mačči s lebɣi n tnefsit neɣ s lebɣi n wemdan , lameɛna d Ṛebbi i sen-yefkan tudert tajdiṭ .
43001014	Win akken yellan d Awal , yuɣal-ed d amdan , iɛac gar-aneɣ , yeččuṛ ț-țideț akk-d ṛṛeḥma . Nețweḥḥid di lqeḍra i d-yefka Baba Ṛebbi i Mmi-s awḥid .
43001015	Yeḥya iched-ed fell-as zdat lɣaci yeqqaṛ : D nețța ɣef i wen-d-nniɣ : win ara d-yasen deffir-iw yezwar-iyi-d axaṭer yella uqbel ad iliɣ .
43001016	Yesseṛwa-yaɣ s lxiṛat-is , lbaṛaka ɣef tayeḍ .
43001017	ccariɛa tusa-d s ufus n Sidna Musa , ma d ṛṛeḥma ț-țideț usant-ed s Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
43001018	Yiwen ur yeẓri Sidi Ṛebbi , Mmi-s awḥid yellan ɣuṛ-es , d nețța i ɣ-t-id isbeggnen .
43001019	Atah wamek i geched Yeḥya asmi i d-ceggɛen ɣuṛes lḥekkam n wudayen si temdint n Lquds . Ceggɛen-d ɣuṛes tajmaɛt n lmu-qedmin akk-d yemṛabḍen n at Lewwi akken a t-steqsin , nnan-as : Anwa-k keččini ?
43001020	Yenna-yasen tideț mbla tuffra : Mačči d nekk i d Lmasiḥ !
43001021	Rnan steqsan-t : Anwa-k ihi ? D kečč i d nnbi Ilyas ? Yeḥya yenna-yasen : Xaṭi mačči d nekk . Nutni rnan nnan-as : D nnbi i telliḍ ? Nețța yerra-yasen : Xaṭi !
43001022	Rnan ḥeṛsen-t nnan-as : Anwa-k ihi ? Ilaq a nerr lexbaṛ i wid i ɣ-d-iceggɛen . D acu i teqqaṛeḍ ɣef yiman-ik ?
43001023	Yeḥya yenna-yasen : Nekk d win akken ɣef i d-yenna nnbi Iceɛya : ț-țaɣect tețɛeggiḍ deg unezṛuf : Heggit abrid i Sidi Ṛebbi !
43001024	Wid i d-yusan ɣuṛ-es i gellan di tejmaɛt n ifariziyen ,
43001025	rnan steqsan-t nnan-as : Imi ur telliḍ ara d Lmasiḥ neɣ d nnbi Ilyas neɣ d nnbi nniḍen , iwacu ihi i tesseɣḍaseḍ lɣaci deg waman ?
43001026	Yeḥya yerra-yasen : Nekk sseɣḍaseɣ-kkun deg waman ; yella gar-awen yiwen ur t-tessinem ara ,
43001027	usiɣ-ed uqbel-is , lameɛna ur uklaleɣ ara ad fsiɣ ulamma d lexyuḍ n warkasen-is .
43001028	Annect-agi meṛṛa yedṛa di taddart n Bitanya ɣer tama n cceṛq n wasif n Urdun anda i gesseɣḍas Yeḥya lɣaci .
43001029	Azekka-nni , Yeḥya iwala Sidna Ɛisa iteddu-d ɣuṛ-es , yenṭeq s ṣṣut ɛlayen : Atan Izimer n Ṛebbi , d win ițekksen ddnub n ddunit .
43001030	Fell-as i wen-d-nniɣ : « a d-yas yiwen , zwareɣ-t-id meɛna yella uqbel a d iliɣ . »
43001031	Nekk s yiman-iw ur ẓriɣ ara anwa-t meɛna usiɣ-ed ad sɣeḍseɣ deg waman akken a t-issinen wat Isṛail .
43001032	Atan wayen i d-yenna Yeḥya Aɣeṭṭas fell-as : Walaɣ Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen iṣubb-ed seg igenni s ṣṣifa n tetbirt yers-ed fell-as .
43001033	Nekk ur ẓriɣ ara belli d nețța , meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi i yi-d iceggɛen iwakken ad sɣeḍseɣ deg waman , yenna-yi-d : « Aț-țwaliḍ Ṛṛuḥ iṣubb-ed seg igenni , a d-yers ɣef yiwen wergaz , d nețța ara yesɣeḍsen imdanen s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen . »
43001034	Ayagi d ayen i ẓrant wallen-iw , daymi i d-cehdeɣ fell-as qqaṛeɣ : « Argaz-agi d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi . »
43001035	Azekka-nni , Yeḥya mazal-it dinna nețța d sin seg inelmaden-is .
43001036	Akken i gwala Sidna Ɛisa iɛedda-d , yenna-yasen : Atan izimer n Ṛebbi !
43001037	Mi slan i imeslayen-agi , inelmaden-nni tebɛen Sidna Ɛisa .
43001038	Sidna Ɛisa mi geẓra tebɛen-t-id , yezzi-d ɣuṛ-sen , yenna-yasen : D acu tebɣam ? Nutni nnan-as : Ṛabi ( yeɛni : a Sidi ) , anda tzedɣeḍ ?
43001039	Yenna-yasen : Ddut yid-i aț-țeẓrem . Inelmaden-nni ddan yid-es , ẓran anda yezdeɣ . Aț-țili d ṛebɛa n tmeddit , qqimen yid-es armi yekfa wass .
43001040	Andriyus , gma-s n Semɛun Buṭrus d yiwen seg inelmaden-nni i gtebɛen Sidna Ɛisa m'akken i sen-d-yehdeṛ fell-as Yeḥya ;
43001041	iṛuḥ uqbel ɣer gma-s Semɛun , yenna-yas : Nufa Lmasiḥ ! Win i gextaṛ Ṛebbi .
43001042	Andriyus yewwi Semɛun ɣer Sidna Ɛisa . Akken i t-iwala Sidna Ɛisa , imuqel-it yenna-yas : Kečč i d Semɛun mmi-s n Yunes . Sya d asawen aț-tețțusemmiḍ Sifas yeɛni : Buṭrus .
43001043	Azekka-nni , Sidna Ɛisa yeqsed ad iṛuḥ ɣer tmurt n Jlili . Deg ubrid yemmuger-ed Filibus , yenna-yas : Ddu-d yid-i !
43001044	Filibus , d yiwen si taddart n Bitsayda , anda akken zedɣen Buṭrus d Andriyus .
43001045	Syenna Filibus yeẓra-d Natanahil , yenna-yas : Nufa win ɣef i d-yehdeṛ Sidna Musa di ccariɛa , win akken i ɣef d-xebbṛen lenbiya . D Ɛisa , mmi-s n Yusef n taddart n Naṣaret .
43001046	Natanahil yerra-yas : Amek , yezmer a d-iffeɣ wayen yelhan si taddart n Naṣaret ? Filibus yerra-yas : Eyya-d aț-țwaliḍ s wallen-ik !
43001047	Sidna Ɛisa mi gwala Natanahil iteddu-d ɣuṛ-es , yenna : Atah yiwen n wat Isṛail n tideț , ulac deg-s leɣdeṛ .
43001048	Natanahil yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : Anda i yi-tesneḍ ? Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Uqbel a k-d-yessiwel Filibus , mi telliḍ ddaw n tneqleț , walaɣ-k-in !
43001049	Dɣa Natanahil yenna-yas : A Sidi , kečč d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ! D agellid n wat Isṛail !
43001050	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Tumneḍ imi i k-d-nniɣ walaɣ k-in seddaw n tneqleț ; sya ɣer zdat aț-țeẓred ayen yugaren annect-a !
43001051	S tideț qqaṛeɣ-awen : aț-țwalim igenni yeldi , lmalayekkat n Sidi Ṛebbi țțalint țṣubbunt sennig Mmi-s n bunadem .
43002001	Mi ɛeddan sin wussan , tella-d tmeɣṛa di tmurt n Jlili di taddart Kana , tella dinna yemma-s n Sidna Ɛisa .
43002002	Ula d Sidna Ɛisa yețwaɛṛed nețța d inelmaden-is ɣer tmeɣṛa-nni .
43002003	Imi i ten-ixuṣṣ ccṛab , yemma-s n Sidna Ɛisa tusa-d ɣuṛ-es tenna-yas : Ifuk-asen ccṛab !
43002004	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : D nekk neɣ d kemm i teɛna temsalt-agi a tameṭṭut ? Taswiɛt-iw urɛad i d-tusi .
43002005	Dɣa yemma-s tenna i iqeddacen : Xedmet ayen akk ara wen-d yini !
43002006	Llant dinna sețța n tsebbalin ( icmuxen ) yețwaxedmen s wedɣaɣ , țțawint si tmanyin ar meyya uɛecrin n litrat , seg-sent i d-țɛemmiṛen wat Isṛail aman i luḍu .
43002007	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i iqeddacen nni : ? čaṛet ticbayliyin-agi d aman . ? čuṛen-tent armi d imi .
43002008	Dɣa yenna-asen : Ɛemmṛet-ed tura kra n waman seg-sent tawim-ten i bab n tmeɣṛa . Kkren xedmen akken i sen-d-yenna .
43002009	Win iḍebbṛen di leqdic n tmeɣṛa yeɛṛeḍ aman-nni i guɣalen d ccṛab . Nețța ur yeẓri ansi i d-yekka ccṛab-agi , ma d iqeddacen-is ẓran axaṭer d nutni i ten-id-yewwin . Iṛuḥ yessawel i yesli ,
43002010	yenna-yas : Di tmeɣṛiwin , medden srusun-d uqbel ccṛab yelhan , mi ḥman inebgawen rennun-asen-d win ṛqiqen , kečč teǧǧiḍ ccṛab yelhan armi ț-țura !
43002011	D wagi i d lbeṛhan amezwaru i gexdem Sidna Ɛisa di taddart n Kana di tmurt n Jlili . S wakka i d-ibeggen tamanegt-is i inelmaden-is , dɣa umnen yis .
43002012	Deffir wayagi Sidna Ɛisa iṣubb ɣer temdint n Kafernaḥum . Tedda yid-es yemma-s , atmaten-is akk-d inelmaden-is ; qqimen dinna anagar kra n wussan .
43002013	Akken i d-yeqṛeb wass n Tfaska n izimer n leslak yellan d lɛid n wat Isṛail , Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer temdint n Lquds .
43002014	Yufa deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen wid yeznuzun izgaren , ulli d yetbiren , yufa daɣen dinna wid yețbeddilen idrimen ; rran lǧameɛ iqedsen d ssuq .
43002015	Ixdem-ed ajelkwaḍ ( acelliṭ ) s wemrar , yebda itellif-iten s nutni s wulli-nsen akk-d yezgaren-nsen , iqleb-asen ( ițți-yasen ) daɣen ṭṭwabel i wid yețbeddilen idrimen , iḍeggeṛ asen kullec ɣer lqaɛa , issufeɣ-iten meṛṛa seg ufrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen ,
43002016	yerna yenna i wid yeznuzun itbiren : Kkset syagi ssuq-nwen ! Wagi d axxam n Baba , ur t-țarrat ara d ssuq !
43002017	inelmaden-is mmektan-d ayen yuran di tektabt n ? abur : Leḥmala i sɛiɣ ɣef wexxam-ik am tmes itețțen ul-iw !
43002018	Kkren wudayen nnan-as : D acu n lbeṛhan ara ɣ-d-tbeggneḍ akken a neɛqel lḥekma s wayes i txeddmeḍ annect-agi ?
43002019	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Huddet lǧameɛ-agi iqedsen , a t-id-sbeddeɣ di tlata wussan .
43002020	At Isṛail nnan-as : Wid yebnan lǧameɛ-agi qqimen deg-s sețța uṛebɛin iseggasen , kečč tzemreḍ a s-tɛiwdeḍ lebni di tlata wussan !
43002021	Lameɛna « Lǧameɛ » i ɣef d-yehdeṛ Sidna Ɛisa d lǧețța-s .
43002022	Asmi i d-yeḥya Sidna Ɛisa si lmut ɣer tudert , inelmaden-is mmektan-d awal-agi i d-yenna , dɣa umnen s wayen yuran di tira iqedsen d wayen i d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa .
43002023	Mi gella Sidna Ɛisa di temdint n Lquds di lweqt n lɛid n Tfaska , aṭas i gumnen yis mi ẓran lbeṛhanat i gxeddem .
43002024	Lameɛna Sidna Ɛisa ur yesɛi ara deg-sen laman axaṭer yessen-iten akken ma llan .
43002025	Ur yeḥwaǧ ara a s-d-ḥkun ɣef yemdanen imi yessen ayen yellan deg wulawen-nsen .
43003001	Yella yiwen wergaz isem-is Nikudem i gellan si tejmaɛt n ifariziyen , d yiwen seg imeqqranen n wat Isṛail .
43003002	Iṛuḥ-ed deg iḍ ɣer Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : A Sidi neẓra belli d Sidi Ṛebbi i k-id-iceggɛen iwakken a ɣ-teslemdeḍ , axaṭer yiwen ur izmir ad yexdem lbeṛhanat i txeddmeḍ m'ur yelli ara Ṛebbi yid-es .
43003003	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : S tideț a k-d-iniɣ : yiwen ur izmir ad iẓer tagelda n Ṛebbi m'ur d-iɛawed ara talalit .
43003004	Nikudem yenna-yas : Amek i gezmer yiwen a d iɛiwed talalit ma yella d amɣaṛ ? Izmer ad yuɣal ɣer tɛebbuṭ n yemma-s a d iɛiwed talalit ?
43003005	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Nniɣ-ak s tideț : m'ur d-ilul ara yiwen seg waman akk-d Ṛṛuḥ , ur ițțizmir ara ad ikcem tagelda n Ṛebbi .
43003006	Win i d-ilulen seg wemdan ț-țaṛwiḥt n wemdan , win i d-ilulen s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen d Ṛṛuḥ .
43003007	Ur țțawham ara imi i k-d-nniɣ « ilaq a d-tɛiwdem talalit . »
43003008	Aḍu yețsuḍu ɣer wanda i s-yehwa , tselleḍ i ṣṣut-is lameɛna ur tẓerreḍ ara ansi d-yekka neɣ anda iteddu . Akka daɣen i gella ɣef kra n win i d-ilulen s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
43003009	Nikudem yenna-yas : Amek ara yedṛu wayagi ?
43003010	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Tesselmadeḍ ccariɛa i wat Isṛail ur tessineḍ ara annect-agi ?
43003011	A k-iniɣ tideț : neqqaṛ-ed ayen kan i nessen , nețcehhid-ed s wayen i nwala , lameɛna kunwi ur teqbilem ara cchada-nneɣ .
43003012	M'ur tuminem ara mi wen-d-hedṛeɣ ɣef temsalin n ddunit-agi amek ara tamnem s tid n igenwan ?
43003013	Yiwen ur yuli ɣer igenwan anagar Mmi-s n bunadem i d-iṣubben seg igenwan .
43003014	Akken i gɛelleq Musa azrem n nnḥas ɣef tgejdit deg unezṛuf , i glaq ad ițțuɛelleq daɣen Mmi-s n bunadem
43003015	iwakken kra n win yumnen yis , ad yesɛu tudert n dayem .
43003016	Sidi Ṛebbi iḥemmel imdanen n ddunit meṛṛa armi i d-yefka Mmi-s awḥid iwakken kra n win yumnen yis ur yețmețțat ara meɛna ad yesɛu tudert n dayem .
43003017	Sidi Ṛebbi ur d-iceggeɛ ara Mmi-s ɣer ddunit iwakken ad iḥaseb imdanen meɛna iwakken a ten-isellek .
43003018	Win yumnen yis ur yețțuḥaseb ara , ma d win ur numin ara atan yețțuḥaseb yakan , imi ur yumin ara s Mmi-s awḥid n Sidi Ṛebbi .
43003019	Atah lḥisab yellan fell-as : « tafat tusa-d ɣer ddunit meɛna imdanen ḥemmlen ṭṭlam axiṛ n tafat , axaṭer lecɣal-nsen diri-ten . »
43003020	Kra n win ixeddmen cceṛ , yekṛeh tafat yerna ur ițqeṛṛib ara ɣuṛ-es , ițțaggad a d-tessedheṛ yir lecɣal-is .
43003021	Ma d win iteddun di tideț yețțas-ed ɣer tafat akken a d-iban belli kra n wayen ixeddem , ixeddem it di lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi .
43003022	Syenna Sidna Ɛisa d inelmaden is ṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n Yahuda , qqimen dinna kra n wussan , sseɣḍasen lɣaci deg waman .
43003023	Yeḥya daɣen yella yesseɣḍas lɣaci di Ɛinun ț-țama n Salim imi qwan waman dinna . Aṭas lɣaci i d-ițasen ɣuṛ-es iwakken a ten-isseɣḍes .
43003024	Di lweqt-nni urɛad i skecmen Yeḥya ɣer lḥebs .
43003025	Yiwen wass kra seg inelmaden n Yeḥya hedṛen d yiwen wergaz n wat Isṛail ɣef luḍu .
43003026	Ṛuḥen ɣer Yeḥya , nnan-as : A Sidi , win yellan yid-ek mi telliḍ agemmaḍ i wasif n Urdun , win akken i ɣef d-tcehdeḍ , atan yesseɣḍas ula d nețța , lɣaci meṛṛa țṛuḥun ɣuṛ-es .
43003027	Yeḥya yerra-yasen : Yiwen ur izmir ad ixdem ccɣel nniḍen sennig wayen i s-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi .
43003028	Aql-ikkun s yiman-nwen d inigan , acḥal d abrid i wen-d nniɣ : mačči d nekk i d Lmasiḥ , țwaceggɛeɣ d kan uqbel-is .
43003029	Iwumi tewjed teslit ? Anaɣ i yesli ! Ma d aḥbib n yesli d win yețɣimin ɣer tama-s , ifeṛṛeḥ m'ara isel i ṣṣut n yesli . Ula d nekk tura lfeṛḥ-iw yennekmal .
43003030	Ilaq nețța ad yețțimɣuṛ nekk ad țțim ? iyeɣ .
43003031	Win i d-yusan seg igenni yella nnig n wayen yellan meṛṛa , ma d win yellan n ddunit-agi iheddeṛ anagar ɣef wayen yellan di ddunit . Win i d-yusan seg igenni yella sennig-nsen meṛṛa .
43003032	Icehhed-ed ɣef wayen yeẓra d wayen yesla , lameɛna yiwen ur iqbil cchada-ines .
43003033	Win ara iqeblen cchada-ines , yetḥeqqeq belli Sidi Ṛebbi yeqqaṛ tideț .
43003034	S tideț amceggeɛ n Ṛebbi iheddeṛ imeslayen i s-d-yefka Ṛebbi , imi i t-yeččuṛ s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
43003035	Baba Ṛebbi iḥemmel Mmi-s , yerra kullec ger ifassen-is .
43003036	Win yumnen s Mmi-s yesɛa tudert ur nfennu ; ma d win ur numin ara s Mmi-s ur yețwali ara tudert , urrif n Ṛebbi yezga fell-as .
43004001	Ifariziyen slan s Sidna Ɛisa yesɛa aṭas n inelmaden yerna yesseɣḍas imdanen akteṛ n Yeḥya .
43004002	Lameɛna Sidna Ɛisa mačči d nețța s yiman-is i gesseɣḍasen lɣaci , ccɣel-agi yeǧǧa-t i inelmaden-is . Mi geẓra Sidna Ɛisa belli slan yis ,
43004003	yeffeɣ si tmurt n at Yahuda . Iwakken ad yuɣal ɣer tmurt n Jlili ,
43004004	ilaq-as ad iɛeddi ɣef tmurt n Samarya .
43004005	Yelḥeq ɣer taddart n Sicar iqeṛben akal i d-yeǧǧa Sidna Yeɛqub i mmi-s Yusef ;
43004006	dinna i gella lbir n Sidna Yeɛqub . Sidna Ɛisa yeqqim ɣef yiri n lbir akken ad yesteɛfu . Aț-țili d tnac n wass .
43004007	Yiwet n tmeṭṭut n Samarya tusa-d aț-țagem ; Sidna Ɛisa iluɛa-ț , yenna yas : A tameṭṭut , ma ulac aɣilif efk-yi-d ad sweɣ !
43004008	Yuɣ lḥal inelmaden-is ṛuḥen ɣer temdint a d-aɣen ayen ara ččen .
43004009	Tameṭṭut-nni tasamarit tenna-yas : Amek , kečč yellan n wat Isṛail tessutreḍ-iyi-d aț-țesweḍ i nekk yellan ț-țasamarit ? ( axaṭer at Isṛail ur țemsaɛaden ara yerna ur țemxalaḍen ara d isamariyen ) .
43004010	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Lemmer teẓriḍ ayen i gebɣa Ṛebbi a m-t-id ye akk-d win i m-d-yessutren aman , tili d kemm ara s-yessutren a m-d-ye aț țesweḍ ; nețța , d aman yessidiren ara m-d-ye .
43004011	Tameṭṭut-nni tenna-yas : A Sidi , ur tesɛiḍ ara s wacu ara d-tessaliḍ aman yerna lbir-agi lqay . Ansi ara k-d-kken waman-agi yessidiren ?
43004012	Tebɣiḍ eɛni a d-tiniḍ tɛeddaḍ jeddi-tneɣ Yeɛqub i ɣ-d yeǧǧan lbir-agi , i geswan seg-s nețța d warraw-is akk țqeḍɛiyin-is ?
43004013	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Kra n win ara yeswen seg waman-agi ad yuɣal ad iffad ,
43004014	lameɛna win ara yeswen seg waman ara s-d-fkeɣ ur yețțuɣal ara ad iffad . Yerna aman ara s-d-fkeɣ ad uɣalen deg-s ț-țaɛwint ur nețɣaṛ ara , a d-tețfeggiḍ seg-s tudert n dayem .
43004015	Tameṭṭut-nni tenna-yas : A Sidi , efk-iyi-d seg waman-agi iwakken ur țțuɣaleɣ ara ad ffadeɣ neɣ a d-aseɣ ɣer lbir-agi ad agmeɣ .
43004016	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ṛuḥ ssiwel-as i wergaz-im tuɣaleḍ-ed ɣer dagi !
43004017	Tameṭṭut-nni terra-yas : Ur sɛiɣ ara argaz ! Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Tesɛiḍ lḥeqq imi d-tenniḍ ur sɛiɣ ara argaz .
43004018	Axaṭer xemsa iberdan i tzewǧeḍ , win yellan yid-em tura mačči d argaz-im ; deg wannect-agi ț-țideț i d-tenniḍ !
43004019	Nețțat tenna-yas : A Sidi , ɛeqleɣ-k d nnbi i telliḍ .
43004020	Ini-yi-d anwa i gesɛan lḥeqq : lejdud nneɣ isamariyen ɛebbden Ṛebbi ɣef wudrar-agi , ma d kunwi s wat Isṛail teqqaṛem amkan anda i glaq a neɛbed Ṛebbi , d Lquds .
43004021	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : A tameṭṭut , amen s wayen ara m-d-iniɣ ! Iteddu-d lweqt anda mačči ɣef wedrar-agi neɣ di Lquds ara yețwaɛbed Baba Ṛebbi .
43004022	Kunwi s isamariyen tɛebbdem ayen ur tessinem ara , ma d nukkni nɛebbed ayen nessen axaṭer leslak ițekk-ed seg wegdud n Isṛail .
43004023	Lameɛna iteddu-d lweqt yerna yewweḍ-ed , anda lmumnin n ṣṣeḥ ad ɛebbden Baba Ṛebbi s Ṛṛuḥ , s tideț , axaṭer d lmumnin-agi n ṣṣeḥ i gebɣa Baba Ṛebbi .
43004024	Imi Ṛebbi d Ṛṛuḥ i gella , ilaq wid ara t-iɛebden a t-ɛebden s Ṛṛuḥ ț-țideț .
43004025	Tameṭṭut-nni tenna-yas : ? riɣ a d-yas win i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , win ițțusemman « Lmasiḥ » . Asm'ara d-yas a ɣ-d-yessefhem kra yellan .
43004026	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Lmasiḥ , d nekk s yiman-iw !
43004027	Imiren kan wwḍen-d inelmaden is . Wehmen imi i t-id-ufan yețmeslay ț-țmeṭṭut ; lameɛna yiwen deg-sen ur s-yenni : d acu i tebɣiḍ ɣuṛ-es , neɣ iwacu i tețmeslayeḍ yid-es ?
43004028	Dɣa tameṭṭut-nni teǧǧa tacmuxt-is dinna , tuzzel ɣer taddart tenna i lɣaci :
43004029	Eyyaw aț-țe ? rem yiwen yenna-yi-d akk ayen xedmeɣ ! Ad yili d nețța i d Lmasiḥ !
43004030	Lɣaci ffɣen-d si taddart ṛuḥen ad ẓren Sidna Ɛisa .
43004031	Uqbel a d-yaweḍ lɣaci , inelmaden-is ḥeṛsen-t ad yečč , nnan-as : A Sidi ɛeddi-d aț-țeččeḍ !
43004032	Yenna-yasen : Sɛiɣ lqut ara ččeɣ meɛna kunwi ur teẓrim ara d acu-t .
43004033	Inelmaden qqaṛen wway gar asen : Ahat yella win i s-d-yewwin ad yečč .
43004034	Sidna Ɛisa yenna : Lqut-iw , d m'ara xedmeɣ lebɣi n win i yi-d-iceggɛen akken ad kemmleɣ ccɣel i ɣef i yi-iwekkel .
43004035	Kunwi teqqaṛem mazal ṛebɛa wagguren i tmegra ma d nekk a wen-d-iniɣ : ldit allen-nwen aț-țwalim igran weṛṛaɣ-it , wejden i tmegra !
43004036	Win imeggren yewwi lexlaṣ-is , ijemmeɛ lɣella i tudert n dayem . Akka lfeṛḥ yesdukkel win izerrɛen d win imeggren .
43004037	Axaṭer ț-țideț lemtel-agi i d-yeqqaṛen : « Yiwen izerreɛ wayeḍ imegger » !
43004038	Nekk ceggɛeɣ-kkun aț-țmegrem anda ur tezriɛem ara , anda i nɛețțaben wiyaḍ ; nutni nɛețțaben , kunwi tɣelltem lɣella n leɛtab-nsen .
43004039	Aṭas n isamariyen n taddart-nni i gumnen s Sidna Ɛisa mi d-tcehhed fell-as tmeṭṭut-nni s imeslayen-agi : « yenna-yi-d akk ayen i xedmeɣ ! »
43004040	Mi wwḍen ɣuṛ-es isamariyen-nni , ḥellelen Sidna Ɛisa ad iqqim yid-sen . Dɣa yeqqim yid-sen sin wussan .
43004041	Aṭas nniḍen i gumnen yis mi slan i imeslayen-is .
43004042	Nnan-as i tmeṭṭut-nni : Tura numen yis mačči kan ɣef wayen i ɣ-d-tenniḍ fell-as , nesla yas s yiman-nneɣ , neẓra belli d nețța i d amcafeɛ n ddunit .
43004043	Mi ɛeddan sin wussan , Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ syenna ɣer tmurt n Jlili .
43004044	Yenna-yasen : « Ulac nnbi yesɛan leqdeṛ di tmurt-is . »
43004045	Mi gewweḍ ɣer tmurt n Jlili , lɣaci sṭreḥben yis s lfeṛḥ d ameqqran imi ula d nutni ḥedṛen i lɛid n Tfaska di temdint n Lquds , ẓran akk lbeṛhanat i gexdem dinna .
43004046	Yuɣal iɛedda ɣef taddart n Kana di tmurt n Jlili anda akken i gerra aman d ccṛab . Yella yiwen lḥakem n ddewla n temdint n Kafernaḥum yesɛa mmi-s yuḍen yenṭer .
43004047	Mi gesla s Sidna Ɛisa yuɣal-ed si tmurt n Yahuda ɣer tmurt n Jlili , iṛuḥ-ed ɣuṛ-es , iḥellel-it iwakken a d yas ad yesseḥlu mmi-s yețmețțaten .
43004048	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : M'ur twalam ara licaṛat d lbeṛhanat ur tețțamnem ara ?
43004049	Lḥakem n ddewla yenna-yas : A Sidi , di leɛnaya-k ɣiwel uqbel ad yemmet mmi !
43004050	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ṛuḥ , atan mmi-k yeḥla ! Argaz-nni yumen s wayen i s-d yenna Sidna Ɛisa , dɣa yuɣal
43004051	ɣer wexxam-is . Mi gteddu ɣer wexxam , mmugren-t-id iqeddacen-is nnan-as : Mmi-k yeḥla !
43004052	Yesteqsa-ten anta ssaɛa i deg yeḥla , rran-as-ed : Iḍelli ɣef lweḥda n tmeddit i t-teffeɣ tawla .
43004053	Baba-s n weqcic-nni yewwi-d s lexbaṛ belli di ssaɛa-nni i s-d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa « Mmi-k yeḥla » i geḥla mmi-s , seg imiren yumen nețța d wat wexxam-is meṛṛa .
43004054	D wagi i d lbeṛhan wis sin i gexdem Sidna Ɛisa di tmurt n Jlili mi d-yuɣal si tmurt n Yahuda .
43005001	Ɛeddan kra n wussan , Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer temdint n Lquds akken ad yeḥdeṛ i lɛid n wat Isṛail .
43005002	Di temdint-agi , zdat n tewwurt yețțusemman « tawwurt n wulli , » tella yiwet n temda n waman qqaṛen-as s tɛibṛanit : « Bitesda » . Zzin-as-d xemsa ifragen yesɛan ssqef .
43005003	Deg ifragen-agi aṭas n imuḍan i gḍelqen , iderɣalen , iɛibanen d wukrifen țṛaǧun akk ad ḥerrken waman .
43005004	Axaṭer tiswiɛin yețṣubbu-d yiwen n lmelk ɣer temda , yețḥerrik aman-nni ; win ara ikecmen d amezwaru ɣer temda m'ara ḥerrken waman ad yeḥlu si lehlak-is akken yebɣu yili .
43005005	Yella dinna yiwen wergaz tmanya utlatin iseggasen nețța di lehlak .
43005006	Sidna Ɛisa mi t-iwala yeḍleq , yeẓra belli aṭas aya segmi yuḍen , yenna-yas : Tebɣiḍ aț-țeḥluḍ ?
43005007	Amuḍin-nni yerra-yas-ed : A Sidi , ur sɛiɣ ara win ara yi gren ɣer temda m'ara ḥerken waman ; m'ara ɛeṛdeɣ ad kecmeɣ wayeḍ a yi-izwir .
43005008	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ekker fell-ak , ddem tagertilt-ik telḥuḍ !
43005009	Imiren kan argaz-nni yeḥla , yeddem tagertilt-is yebda tikli . Ayagi yedṛa deg wass n ssebt yellan d ass n westeɛfu .
43005010	Lecyux n wat Isṛail nnan-as i wergaz-nni yeḥlan : Ass-agi d ass n westeɛfu , d leḥṛam fell-ak aț-țebbibeḍ tagertilt-ik !
43005011	Nețța yerra-yasen : Win i yi-sseḥlan d nețța i yi-d yennan : « Ddem tagertilt-ik telḥuḍ . »
43005012	Steqsan-t nnan-as : Anwa i k-d-yennan akka ?
43005013	Lameɛna argaz-nni yeḥlan ur yeẓri ara anwa-t , axaṭer Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ger lɣaci ițemdeḥḥasen dinna .
43005014	Taswiɛt kan , Sidna Ɛisa yemlal-it-id deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen yenna yas : Aql-ik teḥliḍ , sya d asawen xḍu i ddnub iwakken ur ideṛṛu ara yid-ek akteṛ n wannect-nni !
43005015	Argaz-nni iṛuḥ ad ixebbeṛ lecyux n wat Isṛail belli d Sidna Ɛisa i t-yesseḥlan .
43005016	Lecyux n wat Isṛail bdan accetki ɣef Sidna Ɛisa imi i gexdem ayagi deg wass n westeɛfu .
43005017	Sidna Ɛisa yenna yasen : Baba Ṛebbi ixeddem ar tura , nekk daɣen aql-i xeddmeɣ !
43005018	? ef wawal-agi lecyux-nni ufan-as-ed sebba nniḍen , țqelliben amek ara t-nɣen , mačči kan imi ur iqudeṛ ara ass n westeɛfu meɛna imi gerra Ṛebbi d Baba-s yerna yesseɛdel iman-is d Ṛebbi .
43005019	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : S tideț qqaṛeɣ-awen : Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ur ixeddem acemma s yiman is , ixeddem ala ayen yeẓra ixeddem-it Baba-s . Kra n wayen ixeddem Baba-s ixeddem-it Mmi-s daɣen .
43005020	Axaṭer Baba-s iḥemmel Mmi-s , yesbeggin-as-d lecɣal-is meṛṛa . Ad as-yernu tazmert s wacu ara yexdem ayen yugaren kra n wayen teẓram ar ass-a , aț-țwehmem di lecɣal-is .
43005021	Akken Baba Ṛebbi yeskkaray-ed lmegtin ițțarra-yasen tudert , akken daɣen Mmi-s yețțak tudert i win yebɣa .
43005022	Baba Ṛebbi ur iḥekkem ɣef yiwen , lameɛna yerra lḥekma ger ifassen n Mmi-s
43005023	iwakken imdanen meṛṛa ad qadṛen Mmi-s akken țqadaṛen Baba-s . Win ur nqudeṛ ara Mmi-s ur iqudeṛ ara Baba-s i t-id iceggɛen .
43005024	S tideț nniɣ-awen : « kra n win yesmeḥsisen i wawal-iw , yumnen s win i yi-d-iceggɛen yesɛa tudert n dayem yerna ulac fell-as lḥisab , lameɛna iɛedda yakan si lmut ɣer tudert .
43005025	S tideț nniɣ-awen : « iteddu-d lweqt yerna yewweḍ-ed anda lmegtin ad slen i ṣṣut n Mmi-s n Ṛebbi , yerna wid akk ara s-yeslen ad idiren .
43005026	Akken yesɛa Baba Ṛebbi tudert deg yiman-is i gefka daɣen i Mmi-s ad yesɛu tudert deg yiman-is .
43005027	Yerra ger ifassen-is lḥekma imi d Mmi-s n bunadem i gella .
43005028	Ur țțawhamet ara , axaṭer lweqt iteddu-d , wid akk yellan deg i ? ekwan ad slen i ṣṣut n Mmi-s n bunadem ,
43005029	imiren a d-kkren ; wid ixedmen lxiṛ a d-ḥyun ɣer tudert n dayem ma d wid ixedmen cceṛ a d-ḥyun iwakken ad țțuḥasben .
43005030	Ur xeddmeɣ acemma s lebɣi-w lameɛna ḥekkmeɣ s lebɣi n Baba Ṛebbi . Lḥekma-inu d lḥeqq axaṭer ur țqellibeɣ ara ad xedmeɣ lebɣi-w , lameɛna lebɣi n win i yi-d-iceggɛen . »
43005031	Ma yella d nekk kan i d icehden ɣef yiman-iw cchada-inu ur tețwaqbal ara .
43005032	Lameɛna sɛiɣ inigi nniḍen , yerna cchada-ines tṣeḥḥa .
43005033	Tceggɛem ɣer Yeḥya testeqsam-t , nețța icehhed-ed ɣef tideț .
43005034	Nekk ur țkileɣ ara ɣef cchada n wemdan , nniɣ-awen-d annect-agi akken aț-țețwasellkem .
43005035	Yeḥya yusa-d ț-țaftilt yețfeǧǧiǧen ger yemdanen , ma d kunwi tebɣam aț-țferḥem taswiɛt kan di tafat-is .
43005036	Tella fell-i cchada nniḍen yugaren tin n Yeḥya : d lecɣal i yi d-yefka Baba Ṛebbi a ten-xedmeɣ . Lecɣal-agi țcehhiden-d fell-i belli d Baba Ṛebbi i yi-d-iceggɛen .
43005037	Ula d Baba Ṛebbi i yi d-iceggɛen icehhed-ed fell-i , meɛna kunwi leɛmeṛ ur teslim i ṣṣut-is , ur teẓrim udem-is .
43005038	Awal-is ur yezdiɣ ara deg wulawen nwen imi ur tuminem ara s win i d-iceggeɛ .
43005039	Tețnadim di tektabin iqedsen tɣilem aț-țafem deg-sent tudert n dayem . Tiktabin-agi d nutenti i-d-icehden fell-i .
43005040	Lameɛna kunwi tugim a d-tasem ɣuṛ-i aț-țesɛum tudert .
43005041	Ur țqellibeɣ ara ad sɛuɣ cciɛa ɣer yemdanen ,
43005042	? riɣ belli deg wulawen-nwen ur tḥemmlem ara Ṛebbi .
43005043	Nekk usiɣ-ed s yisem n Baba Ṛebbi , kunwi ur iyi-teqbilem ara . Lemmer a d-yas wayeḍ a d-icehhed ɣef yiman-is a t-tqeblem !
43005044	Amek ara tesɛum liman ma yella tețnadim aț-țemyeɛǧabem wway gar awen wala aț-țɛeǧbem kan i Ṛebbi ?
43005045	? adret aț-țɣilem d nekk ara iccetkin fell-awen zdat Baba Ṛebbi ! D Musa ara iccetkin fell-awen , d Musa-nni ɣef i tețțeklem .
43005046	Lemmer ț-țideț tumnem s Musa tili tumnem yis-i , axaṭer yura-d fell-i di tira iqedsen .
43005047	Ma yella ur tuminem ara s wayen i d-yura , amek ara tamnem s wawal-iw ?
43006001	Syenna , Sidna Ɛisa yezger lebḥeṛ n Jlili ( iwumi qqaṛen daɣen lebḥeṛ n Tiberyas ) .
43006002	Aṭas n yemdanen i geddan yid-es mi walan yesseḥlay imuḍan .
43006003	Daymi Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer wedrar ad innejmaɛ d inelmaden-is .
43006004	Lɛid n wat Isṛail iwumi qqaṛen Tafaska n izimer n leslak tqeṛb-ed .
43006005	Akken i gwala lɣaci iteddu-d ɣuṛ-es , Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq ɣer Filibus yenna-yas : Ansi ara d-naɣ aɣṛum i wannect agi n lɣaci ?
43006006	Yesteqsa-t kan iwakken ad i ? er d acu ara s-d-yini , axaṭer nețța yeẓra yakan d acu ara yexdem .
43006007	Filibus yerra-yas : A Sidi ur d-keffunt ara mitin alef iwakken mkul yiwen deg-sen a t-id-iṣaḥ ciṭṭuḥ n weɣṛum .
43006008	Andriyus gma-s n Semɛun Buṭrus , yellan seg inelmaden , yenṭeq ɣer Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas :
43006009	Yella dagi yiwen weqcic yesɛa xemsa n teḥbulin n weɣṛum n tem ? in akk-d sin iselman ( iḥutiwen ) , lameɛna d acu ara d-xedmen i wannect-agi n lɣaci ?
43006010	Sidna Ɛisa issendeh-iten ad sɣimen lɣaci . Deg wemkan-nni yeqwa leḥcic , lɣaci yeqqim ɣer lqaɛa , ad ilin azal n xemsa alaf n yergazen .
43006011	Sidna Ɛisa yeddem-ed tiḥbulin-nni n weɣṛum , yeḥmed Ṛebbi icekkeṛ-it , ifṛeq-itent i lɣaci yeqqimen ɣef leḥcic , yefreq-asen daɣen iselman nni , ččan akk armi ṛwan .
43006012	Mi ččan ṛwan , Sidna Ɛisa iluɛa inelmaden-is yenna-yasen : Jemɛet-ed ayen i d-yeqqimen akken ur ixețțeṛ ula d acemma .
43006013	Ayen i d-yegran si xemsa n teḥbulin-nni n weɣṛum n temẓin , jemɛen-t-id ččuṛen yis tnac n iḍellaɛen ( tiquftin ) .
43006014	Lɣaci-nni mi walan lbeṛhan-agi n Sidna Ɛisa , țɛeggiḍen qqaṛen : Mbla ccekk argaz-agi d nețța i d nnbi-nni ara d-yasen ɣer ddunit .
43006015	Sidna Ɛisa mi geẓra lɣaci bɣan a t-rren d agellid fell-asen , iḍeṛṛef iman-is , yuli ɣer wedrar .
43006016	Mi geɣli yiṭij , inelmaden-is uɣalen ṣubben ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ .
43006017	Rekben taflukt ad zegren ɣer ugemmaḍ , ɣer Kafernaḥum . Yeɣli-d yakan ṭṭlam , Sidna Ɛisa urɛad yelḥiq ɣuṛ-sen .
43006018	Yekker-ed yiwen waḍu iǧehden , lebḥeṛ yerwi .
43006019	Inelmaden-is yuɣ-iten lḥal wwḍen ɣer tlemmast n lebḥeṛ . Walan Sidna Ɛisa iteddu-d ɣuṛ-sen , ileḥḥu-d ɣef wuḍar s ufella n waman . Mi d-iqeṛṛeb ɣer teflukt nsen , xelɛen .
43006020	Sidna Ɛisa yenna yasen : Ur țțaggadet ara , d nekk !
43006021	Bɣan a t-srekben yid-sen di tefluk meɛna ufan-d iman-nsen wwḍen ɣer wemkan anda țeddun .
43006022	Azekka-nni , lɣaci yeqqimen agummaḍ i lebḥeṛ wwin-d s lexbaṛ belli anagar yiwet n teflukt i gellan dinna , yerna Sidna Ɛisa ur yeddi ara d inelmaden-is mi ṛuḥen di teflukt .
43006023	Dɣa tiflukin nniḍen i d-yusan si temdint n Tiberyas , wwḍent-ed ɣer wemkan-nni anda akken i sen-yebḍa Sidna Ɛisa aɣṛum mi geḥmed Ṛebbi .
43006024	Mi walan lɣaci ulac dinna Sidna Ɛisa akk-d inelmaden-is , rekben tiflukin , zegren ɣer Kafernaḥum ad qellben fell-as .
43006025	Mi t-ufan dinna , nnan-as : A Sidi , melmi d-tusiḍ ɣer dagi ?
43006026	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : S tideț a wen-d-iniɣ : imi teččam aɣṛum armi teṛwam i tețqellibem fell-i mačči imi tfehmem lbeṛhanat-iw .
43006027	Ur țḥebbiṛet ara ɣef yiɛebbaḍ-nwen , ḥebbṛet ɣef tudert yețdumun i dayem . Tudert-agi , d Mmi-s n bunadem ara wen-ț-id-yefken , Baba Ṛebbi yefka-yas tazmert imi i t-iɛellem s ṭṭabeɛ-ines .
43006028	Nnan-as : D acu ara nexdem ihi , d acu i gețṛaǧu Ṛebbi deg-nneɣ ?
43006029	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Sidi Ṛebbi yețṛaǧu deg-wen aț-țamnem s win i d-iceggeɛ !
43006030	Nutni nnan-as : Ihi acu n lbeṛhan ara ɣ-d-tessekneḍ akken a namen yis-ek ? D acu ara txedmeḍ ?
43006031	Lejdud-nneɣ ččan tamanna deg unezṛuf , akken yura di ccariɛa n Musa : Yefka-yasen ččan aɣṛum i d-yekkan seg igenni .
43006032	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : S tideț nniɣ-awen , mačči d Musa i wen-d-yefkan aɣṛum i d-yekkan seg igenni , lameɛna d Baba Ṛebbi ! D nețța i wen-d-yețțaken aɣṛum n ṣṣeḥ i d-itekken seg igenni .
43006033	Axaṭer aɣṛum i d-yekkan s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi , d win i d-iṣubben seg igenni , d nețța i d-yețțaken tudert n ṣṣeḥ i yemdanen .
43006034	Nutni nnan-as : A Sidi țțak-aɣ-d mkul ass seg weɣṛum-agi .
43006035	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : D Nekk i d aɣṛum yețțaken tudert . Win i d-yusan ɣuṛ-i ur yețțuɣal ara ad illaẓ , win yumnen yis-i ur yețțuɣal ara ad iffad .
43006036	Nniɣ-awen-t-id yakan : twalam yerna tugim aț-țamnem !
43006037	Wid akk ara yi-d-ye Baba Ṛebbi a d-asen ɣuṛ-i ; win ara d-yasen ɣuṛ-i ur t-țarraɣ ara ɣef tewwurt .
43006038	Ur d-ṣubbeɣ ara seg igenni akken ad xedmeɣ lebɣi-w , ṣubbeɣ-d ad xedmeɣ lebɣi nwin i yi-d-iceggɛen .
43006039	Win i yi-d iceggɛen ur yebɣi ara ad yeɛṛeq ula d yiwen seg wid i yi-d-yefka , lameɛna a ten-id-sseḥyuɣ si lmut deg wass aneggaru .
43006040	D wagi i d lebɣi n Baba Ṛebbi : « kra n win yețmuqulen ɣer Mmi-s , yumen yis , ad yesɛu tudert n dayem yerna a t-id-sseḥyuɣ si lmut ass aneggaru . »
43006041	Lɣaci bdan smermugen gar-asen ɣef Sidna Ɛisa imi d yenna : « d nekk i d aɣṛum i d yekkan seg igenni . »
43006042	Qqaṛen : « Mačči d Ɛisa mmi-s n Yusef wagi ? Nessen baba-s nessen yemma-s , amek i gezmer a d-yini tura : ṣubbeɣ-d seg igenni ? »
43006043	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Beṛkat asmermeg gar-awen !
43006044	Ulac win i gzemren a d-yas ɣuṛ-i ma yella mačči d Baba Ṛebbi i s-d yessawlen , yerna nekk a t-id-sseḥyuɣ si lmut ass aneggaru .
43006045	Akken yura deg idlisen n lenbiya : « Ad lemden akk s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi . » Kra n win isellen i wawal n Baba Ṛebbi , ilemden s ɣuṛ-es , a d-yas ɣuṛ-i .
43006046	Ulac win yeẓran Baba Ṛebbi ala win i d-yusan s ɣuṛ-es , nețța yeẓra Baba Ṛebbi .
43006047	S tideț nniɣ-awen : kra n win yumnen , yesɛa tudert n dayem ,
43006048	axaṭer d nekk i d aɣṛum i d yețțaken tudert .
43006049	? as akken lejdud nwen ččan tamanna deg unezṛuf , mmuten .
43006050	Atan weɣṛum i d-yekkan seg igenni : win ara yeččen seg-s ur yețmețțat ara .
43006051	D nekk i d aɣṛum n tudert i d yekkan seg igenni . Kra n win ara yeččen seg weɣṛum-agi ad yidir i dayem . Aɣṛum ara d-fkeɣ d lǧețța w , yis ara tɛic ddunit .
43006052	Mi slan wat Isṛail i wannect-agi bdan țemjadalen qqaṛen wway gar asen : Amek akka i gezmer a ɣ-d-ye aksum-is a t-nečč ?
43006053	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen daɣen : S tideț a wen-d-iniɣ : m'ur teččim ara si lǧețța n Mmi-s n bunadem , m'ur teswim ara seg idammen-is ur tețțili ara deg-wen tudert .
43006054	Win ara yeččen si lǧețța-w , ara yeswen seg idammen-iw ad yesɛu tudert n dayem , yerna a t-id-sseḥyuɣ si lmut ass aneggaru .
43006055	Axaṭer lǧețța-w d lqut n ṣṣeḥ , idammen-iw ț-țissit n ṣṣeḥ .
43006056	Win ara yeččen si lǧețța-w , ara yeswen seg idammen-iw ad yili deg-i nekk ad iliɣ deg-s .
43006057	Baba Ṛebbi i yi-d-iceggɛen deg-s i tella tudert , d nețța i yi ssidiren . Akken daɣen win ara yeččen seg-i ad yidir yis-i .
43006058	D wagi i d aɣṛum i d-yekkan seg igenni . Mačči am weɣṛum-nni i ččan lejdud-nwen ; nutni mmuten , ma d win ara yeččen aɣṛum-agi ad yidir i dayem .
43006059	D imeslayen-agi i d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa asmi i gesselmed di lǧameɛ n wat Isṛail di temdint n Kafernaḥum .
43006060	Mi s-slan inelmaden-is , aṭas deg-sen nnan : Imeslayen-agi weɛṛen , anwa i gzemren a ten-yeqbel ?
43006061	Sidna Ɛisa , mi geẓra inelmaden is sgermuden wway gar-asen ɣef wayen i d-yenna , yenna-yasen : Iqṛeḥ-ikkun lḥal ?
43006062	D acu ara tinim ihi m'ara teẓrem Mmi-s n bunadem yuɣal ɣer wanda yella di tazwara ?
43006063	D Ṛṛuḥ i d-yețțaken tudert amdan ur yețțaweḍ ɣer wacemma ma yețkel ɣef yiman-is . Imeslayen-agi i wen-d-nniɣ , d wigi i d Ṛṛuḥ , d wigi i ț-țudert .
43006064	Lexsaṛa : llan kra gar awen ur numin ara ! Si tazwara Sidna Ɛisa yeẓra anwi deg-sen ur numin ara , yeẓra daɣen anwa ara t-ixedɛen .
43006065	Yenna-yasen daɣen : Daymi i wen-d-nniɣ : ulac win i gzemren a d-yas ɣuṛ-i ma yella mačči d Baba Ṛebbi i s-d-issawlen . »
43006066	Seg imiren , aṭas i t-yeǧǧan seg inelmaden-is , rewlen fell-as .
43006067	Sidna Ɛisa yezzi ɣer tnac inelmaden-is , yenna-yasen : Ur tebɣim ara aț-țṛuḥem ula d kunwi ?
43006068	Semɛun Buṭrus yerra-yas : A Sidi , anwa i ɣer ara nṛuḥ ? ? uṛ-ek i gella wawal n tudert .
43006069	Nukni nesɛa laman deg-k , yerna neẓra belli d kečč i d Imqeddes i d-iceggeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
43006070	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Mačči d nekk i kkun-ixtaṛen di tnac yid-wen ? ? as akken yiwen gar awen d Cciṭan .
43006071	Yenna-d annect-agi ɣef Yudas , mmi-s n Semɛun n taddart n Qeṛyut , yiwen ger tnac inelmaden-is ara t-ixedɛen .
43007001	Deffir wayagi , Sidna Ɛisa ikemmel abrid-is iteddu di tmurt n Jlili . Ur yebɣi ara ad iṛuḥ ɣer tmurt n Yahuda , axaṭer imeqqranen n wat Isṛail țqelliben fell-as iwakken a t nɣen .
43007002	Lɛid i deg xeddmen wat Isṛail tiɛecciwin iqeṛṛeb-ed .
43007003	Dɣa atmaten is nnan-as : Kker aț-țṛuḥeḍ ɣer tmurt n Yahuda akken inelmaden-ik yellan dinna ad ẓren ayen i txeddmeḍ .
43007004	Win yebɣan ad yețwassen , ur ilaq ara ad iffer wayen i gxeddem . Imi tzemreḍ i lecɣal imeqqranen , sbeggen-ed iman-ik a k-walin akk yemdanen .
43007005	Atmaten-is s yiman-nsen ur uminen ara yis .
43007006	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Ma yella ɣuṛ-wen iwweḍ-ed lweqt , nekk ɣuṛ-i mazal .
43007007	Medden ur sɛin ara sebba s wayes ara kkun keṛhen , keṛhen-iyi nekk imi d-sbeggneɣ yir lecɣal-nsen .
43007008	Kunwi ṛuḥet aț-țɛeggdem , ma d nekk ur tedduɣ ara , imi lweqt-iw urɛad i d-yusi .
43007009	Mi sen-d-yenna ayagi , yeǧǧa-ten ṛuḥen , nețța yeqqim di tmurt n Jlili .
43007010	Mi ṛuḥen watmaten-is ad ɛeggden , iṛuḥ ula d nețța mbla ma yesseɛlem yiwen .
43007011	Deg ussan n lɛid , imeqqranen n wat Isṛail țnadin fell-as , steqsayen anda yella .
43007012	Lɣaci i d-yusan ad ɛeggden , bdan țmeslayen fell-as . Kra deg-sen qqaṛen : D argaz n lxiṛ ! Wiyaḍ qqaṛen : Awah ! Yețkellix kan ɣef lɣaci !
43007013	Yiwen ur d-yehdiṛ fell-as ɛinani axaṭer uggaden imeqqranen n wat Isṛail .
43007014	Mi gneṣṣef lɛid n iɛecciwen , Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen , yebda yesselmad .
43007015	At Isṛail wehmen , qqaṛen : Ur yeɣṛi ara d lɛulama yerna yessen tira iqedsen , ansi i s-d-tekka tmusni-yagi ?
43007016	Sidna Ɛisa yenna yasen : Ayen i sselmadeɣ mačči s ɣuṛ-i i d-yekka , yekka-d s ɣuṛ win i yi-d iceggɛen .
43007017	Win iqesden ad yexdem lebɣi n Ṛebbi ad yeɛqel ma yella wayen i sselmadeɣ yekka-d s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi neɣ d imeslayen-iw kan .
43007018	Win iheddṛen s yisem-is yețqellib ad yawi cciɛa i yiman-is . Ma d win yețqelliben a d-yawi cciɛa i win i t-id iceggɛen yeqqaṛ tideț , ulac deg-s lexdeɛ .
43007019	Nnbi Musa yeǧǧa-yawen-d ccariɛa , lameɛna ulac gar-awen win i ț-itebɛen ! Acuɣeṛ i tețqellibem a yi tenɣem ?
43007020	Lɣaci nnan-as : Anwa akka i gebɣan a k-ineɣ ? Waqila ikcem-ik lǧen !
43007021	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : ? ef wayen akka xedmeɣ i twehmem ?
43007022	Meyzet ɣef wayagi : nnbi Musa yeǧǧa-yawen-d lextana ( ṭṭhaṛa ) , lɛadda-agi mačči s ɣuṛ-es i d-tekka meɛna s ɣuṛ lejdud-is . Atan tqeblem tessextanem deg wass n westeɛfu .
43007023	Ma yella tqeblem aț-țesxetnem i weqcic deg ass n westeɛfu , iwakken ur tețxalafem ara ccariɛa n Musa , acuɣeṛ terfam fell-i imi sseḥlaɣ amdan s lekmal-is deg wass n westeɛfu ?
43007024	Beṛkat ! Ur ḥekkmet ara s wayen kan i țwalint wallen-nwen , lemdet aț-țḥekmem s lḥeqq .
43007025	Kra n imezdaɣ n temdint n Lquds wehmen , qqaṛen : Mačči d win akken i țqelliben a t-nɣen ?
43007026	Atan iheddeṛ ɛinani zdat lɣaci , yiwen ur s-yenni acemma ! Ɛeqlen-t lɛulama-nneɣ d nețța i d Lmasiḥ ?
43007027	Argaz-agi neẓra ansi-t , lameɛna Lmasiḥ asm'ara d-yas yiwen ur iẓerr ansi ara d-yekk .
43007028	Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq s ṣṣut ɛlayen , slan-as-d akk deg wefrag n Lǧameɛ iqedsen , yenna : Tessnem-iyi yerna teẓram ansi i d-kkiɣ ! Ur d-usiɣ ara s lebɣi-w , lameɛna d Bab n lḥeqq i yi-d iceggɛen ; kunwi ur t-tessinem ara .
43007029	Nekkini ssneɣ-t axaṭer s ɣuṛ-es i d-usiɣ yerna d nețța i yi-d-iceggɛen .
43007030	Bɣan a t-ṭṭfen imiren , meɛna yiwen ur yesris afus-is fell-as imi ass-is urɛad d-yewwiḍ .
43007031	Aṭas n lɣaci si terbaɛt-nni i gumnen yis , qqaṛen : M'ara d-yas Lmasiḥ , eɛni ad ixdem lbeṛhanat yugaren wigi ?
43007032	Ifariziyen wwin-d s lexbaṛ s wayen heddṛen lɣaci ɣef Sidna Ɛisa , dɣa lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d ifariziyen ceggɛen iɛessasen a t-id ṭṭfen .
43007033	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i lɣaci : Mazal-iyi kra n lweqt yid-wen , syin akkin ad uɣaleɣ ɣer win i yi-d iceggɛen .
43007034	Aț-țqellbem fell-i ur iyi-tețțafem ara imi ur tezmirem ara a d-tasem ɣer wanda ara yiliɣ .
43007035	At Isṛail qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Anda akka ara iṛuḥ armi ur nețțizmir ara a t-naf ? Eɛni ad iṛuḥ ɣer wat Isṛail ițwazerɛen ger leǧnas ? Neɣ ibɣa ad isselmed leǧnas nniḍen ?
43007036	D acu i gebɣa a d-yini mi d-iqqaṛ : « aț-țqellbem fell-i , ur iyi-tețțafem ara axaṭer ur tezmirem ara a d-tasem ɣer wanda ara yiliɣ . »
43007037	Ass aneggaru n lɛid , yellan d ass yesɛan aṭas n lqima ; Sidna Ɛisa ibedden ger lɣaci iɛeggeḍ , yenna : Win iffuden a d-yas ɣuṛ-i ad isew ; win yumnen yis-i a d-yas ad isew .
43007038	Akken yura di lkutub : D isaffen n waman ara d-ițfeggiḍen seg-s .
43007039	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-d ayagi ɣef Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ara yeččaṛen ulawen n wid yumnen yis . Di lweqt-nni , Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen mazal ur d-ițțune ara axaṭer Sidna Ɛisa werɛad yekcim tamanegt-is .
43007040	Ger lɣaci i s-d-yeslan , llan wid yeqqaṛen : Argaz-agi mbla ccekk d nețța i d nnbi-nni ara d-yasen !
43007041	Wiyaḍ qqaṛen : D nețța i d Lmasiḥ ! Ma d kra nniḍen qqaṛen : Yezmer Lmasiḥ a d-iffeɣ si tmurt n Jlili ?
43007042	Ur yuri ara di tira iqedsen : Lmasiḥ a d-yeffeɣ si dderya n Sidna Dawed , si taddart n Bitlḥem ?
43007043	S wakka i gebda yețțimɣuṛ lxilaf ger lɣaci ɣef Sidna Ɛisa .
43007044	Kra deg-sen bɣan a t-ḥebsen lameɛna yiwen ur yesris afus-is fell-as .
43007045	Mi yuɣalen iɛessasen i d-yețwaceggɛen a t-ṭṭfen , lmuqedmin imeqqranen d ifariziyen nnan-asen : Iwacu ur t-id-tewwim ara ?
43007046	Nutni rran-asen : Di leɛmeṛ ur nesli i yiwen iheddeṛ am nețța .
43007047	Ifariziyen nnan-asen : Iseḥḥer-ikkun ula d kunwi ?
43007048	Teẓram yiwen si lecyux-nneɣ , neɣ seg ifariziyen i gumnen yis ?
43007049	Anagar lɣaci-agi ur nessin ara ccariɛa . . . a ten-inɛel Ṛebbi !
43007050	Nikudem yellan d yiwen seg-sen , win akken i gṛuḥen deg iḍ ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , yenna-yasen :
43007051	Tserreḥ-aɣ ccariɛa-nneɣ a neḥkem ɣef yiwen uqbel a s-nsel neɣ uqbel a nẓer d acu n cceṛ i gexdem ?
43007052	Nutni rran-as : Ula d kečč d ajlili ? Qelleb mliḥ di tira iqedsen aț-țafeḍ : « Ulac nnbi ara d-yekken si tmurt n Jlili . »
43007053	Imiren , mkul yiwen yuɣal ɣer wexxam-is .
43008001	Sidna Ɛisa yuli s yiɣil uzemmur ;
43008002	azekka-nni , ssbeḥ zik yuɣal ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen . Lɣaci meṛṛa uzzlen-d ɣuṛ-es . Sidna Ɛisa yeqqim gar-asen , yebda yesselmad iten deg ufrag n lǧameɛ .
43008003	Atnaya lɛulama n ccariɛa akk-d ifariziyen wwin-as-d yiwet n tmeṭṭut ṭṭfen-ț txeddem zzna . Sbedden-ț ger lɣaci akken a ț iwali Sidna Ɛisa .
43008004	Nnan-as : A Sidi , neṭṭef tameṭṭut-agi mi txeddem zzna .
43008005	Di ccariɛa , Sidna Musa yumeṛ-aɣ-d a neṛjem s yedɣaɣen tameṭṭut am tagi alamma temmut . I keččini d acu ara d-tiniḍ ?
43008006	Steqsan-t iwakken a t-jeṛṛben , țnadin sebba s wacu ara ccetkin fell-as . Sidna Ɛisa yekna , yețțaru s uḍad-is di lqaɛa .
43008007	Imi t-ḥeṛṣen s usteqsi , yekker yenna-yasen : Win deg-wen werǧin yednib a ț-yeṛjem d amezwaru !
43008008	Yekna daɣen yețțaru di lqaɛa .
43008009	Lɣaci-nni , mi slan annect-agi , bdan tixxiṛen yiwen yiwen , seg umɣaṛ armi d ameẓyan . ? ǧan dinna Sidna Ɛisa weḥd-es di tlemmast n wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen , nețța ț-țmeṭṭut-nni .
43008010	Dɣa yerfed allen-is , yenna-yas : A tameṭṭut , anda-ten widak-nni i d-icetkan fell-am ? Ulac win iḥekmen fell-am ?
43008011	Tenna-yas : Ulac a Sidi ! Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ula d nekk ur ḥekkmeɣ ara fell-am . Ṛuḥ , meɛna sya d asawen xḍu i ddnub .
43008012	Sidna Ɛisa iheddeṛ i lɣaci yenna yasen : D nekk i ț-țafat n ddunit , win ara yi-tebɛen ur iteddu ara di ṭṭlam , lameɛna ad yesɛu tafat n tudert .
43008013	Ifariziyen nnan-as : Tețcehhiḍeḍ ɣef yiman-ik , cchada-inek ur tṣeḥḥa ara .
43008014	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : ? - țideț , țcehhideɣ ɣef yiman-iw , lameɛna cchada-inu tṣeḥḥa , axaṭer ? riɣ ansi d-kkiɣ , ẓriɣ daɣen ɣer wanda tedduɣ . Ma d kunwi ur te ? rim ansi d-kkiɣ ur teẓrim anda tedduɣ .
43008015	Kunwi tḥekkmem ɣef wiyaḍ s lɛeqliya n wemdan , ma d nekk ur ḥekkmeɣ ɣef yiwen .
43008016	Ma yella yewwi-d lḥal ad ḥekmeɣ , ad ḥekkmeɣ s lḥeqq axaṭer ur lliɣ ara weḥd-i , Baba Ṛebbi i yi-d-iceggɛen yella yid-i .
43008017	Yura di ccariɛa-nwen belli ma ddukklen sin inigan ɣef yiwet n cchada , cchada-nsen tețwaqbel .
43008018	Atan nekk cehdeɣ-ed ɣef yiman-iw , Baba i yi-d-iceggɛen d inigi fell-i .
43008019	Nutni nnan-as : Anda yella Baba-k ? Yerra-yasen : Ur iyi-tessinem , ur tessinem Baba . Lemmer i yi-tessinem , tili tesnem Baba .
43008020	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-d annect-agi mi gesselmad deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen , zdat wemkan anda srusun lweɛdat . Ula d yiwen ur yesris afus-is fell-as axaṭer urɛad d-yewwiḍ wass-is .
43008021	Sidna Ɛisa yerna yenna-yasen : Atan ad ṛuḥeɣ , aț-țqellbem fell-i lameɛna aț-țemtem di ddnub-nwen , ur tezmirem ara a d-tasem ɣer wanda ara ṛuḥeɣ .
43008022	At Isṛail qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Ahat yebɣa ad ineɣ iman-is imi ɣ-d-yenna ur tezmirem ara a d-tasem ɣer wanda ara ṛuḥeɣ ?
43008023	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Kunwi n lqaɛa nekk n igenwan ; kunwi n ddunit-agi nekk mačči-yines .
43008024	Daymi i wen-d-nniɣ aț-țemtem di ddnub-nwen . Atan m'ur tuminem ara belli nekk « d Win yellan , » aț-țemtem di ddnub-nwen .
43008025	Nnan-as : Anwa-k keččini ? Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : D win akken i wen-d-qqaṛeɣ si tazwara .
43008026	? ef wayen i kkun-yeɛnan sɛiɣ aṭas ara d-iniɣ , aṭas ara ḥasbeɣ ; win i yi-d-iceggɛen d Bab n tideț , d ayen i sliɣ ɣuṛ-es i d-țɛawadeɣ di ddunit .
43008027	Imi ur fhimen ara belli ɣef Baba Ṛebbi i sen-d-iheddeṛ ,
43008028	yenna-yasen daɣen : Asm'ara tessaɛlim Mmi-s n bunadem , imiren aț-țfiqem belli nekk « d Win yellan ! » Aț-țɛeqlem belli ur xeddmeɣ acemma s yiman-iw , lameɛna qqaṛeɣ-ed ayen i yi-iselmed Baba Ṛebbi .
43008029	Win i yi-d-iceggɛen yella yid-i , ur yi-țțaǧa ara weḥd-i imi dayem xeddmeɣ lebɣi-s .
43008030	Mi d-yenna imeslayen-agi , aṭas i gumnen yis .
43008031	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i wat Isṛail i gumnen yis : Ma teṭṭfem s tideț deg awal-iw aț-țilim d inelmaden-iw n ṣṣeḥ .
43008032	Aț-țissinem tideț , tideț ara kkun isuffɣen ɣer tlelli .
43008033	Nnan-as : Nukni ț-țarwa n Sidna Ibṛahim . Di leɛmeṛ ur nelli d aklan n walebɛaḍ ; amek i tzemreḍ a d-tiniḍ : « Aț-țesɛum tilelli » ?
43008034	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : S tideț qqaṛeɣ-awen : kra n win ixeddmen ddnub d akli n ddnub .
43008035	Aklan ur țwaḥsaben ara n at wexxam ma d mmi-s n wexxam yețwaḥseb dayem n at wexxam .
43008036	Ma yella d Mmi-s i wen-d-yefkan tilelli , aț-țilim s tideț di tlelli .
43008037	? riɣ belli kunwi ț-țarwa n Ibṛahim , lameɛna tețnadim a yi tenɣem axaṭer awal-iw ur ikeččem ara ulawen-nwen .
43008038	Nekk qqaṛeɣ-ed ayen ẓriɣ ɣer Baba , ma d kunwi txeddmem ayen i tlemdem s ɣuṛ Baba-twen !
43008039	At Isṛail rran-as : Baba-tneɣ nukkni , d Sidna Ibṛahim . Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Lemmer ț-țideț d arraw n Ibṛahim i tellam , tili txeddmem lecɣal i gxeddem Ibṛahim ;
43008040	kunwi tețqellibem a yi-tenɣem , acuɣeṛ ? Axaṭer qqaṛeɣ-awen-d tideț akken i ț-sliɣ ɣer Baba Ṛebbi . Ibṛahim di leɛmeṛ ur yexdim am kunwi !
43008041	Kunwi txeddmem akken i gxeddem Baba twen ! Nutni rran-as : Ur nelli ara d arraw n leḥṛam ; nesɛa yiwen n Baba-tneɣ kan : d Ṛebbi !
43008042	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Lemmer ț-țideț d Ṛebbi i d Baba twen tili tḥemmlem-iyi axaṭer s ɣuṛ-es i d-kkiɣ , s ɣuṛ-es i d-usiɣ ɣuṛ-wen . Ur d-usiɣ ara s yiman-iw lameɛna d nețța i yi-d-iceggɛen .
43008043	Acuɣeṛ ur tfehhmem ara ayen i wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ? Axaṭer ur tezmirem ara aț-țqeblem imeslayen-iw .
43008044	Baba-twen d Cciṭan yerna tebɣam aț-țxedmem lebɣi-s . Nețța d bu-tmegṛaḍ si tazwara , ur yeṭṭif ara di tideț axaṭer ulac deg-s tideț . M'ara yeskiddib , yețmeslay-ed seg ul-is imi d ameskaddab i gella ; d nețța i d bab n lekdeb .
43008045	Lameɛna nekk qqaṛeɣ-d tideț , daymi ur iyi-tețțamnem ara .
43008046	Anwa deg-wen ara yi-d-issuksen ula yiwet n lɣelṭa ? Ma nniɣ-ed tideț , iwacu ur iyi-tețțamnem ara ?
43008047	Win yellan n Ṛebbi yesmeḥsis i wawal n Ṛebbi . Kunwi ur tellim ara n Ṛebbi , daymi ur tesmeḥsisem ara i wawal-is .
43008048	At Isṛail nnan-as : Nesɛa lḥeqq mi d-nenna kečč d asamari , yerna izdeɣ-ik uṛuḥani !
43008049	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Ur iyi-izdiɣ ara uṛuḥani . Nekk țɛuzzuɣ Baba Ṛebbi , kunwi tḥeqṛem-iyi .
43008050	Ur țqellibeɣ ara ccan i yiman-iw , yella win yețḥebbiṛen fell-i , d nețța ara yi-d-yefken lḥeqq .
43008051	A wen-iniɣ tideț : win iḥerzen awal-iw ur yețmețțat ara maḍi .
43008052	At Isṛail nnan-as : Atan tura iban izdeɣ-ik uṛuḥani ! Sidna Ibṛahim yemmut , lenbiya mmuten , kečč teqqaṛeḍ : win iḥerzen awal-iw ur yețmețțat ara maḍi !
43008053	Tugareḍ baba-tneɣ Ibṛahim neɣ lenbiya meṛṛa i gemmuten ? D acu i tḥesbeḍ iman-ik ?
43008054	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Ma fkiɣ ccan i yiman-iw , ccan-iw ur yesɛi ara azal . Win i yi-d-yețțaken ccan d Baba , win akken i teqqaṛem « d Ṛebbi-nneɣ . »
43008055	Kunwi ur t-tessinem ara , nekkini ssneɣ-t . Ma nniɣ-ed ur t-ssineɣ ara ad uɣaleɣ d akeddab am kunwi . Lameɛna ssneɣ-t yerna xeddmeɣ lebɣi-s .
43008056	Baba-twen Ibṛahim yefṛeḥ mi geẓra iteddu-d wass-iw , tura mi t-yeẓra yefṛeḥ aṭas .
43008057	At Isṛail nnan-as : Amek , urɛad tesɛiḍ xemsin iseggasen teqqaṛeḍ walaɣ Ibṛahim ?
43008058	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Uqbel a d-ilal Ibṛahim , lliɣ !
43008059	? ef wannect-agi i d-ddmen wat Isṛail iblaḍen iwakken a t-ṛeǧmen . Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ger lɣaci , yeffeɣ seg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen .
43009001	Deg ubrid-is , Sidna Ɛisa iwala yiwen wergaz , d aderɣal seg wasmi i d-ilul .
43009002	Inelmaden-is steqsan-t nnan-as : A Sidi , iwacu i d-ilul wergaz-agi d aderɣal ? Anwa i gdenben d nețța neɣ d imawlan-is ?
43009003	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Tidderɣelt-agi ur d-tekki ara si ddnub-is neɣ si ddnub n imawlan-is , lameɛna iwakken medden meṛṛa ad ẓren ayen i gezmer Ṛebbi a t-ixdem .
43009004	Skud mazal tafat n wass , ilaq-aɣ a nexdem lecɣal n win i yi-d iceggɛen ; iteddu-d yiḍ anda yiwen ur yezmir ad ixdem .
43009005	Skud mazal lliɣ di ddunit d nekk i ț-țafat n ddunit .
43009006	Mi d-yenna imeslayen-agi , Sidna Ɛisa yessusef ɣer lqaɛa , yexleḍ akal s tsusaf-is , yeḍla-t ɣef wallen n uderɣal-nni ,
43009007	yenna-yas : Ṛuḥ aț-țessirdeḍ di tala n Silwi ( Silwi lmeɛna-ines « amceggeɛ » ) . Aderɣal-nni iṛuḥ a d-issired , mi d-yuɣal , yețwali .
43009008	Lǧiran-is akk-d wid i t-yessnen itețțer , qqaṛen : Argaz-agi mačči d win akken yețɣimin ɣer lqaɛa yezga yessutur tin n Ṛebbi ?
43009009	Kra qqaṛen : D nețța . Wiyaḍ qqaṛen : Mačči d nețța , d wayeḍ i gțemcabin ɣuṛ-es . Ma d nețța yeqqaṛ : D nekk s yiman-iw .
43009010	Nnan-as : Ihi amek i d-ldint wallen ik ?
43009011	Nețța yerra-yasen : Argaz-nni iwumi qqaṛen Ɛisa yexleḍ akal s tsusaf-is , yeḍla-t i wallen-iw , yenna-yi-d : « Ṛuḥ aț-țessirdeḍ di tala n Silwi . » Mi ṛuḥeɣ ssardeɣ , imiren kan yuɣal iyi-d yeẓri .
43009012	Nutni nnan-as : Anda-t wergaz-agi ? Yenna-yasen : Ur ẓriɣ ara anda yerra
43009013	Wwin argaz-nni yellan zik d aderɣal ɣer ifariziyen .
43009014	Yuɣ lḥal deg wass n westeɛfu i gexleḍ Sidna Ɛisa akal s tsusaf-is , i s-d-yerra iẓri i uderɣal-nni .
43009015	Ifariziyen steqsan-t amek armi i t-id-yuɣal yeẓri . Nețța yenna-yasen : Yexleḍ akal s tsusaf-is , yeḍla-t ɣef wallen-iw , ṛuḥeɣ ssardeɣ udem-iw , imiren kan uɣaleɣ țwaliɣ .
43009016	? ef wakka i nnan kra seg ifariziyen : Argaz-agi ur yezmir ara a d-yekk s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi , imi ur yețqadaṛ ara lqanun n wass n westeɛfu . Ma d wiyaḍ qqaṛen : Lemmer d amednub i gella amek i gezmer ad ixdem lbeṛhanat am wigi ? Yekker lxilaf ger lɣaci-nni ,
43009017	ifariziyen rnan steqsan daɣen aderɣal-nni : I kečč d acu ara d-tiniḍ deg wergaz-agi i k-d-yeldin allen ? Nețța yenna-yasen : Nekk a d-iniɣ , argaz-agi ț-țideț d nnbi .
43009018	Lameɛna imeqqranen n wat Isṛail ugin ad amnen belli argaz-nni yella si zik d aderɣal , yuɣal yețwali . Uɣalen ceggɛen ɣer imawlan-is , usan-d .
43009019	Steqsan-ten nnan-asen : Argaz-agi , ț-țideț d mmi-twen ? D ṣṣeḥ ilul-ed d aderɣal ? Amek armi i guɣal yețwali tura ?
43009020	Imawlan n uderɣal-nni nnan asen : ? - țideț , d mmi-tneɣ yerna ilul-ed d aderɣal .
43009021	Meɛna amek i guɣal yețwali tura neɣ anwa i s-d-yerran i ? ri . . . ur neẓri ara ! Steqsit-eț nețța , d argaz i gella , izmer a d-yerr s yiman-is .
43009022	Imawlan-is nnan-asen akka , axaṭer uggaden lecyux n wat Isṛail i gqesden ad sṭixṛen si lǧameɛ-nsen kra n win ara icehden belli Ɛisa d Lmasiḥ .
43009023	Daymi i sen-nnan imawlan is : « D argaz i gella , yezmer ad yerr s yiman-is . »
43009024	Ifariziyen ssawlen tikkelt tis snat i wergaz-nni iwumi d-yuɣal yeẓri nnan-as : Ɛuzz Sidi Ṛebbi , ini-d tideț . Nukni neẓra belli argaz-agi d amednub .
43009025	Nețța yerra-yasen : Ur ẓriɣ ara ma d amednub i gella ; nekk ẓriɣ yiwet lḥaǧa : « Lliɣ d aderɣal , tura țwaliɣ » .
43009026	Nnan-as daɣen : D acu i k-ixdem ? Amek i k-d-yeldi allen-ik ?
43009027	Yerra-yasen : Nniɣ-awen-t-id yakan meɛna ur iyi-d-semḥessem ara . Iwacu tebɣam a wen-t-id-ɛiwdeɣ ? Ula d kunwi tebɣam aț-țuɣalem d inelmaden-is ?
43009028	Regmen-t , nnan-as : D kečč i d anelmad-is , nukkni d inelmaden n Sidna Musa .
43009029	Neẓra belli Ṛebbi ihḍeṛ-ed i Sidna Musa , ma d wagi ur neẓri ara ansi i d-yekka .
43009030	Argaz-nni yerra-yasen : D ayen yessewhamen ! Argaz yeldi-yi-d allen , kunwi ur te ? rim ara ansi i d-yekka !
43009031	Medden akk ẓran belli Ṛebbi ur d-iqebbel ara ddeɛwat n yemcumen , lameɛna iqebbel-ed win i t-iḍuɛen , ixeddmen lbɣi-is .
43009032	Seg wasmi i d-texleq ddunit werǧin nesli s yiwen yeldi-d allen i win i d-ilulen d aderɣal .
43009033	Lemmer argaz-agi mačči s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-yekka tili ur yezmir ad yexdem acemma .
43009034	Rran-as : Amek ! Seg wasmi i d-luleḍ kečč di ddnub seg iḍaṛṛen armi d aqeṛṛuy , tura tusiḍ-ed a ɣ tesfehmeḍ ? Dɣa qecɛen-t ( ḍerqen-t ) ɣer beṛṛa .
