43009035	Sidna Ɛisa yesla belli qecɛen argaz-nni ɣer beṛṛa . Iṛuḥ ɣuṛ-es , yenna-yas : Ini-yi-d , tumneḍ s Mmi-s n bunadem ?
43009036	Yerra-yas : Anwa-t a Sidi ? Ini-yi-t-id iwakken ad amneɣ yis .
43009037	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Aql-ik tețwaliḍ-t s wallen-ik , d nețța s yiman-is i d-yețmeslayen yid-ek tura .
43009038	Argaz-nni yenna-yas : Umneɣ a Sidi ! Dɣa yeɣli ɣef tgecrar zdat-es .
43009039	Sidna Ɛisa yenna : D wagi i d lḥisab ɣef wacu i d-usiɣ ɣer ddunit : wid ur nețwali ara ad walin , wid yețwalin ad uɣalen d iderɣalen .
43009040	Kra n ifariziyen i geslan i imeslayen-is steqsan-t , nnan-as : Ihi ula d nukkni d iderɣalen ?
43009041	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Lemmer ț-țideț d iderɣalen i tellam tili ulac ddnub fell-awen , lameɛna tura imi teqqaṛem nețwali , ddnub i yirawen-nwen .
43010001	— S tideț a wen-d-iniɣ , win ur nkeččem ara si tewwurt ɣer wemṛaḥ ( leɛzib ) n wulli , iɛedda si ẓẓeṛb , winna d amakar yerna d aqeṭṭaɛ .
43010002	Ma d win ikeččmen si tewwurt d nețța i d ameksa n wulli .
43010003	Aɛessas n wemṛaḥ ileddi tawwurt i umeksa , ulli sellent i ṣṣut-is , issawal-asent s yismawen-nsent , yessufuɣ-itent ɣer beṛṛa .
43010004	Mi gessufeɣ tid akk yellan-ines , izeggir zdat-sent , ulli ttabaɛent-eț axaṭer ssnent ṣṣut-is .
43010005	D lmuḥal ad tebɛen-t abeṛṛani , ad rewlent fell-as imi ur ssinent ara ṣṣut n ibeṛṛaniyen .
43010006	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen lemtel agi , lameɛna ur fhimen ara ayen yebɣa a sen-yini .
43010007	Yenna yasen daɣen : S tideț qqaṛeɣ-awen , d nekk i ț-țawwurt ansi țɛeddayent wulli .
43010008	Wid meṛṛa i d-yusan uqbel-iw d imakaren d iqeṭṭaɛen . Lameɛna ulli ur sen-ḥessent ara .
43010009	D nekk i ț-țawwurt . Win ara ikecmen yis-i ad yețțusellek : ad ikcem ad yeffeɣ akken i s-ihwa , ad yaf ayen ara yečč .
43010010	Amakar yețțas-ed kan iwakken ad yaker , ad yezlu , ad yessenger . Nekk usiɣ-ed iwakken ad fkeɣ tudert i wulli-inu , tudert s tugeț ( ṭaqa ) .
43010011	D nekk i d ameksa n ṣṣeḥ . Ameksa n ṣṣeḥ yețțsebbil tudert-is ɣef wulli-ines .
43010012	Ma d win ur nelli ara d ameksa n wulli ur nelli ara d bab-nsent , d ameksa kan yețwaxelṣen , ireggel , ițaǧǧa ulli m'ara iwali uccen . Imiren uccen a d-yezḍem ɣef wulli , ad yawi kra seg-sent yerna ad yesserwel akk taqeḍɛit .
43010013	Argaz-agi ixeddem akka imi d ameksa kan yețwaxelṣen , ur as tewqiɛ ara deg wulli .
43010014	Nekk d ameksa n ṣṣeḥ , ssneɣ ulli-inu nutenti ssnent-iyi ,
43010015	akken i yi-issen Baba Ṛebbi i t-ssneɣ ula d nekk . ? sebbileɣ tudert-iw ɣef wulli-inu .
43010016	Sɛiɣ daɣen ulli nniḍen ur nelli ara seg wemṛaḥ agi . Tigi daɣen ilaq a tent-id-awiɣ , a d-ḥessent i ṣṣut-iw , s wakka aț-țili anagar yiwet n tqeḍɛit s yiwen umeksa .
43010017	Baba iḥemmel-iyi imi țsebbileɣ tudert-iw meɛna syin akkin a ț-id-rreɣ .
43010018	Yiwen ur izmir a yi-ikkes tudert , țsebbileɣ-ț s lebɣi-inu . Sɛiɣ tazmert a ț-sebbleɣ , sɛiɣ daɣen tazmert a ț-id-rreɣ . D wagi i d lameṛ i yi-d yefka Baba Ṛebbi .
43010019	Mi d-yenna imeslayen-agi , yekker daɣen lxilaf ger lɣaci .
43010020	Aṭas deg-sen qqaṛen : Argaz-agi yezdeɣ-it lǧen , yedderwec , acuɣeṛ i s-tesmeḥsisem ?
43010021	Wiyaḍ qqaṛen : Win ițwamelken ur yețmeslay ara akka . Qqaṛen daɣen : Izmer lǧen a d-yerr iẓri i iderɣalen ?
43010022	Yewweḍ-ed lweqt anda i țɛeggiden di temdint n Lquds lɛid n weɛzal n Lǧameɛ iqedsen ; imiren d ccetwa .
43010023	Sidna Ɛisa yella yețṛuḥu ițțuɣal deg wefrag n Lǧameɛ iqedsen seddaw n wesqif n Sidna Sliman .
43010024	Yezzi-yas-d lɣaci , nnan-as : Ar melmi ara ɣ-teǧǧeḍ di ccekk ? Ma d Lmasiḥ i telliḍ ini-aɣ t-id ɛinani !
43010025	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Nniɣ-awen-t-id ur tuminem ara , yerna twalam lecɣal i xeddmeɣ s yisem n Baba : d lecɣal-agi i d yețcehhiden fell-i .
43010026	Kunwi ur tețțamnem ara axaṭer ur tellim ara seg ulli-inu .
43010027	Ulli-inu smeḥsisent i ṣṣut-iw , ssneɣ-tent yerna ttabaɛent iyi-d .
43010028	? țakeɣ-asent tudert n dayem , ur țmețțatent ara maḍi , yiwen ur izmir a tent-yekkes seg ufus-iw .
43010029	Baba i yi-tent-id-yefkan yugar kullec , win yellan ger ifassen is , yiwen ur izmir a s-t-id-yekkes
43010030	axaṭer nekk d Baba , d yiwen .
43010031	Jemɛen-d daɣen idɣaɣen akken a t-nɣen .
43010032	Yekker Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Xedmeɣ zdat-wen aṭas n lecɣal yelhan yessewhamen , s tezmert n Baba ; ɣef wanwa deg-sen i tebɣam a yi-tenɣem s iblaḍen ?
43010033	At Isṛail nnan-as : Mačči ɣef ccɣel yelhan i nebɣa a k-neṛjem , lameɛna imi i tkeffreḍ ! Axaṭer kečč yellan d amdan terriḍ iman-ik d Ṛebbi .
43010034	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Eɛni ur yuri ara di ccariɛa nwen : Nekk , Sidi Ṛebbi nniɣ-awen : Kunwi d iṛebbiten !
43010035	Yiwen ur yezmir ad inkeṛ ayen i d-nnant tira iqedsen . Ma yella ccariɛa-nwen tsemma « iṛebbiten » wid iwumi i d-ițțuceggeɛ wawal n Ṛebbi ,
43010036	amek armi teqqaṛem fell-i keffṛeɣ mi d-nniɣ « nekk d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi , » eɛni mačči d Baba i yi-ixtaṛen , i yi-d-iceggɛen ɣer ddunit ?
43010037	Lemmer ur xeddmeɣ ara lecɣal n Baba tili ur teḥwaǧem ara aț țamnem yis-i .
43010038	Lameɛna ma xeddmeɣ-ten , ɣas akken ur tebɣim ara aț-țamnem yis-i , amnet s lecɣal-iw akken aț țeẓrem , aț-țfehmem belli Baba yella deg-i nekk lliɣ di Baba .
43010039	? ef yimeslayen-agi , lecyux n at Isṛail ɛeṛden a t-ṭṭfen lameɛna yemneɛ si ger ifassen-nsen .
43010040	Syenna Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ ɣer tama nniḍen n wasif n Urdun , ɣer wemkan nni anda i gesseɣḍes Yeḥya lɣaci , yeqqim dinna kra n wussan .
43010041	Aṭas i d-yusan ɣuṛ-es , qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Yeḥya ur yexdim ula d yiwen lbeṛhan , lameɛna ayen akk i d-yenna ɣef wergaz-agi ț-țideț .
43010042	Dinna , aṭas n lɣaci i gumnen yis .
43011001	Di taddart n Bitanya , llant snat n tyestmatin , Marṭa d Meryem akk-d gma-tsent Laɛẓar ;
43011002	Meryem , ț-țin akken i gdehnen iḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa s zzit n leɛṭeṛ terna teṣfeḍ-iten s ucebbub-is ; tesɛa gma-s Laɛẓar , yehlek yenṭer .
43011003	Yessetma-s ceggɛent ɣer Sidna Ɛisa a s-inin : A Sidi , atan weḥbib-ik yuḍen .
43011004	Mi gesla Sidna Ɛisa s lexbaṛ-agi yenna : Lehlak-agi ur yeṣṣawaḍ ara ɣer lmut , lameɛna a d-yesbeggen tamanegt n Ṛebbi ; yis daɣen ara d-tban tmanegt n Mmi-s n Ṛebbi .
43011005	Sidna Ɛisa iḥemmel aṭas Marṭa , Meryem akk-d Laɛẓar .
43011006	? as akken yesla s Laɛẓar yuḍen , yerna sin wussan deg wemkan-nni anda yella .
43011007	Dɣa yenna i inelmaden-is : Eyyaw a nuɣalet ɣer tmurt n Yahuda .
43011008	Nnan-as : A Sidi , mačči aṭas aya segmi țnadin wat Isṛail a k-nɣen s iblaḍen , tura tebɣiḍ aț-țuɣaleḍ ɣer dinna ?
43011009	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Eɛni ur llint ara tnac n swayeɛ deg wass ? Ma ileḥḥu yiwen deg wass ur t-kkaten ara wuguren axaṭer tella tafat , yețwali abrid .
43011010	Lameɛna ma ileḥḥu deg iḍ ad imḍerkal axaṭer ulac tafat .
43011011	Mi d-yenna ayagi , yerna yenna yasen : Aḥbib-nneɣ Laɛẓar tewwi-t tnafa , ad ṛuḥeɣ a t-id-ssakiɣ .
43011012	? ef wayagi inelmaden-is nnan as : A Sidi , ma ț-țaguni i geṭṭes ihi a d-yekker .
43011013	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-d ayagi ɣef lmut n Laɛẓar , nutni nwan ɣef tguni i d-yemmeslay .
43011014	Dɣa yenna-yasen ɛinani : Laɛẓar yemmut ,
43011015	yerna feṛḥeɣ ɣef ddemma-nwen imi ur lliɣ ara dinna di teswiɛt-nni , axaṭer ayagi d ayen ara yernun di liman-nwen . Eyyaw tura a nṛuḥet ɣuṛ-es .
43011016	? uma iwumi qqaṛen Akniw , yenna i inelmaden nniḍen : Eyyaw a neddut ula d nukkni iwakken a nemmet yid-es .
43011017	Mi qṛib ad yaweḍ ɣer dinna , Sidna Ɛisa yesla belli ṛebɛa wussan aya segmi i meḍlen Laɛẓar .
43011018	Ad ilin wazal n tlata alaf kilumitrat ger taddart n Bitanya ț-țemdint n Lquds .
43011019	Daymi aṭas n lɣaci i d-yusan ɣer Marṭa d Meryem a tent-ṣebbṛen ɣef lmut n gma-tsent .
43011020	Akken kan i tesla Marṭa belli Sidna Ɛisa iteddu-d ɣer taddart , tuzzel ɣuṛ-es a t-temmager . Ma d Meryem teqqim deg wexxam .
43011021	Marṭa tenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi , lemmer dagi i telliḍ , tili gma ur yemmut ara .
43011022	Lameɛna ẓriɣ ula ț-țura , ayen akk ara tessutreḍ i Ṛebbi a k-t-id-yeqbel .
43011023	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Gma-m a d-yuɣal ɣer tudert .
43011024	Marṭa terra-yas : ? riɣ a d-yuɣal ɣer tudert ass aneggaru , ass n ḥeggu n lmegtin .
43011025	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : D nekk i d ḥeggu , d nekk i ț-țudert . Win ara yesɛun laman deg-i , ad yidir ɣas ma yemmut .
43011026	Yal amdan yeddren , yumnen yis-i , ur yețmețțat ara maḍi . Tumneḍ s wannect-agi ?
43011027	Marṭa tenna-yas : Umneɣ a Sidi , d kečč i d Lmasiḥ , d kečč i d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi , win akken ara d-yasen ɣer ddunit .
43011028	Syenna , Marṭa tṛuḥ tessawel i weltma-s Meryem tenna-yas s tuffra : Sidna Ɛisa yewweḍ-ed , yebɣa a kem-iẓer .
43011029	Mi tesla s lexbaṛ-agi , tekker Meryem tuzzel ɣer Sidna Ɛisa .
43011030	Yuɣ lḥal urɛad i d-yekcim ɣer taddart , mazal-it deg umkan-nni anda akken i t-temmuger Marṭa .
43011031	Wid yellan țṣebbiṛen deg-s deg wexxam , mi ț-walan tekker teffeɣ s tazzla , ḍefṛen-ț , nwan ɣer u ? ekka i tṛuḥ iwakken aț-țețru ɣef gma-s .
43011032	Mi tewweḍ Meryem ɣer wemkan anda yella Sidna Ɛisa , akken kan i t-twala , teɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is tenna : A Sidi , lemmer dagi i telliḍ tili gma ur yemmut ara .
43011033	Mi ț-iwala tețru nețțat d wid yellan yid-es , Sidna Ɛisa ijreḥ wul-is , tergagi tasa-s .
43011034	Yenna-yasen : Anda i t-tmeḍlem ? Nutni rran-as : Eyya-d aț-țwaliḍ a Sidi .
43011035	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yețru .
43011036	Mi t-walan yețru , nnan : Walit acḥal i t-iḥemmel !
43011037	Ma d kra deg-sen qqaṛen : Nețța i d-yerran iẓri i uderɣal , ur yezmir ara ad issemneɛ Laɛẓar si lmut !
43011038	Sidna Ɛisa tejreḥ tasa-s tikkelt tis snat . Mi wwḍen ɣer u ? ekka yellan d lɣaṛ imedlen s yiwen wezṛu d ameqqran ,
43011039	Sidna Ɛisa yenna : Kkset azṛu-yagi ! Marṭa weltma-s n lmegget-nni tenna : A Sidi , ṛebɛa wussan aya segmi yețwamḍel , ad yili yebda yețriḥ !
43011040	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ur am-d-nniɣ ara ma tumneḍ aț-țwaliḍ tamanegt n Ṛebbi ?
43011041	Kksen azṛu-nni , dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yerfed allen-is ɣer igenni yenna : Tanemmirt-ik a Baba Ṛebbi axaṭer tqebleḍ taẓallit-iw .
43011042	Nekkini ẓriɣ tqebbleḍ-iyi daymen , lameɛna nniɣ-ed akka ɣef ddemma n wid i yi-d-yezzin dagi iwakken ad amnen belli d kečč i yi-d-iceggɛen .
43011043	Imiren kan iɛeggeḍ s lǧehd yenna : A Laɛẓar , effeɣ-ed syenna !
43011044	Ataya lmegget-nni yeffeɣ-ed seg uẓekka , idaṛṛen-is d ifassen-is țțlen , udem-is iɣumm s lekfen . Sidna Ɛisa yenna i wid yellan dinna : Kkset-as lekfen , teǧǧem-t ad iṛuḥ !
43011045	Aṭas seg widak-nni i d-yeddan d Meryem umnen s Sidna Ɛisa mi walan ayen yexdem .
43011046	Kra deg-sen ṛuḥen ɣer ifariziyen ṣṣawḍen-asen lexbaṛ .
43011047	Lmuqedmin imeqqranen d ifariziyen nnejmaɛen deg wexxam n ccṛeɛ , nnan : D acu ara nexdem ? Argaz-agi yexdem aṭas n lbeṛhanat ,
43011048	ma neǧǧa-t ad ikemmel akka , lɣaci akk ad amnen yis ; a d-asen iṛumaniyen a ɣ-hudden lǧameɛ-nneɣ ț-țmurt-nneɣ .
43011049	Kayef yellan aseggas-nni d lmuqeddem ameqqran fell-asen ,
43011050	yenṭeq yenna-yasen : Ur teẓrim ara belli ad yemmet axiṛ yiwen ɣef lumma wala ad yenger wegdud-nneɣ ?
43011051	Ayagi mačči s ɣuṛ-es i d-yekka meɛna imi i gella d lmuqeddem ameqqran aseggas-nni . Daymi i s-d-iweḥḥa Sidi Ṛebbi belli ilaq ad immet Sidna Ɛisa ɣef wegdud .
43011052	Mačči kan ɣef wegdud-is ara yemmet meɛna akken ad isdukkel arraw n Ṛebbi i gemzerwaɛen di ddunit meṛṛa , a ten-yejmeɛ d yiwen wegdud .
43011053	Ass-nni dɣa i ɛewwlen ( qesden ) lmuqedmin imeqqranen ad nɣen Sidna Ɛisa .
43011054	Seg wass-nni , Sidna Ɛisa yejbed iman-is ɣef lɣaci . Iṛuḥ Syenna ɣer taddart n Ifṛahim i d-yezgan ț-țama unezṛuf , yesɛedda dinna kra n wussan nețța d inelmaden is .
43011055	Akken i d-iqeṛṛeb lɛid n Tfaska , aṭas n lɣaci i d-ițasen si mkul tamurt ɣer temdint n Lquds akken ad ssizedegen iman-nsen .
43011056	Lɣaci-nni țqelliben ɣef Sidna Ɛisa , țmesteqsayen deg ufrag n lǧameɛ , qqaṛen : D acu i twalam ? A d-yas ad iɛeggeḍ ?
43011057	Yuɣ lḥal lmuqedmin imeqqranen d ifariziyen nebhen-d nnan : Win yeẓran anda yella Ɛisa-nni , ilaq a d-yessiweḍ lexbaṛ i yiɛessasen akken a t-ṭṭfen .
43012001	Sețța wussan uqbel lɛid n Tfaska , Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ ɣer Bitani , taddart n Laɛẓar win akken i d-yesseḥya si lmut .
43012002	At wexxam n Laɛẓar heggan-as imensi . Marṭa tqeddec , Laɛẓar yeqqim ɣer imensi akk-d Sidna Ɛisa .
43012003	Meryem teddem-ed azgen n litra n leɛṭeṛ yeṣfan ɣlayen nezzeh , tesmar-it ɣef yiḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa , tesfeḍ-iten s ucebbub-is ; axxam meṛṛa yeččuṛ d rriḥa n leɛṭeṛ-nni .
43012004	Yudas n Qeṛyut , yiwen seg inelmaden-is , win akken ara t-ixedɛen inṭeq-ed yenna :
43012005	Acuɣeṛ ur nezzenz ara leɛṭeṛ agi ? Lemmer nezzenz-it tili yewwi-d azal n telt meyya twiztin n lfeṭṭa ara nefṛeq i igellilen .
43012006	Mi d-yenna annect-agi mačči d igellilen i t-iɣaḍen meɛna yebɣa ad yawi idrimen-nni , axaṭer d amakar i gella . D nețța i d amdebbeṛ ɣef yidrimen-nsen , yețțaker-iten .
43012007	Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Anfet-as ! Leɛṭeṛ-agi thegga-t i wass n temḍelt-iw .
43012008	Igellilen a ten-tesɛum daymen gar-awen ! Ma d nekk , ur iyi-tseɛɛum ara daymen yid-wen .
43012009	Yuɣ lḥal lɣaci slan belli Sidna Ɛisa di taddart n Bitanya i gella . Dɣa ț-țirebbaɛ i d-iṛuḥen ɣuṛ-es , mačči kan iwakken a t-ẓren nețța , meɛna bɣan ad ẓren Laɛẓar i d yesseḥya si lmut .
43012010	? ef wannect-a , lmuqedmin imeqqranen qesden ad nɣen ula d Laɛẓar .
43012011	Axaṭer ɣef ddemma-ines aṭas n lɣaci i sen iwexxṛen uɣalen umnen s Sidna Ɛisa .
43012012	Azekka-nni , aṭas n lɣaci i d yusan ad ɛeggden di temdint n Lquds . Slan belli Sidna Ɛisa iteddu-d ɣer temdint .
43012013	Kksen-d tiseḍwa ( ticiṭwin ) n tezdayt , ṛuḥen a t-mmagren , țeddun țɛeggiḍen : ? usana ! Yețțubarek win i d-yusan s yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi ! Yețțubarek ugellid n wat Isṛail !
43012014	Sidna Ɛisa yufa yiwen weɣyul d amecṭuḥ , yerkeb fell-as akken yura di tira iqedsen :
43012015	Ur țțaggad a tamdint n Siyun , atan ugellid-im yusa-d , irkeb-ed ɣef weɣyul amecṭuḥ .
43012016	Imiren inelmaden is ur fhimen ara ayen ideṛṛun , lameɛna asmi i gekcem Sidna Ɛisa di tamanegt-is , mmektan-d belli ayen akk yuran fell-as yedṛa yerna yețwakemmel .
43012017	Wid akk i gḥedṛen akk-d Sidna Ɛisa asmi i gessawel i Laɛẓar a d-iffeɣ seg u ? ekka mi i t-id-yesseḥya si lmut , cehden-d ɣef wayen ẓran ;
43012018	ɣef wannect-agi aṭas n lɣaci i d-yusan ɣuṛ-es imi slan s lbeṛhan i gexdem .
43012019	Imi walan akkenni , ifariziyen nnan wway gar-asen : Twalam tura : ur nezmir i wacemma , lɣaci akk ttabaɛen-t !
43012020	Ger widak-nni i d-yusan ad ɛeggden di temdint n Lquds , llan kra n iyunaniyen .
43012021	Iyunaniyen-agi ṛuḥen ɣer Filibus ajlili n taddart n Bitsayda , nnan-as : Nebɣa a nẓer Sidna Ɛisa !
43012022	Filibus ixebbeṛ Andriyus , dɣa ddukklen i sin a s-inin i Sidna Ɛisa .
43012023	Nețța yerra-yasen-d : Yewweḍ-ed lweqt i Mmi-s n bunadem ad ikcem di tmanegt-is .
43012024	S tideț , nniɣ-awen : aɛeqqa n yired yeɣlin deg wakal m'ur yemmut ara ad iqqim weḥd-es , lameɛna ma yemmut ad yefti , a d-ye aṭas n iɛeqqayen .
43012025	Win yețḥadaren ɣef tudert-is ad as-tṛuḥ , ma d win ur nețḥebbiṛ ara fell-as di ddunit-agi a ț-yaf i tudert n dayem .
43012026	Win yebɣan ad iqdec fell-i , a yi-d-yetbeɛ . Anda bɣuɣ iliɣ , aqeddac-iw ad yili yid-i . Win iqeddcen fell-i , Ṛebbi a t-iɛuzz .
43012027	Atan tura ul-iw yetḥeyyeṛ ; d acu ara d-iniɣ ? A Baba sellek-iyi si teswiɛt-agi ? Nekk ẓriɣ ɣef teswiɛt agi i d-usiɣ iwakken a ț-qableɣ !
43012028	A Baba , sbeggen-ed tamanegt-ik ! Dɣa tenṭeq-ed yiwet n taɣect seg igenni , tenna-d : Sbeggneɣ-d yakan tamanegt-iw yerna mazal a ț-id-sbeggneɣ .
43012029	Wid yuɣ lḥal dinna slan i ṣṣut nni , ɣilen d ṛɛud . Wiyaḍ qqaṛen d lmalayekkat i s-d yemmeslayen .
43012030	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Mačči ɣuṛ-i i d-tenṭeq taɣect agi , tenṭeq-ed ɣuṛ-wen .
43012031	Tura ara yedṛu lḥisab n ddunit . Tura ara yețwaqceɛ umesbaṭli n ddunit-a .
43012032	Ma d nekk m'ara țwarefdeɣ sennig lqaɛa , a d-awiɣ imdanen meṛṛa ɣuṛ-i .
43012033	S imeslayen-agi , Sidna Ɛisa yebɣa a d-isbeggen amek ara yemmet .
43012034	Lɣaci nnan-as : Ccariɛa tenna-d belli Lmasiḥ ad yidir i dayem . Amek i d-tenniḍ « Mmi-s n bunadem ilaq ad yețwarfed sennig lqaɛa » ? Ini-yaɣ-d ihi anwa i d Mmi-s n bunadem ?
43012035	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Tafat mazal-iț gar-awen i kra n lweqt kan , lḥut skud tella uqbel a kkun-iṭṭef ṭṭlam , axaṭer win ileḥḥun di ṭṭlam ur yeẓri ara anda iteddu .
43012036	Skud tesɛam tafat , amnet yis akken aț-țuɣalem d arraw n tafat . Mi d-yenna imeslayen-agi , Sidna Ɛisa iḍeṛṛef iman-is anda ulac lɣaci .
43012037	? as akken aṭas n lbeṛhanat i gexdem Sidna Ɛisa zdat-sen , nutni ugin ad amnen .
43012038	S wakka i gețwakemmel wayen i d-yenna nnbi Iceɛya : A Ṛebbi , anwa i gumnen s wayen i d-nbecceṛ , iwumi i d-tețwabeggen tezmert-ik ?
43012039	Acuɣeṛ ugin ad amnen ? D nnbi Iceɛya i d-yennan daɣen :
43012040	Ṛebbi yesderɣel-iten , yesɣeṛ ulawen-nsen , daymi allen-nsen ur țwalint ara , lefhama-nsen teqfel , ugin a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid , a kken a ten-sseḥluɣ .
43012041	Nnbi Iceɛya yenna-d ayagi ɣef Sidna Ɛisa mi gwala tamanegt-is .
43012042	Ula seg imeqqranen n wat Isṛail aṭas i gumnen yis ; lameɛna ɣef ddemma n ifariziyen , ur bɣin ara a d-sbeggnen liman-nsen , axaṭer uggaden a ten-sṭixxṛen si lǧameɛ .
43012043	ḥemmlen ad sɛun ccan ɣer yemdanen wala ɣer Ṛebbi .
43012044	Sidna Ɛisa yessaɛli taɣect-is yenna : Win yesɛan laman deg-i mačči yis-i kan i gumen , meɛna yumen ula s win i yi-d-iceggɛen .
43012045	Win i yi iwalan , iwala win i yi-d-iceggɛen .
43012046	Nekk usiɣ-ed ț-țafat ɣer ddunit , kra n win yumnen yis-i , ur yețɣimi ara di ṭṭlam .
43012047	Win yeslan i wawal-iw ur nexdim ara ayen i d-nniɣ mačči d nekk ara t-iḥasben , axaṭer ur d-usiɣ ara akken ad ḥasbeɣ ddunit , meɛna usiɣ-ed a ț-sellkeɣ .
43012048	Kra n win i yi-ḥeqṛen ur neḥsib ara imeslayen-iw , ițțuḥaseb yakan : d awal-agi i d-nniɣ ara t-iḥasben ass aneggaru .
43012049	Imeslayen-agi mačči s ɣuṛ-i i d-kkan : Baba i yi-d-iceggɛen , d nețța i yi-d-yefkan ayen i glaqen a t-id-iniɣ d wayen ara slemdeɣ .
43012050	Daymi nniɣ-awen : aselmed ɣef i yi-d-iweṣṣa Baba ț-țudert n dayem . Nekk sselmadeɣ kan ayen i yi-d-yenna Baba .
43013001	Uqbel lɛid n Tfaska n Izimer n leslak , Sidna Ɛisa yeẓra belli tewweḍ-ed teswiɛt i deg ara yeffeɣ si ddunit , akken ad iṛuḥ ɣer Baba-s . ? ef wannect-agi , isbeggen-ed leḥmala-ines i inelmaden-is yellan di ddunit , yerna yeǧǧa-yasen-d lmeɛna ț-țameqqrant .
43013002	Llan tețțen imensi n Tfaska , Cciṭan yekcem yakan deg wul n Yudas , mmi-s n Semɛun n Qeṛyut , iwelleh-it ad ixdeɛ Sidna Ɛisa , a t-yezzenz .
43013003	Sidna Ɛisa yeẓra belli Baba Ṛebbi yerra kullec ger ifassen-is , yeẓra s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-yusa , ɣuṛ-es ara yuɣal .
43013004	Yekker ɣef yimensi , yekkes abeṛnus-is , yeddem-ed yiwen ubeḥnuq ( ucettiḍ ) yebges yis .
43013005	Syenna , yesmar-ed aman ɣer yiwet n tbaqit , yebda yessirid iḍaṛṛen n inelmaden-is , yesfeḍ-iten s ubeḥnuq-nni i gcudd ɣef wammas-is .
43013006	Mi gewweḍ ɣer Semɛun Buṭrus yenna-yas-d : A Sidi d kečč ara yi-ssirden iḍaṛṛen ?
43013007	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ayen xedmeɣ akka ur t-tfehhmeḍ ara tura , ɣer zdat ara t-tfehmeḍ .
43013008	Buṭrus yenna-yas : Ala ! D lmuḥal a yi-tessirdeḍ iḍaṛṛen-iw ! Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : M'ur k-ssardeɣ ara iḍaṛṛen-ik ur d-yeqqim wacemma i ɣ-icerken .
43013009	Semɛun Buṭrus yenna-yas : Ihi ur iyi-issirid ara iḍaṛṛen kan , ssired-iyi ula d ifassen d uqeṛṛuy-iw .
43013010	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Win yessarden yakan d azedgan , anagar idaṛṛen-is i geḥwaǧ a ten yessired axaṭer zeddig meṛṛa . Kunwi aql-ikkun zeddigit lameɛna mačči akken ma tellam dagi .
43013011	Sidna Ɛisa yeẓra yakan win akken ara t-ixedɛen , daymi i genna i inelmaden-is : « kunwi ur zeddigit ara irkul . »
43013012	Mi sen-issared iḍaṛṛen-nsen , yerra abeṛnus-is , yuɣal ɣer wemkan is yenna-yasen : Tfehmem wayen akka i wen xedmeɣ neɣ ala ?
43013013	Tessawalem-iyi « a Sidi » ; tesɛam lḥeqq axaṭer ț-țideț !
43013014	Ma yella nekk yellan d Ssid-nwen ssardeɣ-awen iḍaṛṛen-nwen , ilaq awen aț-țețțemsiridem iḍaṛṛen wway gar-awen .
43013015	Fkiɣ-awen-d lemtel iwakken ula d kunwi aț-țxedmem akken i wen-xedmeɣ .
43013016	S tideț nniɣ awen : aqeddac ur yugar ara Ssid-is , amceggeɛ ur yugar ara win i t-id iceggɛen .
43013017	Amarezg-nwen ma tessnem ayagi , awi-d kan a t-txedmem .
43013018	Mačči fell-awen meṛṛa i d-nniɣ ayagi : ssneɣ widak i xtaṛeɣ . Lameɛna ayen yuran ad yețwakemmel : « Win yeččan aɣṛum yid-i , yuɣal-iyi-d d aɛdaw . »
43013019	Nniɣ-awen-t-id si tura uqbel a d-yaweḍ , iwakken asm'ara d-yedṛu aț-țamnem belli nekk « d Win yellan . »
43013020	A wen-iniɣ tideț : win iqeblen win ara d-ceggɛeɣ d nekk i geqbel , win ara yi-qeblen yeqbel win i yi-d-iceggɛen .
43013021	Segmi i d-yenna annect-agi , Sidna Ɛisa yetḥeyyeṛ , dɣa yenna ɛinani : A wen-d-iniɣ s tideț , yiwen deg-wen ad iyi-ixdeɛ .
43013022	Inelmaden-is tḥeyyṛen , qqimen țemyex ? aṛen wway gar-asen . Kull yiwen yeqqaṛ deg wul-is : ? ef anwa i d-yenna imeslayen-agi ?
43013023	Yiwen deg-sen , anelmad-nni i gḥemmel Sidna Ɛisa , yeqqim ɣer lmakla ɣer tama-s .
43013024	Semɛun Buṭrus iwehha-yas akken a t-yesteqsi ɣef wanwa i d-ițmeslay .
43013025	Anelmad-nni yekna ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , yenna-yas : A Sidi , ɣef wanwa deg-nneɣ i d-tmeslayeḍ ?
43013026	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ad ssisneɣ ( seyyiɣ ) talqimt n weɣṛum di teṛbut-agi , win iwumi ara ț-fkeɣ , d winna ara yi-ixedɛen . Sidna Ɛisa yessasen talqimt n weɣṛum , dɣa yefka-ț i Yudas mmi-s n Semɛun n Qeṛyut .
43013027	Akken kan i geṭṭef Yudas talqimt-nni , Cciṭan yekcem ul-is . Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ayen ara txedmeḍ ɣiwel xdem-it !
43013028	Ger wid yellan yid-es , yiwen ur yefhim acuɣeṛ i s-yenna ayagi .
43013029	Imi d Yudas i gțsewwiqen fell-asen , kra seg inelmaden nwan iwekkel-it akken a d-iqḍu i lɛid neɣ ad iseddeq i igellilen .
43013030	Akken kan i geṭṭef talqimt-nni , Yudas yeffeɣ seg wexxam ; yuɣ lḥal yeɣli-d yiḍ .
43013031	Mi geffeɣ Yudas , Sidna Ɛisa yenna : Tura ara d-tban tmanegt n Mmi-s n bunadem , yis ara yețwaɛuzz Ṛebbi .
43013032	Imi yis ara yețwaɛuzz , Ṛebbi daɣen ad iɛuzz Mmi-s n bunadem yerna qṛib a d-yedṛu .
43013033	Ay arrac ɛzizen , aql-i mazal-iyi gar-awen meɛna ur țɛeṭṭileɣ ara . Aț-țnadim fell-i , atan ayen i nniɣ i lɣaci tura a wen-t-id-iniɣ daɣen i kunwi : « Ur tezmirem ara aț țeddum ɣer wanda ara ṛuḥeɣ » !
43013034	A wen-d-fkeɣ yiwen n lameṛ d ajdid : « myeḥmalet wway gar awen . Akken i kkun-ḥemmleɣ , myeḥmalet wway gar-awen . »
43013035	Ma temyeḥmalem wway gar awen , lɣaci meṛṛa a kkun-ɛeqlen belli d inelmaden-iw i tellam .
43013036	Semɛun Buṭrus yesteqsa-t yenna-yas : A Sidi , ɣer wanda ara tṛuḥeḍ ? Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Anda ara ṛuḥeɣ ur tezmireḍ ara aț-țedduḍ tura , lameɛna ɣer zdat a yi-d-tebɛeḍ .
43013037	Buṭrus yenna-yas : A Sidi , acuɣeṛ ur zmireɣ ara ad dduɣ tura ? Aql-iyi wejdeɣ ad sebbleɣ iman-iw fell-ak .
43013038	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Tqebleḍ aț-țsebbleḍ iman-ik fell-i ? Tideț a k-iniɣ : uqbel ad iskkuɛ uyaziḍ a yi-tnekkṛeḍ tlata iberdan .
43014001	— Kkset anezgum seg ulawen nwen . Amnet s Ṛebbi , amnet daɣen yis-i .
43014002	Deg wexxam n Baba aṭas n tmezduɣin i gellan , ad ṛuḥeɣ a wen-heggiɣ amkan ; lemmer ulac , tili nniɣ-awen-t-id .
43014003	M'ara wen-heggiɣ amkan , a d uɣaleɣ a kkun-awiɣ yid-i akken anda lliɣ aț-țilim ula d kunwi .
43014004	Tessnem abrid yețțawin ɣer wanda i țedduɣ .
43014005	? uma yenna-yas : A Sidi , ur neẓri ara ɣer wanda ara tṛuḥeḍ , amek i tebɣiḍ a nissin abrid ?
43014006	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : D nekk i d abrid axaṭer d nekk i ț-țideț , d nekk i ț-țudert . Yiwen ur yezmir ad iṛuḥ ɣer Baba m'ur yekki ara seg-i .
43014007	Ma tessnem-iyi , aț-țissinem ula d Baba . Atan tura tessnem-t yakan yerna teẓram-t .
43014008	Filibus inṭeq-ed , yenna-yas : A Sidi , sken-aɣ-ed kan Baba Ṛebbi beṛka-yaɣ .
43014009	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Amek , ayen akk i sɛeddaɣ yid-wen mazal ur iyi-tessineḍ ara a Filibus ! Win i yi-iwalan iwala Baba . Amek armi teqqaṛeḍ : « Sken-aɣ-ed kan Baba Ṛebbi »
43014010	Mazal ur tumineḍ ara belli nekk lliɣ di Baba , Baba yella deg-i ? Ayen i wen-d qqaṛeɣ ur d-yekki ara s ɣuṛ-i : Baba yella deg-i , d nețța i gxeddmen lecɣal-agi-ines .
43014011	Amnet-iyi , nekk lliɣ di Baba , Baba yella deg-i ; neɣ m'ulac , amnet xeṛsum ɣef ddemma n lecɣal i twalam xedmeɣ-ten .
43014012	A wen-iniɣ tideț : win yumnen yis-i , ad ixdem ula d nețța lecɣal i xedmeɣ , yerna ad ixdem akteṛ axaṭer ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer Baba .
43014013	Ayen akk ara tessutrem s yisem-iw a t-xedmeɣ iwakken tamanegt n Baba Ṛebbi a d-tban s Mmi-s .
43014014	A wen-t-id ɛiwdeɣ : ma tessutrem kra s yisem-iw a t-xedmeɣ .
43014015	Ma tḥemmlem-iyi , ḥerzet lewṣayat-iw .
43014016	Nekk ad ssutreɣ i Baba a wen-d-ye Amɛiwen nniḍen ara yilin yid-wen i dayem :
43014017	d Ṛṛuḥ n tideț , win akken ur tezmir ddunit a t-teqbel axaṭer ur t-twala ur t-tessin . Kunwi tessnem-t axaṭer yella yid-wen yerna ad yili deg-wen .
43014018	Ur kkun-țțaǧǧaɣ ara d igujilen , a d-uɣaleɣ ɣuṛ-wen .
43014019	Drus i yi-d iqqimen di ddunit ; ddunit ur tețɛawad ara a yi-tẓer , ma d kunwi a yi-twalim axaṭer ddreɣ yerna ula d kunwi aț-țidirem .
43014020	Ass-nni aț-țfehmem belli nekk lliɣ di Baba , aț-țeẓrem daɣen belli kunwi tellam deg-i nekk lliɣ deg-wen .
43014021	Win i yi-ḥemmlen s tideț , d win i geṭṭfen lewṣayat-iw yerna iḥrez-itent . Win i yi-ḥemmlen a t-iḥemmel Baba , nekk daɣen a t-ḥemmleɣ yerna a d-sbeggneɣ iman-iw ɣuṛ-es .
43014022	Yuda ( mačči Yudas n Qeṛyut ) , yenna-yas : A Sidi , acuɣeṛ i nukkni kan i tebɣiḍ a d-sbeggneḍ iman-ik , mačči i ddunit meṛṛa ?
43014023	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Win i yi-ḥemmlen ad ixdem ayen i d-nniɣ , ula d Baba a t iḥemmel ! A d-nas i sin ɣuṛ-es , a nezdeɣ ɣuṛ-es .
43014024	Ma d win ur iyi-nḥemmel ara ur ixeddem ara ayen i d-nniɣ . Awal-agi i teslam mačči s ɣuṛ-i i d-yekka meɛna d awal n Baba i yi-d-iceggɛen .
43014025	Qqaṛeɣ-awen-d akk annect-agi skud mazal-iyi yid-wen .
43014026	Lameɛna Amɛiwen , Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ara d-iceggeɛ Baba s yisem-iw , a wen-isselmed kullec yerna a wen-d-ismekti ayen akk i wen-d-nniɣ .
43014027	Ad ṛuḥeɣ meɛna a wen-d ǧǧeɣ lehna , d lehna-w ara wen-d fkeɣ . Lehna ara wen-d-fkeɣ mačči am lehna i d-tețțak ddunit . Daymi i wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ur țțaggadet ara , kkset anezgum seg wulawen-nwen .
43014028	Teslam-d mi wen-d-nniɣ ad ṛuḥeɣ meɛna a d-uɣaleɣ ɣuṛ-wen . Lemmer tḥemmlem-iyi , tili tfeṛḥem imi teẓram ɣer Baba ara ṛuḥeɣ , axaṭer Baba yugar-iyi .
43014029	Xebbṛeɣ-kkun-id ɣef wannect-agi tura uqbel ad yedṛu iwakken m'ara d-yedṛu aț-țamnem .
43014030	Sya d asawen , ur seɛɛuɣ ara lweqt ad meslayeɣ yid-wen imi Amesbaṭli n ddunit-agi atan iteddu-d . Ur yeḥkim ara deg-i ,
43014031	meɛna ilaq imdanen n ddunit-a ad ɛeqlen belli ḥemmleɣ Baba yerna xeddmeɣ akken i yi-d-yumeṛ . Ayaw kkret a nṛuḥet syagi .
43015001	— D nekk i ț-țara n tideț , yerna d Baba i ț-ixeddmen .
43015002	Yal isegmi yeṭṭfen deg-i ur d-nețțak ara lfakya , ige ? ? em-it , ma d isegman i d-ițakken lfakya , iferres iten akken a d-efken lfakya s waṭas .
43015003	Akka ula d kunwi i teṣfam s uselmed i wen-d-fkiɣ .
43015004	Ilit deg-i , nekk ad iliɣ deg-wen . Isegmi ur yezmir ara a d-ye lfakya weḥd-es m'ur yeṭṭif ara ɣer tara . Akken daɣen kunwi , m'ur teṭṭifem ara deg-i ur tețțizmirem ara a d-tefkem lfakya .
43015005	Nekk ț-țara , kunwi d isegman-is . Win yellan deg-i nekk lliɣ deg-s , a d-ye lfakya s waṭas , axaṭer mbla nekk ur tețțizmirem aț-țxedmem acemma .
43015006	Win ur neṭṭif ara deg-i ad yețwaḍeggeṛ ɣer beṛṛa n tfeṛṛant am isegmi yețwagezmen . M'ara qqaṛen isegman , ad țwajemɛen iwakken a sen-ceɛlen times ad ṛɣen .
43015007	Ma teṭṭfem deg-i yerna awal-iw yezdeɣ deg-wen , ssutret ayen i tebɣam a kkun-id-yaweḍ .
43015008	Ma tețțakem-d lfakya s tugeț tesbegginem-d belli ț-țideț d inelmaden-iw i tellam ; akka ara d-tban tmanegt n Baba i yemdanen .
43015009	Akken i yi-iḥemmel Baba i kkun ḥemmleɣ ula d nekk ; dumet di tayri-inu .
43015010	Ma tḥerzem lumuṛat-iw aț țdumem di tayri-w , akken ḥerzeɣ lumuṛ n Baba yerna dumeɣ di tayri-s .
43015011	Nniɣ-awen-d akk ayagi iwakken lfeṛḥ-iw a kkun-yeččaṛ ula d kunwi , dɣa lfeṛḥ-nwen ad yennekmal .
43015012	Atan ihi lameṛ ara wen-d-fkeɣ : « Myeḥmalet wway gar-awen akken i kkun-ḥemmleɣ nekkini . »
43015013	Ulac tayri yugaren tin n win ara isebblen tudert-is ɣef yeḥbiben-is .
43015014	Aql-ikkun d iḥbiben-iw ma txeddmem ayen i wen d-umṛeɣ .
43015015	Sya ɣer zdat ur kkun-ḥețțbeɣ ara d iqeddacen , axaṭer aqeddac ur yeẓri ara d acu i gxeddem Bab-is . Tura aql-ikkun d iḥbiben-iw axaṭer slemdeɣ-awen ayen akk i d-lemdeɣ ɣer Baba .
43015016	Mačči d kunwi i yi-ixtaṛen meɛna d nekk i kkun ixtaṛen ; ceggɛeɣ-kkun iwakken a d-tefkem lfakya , lfakya ara idumen . S wakka , Baba Ṛebbi a wen-yeqbel kra n wayen ara s-tessutrem s yisem-iw .
43015017	Atan ihi lameṛ ara wen-d-fkeɣ : « Myeḥmalet wway gar-awen » .
43015018	Ma yella tekṛeh-ikkun ddunit ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli tekṛeh-iyi uqbel-nwen .
43015019	Lemmer n ddunit i tellam tili tḥemmel-ikkun imi d ayla-s . Lameɛna kunwi mačči n ddunit , axaṭer d nekk i kkun-id yextaṛen si tlemmast n ddunit , daymi i kkun-tekṛeh .
43015020	Mmektit-ed ayen i wen-d nniɣ : aqeddac werǧin yugar Bab-is . Ma qehṛen-iyi a kkun-qehṛen ula d kunwi ; ma ḥerzen imeslayen-iw ad ḥerzen imeslayen-nwen .
43015021	? ef ddemma-w ara xedmen akka , axaṭer ur ssinen ara win i yi-d-iceggɛen .
43015022	Lemmer ur d-usiɣ ara , lemmer ur sen-d-mmeslayeɣ ara tili ulac ddnub fell-asen lameɛna tura ddnub i yirawen-nsen .
43015023	Win i yi-keṛhen yekṛeh daɣen Baba .
43015024	Lemmer ur xdimeɣ ara gar-asen ayen weṛǧin yexdem yiwen , tili ulac ddnub fell-asen . Meɛna tura , ɣas akken ẓran kullec , țkemmilen keṛhen-iyi am nekk am Baba .
43015025	Axaṭer ilaq ad yețwakemmel wayen yuran di ccariɛa : Keṛhen-iyi mbla sebba .
43015026	M'ara d-yas umɛiwen , win akken ara wen-d-ceggɛeɣ s ɣuṛ Baba Ṛebbi , Ṛṛuḥ n tideț ara d-yasen s ɣuṛ-es , nețța s yiman-is ara d-icehden fell-i .
43015027	Kunwi daɣen aț-țuɣalem d inigan-iw imi tellam yid-i si tazwara .
43016001	Nniɣ-awen-d akk annect-agi iwakken ur tɣellim ara .
43016002	Axaṭer , a kkun-stixṛen si lǧwameɛ , yerna a d-yas lweqt anda wid ara kkun-inɣen ad ɣilen d asfel i fkan i Ṛebbi .
43016003	Ad ssiwḍen ɣer wannect-agi imi ur iyi-ssinen nekk , ur ssinen Baba .
43016004	Nniɣ-awen-d akk ayagi tura iwakken asm'ara ssiwḍen ɣer wannect-agi , a d-mektim belli nniɣ-awen-t-id uqbel a d-yedṛu . Ur a wen-t-id-nniɣ ara si tazwara axaṭer mazal-iyi lliɣ yid-wen .
43016005	Tura ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer win i yi-d iceggɛen ; atan yiwen deg-wen ur iyi-d-isteqsa ɣer wanda ara ṛuḥeɣ .
43016006	Imi i wen-d-nniɣ akka , leḥzen yeččuṛ ulawen-nwen .
43016007	A wen-iniɣ tideț , yelha-yawen ma ṛuḥeɣ axaṭer m'ur ṛuḥeɣ ara , amɛiwen ur d-yețțas ara ɣuṛ-wen , meɛna ma ṛuḥeɣ a wen t-id-ceggɛeɣ .
43016008	M'ara d-yas , a d-isbeggen i yemdanen belli ɣelṭen ɣef wayen yeɛnan ddnub , lḥeqq , d lḥisab n Ṛebbi .
43016009	? elṭen ɣef wayen yeɛnan ddnub , imi ugin ad amnen yis-i ;
43016010	ɣef wayen yellan d lḥeqq imi tedduɣ ɣer Baba yerna ur tețțuɣalem ara a yi-twalim ;
43016011	ɣelṭen ɣef wayen yeɛnan lḥisab n Ṛebbi , imi amesbaṭli n ddunit-agi yețțuḥaseb yakan .
43016012	Aṭas n lewṣayat i mazal a wen tent-id-iniɣ , lameɛna di teswiɛt-agi ur sent-tezmirem ara .
43016013	Asm'ara d-yas Ṛṛuḥ n tideț , a kkun-iseddu di tideț akken tella , ayen ara wen-d-yini mačči s ɣuṛ-es i d-yekka meɛna a d-immeslay ɣef wayen akk i gesla yerna a kkun id-ixebbeṛ ɣef wayen akk ara yedṛun ɣer zdat .
43016014	A d-isbeggen tamanegt-iw axaṭer s ɣuṛ-i ara d-yawi wayen akk ara wen-d-yini .
43016015	Ayla n Baba d ayla-w ula d nekk . Daymi i wen-d-nniɣ s ɣuṛ-i ara d-yawi wayen akk ara wen-d-yini .
43016016	Di kra n lweqt ur iyi-tețwalim ara , kra n lweqt daɣen aț-țuɣalem a yi-twalim .
43016017	Dɣa kra seg inelmaden-is țmesteqsayen , qqaṛen : D acu i gebɣa a ɣ-d-yini mi i d-yeqqaṛ : « Kra n lweqt ur iyi tețwalim ara , kra n lweqt daɣen aț-țuɣalem a yi-twalim » , neɣ mi ɣ-d yenna : « Ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer Baba » ?
43016018	Nnan daɣen : D acu i d lmeɛna n « Kra n tallit kan » i ɣef i ɣ-d-yemmeslay ? Ur nefhim ara d acu i gebɣa a d-yini !
43016019	Sidna Ɛisa yefhem belli bɣan a t-steqsin , dɣa yenna-yasen : Tețmesteqsayem ɣef wayen i bɣiɣ a d-iniɣ s imeslayen-agi : « Tallit kan i mazal ur yi-tețwalim ara , tallit daɣen a yi-twalim » ;
43016020	nniɣ-awen s tideț : kunwi aț-țețrum , aț-țmeǧdem , ma d imdanen n ddunit-a ad feṛḥen aṭas . Kunwi aț-țeṛwum lqeṛḥ meɛna lqeṛḥ-nwen ad yuɣal d lfeṛḥ .
43016021	M'ara d-tarew tmeṭṭut tețțenɛețțab aṭas di teswiɛt-nni , lameɛna akken kan ara twali llufan-is ilul-ed tețțu lqeṛḥ-is imi lfeṛḥ-is d ameqqran .
43016022	Kunwi daɣen aql-ikkun tețwaqeṛḥem tura meɛna a d-uɣaleɣ a kkun-zṛeɣ , imiren ulawen-nwen ad ččaṛen d lfeṛḥ ; lfeṛḥ-agi yiwen ur izmir a wen t-yekkes .
43016023	M'ara d-yas wass-nni ur tețțuɣalem ara a yi-testeqsim . A wen iniɣ s tideț : ayen akk ara tessutrem i Baba s yisem-iw a wen-t-id-yeqbel .
43016024	Ar tura ur tessutrem acemma s yisem-iw . Ssutret a wen-d-yețțune akken lfeṛḥ-nwen ad yețwakemmel .
43016025	Ayen akk i wen-d-nniɣ , nniɣ awen-t-id s lemtul . A d-yas lweqt ur a wen-d-țmeslayeɣ ara akka , a wend hedṛeɣ ɛinani ɣef wayen yeɛnan Baba .
43016026	Ass-nni aț-țdeɛɛum ɣer Baba s yisem-iw , yerna ur wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ara belli ad dɛuɣ ɣer Baba fell-awen .
43016027	Axaṭer Baba iḥemmel-ikkun imi iyi-tḥemmlem , yerna tumnem belli s ɣuṛ-es i d-kkiɣ .
43016028	? - țideț usiɣ-ed s ɣuṛ Baba , usiɣ-ed ɣer ddunit , ma ț-țura ad ǧǧeɣ ddunit ad uɣaleɣ ɣer Baba .
43016029	Inelmaden-is nnan-as : Atan tura tețmeslayeḍ-aɣ-d ɛinani mačči s lemtul .
43016030	Tura neẓra belli tessneḍ kullec imi uqbel a d-nehdeṛ teẓriḍ ɣef wacu i nebɣa a k-nesteqsi . ? ef wayagi i numen belli s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-tusiḍ .
43016031	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Tura tumnem !
43016032	Atan iteddu-d lweqt yerna yewweḍ-ed , aț țemfaṛaqem ɣer mkul tama a yi teǧǧem iman-iw . Lameɛna ur lliɣ ara weḥd-i axaṭer Baba yella yid-i .
43016033	Ilaq-iyi a wen-d-iniɣ daɣen annect-agi akken aț-țafem deg-i talwit . Aț-țɛeddim si teswiɛin n ddiq di ddunit , aț-țneɛtabem meɛna ṣebṛet ! Nekk ɣelbeɣ ddunit .
43017001	Mi d-yenna imeslayen-agi , Sidna Ɛisa yerfed allen-is ɣer igenni , yenna : — A Baba , yewweḍ-ed lweqt ! Sbeggen-ed tamanegt n Mmi-k iwakken ula d nețța a d-isbeggen tamanegt-ik !
43017002	Tefkiḍ-as tazmert ɣef yemdanen n ddunit meṛṛa akken ad ye tudert n dayem i wid akk i s-d-tefkiḍ .
43017003	Tudert n dayem : d asm'ara issinen yemdanen belli d kečč i d Ṛebbi awḥid , Illu n tideț , ad issinen daɣen Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , win akken i d-tceggɛeḍ .
43017004	Sbeggneɣ-ed tamanegt-ik di ddunit mi kfiɣ ccɣel-nni i ɣef iyi-twekkleḍ .
43017005	Tura a Baba , ɛuzz-iyi s tmanegt-ik , tin akken i sɛiɣ asmi lliɣ ɣuṛ-ek uqbel a d-texleq ddunit !
43017006	Sbeggneɣ-d isem-ik i yemdanen akk i yi-d-tefkiḍ si ddunit . Llan d ayla-k , tuɣaleḍ tefkiḍ-iyi-ten-id ; nutni ḥerzen awal-ik .
43017007	Tura ẓran belli ayen akk i yi-d-tefkiḍ s ɣuṛ-ek i d-yekka ;
43017008	axaṭeṛ ṣṣawḍeɣ-asen-d awal-ik akken yella , yerna qeblen-t . ? ran ț-țideț s ɣuṛ-ek i d-kkiɣ yerna umnen d kečč i yi-d-iceggɛen .
43017009	Deɛɛuɣ ɣuṛ-ek fell-asen . Ur deɛɛuɣ ara ɣef yemdanen nniḍen lameɛna ɣef wid i yi-d-tefkiḍ , axaṭer nutni d ayla-k .
43017010	Ayen yellan d ayla-w inek , ayen yellan d ayla-k inu . Tamanegt-iw tețfeǧǧiǧ deg-sen .
43017011	Qṛib tura ad ffɣeɣ si ddunit , a n-ṛuḥeɣ ɣuṛ-ek meɛna nutni ad qqimen di ddunit . A Baba , ay Imqeddes ! ? erz-iten s tezmert n yisem-ik , isem-nni i yi-d-tefkiḍ iwakken ad uɣalen d yiwen , akken nella nekk yid-ek d yiwen .
43017012	Seg wasmi lliɣ gar-asen , ḥerzeɣ-ten s tezmert n yisem-ik , isem-agi i yi-d-tefkiḍ . ? erzeɣ-ten , yiwen deg-sen ur yeɛṛiq anagar win i glaqen ad yeɛṛeq , iwakken tira iqedsen ad nnekmalent .
43017013	Tura a n-uɣaleɣ ɣuṛ-ek , qqaṛeɣ-ed akk annect-agi skud mazal-iyi di ddunit , akken ad ččaṛen wulawen-nsen d lfeṛḥ am lfeṛḥ-iw ikemlen .
43017014	Fkiɣ-asen awal-ik meɛna at ddunit keṛhen-ten axaṭer am nekk am inelmaden-iw ur nelli ara n at ddunit .
43017015	Ur k-d-ssutreɣ ara akken a ten tekkseḍ si ddunit , meɛna a ten tmenɛeḍ si Cciṭan .
43017016	Nutni mačči n ddunit , akken ula d nekk ur lliɣ ara n ddunit .
43017017	? erz-iten di tideț ; d awal-ik i ț-țideț .
43017018	Akken i yi-d-tceggɛeḍ ɣer ddunit , nekk daɣen a ten-ceggɛeɣ .
43017019	? ef yisem-ik ad sebbleɣ iman-iw fell-asen , iwakken ula d nutni ad sebblen iman-nsen ɣef tideț .
43017020	Mačči fell-asen kan i deɛɛuɣ , deɛɛuɣ daɣen ɣef wid akk ara yamnen yis-i s cchada n inelmaden-iw .
43017021	A k-ssutreɣ a Baba ad uɣalen akk d yiwen . Akken telliḍ deg-i a Baba nekk daɣen lliɣ deg-k , ad uɣalen d yiwen iwakken at ddunit ad amnen belli d kečč i yi-d-iceggɛen .
43017022	Fkiɣ-asen tamanegt i yi-d-tefkiḍ iwakken ad uɣalen d yiwen , akken nella nekk yid-ek d yiwen :
43017023	nekk deg-sen , kečč deg-i . Ad uɣalen akk d yiwen , iwakken at ddunit meṛṛa ad setɛeṛfen belli d kečč i yi-d-iceggɛen , yerna tḥemmleḍ-ten akken i yi tḥemmleḍ !
43017024	A Baba bɣiɣ wid meṛṛa i yi-d tefkiḍ ad ilin yid-i anda ara yiliɣ , ad walin tamanegt i yi-d-tefkiḍ axaṭer tḥemmleḍ-iyi uqbel a d-texleq ddunit .
43017025	A Baba , Kečč yellan d aḥeqqi at ddunit ur k-ssinen ara ma d nekk ssneɣ-k , wigi ẓran belli d kečč i yi-d-iceggɛen .
43017026	Sbeggneɣ-k-id ɣuṛ-sen yerna mazal a k-id-sbeggneɣ , iwakken tayri akk i yi-d-tefkiḍ aț-țili deg-sen , nekk daɣen ad iliɣ deg-sen .
43018001	Mi gfukk ta ? allit , Sidna Ɛisa yekker iṛuḥ nețța d inelmaden is , zegren iɣzer n Sidṛun . Dinna tella yiwet n tmazirt kecmen ɣuṛ-es .
43018002	Yudas ara t-ixedɛen yessen mliḥ amkan-nni , axaṭer Sidna Ɛisa yennum ițṛuḥu ɣer dinna nețța d inelmaden-is .
43018003	Yudas yewwi-d yid-es tarbaɛt n lɛeskeṛ akk-d iɛessasen n lǧameɛ ; ceggɛen-ten-id lmuqedmin imeqqranen d ifariziyen , wwḍen-d ɣer tmazirt-nni . Wwin-d yid-sen tiftilin , isufa akk-d leslaḥ .
43018004	Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran akk ayen ara yedṛun yid-es , iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-sen yenna yasen : ? ef wanwa i tețnadim ?
43018005	Nutni rran-as : Nețnadi ɣef Ɛisa anaṣari ! Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : D nekkini . Yudas , win akken ara t-ixedɛen yuɣ-it lḥal gar-asen .
43018006	Imi i sen-yenna Sidna Ɛisa « d nekkini » , uɣalen akk ɣer deffir , ɣlin ɣer lqaɛa .
43018007	Sidna Ɛisa yesteqsa-ten daɣen yenna : ? ef wanwa i tețnadim ? Nutni rran-as : ? ef Ɛisa anaṣari !
43018008	Sidna Ɛisa yerna yenna-yasen : Nniɣ-awen-d d nekk ! Ma d nekk i ɣef tețnadim , ǧǧet widak-agi ad ṛuḥen .
43018009	Akka i gedṛa wawal-nni i d yenna yakan : « Ur sruḥeɣ ula d yiwen seg widak i yi-d-tefkiḍ . »
43018010	Semɛun Buṭrus yejbed-ed ajenwi , yewwet yis aqeddac n lmuqeddem ameqqran , igzem-as ame ? ? uɣ ayeffus . Aqeddac-agi isem-is Maṛxus .
43018011	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i Buṭrus : Err ajenwi-inek ɣer titar-is ( teɣlaft-is ) . Eɛni ur ilaq ara ad sweɣ taqbuct n leɛtab i yi-d-yefka Baba ?
43018012	Lɛeskeṛ akk-d iɛessasen n lǧameɛ ṭṭfen Sidna Ɛisa ,
43018013	wwin-t yețwarez ɣer wexxam n ? anna aḍeggal n Kayef yellan d lmuqeddem ameqqran aseggas-nni .
43018014	Kayef d win akken i sen-yennan i wat Isṛail : « Axiṛ ad immet yiwen kan ɣef lumma . »
43018015	Semɛun Buṭrus , nețța d yiwen unelmad nniḍen tebɛen Sidna Ɛisa . Anelmad-agi yessen lmuqeddem ameqqran s yiman-is ; itbeɛ Sidna Ɛisa mi t-wwin ɣer wefrag n wexxam n lmuqeddem ameqqran ,
43018016	ma d Buṭrus yeqqim di beṛṛa ɣer tama n tewwurt . Anelmad-nni yessnen lmuqeddem ameqqran yuɣal yeffeɣ ed , yehdeṛ-as i tɛessast n tewwurt , dɣa tessekcem Buṭrus .
43018017	Taqeddact-nni yețɛassan tawwurt , tenna i Buṭrus : Ur telliḍ ara ula d kečč seg inelmaden n wergaz-agi ? Buṭrus yerra-yas : Xaṭi , ur lliɣ ara seg-sen !
43018018	Iqeddacen akk-d iɛessasen ceɛlen times di lkanun , zzin-as iwakken ad sseḥmun axaṭer d asemmiḍ . Buṭrus iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-sen ad yeẓẓiẓen ( ad isseḥmu ) ula d nețța .
43018019	Lmuqeddem ameqqran yebda yesteqsay Sidna Ɛisa ɣef wayen yeɛnan inelmaden-is d uselmed-ines .
43018020	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Hedṛeɣ ɛinani zdat lɣaci , slemdeɣ di leǧwameɛ n wat Isṛail , slemdeɣ daɣen deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen anda i gețnejmaɛ lɣaci , ur hdiṛeɣ ara s tuffra .
43018021	Iwacu i yi testeqsayeḍ ? Steqsi widak i yi-slan amek i sen-hedṛeɣ , nutni ẓran akk ayen i d-nniɣ .
43018022	Mi d-yenna ayagi , yiwen uɛessas yellan zdat-es , yewwet it s useṛfiq , yenna-yas : Akka ara d-thedṛeḍ i lmuqeddem ameqqran ?
43018023	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ma nniɣ-ed ayen ixesṛen , ini yi-d d acu-t ; ma yella ț-țideț i d nniɣ , acuɣeṛ i yi-tewteḍ ?
43018024	Imiren ? anna iceggeɛ Sidna Ɛisa yețwarez ɣer Kayef , lmuqeddem ameqqran .
43018025	Semɛun Buṭrus mazal-it yeqqim yeẓẓiẓin deg wemkan-nni , iluɛa-t-id yiwen yenna-yas : I kečč , ur telliḍ ara d yiwen seg inelmaden n wergaz-agi ? Buṭrus inkeṛ yenna-yas : Xaṭi , ur lliɣ ara seg-sen !
43018026	Yiwen seg iqeddacen n lmuqeddem ameqqran , yețțilin i win akken iwumi yegzem Semɛun Buṭrus ame ? ? uɣ , iwehha-d ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : Ur k-ẓriɣ ara yid-es di tmazirt ?
43018027	Lameɛna Buṭrus yenkeṛ daɣen . Imiren kan iskkuɛ uyaziḍ .
43018028	Mi d-ffɣen s ɣuṛ Kayef , lecyux n wat Isṛail wwin Sidna Ɛisa ɣer lḥakem Bilaṭus ; yuɣ lḥal d lefjer . Wid i t-yewwin ur kcimen ara ɣer daxel n lbeṛj ( sṛaya ) n Bilaṭus , iwakken ad qqimen d izedganen m'ara ččen imensi n lɛid n Tfaska .
43018029	Daymi i d-iffeɣ ɣuṛ-sen Bilaṭus , yesteqsa-ten yenna : D acu i gexdem wergaz-agi ?
43018030	Rran-as : Lemmer ur yexdim ara ayen n diri , tili ur k-t-id-nețțawi ara .
43018031	Bilaṭus yenna-yasen : Atan ɣuṛ-wen , ḥekmet fell-as s ccariɛa-nwen ! Nutni nnan-as : Nukni ur nezmir ara a neḥkem ɣef yiwen s lmut !
43018032	Ayagi , iwakken ad yedṛu wayen i d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa ɣef lmut i t-yețṛaǧun .
43018033	Bilaṭus yekcem ɣer wexxam n ccṛeɛ akken ad icaṛeɛ Sidna Ɛisa ; yesteqsa-t , yenna-yas : D kečč i d agellid n wat Isṛail ?
43018034	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yella win i k-t-id-yennan neɣ d kečč i t-id-yennan s yiman-ik ?
43018035	Bilaṭus yerra-yas : Tḥesbeḍ-iyi n wat Isṛail nekkini ? D lmuqedmin imeqqranen d wat n tmurt-ik i k-id-yewwin ɣuṛ-i ! D acu i txedmeḍ ?
43018036	Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Tagelda-w mačči n ddunit-agi . Lemmer tagelda-w n ddunit-agi tili iqeddacen-iw nnuɣen akken ur d-ɣelliɣ ara ger ifassen n imeqqranen n wat Isṛail . S tideț tagelda-w mačči n dagi .
43018037	Bilaṭus yenna-yas : Ihi d agellid i telliḍ ? Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Tenniḍ-t-id s yiman-ik , d agellid i lliɣ ! Luleɣ-d yerna usiɣ-ed ɣer ddunit-agi akken a d-cehdeɣ ɣef tideț . Win iḥemmlen tideț , yesmeḥsis i wayen i d-qqaṛeɣ .
43018038	Bilaṭus yenna-yas : D acu i ț-țideț ? Mi s-d-yenna ayagi , Bilaṭus yuɣal ɣer wat Isṛail yenna-yasen : Nekk , ur ufiɣ ara sebba s wayes ara ḥekmeɣ ɣef wergaz-agi .
43018039	Meɛna akken i tella lɛadda , di mkul lɛid n Tfaska țserriḥeɣ-awen-d i yiwen umeḥbus ; tebɣam ihi a d-serrḥeɣ i ugellid n wat Isṛail ?
43018040	Dɣa nutni bdan țɛeggiḍen , qqaṛen : Ala ! Ur as-d-țserriḥ ara i nețța ! Serreḥ-ed i Baṛabas ! Baṛabas-agi , d argaz bu tmegṛaḍ .
43019001	Bilaṭus yefka lameṛ ad awin Sidna Ɛisa a t-wten s ujelkkaḍ .
43019002	Lɛeskeṛ zḍan taɛeṣṣabt s isennanen , ssersen-as-ț ɣef wuqeṛṛuy , selsen-as daɣen abeṛnus azeggaɣ ,
43019003	imiren țqeṛṛiben ɣer zdat-es qqaṛen : Azul fell-ak ay agellid n wat Isṛail ! Rnan kkaten-t s iṣeṛfiqen ( ibeqqayen ) .
43019004	Bilaṭus yeffeɣ-ed daɣen ɣer imeqqranen n wat Isṛail yenna-yasen : Atan a wen-t-id-awiɣ ɣer dagi akken aț-țeẓrem belli ur ufiɣ ara deg-s sebba s wayes ara ḥekmeɣ fell-as .
43019005	Ssufɣen-d Sidna Ɛisa ɣer beṛṛa s tɛeṣṣabt-nni n isennanen akk-d ibidi ( abeṛnus ) azeggaɣ . Bilaṭus yenna-yasen : Atan ɣuṛ-wen !
43019006	Mi t-walan imeqqranen n wat Isṛail d iɛessasen , bdan țɛeggiḍen : Semmeṛ-it ɣef wumidag ! Semmeṛ-it ɣef lluḥ ! Bilaṭus yenna yasen : Ma tebɣam a t-tsemmṛem ɣef wumidag , atan ɣuṛ-wen ! Ma d nekk , ur ufiɣ ara sebba s wayes ara ḥekmeɣ fell-as .
43019007	Lecyux n wat Isṛail rran-as : Nukni nesɛa ccariɛa ; ccariɛa nneɣ teqqaṛ-ed : Argaz am agi ilaq ad yemmet axaṭer yenna-d : « Nekk d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi . »
43019008	Imeslayen-agi sxelɛen Bilaṭus .
43019009	Yuɣal yekcem ɣer wexxam n ccṛeɛ yesteqsa daɣen Sidna Ɛisa , yenna-yas : Ansi i d-tekkiḍ ? Sidna Ɛisa ur s-d-yerri ara awal .
43019010	Bilaṭus yenna-yas : Amek ! Ur iyi-d-țarraḍ ara awal ? Ur teẓriḍ ara belli zemreɣ a k-serḥeɣ , zemreɣ daɣen ad fkeɣ lameṛ a k-semmṛeɣ ɣef wumidag ?
43019011	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ur tezmireḍ i wacemma fell-i anagar ayen i k-d-yețțunefken seg igenni . Daymi win i yi-d-yewwin ger ifassen-ik yewwi ddnub akteṛ-ik .
43019012	Seg imiren Bilaṭus yețqellib amek ara d-iserreḥ i Sidna Ɛisa lameɛna lecyux n wat Isṛail sekkren leɛyaḍ , qqaṛen-as : Ma tserrḥeḍ-as i wergaz-agi ur telliḍ ara d aḥbib n Qayṣer , axaṭer win yerran iman-is d agellid , d aɛdaw n Qayṣer .
43019013	Mi gesla i imeslayen-agi , Bilaṭus yessufeɣ-ed Sidna Ɛisa ɣer beṛṛa , yeqqim ɣef wukursi n ccṛeɛ deg umkan iwumi qqaṛen s tɛibṛanit « Gabbaṭa » yeɛni « afrag yessan s yeblaḍen » .
43019014	Ass-nni , d ass uqbel lɛid n Tfaska ; aț-țili d leǧwahi n tnac , Bilaṭus yenna i lecyux n at Isṛail : Atan ugellid-nwen !
43019015	Meɛna nutni rnan ɛeggḍen : Enɣ-it ! Enɣ-it ! Semmeṛ-it ɣef wumidag ! Bilaṭus yenna-yasen : Amek ! Ad semmṛeɣ agellid nwen ? Lecyux n wat Isṛail rran-as : D Qayṣer i d agellid-nneɣ , ur nesɛi ara agellid nniḍen .
43019016	Dɣa Bilaṭus yefka-yasen-t akken a t-semmṛen ɣef wumidag . ? ṭfen-d Sidna Ɛisa
43019017	sbubben-as amidag , ffɣen si temdint , ulin ɣer wemkan yețțusemman « tiɣilt n uqeṛṛuy » ( iwumi qqaṛen s tɛibṛanit « Gulguṭa » ) .
43019018	Dinna i t-semmṛen ɣef lluḥ nețța akk-d sin nniḍen . Sbedden imidagen yiwen sya wayeḍ sya , Sidna Ɛisa di tlemmast .
43019019	Bilaṭus yumeṛ ad semmṛen yiwet n telwiḥt sennig uqeṛṛuy n Sidna Ɛisa , yura deg-s : « Ɛisa anaṣari , agellid n wat Isṛail . »
43019020	Imi amkan-nni anda i t-semmṛen ur yebɛid ara ɣef temdint , aṭas n wat Isṛail i geɣṛan talwiḥt-nni yuran s tɛibṛanit , s tlatinit ț-țyunanit .
43019021	Lecyux n wat Isṛail ccetkan ɣer Bilaṭus , nnan-as : Ur ilaq ara aț-țaruḍ ɣef telwiḥt nni « Agellid n wat Isṛail , » lameɛna ilaq aț-țaruḍ « Argaz-agi yenna d : nekk d agellid n wat Isṛail . »
43019022	Bilaṭus yerra-yasen : Ayen uriɣ ad yeqqim akken i t-uriɣ .
43019023	Mi semmṛen Sidna Ɛisa ɣef wumidag , lɛeskeṛ ddmen-d lqecc-is bḍan-ten ɣef ṛebɛa , yal yiwen yewwi amur-is ; yeqqim-ed ujellab-is ur nefṣil ur nxaḍ , mazal-it akken yezḍa seg yixef ɣer wayeḍ .
43019024	Heddṛen wway gar-asen , nnan : Acuɣeṛ ara t-ncerreg , eyyaw axiṛ a nger tasɣaṛt fell-as a nẓer anwa ara t-yawin . S wakka i gennekmal wayen yuran di tira iqedsen : Feṛqen lqecc-iw , gren tasɣaṛt ɣef wubeṛnus-iw . » Akka i xedmen iɛsekṛiyen-nni .
43019025	Zdat umidag , tbedd yemma-s n Sidna Ɛisa , weltma-s n yemma-s , Meryem tameṭṭut n Klufas akk-d Meryem tamagdalit .
43019026	Mi gwala Sidna Ɛisa yemma-s tbedd ɣer tama n unelmad-nni i gḥemmel , yenna-yas : A tameṭṭut , atan mmi-m .
43019027	Yenna daɣen i unelmad-nni : Ațan yemma-k . Seg imiren anelmad-nni yewwi-ț ɣer wexxam-is .
43019028	Mi geẓra Sidna Ɛisa dayen kullec ifuk , yenna iwakken ad nnekmalent tira iqedsen : Ffudeɣ !
43019029	Yella dinna ubuqal yeččuṛen d lxell . Dmen-d ameččim n taḍuṭ cudden-t ɣer yixef n uɣanim , sbezgen t-id s lxell-nni , ssawḍen-as-t ɣer yimi-s .
43019030	Akken kan i geɛṛeḍ lxell-nni , Sidna Ɛisa yenna : Kullec yețwakemmel ! Yessekna aqeṛṛuy-is , yessufeɣ ṛṛuḥ .
43019031	Tafaska n izimer n leslak yeɣli-d deg wass n westeɛfu . Tameddit n wass uqbel ass n westeɛfu , lecyux n wat Isṛail ur bɣin ara ad ǧǧen lǧețțat-nni ɣef yimidagen di leɛwaceṛ . Ṛuḥen ad ssutren i Bilaṭus a sen-ṛẓen iḍaṛṛen i widak-nni yețwasemmṛen ; iwakken ad kksen lǧețțat-nsen .
43019032	Lɛeskeṛ ṛuḥen , ṛẓan iḍaṛṛen i yiwen seg widak-nni yețwasemmṛen ț-țama n Sidna Ɛisa , syenna uɣalen ɣer wayeḍ .
43019033	Mi wwḍen ɣer Sidna Ɛisa , ufan-t yemmut yakan , daymi ur s-ṛzin ara iḍaṛṛen-is .
43019034	Yiwen uɛeskṛi yessenta yas isekkin deg idis , imiren ffɣen-d waman akk-d idammen seg-s .
43019035	Win i d-yeḥkan ɣef wannect-agi d inigi n ṣṣeḥ , axaṭer d ayen i geẓra s wallen-is . Yezṛa ț-țideț i d-yenna , yenna-t-id akken aț-țamnem ula d kunwi .
43019036	Ayagi meṛṛa yedṛa iwakken ad yețțukemmel wayen yuran di tira iqedsen : Ula d yiwen seg yeɣsan-is ur yețṛuz .
43019037	Yura daɣen : Ad ssersen tamuɣli ɣef win i fetken .
43019038	Deffir wannect-agi meṛṛa , Yusef n taddart n Arimati iṛuḥ yessuter i Bilaṭus a t-yeǧǧ ad yawi lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa . Nețța daɣen yella d anelmad-is , lameɛna yeffer iman-is axaṭer ițțaggad lecyux n wat Isṛail . Bilaṭus yeqbel wayen i s-d yessuter ; dɣa Yusef iṛuḥ a d-yawi lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa nețța d Nikudem ,
43019039	win akken i gṛuḥen deg yiḍ ɣer Sidna Ɛisa . Nikudem yewwi-d yid-es azal n tlatin litrat n leɛṭeṛ ixeddmen i lmegtin .
43019040	Di sin yid-sen , wwin-d lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa xedmen-as leɛṭeṛ akken i tella lɛadda n wat Isṛail , imiren țțlen-t s lekfen .
43019041	Zdat wemkan anda semmṛen Sidna Ɛisa , tella deg yiwet n tmazirt yiwen n yefri yețwaheggan d aẓekka , ulac win i gmeḍlen deg-s .
43019042	Imi i geqṛeb yefri-nni , rran lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa ɣer daxel , axaṭer ass i d-iteddun d ass n westeɛfu n wat Isṛail .
43020001	Ass n lḥedd , ṣṣbeḥ zik qbel ad yali wass , Meryem tamagdalit tṛuḥ ɣer u ? ekka . Twala azṛu-nni iqeflen imi n u ? ekka yețwakkes .
43020002	Imiren kan tuzzel aț-țessiweḍ lexbaṛ i Semɛun Buṭrus akk-d unelmad-nni i gḥemmel Sidna Ɛisa . Tenna-yasen : Kksen-d Ssid-nneɣ seg u ? ekka , ur neẓri ara anda i t-rran .
43020003	Buṭrus d unelmad-nni ddukklen , ṛuḥen ɣer u ? ekka .
43020004	Uzzlen i sin , lameɛna anelmad-nni yeǧǧa Buṭrus ɣer deffir , yewweḍ d amezwaru .
43020005	Imuqel ɣer daxel n u ? ekka , iwala lekfen di lqaɛa , lameɛna ur yekcim ara .
43020006	Semɛun Buṭrus i t-id-itebɛen ilḥeq-ed . Yekcem ɣer daxel u ? ekka , iwala lekfen di lqaɛa ,
43020007	ma d aceṭṭiḍ s wayes yețțel uqeṛṛuy n Sidna Ɛisa ur yelli ara akk-d lekfen-nni , meɛna yers ɣer rrif , mazal-it deg wemkan-is akken yețțel .
43020008	Anelmad-nni i gewwḍen d amezwaru , yekcem ula d nețța ɣer uẓekka . Mi gwala , yumen .
43020009	Axaṭer armi d imiren , urɛad fhimen belli Sidna Ɛisa ilaq a d yeḥyu si ger lmegtin akken yura di tira iqedsen .
43020010	Sin inelmaden-nni uɣalen ɣer yexxamen-nsen .
43020011	Yuɣ lḥal Meryem tella di beṛṛa , tețru tama n u ? ekka . Mi tella tețru , tmuqel ɣer daxel ,
43020012	twala snat lmalayekkat s llebsa tamellalt , qqimen deg wemkan-nni anda akken i ssersen lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa , yiwen ɣer uqeṛṛuy wayeḍ ɣer iḍaṛṛen ,
43020013	nnan-as : Acuɣeṛ i tețruḍ ? Meryem tenna-yasen : Wwin Ssid-iw , yerna ur ẓriɣ ara anda i t-rran !
43020014	Urɛad d-tfuk ameslay tmuqel ɣer deffir , twala Sidna Ɛisa ibedd-ed , lameɛna ur teɛqil ara belli d nețța .
43020015	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Acuɣeṛ i tețruḍ ? ? ef wanwa i tețqellibeḍ ? Meryem tɣil d aɛessas n tmazirt , tenna-yas : Ma yella d kečč i t-iddmen , ini-yi-d ɣer wanda i t-tewwiḍ akken ad ṛuḥeɣ a t-id-awiɣ .
43020016	Sidna Ɛisa iluɛa-ț-id yenna-yas : Meryem ! Tezzi ɣuṛ-es , dɣa tenna-yas s tɛibṛanit : Rabuni ! ( yeɛni : a Sidi ! )
43020017	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ur yi-d-țmassa ara , axaṭer urɛad uliɣ ɣer Baba . Lameɛna ṛuḥ ini-yasen i watmaten-iw : aql-iyi ad aliɣ ɣer Baba yellan d Baba-twen , ɣer Yillu-yiw yellan d Illu-nwen .
43020018	Meryem tamagdalit tṛuḥ aț țessiweḍ lexbaṛ i inelmaden . Tenna yasen : ? riɣ Ssid-nneɣ , atah wayen i yi-d-yenna . . .
43020019	Ass n lḥedd tameddit , inelmaden llan deg yiwen wexxam ɣelqen tiwwura axaṭer uggaden at Isṛail . Ataya Sidna Ɛisa ibedd-ed gar-asen , yenna-yasen : Sslam fell-awen !
43020020	Akken i gsellem fell-asen isken asen-d ifassen-is akk-d yidis-is . Inelmaden feṛḥen aṭas imi walan Ssid-nsen .
43020021	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen daɣen : Sslam fell-awen . Akken i yi-d iceggeɛ Baba , nekk daɣen a kkun ceggɛeɣ .
43020022	Mi d-yenna annect-agi , isuḍ ɣef yinelmaden-is , yerna yenna-yasen : Stṛeḥbet s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
43020023	Wid iwumi ara tsemḥem ddnubat a sen țwasemḥen , ma d wid iwumi ur tețsemmiḥem ara ddnubat-nsen ad qqimen i yirawen-nsen .
43020024	? uma , iwumi qqaṛen Akniw , yellan d yiwen si tnac-nni , ur yelli ara yid-sen mi d-yusa Sidna Ɛisa .
43020025	Inelmaden nniḍen nnan-as : Neẓra Sidna Ɛisa ! Meɛna nețța yerra-yasen : Ma yella ur walaɣ ara ccwami n imesmaṛen deg ifassen-is , ma yella ur sriseɣ ara aḍad-iw anda ntan imesmaṛen , ma yella ur sriseɣ ara afus-iw ɣef yidis-is , ur țamneɣ ara .
43020026	Mi ɛeddan tmanya n wussan , inelmaden nnejmaɛen daɣen deg wexxam . Tikkelt-agi ? uma yella yid-sen . Ataya Sidna Ɛisa yekcem-ed ɣuṛ-sen ɣas akken ɣelqent tewwura . Ibedd gar-asen , yenna-yasen : Sslam fell-awen !
43020027	Sidna Ɛisa yenna i ? uma : Awi-d aḍad-ik atnan ifassen-iw , qeṛṛeb-ed afus-ik tserseḍ-t ɣef yidis-iw . Ur jehhel ara , amen !
43020028	? uma yerra-yas : A Ssid-iw ! Ay Illu-yiw !
43020029	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Armi i yi-twalaḍ i tumneḍ ! Amarezg n win ara yamnen mbla ma iwala .
43020030	Aṭas n lbeṛhanat i gexdem daɣen Sidna Ɛisa zdat inelmaden-is , ur d-temmeslay ara fell-asen tektabt-agi .
43020031	Lameɛna ayen akk i d-yețwajemɛen deg-s yura-d iwakken aț-țamnem belli d Ɛisa i d Lmasiḥ , d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi yerna ma tumnem yis aț-țesɛum tudert s yisem-is .
43021001	Syin akkin , Sidna Ɛisa isbeggen-ed iman-is daɣen i inelmaden-is ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ n Tiberyas . Atah wamek i tedṛa :
43021002	Semɛun Buṭrus , ? uma iwumi qqaṛen Akniw , Natanahil n taddart n Kana yellan di tmurt n Jlili , arraw n Zabadi akk-d sin inelmaden nniḍen ddukklen akken .
43021003	Semɛun Buṭrus yenna-yasen : Ad ṛuḥeɣ a d-ṣeggḍeɣ iselman . Nutni nnan-as : Ula d nukkni a neddu yid-ek . Dɣa ṛuḥen rekben taflukt , ṣeggden iḍ kamel ur d-ṭṭifen ula d yiwen uḥewtiw .
43021004	Akken yebda yețțali wass , ataya Sidna Ɛisa ibedd-ed ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ ; inelmaden ur t-eɛqilen ara d nețța .
43021005	Sidna Ɛisa yessawel-asen : Ay arrac , teṭṭfem-d kra n lḥut neɣ ala ? Nutni rran-as : Ur d-neṭṭif ula d yiwen !
43021006	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : ? eggṛet acebbak ɣer tama tayeffust n teflukt a d-teṭṭfem . Deggṛen acebbak ɣer wanda i sen-d-yenna , mi t-id-ssulin yeččuṛ ed d lḥut armi ur zmiren ara a t-id refden .
43021007	Anelmad-nni i gḥemmel Sidna Ɛisa , yenna i Buṭrus : D Sidna Ɛisa ! ɣ Mi gesla belli d Sidna Ɛisa , Semɛun Buṭrus yekksen aqenduṛ-is mi gella yețṣeggid , yelsa-t , dɣa iḍeggeṛ iman-is ɣer waman .
43021008	Inelmaden nniḍen uɣalen-d s teflukt ɣer rrif , zzuɣṛen-d yid-sen acebbak nni yeččuṛen d iselman . Llan beɛden ɣef rrif azal n meyya n lmitrat .
43021009	Mi d-rsen ɣer lqaɛa , ufan-d aɣṛum akk-d lḥut s ufella n yirrij n tmes .
43021010	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Awit-ed kra n iselman seg wid i d-teṭṭfem .
43021011	Semɛun Buṭrus yuli ɣer teflukt , ijebd-ed acebbak-nni , yeẓẓuɣer-it-id ɣer lqaɛa . Ufan deg-s meyya utlata uxemsin iselman imeqqranen ; ɣas akken yeččuṛ ucebbak-nni ur iqqeṛs ara .
43021012	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Qeṛṛbet-ed aț-țeččem . Ula d yiwen seg inelmaden-nni ur yezmir a s-yini « anwa-k ? » ? ran akk belli d Sidna Ɛisa .
43021013	Sidna Ɛisa iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-sen , ifṛeq-asen aɣṛum-nni d iselman-nni .
43021014	? - țikkelt tis tlata i d-yesken iman-is Sidna Ɛisa i inelmaden-is seg wasmi i d-yeḥya si lmut . Sidna Ɛisa akk-d Buṭrus
43021015	Mi kfan učči , Sidna Ɛisa yenna i Semɛun Buṭrus : A Semɛun mmi-s n Yunes , tḥemmleḍ-iyi akteṛ n wigi ? Semɛun Buṭrus yenna-yas : Ih a Sidi , teẓriḍ ḥemmleɣ-k . Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : ? ḥadar izamaren-iw .
43021016	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas tikkelt tis snat : A Semɛun mmi-s n Yunes , tḥemmleḍ-iyi ? Yerra-yas : Ih teẓriḍ ḥemmleɣ-k a Sidi ! Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Kess ulli-inu .
43021017	Sidna Ɛisa yesteqsa-t tikkelt tis tlata , yenna-yas : A Semɛun mmi-s n Yunes , tḥemmleḍ-iyi ? Semɛun Buṭrus iɣaḍ-it lḥal , axaṭer ț-țikkelt tis tlata i t-id-yesteqsa : « Ma tḥemmleḍ-iyi ? » . Dɣa yenna-yas : A Sidi , teẓriḍ kullec , teẓriḍ belli ḥemmleɣ-k ! Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : ? ḥadar ulli-inu .
43021018	Qqaṛeɣ-ak s tideț : asmi me ? ? iyeḍ , tețbeggiseḍ i yiman-ik weḥd-ek , tețṛuḥuḍ anda tebɣiḍ . Lameɛna asm'ara tuɣaleḍ d amɣaṛ , aț-țḍelqeḍ iɣallen-ik i wayeḍ akken a k-yebges yerna a k yawi ɣer wanda ur tebɣiḍ ara aț-țṛuḥeḍ .
43021019	S imeslayen-agi , issemɛen-ed amek ara yemmet Semɛun Buṭrus ɣef ddemma n tmanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi . Mi d-yenna ayagi , yenna-yas daɣen : Ddu-d yid-i !
43021020	Buṭrus yezzi ɣer deffir , iwala anelmad-nni i gḥemmel Sidna Ɛisa iteddu-d deffir-nsen . Anelmad-agi d win akken i geknan ɣer Sidna Ɛisa asmi llan tețțen imensi , i s yennan : « A Sidi , anwa ara k ixedɛen ? »
43021021	Mi t-iwala , Buṭrus yesteqsa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : I nețța a Sidi , d acu ara yedṛun yid-es ?
43021022	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ma bɣiɣ ad yidir alamma d asm'ara d-uɣaleɣ , d acu i k yecqan ? Kečč tbeɛ-iyi-d !
43021023	? ef wannect-agi i geffeɣ lexbaṛ ger watmaten , qqaṛen : « Anelmad-agi ur yețmețțat ara » . S tideț , Sidna Ɛisa ur d-yenni ara belli anelmad-agi ur yețmețțat ara lameɛna yenna-d kan : « Ma bɣiɣ ad yidir alamma asm'ara d uɣaleɣ , d acu i k yecqan ? »
43021024	D anelmad-agi i d-ixebbṛen ɣef wannect-agi yerna yura-t-id . Neẓra belli cchada-ines tṣeḥḥa .
43021025	Sidna Ɛisa yexdem daɣen aṭas n lecɣal nniḍen . Lemmer a ten-id neḥku yiwen yiwen , ur cukkeɣ ara ddunit meṛṛa aț-țawi tiktabin ara naru .
44001001	A Tawfilus , di tektabt-inu tamezwarut , ḥkiɣ-ed ayen ixdem Sidna Ɛisa d wayen yesselmed seg wass amezwaru armi d ass i deg yețwarfed ɣer igenni .
44001002	Uqbel ad ițwarfed , yefka lumuṛat-is s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i wid i gextaṛ ad ilin d ṛṛusul .
44001003	Mi d-iḥya si ger lmegtin , i nutni daɣen iwumi i d-isban iman-is belli yedder ; ṛebɛin wussan nețța ițban asen-d yerna ițmeslay-asen-d ɣef wayen yeɛnan tagelda n Sidi Ṛebbi .
44001004	Yiwen wass , mi gella itețț yid-sen , yefka-yasen lameṛ-agi : Ur țeffɣet ara si temdint n Lquds , lameɛna eṛǧut lemɛahda n Baba Ṛebbi , tin akken i wen-d nniɣ ;
44001005	« Yeḥya isseɣḍas imdanen deg aman , ma d kunwi , di kra n wussan aț-țețwaɣeḍsem s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen . »
44001006	Mi llan ṛṛusul nnejmaɛen yid-es , steqsan-t : A Sidi , deg ussan-agi ara d terreḍ tageldit i wegdud n wat Isṛail ?
44001007	Yerra-yasen : Ur țnadit ara aț-țeẓrem ayen yeɛnan lewqat d wussan i ghegga Baba Ṛebbi s lḥekma-ines si zik , ayagi mačči d ccɣel-nwen .
44001008	Kunwi a wen-d-tețțune tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ara d-yersen fell-awen , imiren aț-țilim d inigan-iw di temdint n Lquds , di tmurt n Yahuda ț-țmurt n Samarya , aț-țawḍem alamma d ixfawen n ddunit .
44001009	Akken i d-yenna imeslayen-agi , Sidna Ɛisa yețwarfed ɣer igenni nutni țmuqulen deg-s armi i t-tɣumm tagut .
44001010	Mazal ṛeṣṣan allen-nsen deg-s ɣer tegnaw , mi sen-d-dehṛen sin yergazen s llebsa tamellalt , nnan-asen :
44001011	Ay imezdaɣ n tmurt n Jlili , acuɣeṛ mazal-ikkun tețmuqqulem ɣer tegnaw ? Akken i twalam Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer igenni , akken daɣen ara t-twalim asmi ara d-yuɣal .
44001012	Seg iɣil uzemmur , uɣalen ɣer temdint n Lquds ibeɛden azal n tikli n wass n westeɛfu .
44001013	Mi wwḍen ɣer temdint n Lquds , ulin ɣer texxamt anda nnumen țnejmaɛen . Yella gar-asen Buṭrus , Yuḥenna , Yeɛqub , Andriyus , Filibas , Suma , Bartelmay , Matta , Yeɛqub mmi-s n Ḥalfi , Semɛun awaṭani akk-d Yahuda mmi-s n Yeɛqub .
44001014	Țnejmaɛen s yiwen n ṛṛay iwakken ad deɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi nutni d kra n tlawin , llan yid-sen daɣen watmaten n Sidna Ɛisa akk-d yemma-s , Meryem .
44001015	Deg ussan-nni , llan nnejmaɛen azal n meyya uɛecrin n wayetmaten , yekker-ed Buṭrus gar-asen , yenna-d :
44001016	Ay atmaten , ilaq a d-yedṛu wayen i d-yenna Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen si zik seg yimi n Sidna Dawed , ɣef wayen yeɛnan Yudas i d-yezwaren zdat n wid i geṭṭfen Sidna Ɛisa .
44001017	Yudas-agi yella d yiwen seg neɣ , yerna ițekki di leqdic-nneɣ ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi .
44001018	Argaz-agi yuɣ akal s yedrimen-nni n lexdeɛ , yuɣal yeɣli ɣef wudem , ifelleq uɛebbuḍ-is , mmaren-d akk ijuɣdan-is .
44001019	Imezdaɣ n temdint n Lquds slan akk s wannect-agi , daymi i semman i wemkan-nni s tmeslayt-nsen : Ḥaqel damma , yeɛni iger n idammen .
44001020	Am akken yura di tektabt n Sabur : Axxam-is ad yexlu , ur t-izeddeɣ yiwen . Yura daɣen : Wayeḍ ad yeṭṭef amkan-is .
44001021	Ilaq-aɣ ihi a d-nextiṛ yiwen seg wid yellan yid-nneɣ mi nțeddu d Sidna Ɛisa di mkul amkan ,
44001022	seg wasmi i t-isseɣḍes Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas armi d ass i deg yețwarfed ɣer igenni ; iwakken ad yili am nukkni d inigi n ḥeggu-ines .
44001023	Sbedden-d sin yergazen : Yusef yețțusemman Barsaba iwumi qqaṛen daɣen « Aḥeqqi » akk-d Matyas .
44001024	Dɛan ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s imeslayen agi : A Sidi Ṛebbi , kečč yesnen ulawen n yemdanen meṛṛa , sbeggen aɣ-ed anwa deg-sen i gwulmen
44001025	iwakken ad iṭṭef amkan di lecɣal n ṛṛusul i ɣef yeṭṭaxeṛ Yudas , imi nețța iṛuḥ ɣer wemkan i s-ilaqen .
44001026	Gren tasɣaṛt , tṣaḥ-ed i Matyas ; dɣa rnan-t-id ɣer ḥdac-nni n ṛṛusul .
44002001	Ass n Lɛid n wass wis xemsin , inelmaden llan nnejmaɛen akk deg yiwen n wemkan .
44002002	Taswiɛt kan , yekka-d yiwen n lḥess ameqqran seg igenni am waḍu iǧehden , yeččuṛ akk axxam-nni anda qqimen .
44002003	Sehṛen-asen-d am akken d ilsawen n tmes ițemfaṛaqen wway gar-asen , rsen-d ɣef yal yiwen deg sen .
44002004	Sčuṛen akk s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , bdan țmeslayen s tutlayin nniḍen , yal yiwen seg-sen iheddeṛ s tutlayt i s-d-yefka Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
44002005	Deg ussan-nni , di temdint n Lquds , llan yemdanen n wat Isṛail yețḍuɛun Sidi Ṛebbi , i d-yusan si mkul tamurt n ddunit .
44002006	Mi slan i lḥess-nni , lɣaci uzzlen d meṛṛa ; dehcen , axaṭer sellen-asen țmeslayen-d s tutlayt n tmurt i deg țɛicin .
44002007	Wehmen , țɛeǧben , qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Imdanen-agi yețmeslayen mačči n tmurt n Jlili ?
44002008	Amek armi yal yiwen deg-nneɣ isell-asen țmeslayen s tmeslayt-is ?
44002009	Llan gar-aneɣ yemdanen i d yusan si tmurt n Bartas , si tmurt n Midyas , si tmurt n Ilam , kra nniḍen si tmurt n Mizubuṭamya , si tmurt n Yahuda akk-d tmurt n Kafadusya , wiyaḍ si tmurt n Tqenṭert , si tmurt n Asya ,
44002010	si tmurt n Frijya akk-d Bamfilya . Usan-d daɣen si tmurt n Maṣer , si leǧwahi n Qiṛwan di tmurt n Libya , widak i d-yusan si temdint n Ṛuma ;
44002011	llan daɣen wat Isṛail akk-d wid itabaɛen di ddin nsen , llan wid n tegzirt n Kritus akk-d waɛṛaben . Amek armi i sen-nesla țmeslayen s tutlayin-nneɣ meṛṛa ɣef leɛǧayeb n Sidi Ṛebbi ?
44002012	Dehcen akk , ur ẓrin d acu ara xemmemen , qqaṛen wway gar-asen : D acu-t wayagi ?
44002013	Ma d wiyaḍ stehzayen fell-asen qqaṛen : D askaṛ i sekkṛen !
44002014	Buṭrus yellan akk-d ḥdac n ṛṛusul-nni , issaɛli taɣect-is yenna i lɣaci : Ay imezdaɣ n temdint n Lquds akk-d kunwi meṛṛa isɛeddayen ussan di temdint-agi , slet-ed mliḥ i wayen ara wen-d-iniɣ , ilaq aț-țeẓrem ayagi :
44002015	irgazen-agi ur skiṛen ara am akken i ɣilen kra seg-wen , axaṭer ațan d țesɛa n ṣṣbeḥ kan !
44002016	Lameɛna ayagi yedṛan d ayen i d-icar nnbi Yuwil :
44002017	Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d : Deg ussan ineggura a d-sserseɣ Ṛṛuḥ-iw ɣef yemdanen meṛṛa ; arrac-nwen d yessi-twen a d-țcirin ayen ara sen-d-țxebbiṛeɣ , ilmeẓyen-nwen a sen-d-țweḥḥiɣ , imɣaṛen-nwen a sen-d-mmeslayeɣ di tirga .
44002018	Anɛam , deg ussan-nni a d-smireɣ Ṛṛuḥ-iw ɣef yiqeddacen-iw ț-țqeddacin-iw , a d-ciren s wayen ara sen-d-țxebbiṛeɣ .
44002019	Deg igenni ad xedmeɣ leɛǧayeb , di lqaɛa a d-sekneɣ licaṛat yessewhamen : idammen , times d usigna n ddexxan .
44002020	Iṭij ad yuɣal d ṭṭlam , aggur ad yuɣal am idammen uqbel a d-yas wass n Sidi Ṛebbi ; ass-nni d ass ameqqran , yeččuṛen d lɛaḍima .
44002021	Imiren kra n win ineddhen s yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi ad ițțusellek .
44002022	Ay imdanen n wat Isṛail , ḥesset-ed mliḥ i wayen ara wen-d iniɣ : ɣef wayen yeɛnan Ɛisa anaṣari , teẓram akk belli Sidi Ṛebbi isbeggen ed tazmert-is mi gexdem zdat-wen lbeṛhanat , licaṛat d leɛǧubat , am akken i teẓram s yiman-nwen .
44002023	Akken yella si zik di leqsed n Sidi Ṛebbi ; argaz-agi tezzenzem-t , d kunwi i t-yenɣan mi t-tsellmem ger ifassen n ikafriwen i t-isemmṛen ɣef lluḥ .
44002024	Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yesseḥya t-id , isellek-it-id si tesra n lmut axaṭer d lmuḥal a t-teṭṭef ɣuṛ-es .
44002025	Sidna Dawed yenna-d fell-as : Țwaliɣ kull ass Sidi Ṛebbi zdat-i axaṭer yețțili ɣer uyeffus-iw iwakken ur ɣelliɣ ara ;
44002026	daymi i gefṛeḥ wul-iw , i tcennu taɣect-iw ; ula d iɣsan-iw ad ṛtiḥen di laman ;
44002027	axaṭer ur iyi-tețțaǧǧaḍ ara di laxeṛt , ur tețțaǧaḍ ara win i k-iḍuɛen ad yerku deg uẓekka .
44002028	Teldiḍ-iyi iberdan n tudert ; ul-iw yeččuṛ d lfeṛḥ imi tețțiliḍ yid-i .
44002029	Ay atmaten ilaq-iyi a wen d-mmeslayeɣ ɛinani ɣef tideț yeɛnan jeddi-tneɣ Sidna Dawed . Teẓram belli yemmut , yețwamḍel , yerna aẓekka ines mazal-it ar ass-a gar-aneɣ .
44002030	Lameɛna imi d nnbi i gella , yeẓra belli Sidi Ṛebbi ad iṭṭef di lemɛahda i s-d-yefka mi s-d-yenna : D yiwen si tarwa-k ara sbeddeɣ d agellid deg wemkan-ik .
44002031	Ɣef ḥeggu n Lmasiḥ i d-icar mi d-yenna lehduṛ-agi ; axaṭer ț-țideț , ur t-yeǧǧi di laxeṛt , ur t-yeǧǧi ad yerku .
44002032	Win ɣef i wen-d-țmeslayeɣ , d Ɛisa-agi i d-isseḥya Sidi Ṛebbi si ger lmegtin , aql-aɣ akk d inagan .
44002033	Mi gețwarfed ɣer uyeffus n Sidi Ṛebbi , yețțunefk-as Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i s-yewɛed Baba Ṛebbi , nețța ismar-it-id fell-aɣ ; d ayen i teslam , i twalam .
44002034	Mačči d Sidna Dawed i gulin ɣer igenni , axaṭer d nețța i d-yennan : Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d i Ssid-iw :
44002035	Sṭef amkan n lḥekma ɣer uyeffus-iw alamma rriɣ iɛdawen-ik seddaw idaṛṛen-ik .
44002036	Ilaq ihi at Isṛail meṛṛa ad ẓren s tideț belli Ɛisa-nni i tsemmṛem ɣef lluḥ , d nețța i gerra Sidi Ṛebbi d Agellid ameqqran , d Lmasiḥ .
44002037	Mi slan i wayen i d-yenna Buṭrus , lɣaci meṛṛa saxen wulawen-nsen , nnan i Buṭrus d ṛṛusul nniḍen : Ay atmaten , d acu ara nexdem ?
44002038	Buṭrus yerra-yasen : Tubet , beddlet tikli ! Mkul yiwen deg-wen ad yețwaɣḍes s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ iwakken a wen-țwasemmḥen ddnubat-nwen , yerna a wen-d yețțune Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
44002039	Axaṭer lweɛd-agi n Sidi Ṛebbi , yețțunefk-ed i kunwi d warraw-nwen akk-d wid meṛṛa n leǧnas nniḍen iwumi ara d-issiwel Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ .
44002040	Buṭrus inehhu-ten s waṭas n yimeslayen nniḍen , iwakken ad amnen , yeqqaṛ-asen : Xḍut i lǧil-agi iɛewjen iwakken aț-țețțusellkem !
44002041	Wid iqeblen ayen i d-yenna Buṭrus , qeblen ad țwaɣedṣen . Ass-nni rnan-d wazal n tlata alaf n yemdanen i gumnen .
44002042	Seg imiren , zgan țnejmaɛen am atmaten iwakken ad slen i wselmed n ṛṛusul ; beṭṭun aɣṛum n usmekti n Lmasiḥ , yerna deɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s yiwen n wul .
44002043	Tɛeǧǧben , tekcem-iten akk tugdi mi țwalin ṛṛusul xeddmen aṭas n lbeṛhanat d leɛǧayeb .
44002044	Wid akk yumnen , țɛicin s tdukli yerna beṭṭun wway gar-asen ayen akk sɛan .
44002045	Znuzun ayla-nsen meṛṛa , ayen akken i d-jemɛen , feṛqen-t wway gar-asen mkul yiwen ɣef leḥsab n wakken yeḥwaǧ .
44002046	Kull ass , s yiwen ṛṛay , țnejmaɛen di lǧameɛ iqedsen , țnejmaɛen daɣen deg ixxamen-nsen , beṭṭun aɣṛum iwakken ad mektin Lmasiḥ , tețțen lqut-nsen s nneya d lfeṛḥ ;
44002047	țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi , imdanen meṛṛa țqadaṛen-ten ; Sidi Ṛebbi irennu-d kull ass ɣer tejmaɛt-nsen wid ițțusellken .
44003001	Aț-țili d leǧwahi n tlata n tmeddit , Buṭrus d Yuḥenna ddukklen , ulin ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen iwakken ad dɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
44003002	Țțawin-d mkul ass yiwen n wergaz i d-ilulen d aquḍar ɣer zdat n tewwurt n lǧameɛ , tin iwumi qqaṛen « tawwurt tucbiḥt » ; yețɣimi dinna iwakken ad issuter tin n Ṛebbi i wid i gkeččmen ɣer lǧameɛ-nni .
44003003	Mi gwala Buṭrus d Yuḥenna țeddun ad kecmen , issuter-asen tin n Ṛebbi .
44003004	Buṭrus d Yuḥenna , ṛeṣṣan allen-nsen fell-as , nnan-as : Muqel-ed ɣuṛ-nneɣ !
44003005	Argaz-nni imuqel-iten , iḍmeɛ deg-sen a s-d-fken kra .
44003006	Dɣa Buṭrus yenna-yas : Ur sɛiɣ idrimen n lfeṭṭa , ur sɛiɣ wid n ddheb , lameɛna ayen sɛiɣ a k-t-fkeɣ : s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ anaṣari , ekker telḥuḍ !
44003007	Iṭṭef-it-id seg ufus ayeffus , issekker-it-id . Imiren kan iḍaṛṛen-is ț-țkeɛburin n idaṛṛen-is ḥlan .
44003008	Ibedd ɣef yidaṛṛen-is , ineggez , yebda ileḥḥu . Ikcem yid-sen ɣer lǧameɛ , ileḥḥu ițjellib , ițḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi .
44003009	Lɣaci akk walan-t mi gleḥḥu ițḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi .
44003010	Mi t-ɛeqlen qqaṛen : Mačči d win akken yețɣimin ɣer tewwurt tucbiḥt n lǧameɛ iqedsen win akken issuturen tin n Ṛebbi ? Dehcen meṛṛa , wehmen deg wayen yedṛan yid-es .
44003011	Argaz-nni iteddu d Buṭrus akk-d Yuḥenna , ur yeṭṭixiṛ ara fell-asen , lɣaci-nni meṛṛa wehmen , uzzlen-d ɣuṛ-sen ɣer usqif iwumi qqaṛen « Asqif n Sidna Sliman » .
44003012	Buṭrus mi gwala ayagi , yenṭeq ɣer lɣaci yenna : Ay at Isṛail , acuɣeṛ akka twehmem deg wayen yedṛan ? Acuɣeṛ i d-țmuqulem ɣuṛ-nneɣ , am akken d nukkni i gesselḥan argaz-agi s tezmert-nneɣ neɣ s ṭṭaɛa-nneɣ ?
44003013	D Sidi Ṛebbi Illu n Sidna Ibṛahim , n Isḥaq d Yeɛqub , Ṛebbi n lejdud-nneɣ , d nețța i d-isbeggnen lɛaḍima n Sidna Ɛisa aqeddac-is , win akken i tnekṛem , i tsellmem i lḥakem Bilaṭus i gebɣan a s-d-iserreḥ .
44003014	Kunwi tnekṛem win akken yellan d azedgan , d aḥeqqi ; tessutrem a d-serrḥen i bu tmegṛaḍ deg umkan-is .
44003015	Tenɣam Mmi-s n ugellid n tudert , meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yesseḥya-t-id si ger lmegtin , aql-aɣ d inigan .
44003016	Ț-țazmert yellan deg isem n Sidna Ɛisa i d-yerran lǧehd i wergaz agi i tețwalim , yerna tessnem-t . D Sidna Ɛisa s wayes numen i t-isseḥlan zdat-wen meṛṛa .
44003017	Ay atmaten , ẓriɣ s lqella n lefhama i txedmem annect-nni , am kunwi am imeqranen-nwen .
44003018	Meɛna s wakka i gesnekmal Sidi Ṛebbi ayen i d-yenna si zik seg imawen n lenbiya meṛṛa : yenna-d belli Lmasiḥ-ines ad inɛețțab .
44003019	Ndemmet ihi , beddlet tikli iwakken ad mḥun ddnubat-nwen ,
44003020	iwakken a kkun-id-asen wussan n ṛṛaḥa s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , a wen-d iceggeɛ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , win akken i wen-ihegga .
44003021	Tura atan deg igenni alamma yusa-d lweqt i deg ara tuɣal txelqit meṛṛa ț-țajḍiṭ , akken i t-id-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi si zik seg imawen n lenbiya .
44003022	Sidna Musa yenna i wat Isṛail : Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nwen a wen-d iceggeɛ si ger watmaten-nwen , + yiwen n nnbi am nekk , a s-tḥessem deg wayen akk ara wen-d-yini .
44003023	Kra n win ur nețḥessis ara i nnbi-yagi , ad yețwakkes si ddunit ger watmaten-is .
44003024	Lenbiya meṛṛa , si zzman n nnbi Samwil d wid meṛṛa i d-yernan deffir-es , caren-d daɣen ɣef wussan agi i deg nețɛici .
44003025	D kunwi i d arraw n lenbiya , i d arraw n leɛqed-nni i gexdem Sidi Ṛebbi d lejdud-nneɣ , mi s-yenna i Sidna Ibṛahim : S dderya n dderya-k ara barkeɣ tiwaculin meṛṛa n ddunit + .
44003026	I kunwi d imezwura iwumi i d iceggeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi aqeddac-is , isseḥya t-id iwakken a kkun-ibarek yerna a d-issebɛed mkul yiwen deg-wen seg yir n lecɣal-is .
44004001	Buṭrus d Yuḥenna mazal-iten heddṛen i lɣaci mi d-wwḍen kra n lmuqedmin , yedda-d yid-sen umeqqran n iɛessasen n lǧameɛ iqedsen akk-d kra n yergazen si tejmaɛt n isaduqiyen
44004002	Zeɛfen mi walan ṛṛusul sselmaden lɣaci yerna ssefhamen-ten ɣef ḥeggu n lmegtin qqaṛen-asen : — Akken i d-yeḥya Sidna Ɛisa si ger lmegtin , akken daɣen ara d-ḥyun lmegtin .
44004003	Sṭfen-ten , rran-ten ɣer lḥebs armi d azekka-nni axaṭer imiren yeɣli-d yiḍ .
44004004	Lameɛna aṭas seg wid yeslan i wawal , umnen . Ad ilin azal n xemsa alaf n yemdanen i gumnen .
44004005	Azekka-nni , lḥukkam , lecyux akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa yellan di temdint n Lquds , nnejmaɛen .
44004006	Yella lmuqeddem ameqqran ițusemman Hannan akk-d wid i s-yețțilin , ḥedṛen daɣen : Kayef , Yuḥenna d Alixandru .
44004007	Wwin-d Buṭrus d Yuḥenna , sbedden-ten di tlemmast-nsen akken a ten-beḥten , qqaṛen-asen : Ansi i wen-d-tekka tezmert-agi , anwa isem s wayes i tneddhem armi txedmem ayagi ?
44004008	Dɣa Buṭrus yeččuṛen d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , yenna-yasen :
44004009	A lḥukkam d lecyux n wat Isṛail ! Imi ɣef lxiṛ i nexdem i wergaz-agi aɛiban d wamek i geḥla i ɣ-d-testeqsayem ass-agi ,
44004010	ilaq aț-țeẓrem kunwi d wat Isṛail meṛṛa , belli s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa anaṣari , win akken i tsemmṛem ɣef wumidag , win akken i d-yesseḥya Sidi Ṛebbi si ger lmegtin , s tezmert-is i gbedd wergaz agi tura zdat-wen yeḥla .
44004011	D nețța i ɣef d-nnant tira iqedsen : D azṛu-nni i tḍeggṛem kunwi ay ibennayen , i guɣalen d azṛu i geṭṭfen lebni .
44004012	Deg-s i gella leslak ; ulac di ddunit meṛṛa isem nniḍen s wayes i nezmer a nețțusellek .
44004013	Mi walan belli Buṭrus d Yuḥenna heddṛen s laman mbla akukru , wehmen axaṭer ẓran d imdanen ur neɣṛi ara ; ɛeqlen-ten seg wid yeddan d Sidna Ɛisa .
44004014	Lameɛna imi walan argaz-nni yeḥlan ibedd zdat-sen , ur ufin d acu ara d-inin .
44004015	Umṛen-ten ad ffɣen seg unejmaɛ n ccṛeɛ iwakken ad mcawaṛen wway gar-asen ,
44004016	nnan : D acu ara nexdem s yemdanen agi ? Imezdaɣ n temdint n Lquds akk wwin-d s lexbaṛ belli xedmen lbeṛhan yerna ț-țideț ur nezmir ara a nenkeṛ ayagi .
44004017	Lameɛna iwakken lexbaṛ-agi ur iteffeɣ ara ger lɣaci , a neggal deg-sen ur țțuɣalen ara ad mmeslayen ula i yiwen s yisem-agi .
44004018	Uɣalen ssawlen-asen , gullen deg-sen iwakken ur țțuɣalen ara ad mmeslayen neɣ ad slemden s yisem-agi n Ɛisa .
44004019	Lameɛna Buṭrus d Yuḥenna nnan-asen : D acu i d lḥeqq zdat Ṛebbi , a wen-naɣ awal i kunwi neɣ a naɣ awal i Sidi Ṛebbi ?
44004020	Walit s yiman nwen ! Nukni ur nezmir ara a nessusem ɣef wayen neẓra d wayen nesla .
44004021	Rnan gullen deg-sen , lameɛna serrḥen-asen imi ur d-ufin ara sebba s wayes ara ten-ɛaqben , yerna lɣaci akk țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wayen yedṛan ,
44004022	axaṭer argaz-agi i geḥlan s lbeṛhan di leɛmeṛ-is akteṛ n ṛebɛin iseggasen .
44004023	Mi sen-serrḥen , ṛuḥen ɣer watmaten , ḥkan-asen akk ayen i sen-d-nnan lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lecyux .
44004024	Mi slan watmaten-nni i wayen i d-yenna Buṭrus , akken ma llan serrḥen i taɣect-nsen , nedhen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi nnan : A Sidi Ṛebbi , kečč i gxelqen igenni , lqaɛa , lebḥeṛ d wayen akk yellan .
44004025	D kečč i d-ineṭqen s Ṛṛuḥ-ik iqedsen seg yimi n jeddi-tneɣ Dawed aqeddac-ik , mi d-yenna : Acuɣeṛ ccwal-agi ger leǧnas , acuɣeṛ igduden ggaren-d anagar yir ixemmimen ?
44004026	Igelliden n ddunit heggan iman nsen , imeqqranen ddukklen akk , ffɣen-d d iɛdawen n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Lmasiḥ-ines .
44004027	Axaṭer ț-țideț , di temdint-agi , Hiṛudus d Bilaṭus mcawaṛen , ddukklen nutni d ibeṛṛaniyen akk-d wat Isṛail , uɣalen d iɛdawen n Sidna Ɛisa imqeddes i textaṛeḍ d Lmasiḥ .
44004028	Ayen akka xedmen , d ayen akken i tqesdeḍ keččini di lebɣi-inek , s tezmert-ik , si zik .
44004029	I tura , a Sidi Ṛebbi , wali-d amek akka i ɣ ssaggaden ; efk-aɣ-d a Sidi Ṛebbi tazmert s wayes ara nbecceṛ awal-ik s ṭṭmana mbla akukru .
44004030	Ssers-ed afus-ik iwakken ad ḥlun imuḍan , iwakken a d-ilint licaṛat d lbeṛhanat s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa aqeddac-ik imqeddes .
44004031	Mi fukken taẓallit , amkan-nni anda nnejmaɛen yergagi ; ččuṛen akk s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , bdan țbecciṛen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi s ṭṭmana mbla tugdi .
44004032	Wid akk yumnen s Lmasiḥ , ddukklen akk s yiwen n wul , s yiwen n ṛṛuḥ , ula d yiwen deg-sen ur yeḥsib ayen yesɛa d ayla-s i yiman-is kan , meɛna cerken kullec wway gar-asen .
44004033	Ṛṛusul țcehhiden-d ɣef ḥeggu n Sidna Ɛisa s tezmert tameqqrant yerna ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi txeddem deg-sen s lǧehd .
44004034	Ulac gar-asen win ixuṣṣen ; wid akk yesɛan igran neɣ ixxamen zzenzen-ten ,
44004035	idrimen-nni i d-țțawin deg-sen , țțawin-ten ɣer ifassen n ṛṛusul i ten-ifeṛṛqen i mkul yiwen ɣef leḥsab n wakken yeḥwaǧ .
44004036	Yusef illan n at Lewwi iwumi semman ṛṛusul Barnabas , ( yeɛni argaz inehhun ) i glulen di tegzirt n Qubṛus ,
44004037	yesɛa yiwen n yiger , izzenz-it , yewwi-d idrimen-nni , yefka-ten i ṛṛusul .
44005001	Yiwen wergaz isem-is Ananyas , nețța ț-țmeṭṭut-is Safira zzenzen yiwen n weḥric seg wakal-nsen ; msefhamen ad kksen yiwen n umur si ssuma n lbiɛ-nni ;
44005002	amur nniḍen yewwi-t-id ɣer ifassen n ṛṛusul .
44005003	Buṭrus inṭeq ɣuṛ-es yenna : Ay Ananyas , acuɣeṛ i teǧǧiḍ Cciṭan yeččuṛ ul-ik ? Acuɣeṛ i teskadbeḍ i Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen mi tekkseḍ yiwen umur n yedrimen n wakal i tezzenzeḍ ? Uqbel a t-tezzenzeḍ , akal-nni yella d ayla-k !
44005004	Mi t-tezzenzeḍ , idrimen-nni daɣen d ayla-k ! Amek armi i teṣṣawḍed aț-țxeḍmeḍ yiwet lḥaǧa am tagi ? Ihi mačči i yemdanen iwumi teskadbeḍ , lameɛna i Sidi Ṛebbi !
44005005	Mi gesla i yimeslayen-nni , Ananyas yeɣli , yeffeɣ-it ṛṛuḥ , yemmut . Wid akk yellan dinna , ikcem-iten akk lxuf , țergigin .
44005006	Kkren ilmeẓyen kefnen-t , wwin-t a t-meḍlen .
44005007	Ɛeddant wazal n tlata sswayeɛ , mi d-tekcem tmeṭṭut n Ananyas , nețțat ur tesli ara s wayen yedṛan .
44005008	Buṭrus yenṭeq ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : Ini-yi-d , ma s ssuma-yagi i tezzenzem akal-nwen ? Terra-yas-d : Ih , s ssuma-yagi i t-nezzenz .
44005009	Dɣa Buṭrus yenna-yas : Amek armi i temsefhamem iwakken aț-țjeṛṛbem Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi ? Wid imeḍlen argaz-im atnan ɣer tewwurt , a kkem-awin ula d kemm !
44005010	Imiren kan teɣli ɣer idaṛṛen-is yeffeɣ-iț ṛṛuḥ , temmut . Ilmeẓyen-nni mi d-kecmen ufan-ț-id temmut , wwin-ț meḍlen-ț ɣer tama n wergaz-is .
44005011	Yeɣli-d ṛṛɛac ( lxuf ) d ameqqran ɣef tejmaɛt n watmaten d wid akk yeslan s wayen yedṛan .
44005012	Aṭas n lbeṛhanat d lmuɛǧizat i xeddmen ṛṛusul ger lɣaci . Wid yumnen țnejmaɛen akk s yiwen ṛṛay deg wesqif n Sidna Sliman .
44005013	Lɣaci meṛṛa țcekkiṛen-ten meɛna kukran akk a d-rnun ɣuṛ-sen .
44005014	Leḥsab n yergazen ț-țilawin yumnen s Sidna Ɛisa yețzad irennu .
44005015	Țțawin-d imuḍan ɣer iberdan , srusun-ten ɣef tgertyal iwakken m'ara d-iɛeddi Buṭrus , ad innal yiwen seg-sen ulamma s tili-ines .
44005016	Lɣaci țțazzalen-d daɣen ula si temdinin nniḍen iqeṛben tamdint n Lquds ; țțawin-d imuḍan akk-d wid yețwazedɣen , ḥellun akken ma llan .
44005017	Ɣef ddemma n wayen ideṛṛun kkrent-asen-d tismin i lmuqeddem ameqqran akk-d isaduqiyen-nni yellan yid-es ,
44005018	ṭṭfen ṛṛusul , rran-ten ɣer lḥebs n baylek .
44005019	Lameɛna deg yiḍ-nni , yiwen lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi yeldi tiwwura n lḥebs , issufeɣ-iten-id , yenna-yasen :
44005020	Ṛuḥet beccṛet di lǧameɛ iqedsen , slemdet i lɣaci awal n tudert .
44005021	Mi slan i wayen i sen-d-yenna lmelk-nni , ṛuḥen ṣṣbeḥ zik ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen , bdan sselmaden . Ma d lmuqeddem ameqqran d wid akk yellan yid-es , snejmaɛen-d lecyux akk-d imeqqranen n wat Isṛail ɣer unejmaɛ n ccṛeɛ ; imiren ceggɛen a d-awin ṛṛusul-nni si lḥebs .
44005022	Mi wwḍen iɛessasen ɣer lḥebs , ur ten-ufin ara dinna ; uɣalen-d ɣer unejmaɛ , nnan-asen :
44005023	Nufa lḥebs isekkeṛ , iɛessasen bedden zdat n tewwurt , lameɛna mi nekcem , ur nufi ula d yiwen zdaxel .
44005024	Mi ten-yewweḍ lexbaṛ-agi , lqebṭan n lǧameɛ akk-d lmuqedmin imeqqranen ɛewqen ! Ur ẓrin ara ɣer wanda ara taweḍ temsalt-agi .
44005025	Iṛuḥ-ed ɣuṛ-sen yiwen yenna yasen : Irgazen-nni i terram ɣer lḥebs , atnan deg ufrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen yerna sselmaden lɣaci .
44005026	Lqebṭan n lǧameɛ d iɛessasen ṛuḥen wwin-ten-id lameɛna ḥudren ten axaṭer uggaden a ten-ṛejmen lɣaci .
44005027	Mi ten-id-wwin ɣer zdat usqamu n ccṛeɛ , lmuqeddem ameqqran isteqsa ten yenna-yasen :
44005028	Neggul deg-wen ur tețțuɣalem aț-țeslemdem s yisem-agi ; lameɛna kunwi tessufɣem aselmed nwen di temdint n Lquds meṛṛa ! Tura tebɣam a d-terrem ɣer yirawen nneɣ tamgeṛṭ n wergaz-agi !
44005029	Buṭrus d ṛṛusul nniḍen erran asen : Ilaq a naɣ awal i Sidi Ṛebbi , mačči i yemdanen !
44005030	Ṛebbi , Illu n lejdud-nneɣ yesseḥya-d Sidna Ɛisa , win akken i tenɣam , i tsemmṛem ɣef lluḥ .
44005031	D nețța i gessuli Sidi Ṛebbi ɣer uyeffus-is d Agellid , d Amsellek , iwakken a d-ye i wat Isṛail leɛfu n ddnubat m'ara beddlen tikli .
44005032	Aql-aɣ d inagan ɣef wayagi , nukkni akk-d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi i wid i t-iḍuɛen .
44005033	Mi sen-slan , ikcem-iten wurrif d ameqqran armi bɣan a ten-nɣen .
44005034	Meɛna Gamalyel , yiwen n lɛalem n ccariɛa yellan d afarizi , ḥemmlen-t akk lɣaci ; ikker-ed deg unejmaɛ-nni , yefka lameṛ ad ssufɣen ṛṛusul-nni kra n lweqt .
44005035	Dɣa yenṭeq yenna : Ay at Isṛail , ḥadret iman-nwen ɣef wayen akka tebɣam a t-txedmem i yemdanen-agi !
44005036	Mmektit-ed , mačči aṭas aya ikker-ed yiwen yețțuseman Tudas yerran iman-is d ameqqran . Azal n ṛebɛa meyya n yergazen i ddan yid-es ; asmi i t-nɣan , wid akk i geddan yid-es mfaṛaqen , ur d-yeqqim lateṛ-nsen .
44005037	Deffir Tudas , ikker-ed daɣen Yahuda ajlili di lweqt-nni n ujerred n wegdud ; aṭas daɣen n wid i geddan yid-es , meɛna ula d nețța mi gemmut , wid akk yeddan yid-es mfaṛaqen .
44005038	Ihi tura a wen-d-iniɣ : ur ceɣlet ara d yemdanen-agi , anfet-asen ad ṛuḥen . Ma yella aselmed-agi-nsen yekka-d s ɣuṛ-sen , ur yețdumu ara ;
44005039	ma yella s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i d-ikka , ur tețțizmirem ara a t-tekksem ! Ḥadret iman-nwen ihi , neɣ m'ulac aț-țuɣalem d iɛdawen n Sidi Ṛebbi !
44005040	Mi mcawaṛen , uɣen ṛṛay-is . Uɣalen skecmen ṛṛusul-nni , fkan lameṛ a ten-wwten s iɛekkzan , rnan gullen deg-sen ur țțuɣalen ara ad mmeslayen s yisem-agi n Ɛisa , dɣa serrḥen-asen .
44005041	Mi d-ffɣen ṛṛusul seg unejmaɛ n ccṛeɛ , feṛḥen imi țwaḥesben d wid yuklalen ad țewten , ad țwaregmen ɣef ddemma n yisem n Sidna Ɛisa .
