44005042	Dɣa kull ass sselmaden țbecciṛen di lǧameɛ iqedsen akk-d ixxamen , lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
44006001	Deg ussan-nni , leḥsab n widak yumnen s Sidna Ɛisa yețzid irennu . At Isṛail i d-yusan si tmura nniḍen , yețmeslayen s tyunanit , ccetkan ɣef wat Isṛail yellan di tmurt , axaṭer m'ara feṛqen lmakla , ur d-țelhayen ara ț-țuǧǧal-nsen .
44006002	Tnac ṛṛusul-nni snejmaɛen-d inelmaden meṛṛa , nnan-asen : Mačči d lḥeqq a neǧǧ Awal n Sidi Ṛebbi di rrif iwakken a nelhi d wefṛaq n lqut i mkul yiwen .
44006003	Ihi ay atmaten , xtiṛet-ed si gar-awen sebɛa yergazen i deg sɛan laman yemdanen n tmurt meṛṛa , yeččuṛen d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen akk-d leɛqel , d nutni ara nwekkel ɣef ccɣel-agi .
44006004	Ma d nukkni , lweqt-nneɣ a t-nesɛeddi di tẓallit akk-d uselmed n wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi .
44006005	Tajmaɛt akk iɛeǧǧeb-as ṛṛay-agi . Kkren xtaṛen-d Stifan yellan d argaz yeččuṛen d liman akk-d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen . Xtaṛen daɣen Filbas , Brukurus , Nikanur , Timun , Barmenas , akk-d Nikulus n temdint n Antyuc , i gkecmen si zik di ddin n wat Isṛail .
44006006	Wwin-ten-id , sbedden-ten zdat n ṛṛusul . Ṛṛusul ssersen ifassen-nsen fell-asen , dɛan-asen s lxiṛ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
44006007	Yuɣal , awal n Sidi Ṛebbi iffeɣ yețwassen , leḥsab n wid yumnen s Lmasiḥ yețzid irennu di temdint n Lquds yerna aṭas n lmuqedmin i gumnen , qeblen abrid n Lmasiḥ .
44006008	Stifan yeččuṛen d ṛṛeḥma ț-țezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi , ixeddem lbeṛhanat d leɛǧayeb timeqqranin ger lɣaci .
44006009	Kra n yemdanen n tejmaɛt n iḥeṛṛiyen i d-yusan si tmurt n Qiṛwan , si tmurt n Skandriya , si tmurt n Silisya akk-d wid i d-yusan si tmurt n Asya , usan-d ad mjadalen nutni d Stifan ;
44006010	lameɛna ur zmiren ara a t-ɣelben deg awal axaṭer ițmeslay s ṣṣwab d leɛqel i s-d-yefka Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
44006011	Imiren fkan tajɛelt i kra n yergazen iwakken a d-inin : « Nesla yas yekfeṛ ɣef Sidna Musa akk-d Sidi Ṛebbi ! »
44006012	Sekkren ccwal ger lɣaci d lecyux akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa , dɣa ṭṭfen Stifan ewwtent , wwin-t ɣer unejmaɛ n usqamu n ccṛeɛ .
44006013	Sbedden-d inigan i d-icehden fell-as s ẓẓur , nnan-d : Argaz-agi , yezga yekkat deg wemkan-agi iqedsen akk-d ccariɛa n Sidna Musa !
44006014	Nesla-yas mi geqqaṛ : « Ɛisa-nni Anaṣari , ad ihudd amkan agi yerna ad ibeddel lɛaddat i ɣ-d yeǧǧa Sidna Musa . »
44006015	Wid akk yellan deg unejmaɛ n ccṛeɛ , ṛeṣṣan allen-nsen ɣef Stifan ; țwalin udem-is am akken d udem n lmalayekkat .
44007001	Lmuqeddem ameqqran isteqsa Stifan yenna-yas : Ț-țideț wayen akka i d-nnan ?
44007002	Stifan yerra-yas : Ay atmaten , ay imɣaṛen n wat Isṛail , ḥesset-iyi-d ! Sidi Ṛebbi di lɛaḍima-s tameqqrant , yesbeggen-ed iman-is i jeddi-tneɣ Sidna Ibṛahim , mi gella di tmurt n Mizubuṭamya uqbel ad yezdeɣ di temdint n Haran .
44007003	Yenna-yas : Ffeɣ si tmurt-ik , si tmurt n imawlan-ik , tṛuḥeḍ ɣer tmurt ara k-d-ssekneɣ .
44007004	Iffeɣ ihi si tmurt n iqaldiyen , iṛuḥ ad izdeɣ di temdint n Haran . Mi gemmut baba-s , Sidi Ṛebbi yewwi-t-id ɣer tmurt-agi i deg tzedɣem tura .
44007005	Sidi Ṛebbi ur s-yefki ara di tmurt-agi ula d azal n terdast i deg ara yesres aḍar-is ; meɛna iwɛed-as a s-ye tamurt-agi i nețța d dderya n dderya-s ɣas akken imiren mazal ur yesɛi ara dderya , Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-yas :
44007006	Dderya n dderya-k aț-țezdeɣ deg yiwet n tmurt tabeṛṛanit , dinna a ten-erren d aklan , ad sɛeddin fell-asen lḥif azal n ṛebɛa meyya iseggasen .
44007007	Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d : Ad uɣalen a d-ffɣen si tmurt-nni , ad iyi-ɛebden deg wemkan-agi ; ma d lǧens-nni i ten-yerran d aklan , d nekk ara ten-iḥasben .
44007008	Dɣa Sidi Ṛebbi yefka-d i Sidna Ibṛahim leɛqed yeɛnan ṭṭhaṛa . S wakka , mi d-yesɛa mmi-s Isḥaq , Sidna Ibṛahim iṭeḥheṛ-as deg wass wis tmanya n tlalit-is . Isḥaq daɣen yexdem akken i mmi-s yeɛqub ; ula d Yeɛqub iṭeḥheṛ i tnac-nni warraw-is yellan d lejdud-nneɣ .
44007009	Ihi arraw-agi n yeɛqub usmen ɣef gma-tsen Yusef , kkren zenzen-t ɣer tmurt n Maṣer anda yuɣal d akli .
44007010	Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yella yid-es , ițsellik-it si tegnatin n ccedda ; issers-ed fell-as ṛṛeḥma yerna-yas-d leɛqel s wayes ara yeɛziz ɣer Ferɛun agellid n tmurt n Maṣeṛ . Ferɛun isbedd-it d lḥakem ɣef tmurt-is akk-d wexxam-is meṛṛa .
44007011	Yeɣli-d laẓ ɣef tmurt n Maṣeṛ akk ț-țmurt n Kenɛan , d lweqt n cedda tameqqrant ; lejdud-nneɣ ur ufin ara ayen ara ččen .
44007012	Mi gesla Yeɛqub belli llan yirden di tmurt n Maṣer , iceggeɛ ɣer dinna tikkelt tamezwarut , arraw-is yellan d lejdud-nneɣ .
44007013	Mi uɣalen tikkelt tis snat , Yusef isbeggen-ed iman-is ɣer watmaten-is , ɛeqlen-t d nețța . Yuɣal Ferɛun yeẓra laṣel n Yusef ansi-t .
44007014	Yusef iceggeɛ a d-awin baba-s Yeɛqub akk-d wat wexxam-is meṛṛa i gellan di xemsa usebɛin yid-sen .
44007015	Yeɛqub iṣubb ɣer tmurt n Maṣer ikemmel dinna ussan-is armi yemmut , am nețța am lejdud-nneɣ .
44007016	Wwin-d iɣsan-nsen ɣer taddart n Sicem , meḍlen-ten deg uẓekka i guɣ Sidna Ibṛahim s yedrimen ɣef warraw n Hamur n taddart n Sicem .
44007017	Mi d-yewweḍ lweqt i deg ara yedṛu wayen i gewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi i Sidna Ibṛahim s limin , agdud-nneɣ yufa-t-id lḥal innerna s waṭas di tmurt n Maṣer ;
44007018	imiren ikker-ed ugellid nniḍen ur nessin ara Yusef .
44007019	Agellid-nni iḥqeṛ lɣaci-nneɣ , yețqehhiṛ lejdud nneɣ , yeṣṣaweḍ armi i gefka lameṛ ad ǧǧen arraw-nsen i cceṛ akken kan ara d-lalen , iwakken ur țidiren ara .
44007020	Di lweqt-nni i d-ilul Sidna Musa ; icbeḥ yerna eɛziz ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi . Yețțuṛebba deg wexxam n imawlan-is tlata wagguren s tuffra ;
44007021	uɣalen rran-t zdaxel n tqecwalt , serrḥen-as deg wasif ; d yelli-s n Ferɛun i t-id-ijemɛen , tṛebba-t-id am mmi-s .
44007022	Ikker-ed ger imaṣriyen , yelmed akk tamusni-nsen ifazen . Yuɣal d argaz amusnaw , izewṛen ama deg yimeslayen ama di lecɣal .
44007023	Mi geṣṣaweḍ ṛebɛin iseggasen di leɛmeṛ-is , yemmekta-d atmaten-is at Isṛail , iṛuḥ ad iẓer acu n lḥala i deg țɛicin .
44007024	Yiwen wass iwala s wallen-is yiwen umaṣri ikkat yiwen seg wat Isṛail ; ikker a t-iḥudd , yerra-as-d țțar ; yewwet amaṣri-nni , yenɣa-t .
44007025	Yenwa ad fehmen watmaten-is belli s ufus-is ara ten-isellek Sidi Ṛebbi ; lameɛna nutni ur fhimen ara .
44007026	Azekka-nni iwala sin yergazen n wat Isṛail țnaɣen wway gar-asen , iger iman-is , yeɛṛed a ten-ifru , yenna-yasen : Eɛni mačči d atmaten i tellam ? Acimi i tețțnaɣem wway gar-awen ?
44007027	Lameɛna win akken iḍelmen wayeḍ idemmer Musa yenna-yas : Anwa i k-yerran d aqeṛṛuy neɣ d lḥakem fell-aɣ ?
44007028	Eɛni tebɣiḍ a yi-tenɣeḍ akken tenɣiḍ iḍelli amaṣri-nni ?
44007029	Ɣef ddemma n yimeslayen-agi Sidna Musa yerwel , iṛuḥ ad izdeɣ di tmurt n Madyan . Dinna i gesɛa sin n warrac .
44007030	Mi ɛeddan ṛebɛin n iseggasen , idheṛ-as-ed yiwen n lmelk deg yiwen uḥeǧǧaǧu n tmes iceɛlen deg inijel , mi gella deg unezṛuf n wedrar n Sinay .
44007031	Sidna Musa yewhem deg wayen yețwali ; akken kan iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es , Sidi Ṛebbi yessawel-as-d seg uḥeǧǧaǧu-nni n tmes , yenna-yas-d :
44007032	D nekk i d Illu n lejdud-ik , d Illu n Ibṛahim , n Isḥaq akk-d Yeɛqub . Sidna Musa yeqqim ițergigi , yuggad ad yerfed ula d allen-is .
44007033	Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-yas : Kkes arkasen seg iḍaṛṛen-ik axaṭer amkan-agi anda tbeddeḍ d amkan iqedsen .
44007034	Walaɣ lbaṭel ideṛṛun d wegdud-iw di tmurt n Maṣer ; sliɣ-ed i unazeɛ-nsen ; ṣubbeɣ-d iwakken a ten-sellkeɣ . Ṛuḥ tura a k-ceggɛeɣ ɣer tmurt n Maṣeṛ .
44007035	Musa-nni i nekṛen m'akken i s-nnan : Anwa i k-yerran d amdebbar neɣ d lḥakem ? D nețța i d-iceggeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi d aqeṛṛuy , d amcafeɛ n wegdud ; s lemɛawna n lmelk i s-d-idehṛen deg udarnu ireqqen .
44007036	D nețța i ten-id-issufɣen si tmurt n Maṣer . Yexdem aṭas n lbeṛhanat d leɛǧayeb di tmurt-nni , di lebḥeṛ azeggaɣ , deg unezṛuf n Sinay , anda akken qqimen ṛebɛin iseggasen .
44007037	D nețța daɣen i gennan i wat Isṛail : Sidi Ṛebbi a wen-d-ye si ger watmaten-nwen yiwen n nnbi am nekk .
44007038	Asm'akken i gennejmaɛ wegdud deg unezṛuf , d nețța iwumi d yemmeslay lmelk-nni deg wedrar n Sinay , d nețța iwumi d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi awal n tudert iwakken a ɣ-t-id issiweḍ .
44007039	Lameɛna lejdud-nneɣ ugin a s-aɣen awal ; ur t-qbilen ara axaṭer deg ulawen-nsen bɣan ad uɣalen ɣer tmurt n Maṣer .
44007040	Nnan i Haṛun gma-s n Sidna Musa : Xdem-aɣ-d iṛebbiten am wid n imaṣriyen , ara nezzwer zdat-nneɣ , axaṭer Musa-agi i ɣ-d-yessufɣen si tmurt n Maṣeṛ , ur neẓri ara d acu i gedṛan yid-es .
44007041	Dɣa deg ussan-nni , jemɛen-d ddheb , ssefsin-t xedmen yis yiwen ugenduz . Imiren zlan-as asfel , xedmen-as tameɣṛa , feṛḥen s wayen xedmen yifassen-nsen .
44007042	Sidi Ṛebbi yeṭṭaxeṛ fell-asen , yeǧǧa-ten ad ɛebden itran n yigenni , d ayen i guran di tektabt n lenbiya : Ay agdud n wat Isṛail , eɛni i nekk iwumi d-tefkam lewɛadi d iseflawen , di ṛebɛin iseggasen-nni i tesɛeddam deg unezṛuf ?
44007043	Xaṭi meɛna tbubbem aqiḍun n Mulux akk-d itri n Rufan i tḥesbem d iṛebbiten-nwen ; + lmeṣnuɛat nni i txedmem iwakken a ten-tɛebdem ! Daymi ara kkun-nfuɣ ɣer lebɛid , akkin i temdint n Babilun !
44007044	Deg unezṛuf , lejdud-nneɣ sɛan aqiḍun i deg yella leɛqed n Sidi Ṛebbi ; aqiḍun-nni ițwaxedmen akken i s-t-id-yemla Sidi Ṛebbi i Sidna Musa mi s-d-yenna : Xdem-it am akken i t-twalaḍ di lemtel i k-d-ssekneɣ .
44007045	Mi d-yewweḍ uqiḍun-nni ɣer ifassen n lejdud-nneɣ , wwin-t-id yid-sen mi i ten-issekcem Yacuɛa ɣer tmurt-nni i sen-yewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi , mi ssufɣen imezdaɣ-is s tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi . Aqiḍun-nni yeqqim dinna armi d zzman n Sidna Dawed .
44007046	Sidna Dawed eɛzizen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , yedɛa ɣuṛ-es yenna : A Sidi Ṛebbi ! A Yillu n jeddi-tneɣ Yeɛqub ! Eǧǧ-iyi ad a k-bnuɣ lǧameɛ iqedsen ara yilin ț-țanezduɣt-ik !
44007047	Lameɛna d Sidna Sliman i s yebnan lǧameɛ-nni !
44007048	Ɣas akken Sidi Ṛebbi ɛlayen ur izeddeɣ ara deg ixxamen ițwabnan s ufus n wemdan , akken i d-yenna nnbi Iceɛya :
44007049	Igenni d amkan n lḥekma-w , ma d lqaɛa ț-țaḥsiṛt i ɣef srusuɣ idaṛṛen-iw . Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d : Acu n wexxam i tzemrem a yi-tebnum , neɣ anda-t wemkan i deg zemreɣ ad steɛfuɣ ?
44007050	Eɛni mačči d afus-iw i d-ixelqen kullec ?
44007051	A wid isbeddayen iɛenqiqen nsen ! Tesɣaṛayem ulawen-nwen , tqeflem imeẓẓuɣen-nwen , tețțeddum di nneqma i Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen am kunwi am lejdud-nwen !
44007052	Anwa nnbi ur qhiṛen ara lejdud-nwen ? Nɣan wid akk ițbecciṛen si zik ɣef Uḥeqqi ara d-yasen ; tura d kunwi i t-ixedɛen yerna tenɣam-t .
44007053	Tewweḍ-ikkun-id ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi s ufus n lmalayekkat , lameɛna kunwi tugim a s-taɣem awal !
44007054	Mi slan i yemslayen-agi , lmuqedmin iffeɣ-iten leɛqel , qeṛcen tuɣmas-nsen fell-as .
44007055	Lameɛna Stifan yeččuṛen d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , yerfed allen-is ɣer igenni , iwala tamanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Sidna Ɛisa ibedden ɣer uyeffus-is .
44007056	Imiren iɛeggeḍ , yenna : Atan țwaliɣ igenwan ldin , țwaliɣ Mmi-s n bunadem ibedd ɣer tama tayeffust n Ṛebbi !
44007057	Qeflen imeẓẓuɣen-nsen , bdan țɛeggiḍen , ẓedmen fell-as akken ma llan .
44007058	Zzuɣṛen-t beṛṛa n temdint , ṛejmen-t s iblaḍen iwakken a t-nɣen . Inigan ǧǧan leḥwayeǧ-nsen ɣer yiwen ilemẓi isem-is Caɛul , iwakken a ten-iɛas .
44007059	M'akken i t-ṛeǧmen , Stifan ideɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi yeqqaṛ : A Sidna Ɛisa , atan ṛṛuḥ-iw ger ifassen-ik !
44007060	Imiren yeɣli ɣef tgecrar , iɛeggeḍ s lǧehd-is : A baba Ṛebbi ur ten-țḥasab ara ɣef ddnub-agi ! Akken kan i d-yenna imeslayen agi , iffeɣ-it ṛṛuḥ .
44008001	Caɛul , d yiwen seg wid iqeblen lmut n Stifan . Ass-nni kkren-d wid ibdan țqehhiṛen tajmaɛt n wid yețțamnen s Lmasiḥ yellan di temdint n Lquds . Wid akk yumnen s Lmasiḥ rewlen ɣer tudrin n tmurt n Yahuda armi ț-țamurt n Samarya ; anagar ṛṛusul i d-yeqqimen di temdint n Lquds .
44008002	Kra yergazen iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi , wwin-d Stifan meḍlen-t , ḥeznen aṭas , țrun fell-as .
44008003	Ma d Caɛul ixeddem akk lmejhud-is iwakken ad ihudd tajmaɛt n wid yumnen s Sidna Ɛisa ; issufuɣ ed seg ixxamen-nsen , irgazen ț-țilawin yumnen s Lmasiḥ , issekcam iten ɣer lḥebs .
44008004	Ihi wid akk i grewlen , mfaṛaqen , țṛuḥun seg wemkan ɣer wayeḍ , țbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi .
44008005	Filbas iṣubb ɣer temdint n Samarya , ibecceṛ dinna lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan Lmasiḥ .
44008006	Lɣaci meṛṛa rran ddehn-nsen ɣer Filbas , mi slan i wayen i d-yeqqaṛ yerna walan lbeṛhanat i gxeddem ;
44008007	axaṭer leǧnun țeffɣen s leɛyaḍ seg waṭas n yemdanen ițțumelken , aṭas daɣen n iquḍaṛen akk-d wid ikerfen i geḥlan .
44008008	Dɣa imezdaɣ n temdint-nni meṛṛa feṛḥen mačči d kra .
44008009	Yuɣ lḥal di temdint-nni yella yiwen wergaz isem-is Semɛun , issewham imezdaɣ n tmurt n Samarya s ssḥur i gxeddem ; iḥețțeb iman-is d win yesɛan tazmert .
44008010	Imdanen akk am umeẓyan am umeqqran , țțaran ddehn-nsen ɣuṛ-es qqaṛen : « Argaz-agi ț-țazmert n Ṛebbi s yiman-is ; ț-țazmert-nni iwumi neqqaṛ tazmert yessewhamen ! »
44008011	Țțamnen yis axaṭer si zik i ten-issewham s ssḥur i gxeddem ;
44008012	lameɛna , asmi umnen s wayen i sen-ibecceṛ Filbas ɣef wayen yeɛnan tagelda n Sidi Ṛebbi d yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , usan-d akk ad țwaɣeḍsen deg waman am yergazen am tlawin .
44008013	Semɛun s yiman-is yumen ; ula d nețța yețwaɣḍes deg waman , seg wass-nni ur yettixiṛ ara ɣef Filbas ; ițțawham deg-s mi gețwali leɛǧayeb d lbeṛhanat timeqqranin i gxeddem .
44008014	Mi slan belli lɣaci n tmurt n Samarya qeblen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi , ṛṛusul yeqqimen di temdint n Lquds ceggɛen-asen Buṭrus d Yuḥenna .
44008015	Mi wwḍen ɣuṛ-sen , dɛan fell asen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a sen-d-ye Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ;
44008016	axaṭer mazal ur d-iris ula ɣef yiwen deg-sen , țwaɣeḍsen kan deg aman s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa .
44008017	Buṭrus akk-d Yuḥenna ssersen ifassen-nsen fell-asen , dɣa yețțune asen-d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
44008018	Mi gwala Semɛun yețțunefk-ed Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i lɣaci imi ssersen ṛṛusul ifassen-nsen fell-asen , yewwi-yasen-d idrimen yenna-yasen :
44008019	Ffket-iyi ula d nekk tazmert agi iwakken kra n win i ɣef ara sserseɣ ifassen-iw , a t-ikcem Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
44008020	Lameɛna Buṭrus yenna-yas : Ad negren yedrimen-ik ad glun yis-ek imi tɣileḍ Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi yețnuzu s idrimen !
44008021	Ul-ik ur yeṣfi ara ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ! Ur k-id-iṣaḥ umur , ur tesɛiḍ lweṛt di ccɣel-agi .
44008022	Endem di yir ṛṛay-ik , tedɛuḍ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ma yella wamek , a k-yeɛfu ɣef yir axemmem-agi i d-yeffɣen seg ul-ik !
44008023	Atan walaɣ teččuṛeḍ d ddɣel , imlek-ik lbaṭel !
44008024	Semɛun yerra-yasen : Dɛut kunwi s yiman-nwen fell-i ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ur d-ideṛṛu ara yid-i wayen akka i d-tennam .
44008025	Buṭrus d Yuḥenna kemmlen cehden ɣef Sidna Ɛisa , beccṛen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi , mbeɛd uɣalen ɣer temdint n Lquds . Deg webrid-nsen , țbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ deg waṭas n tudrin n tmurt n Samarya .
44008026	Yiwen lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi inṭeq-ed ɣer Filbas yenna-yas : Kker , ṛuḥ ɣer lǧiha n usammer , ɛeddi seg webrid-nni yexlan i gețṣubbun si temdint n Lquds ɣer tmurt n Ɣaza .
44008027	Ikker , iṛuḥ . Immuger-ed deg webrid yiwen n wergaz , d aneɣlaf n Kendyas tagellit n tmurt n Ityubya ; d nețța i d lewkil ɣef lmelk-is meṛṛa , lameɛna d argaz ur nesɛi ddunit ; yusa-d ɣer temdint n Lquds iwakken ad iɛbed Sidi Ṛebbi .
44008028	Mi gțeddu ɣef tkeṛṛust-is iwakken ad yuɣal ɣer wexxam-is , yufa-t-id lḥal yeqqaṛ di tektabt n nnbi Iceɛya .
44008029	Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yenna i Filbas : Ṛuḥ qeṛṛeb ɣer tkeṛṛust-ihina .
44008030	Filbas yuzzel ɣuṛ-es , yesla i uneɣlaf-nni n tmurt n Ityubya yeqqaṛ di tektabt n nnbi Iceɛya . Yenna-yas : Tfehmeḍ ayen akka i teqqaṛeḍ ?
44008031	Yerra-yas : Amek ara fehmeɣ ma ulac win ara yi-d-isfehmen ? Dɣa yesserkeb-ed Filbas ɣer tama-s .
44008032	Atah wayen akken yella yeqqaṛ di tektabt-nni : Am izimer m'ara t-awin a t-zlun , am tixsi iggugmen zdat win i ț-ițellsen , ur d-yeldi imi-is .
44008033	Yețwaḥqeṛ , ițwačč lḥeqq-is ! Anwa ara d-yeḥkun ɣef wayen yedṛan di lǧil-ines ? Anwa ara d-yeḥkun ɣef tudert-is yețwakksen si ddunit ?
44008034	Aneɣlaf-nni yenna-yas i Filbas : Di leɛnaya-k ssefhem-iyi-d ɣef wanwa i d-ițmeslay nnbi-yagi , ɣef yiman-is neɣ ɣef wayeḍ ?
44008035	Dɣa Filbas s wawal-agi i gebda a s-ițbecciṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan Sidna Ɛisa .
44008036	Mi teddun deg webrid-nsen , wwḍen ɣer yiwen wemkan i deg llan waman . Aneɣlaf-nni yenna-yas : Atnan waman ! D acu ara yi-d iḥebsen iwakken ad țwaɣedṣeɣ ?
44008037	Filbas yenna-yas : Ma tumneḍ seg ul-ik , tzemreḍ aț-tețwaɣeḍseḍ . Aneɣlaf-nni yerra-yas : Umneɣ belli Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi .
44008038	Imiren yumeṛ ad ḥebsen takeṛṛust-is . Filbas d uneɣlaf-nni rsen-d , kecmen i sin ɣer waman , dɣa Filbas isseɣḍes-it .
44008039	Mi d-ffɣen seg waman , Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi yerfed Filbas , yexfa ger wallen uneɣlaf-nni . Aneɣlaf-nni ikemmel abrid-is s lfeṛḥ ;
44008040	ma d Filbas yufa-d iman-is di temdint n Acdud ; syenna ikemmel abrid-is , ițeddu ițbecciṛ awal n tudert di tudrin meṛṛa i ɣef iɛedda , armi i gewweḍ ɣer temdint n Qiṣarya .
44009001	Caɛul mazal ițqehhiṛ inelmaden n Sidna Ɛisa , ițgalla deg-sen a ten-ineɣ . Iṛuḥ ɣer lmuqeddem ameqqran ,
44009002	issuter-as a s-d-ixdem lkaɣeḍ ara yawi ɣer leǧwameɛ meṛṛa n temdint n Dimecq , iwakken ma yufa deg-sen wid ittabaɛen abrid n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , ama d argaz ama ț-țameṭṭut , a ten-id-yawi țwarzen ɣer temdint n Lquds .
44009003	Yella iteddu deg webrid , qṛib ad yaweḍ ɣer temdint n Dimecq . Taswiɛt kan , tekka-d yiwet n tafat seg igenni tfeǧǧeǧ-ed fell-as , tezzi yas-d .
44009004	Yeɣli ɣer lqaɛa , yesla i yiwen n ṣṣut i s-d-yeqqaṛen : Caɛul ! A Caɛul ! Acuɣeṛ i yi tețqehhiṛeḍ ?
44009005	Yenna-yas : Anwa-k a Sidi ? Sṣut-nni yerra-yas-d : D nekk i d Ɛisa , win akken i tețqehhiṛeḍ !
44009006	Kker fell-ak ! Ṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Dimecq , dinna ara k-d-inin acu ara txedmeḍ .
44009007	Irgazen i geddan yid-es bedden , dehcen , ggugmen ; slan i taɣect-nni lameɛna ur walan ula d yiwen .
44009008	Caɛul ikker-ed si lqaɛa , ɣas akken ldint wallen-is , ur yețwali ara . Sṭfen-as afus , wwin-t ɣer temdint n Dimecq .
44009009	Yeqqim tlata wussan ur iwala , ur ičči , ur yeswi . Caɛul yumen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
44009010	Di temdint n Dimecq , yella yiwen unelmad isem-is Ananyas ; Sidi Ṛebbi yessawel-as-d deg uweḥḥi , Ananyas yerra-yas : Aql-iyi a Sidi .
44009011	Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-yas : Kker tṛuḥeḍ ɣer webrid ițusemman « Abrid ayeffus » , ɣer wexxam n Yuda ; dinna steqsi ɣef yiwen wergaz isem-is Caɛul n temdint n Sars . Atan ideɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ,
44009012	yețwali deg uweḥḥi ikcem ɣuṛ-es yiwen wergaz isem-is Ananyas , yessers ifassen-is fell-as iwakken a t-id-yuɣal yeẓri .
44009013	Ananyas yerra-yas : A Sidi , acḥal n yemdanen i d yeḥkan fell-as ițqehhiṛ inelmaden-ik imqedsen di temdint n Lquds !
44009014	Yusa-d ɣer dagi daɣen s țțesriḥ n lmuqedmin imeqqranen iwakken ad yerr ɣer lḥebs wid akk ineddhen s yisem-ik .
44009015	Lameɛna Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ṛuḥ , axaṭer argaz-agi d nekk i t-yextaṛen iwakken ad ibecceṛ isem-iw i wat Isṛail , i leǧnas nniḍen akk-d igelliden-nsen .
44009016	Yerna a s ssekneɣ acḥal ara yeɛteb ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw .
44009017	Ananyas iṛuḥ ; mi gewweḍ ɣer wexxam-nni , yessers ifassen-is ɣef Caɛul yenna-yas : A Caɛul a gma , d Sidna Ɛisa-nni i k-d-iḍehṛen deg-webrid ansi i d-tusiḍ , i yi-d-iceggɛen iwakken a k-id-yuɣal yeẓri yerna aț-țeččaṛeḍ d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
44009018	Imiren kan ɣlin-d seg wallen-is am akken d iqecṛan , dɣa yuɣal-it-id yeẓri ; yekker , yețwaɣḍes .
44009019	Mi gečča , yuɣal-it-id lǧehd ; isɛedda kra wussan ɣer inelmaden i gellan di temdint n Dimecq .
44009020	Ur iɛeṭṭel ara , yebda yețbecciṛ di leǧwameɛ n wat Isṛail belli Sidna Ɛisa d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi .
44009021	Wid akk i s isellen , wehmen qqaṛen : Eɛni mačči d win akken i gețqehhiṛen di temdint n Lquds wid ineddhen s yisem-agi n Ɛisa ? Eɛni ur d-yusi ara ɣer dagi iwakken a ten-yawi țwarzen ɣer lmuqedmin imeqqranen ?
44009022	Lameɛna Caɛul simmal yețnerni di liman ; isseɛweq at Isṛail izedɣen di temdint n Dimecq mi sen-d-ițbeggin belli d Ɛisa i d Lmasiḥ .
44009023	Mi Ɛeddan kra wussan , at Isṛail mcawaṛen akken a t-nɣen ;
44009024	lameɛna Caɛul yesla s txazabit i bɣan a s xedmen , am yiḍ am ass țɛassan ula ț-țiwura n temdint iwakken a t-nɣen .
44009025	Yiwen yiḍ , inelmaden gren-t zdaxel n uqecwal , ṣubben-t-id si ṣṣuṛ i d-izzin i temdint .
44009026	Mi i d-yusa ɣer temdint n Lquds , Caɛul inuda ɣef yinelmaden , lameɛna kukran-t akk axaṭer ur uminen ara belli yuɣal d anelmad n Sidna Ɛisa .
44009027	Dɣa Barnabas yewwi-t ɣer ṛṛusul , yeḥka-yasen amek i s-d-iban Sidna Ɛisa deg webrid , amek i s-d-ihḍeṛ d wamek i gbecceṛ s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa ɛinani mbla akukru di temdint n Dimecq .
44009028	Seg imiren yețṛuḥu yețțuɣal yid-sen di temdint n Lquds , yețbecciṛ ɛinani s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa .
44009029	Iheddeṛ daɣen nețța d wat Isṛail i d-yusan si tmura i gețmeslayen tayunanit , yețțemjadal yid-sen , meɛna ula d nutni țqelliben a t-nɣen .
44009030	Mi slan watmaten s wannect-agi , srewlen-t ɣer temdint n Qiṣarya iwakken ad iṛuḥ syenna ɣer temdint n Sars .
44009031	Tajmaɛt n watmaten yellan di tmura n Yahuda d Jlili akk-d Samarya tethenna , tețțimɣuṛ di liman , tețțeddu s tugdi n Sidi Ṛebbi , tețnerni s lemɛawna n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
44009032	Buṭrus i d-inudan tijmaɛin meṛṛa , iṛuḥ daɣen ɣer watmaten izedɣen di temdint n Lud .
44009033	Yufa dinna yiwen wergaz isem-is Inyas ; argaz-agi tmanya iseggasen nețța deg usu axaṭer ikref .
44009034	Yenṭeq ɣuṛ-es Buṭrus yenna-yas : Ay Inyas ! Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yesseḥla-k ! Kker fell-ak tekkseḍ usu-inek ! Imiren kan yekker .
44009035	Mi t-walan yeḥla , imezdaɣ akk n temdint n Lud d wid n uzaɣaṛ n tmurt n Sarun beddlen tikli , qeblen abrid n Sidna Ɛisa .
44009036	Di temdint n Jafa , tella yiwet n tmeṭṭut isem-is Tabita ; tețseddiq , tețɛawan igellilen .
44009037	Di lweqt-nni , yeɣli-d fell-as lehlak dɣa temmut . Ssarden-ț , ssersen-ț di tɣuṛfeț .
44009038	Mi slan inelmaden belli Buṭrus di temdint n Jafa i gella , yerna ț-țamdint ur nebɛid ara ɣef temdint n Lud , ceggɛen ɣuṛ-es sin yergazen iwakken a t-ḥellelen a d-yas ɣuṛ-sen s lemɣawla .
44009039	Buṭrus ikker yedda yid-sen imiren kan . Mi gewweḍ , ssulin-t ɣer tɣuṛfeț-nni . Tuǧǧal akk țrunt , zzint-as-d i Buṭrus , sseknent-as-d tiqendyaṛ d ibeṛnyas i tzeṭṭ Durka uqbel aț-țemmet .
44009040	Buṭrus issufeɣ ɣer beṛṛa wid akk yellan dinna , yeqqim ɣef tgecrar , yedɛa ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ; izzi ɣer lmegget-nni yenna-yas : Tabita , ekker ! Dɣa teldi-d allen-is , twala-d Buṭrus , imiren teqqim-ed .
44009041	Buṭrus yefka-yas afus-is iskker-iț-id , dɣa issawel i inelmaden nni akk-d tuǧǧal , ufan-ț-id tedder .
44009042	Imezdaɣ meṛṛa n temdint n Jafa slan s wayen yedṛan , daymi aṭas i gumnen s Sidna Ɛisa .
44009043	Buṭrus yeqqim kra n wussan di temdint n Jafa , ɣer yiwen wergaz isem-is Semɛun , d axeddam deg uɣerruz ( aglim ) .
44010001	Di temdint n Qiṣarya , yella yiwen wergaz iwumi qqaṛen Kurnilyus , d lqebṭan n yiwet n terbaɛt isem-is « tarbaɛt n Selyan » .
44010002	Am nețța am wexxam-is ḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi ; ițseddiq i igellilen , yerna am iḍ am ass yezga ideɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
44010003	Yiwen wass , leǧwahi n tlata n tmeddit , iweḥḥa-yas-ed Sidi Ṛebbi , iwala yiwen lmelk ikcem-ed ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas-d : A Kurnilyus !
44010004	Kurnilyus yerfed allen-is ɣuṛ-es , tekcem-it tugdi , ițergigi , yerra-yas : D acu , a Sidi ? Lmelk yenna-yas-d : Sidi Ṛebbi yeqbel taẓallit-ik akk-d lewɛadi i tețțakeḍ i imeɣban ;
44010005	Tura ceggeɛ irgazen ɣer temdint n Jafa , ɣer Semɛun , win iwumi qqaṛen Butṛus , iwakken a d-yas .
44010006	A t-tafeḍ ɣer yiwen wergaz i gxeddmen deg uɣerruz , ula d nețța isem-is Semɛun ; axxam-is yezga-d ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ .
44010007	Mi gṛuḥ lmelk-nni i s-d-ihedṛen , Kurnilyus yessawel i sin seg iqeddacen-is akk-d yiwen uɛeskṛi n terbɛat-is i gellan d argaz iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi .
44010008	iḥka-yasen-d ayen akk yedṛan ; dɣa iceggeɛ-iten ɣer temdint n Jafa .
44010009	Azekka-nni , mi qṛib ad awḍen wid i gceggeɛ Kurnilyus ɣer temdint n Jafa , Buṭrus yuɣ-it lḥal yuli ɣef ssḍeḥ iwakken ad idɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , aț-țili d leǧwahi n tnac n wass ,
44010010	yeṭṭef-it laẓ yebɣa ad yečč . Llan țheggin-as-ed lqut , taswiɛt kan iweḥḥa-yas-ed Sidi Ṛebbi ;
44010011	iwala igenni yeldi , yiwet lḥaǧa icuban ɣer tẓeṛbit tameqqrant icudden si ṛebɛa tɣemmaṛ , tețṣubbu-d ɣer lqaɛa .
44010012	Llan deg-s lewḥuc at ṛebɛa idaṛṛen n mkul ṣṣifa , wid iteddun ɣef wuɛebbuḍ , akk-d yefṛax n igenni s mkul ṣṣifa .
44010013	Yesla i yiwen n ṣṣut yenna yas-d : A Buṭrus , ekker ! Ezlu teččeḍ !
44010014	Lameɛna Butṛus yenna-yas : Ala a Sidi , di leɛmeṛ-iw ur ččiɣ ayen iḥeṛmen neɣ ayen ur neṣfi .
44010015	Sṣut-nni inṭeq-ed tikkelt tis snat yenna-yas-d : Ayen iḥseb Sidi Ṛebbi d leḥlal , ur k-id-iṣaḥ ara a t-tḥesbeḍ d leḥṛam !
44010016	Ayagi , iweḥḥa-yas-t-id Sidi Ṛebbi tlata n tikkal ; imiren kan , lḥaǧa-nni tețwarfed ɣer igenni .
44010017	Akken mazal Buṭrus yețxemmim ɣef lmeɛna n uweḥḥi-nni , wwḍen-d yergazen-nni i d-iceggeɛ Kurnilyus steqsayen ɣef wexxam n Semɛun .
44010018	Mi d-wwḍen ɣer tewwurt , ssawlen , steqsan ma deg wexxam-nni i gețțili Semɛun iwumi qqaṛen Butṛus .
44010019	Mazal Buṭrus ițxemmim ɣef wuweḥḥi-nni , mi s-d-yenna Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen : Atnaya tlata yergazen țnadin fell-ak .
44010020	Ur țkukru ara , kker , ddu yid-sen axaṭer d nekk i ten-id iceggɛen .
44010021	Butṛus iṣubb-ed ɣuṛ-sen , yenna yasen : Aql-i ! D nekk i d Buṭrus ! D acu akka i kkun-id-yewwin ɣuṛ-i ?
44010022	Nutni rran-as : D lqebṭan-nneɣ Kurnilyus , i ɣ-d iceggɛen ɣuṛ-ek ! D argaz țcekkiṛen akk wat Isṛail yerna ḥemmlen-t axaṭer d amdan aḥeqqi iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi . Ibedd-ed ɣuṛ-es lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-yas-d a d-iceggeɛ ɣuṛ-ek , a d-taseḍ ɣer wexxam-is iwakken ad isel i wayen i tesɛiḍ a s-t-id-tiniḍ .
44010023	Buṭrus issekcem-iten ad nsen ɣuṛ-es . Azekka-nni ikker yedda yid-sen nețța d kra n watmaten n Jafa .
44010024	Sellazekka-nni , wwḍen ɣer temdint n Qiṣarya . Kurnilyus yețṛaǧu ten deg wexxam-is nețța d leḥbab-is akk-d imawlan-is i d-yeɛṛeḍ .
44010025	Akken iteddu Butṛus ad yekcem , immuger-it-id Kurnilyus ɣer tewwurt n wefrag , yeɣli ɣer idaṛṛen-is , yekna zdat-es iwakken ad isṭerḥeb yis s leqdeṛ ameqqran .
44010026	Meɛna Butṛus issekker-it-id yenna-yas : Kker fell-ak ! D amdan am kečč i lliɣ .
44010027	Leḥḥun , țmeslayen armi kecmen ɣer wexxam , yufa dinna aṭas n yemdanen i gennejmaɛen .
44010028	Buṭrus yenna-yasen : Yak teẓram d leḥṛam i wemdan n wat Isṛail ad ixaleḍ abeṛṛani neɣ ad ikcem ɣer wexxam-is . Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yessefhem-iyi-d belli ur ilaq ara a d-nini ɣef walebɛaḍ belli ur zeddig ara neɣ ur iṣfi ara ;
44010029	daymi i qebleɣ a d-aseɣ mi yi-d-tessawlem . Init-iyi-d tura sebba ɣef wacu i d-tceggɛem ɣuṛ-i .
44010030	Kurnilyus yerra-yas : Ṛebɛa wussan aya , leǧwahi n tlata n tmeddit , lliɣ deɛɛuɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi deg wexxam-iw ; ataya ibedd-ed zdat-i yiwen wergaz s llebsa yețfeǧǧiǧen ,
44010031	yenna-yi-d : « A Kurnilyus ! Sidi Ṛebbi yeqbel taẓallit-ik akk-d lewɛadi i tețțakeḍ i igellilen .
44010032	Ceggeɛ ɣer temdint n Jafa ɣerSemɛun ițusemman Butṛus iwakken a d-yas ; a t-tafeḍ ɣer yiwen i gxeddmen igelman , ula d nețța isem-is Semɛun ; axxam-is yezga-d ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ .
44010033	Imiren ceggɛeɣ-en ɣuṛ-ek ; tanemmirt-ik imi d-tusiḍ . Tura ihi aql-aɣ akk dagi zdat Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a nsel s ɣuṛ-ek , ayen akk i k-d-yumeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi a ɣ-t-id-tiniḍ .
44010034	Butṛus yebda ameslay yenna : Armi ț-țura i fehmeɣ belli ț-țideț , Sidi Ṛebbi ur ixeddem ara lxilaf ger yemdanen .
44010035	Lameɛna di mkul lǧens , yal amdan i t-yețḍuɛun , ixeddmen ayen yellan d lḥeqq , iɛǧeb-as i Ṛebbi i gellan d Illu n yemdanen meṛṛa ; teslam belli iceggeɛ-ed awal-is i wat Isṛail , ibecceṛ-asen-d lehna s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
44010036	
44010037	Ahat teslam s wayen yedṛan di tmurt n Yahuda meṛṛa ; yebda-d si tmurt n Jlili seg wasmi ițbecciṛ Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas , aɣḍas n waman .
44010038	Teslam s Ɛisa Anaṣari amek i t-iččuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi s tezmert akk-d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , amek i gteddu seg umkan ɣer wayeḍ , ixeddem lxiṛ , amek isseḥlay wid akk i gemlek Cciṭan , axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ițțili yid-es .
44010039	Aql-aɣ d inigan n wayen akk i gexdem di tmurt n wat Isṛail ț-țemdint n Lquds anda i t-nɣan mi t-semmṛen ɣef wumidag ,
44010040	meɛna ass wis tlata Sidi Ṛebbi isseḥya-t-id si ger lmegtin ; yefka-yas tazmert s wayes i d-isbeggen iman-is ,
44010041	mačči i yemdanen meṛṛa meɛna i nukkni kan i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi a nili d inagan-is ; nukkni yeččan , yeswan yid-es mi d-iḥya si ger lmegtin .
44010042	Sidna Ɛisa iweṣṣa-yaɣ a nbecceṛ i yemdanen meṛṛa , belli d nețța i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ad iḥaseb wid yeddren akk-d wid yemmuten .
44010043	Lenbiya akk cehden-d fell-as belli kra n win ara yamnen yis , a s-țwaɛeffun ddnubat-is s yisem-is .
44010044	Urɛad ifuk Buṭrus ameslay mi d-yers Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ɣef wid akk yellan dinna , i gesmeḥsisen i wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi .
44010045	Wid i geddan d Butṛus , yellan d at Isṛail yumnen s Lmasiḥ , dehcen , wehmen imi d-yețțune Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ula i wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail .
44010046	Axaṭer sellen-asen heddṛen yerna țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi s tutlayin ur nețwassen ara . Dɣa Butṛus yenna :
44010047	Eɛni nezmer a nḥeṛṛem seg weɣḍas deg waman wid iwumi i d-yețțune Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen am nukkni ?
44010048	Dɣa Yefka lameṛ ad țwaɣeḍsen s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ; imiren ḥellelen-t ad yeqqim yid-sen kra n wussan .
44011001	Ṛṛusul d watmaten yellan di tmurt n Yahuda slan belli ula d leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail qeblen awal n Ṛebbi .
44011002	Mi guɣal Butṛus ɣer temdint n Lquds , at Isṛail yumnen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ur ten-iɛǧib ara lḥal ; lummen fell-as , nnan-as :
44011003	Amek armi tkecmeḍ ɣer wexxam n wid ur neḍhiṛ ara yerna teččiḍ yid-sen ?
44011004	Dɣa Butṛus yebda a sen-d-iḥekku ayen akk yedṛan , yenna-yasen :
44011005	Mi lliɣ di temdint n Jafa , lliɣ deɛɛuɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ; taswiɛt kan , iṛuḥ leɛqel-iw , iweḥḥa-yi-d Sidi Ṛebbi , walaɣ taẓeṛbit tameqqrant tcudd si ṛebɛa n tɣemmaṛ , tețṣubbu-d seg igenni , tewweḍ-ed armi d ɣuṛ-i .
44011006	Reṣṣaɣ allen-iw fell-as , walaɣ deg-s mkul ṣṣifa n lewḥuc at ṛebɛa idaṛṛen d wid iteddun ɣef wuɛebbuḍ akk-d yefṛax n igenni n mkul ṣṣenf .
44011007	Dɣa sliɣ i yiwen n ṣṣut i yi-d iqqaṛen : a Buṭrus ! Ekker , ezlu teččeḍ !
44011008	Lameɛna nniɣ-as : ala a Sidi ! Leɛmeṛ yekcim ɣer yimi-w wayen iḥeṛmen neɣ wayen ur neṣfi .
44011009	Tikkelt tis snat , ṣṣut-nni i d-yusan seg igenni yenna-yi-d : ayen iḥseb Sidi Ṛebbi d leḥlal , ur k-id iṣaḥ ara a t-tḥesbeḍ d leḥṛam !
44011010	Ayagi yedṛa-d tlata n tikkal , dɣa kullec ițwarfed ɣer igenni .
44011011	Imiren kan wwḍen-d tlata yergazen ɣer wexxam i deg lliɣ , țwaceggɛen-d ɣuṛ-i si temdint n Qiṣarya .
44011012	Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yenna-yi-d : ddu kan yid-sen ur țțaggad ara . Wwiɣ yid-i sețța watmaten-agi i tețwalim , dɣa nṛuḥ .
44011013	Nekcem ɣer wexxam n Kurnilyus , yeḥka-yaɣ-d ayen i s yenna lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi i d ibedden ɣuṛ-es , mi s-yenna : ceggeɛ ɣer temdint n Jafa a d-awin Semɛun ițusemman Butṛus ,
44011014	a k-d-yini amek ara tețwasellkeḍ kečč d wat wexxam-ik .
44011015	Mi bdiɣ ameslay , Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yers-ed fell-asen , akken i d-yers fell-aɣ ass amezwaru .
44011016	Imiren mmektaɣ-ed awal-nni i d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa : « Yeḥya isseɣḍas deg aman , lameɛna kunwi aț-țețwaɣeḍsem di Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen . »
44011017	Ihi imi sen-d yefka Sidi Ṛebbi tikci am nukkni yumnen s Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , d acu-yi nekk iwakken ad xalfeɣ lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi ?
44011018	Mi slan i wannect-nni , yethedden wul-nsen , ḥemden Ṛebbi nnan : A neḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi i geldin abrid n țțuba ula i wat leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail , iwakken ad sɛun tudert !
44011019	Asmi gemmut Stifan , yekker uqehheṛ i gessemfaṛaqen inelmaden ɣer mkul amkan ; ṛuḥen armi ț-țamurt n Finisya , armi ț-țigzirt n Qubṛus ț-țemdint n Antyuc , țbecciṛen awal n Ṛebbi i wat Isṛail kan ;
44011020	lameɛna llan gar-asen kra n yergazen n tegzirt n Qubṛus akk-d kra nniḍen n temdint n Qiṛwan , usan-d ɣer temdint n Antyuc , țmeslayen i iyunaniyen , țbecciṛen-asen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan Sidna Ɛisa .
44011021	Tazmert n Sidi Ṛebbi tețțili yid-sen ; aṭas n yemdanen i gumnen beddlen tikli , tebɛen abrid n Sidna Ɛisa .
44011022	Mi gewweḍ lexbaṛ-agi ɣer tejmaɛt n watmaten n temdint n Lquds , ceggɛen Barnabas armi d Antyuc .
44011023	Mi gewweḍ , iwala ayen i texdem dinna ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi dɣa yeččuṛ d lfeṛḥ . Yenha-ten akk iwakken ad ṭṭfen seg wul di liman sɛan di Lmasiḥ .
44011024	Axaṭer Barnabas d argaz ixeddmen lxiṛ , iččuṛ d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen akk-d liman . S wakka , aṭas n yemdanen i d-yernan ɣer Sidna Ɛisa .
44011025	Barnabas iṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Sars iwakken ad inadi ɣef Caɛul .
44011026	Mi t-yufa , yewwi-t-id yid-es ɣer temdint n Antyuc . Di tejmaɛt-nni , sɛeddan aseggas kamel , xeddmen s tdukli , sselmaden aṭas n yemdanen . Di temdint n Antyuc ițțusemman inelmaden n Sidna Ɛisa tikkelt tamezwarut : « imasiḥiyen »
44011027	Deg ussan-nni , ṣubben-d kra n lenbiya si temdint n Lquds ɣer temdint n Antyuc .
44011028	Yiwen seg-sen isem-is Agabus , ikker icar-ed s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen belli a d-yeɣli laẓ d ameqqran di ddunit meṛṛa ; ț-țideț , laẓ-agi yeɣli-d di zzman n ugellid ameqqran : Kludyus
44011029	Inelmaden n temdint n Antyuc , msefhamen belli mkul yiwen deg-sen a d-ye ayen iwumi yezmer , iwakken ad ɛiwnen atmaten izedɣen di tmurt n Yahuda .
44011030	D ayen i xedmen ; ceggɛen Barnabas d Caɛul ad awin i imeqqranen n tejmaɛin n tmurt n Yahuda , ayen akk i d-jemɛen .
44012001	Di lweqt-nni , agellid Hiṛudus yebda ițqehhiṛ inelmaden n tejmaɛt yellan di temdint n Lquds .
44012002	Yefka lameṛ , ad nɣen s usekkin Yeɛqub gma-s n Yuḥenna .
44012003	Mi gwala d ayen isfeṛḥen at Isṛail , yerna daɣen isseḥbes Butṛus , deg wussan n lɛid n leslak .
44012004	Mi t-id-ṭṭfen , rran-t ɣer lḥebs . Isbedd-as taɛessast n ṛebɛa trebbaɛ n lɛeskeṛ , mkul tarbaɛt deg-s ṛebɛa iɛeskṛiwen ; yebɣa a t-icaṛeɛ zdat lɣaci meṛṛa , m'ara tɛeddi Tfaska n yizimer .
44012005	Butṛus ihi yella di lḥebs ; ma ț-țajmaɛt n watmaten tezga di tẓallit , tdeɛɛu fell-as ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
44012006	Iḍ-nni uqbel a t-icaṛeɛ Hiṛudus , Butṛus ițwarzen s snat snasel , yella iṭṭes ger sin iɛeskṛiwen , wiyaḍ ɛussen tawwurt n lḥebs .
44012007	Taswiɛt kan , ataya lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi iḍheṛ-as-d ; yiwet n tafat tameqqrant tceɛceɛ-ed di lḥebs-nni . Lmelk-nni yennul idis n Buṭrus , issendekwal-it-id yenna-yas : Ɣiwel Kker ! Imiren kan , qqeṛsent snasel-nni ɣlint-ed seg ifassen-is .
44012008	Lmelk-nni yenna-yas : Els-ed arkasen-ik tbeggseḍ ɣef yiman-ik ! Buṭrus ixdem akken i s-d-yenna , lmelk yenna-yas-d daɣen : Sburr-ed abeṛnus-ik tettebɛeḍ-iyi-d !
44012009	Butṛus ikker itbeɛ-it ; ur ifaq ara belli lmelk nni ț-țideț iḍheṛ-as-ed , inwa d aweḥḥi n Sidi Ṛebbi .
44012010	Ɛeddan zdat tɛessast tamezwarut , rnan tis snat , wwḍen ɣer tewwurt n wuzzal yessufuɣen ɣer temdint , teldi weḥd-es ; ffɣen ɛeddan deg yiwet n tezniqt , imiren lmelk yexfa ger wallen n Buṭrus .
44012011	Mi d-yufa iman-is di beṛṛa , ifaq belli ț-țideț , Sidi Ṛebbi iceggeɛ-d lmelk-is , isellek-it-id seg-ufus n Hiṛudus akk-d lbaṭel i bɣan a s-t xedmen wat Isṛail .
44012012	Mi gefhem lḥala i deg yella , ikker iṛuḥ ɣer wexxam n Meryem yemma-s n Yuḥenna iwumi qqaṛen daɣen Maṛqus , nnejmaɛen dinna waṭas n watmaten , deɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
44012013	Mi gesqeṛbeb di tewwurt n beṛṛa , tusa-d yiwet n tqeddact isem-is Rudya , tqeṛṛeb ɣer tewwurt aț-țesmeḥses ;
44012014	mi teɛqel taɣect n Buṭrus , di lfeṛḥ-nni i deg tella ur teldi ara tawwurt , tuzzel aț-țissiweḍ lexbaṛ belli Butṛus atan ibedd zdat tewwurt .
44012015	Nnan-as : Waqila iffeɣ-ikem leɛqel ! Lameɛna teṭṭef deg wayen i d tenna .
44012016	Nnan-as : Ahat d lexyal-is ihi ! Llan țemsteqsayen , ma d Butṛus mazal-it isqeṛbub-ed ; mi d-ldin tawwurt wehmen mi t-walan .
44012017	Buṭrus iwehha-yasen s ufus-is ad ssusmen , yeḥka-yasen amek i t-id issufeɣ Sidi Ṛebbi si lḥebs , yenna yasen : Sṣiwḍet lexbaṛ-agi i Yeɛqub d watmaten . Dɣa iṛuḥ ibeddel amkan .
44012018	Mi guli wass , lɛeskeṛ iɛussen Butṛus tqelqen , țmesteqsayen amek i geffeɣ si lḥebs , anwa i t-yessufɣen ?
44012019	Hiṛudus iceggeɛ a t-id-qellben , meɛna ur t-ufin ara . Yebḥet iɛessasen-nni , dɣa yefka lameṛ a ten-nɣen ; imiren iṛuḥ si tmurt n Yahuda ɣer tmurt n Qiṣarya , anda yesɛedda kra n wussan .
44012020	Hiṛudus yerfa ɣef yimezdaɣ n temdinin n Sur akk d Sidun , lameɛna nutni mcawaṛen , msefhamen akk-d Blastus yellan d lewkil-is ; dɣa ceggɛen wid ara s-issutren lehna , axaṭer tamurt-nsen tețɛic seg wayen i d-itekken si tmurt n ugellid Hiṛudus .
44012021	Yewweḍ-ed wass i deg ara d-yini Hiṛudus lxeṭba i lɣaci . Mi d-yewweḍ wass n temlilit , Hiṛudus yelsa llebsa n ugellid , yuli ɣer wemkan n lxeṭba ad immeslay i lɣaci .
44012022	Mi gebda ameslay , lɣaci meṛṛa qqaṛen : D Ṛebbi i d-ițmeslayen , mačči d amdan !
44012023	Imiren kan lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi yesseɣli-d fell-as aṭan , axaṭer yeqbel a t-ḥesben yemdanen am Ṛebbi , iceggeɛ-as-d abeɛɛuc i t-yeččan dɣa yemmut ;
44012024	ma d awal n Sidi Ṛebbi țbecciṛen-t , yewweḍ ɣer mkul amkan .
44012025	Barnabas akk-d Caɛul mi fukken lxedma-nsen di temdint n Lquds uɣalen , wwin yid-sen Yuḥenna ițusemman Maṛqus .
44013001	Di tejmaɛt n temdint n Antyuc llan lenbiya d lɛulama : Barnabas , Semɛun ițusemman Aberkan , Lusyus n temdint n Qiṛwan , Manahen i d-ițțuṛebban d Hiṛudus Antibas , akk-d Caɛul .
44013002	Yiwen wass atmaten nnejmaɛen iwakken ad uẓummen yerna ad dɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi . Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yenna-yasen-d : Swejdet-iyi-d Barnabas akk-d Caɛul i ccɣel-nni iwumi i ten-heggaɣ .
44013003	Mi ẓummen , ssersen ifassen-nsen fell-asen , rnan dɛan ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , dɣa ǧǧan-ten ad ṛuḥen .
44013004	Barnabas akk-d Caɛul i gceggeɛ Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , ṣubben ɣer lmeṛṣa n Slukya ; syenna rekben di lbabuṛ ɣer tegzirt n Qubṛus .
44013005	Mi wwḍen ɣer lmeṛṣa n Salamin , beccṛen awal n Ṛebbi di leǧwameɛ n wat Isṛail ; Yuḥenna yella yid-sen , yețɛawan-iten .
44013006	Mi zegren akk tigzirt-nni , wwḍen ɣer temdint n Bafus , mlalen-d d yiwen useḥḥar n wat Isṛail i gețțarran iman-is d nnbi , isem-is Barɛisa .
44013007	Ițțili ɣer lḥakem Serjyus Bulus , yellan d argaz ifehmen . Serjyus iceggeɛ ɣer Barnabas d Caɛul , axaṭer yebɣa ad isel i wawal n Ṛebbi .
44013008	Meɛna Ilimas aseḥḥar-nni , ( akkagi i gețwaṭerjem yisem-is s tyunanit ) yețxaṣam-iten , yețnadi ad isseɛṛeq abrid n liman i lḥakem-nni .
44013009	Caɛul , ițusemman daɣen Bulus , yeččuṛen d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , issers allen-is fell-as ,
44013010	yenna-yas : A mmi-s n Cciṭan yeččuṛen ț-țiḥila d lexdeɛ ! Ay aɛdaw n lḥeqq ! Ar melmi ara tesseɛwajeḍ akka iberdan n lewqam n Sidi Ṛebbi ?
44013011	Tura atan ufus n Sidi Ṛebbi fell-ak : aț-țedderɣleḍ , aț-țeqqimeḍ kra n wussan ur tețwaliḍ ara tafat n yiṭij . Imiren kan , Ilimas idderɣel , yeɣli-d fell-as ṭṭlam ; yeqqim isferfud , ițnadi anwa ara s-yeṭṭfen afus .
44013012	Lḥakem-nni mi gwala ayen yedṛan , itɛeǧǧeb deg wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi dɣa yumen .
44013013	Bulus d yeṛfiqen-is zegren tigzirt n Qubṛus , wwḍen ɣer temdint n Bafus , syenna rekben di lbabuṛ iwakken ad zegren ɣer temdint n Barja yellan di tmurt n Bamfilya .
44013014	Mi wwḍen ɣer dinna , Yuḥenna yeǧǧa-ten yuɣal ɣer temdint n Lquds ; ma d nutni kemmlen abrid-nsen si temdint n Barja , wwḍen ɣer temdint n Antyuc yellan di tmurt n Bisidya . Deg wass n westeɛfu , i deg țnejmaɛen wat Isṛail di leǧwameɛ , kecmen ɣer lǧameɛ , qqimen .
44013015	Mi d-ɣṛan tiktabin n Sidna Musa akk-d Lenbiya , imeqqranen n lǧameɛ nni nnan-asen : Ay atmaten , ma yella tesɛam kra n wawal s wayes ara tenhum lɣaci-agi , ɛeddit-ed aț-țhedṛem !
44013016	Bulus ikker-ed , iwehha-yasen s ufus-is , yenna : Ay at Isṛail ! A kunwi iḍuɛen Ṛebbi , ḥesset-iyi-d !
44013017	Sidi Ṛebbi Illu n wat Isṛail , yextaṛ lejdud-nneɣ , yessefti-ten mi llan di tmurt n Maṣeṛ , yessufeɣ iten id s tezmert-is tameqqrant .
44013018	Iḥuder-iten azal n ṛebɛin iseggasen deg unezṛuf n Sinay .
44013019	Issenger sebɛa leǧnas di tmurt n Kenɛan , iwakken a sen-ye tamurt-nni i lejdud-nneɣ .
44013020	
44013021	Dɣa ssutren i Sidi Ṛebbi a sen-d-ye agellid ; yefka-yasen-d Caɛul , mmi-s n Qic n wedrum n Benyamin , yuɣal d agellid fell-asen azal n ṛebɛin iseggasen .
44013022	Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yekkes leḥkum i Caɛul , yerra Sidna Dawed d agellid deg umkan-is . Atan wayen i d-yenna fell-as : Ufiɣ Dawed , mmi-s n Yassa , d argaz yellan akken i t-yebɣa wul-iw , ara ixedmen lebɣi-w .
44013023	Tura , si dderya n Sidna Dawed i d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi amsellek i wat Isṛail akken i t-id-yewɛed ; amsellek-agi d Ɛisa .
44013024	Uqbel a d-yas Sidna Ɛisa , Yeḥya ibecceṛ țțuba s weɣḍas n waman i wegdud n wat Isṛail .
44013025	Uqbel a t-ṭṭfen ɣer lḥebs iwakken a t-nɣen , Yeḥya yenna i lɣaci : Nekk ur lliɣ ara d win akken i tɣilem ; lameɛna a d-yas deffir-i yiwen , ur uklaleɣ ara ad fsiɣ ula d lexyuḍ n warkasen-is .
44013026	Ay atmaten ! Ay arraw n Sidna Ibṛahim d wid akk ițțaggaden Sidi Ṛebbi ! I nukkni iwumi i d-ițțuceggeɛ wawal-agi n leslak .
44013027	Axaṭer imezdaɣ n temdint n Lquds d imeqqranen-nsen , ur fhimen ara d acu-t Ɛisa-agi , ur fhimen ara daɣen imeslayen i d qqaṛen di tektabt n lenbiya mkul ass n westeɛfu ; lameɛna xedmen akken i gura di tira iqedsen , mi ḥekmen ɣef Sidna Ɛisa s lmut .
44013028	Ɣas akken ur s-d-ufin ara sebba s wayes ara ḥekmen fell-as s lmut , ssutren i Bilaṭus ad ye lameṛ iwakken a t-semmṛen ɣef lluḥ .
44013029	Mi gedṛa wayen akk ițwaketben fell-as , ṣubben-t-id seg umidag , rran-t ɣer uẓekka .
44013030	Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi isseḥya-t-id si ger lmegtin .
44013031	Acḥal wussan nețța ițbeggin-ed iman-is i widak-nni i d-yeddan yid-es si tmurt n Jlili armi ț-țamdint n Lquds ; tura d nutni i d inigan-is zdat n yemdanen meṛṛa .
44013032	Daymi , nukkni tura newwi yawen-d lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ . Ayen akken i gewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi i lejdud nneɣ , yedṛa-d tura gar-aneɣ , nukkni yellan d dderya-nsen .
44013033	Mi d-yesseḥya Sidi Ṛebbi Sidna Ɛisa , akken yura di Sabur wis-sin : Kečč d mmi , d nekk i k-id-yefkan ɣer ddunit ass-a !
44013034	Ihi Sidi Ṛebbi isseḥya-t-id si ger lmegtin iwakken ur irekku ara , akken i t-id-yenna di tira iqedsen : Si Dawed ara wen-d-fkeɣ lbaṛakat yeṣfan , lbaṛakat n tideț i wen weɛdeɣ .
44013035	Yura daɣen : Ur tețțaǧǧaḍ ara ameɛzuz-ik ad yerku zdaxel n uẓekka .
44013036	Di lweqt-is , Sidna Dawed yexdem lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi ; mi gemmut , yețwamḍel ger lejdud-is , tura lǧețța-s terka deg uẓekka .
44013037	Lameɛna win i d-yesseḥya Sidi Ṛebbi , ur t-yeǧǧi ara ad yerku deg uẓekka .
44013038	Ilaq ihi aț-țeẓrem ay atmaten , belli s yisem-is i wen-d-ițțubecceṛ leɛfu n ddnubat .
44013039	Kra n win yumnen yis , a s-țwasemmḥen ddnubat-is , ddnubat-nni i ɣef ur tezmirem ara aț-țețwasemmḥem s ccariɛa n Musa .
44013040	Ihi ɣuṛ-wat a d-yedṛu yid-wen wayen i d-nnan lenbiya :
44013041	Ay imdanen yeččuṛen d zzux , iḥeqqṛen wiyaḍ , dehcet , tenfum syagi ! Axaṭer atan ad xedmeɣ di zzman-nwen yiwet lḥaǧa s wayes ur tețțamnem ara ma yella ḥkan awen-ț-id .
44013042	Mi kkren ad ffɣen si lǧameɛ , ḥellelen Bulus d Barnabas iwakken a d-uɣalen ass n ssebt i d-iteddun a d-rnun a d-mmeslayen ɣef wannect nni .
44013043	Mi mfaṛaqen , aṭas n wat Isṛail akk-d wid i gkecmen ddin-nsen , tebɛen-d Bulus akk-d Barnabas i sen-ițmeslayen , i ten-inehhun ad ṭṭfen di ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi .
44013044	Ass n westeɛfu nniḍen , qṛib tamdint meṛṛa i d-innejmaɛen iwakken ad slen i wawal n Ṛebbi .
44013045	Mi walan annect-nni n lɣaci , at Isṛail usmen , sseɛwajen s rregmat ayen i d-yeqqaṛ Bulus .
44013046	Lameɛna Bulus d Barnabas nnan-asen ɛinani : I kunwi d imezwura iwumi ilaq ad ițțubecceṛ wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi , meɛna imi ur t-teqbilem ara , tḥusbem iman-nwen ur tuklalem ara tudert n dayem , ihi a nezzi ɣer wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail .
44013047	Axaṭer atah wayen i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi : Sbeddeɣ-k aț-țiliḍ ț-țafat i leǧnas , aț-țessiwḍeḍ leslak alamma d ixfawen n ddunit .
44013048	Leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail feṛḥen mi slan s wannect-agi , țḥemmiden awal n Ṛebbi ; wid akk yețțuheggan i tudert n dayem umnen .
44013049	Awal n Sidi Ṛebbi yețțubecceṛ di mkul amkan n tmurt .
44013050	Lameɛna at Isṛail sḥeṛcen imeqqranen n temdint akk-d d kra n tilawin timeṛkantiyin i gettabaɛen ddin n wat Isṛail ; sekkren-d aqehheṛ ameqqran ɣef Bulus d Barnabas , ssufɣen-ten si tmurt-nsen .
44013051	Bulus d Barnabas zwin aɣebbaṛ n iḍaṛṛen-nsen , ṛuḥen ɣer temdint n Ikunyum .
44013052	Ma d inelmaden ijdiden , ččuṛen d lfeṛḥ akk-d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
44014001	Di temdint n Ikunyum , Bulus d Barnabas kecmen daɣen ɣer lǧameɛ n wat Isṛail , beccṛen-asen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ; aṭas n Iyunaniyen akk-d wat Isṛail i gumnen .
44014002	Lameɛna kra seg wat Isṛail i gugin ad amnen , ɛemṛen-asen aqeṛṛuy i wat n leǧnas niḍen sḥeṛcen-ten iwakken ad xedmen lbaṭel i watmaten ;
44014003	ɣas akken , Bulus d Barnabas ɛeṭṭlen di temdint n Ikunyum , țeklen ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi , heddṛen s țțbut mbla akukru ɣef ṛṛeḥma-ines . Sidi Ṛebbi ițbeggin-ed s lbeṛhanat d licaṛat belli ayen țbecciṛen ț-țideț .
44014004	Imezdaɣ n temdint mfaṛaqen : kra deg-sen tebɛen at Isṛail , ma d wiyaḍ ddan d ṛṛusul .
44014005	At Isṛail d iyunaniyen akk-d imeqqranen-nsen ɛewlen ad xedmen lbaṭel i ṛṛusul , bɣan a ten nɣen s weṛjam .
44014006	Bulus d Barnabas mi ten-yewweḍ lexbaṛ , beddlen amkan ṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n Likawnya , ɣer temdinin n Listra , d Derba akk-d tudrin i sent-id yezzin ;
44014007	țbecciṛen dinna lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi .
44014008	Di temdint n Listra , yella yiwen wergaz ikerfen seg-wasmi i d-ilul , di leɛmeṛ-is ur yelḥi .
44014009	Yesmeḥsis i wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Bulus ; Bulus iṛeṣṣa allen-is fell-as , iwala belli yesɛa liman iwakken ad yeḥlu ,
44014010	dɣa yenṭeq ɣur-es s ṣṣut ɛlayen yenna-yas : Ekker , bedd ɣef yidaṛṛen-ik ! Imiren kan yekker , yebda ițeddu .
44014011	Mi walan ayen yexdem Bulus , lɣaci n tmurt n Likawnya țɛeggiḍen s tutlayt nsen : Iṛebbiten ṣubben-d ɣuṛ-nneɣ s ṣṣifa n yemdanen !
44014012	Semman-as i Barnabas « SSus » , ma d Bulus « Hermas » axaṭer d nețța i d-ițmeslayen .
44014013	Lmuqeddem n lǧameɛ n SSus yellan ɣer tewwurt n temdint , yewwi-d izgaren akk-d ijeǧǧigen zdat tewwura n lǧameɛ ; yebɣa a ten-yezlu d asfel nețța d lɣaci i Bulus akk-d Barnabas .
44014014	Ṛṛusul mi slan s wannect nni cerrgen llebsa-nsen , uzzlen ɣer tlemmast n lɣaci , țɛeggiḍen :
44014015	Ay irgazen , acuɣeṛ i txeddmem akka ? Nukni d imdanen kan i nella am kunwi ! D lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wen-d newwi iwakken aț-țeṭṭixṛem i leɛbada n wayen ur nesɛi lmeɛna ; aț-tebɛem abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi , Bab n tudert i d-ixelqen igenni d lqaɛa , lebḥeṛ d wayen akk yellan deg-s .
44014016	Ɣas akken di zzmanat iɛeddan yeǧǧa imdanen n leǧnas meṛṛa ad tebɛen abrid i sen-yehwan ;
44014017	nețța yețbeggin-ed iman-is s lxiṛat i gxeddem : d nețța i wen-d-ițțaken ageffur ( lehwa ) , d nețța i wen-d ițțaken lɣellat di lweqt-nsent , d nețța daɣen i wen-d-ițakken tamɛict-nwen , ula d ulawen-nwen d nețța i ten issefṛaḥen .
44014018	Ɣas akken ṛṛusul nnan asen imeslayen-agi , s lḥif ameqqran i ḥebsen lɣaci-nni iwakken ur sen zellun ara asfel .
44014019	Dɣa usan-d kra seg wat Isṛail si temdinin n Antyuc akk-d Ikunyum , sekkren ccwal ger lɣaci , sḥeṛcen-ten ad ṛejmen Bulus iwakken a t-nɣen . Mi t-ṛejmen , zzuɣṛen-t ɣer beṛṛa n temdint , axaṭer ɣilen yemmut .
44014020	Lameɛna nnejmaɛen-d ɣuṛ-es inelmaden , ṭṭfen-as afus , yuɣal yekker yekcem ɣer temdint . Azekka-nni , nețța d Barnabas ṛuḥen ɣer temdint n Derba .
44014021	Mi beccṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ di temdint-nni n Derba , aṭas inelmaden i d-yernan ; dɣa uɣalen ɣer temdinin n Listra , Ikunyum d Antyuc
44014022	iwakken ad sǧehden ulawen n inelmaden . Nehhun-ten ad ṭṭfen di liman , qqaṛen-asen : S waṭas n leɛtab ara nekcem ɣer ddewla n Sidi Ṛebbi .
44014023	Sbedden imḍebbṛen di mkul tajmaɛt ; mi uẓamen , rnan dɛan ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , ǧǧan-ten seddaw leɛnaya n Sidi Ṛebbi s wayes umnen .
44014024	Zegren si tmurt n Bisidya , wwḍen-d ɣer tmurt n Bamfilya ,
44014025	beccṛen awal n Ṛebbi di temdint n Barja , imiren ṣubben-d ɣer temdint n Aṭalya .
44014026	Syenna rekben lbabuṛ , uɣalen ɣer temdint n Antyuc ansi i ten wekklen i Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef cceɣl-nni xedmen .
44014027	Mi wwḍen , snejmaɛen-d atmaten , ḥkan-asen ayen akk i gexdem Sidi Ṛebbi yis-sen , d wamek i d-wwin ɣer webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi at leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail .
44014028	Sɛeddan aṭas n wussan akk-d inelmaden .
44015001	Kra n yemdanen i d-yusan si tmurt n Yahuda ɣer temdint n Antyuc , bɣan ad slemden atmaten , qqaṛen-asen : Ma yella ur teḍhiṛem ara am akken i d-tenna ccariɛa n Musa , ur tezmirem ara aț-țețwasellkem
44015002	Bulus d Barnabas ur qbilen ara ayen i sselmaden yergazen-agi i d-yusan si tmurt n Yahuda dɣa yekker lxilaf ameqqran gar-asen . Ceggɛen Bulus d Barnabas akk-d kra seg-sen , ad alin ɣer ṛṛusul akk-d imeqqranen yellan di temdint n Lquds iwakken ad msefhamen ɣef temsalt-agi n ṭṭhaṛa .
44015003	Tajmaɛt-nni n watmaten n temdint n Antyuc tɛawen-iten deg wayen ara ḥwiǧen deg webrid-nsen ; dɣa ṛuḥen , ɛeddan si tmura n Finisya akk-d Samarya , ḥekkun di mkul amkan amek umnen s Sidna Ɛisa leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail . Mi slan i wannect-agi , feṛḥen aṭas watmaten .
44015004	Mi wwḍen ɣer temdint n Lquds , tesṭerḥeb yis-sen tejmaɛt n watmaten d ṛṛusul akk-d imeqqranen n tejmaɛt ; nutni ḥkan-asen lecɣal imeqqranen i gexdem Sidi Ṛebbi gar-asen .
44015005	Kra si terbaɛt n ifariziyen i gumnen s Sidna Ɛisa kkren-d nnan : Ilaq aț-ḍehhṛem i watmaten ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail yerna a sen tamṛem ad tebɛen ccariɛa n Sidna Musa .
44015006	Dɣa ṛṛusul akk-d imeqqranen n tejmaɛt nnejmaɛen iwakken ad frun taluft-agi .
44015007	Mi ketṛen deg wawal , ikker-ed Butṛus yenna-yasen : Ay atmaten , teẓram belli Sidi Ṛebbi yextaṛ-iyi-d gar-awen seg wass amezwaru iwakken ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail , akken ad amnen .
44015008	Sidi Ṛebbi yessnen ulawen , ibeggen-ed belli iqbel-iten imi i sen-yefka Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen am akken i ɣ-t-id-yefka i nukkni ;
44015009	ur yexdim ara lxilaf gar-aɣ d yid-sen , imi i gṣeffa ulawen-nsen s liman ula d nutni .
44015010	Ihi tura acuɣeṛ i tețjeṛṛibem Sidi Ṛebbi , mi tebɣam aț-țessersem ɣef tuyat n wid yumnen azaglu ur nerfid nukkni , ur rfiden lejdud-nneɣ ;
44015011	lameɛna s ṛṛeḥma n Sidna Ɛisa swayes i numen , i nețțusellek am akken țțusellken ula d nutni .
44015012	Akken ma llan di tejmaɛt ssusmen , dɣa smeḥsisen i Bulus d Barnabas i d-iḥekkun licaṛat d leɛǧayeb i gexdem Sidi Ṛebbi yis-sen ger leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail .
44015013	Mi kfan ameslay , inṭeq Yeɛqub yenna-d : Ay atmaten , ḥesset-iyi-d : Tura
44015014	Semɛun yeḥka-d amek i d-ixtaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi si ger leǧnas si tazwara , lumma ara yeddun s yisem-is .
44015015	S wakka , yedṛa-d wayen i d nnan lenbiya am akken yura di tektabt iqedsen :
44015016	Deg ussan-nni , a d-uɣaleɣ a s-ɛiwdeɣ lebni i wexxam n Dawed ; axxam-nni yeɣlin , ad sbeddeɣ leḥyuḍ-is ihudden ,
44015017	iwakken ayen i d-iqqimen seg imdanen akk-d leǧnas meṛṛa i geslan s yisem-iw , ad nadin ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi .
44015018	Akka i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi i gxeddmen lecɣal-agi i d-ihegga si zik .
44015019	Ihi a wen-d-iniɣ : lemmer ufiɣ , ur nrennu ara aɣilif i wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail , i gumnen s Sidna Ɛisa .
44015020	Lameɛna a sen-naru tabṛaț iwakken ad ṭṭixṛen ɣef wučči n weksum immezlen i lmeṣnuɛat d ssadat . Ad ttixṛen daɣen i yir tikli , i wučči n lmal immurḍsen akk-d tissit n idammen ,
44015021	axaṭer si zzman aqdim llan yemdanen ițbecciṛen ccariɛa n Musa di mkul tamdint , yerna mkul ass n westeɛfu qqaṛen taktabt-is di leǧwameɛ n wat Isṛail .
44015022	Ihi ṛṛusul , imeqqranen n tejmaɛt akk-d watmaten meṛṛa walan belli d ṛṛay yelhan ma yella xtaṛen-d kra n watmaten si gar-asen , iwakken a ten-ceggɛen ɣer temdint n Antyuc nutni d Bulus akk-d Barnabas . Xtaṛen Yuda , ițusemman Barsaba akk-d Silas ; d irgazen i țqadaṛen watmaten .
44015023	Fkan asen tabṛaț i deg uran : Ay atmaten ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail , i gzedɣen di temdinin n Antyuc , n Surya akk-d Silisya , țsellimen-d fell-awen ṛṛusul akk-d imeqqranen n tejmaɛt akk-d watmaten n temdint n Lquds .
44015024	Nesla belli kra n watmaten-nneɣ ṛuḥen-d ɣuṛ-wen mbla ma nefka-yasen lameṛ , rwin-kkun s yimeslayen-nsen , skecmen-awen ccekk .
44015025	Tura mi nemcawaṛ , neqsed s yiwen ṛṛay a d-nextiṛ kra n watmaten , ara wen-nceggeɛ nutni d watmaten nneɣ eɛzizen Bulus d Barnabas ;
44015026	nutni i gsebblen tudert nsen ɣef yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
44015027	Nceggeɛ-awen ihi Yuda akk-d Silas ara wen-d-yeṣṣiwḍen s yiman nsen imeslayen-agi :
44015028	Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen akk-d nukkni , nwala d ayen yelhan m'ur nḥettem ara fell-awen ayen nniḍen sennig wayen ilaqen ,
44015029	yeɛni aț-țettixṛem i wučči n iseflawen yemmezlen i lmeṣnuɛat , i tissit n idammen , i lmal yemmuṛdsen d zzna . D ayen yelhan ma tḥudrem iman-nwen ɣef wannect-agi . Qqimet di lehna .
44015030	Imiren wid-nni yețwaxtaṛen ǧǧan atmaten di lehna , ṛuḥen ɣer temdint n Antyuc . Dinna jemɛen-d atmaten , fkan-asen tabṛaț-nni .
44015031	Mi ț-id-ɣṛan , feṛḥen aṭas s lewṣayat yellan deg-s d yimeslayen i ten-isǧehden .
44015032	Yuda d Silas iwumi yețțune a d-țxebbiṛen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , nhan atmaten-nni , sǧehden-ten s waṭas n yimeslayen .
44015033	Mi sɛeddan dinna kra n wussan , serrḥen-asen watmaten ad uɣalen di lehna ɣer wid i ten-id-iceggɛen ;
44015034	ma d Silas iɛǧeb-as lḥal yebɣa ad yernu kra n wussan dinna .
44015035	Bulus d Barnabas qqimen di temdint-agi n Antyuc , sselmaden , țbecciṛen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi nutni d waṭas n watmaten nniḍen .
44015036	Mi ɛeddan kra n wussan , Bulus yenna-yas i Barnabas : Eyya a nuɣal a nesteqsi ɣef watmaten yellan di temdinin anda nbecceṛ awal n Sidi Ṛebbi , iwakken a nẓer amek i țilin .
44015037	Barnabas yebɣa ad yawi yid-sen Yuḥenna ițusemman Maṛqus ,
44015038	lameɛna Bulus ur yeqbil ara ad awin yid-sen win akken i ten yeǧǧan di tmurt n Bamfilya , yerna ur ten-iɛawen ara di ccɣel-nsen .
44015039	Ikker yiwen lxilaf gar-asen armi mfaṛaqen . Barnabas yewwi yid-es Maṛqus , rekben di lbabuṛ ɣer tegzirt n Qubṛus ,
44015040	ma d Bulus yextaṛ Silas ad iddu yid-es . Atmaten n tejmaɛt wekklen-t i ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi , dɣa iṛuḥ .
44015041	Yekka-d nețța d Silas si tmura n Surya akk-d Silisya , isseǧhad tijmaɛin n watmaten .
44016001	Bulus d Silas wwḍen ɣer temdinin n Derba d Listra ; ufan dinna yiwen unelmad isem-is Timuti , baba-s d ayunani , ma d yemma-s n wat Isṛail , nețțat daɣen tumen s Lmasiḥ .
44016002	Atmaten yellan di temdint n Listra ț-țemdint n Ikunyum ḥemmlen-t yerna țcekkiṛen-t .
44016003	Bulus yebɣa ad yawi yid-es Timuti , daymi i s-iḍehheṛ ɣef ddemma n wat Isṛail yellan dinna , axaṭer ẓran akk belli baba-s d ayunani .
44016004	Di yal tamdint i deg ɛeddan , țxebbiṛen atmaten s lewṣayat yellan di tebṛaț i d-fkan ṛṛusul d imeqqranen n temdint n Lquds , nehhun-ten ad tebɛen lewṣayat-agi .
44016005	Tijmaɛin n watmaten țimɣuṛent di liman , leḥsab n widak yumnen s Lmasiḥ yețnerni kull ass .
44016006	Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ur sen-iserreḥ ara ad ṛuḥen ad beccṛen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi di tmurt n Asya , dɣa zegren timura n Frijya d Galasya .
44016007	Mi wwḍen ɣer tmurt n Misya , ɛeṛden ad ṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n Bitinya ; lameɛna Ṛṛuḥ n Sidna Ɛisa ur sen-iserreḥ ara daɣen ad ṛuḥen ɣer dinna .
44016008	Ɛeddan si tmurt n Misya , ṣubben ɣer temdint n Truwas .
44016009	Deg iḍ , iweḥḥa-yas-ed Ṛebbi i Bulus , iwala yiwen umezdaɣ n Masidunya ibedd-ed ɣuṛ-es , ițḥellil-it ad iɛeddi ɣuṛ-sen ɣer tmurt n Masidunya a ten-iɛiwen .
44016010	Mbeɛd ayen i s-d-iweḥḥa Sidi Ṛebbi i Bulus , nennuda amek ara nṛuḥ ɣer tmurt n Masidunya , axaṭer nefhem belli d Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-d yessawlen iwakken a nbecceṛ Lexbeṛ n lxiṛ di tmurt-nni .
44016011	Mi nerkeb di lbabuṛ si temdint n Truwas , nṛuḥ qbala ɣer tegzirt n Samutras . Azekka-nni nkemmel ɣer temdint n Nabulis .
44016012	Syenna nṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Filibus , illan țamdint tamezwarut n Masidunya i gesteɛmeṛ Ṛuman ; nesɛedda kra n wussan dinna .
44016013	Ass n westeɛfu , neffeɣ si temdint nṛuḥ ɣer rrif n wasif , nɣil a naf amkan anda țnejmaɛen i tẓallit . Nufa dinna kra n tilawin nnejmaɛent , neqqim iwakken a nemmeslay yid sent .
44016014	Tella dinna yiwet n tmeṭṭut isem-is Lidya n temdint n Tyatir , teznuzu lkețțan azeggaɣ ɣlayen ; ț-țameṭṭut iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi . M'akken i d-tesmeḥsis , Sidi Ṛebbi yeldi-yas ul-is iwakken aț-țerr ddehn is ɣer wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Bulus .
44016015	Mi tețwaɣḍes deg waman nețțat d wat wexxam-is , teɛṛeḍ-aɣ , tenna-d : ma twalam umneɣ seg ul-iw s Sidi Ṛebbi , eyyaw aț-țesɛeddim kra n wussan deg wexxam-iw . Dɣa teḥreṣ-aɣ iwakken a nekcem .
44016016	Yiwen wass mi nteddu ɣer wemkan-nni n tẓallit , temmuger-aɣ-d yiwet n tqeddact ițwamelken , ț - țaderwict , tețțawi-d aṭas n lfayda i yemɛellmen i ɣef txeddem .
44016017	Tettabaɛ-aɣ-d nekk d Bulus , tețɛeggiḍ teqqaṛ : Imdanen-agi d iqeddacen n Ṛebbi ɛlayen , țbecciṛen-awen abrid n leslak .
44016018	Acḥal n wussan nețțat tettabaɛ deg-nneɣ , yuɣal Bulus yeɛya deg-s , yezzi ɣuṛ-es , yenna i uṛuḥani i ț-imelken : Umṛeɣ-k s yisem n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , effeɣ si tmeṭṭut-agi ! Imiren kan , yeffeɣ-it uṛuḥani-nni .
44016019	Imɛellmen-is mi walan dayen ur sen-d-tețțawi ara lfayda , ṭṭfen Bulus d Silas , zzuɣṛen-ten ɣer wezniq n temdint anda țnejmaɛen lɣaci zdat lḥukkam .
44016020	Wwin-ten ɣer lḥakem n tmurt n Ṛuman nnan : Imdanen-agi-nni n wat Isṛail cewwlen tamdint-nneɣ .
44016021	Sselmaden lɛaddat ur nezmir a tent-neqbel neɣ a tent-netbeɛ nukkni yellan d iṛumaniyen .
44016022	Lɣaci kkren-d ɣuṛ-sen s leɛyaḍ , dɣa lḥukkam n Ṛuman umṛen a sen-cerrgen llebsa-nsen , a ten wwten s ujelkkaḍ ( s ucelliṭ ) .
44016023	Mi sen-sseṛwan tiyitiwin , rran-ten ɣer lḥebs , umṛen i wɛessas n lḥebs a ten-iɛas akken ilaq .
44016024	Akken i t-yewweḍ lameṛ-agi , aɛessas-nni yerra-ten ɣer lḥebs yellan seddaw tmurt , yerna yurez-asen idaṛṛen s snasel .
44016025	Di țnaṣfa n yiḍ , Bulus d Silas deɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , cennun , țḥemmiden-t , imeḥbas nniḍen smeḥsisen-asen .
44016026	Taswiɛt kan , tezlez tmurt armi yenhezz ula d lsas n lḥebs ; imiren kan ldint tewwura n lḥebs , snasel icudden imeḥbas meṛṛa qelɛent-ed .
44016027	Aɛessas-nni ikker-ed ; mi gwala tiwwura n lḥebs ldint , ijbed-ed asekkin is iwakken ad ineɣ iman-is ; yenwa rewlen imeḥbas-nni .
44016028	Lameɛna Bulus iɛeggeḍ s lǧehd is , yenna-yas : Eḥbes ! Ḥader aț-țenɣeḍ iman ik ! Aql-aɣ akk dagi .
44016029	Dɣa aɛessas yumeṛ a s-d-ceɛlen tafat , yuzzel ɣer daxel n lḥebs ; yeɣli ɣer idaṛṛen n Bulus d Silas , ițergigi .
44016030	Yessufeɣ-iten-id si lḥebs , yenna yasen : A ssyad-i , d acu i glaqen a t xedmeɣ iwakken ad țțusellkeɣ ?
44016031	Rran-as : Amen s Sidna Ɛisa , aț-țețusellkeḍ s kečč s wat wexxam-ik .
44016032	Dɣa beccṛen-as awal n Sidi Ṛebbi i nețța d wat wexxam-is meṛṛa .
44016033	Deg yiḍ-nni kan , aɛessas-nni yewwi-ten anda ara sen-yessired lejruḥ-nsen ; imiren-nni sɣeḍsen-t deg aman s nețța s twacult-is .
44016034	Yuɣal nețța d Bulus d Silas ɣer wexxam-is , issers-asen-d ad ččen . Yefṛeḥ aṭas nețța d wat wexxam-is imi umnen s Sidi Ṛebbi .
44016035	Akken yuli wass , lḥukkam n Ṛuman ceggɛen wid ara yinin i uɛessas n lḥebs : Serreḥ-asen i imeḥbas-nni !
44016036	Aɛessas ixebbeṛ Bulus yenna yas : Lḥukkam umṛen-iyi-d a wen serrḥeɣ ; tura tzemrem aț-țefɣem , ṛuḥet di lehna !
44016037	Lameɛna Bulus yenna-yas : Amek ! Ewten-aɣ zdat medden s ujelkaḍ ( s ucelliḍ ) mbla ma nɛedda di ccṛeɛ nukni yellan d iṛumaniyen yerna skecmen-aɣ ɣer lḥebs tura bɣan a ɣ-ssufɣen s tuffra ? Awah ! A d-asen nutni s yiman-nsen a ɣ-serrḥen .
44016038	Wid-nni i d-ițțuceggɛen ssawḍen imeslayen-nni i lḥukkam n Ṛuman . Lḥukkam ikcem-iten lxuf mi slan belli Bulus d Silas d iṛumaniyen i llan . Usan-d ḍelben deg-sen ssmaḥ , serrḥen-asen si lḥebs ,
44016039	ḥellelen-ten ad ffɣen si temdint .
44016040	Mi ffɣen si lḥebs , Bulus d Silas ṛuḥen ɣer wexxam n Lidya , anda nnejmaɛen d watmaten , nhan-ten , imiren ṛuḥen .
44017001	Bulus d Silas ɛeddan si temdinin n Anfibulis akk-d Abulunis , wwḍen ɣer temdint n Tiṣalunik anda sɛan wat Isṛail lǧameɛ .
44017002	Akken yennum , Bulus yekcem ɣer lǧameɛ ; tlata smanat , mkul ass n westeɛfu , ițmeslay yid-sen ɣef wawal n Ṛebbi .
44017003	Issefham-asen , ițbeggin-asen-d di Tira belli Lmasiḥ ilaq ad yeɛteb yerna a d-yeḥyu si ger lmegtin , iqqaṛ-asen : Ɛisa-yagi ɣef i wen-d-hedṛeɣ , d nețța i d Lmasiḥ .
44017004	Kra deg-sen umnen ; aṭas n iyunaniyen iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi d waṭas n tilawin n laṣel i geddan daɣen d Bulus akk-d Silas .
44017005	Lameɛna at Isṛail usmen , dɣa wwin yid-sen kra n yergazen n diri ițmenṭaṛen deg iberdan , sekkren ccwal ger lɣaci , cewwlen tamdint meṛṛa , zeḍmen ɣer wexxam n Yazun , qellben ɣef Bulus d Silas iwakken a ten-caṛɛen zdat lɣaci .
44017006	Imi ur ten-ufin ara , zuɣṛen-d Yazun d kra n watmaten ɣer lḥukkam n temdint , bdan țɛeggiḍen : D irgazen-agi i gerwin ddunit , atan usan-d armi d ɣuṛ-nneɣ ,
44017007	Yazun isṭerḥeb yis-sen . Xulfen lumuṛ n Qayṣer , qqaṛen belli yella ugellid nniḍen ițusemman Ɛisa .
44017008	S yimeslayen-agi , sḥeṛcen lɣaci akk-d lḥakem n temdint .
44017009	Ugin a sen-serrḥen i Yazun d watmaten nniḍen armi xellṣen lexṭiya .
44017010	Mi d-yewweḍ yiḍ , atmaten srewlen Bulus d Silas ɣer temdint n Biri . Mi wwḍen , kecmen ɣer lǧameɛ n wat Isṛail .
44017011	Lɣaci n dinna sṭerḥben yis-sen axiṛ n wid n temdint n Tiṣalunik , qeblen awal n Ṛebbi s wul yeṣfan . Kull ass țnadin di Tira iqedsen iwakken ad walin ma yella ț-țideț , yella di tira wayen i d-qqaṛen .
44017012	Aṭas seg-sen i gumnen ; ger iyunaniyen , aṭas n tilawin n laṣel d yergazen nniḍen i gumnen daɣen .
44017013	Lameɛna mi slan wat Isṛail n Tiṣalunik belli Bulus ițbecciṛ awal n Ṛebbi di temdint n Biri , uzzlen-d ad rwin lɣaci , a ten-cewwlen .
44017014	Dɣa atmaten srewlen imiren Bulus ɣer lǧiha n lebḥeṛ , ma d Silas d Timuti qqimen di temdint n Biri .
44017015	Widak yewwin Bulus , ssawḍen-t armi ț-țamdint n Atinya , syenna uɣalen-d ɣer temdint n Biri . Iweṣṣa-ten Bulus ad inin i Silas d Timuti , ur țɛeṭṭilen ara a t-leḥqen .
44017016	M'akken i gețṛaǧu Silas akk-d Timuti di temdint n Atinya , Bulus iɣaḍ-it lḥal mi gwala tamdint-nni teččuṛ d lmeṣnuɛat i țɛebbiden imezdaɣ-is .
44017017	Di lǧameɛ , yebda ițmeslay d wat Isṛail akk-d iyunaniyen iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi . Ițmeslay daɣen akk-d wid i d-ițemlili kull ass di tejmaɛt n temdint .
44017018	Kra n lɛulama yețfelsifen , yeɛni wid ițekkin di tejmaɛt n Ibikur akk-d Stuwis , bdan țmeslayen yid-es . Kra qqaṛen : D acu i gebɣa ad yini bu lehduṛ agi ? Wiyaḍ qqaṛen : Waqila yețbecciṛ iṛebbiten ibeṛṛaniyen ! Axaṭer Bulus yella ițbecciṛ-asen ɣef Sidna Ɛisa akk-d ḥeggu n lmegtin .
44017019	Dɣa wwin-t yid-sen ɣeryiwen wemkan n ccṛeɛ n temdint-nni iwumi qqaṛen Laryufaj , nnan-as : Nezmer a nẓer d acu-t uselmed agi ajdid i ɣ-d-tewwiḍ ?
44017020	Axaṭer nesla-yak tețmeslayeḍ-ed ɣef temsalin yessewhamen . Nebɣa a nissin lmeɛna-nsent .
44017021	Imezdaɣ n temdint n Atinya akk-d ibeṛṛaniyen i gzedɣen dinna , ḥemmlen ad sɛeddin lweqt-nsen anagar deg umeslay d usmeḥses i lexbaṛat ijdiden i d-ițeffɣen .
44017022	Bulus ibedd di tlemmast n Laryufaj yenna : Ay irgazen n temdint n Atinya , ẓriɣ-kkun tẓewṛem yerna tettabaɛem ddin di mkul ḥaǧa ;
44017023	axaṭer ḥewwseɣ akk tamdint-nwen , walaɣ lmeṣnuɛat akk i tɛebdem ; ufiɣ daɣen yiwen n idebder anda yura : « I Ṛebbi-nni ur nețwassen ara . » Win akken i tɛebbdem mbla ma tessnem-t , d nețța i wen-țbecciṛeɣ .
44017024	D nețța i d-ixelqen ddunit d wayen yellan deg-s , d Bab igenwan d lqaɛa , ur yezdiɣ ara di leǧwameɛ i bnan ifassen n yemdanen .
44017025	Ur yeḥwaǧ ara ad xedmen fell-as yemdanen am akken yella wayen i t-ixuṣṣen , nețța i d-ițțaken i yemdanen meṛṛa tudert , ṛṛuḥ d wayen akk yellan .
44017026	Seg yiwen wemdan i d-ixleq akk leǧnas , yeɛmeṛ yis-sen ddunit ; yefka-yasen lewqat i tudert-nsen akk-d tilisa i tmura-nsen .
44017027	Sidi Ṛebbi ixdem annect-agi meṛṛa iwakken ad nadin fell-as ; ahat a t-afen s usferfed , nețța ur nebɛid ara ɣef mkul yiwen deg-nneɣ .
44017028	Yis i nesɛa tudert , i nteddu , i nețțili ; d ayen i d-nnan daɣen kra seg imedyazen-nwen : « ula d nukkni , darraw-is ! »
44017029	Ihi imi nella d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi , ur ilaq ara a nɣil belli Ṛebbi yețțemcabi ɣer lmeṣnuɛ n ddheb , neɣ n lfeṭṭa , neɣ n wezṛu yețwanejṛen s ufus ț-țmusni n wemdan .
44017030	Sidi Ṛebbi isemmeḥ-asen i yemdanen asmi akken ur t-ssinen ara ; tura issawel-asen-d akk di mkul amkan iwakken ad beddlen tikli , a d-uɣalen ɣuṛ-es .
44017031	Axaṭer yextaṛ ass i deg ara iḥaseb imdanen s lḥeqq , s wemdan i gextaṛ yerna yefka-yaɣ-d akk țțbut mi t-id-isseḥya si ger lmegtin .
44017032	Mi slan iheddeṛ-ed ɣef ḥeggu n lmegtin , kra țmesxiṛen , wiyaḍ qqaṛen-as : A k-nḥess ɣef wannect-agi tikkelt nniḍen . . .
44017033	Imiren , Bulus iṛuḥ yeǧǧa-ten .
44017034	Ɣas akken aṭas i gețmesxiṛen , llan kra deg-sen umnen , ddan yid-es . Yella gar-asen Dunisus i gțekkin di tejmaɛt n Laryufaj , yiwet n tmeṭṭut isem-is Damaris akk-d wiyaḍ .
44018001	Bulus iṛuḥ si temdint n Atinya ɣer temdint n Kurintus .
44018002	Yufa dinna yiwen wergaz n wat Isṛail , isem-is Akilas , laṣel-is n tmurt n Tqenṭert ; yewweḍ-ed deg ussan-nni kan si tmurt n Selyan nețța ț-țmeṭṭut-is Brisila , axaṭer Qayṣer Kludyus yumeṛ i wat Isṛail meṛṛa ad ffɣen si temdint n Ṛuma .
44018003	Imi Brisila d Akilas xeddmen iqiḍunen am Bulus , yeqqim ɣuṛ-sen xeddmen s tdukli .
44018004	Mkul ass n westeɛfu , Bulus ițmeslay di lǧameɛ , ițbecciṛ i wat Isṛail akk-d iyunaniyen ttabaɛen ddin n wat Isṛail , iwakken ad amnen .
44018005	Mi d-usan Silas d Timuti si tmurt n Masidunya , Bulus yuɣal ițțelhay kan d ubecceṛ n wawal n Ṛebbi , ițbeggin ed i wat Isṛail belli d Ɛisa i d Lmasiḥ .
44018006	Imi i t-xulfen yerna regmen-t , Bulus yezwi icuḍaḍ-is , yenna-yasen : Cfut ur teqbilem ara leslak-agi , ddnub i yirawen-nwen ! Nekk ayen i yi-d-yewwi lḥal xedmeɣ-t . Ihi sya d asawen , ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer wat leǧnas ur nelli ara seg warraw n wat Isṛail .
44018007	Mi d-iffeɣ syenna , ikcem ɣer wexxam n Tit Justus , i gellan d amdan iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi ; axxam-is yezga-d tama n lǧameɛ n wat Isṛail .
44018008	Krisbus , ameqqran n lǧameɛ yumen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ nețța d wat wexxam-is meṛṛa ; aṭas n wat kurintus daɣen i gumnen mi slan s wayen i d-yenna Bulus , dɣa țwaɣeḍsen deg waman .
44018009	Yiwen n yiḍ , Sidi Ṛebbi iweḥḥa yas-ed di targit i Bulus yenna-yas-d : Ur țțaggad ara , kemmel ehdeṛ ur țsusum ara !
44018010	Axaṭer aqli-n yid-ek ! Yiwen ur izmir ad issers afus-is fell-ak iwakken a k-yexdem cceṛ , axaṭer aṭas i gellan d ayla-w di temdint-agi .
44018011	Bulus yeqqim aseggas d sețța wagguren ger wat kurintus , isselmad asen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi .
44018012	Di lweqt-nni i deg yella Galyun d lḥakem ɣef tmurt n Lakaya , at Isṛail msefhamen , ddukklen ɣef Bulus , wwin-t ɣer wexxam n ccṛeɛ , nnan :
44018013	Argaz-agi issamaṛ lɣaci ad ɛebden Ṛebbi s webrid ixulfen ccariɛa .
44018014	Mi gekker Bulus ad ihdeṛ , inṭeq Galyun yenna i wat Isṛail : Lemmer d lbaṭel neɣ d ayen n diri i gexdem , zemreɣ a wen ḥesseɣ am akken yella di lqanun ay at Isṛail ;
44018015	meɛna imi d amjadel ɣef yimeslayen , ɣef yismawen akk-d ccariɛa n Musa , ayagi d ccɣel-nwen ! Ur bɣiɣ ara ad ḥekmeɣ ɣef wannect-a .
44018016	Imiren issufeɣ-iten-id syenna .
44018017	Dɣa lɣaci mmɣen ɣef Sustin , ameqqran n lǧameɛ n wat Isṛail , ewten-t zdat wexxam n ccṛeɛ , Galyun ur s-tewqiɛ ara lmeɛna .
44018018	Bulus yerna aṭas n wussan di temdint n Kurintus ; syenna yeǧǧa atmaten di lehna , yerkeb lbabuṛ ɣer tmurt n Surya ; Brisila d Akilas ddan yid-es . Uqbel ad iṛuḥ si lmeṛṣa n temdint n Senkriya , iseṭṭel aqeṛṛuy-is axaṭer yefka lemɛahda i Sidi Ṛebbi .
44018019	Mi wwḍen ɣer temdint n Ifasus , mfaṛaqen : Bulus yeǧǧa iṛfiqen-is Akilas d Brisila , ma d nețța ikcem ɣer lǧameɛ n wat Isṛail , ițmeslay yid-sen .
44018020	Ḥellelen-t ad yernu kra wussan yid-sen , lameɛna ur yeqbil ara .
44018021	Yenna-yasen : A d-uɣaleɣ ɣuṛ-wen ma yebɣa Ṛebbi .
44018022	Yerkeb di lbabuṛ si temdint n Ifasus ɣer temdint n Qiṣarya ; syenna iṛuḥ a d-iẓer tajmaɛt n watmaten yellan di temdint n Lquds ; imiren iṣubb ɣer temdint n Antyuc .
44018023	Mi gesɛedda kra n wussan di temdint n Antyuc , yuɣal yeṭṭef abrid ɣer tmura n Galasya d Frijya , di mkul amkan yesseǧhad inelmaden di Liman .
44018024	Di lweqt-nni , yiwen wergaz n wat Isṛail yețțusemman Abulus , ilulen di temdint n Skandriya yellan di tmurt n Maṣeṛ , yusa-d ɣer temdint n Ifasus ; yezweṛ deg wawal yerna yessen mliḥ tira iqedsen .
44018025	Argaz-agi yelmed abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi , iǧhed di liman , ițbecciṛ , yesselmad s teḥqiq ayen i d-qqaṛent tira iqedsen ɣef Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , ɣas akken d aɣḍas n Yeḥya kan i gessen .
44018026	Yebda ițmeslay ɛinani di lǧameɛ n wat Isṛail . Akilas d Brisila mi s-slan wwin-t yid-sen , sfehmen-as tideț n webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi akken tella .
44018027	Imi i gebɣa Abulus ad iɛeddi ɣer tmurt n Akaya , atmaten kksen-as akukru , uran tabṛaț i inelmaden n temdint n Kurintus iwakken ad stṛeḥben yis . Mi gewweḍ ɣer dinna , s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi iɛawen aṭas widak yumnen ;
44018028	
44019001	axaṭer yețṛuẓu ɛinani awal n lecyux n wat Isṛail zdat lɣaci meṛṛa ; yerna ițbeggin-ed s tira iqedsen belli d Ɛisa i d Lmasiḥ .
44019002	Yers-ed fell-awen Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen asmi i tumnem ? Rran-as : Leɛmeṛ nesli s Ṛṛuḥ-agi iqedsen .
44019003	Yenna-yasen : Anwa aɣḍas i-s-tețwaɣeḍsem ihi ? Rran-as : S weɣḍas n Yeḥya .
44019004	Bulus yenna-yasen : Yeḥya yesseɣḍes wid akk iqeblen ad beddlen tikli , yeqqaṛ i wegdud ad amnen s win ara d-yasen deffir-es , yeɛni s Sidna Ɛisa .
44019005	Mi slan i yimeslayen-agi , țwaɣeḍsen s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa .
44019006	Akken yessers Bulus ifassen-is fell-asen , ikcem-iten Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , bdan heddṛen s tutlayin ur nețwassen ara , yerna țcaren-d ayen i sen-d-yusan s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
44019007	Imdanen-agi ad ilin di tnac yid-sen .
44019008	Dɣa Bulus ikcem ɣer lǧameɛ n wat Isṛail . Azal n tlata wagguren ițmeslay yid-sen , ițqenniɛ-iten iwakken ad amnen s wayen yeɛnan tagelda n Sidi Ṛebbi .
44019009	Lameɛna kra deg-sen yeqquṛ wul-nsen ugin ad amnen , rnan kkaten deg webrid n Sidna Ɛisa zdat lɣaci . Mi gwala annect-agi , Bulus iṭṭaxeṛ-asen , yewwi yid-es inelmaden , isselmad-iten kull ass deg wexxam n yiwen wergaz isem-is Tiranus .
44019010	Yeqqim dinna sin iseggasen armi imezdaɣ meṛṛa n tmurt n Asya , ama d at Isṛail ama d iyunaniyen , slan i wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi .
44019011	Sidi Ṛebbi ixeddem lbeṛhanat imeqqranen s ifassen n Bulus ;
44019012	lɣaci wwḍen armi srusun ɣef yimuḍan ula ț-țimucwaṛin neɣ iceṭṭiḍen yennulen Bulus , dɣa imuḍan ḥellun , wid akk yețțumelken țeffɣen ten leǧnun .
44019013	Kra iseḥḥaren n wat Isṛail , ileḥḥun seg wemkan ɣer wayeḍ , ɛerden ad ssuffɣen leǧnun seg wid yețwamelken , qqaṛen-asen : S yisem n Sidna Ɛisa , win akken i gețbecciṛ Bulus , effɣet seg-es !
44019014	Widak ixeddmen annect-agi llan di sebɛa yid-sen , d arraw n Ciba yellan d yiwen si lmuqedmin imeqqranen n at Isṛail .
44019015	Lǧen-nni yerra-yasen-d : Ɛisa ssneɣ-t , ssneɣ daɣen anwa i d Bulus , ma d kunwi d acu-kkun ?
44019016	Argaz-nni i gezdeɣ lǧen , izḍem fell-asen yekkat-iten armi rewlen seg wexxam d iɛeryanen , yerna jerḥen .
44019017	At Isṛail akk-d iyunaniyen meṛṛa izedɣen tamdint n Ifasus slan s wayagi , ikcem-iten meṛṛa lxuf , ḥemmden isem n Sidna Ɛisa .
44019018	Aṭas seg wid i gumnen , usan-d ad qiṛṛen zdat wiyaḍ , ḥkan-d ayen xedmen .
44019019	Aṭas seg wid yellan xeddmen ssḥur , wwin-d tiktabin-nsen s wayes xeddmen ssḥur , sseṛɣen-tent zdat medden . Ufan belli azal n xemsin alef n twiztin i d ssuma-nsent .
44019020	S wakka i gewweḍ wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣer mkul amkan , ițnerni s tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi .
44019021	Mi gɛedda wayagi akk , Bulus yeqsed ad iṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Lquds , ad iɛeddi si tmura n Masidunya akk-d Akaya ; ixemmem deg iman-is yenna : « M'ara awḍeɣ ɣer dinna , ilaq-iyi daɣen ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer temdint n Ṛuma . »
44019022	Iceggeɛ ɣer tmurt n Masidunya sin seg imɛawnen-is , Timuti d Irastus ; ma d nețța yerna kra n wussan di tmurt n Asya .
44019023	Di lweqt-nni , ɣef ddemma n webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi ikker ccwal d ameqqran di temdint n Ifasus .
44019024	Yella yiwen uḥeddad isem-is Dimitriyus , iṣenneɛ s lfeṭṭa leǧwameɛ imecṭaḥ i d-yețmettilen lǧameɛ n Artimis , yesserbeḥ aṭas ixeddamen-is .
44019025	Isnejmaɛ-iten nutni d wid i gxeddmen lfeṭṭa am nețța , yenna yasen : Ay atmaten ! Teẓram belli rrbeḥ-nneɣ itekk-ed si lxedma-agi ;
44019026	teẓram yerna teslam daɣen ɣef Bulus-agi issamnen aṭas n lɣaci di temdint n Ifasus d waṭas n tmura n Asya . Yessamen lɣaci , yewwi-ten d webrid-is mi sen-iqqaṛ : « Iṛebbiten agi ițwaxedmen s ifassen n wemdan mačči d iṛebbiten n tideț » ;
44019027	ur nuggad ara kan aț-țeɣli ṣṣenɛa-nneɣ , lameɛna nuggad ad sseɣlin lqima i lǧameɛ n Artimis tameqqrant , taṛebbiț-nneɣ , qṛib a s-kksen lɛaḍima s wayes tețwaɛbed di tmurt n Asya d ddunit meṛṛa .
44019028	Mi slan i lehduṛ-agi , ikcem-iten wurrif , bdan țɛeggiḍen : Ț-țameqqrant Artimis , taṛebbiț n at Ifasus !
44019029	Tețțucewwel akk temdint , lɣaci uzzlen ɣer wexxam n umezgun , seddan yid-sen Gayus akk-d Aristark yellan d imasiduniyen , d iṛfiqen n Bulus , ițṣafaṛen yid-es .
44019030	Bulus yebɣa ad ikcem di tlemmast n lɣaci-nni , lameɛna ugin-as inelmaden .
44019031	Ula d kra n lḥukkam imeqqranen n tmurt n Asya yellan d imdukkal-is , ceggɛen ɣuṛ-es iwakken a t-ḥellelen ur ițṛuḥ ara ɣer wexxam n umezgun .
44019032	Anejmaɛ-nni yexṛeb , kra țɛeggiḍen akka , wiyaḍ akken nniḍen yerna aṭas deg-sen ur ẓrin ara acu i d sebba n unejmaɛ-nni .
44019033	At Isṛail sbedden-d Alixandru ad immeslay i lɣaci . Iwehha-yasen ufus-is ad ssusmen , iwakken a d-ihdeṛ ,
44019034	lameɛna mi t-ɛeqlen n wat Isṛail i gella , bdan țɛeggiḍen meṛṛa ɣef tikkelt azal n snat sswayeɛ : Ț-țameqqrant Artimis n at Ifasus !
44019035	Lameɛna lamin n temdint ihedden lɣaci , yenna-yasen : Ay at Ifasus , anwa ur neẓri ara belli tamdint n Ifasus ț-țaɛessast n lǧameɛ Artimis tameqqrant akk-d lmeṣnuɛ-ines i d-iɣlin seg igenni ?
44019036	Imi ayagi yiwen ur yezmir a t-yenkeṛ , ilaq ihi aț-țhennim iman-nwen , ur xeddmet acemma s tuffɣa n leɛqel !
44019037	Axaṭer irgazen-agi i d-tewwim ur ukiren lǧameɛ , ur rgimen Artimis taṛebbiț-nneɣ .
44019038	Ihi ma yella Dimitriyus d imdukkal-is sɛan sebba n uccetki ɣef yiwen , llan wussan n ccṛeɛ am akken llan lḥukkam ara ten-icaṛɛen , ad ṛuḥen ad ccetkin fell-asen .
44019039	Ma yella wayen nniḍen i tessuturem deg-sen , ad ḥekmen fell-asen deg unejmaɛ zdat lḥukkam .
44019040	Atan nuggad ad ccetkin fell-aɣ ɣef wayen yedṛan ass-agi imi ulac sebba ara ne ɣef wunejmaɛ-agi . Mi gfukk ameslay , iserreḥ i lɣaci , yefra unejmaɛ .
44019041	
44020001	Mi tethedden lḥala ifuk ccwal , imiren Bulus isnejmaɛ-ed inelmaden , yenha-ten , dɣa yeǧǧa-ten di lehna , yeṭṭef abrid ɣer tmurt n Masidunya .
44020002	Mi gezger tamurt n Masidunya , inehhu inelmaden , isseǧhad-iten s waṭas yimeslayen ; syenna ikemmel abrid ɣer tmurt n iyunaniyen anda yeqqim tlata wagguren .
44020003	Mi gțeddu ad yerkeb di lbabuṛ ɣer tmurt n Surya , yesla belli at Isṛail mcawaṛen iwakken a t-xedɛen ; dɣa ibeddel ṛṛay , iṭṭef abrid ad yuɣal ɣer tmurt n Masidunya .
44020004	Ddan yid-es : Subatir , mmi-s n Birus si temdint n Biri ; Arisṭark akk-d Skundus n temdint n Tiṣalunik , Gayus n temdint n Derba ; yedda daɣen Timuti , Tucik akk-d Trufim n tmurt n Asya .
44020005	Wigi zwaren ɣer zdat , eṛǧan-aɣ di temdint n Truwas ,
44020006	ma d nukni mi gɛedda Lɛid n weɣṛum mbla iɣes ( tamtunt ) , nerkeb lbabuṛ si temdint n Filibus ; xemsa wussan mbeɛd , nelḥeq-iten ɣer temdint n Truwas , anda nesɛedda sebɛa wussan .
44020007	Ass amezwaru n dduṛt nennejmaɛ a nebḍu aɣṛum iwakken ad nemekti Lmasiḥ , Bulus ițmeslay nețța d inelmaden . Imi ilaq ad iṛuḥ azekka-nni , ikemmel yid-sen awal armi i gneṣṣef yiḍ ;
44020008	taɣuṛfeț anda i nennejmaɛ , ceɛlent deg-s aṭas n teftilin .
44020009	Yiwen ilemẓi , isem-is Utikus , yella yeqqim ɣef yiri n ṭṭaq . Imi i gɛeṭṭel Bulus deg umeslay , Utikus yewwi-t nuddam ; yeɣli-d si leɛli wis tlata armi d lqaɛa , mi t-id-refden , ufan-t yemmut .
44020010	Bulus iṣubb-ed , yekna ɣuṛ-es , iddem-it ger iɣallen-is yenna : Ur țțaggadet ara , mazal deg-s taṛwiḥt , idder .
44020011	Syenna yuɣal yuli ar tɣuṛfeț , yebḍa aɣṛum ; mi ččan , ikemmel yid-sen ameslay armi d lefjer , dɣa iṛuḥ .
44020012	Ilemẓi-nni , wwin-t yedder ; dɣa yers-ed lfeṛḥ deg ulawen-nsen .
44020013	Nukni nerkeb lbabuṛ , nezwar Bulus ɣer temdint n Assus anda ara nemyagar yid-es axaṭer yebɣa ad iṛuḥ ɣef wuḍaṛ .
44020014	Mi i ɣ-d-yelḥeq di temdint n Assus , yerkeb yid-nneɣ di lbabuṛ ɣer temdint n Mitilan ;
44020015	syenna nkemmel abrid di lebḥeṛ , newweḍ azekka-nni zdat temdint n Ciyu , sellazekka-nni newweḍ ɣer temdint n Samus ; ass wis ṛebɛa newweḍ ɣer temdint n Mili .
44020016	Bulus yebɣa ad iɛeddi rrif n temdint n Ifasus mbla ma yeḥbes , iwakken ur isṛuḥuy ara lweqt di tmurt n Asya . Ițɣawal iwakken ma yella wamek , ad yaweḍ ɣer temdint n Lquds ass n lɛid n wass wis xemsin .
44020017	Si temdint n Mili , Bulus iceggeɛ ɣer imeqqranen n tejmaɛt n temdint n Ifasus iwakken a d-asen .
44020018	Mi d-wwḍen ɣuṛ-es , yenna-yasen : Tesnem si zik tikli-inu yid-wen seg wass amezwaru mi d-kecmeɣ tamurt n Asya .
44020019	Qedceɣ ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi s wannuz d imeṭṭawen ger iɣeblan d lemḥayen i yi-sseṛwan wat Isṛail .
44020020	Țbecciṛeɣ-awen rniɣ slemdeɣ kkun ama zdat lɣaci ama deg ixxamen-nwen , mbla ma ffreɣ acemma seg wayen i kkun-inefɛen .
44020021	Țbecciṛeɣ i wat Isṛail d iyunaniyen a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi yerna ad amnen s Sidna Ɛisa .
44020022	Tura , Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen iḥṛes-iyi ad ṭṭfeɣ abrid ɣer temdint n Lquds , ur ẓriɣ ara d acu ara yedṛun yid-i .
44020023	Si temdint ɣer tayeḍ , Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ițxebbiṛ-iyi-d belli țṛaǧun-iyi leḥbus d wussan n ddiq .
44020024	Lameɛna tudert-iw ur s-fkiɣ ara lqima , ur ț-ḥsibeɣ ara eɛzizet fell-i ; a wi yufan kan ad kemmleɣ tikli-inu akk-d Ṛebbi , ad xedmeɣ s lfeṛḥ ayen i yi-d-ifka Sidna Ɛisa , iwakken ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi .
44020025	Tura ẓriɣ belli ur tețțuɣalem ara aț-țeẓrem udem-iw , kunwi iwumi beccṛeɣ tageldit n Sidi Ṛebbi .
44020026	Daymi i wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ass-agi , ma yella yiwen yeffeɣ i webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi , ddnub i yiri-s ,
44020027	imi i wen-beccṛeɣ ayen akk yellan di leqsed n Sidi Ṛebbi , ur ffireɣ ula d acemma fell-awen .
44020028	Ɛasset ɣef yiman-nwen , ɛasset ɣef tqeḍɛit ɣef i kkun-iwekkel Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen . Ilit d iɛessasen ɣef tejmaɛt n Ṛebbi i d-iḥerr s idammen n Mmi-s .
44020029	Sriɣ belli m'ara ṛuḥeɣ , a d-kecmen gar-awen wuccanen iweɛṛen , wid ur nețsamaḥ ara i tqeḍɛit ;
44020030	a d-kkren daɣen gar-awen yergazen ara islemden leḥwayeǧ iɛewjen iwakken ad jebden inelmaden ɣuṛ-sen .
44020031	Ɣuṛ-wat ihi , ɛasset iman-nwen ! Mmektit-ed belli azal n tlata iseggasen , ur ḥbiseɣ am yiḍ am ass , nehhuɣ mkul yiwen seg-wen s imeṭṭawen .
44020032	Tura a kkun-ǧǧeɣ ger ifassen n Sidi Ṛebbi d ṛṛeḥma n wawal-is ; D nețța i gzemren a kkun-isseǧhed , a wen-d-ye lweṛt i kunwi akk yellan d ayla-s .
44020033	Ur ḍmiɛeɣ , ama d ddheb ama d idrimen neɣ leḥwayeǧ n yiwen deg-wen .
44020034	Teẓram s yiman-nwen belli s ifassen-iw i xeddmeɣ iwakken ad ɛeyyceɣ iman-iw akk-d wid yellan yid-i .
44020035	Di mkul lḥaǧa , ssekneɣ-awen amek ara txedmem iwakken aț-țɛiwnem wid ur nezmir ara . Mmektit-ed imeslayen n Sidna Ɛisa mi d-yenna : « Win ițseddiqen ițțubarek akteṛ n win iteṭṭfen ssadaqa » .
44020036	Mbeɛd imeslayen-agi , yuɣal ɣef tgecrar , yedɛa ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi yid-sen .
44020037	Sṭeṛḍqen s imeṭṭawen , ṭṭfen-t ger iɣallen-nsen , selmen akk fell-as ;
44020038	ḥeznen aṭas imi i sen-d-yenna : « Ur tețțuɣalem ara aț-țeẓrem udem-iw . » Syenna ddan yid-es armi d lbabuṛ .
44021001	Mi nemfaṛaq yid-sen , nerkeb lbabuṛ nṛuḥ qbala ɣer temdint n Kus , azekka-nni ɣer temdint n Ṛudus ; syenna nkemmel abrid ɣer temdint n Batara .
44021002	Mi nufa lbabuṛ ara izegren ɣer tmurt n Finisya , nerkeb deg-s nṛuḥ .
44021003	Mi nqubel tigzirt n Qubṛus , neǧǧa-ț ɣer tama tazelmaṭ , nkemmel abrid nneɣ ɣer tmurt n Surya , newweḍ ɣer temdint n Sur imi dinna ara yessers lbabuṛ sselɛa-s .
44021004	Mi nufa dinna inelmaden , nesɛedda sebɛa wussan yid-sen ; s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , inelmaden-nni nnan-as i Bulus : Ur țțali ara ɣer temdint n Lquds .
44021005	Mi ɛeddan wussan-nni , nekker a nṛuḥ , ddan yid-nneɣ armi neffeɣ i temdint , nutni ț-țilawin-nsen d warraw-nsen . Mi newweḍ ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ nuɣal ɣef tgecrar , nedɛa ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
44021006	Mi nemsalam yid-sen , nerkeb di lbabuṛ nṛuḥ ; nutni uɣalen ɣer yexxamen-nsen ,
44021007	nukkni nkemmel abrid s lbabuṛ si temdint n Sur armi ț-țamdint n Bṭulimays , neẓra dinna atmaten , neqqim yid-sen yiwen wass .
44021008	Azekka-nni nṛuḥ , newweḍ ɣer Qiṣarya ; nekcem ɣer wexxam n Filbas , win ițbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , nețța yellan d yiwen si sebɛa-nni ițwaxtaṛen di temdint n Lquds ; neqqim ɣuṛ-es .
44021009	Filbas-nni , ɣuṛ-es ṛebɛa yessi-s urɛad zwiǧent , țxebbiṛent-ed s wayen i tent-id-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
44021010	Ɛeddan kra n wussan , mi d yewweḍ yiwen seg watmaten isem-is Agabus , ula d nețța ițxebbiṛ-ed s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , iṣubb-ed si tmurt n Yahuda , yusa-d ɣuṛ-nneɣ .
