44021011	Iddem tabagust n Bulus , icudd idaṛṛen-is d ifassen-is , yenna : Atan wayen i d-iqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen : akka ara cidden wat Isṛail di temdint n Lquds bab n tbagust-agi , a t-sellmen ger ifassen n ikafriwen .
44021012	Mi nesla annect-agi , nukkni d watmaten n Sizari nḥellel Bulus iwakken ur ițțali ara ɣer temdint n Lquds .
44021013	Dɣa Bulus yerra-yasen : Acu i kkun-yuɣen mi tețrum akka armi tgezmem tasa-w ? Nekk qebleɣ mačči kan ad țwacuddeɣ , lameɛna qebleɣ ula d lmut di temdint n Lquds ɣef ddemma n yisem n Sidna Ɛisa .
44021014	Imi yugi ad yaɣ awal-nneɣ , ur nketteṛ ara fell-as lehduṛ nenna : A neǧǧ lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi ad yedṛu !
44021015	Akken ɛeddan wussan-nni , nhegga iman-nneɣ a nali ɣer temdint n Lquds .
44021016	Kra inelmaden n Qiṣarya ddan yid-nneɣ , wwin-aɣ ɣer yiwen wergaz wuɣuṛ ara nili , isem-is Mansun , n tegzirt n Qubṛus , d yiwen seg inelmaden imezwura .
44021017	Mi newweḍ ɣer temdint n Lquds , sṭreḥben yis-nneɣ watmaten s lfeṛḥ .
44021018	Azekka-nni , yedda yid-nneɣ Bulus ɣer wexxam n Yeɛqub anda nnejmaɛen imeqqranen n tejmaɛt .
44021019	Mi gsellem fell-asen , Bulus yeḥka-yasen ayen akk ixdem yis Sidi Ṛebbi ger leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail .
44021020	Mi slan ayagi , ḥemmden Sidi Ṛebbi nnan-as : Twalaḍ a gma-tneɣ acḥal n luluf n wat Isṛail i gumnen s Sidna Ɛisa yerna ṭṭfen akk di ccariɛa n Musa .
44021021	Atan slan wat Isṛail n temdint n Lquds belli tesselmadeḍ i wat Isṛail yellan ger leǧnas ad ǧǧen ccariɛa n Musa ; slan daɣen teqqaṛeḍ asen : « ur seḍhaṛet ara i warrac nwen , ur ttabaɛet ara leɛwayed i ɣ-d-ǧǧan lejdud » .
44021022	Acu ara nexdem tura ? Mbla ccekk ad slen belli tusiḍ-ed ;
44021023	ihi exdem ayen ara k-d-nini : llan gar-aneɣ ṛebɛa yergazen i gefkan lemɛahda i Sidi Ṛebbi ,
44021024	awi-ten yid-ek , ssizdeg iman-ik yid-sen , seṛṛef fell-asen iwakken ad seṭṭlen iqeṛṛay-nsen ; s wakkagi ad ẓren belli ayen akk slan fell-ak d lekdeb yerna ad walin mazal teṭṭfeḍ di ccariɛa n Musa .
44021025	Ma d at leǧnas i gumnen s Sidna Ɛisa , nura-yasen : Ad ṭṭixṛen i wučči n weksum ițțunefken d asfel i lmeṣnuɛat d ssadat , i tissit n idammen , i lmal yemmuṛḍsen akk-d yir tikli .
44021026	Azekka-nni , Bulus yewwi yid-es ṛebɛa yergazen-nni , issazdeg iman-is yid-sen , ikcem yid-sen ɣer wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen iwakken ad ixebbeṛ lmuqeddem ɣef lweqt i deg ara fakken wussan n uzizdeg-nsen , yeɛni ass i deg ara ye mkul yiwen seg-sen lweɛda-ines .
44021027	Mi qṛib ad fakken sebɛa wussan-nni n usizdeg , at Isṛail n tmurt n Asya walan Bulus di lǧameɛ iqedsen . Sekkren ccwal ger lɣaci dɣa ṭṭfen-t .
44021028	Bdan țɛeggiḍen : Ay at Isṛail , ɛiwnet-aɣ ! Atah wergaz-nni ițbecciṛen di mkul amkan i yemdanen meṛṛa . Iheddeṛ ayen n diri ɣef wegdud-nneɣ , ɣef wemkan-agi iqedsen , isselmad ayen ur teqbil ara ccariɛa-nneɣ , yewwi-d iyunaniyen ɣer lǧameɛ , issenǧes amkan-agi iqedsen !
44021029	Nnan-d ayagi axaṭer walan yid-es Trufim di temdint , ɣilen issekcem-it ɣer daxel n lǧameɛ iqedsen .
44021030	Ikker ccwal di temdint meṛṛa ; uzzlen-d yemdanen si mkul tama . Sṭfen Bulus , zzuɣṛen-t beṛṛa n wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen , sekkṛen-d tiwwura .
44021031	Mi țeddun lɣaci a t-nɣen , yewweḍ lexbaṛ ɣer lqebṭan n lɛeskeṛ n Ṛuman tamdint n Lquds meṛṛa tenhewwal .
44021032	Imiren kan yessawel i ifesyanen d lɛeskeṛ-nsen , uzzlen ɣer lɣaci . Mi walan lqebṭan akk-d lɛeskeṛ-is , ttaxṛen-as i Bulus .
44021033	Dɣa lqebṭan iqeṛṛeb ɣer Bulus , yefka lameṛ a t-ṭṭfen , a t-cudden s snat snasel ; dɣa isteqsa anwa-t , d acu i gexdem .
44021034	Meɛna lɣaci-nni , kra țɛeggiḍen akka , wiyaḍ akken nniḍen . Imi ur ifhim ara wayen i s-d-nnan si leɛyaḍ-nni , yumeṛ a t-awin ɣer lbeṛj .
44021035	Mi gewweḍ Bulus ɣer tseddaṛin , refden-t lɛeskeṛ iwakken a t-sellken si ger ifassen n lɣaci .
44021036	Axaṭer lɣaci-nni ttabaɛen-t țɛeggiḍen : « Enɣ-it ! Enɣ-it ! . . . »
44021037	Mi qṛib a t-skecmen ɣer zdaxel n lbeṛj , Bulus yenna-yas i lqebṭan : Semmeḥ-iyi , zemreɣ a k-d-iniɣ yiwen n wawal ? Yerra-yas : Tessneḍ aț-țhedṛeḍ tayunanit ?
44021038	Mačči d kečč i d amaṣri-nni i gsekkren ccwal ussan-agi iɛeddan , i gessufɣen yid-es ṛebɛa alaf n iqettalen ɣer lxali ?
44021039	Bulus yenna-yas : Xaṭi ! Nekk n wat Isṛail , luleɣ di temdint n Sars yellan di tmurt n Silisya ; d amezdaɣ n temdint mechuṛen . Di leɛnaya-k serreḥ-iyi ad hedṛeɣ i lɣaci-yagi .
44021040	Lqebṭan iɛemmed-as , dɣa Bulus ibedd ɣef tseddaṛin , iwehha i lɣaci s ufus-is , dɣa ssusmen . Yenṭeq s tɛibṛanit , yenna-yasen :
44022001	Ay atmaten akken ma tellam dagi meẓẓi meqqeṛ , semḥesset ed tura a wen-d-iniɣ ayen s wayes ara dafɛeɣ ɣef yiman-iw !
44022002	Mi slan iheddeṛ-asen-d s tɛibṛanit , ssusmen meṛṛa iwakken a s-slen . Dɣa yenna :
44022003	Nekk n wat Isṛail , ț-țideț luleɣ di temdint n Sars n tmurt n Silisya , lameɛna țțuṛebbaɣ di temdint-agi n Lquds . Lliɣ d anelmad n ccix Gamalyel s yiman-is ; yesselmed-iyi akken ilaq amek ara tebɛeɣ ccariɛa i d-ǧǧan lejdud-nneɣ . Ttabaɛeɣ seg ul-iw abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi , am kunwi ass-agi .
44022004	Qehṛeɣ armi d lmut wid ittabaɛen abrid-agi ajdid n Sidna Ɛisa , am yergazen am tlawin , țțawiɣ-ten-id ɣer leḥbus țwarzen .
44022005	Lmuqeddem ameqqran ț-țejmaɛt n lɛuqal atnan d inigan ma bɣan a d-cehden ; d nutni s yiman-nsen i yi-d-yefkan tibṛatin i watmaten n Dimecq , syenna a d-awiɣ țwarzen ɣer temdint n Lquds , wid akk yumnen s webrid-agi , iwakken a ten-ɛaqben .
44022006	Lliɣ tedduɣ deg webrid , qṛib ad awḍeɣ ɣer temdint n Dimecq . Aț-țili d țnaṣfa n wass , taswiɛt kan , yiwet n tafat tameqqrant tewwet-ed seg igenni , tețfeǧǧiǧ , tezzi-yi-d .
44022007	Ɣliɣ ɣer lqaɛa , sliɣ i yiwen n ṣṣut i yi-d-iqqaṛen : Caɛul , a Caɛul , acuɣeṛ i yi tețqehhiṛeḍ ?
44022008	Nniɣ-as : Anwa-k , a Sidi ? Yenna-yi-d : Nekk d Ɛisa Anaṣari , win akken i tețqehhiṛeḍ .
44022009	Wid yellan yid-i walan tafat-nni , lameɛna ur slin ara i ṣṣut i yi-d iheddṛen , dɣa nniɣ : Acu i tebɣiḍ a t-xedmeɣ a Sidi ?
44022010	Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yi-d : Ekker , ṛuḥ ɣer Dimecq , dinna ara k-d-inin ayen akk ilaqen a t-txedmeḍ .
44022011	Imi iyi-tesderɣel tafat-nni s ufeǧǧeǧ-ines , d imdukkal-iw i yi ṭṭfen afus armi wwḍeɣ ɣer Dimecq .
44022012	Yella dinna yiwen wergaz isem-is Ananyas , d argaz iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi , yerna yettabaɛ ccariɛa ; at Isṛail meṛṛa izedɣen di temdint n Dimecq țcehhiden fell-as s lxiṛ .
44022013	Yusa-d ɣuṛ-i yenna-yi-d : A Caɛul a gma , Sidi Ṛebbi yerra-yak-d iẓri ! Di teswiɛt-nni , yuɣal-iyi-d yezṛi , dɣa walaɣ-t .
44022014	Ananyas yenna-yi-d : Sidi Ṛebbi n lejdud-nneɣ yextaṛ ik aț-țissineḍ lebɣi-ines , aț-țwaliḍ s wallen-ik win yellan d Aḥeqqi , aț-țesleḍ imeslayen seg yimi-is .
44022015	axaṭer aț-țuɣaleḍ d inigi-ines zdat yemdanen meṛṛa ɣef wayen akk i teẓriḍ d wayen iwumi tesliḍ .
44022016	Tura d acu i tețṛaǧuḍ ? Kker aț-tețwaɣeḍseḍ , aț-țizdigeḍ seg ddnubat-ik m'ara tedɛuḍ s yisem-is .
44022017	Asmi uɣaleɣ ɣer temdint n Lquds , yiwen n wass lliɣ țẓallaɣ deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen , iweḥḥa-yi-d Sidi Ṛebbi ,
44022018	walaɣ Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yi-d : Ffeɣ s lemɣawla si temdint n Lquds , axaṭer ur qebblen ara ayen s wayes ara tcehdeḍ fell-i .
44022019	Nniɣ : A Sidi , ssnen-iyi ! Sran s yiman nsen belli ttabaɛeɣ si lǧameɛ ɣer wayeḍ wid yumnen yis-ek iwakken a ten-erreɣ ɣer lḥebs ad țewten .
44022020	Ula d Stifan inigi-inek , mi ssuzlen idammen-is lliɣ dinna , qebleɣ at nɣen yerna ɛusseɣ leḥwayeǧ n wid i t-yenɣan .
44022021	Dɣa Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-yi-d : Ṛuḥ a k-ceggɛeɣ ɣer lebɛid ɣer wat leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail .
44022022	Smeḥsisen-as armi d awal-agi imiren ɛeggḍen nnan : Ekkset si ddunit argaz am wagi ! Ur t-țaǧǧat ara ad yidir !
44022023	Țɛeggiḍen , ṭeggiṛen leḥwayeǧ nsen , ssafagen aɣebbaṛ ɣer igenni .
44022024	Lqebṭan n Ṛuman yumeṛ ad skecmen Bulus ɣer lbeṛj , a t-ewten s ujelkkaḍ ( s ucelliṭ ) iwakken ad issinen sebba ɣef wacu țɛeggiḍen fell-as .
44022025	Mi t-cudden s tɣeggadin , Bulus yenna i lqebṭan yellan dinna : Eɛni iserreḥ-awen lqanun aț țewtem aṛumani s ujelkkaḍ uqbel ad iɛeddi di ccṛeɛ ?
44022026	Ɣef yimeslayen-agi , lqebṭan-nni iṛuḥ ɣer wemdebbar ameqqran yenna-yas : Ḥader aț-țewteḍ argaz-agi ! D aṛumani !
44022027	Amdebbar ameqqran mi d-yusa ɣer Bulus , yenna-yas : Ț-țideț kečč d aṛumani ? Ih , d aṛumani i lliɣ !
44022028	Amdebbar ameqqran yenna : Nekk aṭas n yedrimen i fkiɣ iwakken ad uɣaleɣ d aṛumani . Bulus yerra-yas : Nekk , seg wasmi i d-luleɣ i rseɣ di lekwaɣeḍ d aṛumani .
44022029	Imiren widak i d-ikkren a t wten , ṭṭaxṛen-as . Lqebṭan ameqqran s yiman-is yuggad mi geẓra Bulus d aṛumani yerna icudd-it .
44022030	Azekka-nni , imi i gebɣa ad yissin wemdebbar ameqqran ɣef wacu i d-ccetkan fell-as wat Isṛail , iserreḥ i Bulus , yumeṛ i lmuqedmin akk-d usqamu n ccṛeɛ ad nnejmaɛen . Dɣa yewwi-d Bulus isbedd-it-id zdat-nsen .
44023002	Lmuqeddem ameqqran Ananyas yumeṛ i wid yellan zdat-es , a t-wten ɣer yimi .
44023003	Dɣa Bulus yenna : A k-id-iwet Ṛebbi a bu sin wudmawen ! Teqqimeḍ aț-țḥekmeḍ fell-i s ccariɛa , lameɛna kečč s yiman-ik txulfeḍ-ț imi tumreḍ ad iyi wten .
44023004	Widak yellan zdat-es nnan-as : Tregmeḍ lmuqeddem ameqqran n Ṛebbi !
44023005	Bulus yenna-yasen : Ur ẓriɣ ara ay atmaten belli d nețța i d lmuqeddem ameqqran , axaṭer yura di ccariɛa : Ur țekkes ara leqdeṛ ɣef lḥakem n wegdud-ik .
44023006	Bulus , mi gwala deg unejmaɛ-nni azgen deg-sen d isaduqiyen , azgen nniḍen d ifariziyen , iɛeggeḍ gar-asen , yenna : Ay atmaten , nekk d afarizi , d mmi-s n ufarizi ; ɣef ddemma n usirem i nesɛa di ḥeggu n lmegtin i d-beddeɣ ɣer ccṛeɛ ass-agi !
44023007	Mi d-yenna ayagi , ikker umennuɣ ger ifariziyen d isaduqiyen ; dɣa yebḍa unejmaɛ-nni .
44023008	Axaṭer isaduqiyen qqaṛen ulac ḥeggu , ulac lmalayekkat , ulac leṛwaḥ ; ma d ifariziyen , nutni umnen s wannect agi .
44023009	Ikker umennuɣ gar-asen ; kra n lɛulama n ccariɛa n tejmaɛt n ifariziyen kkren iwakken ad ḥudden Bulus , nnan : Ur nufi ara ayen n diri deg wemdan-agi . Yezmer lḥal ihdeṛ-as-d Ṛebbi neɣ lmelk !
44023010	Imi ițțimɣuṛ umenɣi , lqebṭan ameqqran yugad ad feṛqen Bulus d iftaten . Yumeṛ i lɛeskeṛ ad ṛuḥen a t-id-kksen si tlemmast-nsen , a t awin ɣer lbeṛj .
44023011	Azekka-nni deg iḍ , Sidna Ɛisa iḍheṛ-as-d i Bulus yenna-yas : Ur țțaggad ara , axaṭer am akken tcehdeḍ fell-i di temdint n Lquds , ilaq daɣen aț-țcehdeḍ fell-i di temdint n Ṛuma .
44023012	Mi guli wass , at Isṛail xedmen tiḥileț , msefhamen , gullen ur ččin ur swin alamma nɣan Bulus .
44023013	Wid akk i s-ixedmen taxazabit agi , llan akteṛ n ṛebɛin yid-sen .
44023014	Ṛuḥen ad ẓren imeqqranen d lmuqedmin akk-d lɛuqal nnan asen : Neggul s limin ameqqran , ur nečči acemma alamma nenɣa Bulus .
44023015	Tura ihi , init-as i lqebṭan ameqqran a t-id-yawi ɣer unejmaɛ n ccṛeɛ zdat-wen , amzun tebɣam a s-tɛiwdem abeḥḥet ; ma d nukkni , a nheggi iman-nneɣ a t-nenɣ uqbel a d-yaweḍ ɣer dagi .
44023016	Lameɛna mmi-s n weltma-s n Bulus imi gesla s tḥileț-nni i s heggan , iṛuḥ ɣer lbeṛj anda yețwaḥbes Bulus , a s-yessiweḍ lexbaṛ .
44023017	Bulus yessawel-ed i yiwen si lfesyanat , yenna-yas : Awi aqcic-agi ɣer lqebṭan ameqqran , axaṭer yesɛa awal ara s-yini .
44023018	Lfesyan yewwi yid-es aqcic-nni ɣer lqebṭan ameqqran , yenna-yas : Bulus ameḥbus-nni yessawel iyi-d iḥellel-iyi iwakken a k-d-awiɣ aqcic-agi , yesɛa awal ara k-d-yini .
44023019	Lqebṭan ameqqran iddem aqcic-nni seg ufus , ɛezlen iman-nsen ɣer ṭṭeṛf ; yenna-yas : D acu i tebɣiḍ a yi-t-id-tiniḍ ?
44023020	Yerra-yas : At Isṛail msefhamen a k-d ḍelben aț-țawiḍ Bulus azekka ɣer zdat unejmaɛ n ccṛeɛ , ufan-d sebba a s-ɛiwden abeḥḥet ɣef temsalt-is .
44023021	Ur țțaɣ ara awal-nsen , axaṭer akteṛ n ṛebɛin deg-sen ḥeyylen-as , gullen s limin ameqqran ur tețțen ur tessen alamma nɣan-t . Tura heggan iman-nsen , țṛaǧun anagar lebɣi-k .
44023022	Amdebbar ameqqran iserreḥ-as i weqcic-nni ad iṛuḥ , yenna-yas : Ur qqaṛ i yiwen belli tessaweḍed iyi-d lexbaṛ-agi .
44023023	Yuɣal issawel i sin lfesyanat , yenna-yasen : Heggit mitin iɛeskṛiwen , sebɛin yemnayen akk-d mitin iɛeskṛiwen i gteddun s imezṛagen , ad ṛuḥen ɣef tesɛa n yiḍ ɣer Qiṣarya .
44023024	Heggit daɣen iɛewdiwen iwakken ad ssiwḍen Bulus di laman ɣer lḥakem Filiks .
44023025	Yura tabṛaț-agi i lḥakem Filiks :
44023026	« Nekk Kludyus Lizyas i lḥakem ameqqran Filiks , sslam fell-ak !
44023027	At Isṛail ṭṭfen argaz-agi teddun a t-nɣen , mi wwḍeɣ nekk d lɛeskeṛ-iw , sellkeɣ-t-id si ger ifassen-nsen . Imi sliɣ laṣel-is d aṛumani ,
44023028	bɣiɣ ad ẓreɣ sebba ɣef wacu ccetkan fell-as ; wwiɣ-t ɣer zdat unejmaɛ nsen .
44023029	Ufiɣ belli sebba ɣef wacu i ccetkan fell-as , d ayen yeɛnan ccariɛa-nsen , lameɛna ur ixdim acemma yuklalen lmut neɣ lḥebs .
44023030	Mi sliɣ ḥeyylen-as wat Isṛail , ceggɛeɣ-t-in ɣuṛ-ek . Ma d ixṣimen-is nniɣ-asen a n-ṛuḥen ɣuṛ-ek ad ccetkin fell-as . Sǧiɣ-k di lehna !
44023031	Akken i ten-d-yewweḍ lameṛ , iɛeskṛiwen wwin Bulus deg yiḍ ɣer temdint n Antibatris .
44023032	Azekka-nni uɣalen ɣer lbeṛj , ǧǧan imnayen ad kemmlen abrid yid-es .
44023033	Mi wwḍen ɣer temdint n Qiṣarya , wwin Bulus ɣer lḥakem Filiks , rnan fkan-as tabṛaț-nni .
44023034	Lḥakem yeɣṛa tabṛaț-nni , isteqsa anta i ț-țamurt n Bulus . Mi gesla si tmurt n Silisya i gella ,
44023035	yenna-yas : M'ara d-awḍen yexṣimen iccetkan fell-ak , a k-sleɣ . Dɣa yumeṛ a t-ɛassen di lbeṛj n Hiṛudus . At Isṛail cccetkan ɣef Bulus
44024001	Mi ɛeddan xemsa wussan , lmuqeddem ameqqran Ananyas iṣubb-ed ɣer Qiṣarya nețța d kra n lɛuqal n wat Isṛail akk-d yiwen ubugaṭu isem-is Tertulus ; usan-d ɣer lḥakem ad ccetkin ɣef Bulus .
44024002	Mi d-ssawlen i Bulus , Tertulus yebda accetki fell-as s yimeslayen agi :
44024003	A lḥakem ameqqran ! S uḍebbaṛ-ik yelhan i d-yers lxiṛ d lehna ɣef tmurt-agi ! Ɣef wayagi , a Filiks ameqqran , ncekkeṛ-ik meṛṛa di mkul amkan ;
44024004	lameɛna iwakken ur k-nețɛeṭṭil ara aṭas , di leɛnaya-k semḥess-ed i kra n yimeslayen-agi ara k-d-nini :
44024005	Argaz-agi d țerka , iskker ccwal ger wat Isṛail n ddunit meṛṛa , d nețța i d ameqqran n tejmaɛt n inaṣariyen .
44024006	Yeɛṛed ad issenǧes ula d lǧameɛ iqedsen . Mi t-neṭṭef , nebɣa a neḥkem fell-as s ccariɛa-nneɣ ,
44024007	lameɛna yewweḍ-ed lqebṭan ameqqran Lizyas , ikkes-aɣ-t s ddreɛ si ger ifassen-nneɣ ,
44024008	yerna yumeṛ i wid iccetkan fell-as a d-asen ad ccetkin ɣuṛ-ek . Tura tzemreḍ s yiman-ik a t-tbeḥteḍ , iwakken aț-țesleḍ seg yimi-s wayen akk i ɣef neccetka fell-as .
44024009	At Isṛail yellan dinna , cehden akk belli akka i gella lḥal .
44024010	Mi i s-iwehha lḥakem i Bulus iwakken a d-ihdeṛ , Bulus yenna : Sriɣ aṭas iseggasen aya i telliḍ d lḥakem ɣef wegdud-agi ; ihi s laman ara d-qeddmeɣ tamsalt-iw zdat-ek .
44024011	Ur wwiḍen ara tnac wussan segmi uliɣ ɣer temdint n Lquds iwakken ad ɛebdeɣ Ṛebbi , tzemreḍ aț-țesteqsiḍ s yiman-ik .
44024012	Ulac win i yi-d-yufan deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen țemjadaleɣ nekk d walebɛaḍ , ulac daɣen win i yi-d-yufan di leǧwameɛ n wat Isṛail neɣ di temdint sekkreɣ ccwal ger lɣaci .
44024013	Ur zmiren ara a d-awin țțbut n wayen akka i ɣef d-ccetkan fell-i .
44024014	Zemreɣ a d-iniɣ zdat-ek a lḥakem Filiks : Ṛebbi i ɛebbdeɣ , d win akken ɛebden lejdud-iw ; s tideț umneɣ s webrid-agi ajdid i ɣef d-qqaṛen : « ixulef abrid-nsen » ; lameɛna umneɣ s wayen akk yuran di ccariɛa n Musa akk-d lenbiya .
44024015	Sɛiɣ asirem ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi — am akken i t-sɛan ula d nutni — belli a d-ḥyun yemdanen meṛṛa ama d iḥeqqiyen ama d wid ixedmen cceṛ .
44024016	Daymi țɛassaɣ iman-iw kull ass , iwakken ad sɛuɣ ul yeṣfan zdat Ṛebbi akk-d yemdanen .
44024017	Acḥal n iseggasen , nekk ɛaceɣ di lɣeṛba ; usiɣ-ed iwakken a d-awiɣ kra n yedrimen i d-jemɛeɣ d lemɛawna i igellilen n tmurt-iw yerna wwiɣ-ed daɣen lweɛdat i Sidi Ṛebbi .
44024018	Atan wamek i yi-d-ufan deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen : ufan-iyi-d akken kan i ssezdegeɣ iman-iw akken i d-tenna ccariɛa ; ur iyi-d zzin imdanen ur yelli ccwal
44024019	yerna d at Isṛail n tmurt n Asya i gellan dinna , d nutni i glaq ad bedden zdat-ek ma sɛan kra ɣef wacu ara ccetkin fell-i .
44024020	Neɣ m'ulac wid yellan dagi , a d-inin d acu ufan deg-i n diri mi beddeɣ zdat unejmaɛ-nsen n ccṛeɛ ;
44024021	anagar ma yella ɣef wawal-nni i d-nniɣ s leɛyaḍ gar-asen : « imi umneɣ s ḥeggu n lmegtin , i d-beddeɣ ass-agi ɣer ccṛeɛ zdat-wen ! »
44024022	Filiks yesnen akken ilaq abrid n Lmasiḥ , yenna-yasen : Uɣalet-ed m'ara d-yaweḍ lqebṭan Lizyas , imiren ad ẓreɣ tamsalt-nwen .
44024023	Yefka lameṛ i yiwen n lfesyan ad iɛass Bulus , lameɛna a s-yeǧǧ kra n țesriḥ , yerna ad yeǧǧ imdukkal-is a d-reSSun fell-ass .
44024024	Mi ɛeddan kra wussan , yusa-d Filiks akk-d țmeṭṭut-is Drusila , nețțat yellan n wat Isṛail , iceggeɛ a d-awin Bulus , iwakken a sen-d-ihdeṛ ɣef wayen yeɛnan liman di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
44024025	Mi gebda Bulus iheddeṛ ɣef lḥeqq , ɣef wamek ilaq ad iḥkem wemdan deg iman-is , ɣef wass n lḥisab i d-iteddun , Filiks ikcem-it lxuf , yenna-yas : Dayen , tzemreḍ aț-țṛuḥeḍ tura . M'ara d-stifeɣ , a k-d-ssiwleɣ .
44024026	Imi i geḍmeɛ di Bulus a s-ye idrimen , si teswiɛt ɣer tayeḍ issawal-as-ed iwakken ad ihdeṛ yid-es .
44024027	Ɛeddan sin n iseggasen ; dɣa Bursyus Fistus yuɣal d lḥakem deg wemkan n Filiks . Filiks-nni imi i gebɣa ad iɛǧeb i wat Isṛail , yeǧǧa Bulus di lḥebs .
44025001	Mi ɛeddan tlata wussan segmi yuɣal d lḥakem , Fistus yuli si temdint n Qiṣarya ɣer temdint n Lquds .
44025002	Dɣa lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d imeqqranen n wat Isṛail , ccetkan ɣuṛ-es ɣef Bulus .
44025003	Ssutren i Fistus a sen-ixdem lemziya , a sen-d-yawi Bulus ɣer temdint n Lquds , nutni heggan-as-d taxazabit iwakken a t-nɣen deg webrid .
44025004	Lameɛna Fistus yerra-yasen : Bulus ițwaḥbes di Qiṣarya , nekk s yiman-iw qṛib ad uɣaleɣ ɣer dinna .
44025005	Xtiṛet-ed si gar-awen wid ara yeddun yid-i ; ma yella kra n wayen n diri i gexdem wergaz-agi , ad ccetkin fell-as .
44025006	Fistus isɛedda azal n tmanya neɣ ɛecṛa wussan gar-asen , taggara yuɣal ɣer Qiṣarya . Azekka-nni , iṭṭef amkan ɣef wukersi n ccṛeɛ , iceggeɛ a d-awin Bulus .
44025007	Mi d-yewweḍ Bulus , at Isṛail i d-yusan si temdint n Lquds zzin-as , gren-d fell-as lbaṭel , lameɛna ur zmiren ara a d-tebten wayen i d qqaṛen .
44025008	Bulus iḥudd iman-is yenna : Ur ɛuṣaɣ ccariɛa n wat Isṛail , ur skecmeɣ leḥṛam ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen , ur xulfeɣ Qayṣer .
44025009	Imi gebɣa ad issefṛeḥ at Isṛail , Fistus yenna i Bulus : Tebɣiḍ aț-țaliḍ ɣer temdint n Lquds iwakken aț-țɛeddiḍ di ccṛeɛ dinna zdat-i ?
44025010	Lameɛna Bulus yenna : Ɣer ccṛeɛ n Qayṣer i beddeɣ , ɣuṛ-es ara țțucaṛɛeɣ . Ur xdimeɣ ula d acemma i gḍuṛṛen at Isṛail , akken teẓriḍ kečč s yiman-ik .
44025011	Ma yella xedmeɣ lbaṭel neɣ ayen yuklalen lmut , ur țțaggadeɣ ara ad mmteɣ . Lameɛna ma yella lecɣal-agi ɣef i d-ccetkan fell-i ur seḥḥan ara , yiwen ur izmir a yi-isellem ger ifassen-nsen . Ad rẓeɣ ccṛeɛ ɣer Qayṣer !
44025012	Mi gemcawaṛ Fistus nețța ț-țejmaɛt-nni n ccṛeɛ , yenna i Bulus : Tessutreḍ-ed ccṛeɛ n Qayṣer , aț-țețțucarɛeḍ zdat Qayṣer !
44025013	Mi ɛeddan kra wussan , agellid Aɣribas akk-d weltma-s Birinis , usan-d ɣer Qiṣarya ad sellmen ɣef lḥakem Fistus .
44025014	Imi qqimen dinna kra wussan , Fistus iḥka-yas i ugellid-nni taqsiṭ n Bulus , yenna-yas : Yella yiwen wergaz i geǧǧa Filiks dagi d ameḥbus .
44025015	Mi lliɣ di temdint n Lquds , ccetkan fell-as imeqqranen n lmuqedmin d lɛuqal n wat Isṛail ; ssutren-iyi-d ad ḥekmeɣ fell-as .
44025016	Nniɣ-asen mačči di lɛadda n iṛumaniyen ad ḥekmen ɣef wemdan uqbel a t-semqabalen nețța d wid i d-iccetkan fell-as , iwakken ad yaf abrid amek ara idafeɛ ɣef yiman-is .
44025017	Ihi usan-d ɣer dagi . Ur ɛeṭṭleɣ ara , azekka-nni fkiɣ lameṛ a d-awin argaz-nni iwakken a t-sɛeddiɣ di ccṛeɛ ;
44025018	wid iccetkan fell-as ur d-nnin acemma seg wayen țrajuɣ a t-id-inin .
44025019	Țemjadalen anagar ɣef ddin akk-d yiwen ițusemman Ɛisa . Ɛisa-agi yemmut , meɛna Bulus yeqqaṛ-ed yedder .
44025020	Imi ur ẓriɣ ara acu ara xedmeɣ di temsalt-agi , nniɣ-as i Bulus ma yebɣa ad iṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Lquds iwakken ad ițțucaṛeɛ dinna ,
44025021	lameɛna yerẓa ccṛeɛ iwakken ad ițțucaṛeɛ zdat Qayṣer ; dɣa fkiɣ lameṛ a t-ɛassen alamma d ass i deg ara t-ceggɛeɣ ɣer Qayṣer . S
44025022	Agellid Aɣribas yenna i Fistus : Bɣiɣ ula d nekk ad sleɣ i wergaz-agi . Fistus yenna-yas : Azekka a s-tesleḍ !
44025023	Azekka-nni agellid Aɣribas d weltma-s Birinis usan-d , cebbḥen-d iman-nsen , ṭṭfen amkan deg wexxam n ccṛeɛ nutni d lqebṭanat akk-d imeqqranen n temdint ; lḥakem Fistus yefka lameṛ a d-skecmen Bulus ,
44025024	dɣa yenna : Ay agellid Aɣribas akk-d kunwi i gḥedṛen dagi ! Argaz-agi , d win akken i ɣef d-ccetkan wat Isṛail ama di temdint n Lquds ama dagi ; țɛeggiḍen qqaṛen : « ilaq ad immet » !
44025025	Ma d nekk , idheṛ-iyi-d lḥal ur ixdim ula d acemma yuklalen lmut ; imi nețța s yiman-is yerẓa ccṛeɛ ɣer Qayṣer , qebleɣ a s-t-ceggɛeɣ .
44025026	Ur ufiɣ ula d yiwet n sebba iseḥḥan i ɣef ara ketbeɣ fell-as i Qayṣer ; daymi i t-id-sbeddeɣ zdat wen , ula zdat-ek ay agellid Aɣribas , iwakken m'ara t-beḥten ad yili wayen ara ketbeɣ fell-as .
44025027	Axaṭer walaɣ mačči d ṣṣwab ma ceggɛeɣ yiwen umeḥbus ɣer temdint n Ṛuma mbla ma fkiɣ-asen sebba s wayes i d ccetkan fell-as .
44026001	Aɣribas yenna i Bulus : — Atan ɣuṛ-ek wawal , tzemreḍ aț-țdafɛeḍ ɣef yiman-ik . Bulus yerfed afus-is iwakken ad idafeɛ ɣef yiman-is , yenna :
44026002	Feṛḥeɣ aṭas ay agellid Aɣribas imi zdat-ek ara ɛeddiɣ di ccṛeɛ ass-agi ɣef wayen akk i ccetkan fell-i wat Isṛail ,
44026003	axaṭer tesneḍ akken ilaq leɛwayed akk-d yimeslayen-nsen ; di leɛnaya-k ihi semḥess-iyi-d s leɛqel .
44026004	At Isṛail ssnen tikli-inu si temẓi-w , axaṭer țțuṛebbaɣ di temdint n Lquds ger warraw n tmurt-iw .
44026005	Ssnen-iyi si zik ma bɣan ad cehden fell-i . Lliɣ d afarizi , tebɛeɣ leqwanen iweɛṛen yeɛnan ddin-nneɣ di tejmaɛt n ifariziyen .
44026006	Beddeɣ ass-agi di ccṛeɛ axaṭer ssarmeɣ aț-țwakmel lemɛahda-nni i gefka Sidi Ṛebbi i lejdud-nneɣ .
44026007	Tnac leɛṛac-nneɣ i gɛebden Ṛebbi am yiḍ am ass , țṛaǧun a d-taweḍ lemɛahda-agi i ssaramen . Ɣef wusirem-agi i ccetkan wat Isṛail fell-i .
44026008	Ay agellid Aɣribas , acuɣeṛ i tɣilem d lmuḥal a d-isseḥyu Sidi Ṛebbi lmegtin ?
44026009	Ma d nekkini , di tazwara ɛeṛdeɣ ad xaṣmeɣ s wayen yellan di tezmert-iw , isem-agi n Ɛisa Anaṣari ;
44026010	d ayen i xedmeɣ di temdint n Lquds , rriɣ aṭas imasiḥiyen ɣer lḥebs , yerna d lmuqedmin imeqqranen i yi-d-yefkan țesriḥ-agi . M'ara ḥekkmen fell-asen s lmut , nekkini qebbleɣ ;
44026011	qehṛeɣ-ten acḥal d abrid si lǧameɛ ɣer wayeḍ , ḥeṛseɣ-ten ad ṭṭixṛen i webrid-agi n Ɛisa ; deg urrif-iw ameqqran , țṛuḥeɣ armi ț-țimdinin tibeṛṛaniyin iwakken a ten-qehhṛeɣ .
44026012	Ɣef wannect-nni lmuqedmin imeqqranen fkan-iyi tazmert s wayes ṛuḥeɣ ɣer temdint n Dimecq .
44026013	Taswiɛt kan di țnaṣfa wass ay agellid , walaɣ deg webrid yiwet n tafat i d-yekkan seg igenni , tețfeǧǧiǧ akteṛ n yiṭij , tezzi-yi-d i nekk akk-d wid yellan yid-i ,
44026014	neɣli akk ɣer lqaɛa . Sliɣ i ṣṣut i d-iqqaṛen s tmeslayt taɛibṛanit : A Caɛul , a Caɛul ! Acuɣeṛ i yi tețqehhiṛeḍ ? Yewɛeṛ fell-ak aț-țɛaṣiḍ inezlan .
44026015	Rriɣ-as : Anwa-k a Sidi ? Yenna-yi-d : Nekkini d Ɛisa-nni i tețqehhiṛeḍ ;
44026016	kker fell-ak , bedd ɣef yidaṛṛen-ik , ḍehṛeɣ-ak-d iwakken a k-rreɣ d aqeddac-iw , d inigi ɣef wayen twalaḍ ass-agi d wayen ara k-d-sekneɣ sya d asawen .
44026017	Xtaṛeɣ-k-id si ger wat Isṛail akk-d leǧnas nniḍen uɣuṛ ara k ceggɛeɣ . A sen-teldiḍ allen
44026018	iwakken a d ffɣen si ṭṭlam ɣer tafat , si tezmert n Cciṭan ɣer tezmert n Ṛebbi , ad amnen yis-i , iwakken a sen-neɛfuɣ ddnubat-nsen , ad sɛun amkan ger wid i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
44026019	Daymi , ay agellid Aɣribas , ur ɛuṣaɣ ara aweḥḥi i yi-d-yusan seg igenni .
44026020	Bdiɣ abecceṛ di temdint n Dimecq akk-d ț-țemdint n Lquds , beccṛeɣ daɣen di tmurt n Yahuda meṛṛa , di taggara , beccṛeɣ i wat leǧnas ur nelli ara seg wat Isṛail , nhiɣ-ten ad tuben , a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid n Ṛebbi , ad xedmen lecɣal i d-ițbegginen belli tuben s wul-nsen .
44026021	Ɣef wannect-agi i yi-ṭṭfen wat Isṛail deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen , ɛeṛden ad iyi-nɣen .
44026022	Lameɛna s lemɛawna n Sidi Ṛebbi , ddreɣ armi d ass-a , țbecciṛeɣ i yemdanen meṛṛa , ama d ameɣbun ama d ameṛkanti ; yerna ayen i d-qqaṛeɣ , d ayen akken i ɣef d-caren lenbiya akk-d Sidna Musa :
44026023	yeɛni Lmasiḥ ad iɛteb , d nețța i d amezwaru ara d-iḥyun si ger lmegtin , ad ibecceṛ tafat i wegdud n wat Isṛail akk-d leǧnas nniḍen .
44026024	Akken yella Bulus yețdafaɛ ɣef yiman-is , Fistus yenṭeq-ed s leɛyaḍ , yenna : Iffeɣ-ik leɛqel a Bulus ! Lketṛa n tmusni-inek tessufeɣ-ak leɛqel !
44026025	Bulus yerra-yas : Ur iyi-iffiɣ ara leɛqel a Fistus ameqqran ! Ayen akka i d-qqaṛeɣ d imeslayen n tideț yesɛan ṣṣwab .
44026026	Ula d agellid Aɣribas , yeɛlem s wayagi ; daymi i d-mmeslayeɣ zdat-es ɛinani , imi mačči s tuffra i gedṛa wannect-a .
44026027	Ay agellid , tumneḍ s wayen i d-nnan lenbiya ? Sriɣ tumneḍ yis-sen !
44026028	Aɣribas yenna i Bulus : Lemmer a yi-d ternuḍ kra yimeslayen ahat ad iyi-tqenɛeḍ ad uɣaleɣ d amasiḥi !
44026029	Bulus yenna-yas : A wi-yufan a Ṛebbi , mačči d keččini kan , lameɛna ula d wid akk i yi-d-ismeḥsisen ass-agi , aț-țuɣalem am nekk tura neɣ deg ussan i d-iteddun , ḥaca snasel-agi i yi cudden !
44026030	Dɣa agellid Aɣribas , lḥakem Fistus , Birinis d wid akk yeqqimen yid-sen , kkren-d .
44026031	Mi kkren ad ṛuḥen , nnan wway gar-asen : Argaz-agi ur ixdim ula d acemma yuklalen lmut neɣ lḥebs .
44026032	Aɣribas yenna i Fistus : Argaz-agi izmer ad ițțuserreḥ lemmer ur yerẓi ara ccṛeɛ ɣer Qayṣer .
44027001	Mi fkan lameṛ a nerkeb lbabuṛ ɣer tmurt n Selyan , ǧǧan Bulus akk-d kra n imeḥbas nniḍen i yiwen ufesyan n terbaɛt n Qayṣer , isem-is Xulyus .
44027002	Nerkeb deg yiwen lbabuṛ n temdint n Adramit , ara iṛuḥen rrif n tmura n Asya ; nṛuḥ , yedda yid-nneɣ Aristaṛk yellan d amasiduni n temdint n Tiṣalunik .
44027003	Azekka-nni , newweḍ ɣer temdint n Sidun , Xulyus yețqadaṛen Bulus , ixdem-as lemziya , iserreḥ-as ad iṛuḥ ɣer imdukkal-is iwakken a s-d-fken ayen yeḥwaǧ .
44027004	Mi neqleɛ syenna , nɛedda rrif rrif n tegzirt n Qubṛus axaṭer iṣbeḥ-aɣ-d waḍu iǧehden si zdat .
44027005	Nezger lebḥeṛ n Silisya akk-d Bamfilya , newweḍ ɣer lmeṛṣa n Mira yellan di tmurt n Lizya .
44027006	Afesyan-nni yufa dinna lbabuṛ n Skandriya ara iṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n Selyan , isserkeb-aɣ deg-s .
44027007	Lbabuṛ nni yewwi-yaɣ kra n wussan s țțawil ; armi neṛwa leɛtab i newweḍ ɣer tama n temdint n Knidus , imi ur aɣ-yeǧǧi ara waḍu a nqeṛṛeb , nɛedda rrif n tegzirt n Kritus , ɣer tama n Salmuni .
44027008	Nkemmel rrif rrif s leɛtab , armi newweḍ ɣer yiwen wemkan isem-is « Lemraṣi icebḥen » , zdat temdint n Lazaya .
44027009	Nesṛuḥ aṭas n lweqt , lweqt n usafer di lebḥeṛ yuɣal yewɛeṛ aṭas , imi ass i deg țțuẓummen wat Isṛail di taggara n lexṛif iɛedda .
44027010	Daymi i sen-iɛeggen Bulus yenna-yasen : Ay atmaten , ẓriɣ belli tikkelt-agi ma nkemmel aṣafeṛ-nneɣ , a d-tili lexsaṛa mačči kan i lbabuṛ d sselɛa yellan deg-s , lameɛna tezmer aț-țeglu ula yis-nneɣ .
44027011	Afesyan-nni aṛumani yuɣ awal i bab n lbabuṛ akk-d win i t-inehṛen wala ad yaɣ awal i Bulus .
44027012	Imi lmeṛṣa-nni ur telhi ara iwakken ad sɛeddin deg-s ccetwa , azgen ameqqran n ibeḥriyen bɣan ad ṛuḥen , iwakken ma yella wamek , ad awḍen ɣer lmeṛṣa n Finikus yellan di tegzirt n Kritus ; lmeṛṣa-yagi tqubel lǧiha taɣeṛbit , bɣan ad sɛeddin deg-s ccetwa .
44027013	Akken i d-yekker yiwen ubeḥri xfifen , ɣilen ad awḍen ɣer leqsed nsen . Refden amextaf n lbabuṛ , ṛuḥen rrif rrif n tegzirt n Kritus .
44027014	Lameɛna ur tɛeṭṭel ara tekker-ed yiwet n tbuciḍant iwumi qqaṛen Erakilun i d-ikkan seg idurar n tegzirt-nni .
44027015	Imi lbabuṛ ur s-izmir ara i tbuciḍant-nni , neǧǧa-t a t-yawi waḍu ɣer wanda i s-yehwa ,
44027016	nɛedda seddaw yiwet n tegzirt tamecṭuḥt yeddurin ɣef waḍu , isem-is Kluda . Mi ɣ-teɣli teflukt-nni n leslak , s leɛtab ameqqran i ț-id-nessuli ɣer lbabuṛ .
44027017	Imi nuggad a ɣ-yawi waḍu ɣer leryuf iweɛṛen n tmurt n Libya , ncudd lbabuṛ s imurar ; nerna nṣubb-ed lbac-nni s wayes i t-yețțawi waḍu , neǧǧa iman-nneɣ a ɣ-yawi ɣer wanda yebɣa .
44027018	Azekka-nni , imi mazal lebḥeṛ yenhewwal , nessenqes kra n sselɛa yellan deg-s nḍeggeṛ-iț ɣer lebḥeṛ .
44027019	Ass wis tlata , ixeddamen n lbabuṛ rnan ḍeggṛen sselɛa-nni i d-iqqimen .
44027020	Acḥal n wussan ur d-iban yiṭij ur d-banen itran , lebḥeṛ mazal-it yerwi , ur numin ara a nțwasellek .
44027021	Aṭas wussan i neqqim mbla lmakla ; dɣa Bulus ibedd-ed gar-asen yenna : Ay irgazen , lemmer i yi-tuɣem awal m'akken i wen-d-nniɣ : a neqqim axiṛ di lmeṛṣa n Kritus , tili ur d-tdeṛṛu ara lexsaṛa akk-d lxuf-agi !
44027022	Tura ur țțagadet ara , sǧehdet iman-nwen axaṭer ula d yiwen deg-wen ur ițmețțat ; ur d-tețțili lexsaṛa anagar lbabuṛ-agi ara iɣeṛqen .
44027023	Iḍ iɛeddan , Sidi Ṛebbi i ɛebbdeɣ iceggeɛ-ed yiwen lmelk ibedd-ed ɣuṛ-i
44027024	yenna-yi-d : « a Bulus , ur țțaggad ara ! Ilaq aț-țbeddeḍ zdat Qayṣer , atan Sidi Ṛebbi a kkun isellek s kečč s wid yellan yid-ek » .
44027025	Sewṛet ihi ay atmaten ! Țekleɣ ɣef Ṛebbi ad idṛu am akken i d-yenna ;
44027026	mbla ccekk ihi a ɣ-ḍeggṛent lemwaji ɣer yiwet n tegzirt .
44027027	Iḍ wis ṛbeɛṭac , mazal aḍu yețhuccu-yaɣ ițțawi-yaɣ akkin akka ɣef lebḥeṛ Agrakal ; di țnaṣfa n yiḍ , ibeḥṛiyen ḥussen belli ur bɛiden ara ɣef lberr .
44027028	Ktalen lqaɛ n lebḥeṛ s wemrar , ufan llant
44027029	Imi uggaden lbabuṛ a t-id-iḥaz kra seddaw-as , ḍeggṛen ṛebɛa imextafen ɣer deffir n lbabuṛ , tqelqen melmi ara yali wass .
44027030	Lameɛna ixeddamen n lbabuṛ țqelliben ad rewlen ; ṣubben taflukt n leslak ɣer lebḥeṛ , steɛmilen am akken d amextaf ara ḍeggṛen ɣer zdat lbabuṛ .
44027031	Dɣa Bulus yenna i lqebṭan d lɛeskeṛ-is : M'ur qqimen ara yergazen-agi di lbabuṛ , ur tezmirem ara aț-țmenɛem ! S
44027032	Imiren lɛeskeṛ gezmen imurar n teflukt , ǧǧan-ț aț-țeɣli ɣer lebḥeṛ .
44027033	Weqbel ad yali wass , Bulus inha-ten akk ad ččen cwiṭ n lqut , yenna : Ass-agi d ass wis ṛbeɛṭac ur teɛṛiḍem lqut .
44027034	Tura nhiɣ-kkun ihi aț-țeččem iwakken aț-țețțusellkem , ula d yiwen deg-wen ur s-ițṛuḥ wenẓad seg uqeṛṛuy .
44027035	Mi d-yenna ayagi , iddem-ed aɣṛum , iḥmed Ṛebbi zdat-sen meṛṛa , yebḍa-t , yebda itețț .
44027036	Yekkes-asen akk lxuf dɣa ččan .
44027037	
44027038	Mi ččan armi ṛwan , ḍeggṛen ɣer lebḥeṛ ticekkaṛin n yirden , iwakken ad yifsus lbabuṛ .
44027039	Mi guli wass , ur eɛqilen ara maḍi tamurt-nni anda wwḍen . Lameɛna walan yiwen wemkan iqeṛben , iban-ed deg-s ṛṛmel , bɣan ad rren lbabuṛ ɣer dinna ma yella wamek .
44027040	Fsin imurar i imextafen bran asen ɣer lebḥeṛ , fsin daɣen imurar i imeqdafen s wacu nehṛen lbabuṛ ; dɣa ssulin yiwen ubeḥnuq yellan ɣer zdat n lbabuṛ iwakken a ten-yawi waḍu ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ .
44027041	Lameɛna wwḍen ɣer yiwen wemkan n ṛṛmel iwumi d-izzi lebḥeṛ ; rran ɣer dinna lbabuṛ-nni , lǧiha n zdat teḥṣel di ṛṛmel teḥbes ma d lǧiha n deffir tebda tețṛuẓu si lqewwa n lemwaji .
44027042	Lɛeskeṛ bɣan ad nɣen imeḥbas-nni axaṭer uggaden a sen-rewlen s lɛum .
44027043	Lqebṭan-nni i gebɣan ad isellek Bulus , ur ten-yeǧǧi ara ad xedmen lebɣi-nsen . Yefka lameṛ i wid yessnen ad ɛummen , ad ḍeggṛen iman-nsen d imezwura ɣer waman iwakken ad awḍen ɣer rrif .
44027044	Ma d wiyaḍ a ten-tebɛen , ad ṭṭfen di telwiḥin neɣ deg iceqfan n lbabuṛ . S wakka , wwḍen meṛṛa ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ di laman .
44028001	Mi d-nemneɛ si lebḥeṛ , nesla belli tigzirt-nni isem-is Malṭa .
44028002	Imezdaɣ-is setṛeḥben yis-nneɣ , xedmen-aɣ lxiṛ d ameqqran ; ceɛlen times axaṭer yekkat ugeffur ( lehwa ) , yerna d asemmiḍ .
44028003	Bulus ijmeɛ-ed kra n yesɣaṛen a ten-iger ɣer tmes , si leḥmu-nni n tmes yeffeɣ-ed yiwen n wezrem yenṭed deg ufus-is .
44028004	Lɣaci mi walan azrem-nni yeckenṭeḍ deg ufus-is , qqaṛen wway gar-asen : « Argaz-agi iban d bu tmegṛaḍ , axaṭer ɣas akken yemneɛ-ed si lebḥeṛ , Sidi Ṛebbi yellan d Bab n lḥeqq ur t-yețțaǧa ara ad yidir . »
44028005	Lameɛna Bulus yezwi azrem-nni ɣer tmes , ur t-yuɣ ula d acemma ;
44028006	lɣaci-nni țṛaǧun a t-walin ibzeg neɣ ad yemmet imiren kan . Ɛussen-t , mi walan ur t-yuɣ wacemma , beddlen ṛṛay , ḥesben-t d yiwen seg iṛebbiten s wayes țțamnen .
44028007	Di leǧwahi-nni i gezdeɣ Bubliyus lḥakem ameqqran n tegzirt-nni ; yesɛa aṭas n wakal , yesṭerḥeb yis-nneɣ , yerna yessens-aɣ ɣuṛ-es tlata wussan .
44028008	Deg ussan-nni , baba-s n Bubliyus yella deg usu yehlek , tuɣ-it tawla yerna tuzzel tɛebbuṭ-is . Bulus iṛuḥ ɣuṛ-es , issers ifassen-is fell-as , yedɛa ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi dɣa yeḥla .
44028009	Mi slan yis imuḍan n tegzirt-nni usan-d ɣuṛ-es isseḥla-ten ula d nutni .
44028010	Ɣef wayagi , qudṛen-aɣ aṭas ; mi nekker a nṛuḥ , fkan-aɣ-d ayen akk neḥwaǧ i webrid .
44028011	Mi ɛeddan tlata waguren , nerkeb yiwen lbabuṛ n temdint n Skandriya iwumi qqaṛen Dyuskuṛ , isɛeddan ccetwa di tegzirt-nni ;
44028012	newweḍ ɣer temdint n Sirakuz , anda neqqim tlata wussan .
44028013	Syenna nkemmel rrif rrif n lebḥeṛ armi ț-țamdint n Ṛejyu , azekka-nni yekker-ed yiwen n waḍu i d-yekkan seg usamer , sin wussan mbeɛd , newweḍ ɣer temdint n Buzul .
44028014	Nufa dinna atmaten i ɣ iḥellelen a neqqim yid-sen sebɛa wussan , syenna nkemmel abrid ɣer temdint n Ṛuma .
44028015	Mi slan yis-nneɣ watmaten n temdint n Ṛuma , usan-d armi d ssuq n Abyus akk-d wemkan yețțusemman « Tlata Țbernat » iwakken a ɣ-d-mmagren . Mi ten iwala Bulus , yefṛeḥ yeḥmed Ṛebbi yerna yuɣal-it-id lǧehd .
44028016	Mi newweḍ ɣer temdint n Ṛuma , serrḥen-as i Bulus ad izdeɣ deg yiwen wexxam , nețța d yiwen uɛeskṛi i t yețɛassan .
44028017	Mi ɛeddan tlata wussan , Bulus yessawel i imeqqranen n wat Isṛail . Mi d-nnejmaɛen , Bulus yenna yasen : Ay atmaten , ɣas akken ur xdimeɣ acemma i gxulfen agdud d leɛwayed n lejdud-nneɣ , ṭṭfen-iyi ɣer lḥebs di temdint n Lquds , sellmen-iyi ger ifassen n lɛeskeṛ n Ṛuman .
44028018	Mi yi-beḥten , bɣan ad iyi serrḥen axaṭer ur ufin ara deg-i sebba s wayes ara ḥekmen fell-i s lmut .
44028019	Imi ur qbilen ara wat Isṛail ad iyi-d-serrḥen iṛumaniyen , iḥettem-iyi lḥal ad rẓeɣ ccṛeɛ ɣer Qayṣer ; lameɛna mačči d acetki i bɣiɣ ad ccetkiɣ ɣef wegdud-iw .
44028020	Daymi i bɣiɣ a kkun-ẓreɣ , ad mmeslayeɣ yid-wen axaṭer ɣef ddemma n usirem n wat Isṛail i țwarzeɣ s snasel-agi .
44028021	Imeqqranen n wat Isṛail nnan-as : Ur d-neṭṭif ula d yiwet n tebṛaț si tmurt n Yahuda ɣef wayen yeɛnan tamsalt-ik , ula d yiwen seg watmaten ur d-yusi ad iccetki neɣ a ɣ-d-yini ayen n diri fell-ak .
44028022	Lameɛna nebɣa a nsel s ɣuṛ-ek ayen akka s wacu i tumneḍ , ma d ayen yeɛnan tajmaɛt-agi seg i d-tekkiḍ , neẓra belli di yal amkan tețmagar-ed uguren .
44028023	Dɣa msefhamen ɣef wass nniḍen i deg ara mlilen . Mi d yewweḍ wass-nni , usan-d deg waṭas yid-sen ɣer wexxam n Bulus . Si ṣṣbeḥ armi ț-țameddit , Bulus yețbecciṛ-asen ɣef tgeldit n Ṛebbi s ccariɛa n Musa ț-țektabin n lenbiya , yețqellib a ten-iqenneɛ iwakken ad amnen s Sidna Ɛisa .
44028024	Kra umnen s wayen i d-yenna , ma d wiyaḍ ugin ad amnen .
44028025	Mi țeddun ad ṛuḥen mazal lxilaf gar-asen , dɣa Bulus yerna-yasen imeslayen-agi : Ț-țideț ayen i d-yenna Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i lejdud-nwen s yimi n nnbi Iceɛya
44028026	mi d-yenna : Ṛuḥ ɣer wegdud-agi tiniḍ-asen : ɣas aț-țeslem s imeẓẓuɣen-nwen ur tfehmem ara ; aț-țemmuqlem s wallen-nwen ur tețwalim ara ,
44028027	imi ul n wegdud-agi yuɣal d azṛu ; qeflen imeẓẓuɣen-nsen , qemcen allen-nsen ; ur bɣin ara ad walin s wallen-nsen , d slen s imeẓẓuɣen-nsen , ad fehmen s wul-nsen , iwakken a d-uɣalen ɣuṛ-i ad beddlen tikli akken a ten-sseḥluɣ !
44028028	Atan ihi tura leslak n Sidi Ṛebbi ad ițțune i leǧnas nniḍenur nelli ara n wat Isṛail axaṭer nutni a s-semḥessen yerna a t-qeblen .
44028029	Mi d-yenna Bulus ayagi , ffɣen-d imeqqranen n wat Isṛail , leḥḥun țemjadalen wway gar-asen .
44028030	Bulus yeqqim sin iseggasen deg wexxam-nni i gekra . Isṭerḥib s kra n win i d-yețțasen a t-iẓer .
44028031	Yețbecciṛ tageldit n Ṛebbi s tlelli , isselmad-asen ayen akk yeɛnan Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , ulac win i t-iḥebsen .
45001001	Nekk Bulus , yellan d aqeddac n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , țwaxtaṛeɣ ad iliɣ d ṛṛasul , iwakken ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45001002	Lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ i d-yewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi si zik s yimi n lenbiya di tira iqedsen ,
45001003	d ayen yeɛnan Mmi-s , Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ i d-ilulen d amdan seg wedrum n Dawed ,
45001004	yețțusemma d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , s ḥeggu-ines si ger lmegtin .
45001005	Yis i ɣ-ixdem Sidi Ṛebbi lemziya a nili d imceggɛen , iwakken a d-nawi s yisem-is imdanen n leǧnas meṛṛa ad amnen yis yerna ad aɣen awal-is .
45001006	Yessawel-awen-d ula i kunwi yellan ger leǧnas-agi , iwakken aț-țilim d ayla n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
45001007	I wid akk yellan di temdint n Ṛuma , i gḥemmel Sidi Ṛebbi , iwumi i d-yessawel ad ilin d ayla-s : ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d-țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ akk-d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
45001008	Di tazwara , ad ḥemdeɣ Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen meṛṛa s yisem n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , axaṭer yeffeɣ lexbaṛ di ddunit meṛṛa belli tumnem s Lmasiḥ .
45001009	Sidi Ṛebbi i ɛebbdeɣ seg ul-iw , i ɣef qeddceɣ imi țbecciṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan Mmi-s , yeẓra belli țțadreɣ-kkun-id dima m'ara deɛɛuɣ ɣuṛ-es .
45001010	Ssutureɣ mkul ass i Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ma yebɣa , ad afeɣ abrid amek ara n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen .
45001011	Acḥal i bɣiɣ a kkun-ẓreɣ , akken a kkun-slemdeɣ ɣef kra n tukciwin i d-ițțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen iwakken aț țǧehdem ;
45001012	yerna m'ara n-awḍeɣ ɣuṛ-wen , a nemseǧhad wway gar aneɣ ; kunwi s liman-nwen , nekk s liman-inu , imi yiwen n liman i ɣ-isdukklen .
45001013	Ay atmaten , bɣiɣ aț-țeẓrem belli acḥal n tikkal i ɛerḍeɣ a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen , iwakken lxedma inu a wen-d-teglu s kra n lfayda , am akken i d-tewwi lfayda i leǧnas nniḍen ; meɛna ar tura mazal țmagareɣ-ed uguren .
45001014	Ilaq-iyi ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer yemdanen n ddunit meṛṛa , ɣer leǧnas itqeddmen akk-d wid ur netqeddem ara , ɣer wid yeɣṛan d wid ur neɣṛi ara .
45001015	Daymi i bɣiɣ ad beccṛeɣ daɣen lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ , i kunwi yellan di temdint n Ṛuma .
45001016	Ur ssetḥaɣ ara s lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ , axaṭer ț-țazmert n Sidi Ṛebbi i leslak n kra win yumnen yis ; di tazwara i wat Isṛail , a d-ḍefṛen leǧnas nniḍen .
45001017	Lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ ibeggen-ed amek i gețțarra Sidi Ṛebbi imdanen d iḥeqqiyen s liman , axaṭer s liman kan i nezmer a nuɣal d iḥeqqiyen si tazwara alamma ț-țaggara . Akken yura di tira iqedsen : Aḥeqqi ad yidir s liman .
45001018	Sidi Ṛebbi ițbeggin-ed urrif-is seg igenni ɣef ddnub d cceṛ n yemdanen i gețɣummun lḥeqq s lbaṭel ;
45001019	axaṭer ayen akk i glaqen a t-issinen ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi , ẓran-t ; d Ṛebbi s yiman-is i sen-t-id isbeggnen .
45001020	Seg wasmi i d-yexleq ddunit , ayen akk yeffren ɣef wallen , nețwali-t di lecɣal-is ; nezmer a neɛqel belli d nețța kan i d Ṛebbi yesɛan tazmert ur nfennu ; daymi wigi ulac fell-asen ssmaḥ .
45001021	? as akken ẓran yella Ṛebbi , ur setɛeṛfen ara yis ; ur t-ḥmiden , ur t-ckiṛen , lameɛna țkemmilen deg yir ixemmimen-nsen armi iɣumm ṭṭlam ulawen-nsen .
45001022	? țaran iman-nsen d lɛuqal armi uɣalen d imejhal .
45001023	Beddlen lɛaḍima n Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren s lmeṣnuɛat yesɛan ṣṣifa n wemdan ifennun , ṣṣifa n leḍyuṛ , n lewḥuc yesɛan ṛebɛa iḍaṛṛen , d wayen akk ileḥḥun ɣef wuɛebbuḍ ;
45001024	daymi i ten-yeǧǧa Sidi Ṛebbi tebɛen lebɣi n wulawen-nsen , xeddmen ticmatin , ṣṣawḍen armi kksen lḥeṛma ɣef yiman-nsen .
45001025	Beddlen tideț n Sidi Ṛebbi s lekdeb , ɛebbden ayen yețwaxelqen , ǧǧan win i d-ixelqen kullec , nețța i gețțubarken i dayem ; Amin !
45001026	? - țagi i d sebba i ɣef ten-yeǧǧa Sidi Ṛebbi di lɛaṛ n ccehwat-nsen ; tilawin țbeddilent irgazen s tilawin .
45001027	Ula d irgazen țțaǧan tilawin , ițenkkar uḥaṛuq wway gar-asen , țemyexdamen lɛaṛ ; d wagi i d lexlaṣ i yuklalen ɣef tidderɣelt-nsen .
45001028	Imi ugin ad issinen Ṛebbi , Sidi Ṛebbi yeǧǧa-ten di lɛeqliya-nsen iɛewjen iwakken ad xedmen ayen ur nlaq ara .
45001029	? čuṛen d lbaṭel akk-d wayen n diri : d ṭṭmeɛ , d cceṛ , ț-țismin ; d at tmegṛaḍ , d at ccwal , d at tḥila , d at tiḥeṛci , d iqeṛṛaḍen .
45001030	Wa yekkat deg wa , d iɛdawen n Ṛebbi , ur țneḥcamen ara , d imzuxiyen , d ikeddaben ; snulfuyen-d cceṛ , țɛaṣin lwaldin-nsen .
45001031	Ur sɛin lefhama , ur sɛin laman , ulac deg wulawen-nsen ṛṛeḥma neɣ leḥnana .
45001032	? as akken ẓran lḥisab n Sidi Ṛebbi yețṛaǧu wid ixeddmen annect-agi yerna uklalen lmut , țkemmilen di tikli-nsen yerna feṛḥen s wid ixeddmen am nutni .
45002001	Ulac fell-ak ssmaḥ a win ițḥasaben wiyaḍ , axaṭer akken tebɣuḍ tiliḍ , mi tețḥasabeḍ wiyaḍ , d iman-ik i tḥusbeḍ , imi kečč i ten-ițḥasaben txeddmeḍ am nutni .
45002002	Neẓra belli Sidi Ṛebbi iḥekkem s lḥeqq ɣef wid ixeddmen lecɣal-agi .
45002003	I kečč i gețḥasaben wid ixeddmen lecɣal-agi , ma txeddmeḍ am nutni , tɣileḍ aț-țmenɛeḍ i lḥisab n Sidi Ṛebbi ?
45002004	Eɛni tḥeqṛeḍ leḥnana d ṣṣbeṛ i gesɛa Sidi Ṛebbi mbla ceḥḥa ? Ur teẓriḍ ara belli iṣebber-ak s leḥnana-s iwakken aț-țbeddleḍ tikli ?
45002005	Lameɛna kečč yesɣaṛayen ul-ik tugiḍ aț-țbeddleḍ tikli , tețheggiḍ i yiman-ik lɛiqab ameqqran i wass n lḥisab , ass i deg ara d-ibin wurrif akk-d lḥeqq n Sidi Ṛebbi
45002006	ara yerren i mkul yiwen ayen yexdem .
45002007	ad ye tudert n dayem i wid ixeddmen lxiṛ s ṣṣbeṛ , yețnadin ɣef lɛezz d lḥeṛma akk-d tudert n dayem .
45002008	Ma d wid yellan d imcumen , ikeṛhen tideț , ixeddmen lbaṭel , a d-isseɣli fell-asen urrif ț-țwaɣit ;
45002009	a d-isseɣli daɣen ccedda ț-țwaɣit ɣef yal amdan ixeddmen cceṛ , di tazwara ɣef wat Isṛail , a d-ḍefṛen leǧnas nniḍen .
45002010	Meɛna a d-ițțune lɛezz d lḥeṛma akk-d lehna i kra n win ixeddmen lxiṛ , i wat Isṛail uqbel , a d-ḍefṛen leǧnas nniḍen .
45002011	? er Sidi Ṛebbi ulac lxilaf ger yemdanen .
45002012	Kra n wid ara idenben , ur nessin ara ccariɛa n Musa , asm'ara mmten ur tḥekkem ara fell-asen ; ma d win ara idenben yili yessen ccariɛa , d ccariɛa ara t-iḥasben .
45002013	Mačči d wid ismeḥsisen kan i ccariɛa i gețwaḥesben d iḥeqqiyen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , meɛna d wid i gxeddmen ayen i d-tenna .
45002014	Leǧnas ur nessin ara ccariɛa , i gxeddmen s nneya-nsen ayen i d-tenna , uɣalen d ccariɛa i yiman-nsen ɣas akken ur ț-sɛin ara .
45002015	Beggnen-d s tikli-nsen belli ayen i d-tenna ccariɛa , deg ulawen-nsen i gura . D ulawen-nsen i d-ițbegginen annect-a axaṭer axemmem nsen tikwal ițḥasab-iten , tikwal yețḥuddu fell-asen .
45002016	D annect-agi ara d-ibanen asm'ara iḥaseb Sidi Ṛebbi s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , ayen akk xeddmen yemdanen s tuffra am akken yella di lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i țbecciṛeɣ .
45002017	Kečč iḥesben iman-ik si dderya n wat Isṛail , tețțekleḍ ɣef ccariɛa n Musa , tețzuxxuḍ s Ṛebbi ;
45002018	kečč yessnen lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi , teẓriḍ d acu i gelhan imi tesneḍ ccariɛa ;
45002019	kečč i gɣilen tzemreḍ aț-țeṭṭfeḍ afus i iderɣalen , aț-țiliḍ ț-țafat n wid yellan di ṭṭlam ;
45002020	kečč iḥesben iman-ik tzemreḍ aț-țesfehmeḍ wid ur nessin , neɣ aț-țiliḍ d ccix n warrac axaṭer tufiḍ di ccariɛa n Musa tamusni akk-d țideț !
45002021	Tesselmadeḍ wiyaḍ , meɛna ur tesselmadeḍ ara iman-ik ;
45002022	tnehhuḍ wiyaḍ ur țțakren ara , kečč s yiman-ik tețțakreḍ ; tnehhuḍ wiyaḍ ur zennun ara , kečč s yiman-ik tzennuḍ ! Tkeṛheḍ ssadaț , tețțakreḍ lemqamat-nsen !
45002023	Tețzuxxuḍ s ccariɛa , meɛna tesseɣlayeḍ lqima n yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi imi ur txeddmeḍ ara ayen i d-teqqaṛ !
45002024	Axaṭer akken yura di tira iqedsen : ? ef ddemma-nwen i gețwargem yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi ger leǧnas .
45002025	? - țideț , ṭṭhaṛa tenfeɛ ma yella tettabaɛeḍ ccariɛa , meɛna ma yella ur txeddmeḍ ara ayen i d-tenna ccariɛa , am akken ur teḍhiṛeḍ ara .
45002026	Win ur neḍhiṛ ara , itebɛen ccariɛa , eɛni ur ițwaḥsab ara ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi am akken yeḍheṛ ?
45002027	Nețta ur neḍhiṛ ara di lǧețța-s , ixeddmen ayen i d-tenna ccariɛa , izmer a k-iḥaseb kečč iḍehṛen , yesnen ccariɛa meɛna ur txeddmeḍ ara ayen i d-teqqaṛ .
45002028	Win yellan s țideț n wat Isṛail , mačči s uqemmuc kan , neɣ s ṭṭhaṛa i d-ițbanen deg weglim-ines ;
45002029	meɛna mmi-s n wat Isṛail n tideț , d win i t-yellan deg ul-ines , ṭṭhaṛa n ṣṣeḥ d ayen ixeddem Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen deg ul n wemdan , mačči ț-țin ixeddem wemdan s ccariɛa . Amdan am-agi , d Sidi Ṛebbi i t-ițɛuzzun mačči d imdanen .
45003001	Ihi d acu i sɛan n wat Isṛail sennig wiyaḍ ? D acu n nnfeɛ yellan di ṭṭhaṛa ?
45003002	Lfayda tella yerna ț-țameqqrant di mkul tama , axaṭer d nutni iwumi d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi awal-is d imezwura .
45003003	Ma yella ihi kra deg-sen ɛuṣan awal-is , eɛni Sidi Ṛebbi a ten-inkeṛ meṛṛa i lmend-nsen ?
45003004	D lmuḥal ! Sidi Ṛebbi d aḥeqqi , d imdanen kan i geskiddiben ; am akken yura di tektabt n ? abur : Iwakken a d-iban lḥeqq n wawal-ik , yerna m'ara tețḥasabeḍ , d kečč i gesɛan lḥeqq .
45003005	Ma yella lbaṭel i nxeddem isban-ed lḥeqq n Sidi Ṛebbi , d acu ara d-nini ? Eɛni Sidi Ṛebbi ur yesɛi ara lḥeqq m'ara ɣ-iɛaqeb ? ( Nniɣ-ed ayagi s lɛeqliya n wemdan . )
45003006	? - țideț yesɛa lḥeqq ! Neɣ m'ulac amek ara iḥaseb ddunit ?
45003007	Ma yella lekdeb-iw ițbeggin-ed tideț n Sidi Ṛebbi yerna isnernay di lɛaḍima-s , acuɣer ihi mazal-iyi țwaḥesbeɣ d amednub ?
45003008	Llan kra n yemdanen heddṛen fell-aɣ s ẓẓuṛ , qqaṛen belli nenna-d : « Acuɣeṛ ur nxeddem ara cceṛ iwakken a d-yeffeɣ lxiṛ ? » Imdanen am wigi uklalen lɛiqab n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45003009	Amek ihi ? Eɛni Nukni s wat Isṛail axiṛ n wiyaḍ ? Xaṭi ! Nniɣ-ed yakan belli am wat Isṛail am leǧnas nniḍen , d aklan n ddnub meṛṛa .
45003010	Akken yura di tektabt iqedsen : Ulac amdan aḥeqqi , ulac ula d yiwen ,
45003011	Yiwen ur ifhim , yiwen ur yețqellib ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi , ffɣen akk i webrid , uɣalen d imejhal ;
45003012	ulac win ixeddmen lxiṛ , ulac ula d yiwen .
45003013	Imawen-nsen ldin am iẓekwan , Ilsawen-nsen d ixeddaɛen . ? čuṛen d ssem am izerman .
45003014	Imawen-nsen ččuṛen d ddeɛwat n cceṛ ț-țeṛzeg .
45003015	Iḍaṛṛen-nsen țɣawalen iwakken ad ssizlen idammen ;
45003016	ansi ɛeddan ad ǧǧen axeṣṣar d nnger di lateṛ-nsen .
45003017	Ur ssinen ara abrid n lehna ;
45003018	ur sɛin ara deg ul-nsen tugdi n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45003019	Neẓra belli ayen akk i d-tenna ccariɛa , tenna-t-id i wid yellan seddaw leḥkum n ccariɛa iwakken imdanen meṛṛa ad zemmemen yimawen-nsen , ad ẓren belli d imednuben i llan zdat Sidi Ṛebbi .
45003020	Ur yezmir yiwen ad yili d aḥeqqi ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi imi i gexdem ayen i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa ; axaṭer ccariɛa tețbeggin-ed kan i wemdan belli d amednub i gella .
45003021	Tura Sidi Ṛebbi isbeggen-aɣ-d amek ara nuɣal d iḥeqqiyen zdat-es mbla ccariɛa . Ayagi yella di ccariɛa n Musa akk-d tektabin n lenbiya .
45003022	Sidi Ṛebbi iḥseb-aɣ d iḥeqqiyen imi numen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ,
45003023	axaṭer ulac lxilaf ger yemdanen imi denben meṛṛa , țwaḥeṛmen si lɛaḍima n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45003024	Lameɛna s ṛṛeḥma-ines , yerra-ten d iḥeqqiyen mbla lexlaṣ , s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i ten-id-icufeɛ .
45003025	D nețța i d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi d asfel fell-aɣ iwakken s idammen-is yuzzlen , a d-yawi leɛfu n ddnub i yemdanen meṛṛa ara yamnen yis . Akka i d-ibeggen Sidi Ṛebbi lḥeqq-ines ; axaṭer zik-nni , asm'akken i sen-iṣbeṛ , ur iɛuqeb ara imdanen ɣef ddnubat-nsen ;
45003026	ma ț-țura isken-ed amek i ten-yerra d iḥeqqiyen zdat-es , axaṭer yebɣa a d-ibeggen belli nețța d aḥeqqi yerna ad yerr d iḥeqqiyen wid akk ara yamnen s Ɛisa .
45003027	Anda-ț sebba n zzux ? Ulac ! Axaṭer mačči s lefɛayel ara nzux meɛna s liman .
45003028	Nukni neẓra amdan ad yuɣal d aḥeqqi zdat Ṛebbi s liman-ines mačči s wayen i d-tenna ccariɛa .
45003029	Eɛni Sidi Ṛebbi , d Illu n wat Isṛail kan ? Ur yelli ara d Illu n leǧnas nniḍen ? Ula d nutni d Illu-nsen
45003030	imi yiwen n Ṛebbi kan i gellan ; ad yerr d iḥeqqiyen zdat-es wid akk yumnen , am wid iḍehṛen am wid ur neḍhiṛ .
45003031	Ma nenna-d akka , mačči d lqima n ccariɛa i nebɣa a nesseɣli , meɛna d lqima-ines n ṣṣeḥ i s-nefka .
45004001	D acu ara d-nini ihi ɣef Sidna Ibṛahim , jeddi-tneɣ ? Amek i tedṛa yid-es ?
45004002	Lemmer yețwaḥseb d aḥeqqi s lxiṛ yexdem , tili yesɛa sebba s wayes ara izuxx , meɛna ur yezmir ara ad izuxx zdat Sidi Ṛebbi .
45004003	Akken yura di tira iqedsen : Sidna Ibṛahim yețkel ɣef Ṛebbi , daymi i gețwaḥseb d aḥeqqi .
45004004	Axeddam yuklal lexlaṣ-is , lexlaṣ ines ur s-ițwaḥseb ara d lemziya meɛna d lḥeqq-is .
45004005	Akken daɣen win ur nețkil ara ɣef lxiṛ i gxeddem , meɛna yețkel ɣef Ṛebbi i gețțarran amednub d aḥeqqi , ad yețwaḥseb d aḥeqqi ɣef ddemma n liman-is .
45004006	Akka i gessefra Sidna Dawed ɣef wemdan i gḥețțeb Sidi Ṛebbi d aḥeqqi mbla ma yemmuqel ɣer lefɛayel-is :
45004007	D iseɛdiyen wid iwumi țwasemḥent seyyat-nsen , iwumi țwamḥan ddnubat - nsen !
45004008	D aseɛdi wemdan iwumi ur iḥsib ara Sidi Ṛebbi ddnub-is !
45004009	Lfeṛḥ-agi , yella i wid iḍehṛen kan neɣ yella daɣen i wid ur neḍhiṛ-ara ? Nenna-d belli : Ṛebbi iḥseb Sidna Ibṛahim d aḥeqqi ɣef ddemma n liman-ines .
45004010	Melmi ițwaḥseb Sidna Ibṛahim d aḥeqqi , uqbel ad yeḍheṛ neɣ armi geḍheṛ ? Mačči armi geḍheṛ meɛna uqbel !
45004011	? ṭhaṛa tusa-yas-ed d țbut , d ccama i d-isbeggnen belli Sidi Ṛebbi yerra-t d aḥeqqi ɣef ddemma n liman-ines uqbel ad yeḍheṛ . S wakka Sidna Ibṛahim yuɣal d jedd n wid akk yumnen , i gețwaḥesben d iḥeqqiyen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ɣas ur ḍhiṛen ara .
45004012	Yella daɣen d jedd n wid akk iḍehṛen , ur nețkil ara ɣef ṭṭhaṛa-nsen kan meɛna tebɛen lateṛ-is , sɛan liman i gesɛa uqbel ad yeḍheṛ .
45004013	Ayen akk i gewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi d lweṛt di ddunit i Sidna Ibṛahim akk-d dderya n dderya-s , ur s-t-iwɛid ara imi i getbeɛ ccariɛa , meɛna imi i gețkel fell-as . Daymi i t-yeḥseb Sidi Ṛebbi d aḥeqqi .
45004014	Lemmer d wid ittabaɛen ccariɛa ara iweṛten , iwumi ihi liman , iwumi lweɛd n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45004015	Axaṭer d ccariɛa i d-ițawin urrif n Ṛebbi , lemmer ulac ccariɛa ur d-tețțili ara tṛuẓi n ccariɛa .
45004016	Lweɛd i d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi i Sidna Ibṛahim , yebna ɣef liman iwakken ad yili d lemziya , ad țekkin deg-s dderya n dderya-s mačči d wid kan yessnen ccariɛa lameɛna wid akk yumnen am nețța , yuɣal d jeddi-tneɣ nukni akk s wid yumnen .
45004017	Am akken yura di Tawṛat n Sidna Musa : Sbeddeɣ-k iwakken aț-țiliḍ d jedd n waṭas n leǧnas . Yuɣal d jeddi-tneɣ zdat Ṛebbi s wayes i gumen , i d-iḥeggun lmegtin , i d-ixelqen ayen ur nelli ara .
45004018	? as akken ur d-iqqim usirem , Sidna Ibṛahim yuṛǧa s lețkal d ameqqran armi yuɣal d jedd n waṭas n yegduden akken i s-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi : Akka ara tili dderya n dderya-k .
45004019	Liman n Sidna Ibṛahim ur yenqis ara ɣas akken qṛib ad issiweḍ meyya iseggasen , iwala iman-is dayen ur yezmir ara ad isɛu dderya , yerna tameṭṭut-is Saṛa teǧǧa-ț dderya .
45004020	Yețkel ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi , ur t-yekcim ara ccekk ɣef wayen i s-yewɛed . D liman yesɛa i t-isǧehden , s wakka i gețḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert .
45004021	Yețkel belli Sidi Ṛebbi yezmer a s-d-ye ayen i s-yewɛed .
45004022	? ef wannect-agi i t-yeḥseb Sidi Ṛebbi d aḥeqqi .
45004023	Mačči fell-as kan i gura di tira iqedsen : Yețwaḥseb d aḥeqqi ,
45004024	lameɛna fell-aɣ ula d nukni , imi numen s win i d-isseḥyan Ɛisa Ssid nneɣ si ger lmegtin .
45004025	Yețțune ad immet ɣef ddemma n ddnubat nneɣ , isseḥya-t-id Sidi Ṛebbi si ger lmegtin iwakken a nuɣal d iḥeqqiyen .
45005001	Tura imi nuɣal d iḥeqqiyen s liman , ters-ed lehna gar-aɣ d Ṛebbi s Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
45005002	Yis daɣen i nufa abrid s liman ɣer ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi i deg nella tura . Lfeṛḥ-nneɣ , d asirem nesɛa belli a nțekki di lɛaḍima n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45005003	Ula di lmeḥnat , nețțili di lfeṛḥ axaṭer neẓra lmeḥna tețțawi-d ṣṣbeṛ ,
45005004	ṣṣbeṛ isseǧhad deg ujeṛṛeb , lǧehd deg ujeṛṛeb ițțawi-d asirem .
45005005	Asirem-agi ulac deg-s lexdeɛ , axaṭer leḥmala n Sidi Ṛebbi teẓẓa deg ulawen-nneɣ s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i ɣ-d-yețțunefken ;
45005006	asm'akken i ɣ-iɣleb ddnub ur s-nezmir ara , Lmasiḥ yemmut ɣef ddemma n imednuben di lweqt ilaqen .
45005007	Iwɛeṛ i wemdan ad iqbel ad immet ɣef ddemma n uḥeqqi ; ahat ad yili win ara iqeblen ad immet ɣef ddemma n wemdan yelhan ;
45005008	ma d Lmasiḥ , nețța yemmut fell-aɣ m'akken nella d imednuben ; s wakka i ɣ-d-ibeggen Sidi Ṛebbi leḥmala-ines .
45005009	Imi nuɣal tura d iḥeqqiyen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s idammen n Lmasiḥ yuzzlen fell-aɣ , yis daɣen ara nețțusellek seg urrif n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45005010	Asm'akken nella d iɛdawen-is , yefka-d Mmi-s iwakken s lmut-is a ɣ-issemṣaleḥ yid-es . Tura imi nemṣalaḥ d Sidi Ṛebbi , a nețțusellek daɣen s tudert n Mmi-s .
45005011	Mačči d ayagi kan , lameɛna tura lfeṛḥ-nneɣ atan di Sidi Ṛebbi , s Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i ɣ-issemṣalaḥen yid-es .
45005012	S wakka ihi , ddnub ikcem-ed ɣer ddunit s yiwen wemdan , amdan agi d Adem ; ddnub-agi yewwi-d lmut , lmut tețțawi akk imdanen , axaṭer imdanen meṛṛa denben .
45005013	Uqbel a d-ye Sidi Ṛebbi ccariɛa i Musa , ddnub yella yakan di ddunit ; meɛna imdanen ur țțuḥasben ara s ccariɛa imi urɛad i d-tusi .
45005014	? as akka , si zzman n Adem armi d zzman n Sidna Musa lmut teḥkem ula ɣef yemdanen ur nɛuṣa ara Ṛebbi am akken i t-iɛuṣa Adem , nețța yellan d lemtel n win ara d-yasen .
45005015	Ur nezmir ara a nmettel ddnub n Adem ɣer lemziya d ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi ; Adem iɛuṣa Sidi Ṛebbi yiwet n tikkelt yewwi-d lmut i yemdanen meṛṛa , acḥal ihi meqqṛet ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi i d-yețțunefken i yemdanen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
45005016	Ṛṛeḥma-agi n Sidi Ṛebbi mačči am ddnub n yiwen wemdan . Axaṭer yiwen n ddnub yewwi-d lḥisab d lɛiqab , ma d ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi , tețțekkes lḥisab d lɛiqab ɣef waṭas n ddnubat .
45005017	Ma yella lmut teḥkem ɣef yemdanen meṛṛa s ddnub n yiwen wemdan , ihi wid iwumi d-tețțune ṛṛeḥma d lḥeqq , ad ḥekmen yerna ad idiren s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
45005018	S wakka , ddnub n yiwen wemdan yesseɣli-d lɛiqab ɣef yemdanen meṛṛa , akken daɣen lḥeqq i gexdem yiwen wemdan , yewwi-d leslak i gessidiren imdanen meṛṛa .
45005019	Ihi am akken ɛeṣṣu n yiwen wemdan , yerra aṭas n yemdanen d imednuben , akken daɣen ṭṭaɛa n yiwen wemdan terra aṭas n yemdanen d iḥeqqiyen .
45005020	Ccariɛa tger-ed iman-is iwakken a d-tbeggen acḥal meqqeṛ ddnub , lameɛna anda yekteṛ ddnub , ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi meqqṛet akteṛ .
45005021	S wakka ddnub yeḥkem s lmut , ma d ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi teḥkem s lḥeqq , tețțawi ɣer tudert n dayem s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ .
45006001	Acu ara d-nini ihi ? A nkemmel a nețɛici di ddnub iwakken ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țimɣuṛ ?
45006002	Ala ! Nukni i gemmuten ɣef ddemma n ddnub , amek ara nkemmel a nețɛici deg-s ?
45006003	Neɣ ur teẓrim ara belli nukni akk i gețwaɣeḍsen iwakken a neddukel d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , nețwaɣḍeṣ yid-es di lmut-is ?
45006004	S weɣḍas , nețwamḍel yid-es iwakken , nukni daɣen a d-neḥyu akken i d-yeḥya Lmasiḥ si ger lmegtin s tezmert n Ṛebbi , a nekcem di tudert tajḍiṭ .
45006005	Axaṭer ma necrek yid-es di lmut-is , a necrek daɣen yid-es di ḥeggu-ines .
45006006	Ilaq-aɣ a nẓer belli amdan-nni i nella zik , yemmut , ițwasemmeṛ akk-d Lmasiḥ iwakken aț-țemmet lǧețța yeččuṛen d ddnub , ur nețțili ara d aklan n ddnub .
45006007	Axaṭer win yemmuten islek si ddnub ,
45006008	imi nemmut akk-d Lmasiḥ , numen daɣen belli a nidir yid-es .
45006009	Neẓra belli Lmasiḥ seg wasmi i d-yeḥya si ger lmegtin , ur yețțuɣal ara ad immet , lmut ur tezmir ara aț-țeḥkem fell-as .
45006010	Axaṭer talu n ddnub yefra-ț ɣef yiwet n tikkelt i dayem , s lmut-is . Tura atan d lḥey , idder i Sidi Ṛebbi .
45006011	Ula d kunwi ḥesbet iman-nwen am akken temmutem ɣef wayen yeɛnan ddnub . Ɛicet i Ṛebbi di tdukkli akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
45006012	Tura ur țțaǧat ara ddnub ad iḥkem fell-awen , ur xeddmet ara ccehwat n tnefsit-nwen am zik .
45006013	Ur țțaǧat ara lemfaṣel n lǧețțat-nwen ad ɣlint di ddnub , iwakken ad ixdem yis-sen cceṛ ; lameɛna qeddmet iman-nwen i Ṛebbi am win i d-iḥyan si lmut iwakken aț-țqeddcem fell-as a ț-țxeddmem anagar lxiṛ .
45006014	Ddnub ur yețțuɣal ara ad iḥkem fell-awen axaṭer ur tellim ara seddaw n ccariɛa lameɛna seddaw n ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45006015	Acu ara d-nini ihi ? A neǧǧ ddnub ad idebbeṛ fell-aɣ tura imi nella seddaw n ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi mačči seddaw n ccariɛa ? A ɣ-imneɛ Ṛebbi deg wannect-agi !
45006016	Ur teẓrim ara belli ma tuɣalem d aklan n yiwen iwakken ad idebbeṛ fell-awen , ilaq a s-taɣem awal ama d ddnub yețțawin ɣer lmut neɣ d ṭṭaɛa n Ṛebbi yețțawin ɣer tudert taḥeqqit .
45006017	Lameɛna a neḥmed Ṛebbi imi zik tellam d aklan n ddnub , ma tura tḍuɛem s wulawen-nwen awal i tlemdem .
45006018	Tețțusellkem-d si ddnub tuɣalem d aklan n lḥeqq .
45006019	Tura a wen-d-hedṛeɣ s lɛeqliya nwen iwakken aț-țfehmem axaṭer annect-agi yewɛeṛ i lefhama . Am akken tsellmem iman-nwen zik d aklan i lɛaṛ iwakken aț-țxedmem lɛaṛ , tura sellmet iman-nwen d aklan i lḥeqq d ṣṣwab iwakken aț-țeṣfu tudert-nwen .
45006020	Asmi tellam d aklan n ddnub texḍam i lḥeqq .
45006021	Acu i trebḥem s lecɣal-nni s wayes tessetḥam tura , lecɣal-nni i gețțawin ɣer lmut .
45006022	Tura tețwaselkem si ddnub , tuɣalem d iqeddacen n Ṛebbi , lfayda nwen ț-țikli deg webrid yeṣfan akk-d tudert n dayem .
45006023	Ddnub yețțawi ɣer lmut , ma d ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi tewwi-yaɣ-d tudert n dayem di tikli-nneɣ akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ .
45007001	Ay atmaten ur teẓrim ara belli ccariɛa teḥkem ɣef wemdan skud mazal-it idder ? Heddṛeɣ-ed akka i wid yessnen ccariɛa .
45007002	A wen-d-fkeɣ yiwen n lemtel : tameṭṭut tețwarez ɣer wergaz-is s ccariɛa skud mazal-it yedder , meɛna ma yemmut wergaz-is tserreḥ-as ccariɛa ma tebɣa aț-țɛiwed zzwaǧ ;
45007003	ma tuɣ wayeḍ skud mazal argaz-is idder , yețțusemma tezna ; meɛna ma yemmut wergaz-is tserreḥ-as ccariɛa aț-țɛiwed zzwaǧ , ayagi ur yețțusemma ara d leḥṛam .
45007004	Ula d kunwi ay atmaten , temmutem ɣef wayen yeɛnan ccariɛa s lmut n Lmasiḥ , akken aț-țeṭṭfem deg win i d-yeḥyan si ger lmegtin iwakken aț-țxedmem ayen i s-iɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi .
45007005	Axaṭer d ccariɛa i d-isbeggnen amek i nțeddu s lebɣi n tnefsit-nneɣ d ccehwat-nneɣ n diri ; d nețțat daɣen i d-isbeggnen amek yexdem ddnub-agi deg-nneɣ , armi i ɣ-yeṣṣaweḍ ɣer lmut .
45007006	Lameɛna tura nețțusellek si lḥekma n ccariɛa imi nețțusemma nemmut ɣef wayen yeɛnan ccariɛa nni i ɣ-yurzen , s wakka i nezmer tura a nḍuɛ Sidi Ṛebbi s lɛeqliya tajḍiṭ n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , mačči am zik s lɛeqliya-nni taqdimt mi nella seddaw n ccariɛa .
45007007	Acu ara d-nini ihi , eɛni ccariɛa deg-s ddnub ? Xaṭi ! Lameɛna lemmer ulac ccariɛa tili ur țissineɣ ara d acu i d ddnub . Axaṭer lemmer ur d-tenni ara ccariɛa : ur ṭṭamaɛ ara , tilli ur ẓriɣ ara belli ṭṭmeɛ d leḥṛam ?
45007008	Ddnub ifuṛes tagniț s lameṛ n ccariɛa ; yesnulfa-d deg-i mkul ṣṣenf n ṭṭmeɛ n diri ; axaṭer mbla ccariɛa ur d-ițban ara d acu i d ddnub .
45007009	Zik , asmi ulac ccariɛa lliɣ țɛiciɣ s nneya , mi d-iffeɣ lameṛ n ccariɛa , ddnub yuki-d deg-i , yeṣṣaweḍ-iyi ɣer lmut .
45007010	S wakka , lameṛ i glaqen ad iyi-ssiweḍ ɣer tudert , yewwi-yi ɣer lmut
45007011	axaṭer ddnub yufa abrid , s lameṛ-agi n ccariɛa dɣa ixdeɛ-iyi , yewwi-yi ɣer lmut .
45007012	Ihi , ccariɛa s yiman-is teṣfa , lumuṛat yellan deg-s ṣfan , lhan yerna d lḥeqq .
45007013	Eɛni yuɣal-iyi wayen yelhan d sebba n lmut ? Xaṭi ! D ddnub i yi-ṣṣawḍen ɣer lmut s wayen yelhan , iwakken s ccariɛa , a d-tban acḥal meqqṛet tezmert n ddnub .
45007014	Neẓra belli ccariɛa n Musa tețțunefk-ed s Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi . Ma d nekk , d amdan kan i lliɣ yerna imlek-iyi ddnub .
45007015	Ur ẓriɣ ara acu i xeddmeɣ , ayen bɣiɣ a t-xedmeɣ ur t-xeddmeɣ ara lameɛna d ayen akken keṛheɣ i xeddmeɣ .
45007016	Ma yella ayen i xeddmeɣ d ayen akken ur bɣiɣ ara a t-xedmeɣ , tḥeqqeqeɣ belli ccariɛa telha .
45007017	Tura ihi mačči d nekk i gxeddmen ayagi , meɛna d ddnub izedɣen deg-i .
45007018	Axaṭer ẓriɣ belli ayen yelhan ur yezdiɣ ara deg-i nekk yellan d amdan . ? as akken yebɣa wul-iw ad ixdem lxiṛ , nekk ur zmireɣ ara a t-xedmeɣ ,
45007019	axaṭer ur xeddmeɣ ara lxiṛ i bɣiɣ , meɛna d cceṛ ur bɣiɣ ara i xeddmeɣ ;
45007020	ma yella xeddmeɣ ayen ur bɣiɣ ara ihi mačči d nekk i t-ixeddmen meɛna d ddnub-nni izedɣen deg-i .
45007021	Ihi atan wayen fehmeɣ deg yiman-iw : mkul m'ara bɣuɣ ad xedmeɣ lxiṛ ad afeɣ d cceṛ kan iwumi zemreɣ .
45007022	Deg ul-iw ḥemmleɣ ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi ,
45007023	meɛna țțafeɣ deg yiman-iw yiwet n ṭṭbiɛa yețnaɣen d ccariɛa n Ṛebbi i gḥemmel wul-iw ; ṭṭbiɛa-yagi terra-yi seddaw lḥekma n ddnub yellan deg-i .
45007024	A nnger-iw ! Anwa ara yi sellken si ṭṭbiɛa-agi n wemdan i yi-țțawin ɣer lmut ?
45007025	A neḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi imi s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ i nețțusellek ! S wakka ihi , s lefhama-inu , ḍuɛeɣ ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi , meɛna s ṭṭbiɛa n wemdan yellan deg-i , d akli n ddnub i lliɣ .
45008001	Ihi ass n lḥisab ulac lɛiqab ɣef wid yumnen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
45008002	Axaṭer tazmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , tin i d-ifkan tudert i wid yumnen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , tsellek-iyi-d si tezmert n ddnub akk-d lmut .
45008003	Ccariɛa n Musa ur tezmir ara aț-țeɣleb ddnub axaṭer ṭṭbiɛa-nneɣ tekkes-as tazmert . Ayen akken ur tezmir ara ccariɛa n Musa a t texdem , d ayen i gexdem Sidi Ṛebbi mi d-iceggeɛ Mmi-s s ṣṣifa n wemdan , i d-yusan s lǧețța am tin n yemdanen yellan meṛṛa d imednuben , iwakken ad ye iman-is d asfel s wayes ara yeḥkem ɣef ddnub i ten-izedɣen .
45008004	S wakka ihi ara yețwakkemmel deg-nneɣ wayen i d-tenna ccariɛa n Musa , nukni yețɛicin s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen mačči s ṭṭbiɛa-nneɣ .
45008005	Wid yețɛicin s ṭṭbiɛa n wemdan țqelliben kan ɣef wayen yeɛnan lebɣi n wemdan , ma d wid ițɛicin s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen țqelliben ɣef wayen yeɛnan lebɣi n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
45008006	Wid ițɛicin s ṭṭbiɛa n wemdan țeddun ɣer lmut , ma d wid ițɛicin s lebɣi n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen țeddun ɣer tudert d lehna .
45008007	Axaṭer wid ittabaɛen lebɣi n wemdan uɣalen d iɛdawen n Sidi Ṛebbi imi ur ḍuɛen ara ccariɛa-ines , axaṭer ṭṭbiɛa n wemdan ur tezmir ara aț-țḍuɛ ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45008008	Wid temlek ṭṭbiɛa-nsen ulamek ara ɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi .
45008009	Ma d kunwi mačči s ṭṭbiɛa n wemdan i tețțeddum lameɛna tețțeddum s lebɣi n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen axaṭer Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi izdeɣ deg-wen . Win deg ur yezdiɣ ara Ṛṛuḥ n Lmasiḥ ur yelli ara d ayla-s .
45008010	Ma yella Ṛṛuḥ n Lmasiḥ deg-wen , ɣas akken lǧețța-nwen aț-țemmet ɣef ddemma n ddnub , ṛṛuḥ-nwen ad yidir ɣef ddemma n lḥeqq n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45008011	Ma yezdeɣ deg-wen Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi i d-yesseḥyan Sidna Ɛisa si ger lmegtin , win i d-yesseḥyan Sidna Ɛisa si ger lmegtin , yezmer daɣen s Ṛṛuḥ-is izedɣen deg-wen , a d-yerr tudert i lǧețța-nwen ara yemten .
45008012	S wakka ihi ay atmaten lebɣi n ṭṭbiɛa-nneɣ ur yeṭebbiṛ ara fell-aɣ tura iwakken a nexdem lebɣi-ines .
45008013	Ma yella tɛacem s lebɣi n ṭṭbiɛa nwen atan aț-țemtem , lameɛna ma tɣelbem lebɣi n ṭṭbiɛa-nwen s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , aț-țidirem .
45008014	Axaṭer wid ițeddun s Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi , d nutni i d arraw n Ṛebbi .
45008015	Ṛṛuḥ i wen-d-ițțunefken mačči d Ṛṛuḥ ara kkun-irren d aklan iwakken aț-țɛicem di tugdi , meɛna d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i kkun-irran d arraw n Ṛebbi , yis i nezmer a nessiwel i Sidi Ṛebbi : « A baba-tneɣ ! »
45008016	D Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi s yiman-is i d-iḥeqqeqen deg wulawen-nneɣ belli nuɣal d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45008017	Ihi ma yella d arraw-is i nella , d nukni daɣen ara iweṛten : a newṛet ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi nukni akk-d Lmasiḥ , axaṭer ma nenɛețțab yid-es , a nili daɣen yid-es di lɛaḍima-ines .
45008018	Ihi leɛtab i nesɛedday tura , ur nezmir ara a t-nmettel ɣer lɛaḍima ara d-ibeggen Sidi Ṛebbi deg-nneɣ .
45008019	Taxelqit meṛṛa tḥar melmi ara d-banen warraw n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45008020	Axaṭer taxelqit teɣli seddaw leḥkum n lbaṭel , mačči s lebɣi-ines , lameɛna s lebɣi n win i ț-yesseɣlin .
45008021	Meɛna taxelqit-agi tessaram aț-țețwasellek si twaɣit i ț-isfesden , iwakken aț-țekki di lɛaḍima n tlelli n warraw n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45008022	Neẓra tura belli taxelqit meṛṛa tenɛețțab , tețnazaɛ am tmeṭṭut yeṭṭfen addud .
45008023	Mačči ț-țaxelqit kan , meɛna ula d nukni yesɛan Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , yellan d amur amezwaru n tikciwin i ɣ-d-iwɛed Sidi Ṛebbi , nețnazaɛ deg iman-nneɣ , nețṛaǧu a nban s tideț d arraw n Ṛebbi i nella m'ara icafeɛ deg-nneɣ s lekmal .
45008024	Axaṭer leslak nneɣ d ayen i nessaram ; ma yella nesɛa ayen i nessaram , ayagi mačči d asirem : anwa ara yessirmen ayen yesɛa ?
45008025	Meɛna ma nessaram ayen ur nesɛi , nețṛaǧu-t s ṣṣbeṛ .
45008026	Akken daɣen Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ițțas-ed a ɣ iɛiwen nukni ixuṣṣen di tezmert , axaṭer ur nessin ara a neẓẓal akken ilaq ; lameɛna Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen s yiman-is ideɛɛu ɣer Ṛebbi ɣef ddemma-nneɣ , s nnehtat iwumi ur yezmir yimi a tent-id-yini s imeslayen ;
45008027	imiren Sidi Ṛebbi yessnen ulawen , yeẓra d acu i gessutur Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , imi s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi i gdeɛɛu ɣef wid yextaṛ .
45008028	Neẓra belli Sidi Ṛebbi issufuɣ ɣer lxiṛ ayen akk i d-ideṛṛun d wid i t-iḥemmlen , wid yextaṛ s lebɣi-ines .
45008029	Axaṭer wid akk i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi si zik , iqsed si tazwara a ten-yerr am Mmi-s iwakken Mmi-s agi ad yili d amenzu n waṭas n watmaten .
45008030	Wid i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi si zik , d wid iwumi i d-issawel ; wid-nni iwumi yessawel yerra-ten d iḥeqqiyen zdat-es , wid yerra d iḥeqqiyen yefka-yasen amkan di lɛaḍima-s .
45008031	Acu ara d-nernu ihi ? Anwa ara ɣ-izemren ma yella Sidi Ṛebbi yid-nneɣ ?
45008032	Nețța iqeblen ad isebbel Mmi-s eɛzizen , yefka-t d asfel fell-aɣ meṛṛa , amek ur ɣ-d-yețțak ara daɣen kullec yid-es ?
45008033	Anwa ara icetkin ɣef wid yextaṛ Ṛebbi ? D Sidi Ṛebbi s yiman-is i ten-iḥesben d iḥeqqiyen !
45008034	Anwa i gzemren ad iḥkem fell asen ? Ɛisa Lmasiḥ d win yemmuten yerna iḥya-d si ger lmegtin , yuli ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ad icafeɛ fell-aɣ !
45008035	Anwa i gzemren a ɣ-ifṛeq ɣef leḥmala n Lmasiḥ ? Eɛni d ddiq neɣ d ccedda , d leqheṛ neɣ d laẓ , d leɛra neɣ d ayen yessaggaden neɣ d ajenwi ?
45008036	Am akken yura di tektabt n ? abur : ? ef ddemma-inek a Sidi Ṛebbi i nețqabal lmut mkul ass , ḥesben-aɣ am ulli i țțawin ɣer tmezliwt .
45008037	Meɛna deg wannect-agi meṛṛa d nukni i gɣelben s Lmasiḥ i ɣ-iḥemmlen .
45008038	Axaṭer țekleɣ belli ulac d acu i gzemren a ɣ-ifṛeq ɣef leḥmala n Sidi Ṛebbi s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ : ama d lmut neɣ ț-țudert , ama d lmalayekkat , ama ț-țigeldiwin , ama d leḥwayeǧ n tura neɣ ț-țid ara d-yasen , ama d ayen ɛlayen , ama d ayen lqayen , ama ț-țizmar n igenwan neɣ ț-țid n lqaɛa neɣ ayen akk yellan di txelqit .
45008039	
45009001	A wen-d-iniɣ tideț , nekk iteddun deg ubrid n Lmasiḥ , ur skiddibeɣ ara ; lxaṭer-iw icehhed-d ɣef wayagi s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i yi-sedduyen :
45009002	leḥzen d uɣilif zgan deg ul-iw .
45009003	Zemreɣ ad qebleɣ ad țțuneɛleɣ neɣ ad țțuḥeṛṛmeɣ ɣef Lmasiḥ ɣef ddemma n watmaten-iw akk-d lumma-inu ;
45009004	nutni at Isṛail i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi d agdud-is yefka-yasen-d lɛaḍima , yexdem yid-sen leɛqud , yefka-yasen-d ccariɛa d wamek ara t-ɛebden , yerna-yasen-d lemɛahdat .
45009005	Seg-sen i d-ffɣen lejdud-nneɣ i gellan d iqeddacen imezwura n Sidi Ṛebbi , ula d Lmasiḥ seg-sen i d-iffeɣ mi d-ilul s ṣṣifa n wemdan , nețța i gellan sennig kra yellan , d Illu yețwaḥemden i dayem . Amin !
45009006	Acu ara d-nini ? Sidi Ṛebbi yendem deg wawal-is ? Xaṭi ! Meɛna mačči d wid meṛṛa i d-ilulen seg jeddi-tneɣ Isṛail i gellan n wat Isṛail i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
45009007	Daɣen mačči d wid meṛṛa i d-yeǧǧa Sidna Ibṛahim i gellan d arraw-is n tideț , axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi inna-yas-d : Seg Isḥaq ara d-teffeɣ dderya i k-weɛdeɣ .
45009008	S wakka ihi nezmer ad ini mačči d dderya i d ilulen s lebɣi n wemdan ara ițțusemmin d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi meɛna anagar wid i d-ilulen s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi akken i t-id-yewɛed .
45009009	Axaṭer atnan imeslayen s wayes i gɛuhed Sidi Ṛebbi : A d-uɣaleɣ aseggas i d-iteddun di lweqt-agi , ? ara a d-tesɛu aqcic .
45009010	Mačči d ayagi kan : arraw n Rbiḥa daɣen i gellan d akniwen , sɛan yiwen n baba-tsen yellan d jeddi-tneɣ Isḥaq .
45009011	Meɛna imi Sidi Ṛebbi ițextiri imdanen mačči ɣef ddemma n lecɣal-nsen meɛna akken yella lebɣi-s d usiwel-ines ; mazal urɛad i d-lulen warraw n Rbiḥa , ur xdimen cceṛ , ur xdimen lxiṛ , mi s-d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi : Amenzu deg warraw-im ad yuɣal d aqeddac ɣef wumecṭuḥ .
45009012	
45009013	Akken i gura daɣen deg umkan nniḍen n tira iqedsen : ? emmleɣ Yeɛqub , keṛheɣ Icaw .
45009014	D acu ara d-nini deg wannect-a ? Eɛni Sidi Ṛebbi ixeddem lbaṭel ? D lmuḥal !
45009015	Axaṭer yenna-yas i Sidna Musa : A d-sserseɣ ṛṛeḥma-inu ɣef win i bɣiɣ , ad ḥunneɣ daɣen ɣef win i bɣiɣ .
45009016	Lbaṛaka n Sidi Ṛebbi ur d-tețțas ara s lefɛayel n wemdan ama yuzzel ama yeqqim meɛna kullec yețțas-ed s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i d-yețțaken ṛṛeḥma ines akken yebɣa .
45009017	Anda nniḍen di tira iqedsen Sidi Ṛebbi yenna i Ferɛun agellid n Maṣer : Sbeddeɣ-k d agellid ameqqran iwakken a d-sbeggneɣ tazmert-iw deg-ek , s wakka di ddunit meṛṛa ad issinen belli d nekk i d Illu .
45009018	Akka ihi , Sidi Ṛebbi yesrusu-d ṛṛeḥma-s ɣef win yebɣa , isɣaṛay daɣen ul n win yebɣa .
45009019	Ahat ad yili win ara d-yinin : imi akka i gella lḥal , acu i mazal ițlumu deg-nneɣ ? Anwa i gzemren a t-iɛaṣi ?
45009020	I kečč ay amdan ur nesɛi azal , d acu i tḥesbeḍ iman-ik iwakken aț-țḥasbeḍ Sidi Ṛebbi ? Eɛni tacmuxt ițwameslen s wakal tezmer aț-țini i win i ț-imeslen acuɣer i yi-tmesleḍ s ṣṣifa-yagi ?
45009021	Win imesslen afexxaṛ yezmer ad ixdem ayen i s-ihwan s wakal ; seg wakal-nni yezmer ad imsel tacmuxt izewqen neɣ tin i sseqdacen kull ass .
45009022	Eɛni Sidi Ṛebbi ur yezmir ara a d-ibeggen urrif-is akk-d tezmert-is ? Iɣaḍ-ik lḥal ma yella yeṣber s ṣṣber ameqqran i wid yuklalen urrif-is yerna teddun ɣer nnger ?
45009023	Deg wannect-agi , Sidi Ṛebbi yebɣa a d-isbeggen acḥal meqqṛet tmanegt-is i nukni i ɣef iḥunn , i ghegga si zik iwakken a nili yid-es di tmanegt-is ;
45009024	nukni iwumi i d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi mačči seg wat Isṛail kan , meɛna ula si ger leǧnas nniḍen ;
45009025	akken i t-id-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi di tektabt n nnbi Hucaɛ : Lǧens-nni ur nelli ara d agdud-iw a s-semmiɣ agdud-iw , win akken ur nețwaḥemmel ara a s-semmiɣ win eɛzizen fell-i .
45009026	Anda akken i sen-qqaṛen : « Ur tellim ara d agdud n Sidi Ṛebbi » , dinna ara țțusemmin d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren .
45009027	Si lǧiha-s , nnbi Iceɛya icar-ed ɣef wayen yeɛnan agdud n wat Isṛail : ? as ad ketṛen wat Isṛail am ṛṛmel ɣef yiri n lebḥeṛ , kra deg-sen kan ara yețțuselken .
45009028	Axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ur ițɛeṭṭil ara ad ixdem di ddunit ayen akken i d-yenna deg wawal-is .
45009029	Yura di tira iqedsen : Lemmer Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert ur aɣ-d yeǧǧi ara kra seg wegdud-nneɣ , tili nuɣal am temdint n Sudum , aț-țeḍru yid-nneɣ am temdint n Gumuṛ inegren . Ayagi yenna-t-id nnbi Iceɛya uqbel a d-yedṛu .
45009030	D acu ara d-nini ihi ? Igduden nniḍen ur nețnadi ara ɣef lḥeqq uɣalen d iḥeqqiyen zdat Sidi Ṛebbi , uɣalen d iḥeqqiyen imi umnen yis .
45009031	Ma d at Isṛail yețnadin ad uɣalen d iḥeqqiyen s ccariɛa , ur wwiḍen ara ɣer lmeqṣud-nsen s ccariɛa .
45009032	Acuɣer ? Axaṭer ur qellben ara ad ɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi s liman , meɛna nutni ɣilen ad uɣalen d iḥeqqiyen s lefɛayel-nsen . Mmugren-d adɣaɣ i sen-yellan d ugur , isseɣli-ten .
45009033	Am akken yura di tektabt iqedsen : Atan ad sserseɣ ɣef wedrar n Siyun adɣaɣ , d adɣaɣ i ɣef yekkat wugur , d azṛu yesseɣlayen , meɛna win yumnen yis weṛǧin ad yenneḥcam .
45010001	Ay atmaten , ayen i țmenniɣ deg ul-iw , d leslak n wat Isṛail meṛṛa , acḥal i ssutreɣ di Ṛebbi ɣef ddemma-nsen iwakken ad țțuselken .
45010002	Axaṭer zemreɣ ad cehdeɣ fell-asen belli ẓewṛen , bɣan ad ɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi meɛna txuṣṣ-iten tmusni .
45010003	Imi ur ḥsiben ara lḥeqq i d yețțasen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi yerna țnadin ad sbedden lḥeqq-nsen iman-nsen , ur ḍuɛen ara lḥeqq i d-yețțasen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi ;
45010004	axaṭer Lmasiḥ , d nețța i ț-țaggara n ccariɛa , i d lḥeqq n wid yumnen meṛṛa .
45010005	Atah wayen yura Sidna Musa ɣef lḥeqq i d-ițekken si ccariɛa : Amdan ara ixedmen ayen i d-tenna ccariɛa , ad yidir yis .
45010006	Lameɛna atah wamek ițmeslay lḥeqq i d-ițasen si liman : ur qqaṛ ara deg ul-inek anwa ara yalin ɣer igenni ; amakken Lmasiḥ ur d-iṣubb ara syenna
45010007	Neɣ anwa ara iṣubben ɣer laxeṛt ? amakken ur d-yeḥyi ara Lmasiḥ si ger lmegtin .
45010008	Acu i d teqqaṛ ihi ? Awal n tudert atan ɣuṛ-ek , deg imi-k d wul-ik . Awal-agi d awal n liman , d awal i nețbecciṛ .
45010009	Ma tcehdeḍ s yimi-k belli Sidna Ɛisa d Ssid-ik , ma tumneḍ deg wul-ik belli Sidi Ṛebbi isseḥya-t-id si ger lmegtin , atan aț-țețțuselkeḍ .
45010010	Axaṭer ma yella tumneḍ seg wul , Sidi Ṛebbi a k-iḥseb d aḥeqqi ; ma tcehdeḍ s yimi-k aț-țețțuselkeḍ .
45010011	Akken i t-id-nnant tira iqedsen : Kra n win yumnen yis weṛǧin ad inneḥcam .
45010012	Ihi ulac lxilaf ger wat Isṛail akk-d wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail ; imi yiwen n Ṛebbi i gellan , ṭṭfen meṛṛa deg-s , nețța i d-yețțaken mbla ceḥḥa i wid akk ineddhen ɣuṛ-es .
45010013	Akken yura : Kra win ara yedɛun s yisem-is ad ițțusellek .
45010014	Amek ara dɛun ɣuṛ-es ma yella ur uminen ara yis ? Amek ara amnen ma yella ur slin ara yis ? Amek daɣen ara slen yis ma ulac win i sen-ihedṛen fell-as ?
45010015	Amek ara yilin wid ara d-ihedṛen fell-as ma yella ur țțuceggɛen ara ? Akken yura di tira iqedsen : Acḥal yelha m'ara nwali teddun-d ɣuṛ-nneɣ wid ițbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ .
45010016	Lameɛna ur qbilen ara meṛṛa lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ . Nnbi Iceɛya yenna daɣen : A Sidi , anwa i gumnen s wayen i nberreḥ ?
45010017	S wakka liman ițțas-ed seg wayen i nsell yeɛnan awal n Lmasiḥ .
45010018	Lameɛna ma nenna-d : ahat ur slin ara ? Atah wayen yuran : ? ṣut-nsen inuda ddunit meṛṛa , lehduṛ-nsen wwḍen ɣer ixfawen n ddunit .
45010019	Nezmer a d-nini : ahat ur ẓrin ara wat Isṛail ? Lameɛna d Musa i d-ixebbṛen d amezwaru s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi mi d-yenna : A wen-d-ssekkreɣ tismin ɣef win ur nelli ara d agdud ; a kkun-id-yas wurrif ɣef wegdud ur nesɛi lefhama .
45010020	Nnbi Iceɛya yessaweḍ armi genna : Ufan-iyi wid ur nennuda ara fell-i , sbeggneɣ-d iman-iw i wid ur nqelleb ara ad iyi-ssinen .
45010021	Meɛna ɣef wat Isṛail yenna : ? elqeɣ ifassen-iw ṭul n wass ɣer wegdud i yi-ixulfen , i yi-iɛuṣan .
45011001	Ad iniɣ : eɛni Sidi Ṛebbi inkeṛ agdud-is ? Xaṭi ! Imi nekk s yiman-iw n wat Isṛail , si dderya n Sidna Ibṛahim , seg wedrum n Benyamin .
45011002	Sidi Ṛebbi ur yenkiṛ ara agdud-is i gextaṛ si zik . Ur teẓrim ara d acu i d-qqaṛent tira iqedsen , asmi i geccetka nnbi Ilyas i Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wat Isṛail ? Yenna :
45011003	A Sidi Ṛebbi ! Nɣan lenbiya i d ceggɛeḍ , hudden idekkanen anda i k-d-țqeddimen lɣaci iseflawen , anagar nekk i d yeqqimen yerna țnadin a yi-nɣen !
45011004	Lameɛna atah wamek i s-d-yerra Sidi Ṛebbi : Xtaṛ-aɣ-ed i yiman-iw sebɛa alaf n yergazen ur nseǧǧed ara zdat lmeṣnuɛ Baɛl .
45011005	Akka daɣen , di lweqt-agi i deg nella tura , llan kra seg wat Isṛail i geṭṭfen deg-s , d wid i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , s ṛṛeḥma-ines .
45011006	Mačči ɣef ddemma n lefɛayel-nsen i ten-yextaṛ meɛna s ṛṛeḥma-ines . Neɣ m'ulac ma yella s lefɛayel i gțextiṛi Sidi Ṛebbi , ṛṛeḥma-ines ur tețțusemma ara d ṛṛeḥma .
45011007	Amek ihi ? Ayen i nudan wat Isṛail ur t-wwiḍen ara , anagar wid i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i t-yewwḍen ; ma d wiyaḍ qquṛen wulawen-nsen .
45011008	Akken yura di tektabt iqedsen : Sidi Ṛebbi yeqfel lɛeqliya-nsen , allen-nsen ur țwalint ara , i meẓẓuɣen-nsen ur sellen ara , ar ass-agi .
45011009	Ula d Sidna Dawed yenna : Imensi n tmeɣṛiwin-nsen a sen-yuɣal ț-țasra anda ara ɣlin , d acebbak ara d-yesseɣlin . fell-asen lɛiqab uklalen
45011010	A d-yeɣli ṭṭlam ɣef wallen-nsen iwakken ur țwalin ara , lqedd-nsen ad yeknu i dayem !
45011011	Acu ara d-iniɣ ihi ? Eɛni at Isṛail ɣlin iwakken ur țțuɣalen ara a d kkren ? Xaṭi ! Lameɛna s tuccḍa-nsen i wwḍen leǧnas nniḍen ɣer leslak . D annect-agi i d-issekkren tismin i wat Isṛail .
45011012	Ma yella tuccḍa-nsen tesserbeḥ at ddunit , teṣṣaweḍ-iten ɣer leslak , ma yella lexsaṛa-nsen tewwi-d rrbeḥ i yegduden nniḍen , ihi acḥal meqqṛet lbaṛaka ara d-iffɣen seg-sen m'ara d-uɣalen ɣer webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi , iwakken ad țțuselken .
45011013	Nekk i d-ițwaceggɛen d ṛṛasul i leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail , fkiɣ aṭas n lqima i ccɣel-agi i yi-d ițțunefken
45011014	iwakken ma yella wamek , a d ssekkreɣ tismin i watmaten-iw n wat Isṛail , ahat ad țțuselken kra deg-sen .
45011015	Axaṭer ma yella aɛzal n wat Isṛail isemṣalaḥ leǧnas nniḍen akk-d Sidi Ṛebbi , acu ara yedṛun ihi m'ara d-uɣalen nutni ɣer webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi ? Ad yili am akken d ḥeggu i d-ḥyan si ger lmegtin !
45011016	Ma yella awren i tețqeddimem i Sidi Ṛebbi yeṣfa , ula d arukti yeṣfa ; ma yella izuṛan n ttejṛa ṣeḥḥan , ifurkawen daɣen ad ilin ṣeḥḥan .
45011017	Akka i tedṛa d wat Isṛail : kra n tṣedwa țwagezment si tzemmurt , kečč a win ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail , yellan d aḥeccad , tețwaleqmeḍ deg umkan-nsent ; ma yella tețțekkiḍ deg izuṛan n tzemmurt d zzit-is ,
45011018	ur ilaq ara aț-țḥeqṛeḍ tiseḍwa-nni yețwagezmen . ? ader iman-ik ɣef zzux , axaṭer mačči d kečč i geṭṭfen aẓar meɛna d aẓar i k-iṭṭfen .
45011019	A d-tiniḍ ihi : « țwagezment kra n tṣedwa iwakken ad țțuleqmeɣ nekkini » .
45011020	Ayagi ț-țideț ; nutni țwagezmen axaṭer ur uminen ara , ma d kečč teṭṭfeḍ amkan-nsen imi tumneḍ . ? ader iman-ik ɣef zzux , aggad Sidi Ṛebbi axiṛ-ik !
45011021	Axaṭer akken i gegzem tiseḍwa n laṣel n tzemmurt iwakken a k-ileqqem fell-as , i gezmer a k-igzem ula d kečč .
45011022	Meyyez ihi acḥal ḥnin Sidi Ṛebbi , acḥal daɣen yewɛeṛ : yewɛeṛ ɣer wid yeɣlin , ma d kečč d aḥnin ɣuṛ-ek ma teṭṭfeḍ di leḥnana-ines , neɣ m'ulac aț-țețwagezmeḍ ula d kečč .
45011023	Ula d at Isṛail m'ur kemmlen ara di leǧhel-nsen , zemren ad țțuleqmen , axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yezmer a ten ileqqem , a ten-yerr ɣer tzemmurt nsen .
45011024	Ma yella kečč i d-ițwagezmen seg uḥeccad , tețțuleqmeḍ ɣef tzemmurt n lɛali ɣas akken d aḥeccad i telliḍ , acḥal ihi i sen-ishel i nutni yellan ț-țiṣeḍwa n tzemmurt iwakken ad uɣalen ad țțuleqmen ɣef tzemmurt-nsen .
45011025	Ur bɣiɣ ara ay atmaten aț țețwaffer fell-awen lbaḍna-agi , iwakken ur tḥețțbem ara iman-nwen d wid yessnen . Kra seg wat Isṛail , sseɣṛen ulawen-nsen ɣef wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi yerna akka ara kemmlen di taɣaṛt-nsen alamma yewweḍ leslak i leǧnas meṛṛa .
45011026	Imiren ad țțuselken wat Isṛail irkul asmi ara d-yedṛu wayen i d-nnant tira iqedsen : A d-iffeɣ umsellek seg wedrar n Siyun , a sen-yekkes i warraw n Yeɛqub lekfeṛ-nsen ;
45011027	ț-țagi i d lemɛahda ara xedmeɣ yid-sen m'ara sen-kkseɣ ddnubat-nsen .
45011028	? ef wayen yeɛnan lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , at Isṛail uɣalen d iɛdawen n Ṛebbi , ma d kunwi tesfaydim-d deg wayagi . Meɛna ma nemmuqel ɣer lxetyaṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi , iḥemmel-iten ɣef ddemma n lejdud-nsen .
45011029	Axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ur ineddem ara ɣef wid yextaṛ neɣ deg wayen i d-yețțak .
45011030	Zik-nni tellam tɛuṣam Sidi Ṛebbi , lameɛna tețțunefk-awen-d ṛṛeḥma-ines i kunwi imi i t-ɛuṣan wat Isṛail ,
45011031	akken daɣen ara sen-d tețțune ula i nutni i t-iɛuṣan tura , ṛṛeḥma i wen-d-ițțunefken i kunwi .
45011032	Axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yeǧǧa imdanen meṛṛa a t-ɛaṣin iwakken a sen-d-ye daɣen meṛṛa ṛṛeḥma-ines .
45011033	Acḥal lqayit , acḥal meqqṛit leɛqel ț-țmusni n Sidi Ṛebbi ! Anwa i gzemren ad yissin lḥekmat-ines neɣ ad ifhem iberdan-is ?
45011034	Akken yura di tira iqedsen : Anwa i geṣṣawḍen ad yissin ixemmimen n Sidi Ṛebbi neɣ anwa i gzemren ad idebbeṛ fell-as ?
45011035	Anwa i s-yefkan kra d amezwaru iwakken ad yeṛǧu a s-t-id-yerr ?
45011036	Kullec yekka-d s ɣuṛ-es , kullec yella-d yis , kullec d ayla-s . I nețța lɛaḍima si lǧil ɣer lǧil , amin !
45012001	A kkun-nhuɣ ihi ay atmaten s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken aț-țsebblem lǧețțat-nwen d leɛqliya nwen am wesfel yeddren , zeddigen , yeṣfan ara iɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi ; ț-țagi i d ṭṭaɛa i gețṛaǧu deg-wen Sidi Ṛebbi .
45012002	Ur țɛanadet ara lǧil-agi n tura , meɛna ǧǧet Sidi Ṛebbi ad ibeddel ixemmimen-nwen d lɛeqliya-nwen iwakken aț-țissinem lebɣi-ines : ayen yelhan , ayen yeṣfan ur nesɛi lɛib , d wayen akk i t-iɛeǧben .
45012003	S ṛṛeḥma i yi-d-ițțunefken , a d iniɣ i mkul yiwen deg-wen : ur ssimɣuṛet ara iman-nwen , sqenɛet s wakken tellam , ddut s neyya ɣef leḥsab n liman i wen-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi .
45012004	Am akken nesɛa aṭas n lemfaṣel di lǧețța-nneɣ , meɛna mkul yiwen si lemfaṣel-nni s lxedma-ines ,
45012005	akken daɣen nukni , ɣas deg waṭas yid-nneɣ i nella , s tdukli-nneɣ nețțili d yiwet n lǧețța di Lmasiḥ , aql-aɣ meṛṛa d lemfaṣel wway gar-aneɣ , wa yeḥwaǧ wayeḍ .
45012006	Lameɛna di ṛṛeḥma-ines , Sidi Ṛebbi yefka-yaɣ-d tukciwin yemxalafen : ilaq yal yiwen ad ixdem ayen i s-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi , akken ilaq , s wul d liman :
45012007	ama d axebbeṛ s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , ama d leqdic ,
45012008	ama d aselmed , neɣ d nehhu . Ilaq daɣen win ițseddiqen , ad iseddeq mbla ṭṭmeɛ , win ițdebbiṛen ad idebbeṛ s ṣṣwab , win ițḥunnun ɣef yimeɣban ilaq ad iḥunn fell-asen s wul-is .
45012009	Ur seɛɛut ara sin wudmawen , ḥemmlet s wul yeṣfan , keṛhet cceṛ , ṭṭfet deg wayen yelhan .
45012010	Sɛut daymen leqdeṛ wway gar-awen ; sɛut leḥnana , myeḥmalet s leḥmala n tegmaț .
45012011	Qedcet ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi s wulawen-nwen d wayen yellan di tezmert-nwen , ẓewṛet , ur țțilit ara d imeɛdazen .
45012012	Feṛḥet ɣef ddemma n usirem i tesɛam , sɛut ṣṣbeṛ di tegniț n ccedda , deɛɛut dayem ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , ur ḥebbset ara .
45012013	Ɛiwnet atmaten-nwen di liman deg wayen uḥwaǧen , sṭerḥbet s lfeṛḥ s wid i d-yețțasen ɣuṛ-wen .
