45012014	Dɛut s lxiṛ i wid i kkun ițqehhiṛen , deɛɛut s lxiṛ , ur deɛɛut ara s cceṛ ;
45012015	feṛḥet d wid ifeṛḥen , țrut d win yețrun .
45012016	Ur xeddmet ara lxilaf wway-gar awen , ur ssimɣuṛet ara iman-nwen meɛna ddut s wannuz , ur ḥețbet ara iman-nwen d wid yesnen .
45012017	Ur țțarrat ara țțaṛ seg wid i kkun-iḍuṛṛen , nadit ɣef wayen yelhan zdat yemdanen meṛṛa .
45012018	Ma yella wamek ara d-tekk s ɣuṛ-wen lehna , ilit di lehna akk-d yemdanen meṛṛa .
45012019	Ur țțarrat ara țțaṛ ay imeɛzuzen , lameɛna ǧǧet kullec ger ifassen n Sidi Ṛebbi , d nețța ara ixedmen ccɣel-is . Atah wayen yuran di tira iqedsen : D nekk ara yerren țțaṛ , ara yerren i mkul yiwen ayen yukla l , i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi .
45012020	Yura daɣen : Ma yelluẓ weɛdaw-ik efk-as ad yečč , ma yeffud efk-as ad isew , axaṭer ma txedmeḍ akka , am akken ț-țirgin iṛeqqen ara tesserseḍ ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-is .
45012021	Ur țțaǧa ara cceṛ ad iṭṭef amkan deg ul-ik iwakken ad ixdem lebɣi-s , lameɛna eɣleb cceṛ s lxiṛ .
45013001	Mkul amdan , ilaq ad iqadeṛ imdebbṛen i gḥekkmen tamurt i deg yețɛici , axaṭer d Sidi Ṛebbi i d-iǧǧan lḥekma di ddunit , d nețța daɣen i gebɣan aț-țuɣal lḥekma-agi ɣer yifassen n yemdanen .
45013002	S wakka ihi , win ara ixalfen lḥekma i gesbedd Sidi Ṛebbi , d lameṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi i gɛuṣa , d lɛiqab kan ara d-isseɣli ɣef yiman-is .
45013003	Mačči d wid ixeddmen lxiṛ ara yaggaden imdebbṛen n lḥukuma meɛna d wid ixeddmen cceṛ . M'ur tebɣiḍ ara aț-țaggaḍeḍ lḥukuma , xdem ayen yelhan , a k-fken lehna .
45013004	Axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yefka-d lḥukuma i nnfeɛ-inek , meɛna ma txedmeḍ cceṛ , ɣas aggad-iț axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yefka i lḥukkam tazmert s wayes ara k-ɛaqben s lmut . Lḥukkam agi qeddcen ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a d-sbanen urrif-is m'ara ɛaqben wid ixeddmen cceṛ .
45013005	? ef wayagi , ilaq-aɣ a nḍuɛ imdebbṛen n lḥukuma , mačči ɣef ddemma n lɛiqab kan meɛna i lmend n lxaṭer-nneɣ .
45013006	Daymi daɣen i glaq aț-țxelṣem tabzert i lḥukuma , axaṭer wid ițdebbiṛen deg wannect-agi , xeddmen ccɣel-nsen akken i t-id yenna Sidi Ṛebbi .
45013007	Rret i mkul yiwen ayen i wen-ițțalas : xellṣet tabzert i kra win i wen-ițțalasen , aggadet win i glaq a t-taggadem , qadṛet win i glaq a t-tqadṛem .
45013008	? uṛ-wat a wen-ițalas yiwen lḥaǧa anagar leḥmala n wway gar-awen , axaṭer win iḥemmlen wiyaḍ , ixdem ayen akk i d-tenna ccariɛa .
45013009	Axaṭer lumuṛat n ccariɛa i d yeqqaṛen : Ur txeddmeḍ ara lɛaṛ , ur tneqqeḍ ara , ur tețțakreḍ ara , ur teṭṭamaɛeḍ ara , akk-d lumuṛ nniḍen meṛṛa nnejmaɛen deg yiwen n lameṛ-agi : Ilaq aț-țḥemleḍ wiyaḍ am yiman-ik .
45013010	Win yesɛan leḥmala deg wul-is ur ițḍuṛṛu ara wiyaḍ , ihi win iḥemmlen wiyaḍ , yexdem ayen akk i d-tenna ccariɛa .
45013011	Imi teẓram d acu n lweqt i deg nella , tura yewweḍ-ed lawan i deg ara d-akim si nuddam axaṭer ass n leslak iqeṛṛeb-ed ɣuṛ-nneɣ akteṛ n wass amezwaru i deg numen .
45013012	Qṛib ad yekfu yiḍ , ițeddu ad yali wass , a ndeggeṛ akkin ɣef yiman-nneɣ lexdayem n ṭṭlam , a nerfed leslaḥ s wayes ara neddu di tafat .
45013013	A nelḥu ɛinani s tezdeg akk-d ṣṣfa , di tafat n wass ; xḍut i ssikṛan d ccehwat , i leɛdez d lexdayem icemten , i čaqlalat ț-țismin .
45013014	Meɛna elset tudert tajḍiṭ i gellan di Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , ur țțaǧat ara iman-nwen a kkun-yawi ṭṭmeɛ n lebɣi n tnefsit-nwen .
45014001	Qeblet gar-awen win ur neǧhid ara di liman , ur kkatet ara deg-s ma ixuṣṣ di lefhama .
45014002	Axaṭer yiwen yumen belli yezmer ad yečč kullec , wayeḍ ixuṣṣen di liman ițkukru , itețț kan lxedṛa .
45014003	Win itețțen kullec ur ilaq ara ad iḥqeṛ win ur ntețț ara , win ur ntețț ara ur ilaq ara daɣen ad iḥaseb win itețțen , axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi iqbel-it akken yella .
45014004	D acu-k kečč iwakken aț-țḥasbeḍ aqeddac n wayeḍ ? Ma yella ixdem ccɣel-is neɣ yeqqim , ayagi d ccɣel n umɛellem-is ! Meɛna ad ibedd ɣer ccɣel-is , axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yesɛa tazmert iwakken a t-iṭṭef ur iɣelli ara .
45014005	Yella yiwen yeqqaṛ llan wussan yesɛan azal akteṛ n wiyaḍ , ma ɣer wayeḍ ussan akk ɛedlen ur mxalafen ara . Mkul yiwen ilaq ad itḥeqqeq deg wayen ițxemmim .
45014006	Win yețțaken azal i wussan akteṛ n wiyaḍ , ixeddem ayagi i Sidi Ṛebbi , win itețțen kullec , itețț s wul yeṣfan axaṭer yețḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wayen itețț ; win ur ntețț ara kullec , yexdem ayagi s wul yeṣfan imi ula d nețța ițḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wayen itețț .
45014007	Ihi ulac win yețɛicin i yiman-is , ulac daɣen win yemmuten i yiman-is .
45014008	Axaṭer ma nedder , nedder i Ṛebbi , ma nemmut , nemmut i Ṛebbi . Ihi ama nedder ama nemmut , nukni d ayla n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45014009	Axaṭer Lmasiḥ yemmut , yerna yeḥya-d iwakken ad yili d Aḥkim n wid yemmuten akk-d wid yeddren .
45014010	Ma d kečč acuɣeṛ i tețḥasabeḍ gma-k ? Acuɣer i t-tḥeqṛeḍ ? Eɛni ur nețɛeddi ara akk di ccṛeɛ zdat Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a ɣ-iḥaseb ?
45014011	Axaṭer yura di tektabt iqedsen : Nekk Illu , Ṛebbi yeddren , a d-iniɣ : yal tagecrirt aț-țeknu zdat-i , yal imi ad icehhed yis-i belli d nekk i d Ṛebbi .
45014012	Axaṭer yal yiwen deg-nneɣ ad ițțuḥaseb zdat Ṛebbi ɣef wayen yexdem .
45014013	Ur țemḥasabet ara ihi wway-gar awen , meɛna ḥadret iman-nwen iwakken ur txeddmem ara ayen ara yesseɣlin atmaten-nwen di ddnub .
45014014	? riɣ yerna țekleɣ ɣef wayen i d-yenna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ belli ulac ayen yețțuḥeṛmen di lmakla ; win iḥesben kra yețțuḥeṛṛem meɛna yečča-t , d leḥṛam fell-as .
45014015	Ma yella tesḥezneḍ gma-k ɣef ddemma n wayen i tțețțeḍ ur tesɛiḍ ara lmaḥibba . ? ader ihi aț-țiliḍ s lmakla-inek , d sebba n uɣelluy i gma-k i ɣef yemmut Lmasiḥ .
45014016	Ayen tḥesbem kunwi d ayen yelhan , ur ilaq ara ad yili d sebba s wayes ara wten deg-wen wiyaḍ .
45014017	Axaṭer tagelda n Sidi Ṛebbi mačči d lmakla neɣ ț-țissit meɛna d lḥeqq , d lehna akk-d lfeṛḥ s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
45014018	Win iteddun akka deg webrid n Lmasiḥ , ad yeɛǧeb i Ṛebbi , yerna ad yeɛziz ɣer yemdanen .
45014019	S wakka ihi , a nennadit ɣef wayen ara ɣ-d-yawin lehna , d wayen ara ɣ-isnernin di liman .
45014020	Ur ssexṛab ara ccɣel n Sidi Ṛebbi deg wul n gma-k ɣef ddemma n lmakla . S tideț , ayen akk yețmaččan d leḥlal , lameɛna d leḥṛam fell-ak ma telliḍ d sebba n uɣelluy n gma-k ɣef ddemma n wayen i tțețțeḍ .
45014021	Iwakken ur tețțiliḍ ara d sebba n uɣelluy n gma-k , xḍu i lmakla n weksum immezlen i ssadaț neɣ tissit n ccṛab , d wayen akk izemren ad yesseɣli gma-k di ddnub .
45014022	Ayen s wayes tumneḍ keččini , eǧǧ-it i yiman-ik gar-ak d Sidi Ṛebbi . D aseɛdi win ur nesseḍlam ara iman-is deg wayen i gxeddem .
45014023	Meɛna win yețcukkun deg wayen itețț , d leḥṛam fell-as , axaṭer ur itețț ara s nneya . Kra n wayen ur nețwaxdam ara s liman d nneya , d leḥṛam .
45015001	Nukni s wid iǧehden di liman , ilaq a neṣbeṛ i wid ur neǧhid ara , ur nețnadi ara ɣef wayen kan i ɣ-iɛeǧben i nukni .
45015002	Ilaq yal yiwen deg-nneɣ ad inadi ɣef nnfeɛ n wiyaḍ iwakken ad nnernin di liman .
45015003	Axaṭer Lmasiḥ ur inuda ara ɣef wayen i t-iɛeǧǧben , akken yura di tektabt n ? abur : Rregmat n wid i k-ikeṛhen ɣlint-ed fell-i .
45015004	Ayen akk yuran si zik , yura iwakken a nelmed amek ara nesɛu asirem s ṣṣbeṛ akk-d țmeṛǧiwt i d-țakent tira iqedsen .
45015005	Sidi Ṛebbi i d-ițakken lǧehd d ṣṣbeṛ , a wen-d-ye aț-țesɛum yiwen uxemmem wway gar-awen akken i t-id-isselmed Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ,
45015006	iwakken s yiwen n ṛṛay , s yiwet n taɣect aț-țḥemdem Ṛebbi , baba-s n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
45015007	? emyeqbalet wway gar-awen akken i kkun-iqbel Lmasiḥ i lɛaḍima n Sidi Ṛebbi .
45015008	Nniɣ-ed belli Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yusa-d d aqeddac n wat Isṛail iwakken ad ixdem ayen akken i gewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi i lejdud-nsen , yerna a d-isban s wakka belli Sidi Ṛebbi ur yețțuɣal ara deg wawal-is .
45015009	Yusa-d daɣen iwakken leǧnas nniḍen ad ḥemden Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef ṛṛeḥma-s akken yura di tektabt n ? abur : Daymi ara k-ḥemdeɣ ger leǧnas , yerna ad cnuɣ lɛaḍima n yisem-ik .
45015010	Yenna daɣen : A leǧnas feṛḥet akk-d wegdud n Sidi Ṛebbi !
45015011	Yura daɣen di tektabt n ? abur : ? emmdet Sidi Ṛebbi kunwi akk ay igduden , ḥemmdet Sidi Ṛebbi a leǧnas meṛṛa !
45015012	Nnbi Iceɛya yenna : A d-iffeɣ yiwen uxalaf seg uẓaṛ n Yassa , a d-ikker iwakken ad iḥkem ɣef yegduden ; l eǧnas meṛṛa ad ssirmen deg-s .
45015013	Sidi Ṛebbi yellan d Bab n usirem a d-issers fell-awen lfeṛḥ d lehna s liman i tesɛam deg-s , iwakken ul-nwen ad iččaṛ d asirem s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
45015014	? ef wayen i kkun-yeɛnan ay atmaten , tḥeqqeqeɣ belli teččuṛem d leḥnana akk-d lefhama yerna tzemrem aț-țemyenhum wway gar awen .
45015015	Ɛemdeɣ ɣef yimeslayen-agi i wen-uriɣ di tebṛaț-agi iwakken a wen-d-smektiɣ ayen akk i tlemdem . S ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi i yi-d ițțunefken ,
45015016	i lliɣ d aqeddac n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ɣef leǧnas nniḍen . Tura ccɣel-iw , d abecceṛ n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi i leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail , iwakken igduden meṛṛa ad uɣalen d lweɛda yeṣfan s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , d lweɛda ara iɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi .
45015017	S wakka , di tikli-inu akk-d Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , zemreɣ a d-iniɣ : feṛḥeɣ s lxedma i yi-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi .
45015018	Axaṭer ma yella wayen i ɣef ara d-ḥkuɣ , a d-ḥkuɣ kan ɣef wayen i gexdem Sidna Ɛisa yis-i , ama s imeslayen ama s lecɣal iwakken igduden ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail ad ḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi .
45015019	S licaṛat d lbeṛhanat i d-ideṛṛun s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , i beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ si temdint n Lquds armi ț-țamurt n Illirya di mkul amkan .
45015020	Xedmeɣ meǧhud-iw iwakken ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ anagar anda ur yețwassen ara Lmasiḥ iwakken ur bennuɣ ara ɣef lsas sbedden wiyaḍ , xedmeɣ am akken yura di tektabt n nnbi Iceɛya :
45015021	Wid iwumi ur yețwabecceṛ ara , ad walin ; wid ur nesli ara yis , ad fehmen .
45015022	D annect-a i yi-ṭṭfen acḥal d abrid ur n-usiɣ ara ɣuṛ-wen .
45015023	Tura imi kfiɣ lxedma-w di tmura-agi , yerna acḥal iseggasen aya i țmenniɣ a kkun-ẓreɣ , ssarmeɣ a n-ɛeddiɣ ɣuṛ-wen m'ara ṛuḥeɣ ɣer tmurt n Spenyul . Ur țṛuḥuɣ ara alamma sɛeddaɣ kra wussan yid-wen iwakken a nemyussan ; yerna ma yella wamek , a yi-tɛiwnem ad kemleɣ abrid-iw .
45015024	
45015025	Ma ț-țura ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer temdint n Lquds , ad awiɣ ayen ara iɛawnen iqeddacen n Sidi Ṛebbi yellan dinna .
45015026	Axaṭer atmaten-nneɣ n Masidunya akk-d wid n Akaya jemɛen-d ayen ara fken i watmaten-nneɣ imasiḥiyen n temdint n Lquds , i gellan d igellilen .
45015027	? - țideț ayagi xedmen-t s lebɣi nsen , lameɛna imasiḥiyen n temdint n Lquds uklalen lemɛawna-yagi . Axaṭer akken i weṛten yid-sen lbaṛakat i sen-d-yefka Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , akken daɣen nutni tura yewwi-d lḥal fell-asen a ten-ɛiwnen di tugniț n lexṣaṣ .
45015028	M'ara sen-fkeɣ ayen akk i sen-d jemɛen , ad ikfu ccɣel-agi , imiren ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer tmurt n Sbanya , a n-ɛeddiɣ ɣuṛ-wen .
45015029	? riɣ belli m'ara n-ṛuḥeɣ ɣuṛ wen , s lbaṛaka tameqqrant n Lmasiḥ ara n-aseɣ .
45015030	Di leɛnaya-nwen ay atmaten , s yisem n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ d leḥmala i d-yețțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , a wen-ssutreɣ a yi-tɛiwnem aț-țdeɛɛum ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi fell-i
45015031	iwakken a yi-ssemneɛ seg ifassen n wid yugin ad amnen di tmurt n Yahuda ; yerna ayen akka ara yawiɣ i watmaten n temdint n Lquds a ten-yaweḍ di laman iwakken ad feṛḥen yis .
45015032	S wakka ma yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi , a n-awḍeɣ s lfeṛḥ , ad steɛfuɣ dinna ɣuṛ-wen .
45015033	Sidi Ṛebbi yellan d Bab n lehna ad yili yid-wen meṛṛa ! Amin !
45016001	A kkun-weṣṣiɣ ɣef weltma tneɣ Fibya , nețțat illan ț-țaqeddact n Sidi Ṛebbi di tejmaɛt n temdint n Senkriya .
45016002	Sṭerḥbet yis s leqdeṛ , s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa , akken i glaq aț-țesṭeṛḥebem s watmaten . Ɛiwnet-eț deg wayen akk i teḥwaǧ , axaṭer aṭas n watmaten i tɛawen ; ula d nekk tɛawen-iyi .
45016003	? ṣiwḍet sslam i gma-tneɣ Akilas akk-d Briska , wid akken iqeddcen yid-i ɣef Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ,
45016004	wid akken i gqeblen ad sebblen tudert-nsen fell-i ; mačči d nekkini kan i ten icekkṛen meɛna ula ț-țijmuyaɛ n imasiḥiyen n mkul amkan cekkṛent ten .
45016005	? sellimet daɣen ɣef wid yețnejmaɛen deg wexxam-nsen , țsellimet ɣef gma-tneɣ Ibantus aḥbib eɛzizen fell-i , i gellan d amenzu yumnen s Lmasiḥ di tmurt n Asya .
45016006	? sellimet ɣef Meryem i genneɛtaben aṭas fell-awen .
45016007	? sellimet ɣef Andrunikus akk-d Yunya i yi-ițțilin yerna llan yid-i di lḥebs , wid eɛzizen ger ṛṛusul , nutni yumnen s Sidna Ɛisa uqbel ad amneɣ nekkini .
45016008	? sellimet ɣef Ambliyatus gma tneɣ , win eɛzizen fell-i di Lmasiḥ .
45016009	? sellimet ɣef gma-tneɣ Urban , win iqeddcen yid-nneɣ ɣef Lmasiḥ ; țsellimet daɣen ɣef Stakyis aḥbib-iw .
45016010	? sellimet ɣef Abalis , win i nwala amek i geṭṭef di Lmasiḥ . ? sellimet ɣef wat wexxam n gma tneɣ Aristubul .
45016011	? sellimet ɣef Hiṛudiɛun win i yi-ițțilin , țsellimet ɣef wat wexxam n Narsisus , wid yumnen s Lmasiḥ .
45016012	? sellimet ɣef tyessetmatin Trifina akk-d Trifusa i genneɛtaben ɣef lecɣal n Ṛebbi , țsellimet ɣef Bersidya eɛzizen , tin yenneɛtaben aṭas ɣef Lecɣal n Lmasiḥ .
45016013	? sellimet ɣef Rufus win yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d yemma-s i yi iḥesben am mmi-s .
45016014	? sellimet ɣef Asinkritus , Flegun , Hermis , Batrubas , Hermas akk-d watmaten nniḍen yellan yid-sen .
45016015	? sellimet ɣef Filulugus akk-d Julya , Niryus akk-d weltma-s , Ulimbas akk-d wid yumnen s Lmasiḥ yellan yid-sen .
45016016	Msalamet wway-gar-awen s sslam yeṣfan . Tijmuyaɛ akk n Lmasiḥ țselliment-ed fell-awen .
45016017	A kkun-weṣṣiɣ ay atmaten : ḥadret iman-nwen ɣef wid i d-ițțawin beṭṭu yerna skarayen ccwal , bɣan a wen-sɛeṛqen ayen i tlemdem , sbeɛdet iman-nwen fell-asen .
45016018	Axaṭer imdanen am wigi ur qeddcen ara ɣef Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ meɛna ɣef yiɛebbaḍ-nsen kan i qeddcen ; s ukellex akk-d imeslayen ẓiden , țseḥḥiren ulawen n wid yesɛan neyya .
45016019	Ma d kunwi , medden meṛṛa ẓran tḍuɛem Sidi Ṛebbi , d ayen i yi-sfeṛḥen . ? menniɣ aț-țxedmem ayen yelhan s ṣṣwab , ur s-țaǧǧat ara abrid i cceṛ .
45016020	Sidi Ṛebbi yellan d Bab n lehna , ur yețɛeṭṭil ara ad yemḥeq Cciṭan yerna a t-yerr seddaw iḍaṛṛen nwen . Ṛṛeḥma n Ɛisa Ssid-nneɣ aț-țili yid-wen !
45016021	Gma-tneɣ Timuti win iqeddcen yid-i akk-d Lusyus , Yazun , Susibatrus i yi-ițțilin țsellimen-d fell-awen .
45016022	Nekk Tertius i guran tabṛaț-agi țsellimeɣ daɣen fell-awen s yisem n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
45016023	Yețsellim-ed fell-awen Gayus win i ɣer țțiliɣ anda țnejmaɛen daɣen watmaten meṛṛa . Erastus , win yeṭṭfen asenduq n yedrimen n temdint akk-d gma-tneɣ Kartus țsellimen-d fell-awen .
45016024	Ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ aț-țili yid-wen meṛṛa ! Amin !
45016025	Yețțubarek Sidi Ṛebbi yesɛan tazmert a ɣ-yesseǧhed di liman , akken i t-țbecciṛeɣ di lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i d yewwi Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , iwakken a d-isban lbaḍna n Sidi Ṛebbi yețwaffren seg wasmi tebda ddunit ,
45016026	meɛna sḍehṛent-ț-id lenbiya s wayen uran akken i sen-t-id-yumeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , Illu n dayem . Tura leǧnas meṛṛa slan i lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ iwakken a ten-id-yawi ɣer ṭṭaɛa-ines s liman .
45016027	Lɛaḍima i Sidi Ṛebbi awḥid , Bab n tmusni d leɛqel , s Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ si lǧil ɣer lǧil ! Amin !
46001001	Nekk Bulus , iwumi i d-issawel Sidi Ṛebbi s lebɣi-ines iwakken ad iliɣ d amceggeɛ n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d gma-tneɣ Sustin ,
46001002	i tejmaɛt n Sidi Ṛebbi i gellan di temdint n Kurintus , i wid i d-yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ad ilin d imqedsen , d wid akk yellan di mkul amkan ineddhen s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , i gellan d Ssid-nsen d Ssid nneɣ :
46001003	ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi Baba-tneɣ akk-d Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
46001004	Zgiɣ țḥemmideɣ Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen ɣef ṛṛeḥma i wen-d-yefka s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ,
46001005	axaṭer yis i kkun-id yeṛzeq s mkul lxiṛ , ama s wawal-is ama s tmusni-ines ,
46001006	imi cchada ɣef Lmasiḥ tṛeṣṣa nezzeh deg-wen .
46001007	Daymi ur kkun-ixuṣṣ wacemma n lxiṛ s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi , kunwi yețṛaǧun ass i deg ara d-yuɣal Ssid-nneɣ .
46001008	A kkun isseǧhed alamma ț-țaggara iwakken a d-tbanem mbla lɛib ass n tuɣalin n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
46001009	Sidi Ṛebbi yețțaṭaf deg wawal-is ; d nețța i wen-d-issawlen iwakken aț-țɛicem s tdukli akk-d Mmi-s , Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ .
46001010	Ay atmaten , a kkun-nhuɣ s yisem n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ : msefhamet wway gar-awen , ur ilaq ara a d-yili beṭṭu gar-awen , ddukklet , sɛut yiwen uxemmem d yiwen n ṛṛay .
46001011	Axaṭer ay atmaten , irgazen n wexxam n Kluwi ṣṣawḍen-iyi-d lexbaṛ belli ițțili-d umennuɣ gar-awen .
46001012	Ayen bɣiɣ a d-iniɣ : sliɣ belli llan gar-awen wid yeqqaṛen : « nekk ddiɣ d Bulus » , ma d wayeḍ yeqqaṛ : « nekk țekkiɣ d Abulus » , wayeḍ daɣen : « nekk ddiɣ d Buṭrus » , llan daɣen wid yeqqaṛen : « nekk țekkiɣ di Lmasiḥ » .
46001013	Amek akka , tɣilem Lmasiḥ yebḍa ? Eɛni d Bulus i gețwasemmṛen fell-awen neɣ s yisem n Bulus i tețwaɣeḍsem ?
46001014	Ad ḥemmdeɣ Ṛebbi imi ur sɣeḍseɣ ula d yiwen deg-wen anagar Krisbus d Gayus .
46001015	Akka , yiwen deg-wen ur izmir a d-yini belli yețwaɣḍes s yisem-iw .
46001016	Tella daɣen twacult n Stifanas , d nekk i ț-isɣeḍsen meɛna ur ḥsiɣ ara sɣeḍseɣ yiwen nniḍen dinna .
46001017	Lmasiḥ ur iyi-d-iceggeɛ ara iwakken ad sɣeḍseɣ meɛna iceggeɛ iyi-d ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ; mačči s yimeslayen i d-yekkan si lefhama n wemdan iwakken ur tekkseɣ ara lqima i lmut n Lmasiḥ ɣef wumidag .
46001018	Ț-țideț , abecceṛ n lmut n Lmasiḥ ɣef wumidag ț-țidderwect i wid iḍaɛen ; meɛna ɣuṛ-nneɣ nukni yellan deg webrid n leslak , ț-țazmert n Ṛebbi .
46001019	Atan wayen i d-nnant tira iqedsen : Ad snegreɣ tamusni n imusnawen , ad rreɣ d ula + c lefhama n wid ifehmen + .
46001020	Anda-t uɛeqli ? Anda-t umusnaw ? Anda-t uḥṛic ara d-isfehmen ayen ideṛṛun di lǧil-agi ? Ur d-isbeggen ara Sidi Ṛebbi belli tamusni n ddunit-agi d lehbala ?
46001021	Imi at ddunit s lefhama-nsen ur ɛqilen ara tamusni n Sidi Ṛebbi , nețța yebɣa ad isellek wid yumnen yis s lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ i ḥesben wiyaḍ d lehbala .
46001022	At Isṛail ssuturen lbeṛhanat , iyunaniyen țnadin tamusni ;
46001023	ma d nukni nețbecciṛ Lmasiḥ , win akken yețțusemmṛen ɣef wumidag , yellan d țbehdila i wat Isṛail , d lehbala ɣer iyunaniyen .
46001024	Meɛna wid iwumi i d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi , ama d at Isṛail ama d iyunaniyen , umnen belli d nețța i d Lmasiḥ , i ț-țazmert n Ṛebbi akk-d tmusni-ines .
46001025	Axaṭer ayen akken ḥesben yemdanen d lehbala n Sidi Ṛebbi , ț-țamusni iṣeḥḥan akteṛ n tmusni n yemdanen , ayen ḥesben daɣen d feccal n Sidi Ṛebbi , yeɣleb lǧehd n yemdanen .
46001026	Walit ay atmaten , kunwi iwumi d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi : ur llin gar-awen aṭas n wid yesɛan tamusni n ddunit , ur llin aṭas n wid yesɛan imukan ɛlayen , ur llin daɣen aṭas inaṣliyen yesɛan lqima tameqqrant ;
46001027	meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yextaṛ ayen yellan d lehbala ɣer wemdan iwakken ad isneḥcam imusnawen , yextaṛ ayen ur nesɛi tazmert di ddunit iwakken ad isneḥcam wid iǧehden .
46001028	Sidi Ṛebbi yextaṛ ayen ur nesɛi azal , yețwaḥeqṛen di ddunit akk-d wayen yețwaḥesben d ulac , iwakken ad isseɣli lqima n wayen yesɛan azal ɣer yemdanen .
46001029	Akka , yiwen ur izmir ad izuxx zdat Sidi Ṛebbi .
46001030	Imi d Sidi Ṛebbi i kkun-isdukklen d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , d nețța i ɣ-yuɣalen d lefhama i d yekkan s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi . Yis i ɣ yerra Sidi Ṛebbi d iḥeqqiyen , iṣeffa tikli-nneɣ , yefda-yaɣ-d si ddnub .
46001031	Am akken yura di tira iqedsen : Win yebɣan ad izuxx , ad izuxx s lecɣal n Ṛebbi .
46002001	Daymi ay atmaten mi n-ṛuḥeɣ ɣuṛ wen iwakken a wen mmeslayeɣ ɣef lbaḍna n Sidi Ṛebbi , ur a wen mmeslayeɣ ara s yimeslayen yeččuṛen d zzux neɣ s tmusni yessewhamen .
46002002	Axaṭer ur nudaɣ ara a d mmeslayeɣ gar-awen ɣef wayen nniḍen anagar ɣef Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ; Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i gețwaṣemmṛen ɣef wumidag .
46002003	Ula d nekk asmi lliɣ ɣuṛ-wen , lliɣ fecleɣ , kukraɣ yerna tekcem-iyi tugdi .
46002004	Ayen i wen-slemdeɣ d wayen i wen-beccṛeɣ ur yebni ara ɣef tmusni n wemdan , lameɛna d ayen yebnan ɣef tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
46002005	Akka , liman-nwen ur yețrus ara ɣef tmusni n yemdanen , meɛna ɣef tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi .
46002006	Nesselmad tamusni-agi i wid yesɛan liman iǧehden ; tamusni-agi , mačči ț-țamusni n ddunit-agi neɣ ț-țin n tezmar n igelliden n ddunit-agi iteddun ɣer nnger .
46002007	Nețbecciṛ tamusni n Sidi Ṛebbi yellan d lbaḍna yeffren ɣef yemdanen , i ghegga si zik i lɛezz-nneɣ .
46002008	Ula d yiwen deg igelliden n zzman-agi ur ț-yessin , lemmer ssnen-ț tili ur semmṛen ara Bab n tmanegt ɣef wumidag .
46002009	Am akken i t-id-nnant tira iqedsen : Ayen ur twala tiṭ , ayen ur yesli umeẓẓuɣ + , ayen ɣef ur ixemmem ara wemdan , + d ayen i ghegga Sidi Ṛebbi i wid i t-iḥemmlen + .
46002010	Sidi Ṛebbi ibeggen-aɣ-t-id i nukni s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen . Axaṭer Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yezmer ad iẓer ulamma d lecɣal yeffren n Sidi Ṛebbi .
46002011	Anwa i geẓran ayen yellan deg wul n wemdan ? Anagar ṛṛuḥ-ines i geẓran ayen yellan deg wul-is . Yiwen ur yessin daɣen ixemmimen n Ṛebbi anagar Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi .
46002012	Nukni mačči d ṛṛuḥ n ddunit i neqbel , meɛna d Ṛṛuḥ i d-yekkan s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , iwakken a nissin ayen akk i ɣ-d-yefka s ṛṛeḥma-ines .
46002013	Nukni ur nețmeslay ara s yimeslayen i tesselmad tmusni n wemdan , meɛna nețmeslay s yimeslayen i ɣ-isselmad Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi . Akka i nessefham tideț n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i wid yesɛan Ṛṛuḥ-agi .
46002014	Amdan ițeddun s lɛeqliya n ddunit ur iqebbel ara ayen i d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi imi ɣuṛ-es ayagi d lehbala ; ur yezmir ara a t-yissin axaṭer s Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi i nezmer a t-nefhem .
46002015	Amdan yesɛan Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi yezmer ad ifhem kullec , ma d nețța , yiwen ur izmir a t-iḥaseb .
46002016	Akken yura di tira iqedsen : Anwa i gessnen ixemmimen n + Sidi Ṛebbi , + anwa i gzemren a t-yenhu + ? Ma d nukni , nesɛa axemmem n Lmasiḥ .
46003001	Ay atmaten , ur ufiɣ ara amek ara wen-mmeslayeɣ am akken țmeslayeɣ i yemdanen yesɛan Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , meɛna mmeslayeɣ-awen am yemdanen n ddunit , am wid yellan d arrac deg ubrid n Lmasiḥ .
46003002	Fkiɣ-awen ayefki mačči d aɣṛum axaṭer aɣṛum ur as-tezmirem ara , yerna ar tura ur as-tezmirem ara , mazal-ikkun tețɛicim s lebɣi n tnefsit nwen .
46003003	Imi mazal gar-awen tismin d umceččew , tbeggnem-d belli mazal ikkun tețɛicim s lɛeqliya-nwen yerna tleḥḥum am yemdanen n ddunit .
46003004	M'ara yini yiwen deg-wen : « nekk ddiɣ d Bulus » , wayeḍ ad yini : « Nekk țekkiɣ d Abulus » ; eɛni ayagi mačči d lɛeqliya n ddunit ?
46003005	D acu-t Abulus , d acu-t Bulus ? D iqeddacen kan i kkun-id-yewwin aț-țamnem s Lmasiḥ ! Yal yiwen deg-nneɣ ixeddem ayen i s-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi a t-yexdem .
46003006	Nekk ẓẓiɣ imɣi , Abulus issew-it , meɛna d Sidi Ṛebbi i t-issegman .
46003007	Ihi mačči d win ițeẓẓun neɣ d win yesswayen i gesɛan azal meɛna d Sidi Ṛebbi yessegmuyen .
46003008	Win ițeẓẓun d win yesswayen ɛedlen ; mkul yiwen a s-yerr Sidi Ṛebbi s wakken yuklal di lxedma-s .
46003009	Axaṭer aql-aɣ neddukkel d iqeddacen ɣef lecɣal n Sidi Ṛebbi . Kunwi d iger i gxeddem Sidi Ṛebbi , d axxam i gbennu .
46003010	S ṛṛeḥma i yi-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi , am umusnaw n lebni , nekk sserseɣ lsas , wayeḍ yebna fell-as ; meɛna yal yiwen ad iḥader amek ara yebnu .
46003011	Yiwen ur izmir ad issers lsas nniḍen deg wemkan n win yersen yakan : Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
46003012	Ma yella win yebnan ɣef lsas-agi ama s ddheb , ama s lfeṭṭa , ama s yeẓra ɣlayen , ama s wesɣaṛ neɣ s wusaɣuṛ d walim ,
46003013	mkul yiwen a d-iban ccɣel-is ass n lḥisab , axaṭer mkul ccɣel ad iɛeddi di tmes ; ț-țimes ara d-ibeggnen lecɣal n yal yiwen ma seḥḥan neɣ ur ṣeḥḥan ara .
46003014	Win yebnan ɣef lsas , ur t-tečči ara tmes wayen akken yebna , a t-id-yaweḍ lxiṛ ameqqran ;
46003015	ma d win iwumi tečča tmes wayen yexdem , a s-iṛuḥ lxiṛ-is ; ma d nețța ad ițțusellek , am win izegren times imneɛ .
46003016	Ur teẓrim ara belli kunwi d lǧameɛ n Sidi Ṛebbi i tellam ? Ur teẓrim ara belli Ṛṛuḥ-is yezdeɣ deg-wen ?
46003017	Ihi win yesseɣlin axxam n Sidi Ṛebbi , Sidi Ṛebbi a t-isseɣli axaṭer axxam n Sidi Ṛebbi d imqeddes , d kunwi i d axxam-is .
46003018	Ḥadret ad yili win ara iɣuṛṛen iman-is ! Ma yella gar-awen win iḥesben iman-is d aɛeqli di ddunit-a , ilaq ad yuɣal d amehbul iwakken ad yili d aɛeqli .
46003019	Axaṭer tamusni n ddunit-agi , ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi d lehbala . Tira iqedsen nnant-ed : Sidi Ṛebbi yețțeṭṭef imusnawen di tḥila-nsen .
46003020	Yura daɣen : Sidi Ṛebbi yessen ixemmimen n imusnawen , yeẓra belli d ixemmimen ur nesɛi azal .
46003021	Ḥadret ad yili win ara izuxxen s yemdanen , axaṭer kullec d ayla nwen ;
46003022	Bulus , Abulus neɣ Buṭrus , ddunit , tudert , lmut , lweqt-a d lweqt i d-iteddun , kullec d ayla-nwen ;
46003023	kunwi d ayla n Lmasiḥ , Lmasiḥ d ayla n Sidi Ṛebbi .
46004001	Ilaq a ɣ-ḥesben yemdanen belli d iqeddacen kan n Lmasiḥ i nella , d wid i gwekkel Sidi Ṛebbi i wessefhem n lbaḍna-ines .
46004002	Acu i nețṛaǧu deg win i nwekkel ɣef lḥaǧa ? Nețṛaǧu a nețkel fell-as !
46004003	Nekk , ur iyi-d-tewqiɛ ara ma yella tesḍelmem-iyi kunwi neɣ ma isseḍlem-iyi ccṛeɛ n yemdanen ; nekk daɣen ur sḍelmeɣ ara iman-iw ,
46004004	ɣas akken ur iyi-isseḍlem ara wul-iw , mačči d ayagi ara d-isbeggnen belli d aḥeqqi i lliɣ , axaṭer d Sidi Ṛebbi ara yi-ḥasben .
46004005	Daymi ur țḥasabet ara uqbel lweqt , uqbel tuɣalin n Ssid-nneɣ ; d nețța ara d-isbeggnen s tafat-is ayen yeffren di ṭṭlam , ara d-ibeggnen daɣen ayen yeffren deg wulawen . Imiren yal yiwen ad isɛu ccan yuklal ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
46004006	Ay atmaten , ayen akka i d-nniɣ fell-i akk-d Abulus nniɣ-t-id iwakken aț-țfehmem lmeɛna n lemtel-agi : « Ur țɛeddit ara akkin i tilas n wayen yuran » ; ilaq yiwen ur ixeddem lxilaf ger yemdanen , iwakken ad izuxx s yiwen deg-sen .
46004007	Ihi anwa i k-yessulin ccan sennig wiyaḍ ? Acu ur k-d-nekki ara s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi deg wayen akk tesɛiḍ ? Imi d nețța i k-d-yefkan , acuɣeṛ i tețcekkiṛeḍ iman-ik am akken mačči s ɣuṛ-es i k-d-yekka ?
46004008	Atan teṛwam yakan , tuɣalem d imeṛkantiyen ! Tuɣalem d imḍebbṛen mbla nukni , acḥal bɣiɣ lemmer ț-țideț tzemrem i yiman-nwen iwakken a nḍebbeṛ s tdukli !
46004009	Nukni yellan d imceggɛen n Lmasiḥ , yefka-yaɣ Ṛebbi imukan ineggura ; aql-aɣ am wid ibuṣan , am wid i tețɛassa lmut , tfeṛṛeǧ deg-nneɣ ddunit meṛṛa , am lmalayekkat , am yemdanen .
46004010	Nukni d imehbal ɣef ddemma n Lmasiḥ , ma d kunwi d iɛeqliyen di tikli-nwen akk-d Lmasiḥ ! Nukni nefcel , kunwi tesɛam tazmert ; nukni nețwaḥqeṛ ma d kunwi tesɛam ccan !
46004011	Ar tura , aql-aɣ neqqim i laẓ d fad , neɛra , nețwet , nețmenṭar si tama ɣer tayeḍ ;
46004012	nețɛețțib iman nneɣ a nexdem iwakken a d-nawi aɣṛum-nneɣ s ifassen-nneɣ . M'ara ɣ-reggmen nukni nețbarak-iten , m'ara ɣ-țqehhiṛen nukni nețțawi-yasen ,
46004013	m'ara d-inin ayen n diri fell-aneɣ nenehhu-ten . Ar tura ḥesben-aɣ am iḍumman n ddunit , am ineggura n yemdanen .
46004014	Ur wen-d-uriɣ ara ayagi iwakken a kkun-sneḥcameɣ , meɛna iwakken a kkun-sfehmeɣ am arraw iw i ḥemmleɣ .
46004015	Ɣas ma llan ɛecṛa alaf yemdanen i kkun isselmaden deg webrid n Lmasiḥ , yiwen n baba-twen kan i tesɛam di Lmasiḥ , imi d nekk i kkun-id-yewwin ɣer webrid n Lmasiḥ s Lexbaṛ n lxiṛ .
46004016	A kkun-weṣṣiɣ ihi aț-țeddum am akken ddiɣ nekkini .
46004017	Ɣef wayagi i wen-ceggɛeɣ Timuti , mmi eɛzizen di Lmasiḥ , iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a wen-d-yesmekti amek i leḥḥuɣ deg webrid n Lmasiḥ , akken i t-sselmadeɣ di mkul tajmaɛt n watmaten .
46004018	Kra deg-wen ikcem-iten zzux , ɣilen ur n-țṛuḥuɣ ara a kkun-ẓreɣ ?
46004019	Meɛna ma yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi , qṛib a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen . Ad ẓreɣ widak-agi yețzuxxun , mačči d imeslayen-nsen kan iwumi ara ḥesseɣ meɛna ad waliɣ ayen iwumi izemren .
46004020	Axaṭer tazmert n tgeldit n Sidi Ṛebbi mačči d imeslayen kan ara ț-id-isbeggnen , meɛna d lecɣal .
46004021	D acu i tebɣam ? A n-aseɣ ɣuṛ wen s uɛekkaz , neɣ s wul yeččuṛen d leḥmala akk-d leḥnana ?
46005001	Di mkul amkan nesla yedṛa leḥṛam d ameqqran gar-awen , d ayen ur nețțaf ara ulamma ger leǧnas nniḍen , tessawḍem armi yiwen deg-wen yețɛic di leḥṛam akk ț-țmeṭṭut n baba-s !
46005002	Yerna mazal-ikkun tețzuxxum ! Ilaq-awen aț-țilim di leḥzen , argaz i gxeddmen annect-agi ilaq a t tessufɣem si gar-awen ;
46005003	ma d nekk , ɣas beɛdeɣ fell-awen leɛqel-iw yella yid-wen ; atan sḍelmeɣ win ixedmen lɛaṛ-agi am akken lliɣ yid-wen .
46005004	S yisem n Sidna Ɛisa , s tezmert is , nnejmaɛet aql-i yid-wen :
46005005	ssufɣet akkin argaz am wagi , sellmet-eț i tezmert n Cciṭan ad issenger lǧețța-s iwakken ṛṛuḥ-is ad ițwasellek ass n tuɣalin n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa .
46005006	A wen-d-iniɣ : zzux-agi-nwen ur imɛin ara ! Eɛni ur tessinem ara lemtel i d-yeqqaṛen belli cwiṭ n yiɣes n temtunt yessalay arukti meṛṛa ?
46005007	Ssizdeget iman-nwen , kkset si gar-awen tamtunt ( iɣes ) taqdimt n ddnub iwakken aț-țilim d arukti ajdid yeṣfan . Ț-țideț d arukti ajdid yeṣfan i tellam , axaṭer Tafaska-nneɣ tebda , imi Lmasiḥ yellan d izimer nneɣ n leslak yefka iman-is d asfel .
46005008	Tura ihi a nkemmel lɛid weɣṛum mbla tamtunt ( iɣes ) , mačči s temtunt-nni ixesṛen yellan d ddnub akk-d cceṛ , meɛna s weɣṛum ur nesɛi tamtunt ( iɣes ) yellan d ṣṣfa akk-d tideț .
46005009	Di tebṛaț-nni i wen-n-uriɣ , nniɣ awen-d ur țeddut ara d wid yețɛicin di leḥṛam .
46005010	Ur wen-d-nniɣ ara annect-agi ɣef wat ddunit yețɛicin di leḥṛam , yeččuṛen d ṭṭmeɛ , d lexdeɛ ț-țukeṛda , yețɛebbiden lmeṣnuɛat am Ṛebbi , neɣ m'ulac ilaq-awen aț-țeffɣem si ddunit-agi .
46005011	Meɛna nniɣ-awen-d : ur țemxalaḍet ara d win yețțarran iman-is d amasiḥi yili nețța yețɛici di leḥṛam , yeččuṛ d ṭṭmeɛ , d lexdeɛ , iheddeṛ ɣef wiyaḍ , iɛebbed lmeṣnuɛat , d asekṛan , d amakar . Ur țɣimit ara d wergaz am agi ulamma ɣer lqut .
46005012	Acu ara ɣ-yawin a nḥaseb wid n beṛṛa ? Eɛni mačči d wid yellan gar-awen i glaq aț-țḥasbem ?
46005013	Wid n beṛṛa d Ṛebbi ara ten-iḥasben . Meɛna akken yura di tira iqedsen : Stixṛet amcum si gar-awen .
46006001	Ma yella yiwen deg-wen yebɣa ad iccetki ɣef gma-s , amek ara iṛuḥ a t-icaṛeɛ zdat wid ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ , mačči zdat wid yumnen am nețța ?
46006002	Eɛni ur teẓrim ara d wid yumnen s Lmasiḥ ara iḥasben at ddunit ? Ma yella ihi d kunwi ara iḥasben at ddunit , amek ur tețțizmirem ara aț-țefrum timsalin timecṭuḥin ?
46006003	Ur teẓrim ara belli a nḥaseb lmalayekkat ? Anda ara d-banent temsalin n ddunit-agi !
46006004	Ma d kunwi m'ara yili lxilaf gar-awen , tețṛuḥum ɣer wid ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ iwakken ad frun tilufa-nwen !
46006005	Ur tețneḥcamem ara ! Eɛni ulac ula d yiwen n wergaz ifehmen gar awen , i gzemren ad ifru timsalin ger watmaten ?
46006006	Meɛna kunwi atan wa yețcetki ɣef wa , yerna ɣer wid ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ !
46006007	Ihi amennuɣ i d-yețțilin gar awen , ițbeggin-ed lɛib-nwen . Acuɣeṛ ur tṣebbṛem ara axiṛ ad iɛeddi fell-awen lbaṭel , acuɣeṛ ur tețțaǧǧam ara iman-nwen aț-țețțuɛerrim ?
46006008	Meɛna d kunwi i d imesbaṭliyen , tețɛerrim wiyaḍ ɣas akken d atmaten-nwen !
46006009	Eɛni ur teẓrim ara belli wid ixeddmen lbaṭel ur keččmen ara ɣer tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi ? Ur țɣuṛṛut ara iman-nwen axaṭer kra n win yețɛicin di leḥṛam neɣ wid iɛebbden lmeṣnuɛat , wid ixeddmen zzna , at leɛṛuṛ ,
46006010	wid yețțakren , wid itețțen ayla n medden , wid ireggmen , ixeddaɛen akk-d isekṛanen , ur keččmen ara tagelda n Sidi Ṛebbi .
46006011	Akka i llan yakan kra deg-wen uqbel ad amnen . Meɛna ddnub-nwen yurad , tețwaxtaṛem iwakken aț-țilim d ayla n Sidi Ṛebbi , tuɣalem d iḥeqqiyen zdat Ṛebbi s yisem n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi , Illu-nneɣ .
46006012	Kra deg-wen qqaṛen : « Ɣuṛ-i kullec d leḥlal » , meɛna mačči d kullec i kkun-inefɛen ; zemreɣ a d-iniɣ : kullec d leḥlal ɣuṛ-i , meɛna ur țțaǧaɣ ara lḥaǧa a yi-temlek .
46006013	Lqut yella-d i wɛebbuḍ , aɛebbuḍ yella-d i lqut ; a d-yas wass i deg ara ten-yessenger Sidi Ṛebbi i sin . Meɛna lǧețța ur d-tețwaxleq ara i yir tikli , tețwaxleq-ed iwakken aț-țqeddec ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi i ț-isedduyen .
46006014	Sidi Ṛebbi i d-yessekren Sidna Ɛisa si ger lmegtin , a ɣ-d-isseḥyu ula d nukni s tezmert-is .
46006015	Ur teẓrim ara belli lǧețțat-nwen d lemfaṣel n Lmasiḥ ? Eɛni zemreɣ a d-ddmeɣ lemfaṣel n Lmasiḥ iwakken a ten-erreɣ d lemfaṣel n tmeṭṭut ixeddmen asekkak yeɛni zzna ? Ur zmireɣ ara !
46006016	Ur teẓrim ara belli win ara yeznun nețța akk-d yir tameṭṭut ad yuɣal yid-es d yiwen ? Akken yura di tira iqedsen : Di sin ad uɣalen d yiwet n lǧețța .
46006017	Akka daɣen win ara iḥemmlen Lmasiḥ ad yili yid-es s yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ .
46006018	Xḍut i yir tikli ! Kra n ddnub i gezmer a t-ixdem wemdan ițɣimi beṛṛa n lǧețța-s , ma d win ara ixedmen zzna yessewsex lǧețța-s .
46006019	Ur teẓrim ara daɣen belli Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yezdeɣ di lǧețțat-nwen ? Ṛṛuḥ-nni i wen-d-ițțunefken s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ? Ur teẓrim ara belli ur tețțalasem ara deg yiman-nwen ?
46006020	Axaṭer yella win i kkun-id-ifdan s wazal d ameqqran , ɣlayen . Ɛuzzet ihi Sidi Ṛebbi di lǧețțat-nwen .
46007001	A nɛeddit tura ɣer isteqsiyen i yi-d-tefkam di tebṛaț-nwen teqqaṛem : « D ayen yelhan i wergaz m'ur yezwiǧ ara » .
46007002	Ț-țideț , meɛna iwakken ur d-yețțili ara leḥṛam , axiṛ-as i wergaz ad yesɛu tameṭṭut-is , axiṛ-as i tmeṭṭut aț-țesɛu argaz-is .
46007003	Argaz ilaq ad ixdem lebɣi i tmeṭṭut-is , tameṭṭut daɣen ilaq aț-țexdem lebɣi i wergaz-is .
46007004	Tameṭṭut ur tezmir ara aț-țexdem ayen tebɣa s lǧețța-s , axaṭer lǧețța-s d ayla n wergaz-is ; argaz daɣen ur yezmir ara ad yexdem ayen i gebɣa s lǧețța-s , axaṭer lǧețța-s d ayla n tmeṭṭut-is .
46007005	Ur țemyagit ara gar-awen anagar ma yella temsefhamem iwakken aț-țeǧǧem kra n wussan i tẓallit ; imiren ddukklet daɣen ; ḥadret a wen-yaf Cciṭan abrid a kkun-iɣuṛṛ ma yella ur tezmirem ara aț-țeṭṭfem iman-nwen .
46007006	Ayagi mačči d lameṛ i wen-fkiɣ , meɛna d aweṣṣi kan i kkun-weṣṣaɣ .
46007007	Lemmer ufiɣ medden akk ad ilin am nekk , meɛna mkul yiwen d acu i s-d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi , wa yefka-yas-d aya , wayeḍ yefka-yas-d ayen nniḍen .
46007008	I wid ur nezwiǧ ara akk-d tuǧǧal a sen-iniɣ : yelha-yasen ma qqimen am nekk .
46007009	Meɛna m'ur zmiren ara ad ṭṭfen iman-nsen , ad zewǧen axiṛ . Axiṛ-asen ad zewǧen wala aț-țecɛel tmes deg wulawen-nsen .
46007010	A d-fkeɣ lameṛ i imasiḥiyen izewǧen ; lameṛ-agi mačči s ɣuṛ-i i d-yekka meɛna s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi : tameṭṭut izewǧen ur ilaq ara aț-țeǧǧ argaz-is :
46007011	ma yella teǧǧa-t , ur s-ilaq ara aț-țɛawed zzwaǧ . Neɣ ma tebɣa , tezmer aț-țemṣalaḥ yid-es aț-țuɣal ɣuṛ-es . Argaz daɣen ur s-ilaq ara ad yebru i tmeṭṭut-is .
46007012	Ɣef wayen yeɛnan wiyaḍ atan wayen zemreɣ a d-iniɣ ( ayagi s ɣuṛ-i mačči s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ) : ma yella yiwen seg watmaten yesɛa tameṭṭut ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ yili teqbel aț-țeqqim d wergaz-is , ur ilaq ara a s-yebru ;
46007013	akken daɣen , tameṭṭut tamasiḥit yesɛan argaz ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ yili yeqbel ad iɛic yid-es , ur ilaq ara aț-țerwel fell-as .
46007014	Axaṭer argaz ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ yella seddaw leɛnaya n Sidi Ṛebbi s tmeṭṭut-is yumnen ; daɣen tameṭṭut ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ , tella seddaw leɛnaya n Sidi Ṛebbi s wergaz-is yumnen ; neɣ m'ulac dderya-nsen ad țwaḥesben d dderya n leḥṛam nutni yellan d dderya n leḥlal .
46007015	Ma yella win ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ yebɣa ad imfaṛaq akk-d tmeṭṭut-is i gumnen , neɣ tameṭṭut ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ tebɣa aț-țemfaṛaq akk-d wergaz-is i gumnen , zemren ad mfaṛaqen ; argaz-nni neɣ tameṭṭut-nni yellan d imasiḥiyen ur d-yeqqim wayen i ten-icerken , axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yessawel aɣ-d iwakken a nɛic di lehna .
46007016	Yerna amek i teẓriḍ kemm a tameṭṭut tamasiḥit belli tzemṛeḍ aț-țselkeḍ argaz-im ? Neɣ amek i teẓriḍ kečč ay argaz amasiḥi belli tzemreḍ aț-țselkeḍ tameṭṭut-ik ?
46007017	Ilaq yal yiwen ad yelḥu s wayen i s-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi , yerna ad yeqqim di lḥala i deg yella asmi i s-d-yessawel . Akka i țweṣṣiɣ tijmuyaɛ n watmaten meṛṛa .
46007018	Ma yella walebɛaḍ yuɣ-it lḥal yexten mi s-d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi , ilaq ad yeqqim akken yella ; ma yella walebɛaḍ ur yextin ara asmi i s-d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi , ur ilaq ara ad yexten .
46007019	Yexten walebɛaḍ neɣ ur yextin ara ulac deg-s ; ayen yesɛan azal d ṭṭaɛa n lumuṛat n Sidi Ṛebbi .
46007020	Ilaq yal yiwen ad iqqim akken i t-id-yufa lḥal asmi i s-d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi .
46007021	D akli i telliḍ asmi i k-d yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi ? Ur țxemmim ara , meɛna ma tusa-yak-ed teswiɛt i deg tzemreḍ aț-țesɛuḍ tilelli , faṛes-iț .
46007022	Axaṭer akli iwumi d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi yuɣal d win yesɛan tilelli ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ; daɣen amdan aḥuṛṛi iwumi d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi yuɣal d akli n Lmasiḥ .
46007023	Yella win ixelṣen fell-awen iwakken aț-țilim d iḥuṛṛiyen , ihi ur țțuɣalet ara d aklan n yemdanen .
46007024	Ihi ay atmaten , ilaq yal yiwen ad yeqqim zdat Ṛebbi di lḥala i deg yella asmi s-d-yessawel .
46007025	Ɣef wayen yeɛnan wid ur nezwiǧ ara , Sidi Ṛebbi ur d-yenni kra fell-asen , meɛna a wen-d-fkeɣ ṛṛay-iw , nekk yerra Sidi Ṛebbi s ṛṛeḥma-ines tameqqrant d argaz yuklalen lețkal .
46007026	Ɣuṛ-i d ayen yelhan i wergaz ma yeqqim akken yella ɣef ddemma n lweqt-agi iweɛṛen .
46007027	Ma txeḍbeḍ tameṭṭut , ur țnadi ara a ț-teǧǧeḍ ; m'ur tezwiǧeḍ ara , ur țnadi ara aț-țzewǧeḍ .
46007028	Tura ma yella ilemẓi neɣ tilemẓit zewǧen , ur wwin ara ddnub ; meɛna wid ara izewǧen ad ṛwun lḥif di tudert-nsen ; nekk mačči d ayen i wen-mennaɣ .
46007029	Atan wayen ara d-iniɣ ay atmaten : lweqt ițțazal , drus i d iqqimen , wid izewǧen ilaq ad ilin am akken ur zwiǧen ara ,
46007030	wid yețrun ad ilin am akken ur țrun ara , wid ifeṛḥen am akken ur fṛiḥen ara , wid yețțaɣen am akken ur sɛin ara .
46007031	Wid yesɛan nnfeɛ di ddunit-agi am akken ur t-sɛin ara axaṭer ddunit-agi ur tețdum ara .
46007032	Ur bɣiɣ ara aț-țesɛum iɣeblan . Win ur nezwiǧ ara ițxemmim i lecɣal n Sidi Ṛebbi , yețnadi kan ad yeɛǧeb Sidi Ṛebbi ;
46007033	meɛna win izewǧen yețxemmim ɣef lecɣal n ddunit , yețnadi ad yeɛǧeb i tmeṭṭut-is ; ul-is yebḍa ɣef sin .
46007034	Akken daɣen tameṭṭut ur nezwiǧ ara akk-d țlemẓit ; țxemmiment kan ɣef lecɣal n Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ad ilint ț-țiqeddacin-ines s lǧețțat-nsent d ṛṛuḥ-nsent ; meɛna tin izewǧen tețxemmim kan ɣef lecɣal n ddunit d wamek ara teɛǧeb i wergaz-is .
46007035	Ur wen-d-nniɣ ara ayagi iwakken a kkun-kellxeɣ meɛna nniɣ awen-t-id i nnfeɛ-nwen axaṭer bɣiɣ aț-țeddum s tikli yelhan , yeṣfan iwakken aț-țeṭṭfem deg webrid n Lmasiḥ mačči deg wayen nniḍen .
46007036	Ma yella yiwen deg-wen ixḍeb tilemẓit , iḥar ur yezmir ara ad yeṛǧu ibɣa ad yezweǧ , mačči d ddnub ma yella yezweǧ .
46007037	Ma d win iqesden s lebɣi-ines ur izeggej ara , ma yella yeẓra iman-is yezmer ad iṣbeṛ , d ayen yelhan i gexdem m'ur yezwiǧ ara .
46007038	Ihi win izewǧen d ayen yelhan i gexdem , win ur nezwiǧ ara d ayen yelhan nezzeh .
46007039	Tameṭṭut izewǧen ur tezmir ara aț-țeǧǧ argaz-is skud mazal-it yedder , ma yella yemmut , tezmer aț-țɛiwed zzwaǧ d win tebɣa , acu kan ilaq ad yili d win yumnen s Lmasiḥ am nețțat .
46007040	Meɛna ɣef wakken walaɣ ma teqqim akken tella axiṛ-as , akken ara tesɛu lehna . Wagi d ṛṛay-iw nekk , ẓriɣ ula d nekk sɛiɣ Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi .
46008001	Ɣef wayen yeɛnan aksum n iseflawen i zellun i ssadaț , ț-țideț nesɛa akk tamusni , d acu kan tamusni tețțawi-d zzux i wemdan ma d leḥmala tesnernay deg-nneɣ laman ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
46008002	Win i gɣilen yessen kra , urɛad yessin akken i glaq ad yissin .
46008003	Meɛna win iḥemmlen Sidi Ṛebbi , Sidi Ṛebbi yessen-it .
46008004	Ɣef wayen yeɛnan učči n weksum n iseflawen immezlen i lmeṣnuɛat , neẓra belli lmeṣnuɛat-agi ț-țikellax di ddunit axaṭer anagar yiwen n Ṛebbi i gellan .
46008005	Ɣas qqaṛen aṭas n iṛebbiten i gellan ama deg igenni ama di lqaɛa , ( axaṭer ț-țideț ! Ɣuṛ-sen aṭas n iṛebbiten akk-d ssadaț i gellan )
46008006	meɛna ɣuṛ-nneɣ nukni yiwen kan n Ṛebbi i gellan , d baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi i d-ixelqen kullec , ula d nukni d ayla-s . Anagar yiwen n Ssid i gellan : d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , yis i d-yella kullec , yis daɣen i nedder ula d nukni .
46008007	Aṭas ur nessin ara tideț-agi . Kra deg-sen i guɣen tannumi tețțen asfel n ssadaț , tura m'ara tețțen aksum-nni mazal ḥesben-t belli ț-țideț d asfel i ssadaț , neyya-nsen tenquqel , ḥussen am akken denben .
46008008	Mačči d ayen yețmaččan ara ɣ-iqeṛṛben ɣer Ṛebbi . Ma nečča ur nerbiḥ acemma , m'ur nečči ara , ur aɣ-iṛuḥ wacemma .
46008009	Ihi , ɛasset iman-nwen , ɣuṛ-wat tilelli-agi i tesɛam aț-țili d ugur n uɣelluy i wid ur neǧhid ara di liman .
46008010	Axaṭer ma iwala-k-id walebɛaḍ ur neǧhid ara di liman , teqqimeḍ aț-țeččeḍ di lemqam kečč yessnen , amek tebɣiḍ ur yețṛuḥu ara ula d nețța ad yečč seg iseflawen-agi yemmezlen i ssadaț ?
46008011	S wakka ihi , gma-k-agi ur neǧhid ara di liman , i ɣef yemmut Lmasiḥ , ɣef ddemma n tmusni-nni inek i geɣli .
46008012	Imi tețțawim ddnub ɣef watmaten-nwen , tessexṛabem neyya-nsen , tdenbem ɣer Lmasiḥ .
46008013	Ihi ma yella ayen ara ččeɣ izmer ad isseɣli gma di ddnub , ur țțuɣaleɣ ara maḍi ad ččeɣ lmakla-nni iwakken ur iɣelli ara .
46009001	Eɛni ur zmireɣ ara ad xedmeɣ akken bɣiɣ ? Mačči d amceggeɛ n Lmasiḥ i lliɣ ? Ur ẓriɣ ara Sidna Ɛisa s wallen-iw ? Mačči d nekk i kkun-id-yewwin ɣer webrid n Lmasiḥ ?
46009002	Ɣas wiyaḍ ur iyi-ḥsiben ara d amceggeɛ n Lmasiḥ , kunwi ur tezmirem ara a yi-tnekkṛem axaṭer ț-țikli-nwen akk-d Lmasiḥ i d țbut belli d Lmasiḥ i yi-d-iceggɛen .
46009003	Atan wamek țțaraɣ i wid i yi-sseḍlamen :
46009004	Eɛni ur aɣ-d-iṣaḥ ara a nečč , a nsew nukni s imceggɛen n Lmasiḥ ?
46009005	Ur sɛiɣ ara lḥeqq ad aɣeɣ tameṭṭut yumnen aț-țețțeddu yid-i am akken xeddmen imceggɛen nniḍen n Lmasiḥ d watmaten n Ssid-nneɣ akk-d Buṭrus ?
46009006	Neɣ d nekk kan akk-d Barnabas i glaqen a nexdem iwakken a d-nawi aɣṛum nneɣ ?
46009007	Yella wass i deg teslam belli aɛeskṛi ilaq ad ixelleṣ m'ara d-isɛeddi lɛeskeṛ ? Anwa ara yeẓẓun tara ur itețț ara si tẓuṛin-is ? Ulac ameksa ara yeksen taqeḍɛit n lmal ur itess ara seg uyefki-ines !
46009008	Tɣilem ayen akka i d-nniɣ d lɛaddat kan n yemdanen ? Ula d ccariɛa n Musa tenna-t-id !
46009009	Axaṭer yura deg-s : Ur țțarat ara takmamt i wezger isserwaten nneɛma . Eɛni ɣef yezgaren i gḥebbeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ?
46009010	Mačči ɣef ddemma-nneɣ i d-yenna akka ? Ț-țideț , d nukni iwumi i d-yenna imeslayen-agi ! Ilaq win ikerrzen akk-d win yesserwaten ad ssirmen ad sɛun amur di lɣella nsen .
46009011	Ma yella nezreɛ gar-awen lbaṛakat n Sidi Ṛebbi , d acu yellan ma nemger-ed s ɣuṛ-wen tamɛict nneɣ ?
46009012	Ma twalam d lḥeqq ad meggren wiyaḍ s ɣuṛ-wen , eɛni mačči d nukni i gezwaren ? Meɛna nukni ur d-newwi acemma s ɣuṛ-wen , neṣbeṛ i kullec iwakken ur d-yețțili ara wugur i lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ .
46009013	Ur teẓrim ara belli wid ixeddmen di lǧameɛ țțawin-d lqut-nsen si lǧameɛ ? Ur teẓrim ara daɣen lmuqeddem izellun i Ṛebbi iseflawen i d-țțawin medden , yețțawi amur-is seg-sen ?
46009014	Akka daɣen i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wid yețbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ : di lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ara afen tamɛict-nsen .
46009015	Nekk ur d-wwiɣ acemma s ɣuṛ wen , yerna ur d-uriɣ ara tabṛaț-agi iwakken a d-ssutreɣ lḥeqq-iw . Axiṛ-iyi lmut wala a yi-tețwakkes sebba-agi s wayes zemreɣ ad zuxxeɣ !
46009016	Ur țzuxxuɣ ara s yiman-iw imi țbecciṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , axaṭer țwaḥeṛseɣ ad beccṛeɣ . A nnger-iw ma yella ur beccṛeɣ ara lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ .
46009017	Lemmer xedmeɣ ayagi s lebɣi w sɛiɣ lḥeqq ad ssutreɣ lexlaṣ , meɛna d Ṛebbi i gḥettmen fell-i ccɣel-agi .
46009018	Ihi , d acu i d lexlaṣ-iw ? D lfeṛḥ i seɛɛuɣ m'ara țbecciṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ mbla lexlaṣ , mbla ma ssutreɣ lḥeqq-iw .
46009019	Ɣas akken ur iyi-ițțalas yiwen kra ; rriɣ iman-iw d aqeddac n mkul yiwen iwakken a d-rebḥeɣ aṭas n yemdanen ɣer webrid n Lmasiḥ .
46009020	Ɣer wat Isṛail rriɣ iman-iw am nutni iwakken a ten-id-rebḥeɣ ; ɣer wid yettabaɛen ccariɛa n Musa tebɛeɣ-ț am nutni iwakken a ten id rebḥeɣ , ɣas akken nekk ur lliɣ ara seddaw leḥkum n ccariɛa .
46009021	Akka daɣen , m'ara iliɣ d wid ur nesɛi ara ccariɛa , țțaraɣ iman-iw am akken ur sɛiɣ ara ccariɛa iwakken a ten-id-rebḥeɣ , ɣas akken nekk sɛiɣ ccariɛa n Ṛebbi imi d Lmasiḥ i d ccariɛa-inu .
46009022	Akk-d wid ur neǧhid ara deg webrid n Ṛebbi , uɣaleɣ am nutni , iwakken a ten-id-rebḥeɣ . Ddiɣ di lebɣi i mkul yiwen iwakken a d-sellkeɣ ulamma kra deg-sen .
46009023	Ayagi akk xedmeɣ-t ɣef ddemma n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ iwakken ad sɛuɣ yid-sen amur .
46009024	Di temzizla , teẓram belli deg wid akk yețțazalen deg wannar , yiwen kan ara irebḥen . Azzlet ihi iwakken aț-țrebḥem .
46009025	Wid akk yețțazzalen , m'ara heggin iman-nsen i tazzla , țɛețțiben iman-nsen ; nutni țenɛețțaben iwakken a d-rebḥen cciɛa ur nețdum ara ; lameɛna nukni , nețɛețțib iman-nneɣ iwakken a nerbeḥ cciɛa ara idumen .
46009026	Nekk ur țțazzaleɣ ara am win ur nesɛi ara lmeqsud , ur kkateɣ ara deg ubeḥri m'ara țnaɣeɣ ;
46009027	meɛna țɛețțibeɣ lǧețța-inu , țɛassaɣ ɣef yiman-iw , axaṭer uggadeɣ nekk i gbeccṛen i wiyaḍ ad ɣliɣ , ad uɣaleɣ ɣer deffir .
46010001	
46010002	Țwaɣeḍsen meṛṛa di tagut-nni akk-d lebḥeṛ mi ddan d Sidna Musa ,
46010003	ččan meṛṛa seg yiwen lqut n Sidi Ṛebbi ,
46010004	swan meṛṛa si lɛinseṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi i d-iteffɣen seg wezṛu iteddun yid-sen ; azṛu-agi , d Lmasiḥ .
46010005	Ɣas akken , aṭas seg-sen ur neɛǧib ara i Sidi Ṛebbi ; daymi i ten-tesseɣli lmut yiwen yiwen mi teddun deg unezṛuf .
46010006	Ayen akken yedṛan yid-sen yeqqim-ed d lemtel i nukni , iwakken ur neṭṭamaɛ ara ayen n diri am akken i t-ṭṭamaɛen nutni .
46010007	Ur țțilit ara am wid iɛebbden ssadaț akken xeddmen kra seg-sen , axaṭer am akken yura di tira iqedsen : Yeqqim wegdud ad yečč ad isew , mi gfukk yekker ad yezhu , ad yecḍeḥ .
46010008	Ur ilaq ara daɣen a nxeddem leɛṛuṛ akken xeddmen kra seg-sen ; daymi deg yiwen n wass , lmut tečča tlata uɛecrin alef deg-sen .
46010009	Ur ilaq ara a njeṛṛeb Sidi Ṛebbi akken i xedmen kra seg-sen , dɣa qqsen-ten izerman mmuten .
46010010	Ur ilaq ara daɣen aț-țesmermugem ɣef wiyaḍ akken i smermugen kra deg-sen armi i ten-issenger lmelk n lmut .
46010011	Timsalin-agi akk i sen-yedṛan , qqiment-ed d lemtel , uran-tent di tektabin , iwakken a nelmed nukni ițɛicin di taggara n lweqt .
46010012	Ihi win iḥesben iman-is ibedd , ad iɛass iman-is ur iɣelli ara !
46010013	Ayen akk s wayes i tețwajeṛbem , d ayen iwumi yezmer wemdan . Sidi Ṛebbi d bab n lḥeqq , ur yețɛemmid ara aț-țenɛețțabem sennig n tezmert nwen ; lameɛna m'ara tețwajeṛbem , a wen-d-ye tazmert s wayes ara tṣebṛem d wamek ara teffɣem si tegniț n leɛtab .
46010014	A wid eɛzizen fell-i , xḍut i weɛbad n ssadaț .
46010015	Țmeslayeɣ awen-d am akken țmeslayen i wid ifehmen ; meyyzet kunwi s yiman nwen ɣef wayen i d-qqaṛeɣ .
46010016	Taqbuct n lbaṛaka i ɣef nețḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi , eɛni ur aɣ-tecrik ara d idammen n Lmasiḥ ? Neɣ aɣṛum i nbeṭṭu , ur aɣ-yecrik ara d lǧețța n Lmasiḥ ?
46010017	Imi yiwen n weɣṛum kan i gellan , ula d nukni nuɣal d yiwet n lǧețța ɣas akken deg waṭas yid-nneɣ i nella , axaṭer ntețț meṛṛa seg yiwen n weɣṛum .
46010018	Walit at Isṛail : wid itețțen seg weksum n iseflawen s weɛbad-nsen , eɛni ur criken ara d wemkan-nni anda i zellun iseflawen ?
46010019	Eɛni bɣiɣ a d-iniɣ belli asfel nni i zellun i ssadaț neɣ ssadaț-nni i țɛebbiden , sɛan lqima ? Xaṭi !
46010020	Meɛna ayen akka i zellun , zellun-t i leǧnun mačči i Ṛebbi ; nekk ur bɣiɣ ara aț-țcerkem akk-d leǧnun .
46010021	Ur tezmirem ara aț-țeswem si teqbuct n Sidi Ṛebbi ma yella tețțessem si țeqbuct n leǧnun ; ur tezmirem ara daɣen aț-țeččem seg weɣṛum n Sidi Ṛebbi ma yella tețțețțem seg weɣṛum n leǧnun .
46010022	Eɛni nebɣa a nejreḥ ul n Sidi Ṛebbi a d-neskker tismin-is ? Tɣilem tazmert-nneɣ teɣleb tazmert-is ?
46010023	Llan wid i d-iqqaṛen : kullec d leḥlal fell-aɣ ; ț-țideț , lameɛna ur aɣ-yenfiɛ ara kullec . Kullec yețțusemmeḥ-aɣ a t-nexdem , meɛna mačči d kullec i ɣ-yesnernayen di liman .
46010024	Ur țnadit ara ɣef nnfeɛ-nwen kan kunwi , meɛna nadit ɣef nnfeɛ n wiyaḍ .
46010025	Tzemrem aț-țeččem kra n wayen i gețnuzun di ssuq mbla asteqsi , mbla ma tḥebbṛem ,
46010026	axaṭer ddunit d wayen akk yellan deg-s d ayla n Sidi Ṛebbi .
46010027	Ma yeɛṛeḍ-ikkun walebɛad ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ , ma tṛuḥem , ččet s neyya mbla asteqsi seg wayen akk ara wen-d-issers .
46010028	Lameɛna ma yella win i wen-d yennan : ayagi yețțune d asfel i ssadaț , ur tețțet ara imi i kkun-id ixebbeṛ iwakken ad yethedden wul nwen .
46010029	Mačči ɣef neyya-nwen i d-nniɣ akka , lameɛna ɣef neyya n win i kkun-iɛerḍen . Ihi , acimi ara ǧǧeɣ wayeḍ ad idebbeṛ deg ixemmimen-iw ?
46010030	Ma yella ḥemdeɣ Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wayen i tețțeɣ , acimi ara ǧǧeɣ iman-iw ad wwten deg-i ɣef lqut i ɣef ḥemdeɣ Sidi Ṛebbi ?
46010031	Ama teččam neɣ teswam , neɣ kra n wayen ara txedmem , xedmet-eț i tmanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi .
46010032	Ur țțilit ara d sebba n uɣelluy ama i wat Isṛail , ama i iyunaniyen , ama i tejmaɛt n Sidi Ṛebbi ,
46010033	am akken xeddmeɣ nekk , țnadiɣ a wen-ɛeǧbeɣ meṛṛa di kullec , ur țqellibeɣ ara ɣef nnfeɛ-inu , meɛna țqellibeɣ ɣef nnfeɛ n umur ameqqran deg-wen iwakken ad țwaselken .
46011001	Ɛandet-iyi am akken țɛanadeɣ Lmasiḥ .
46011002	A kkun-ibarek Ṛebbi imi i yi-d-tețmektayem di yal taswiɛt yerna teṭṭafaṛem lewṣayat-iw akken i wen-tent-slemdeɣ .
46011003	Meɛna , tura bɣiɣ aț-țissinem ayagi : Lmasiḥ d aqeṛṛuy ɣef yemdanen meṛṛa , argaz d aqeṛṛuy ɣef tmeṭṭut-is , ma d Ṛebbi d aqeṛṛuy ɣef Lmasiḥ .
46011004	Ihi argaz ara yesburren ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-is m'ara ideɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi neɣ m'ara d-yețxebbiṛ ayen i s-d-yusan s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , yekkes lḥeṛma ɣef Ssid-is .
46011005	Lameɛna tameṭṭut ara ideɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi neɣ ara yețxebbiṛen s wayen i s-d-yețțasen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi aqeṛṛuy-is ɛeryan , tekkes lḥeṛma ɣef wergaz-is , am akken d aqeṛṛuy-is i tseṭṭel .
46011006	Axaṭer ma yella tameṭṭut ur tesburr ara , aț-țegzem kan ihi acebbub-is am wergaz ; lameɛna ma yella d lɛib i tmeṭṭut aț-țegzem neɣ aț-țṣeṭṭel acebbub-is , ilaq ihi aț-țɣum aqeṛṛuy-is .
46011007	Argaz ur ilaq ara ad yesburr i wqeṛṛuy-is axaṭer d nețța i gmetlen Sidi Ṛebbi d lɛaḍima-ines ; ma ț-țameṭṭut d nețțat i d lḥeṛma n wergaz .
46011008	Axaṭer mačči d argaz i d-yețwaxelqen si tmeṭṭut meɛna ț - țameṭṭut i d-ițwaxelqen seg wergaz .
46011009	Daɣen argaz ur d-yețwaxleq ara i tmeṭṭut , lameɛna ț-țameṭṭut i d yețwaxelqen i wergaz .
46011010	Daymi ɣef ddemma n lmalayekkat , tameṭṭut ilaq aț-țesbur i uqeṛṛuy-is iwakken a d-tbeggen belli seddaw lḥekma n wergaz-is i tella .
46011011	Ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , ur d-tețțili tmeṭṭut mbla argaz , ur d-yețțili wergaz mbla tameṭṭut .
46011012	Axaṭer akken i d-tețwaxleq tmeṭṭut seg wergaz , akken daɣen i d-yețlal wergaz si tmeṭṭut , ayagi akk s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i d-yekka .
46011013	Meyzet kunwi s yiman-nwen : eɛni yelha-yas i tmeṭṭut aț-țdeɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi mbla ma tesburr ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-is ?
46011014	Ula d lɛadda n yemdanen tesselmed awen belli d lɛib i wergaz ma iṛebba acebbub-is .
46011015	Lameɛna d ccan ameqqran i tmeṭṭut ma tṛebba acebbub-is axaṭer yețțunefk-as-d iwakken a s-yili d asburru .
46011016	Ma yella win yebɣan ad iɣanen ɣef wannect-agi , ilaq ad iẓer belli nukni ur nesɛi ara tannumi-agi , ur telli ara daɣen di tejmuyaɛ n Sidi Ṛebbi .
46011017	A nɛeddi tura ɣer wayen nniḍen . Ɣef wayen yeɛnan tijmuyaɛ-nwen ur kkun-țcekkiṛeɣ ara , axaṭer ayen i deg ilaq aț-țeddum ɣer zdat , kunwi tețțuɣalem ɣer deffir .
46011018	Sliɣ belli m'ara tețnejmaɛem yețțili lxilaf gar-awen yerna umneɣ belli tella kra n tideț deg wayagi .
46011019	Ilaq a d-yili lxilaf-agi gar-awen iwakken a d-banen wid yeṭṭfen di liman seg wul .
46011020	M'ara tedduklem ɣer imensi n usmekti , ur txeddmem ara akken yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi !
46011021	Axaṭer wa yețḥiri ad yečč lqut-is , wa mazal-it yelluẓ wayeḍ yeṛwa , yeskkeṛ .
46011022	Amek ! Ur tesɛim ara ixxamen nwen iwakken aț-țeččem aț-țeswem ? Neɣ tebɣam aț-țesseɣlim lqima n tejmaɛt n Sidi Ṛebbi , aț-țesneḥcamem wid ur nesɛi acemma ? D acu ara wen-d-iniɣ , a kkun cekkṛeɣ ? Ur kkun-țcekkiṛeɣ ara ɣef wayagi !
46011023	D ayen i yi-d-ițțunefken s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i wen-slemdeɣ nekkini . Deg iḍ-nni i deg yețțuzenz Sidna Ɛisa , yeddem-ed aɣṛum ,
46011024	yeḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi yebḍa-t yenna : « Wagi d lgețța-w yețțunefken fell awen , xeddmet ayagi iwakken a yi-d țmektayem . »
46011025	Daɣen , mi fukken učči , yeddem ed taqbuct yenna : « Taqbuct-agi d lemɛahda tajḍiṭ s idammen-iw ; xeddmet ayagi iwakken a yi-d-tețmektayem . »
46011026	Axaṭer kra n tikkelt i deg ara teččem seg weɣṛum-agi , i deg ara teswem si teqbuct agi , tețxebbiṛem s lmut n Lmasiḥ alamma d ass i deg ara d-yuɣal .
46011027	Daymi win ara yeččen seg weɣṛum-agi , ara yeswen si teqbuct-agi n usmekti n Lmasiḥ , m'ur sen-yefki ara lqima , yewwi ddnub ɣer yiri-s ɣef ddemma n lǧețța akk-d idammen n Lmasiḥ .
46011028	Ihi mkul yiwen ad ixemmem deg yiman-is uqbel ad yečč seg weɣṛum-nni neɣ ad isew si teqbuct-nni .
46011029	Axaṭer ma yella yiwen deg-wen yečča neɣ yeswa tiremt n usmekti n Lmasiḥ , mbla ma yefka lqima i lǧețța n Lmasiḥ , yewwi-d lɛiqab i yiman-is .
46011030	Ɣef wayagi i llan gar-awen aṭas n wid ihelken akk-d ineɛyuba , yerna aṭas deg-sen i gemmuten .
46011031	Lemmer nețḥadar ɣef yiman nneɣ , tili ur d-nețțawi ara lɛiqab n Sidi Ṛebbi fell-aneɣ .
46011032	S wakka m'ara ɣ-iɛaqeb Sidi Ṛebbi , yețṛebbi-yaɣ iwakken ur aɣ yețḥasab ara d wat n ddunit .
46011033	Ihi ay atmaten , asmi ara tennejmaɛem iwakken aț-țeččem , myeṛǧut wway gar-awen .
46011034	Ma llan wid yelluẓen , ad ččen uqbel deg wexxam-nsen iwakken ur d-tesseɣlayem ara lɛiqab n Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen m'ara tennejmaɛem . Timsalin nniḍen a tent-fruɣ m'ara n-aseɣ .
46012001	Ay atmaten , ur bɣiɣ ara aț-țeqqimem mbla tamusni ɣef wayen yeɛnan ayen i d-yețțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
46012002	Teẓram belli asm'akken ur tuminem ara s Lmasiḥ , țțawwin kkun wiyaḍ tɛebbdem lmeṣnuɛat ur neneṭṭeq ara .
46012003	Tura ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli yiwen ur izmir a d-yini : « ad yețwanɛel Ɛisa Lmasiḥ » ma yella s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i gețmeslay . Daɣen yiwen ur izmir ad iched belli Ɛisa Lmasiḥ d Ssid-is , ma yella mačči s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i t-id-yenna .
46012004	Llan aṭas n leṣnaf n tukciwin n Ṛebbi , lameɛna yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ kan i gellan ;
46012005	aṭas n leṣnaf n leqdic i gellan meɛna yiwen n Ssid-nneɣ kan i nesɛa ;
46012006	aṭas n leṣnaf n lecɣal i gellan , meɛna Ṛebbi d yiwen , d nețța i ten-isedduyen akk deg-nneɣ meṛṛa .
46012007	Yal yiwen tețțunefk-as-d tukci n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i nnfeɛ-nneɣ meṛṛa .
46012008	Ihi Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yefka-d i yiwen ad immeslay s ṣṣwab d lefhama , yefka-d i wayeḍ ad immeslay s tmusni .
46012009	Ṛṛuḥ-agi yefka daɣen i wayeḍ liman iǧehden , i wayeḍ tazmert s wayes ara yesseḥlu imuḍan ;
46012010	yefka daɣen i wayeḍ tazmert ad ixdem lbeṛhanat , ma d wayeḍ ad ițxebbiṛ s wayen i s-d-yețțassen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ; wayeḍ daɣen yefka-yas-ed tazmert s wayes ara yeɛqel ayen i d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi d wayen i d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ leṛwaḥ n diri ; wayeḍ yețțunefk-as-d ad immeslay timeslayin ur nețwassen ara ; wayeḍ daɣen yețțunefk-as-d a d-yessefhem timeslayin-agi ur nețwassen ara .
46012011	Ayagi akk itekk-ed seg yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ . Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yețțak-ed ayagi meṛṛa akken yebɣa , i yal yiwen deg nneɣ .
46012012	Lǧețța n wemdan d yiwet , ɣas akken tesɛa aṭas n lemfaṣel . Lemfaṣel-agi ɣas deg waṭas yid-sen , d yiwet n lǧețța i llan ; akken daɣen i gella Lmasiḥ .
46012013	Axaṭer s yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ kan i nețwaɣḍes meṛṛa iwakken a nili d yiwet n lǧețța ; ama d at Isṛail neɣ d iyunaniyen , ama d aklan neɣ d iḥeṛṛiyen , seg yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ i neswa meṛṛa .
46012014	Lǧețța ur tebni ara ɣef yiwen n lmefṣel , lameɛna tebna ɣef waṭas n lemfaṣel .
46012015	Ma yenna-d uḍar : nekk mačči d afus ur țekkiɣ ara di lǧețța , eɛni imi ur yelli ara d afus ur ițekka ara ula d nețța di lǧețța ?
46012016	Ma yella yenna-d umeẓẓuɣ : nekk mačči ț-țiṭ , ur țekkiɣ ara di lǧețța , eɛni ț-țideț m'ur yelli ara ț-țiṭ ur ițekka ara ula d nețța di lǧețța ?
46012017	Ma yella lǧețța meṛṛa ț-țiṭ , amek ara tili tmesliwt ? Neɣ ma yella d ameẓẓuɣ kan i tella , amek ara yili wesriḥi ?
46012018	Sidi Ṛebbi yebna mkul lmefṣel di lǧețța akken i s-yehwa .
46012019	Ma yella lǧețța meṛṛa d yiwen n lmefṣel , anda-ț ihi lǧețța ?
46012020	S wakka ihi aṭas n lemfaṣel i gellan , meɛna lǧețța yiwet .
46012021	Tiṭ ur tezmir ara aț-țini i ufus : ur k-uḥwaǧeɣ ara ! Aqeṛṛuy ur yezmir ara ad yini i uḍaṛ : ur k-uḥwaǧeɣ ara .
46012022	Lemfaṣel-nni n lǧețța i d-yețbanen d imecṭaḥ , nefɛen aṭas .
46012023	Lemfaṣel n lǧețța iwumi ur nefki ara lqima , d nutni i nețḥadar akteṛ n wiyaḍ ; ihi d lemfaṣel ur nezmir ara a d-nebder i nețḥadar aṭas ,
46012024	ma d wid yesɛan lqima , ur uḥwaǧen ara lemḥadra . Sidi Ṛebbi yebna lǧețța akken ara izegged lqima i lemfaṣel ixuṣṣen ,
46012025	iwakken ur d-yețțili ara lxilaf ger lemfaṣel , meɛna ad țemḥadaren wway gar-asen .
46012026	Ma yella yiwen n lmefṣel yețwaqṛeḥ , wiyaḍ meṛṛa ad țwaqeṛḥen yid-es ; ma yella yețțunefk-as ccan i wayeḍ , wiyaḍ akk ad feṛḥen yid-es .
46012027	Kunwi meṛṛa d lǧețța n Lmasiḥ , yal yiwen deg-wen d lmefṣel di lǧețța-s , mkul yiwen deg umkan-is .
46012028	Di tejmaɛt n Lmasiḥ , Sidi Ṛebbi yesbedd uqbel ṛṛusul , deffir-nsen wid i d-yețxebbiṛen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , rnan-d wid yesselmaden , rnan-d daɣen wid yesɛan tazmert ad xedmen lbeṛhanat , wid yesɛan tazmert ad sseḥlun imuḍan , wid ara iɛiwnen wiyaḍ , wid ara yilin d imdebbṛen akk-d wid ara yemmeslayen timeslayin ur nețwassen ara .
46012029	Eɛni țțuceggɛen-d meṛṛa d ṛṛusul ? Neɣ țxebbiṛen-d akk s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ? Sselmaden meṛṛa ? Xeddmen meṛṛa lbeṛhanat ?
46012030	Eɛni sɛan meṛṛa tazmert ad sseḥlun imuḍan , neɣ ad mmeslayen meṛṛa timeslayin ur nețwassen ara ? Neɣ zemren akk a d-sfehmen timeslayin-agi ?
46012031	Ihi a wen-d-iniɣ : nadit axiṛ ɣef tikciwin-nni inefɛen aṭas . A wen d-mleɣ tura abrid yifen akk iberdan .
46013001	Ɣas zemreɣ ad mmeslayeɣ timeslayin n ddunit meṛṛa , ad rnuɣ tid n lmalayekkat , m'ur sɛiɣ ara leḥmala n tideț , ad iliɣ am ṭṭbel yeddendunen neɣ nnaqus yeṭṭenṭunen .
46013002	Ɣas ma yețțunefk-iyi-d ad țxebbiṛeɣ s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi , ad fehmeɣ kra yellan d lbaḍna , ad sɛuɣ tamusni di mkul lḥaǧa , ɣas ad sɛuɣ liman s wayes i zemreɣ ad iniɣ i wedrar qleɛ iman-ik syagi tṛuḥeḍ ɣer wemkan ihina , m'ur sɛiɣ ara leḥmala ɣer wiyaḍ , nekk d ulac .
46013003	Ɣas daɣen ad feṛqeɣ ayen akk sɛiɣ i wid yelluẓen , ad rnuɣ ad sebbleɣ tudert-iw alamma d lmut ɣef ddemma n wiyaḍ , m'ur sɛiɣ ara leḥmala deg ul-iw , ayagi ur iyi-infiɛ ara .
46013004	Leḥmala n tideț tețțawi-d ṣṣbeṛ , leḥmala tețɛawan , leḥmala ur tesɛi ara tismin , ur tesɛi ara zzux , win yesɛan leḥmala deg ul-is ur yețcekkiṛ ara iman-is ,
46013005	Win yesɛan leḥmala n tideț ur ițnadi ara ad ixdem cceṛ , ur yețnadi ara ɣef nnfeɛ-ines , ur izeɛɛef ur yețțaṭṭaf cceḥnat ;
46013006	Win yesɛan leḥmala ur ifeṛṛeḥ ara s lbaṭel meɛna ifeṛṛeḥ s lḥeqq ;
46013007	leḥmala tețsamaḥ kullec , tețțamen , tessaram tsebbeṛ i kullec .
46013008	Axebbeṛ n wayen i d-yețțasen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi ad ifak , timeslayin ur nețwassen ara ad ḥebsent , tamusni aț-țefnu , ma d leḥmala n tideț werǧin aț-țfak ;
46013009	axaṭer tamusni-nneɣ txuṣṣ , ayen nețbecciṛ s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ur innekmal ara ,
46013010	meɛna m'ara d-yaweḍ wayen innekmalen , ayen ixuṣṣen meṛṛa ad imḥu .
46013011	Asmi lliɣ d aqcic , țmeslayeɣ am weqcic , țxemmimeɣ , țmeyyizeɣ slɛeqliya n weqcic ; asmi uɣaleɣ d argaz , ǧǧiɣ lɛeqliya n weqcic .
46013012	Ass-agi , nețwali am akken di lemri yumsen , meɛna imiren a nuɣal a nwali akken ilaq ; ass-agi tamusni inu mazal txuṣṣ lameɛna ad uɣaleɣ ad issineɣ akken i yi-issen Sidi Ṛebbi .
46013013	Tura ihi tlata n leḥwayeǧ-agi i gesɛan lqima : liman , asirem d leḥmala ; lameɛna di tlata-agi , d lehmala i ț-țameqqrant .
46014001	Qbel kullec nadit aț-țesɛum leḥmala n tideț . Nadit daɣen ɣef tukciwin n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , lameɛna nadit axiṛ a d-țxebbiṛem s wayen i d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
46014002	Win yețmeslayen tutlayin ur nețwassen ara , mačči i yemdanen i gețmeslay lameɛna i Ṛebbi , imi yiwen ur ifehhem acu i d-yeqqaṛ ; axaṭer s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-iqqaṛ ayen ur nezmir a t-nefhem .
46014003	Ma d win i d-ițxebbiṛen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , ițmeslay-ed i yemdanen , yesnernay liman-nsen , inehhu-ten , yețṣebbiṛ-iten .
46014004	Win yețmeslayen tutlayin ur nețwassen ara , yesseǧhad iman-is di liman , ma d win i d-ițxebbiṛen s wayen i d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , yesseǧhad tajmaɛt n Sidi Ṛebbi meṛṛa .
46014005	Bɣiɣ aț-țemmeslayem meṛṛa s tutlayin ur nețwassen ara , lameɛna bɣiɣ axiṛ ma tețxebbiṛem s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi . Win yețxebbiṛen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi yenfeɛ akteṛ n win yețmeslayen tutlayin-agi , anagar ma yella izmer a d-yessefhem ayen i d-yenna , iwakken tajmaɛt meṛṛa aț-țestenfeɛ .
46014006	Tura ay atmaten , lemmer a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen a wen-d mmeslayeɣ s tutlayt ur nețwassen ara , deg wacu ara kkun-nefɛeɣ ? A kkun-nefɛeɣ ma wwiɣ-awen-d ayen i yi-d-ițțuweḥḥan d wayen i yi-d-yețțuxebṛen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , neɣ țamusni akk-d uselmed !
46014007	A d-ne lemtel n dduzan n lmusiqa am tjewwaqt d snitra : ma yella ur yemxalaf ara ṣṣut-nsent , amek ara neɛqel ṣṣut n tjewaqt neɣ win n snitra ?
46014008	Neɣ daɣen m'ur neɛqil ara mliḥ ṣṣut n lbuq s wayes i țheggin imnayen iman-nsen ɣer imenɣi , anwa ara iheggin iman-is ɣer umenɣi ?
46014009	Kunwi daɣen , ma yella tneṭqem-d s tutlayt ur nețwassen ara , amek ara nefhem d acu i d-teqqaṛem ? Am akken tețmeslayem i waḍu !
46014010	Llant aṭas n tutlayin yemxalafen di ddunit , lameɛna sɛant akk lmeɛna .
46014011	Ma yella ur fhimeɣ ara tameslayt n walebɛaḍ , ad iliɣ d abeṛṛani ar ɣuṛ-es , nețța daɣen ad yili ɣuṛ-i d abeṛṛani .
46014012	Kunwi daɣen , imi tețnadim aț-țesɛum tukciwin i d-yețțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , nadit axiṛ aț-țesɛum ayen ara inefɛen tajmaɛt n Sidi Ṛebbi .
46014013	Daymi , win yețmeslayen tutlayt ur netwassen ara ilaq ad issuter i Ṛebbi a s-d-ye ad yessefhem ayen i d-iqqaṛ .
46014014	Axaṭer ma yella deɛɛuɣ s tutlayt ur nețwassen ara , d ṛṛuḥ-iw i gdeɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi mačči d lefhama-inu .
46014015	D acu ara xedmeɣ ihi ? Ad dɛuɣ s ṛṛuḥ , lameɛna ad dɛuɣ daɣen s lefhama-inu ; ad cnuɣ s ṛṛuḥ , ad cnuɣ daɣen s lefhama-inu .
46014016	Axaṭer ma yella tḥemdeḍ Ṛebbi s ṛṛuḥ-ik kan s tutlayt ur nețwassen ara , win yeqqimen gar-awen , ur nessin ara , amek ara d-yini « amin » i yimeslayen-ik , m'ur yefhim ara d acu i d-teqqaṛeḍ ?
46014017	Ɣas yimeslayen-ik s wayes i tḥemdeḍ Ṛebbi gerrzen aṭas , ur nfiɛen ara win ur nefhim ara d acu i d-teqqaṛeḍ .
46014018	Ad ḥemdeɣ Ṛebbi imi țmeslayeɣ tutlayin ur nețwassen ara akteṛ-nwen meṛṛa .
46014019	Meɛna di tejmaɛt , axiṛ-iyi a d-iniɣ xemsa yimeslayen yețwafehmen iwakken ad lemden wiyaḍ , wala ɛecṛa alaf imeslayen s tutlayt ur nețwassen ara .
46014020	Ay atmaten , ur țțilit ara am arrac m'ara tmeyyzem ɣef kra , lameɛna sɛut lɛeqliya n imeqqranen ; ma ɣef wayen yeɛnan cceṛ , ilit am arrac .
46014021	Atan wayen yuran di tira : Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d : A d-mmeslayeɣ i wegdud-agi + seg imawen n ibeṛṛaniyen + s tutlayin nniḍen + , meɛna ur iyi-d-smeḥsisen ara .
46014022	Ihi tutlayin-agi ur nețwassen ara , d licaṛa i wid ur numin ara mačči i wid yumnen ; ma d win i d ițxebbiṛen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi , d licaṛa i wid yumnen mačči i wid ur numin ara .
46014023	Ma yella nnejmaɛen imasiḥiyen meṛṛa deg yiwen wemkan , bdan țḥemmiden akk Sidi Ṛebbi s tutlayin ur nețwassen ara , ma kecmen-d yemdanen ur nessin ara ayagi neɣ wid ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ , eɛni ur d-qqaṛen ara tedrewcem ?
46014024	Meɛna ma yella țxebbiṛen-d akk s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , ma ikcem-ed win ur numin ara neɣ win ur nessin ara , a d-yawi s lexbaṛ belli d amednub i gella ɣef ddemma n wayen yesla , ad iḥuss deg iman-is belli ad ițțuḥaseb ;
46014025	ayen yeffren deg ul-is a d-iban , dɣa ad yeɣli ɣer lqaɛa ɣef wudem , ad yeɛbed Sidi Ṛebbi ad yini : ț-țideț Ṛebbi gar-awen i gella !
46014026	D acu ihi i glaqen ay atmaten ? M'ara tennejmaɛem akken tellam : wa a d-yawi ccna , wayeḍ d aselmed , wayeḍ d aweḥḥi , wayeḍ timeslayin ur nețwassen ara , wayeḍ a tent-id issefhem ; kullec ad yețwaxdem i wesnerni n tejmaɛt .
46014027	Ma llan wid yețmeslayen timeslayin ur nețwassen ara , sin neɣ tlata a d-mmeslayen meɛna yal yiwen s nnuba-s , yerna ilaq ad yili win ara d-yesfehmen ayen i d-qqaṛen .
46014028	Ma ulac win ara d-yesfehmen , ad ssusmen axiṛ di tejmaɛt , ad mmeslayen deg iman-nsen kan akk-d Sidi Ṛebbi .
46014029	Ma llan wid i d-ițxebbiṛen s wayen i d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , sin neɣ tlata a d-mmeslayen , wiyaḍ ad meyzen ɣef wayen i d-nnan .
46014030	Ma yella gar-awen win iwumi i d-iweḥḥa Sidi Ṛebbi kra , ilaq ad iɛass alamma yessusem win akken yellan yețmeslay .
46014031	Tzemrem akk a d tețxebbiṛem s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , meɛna wa deffir wa , iwakken atmaten meṛṛa ad lemden , ad innerni liman-nsen .
46014032	Win i d-ițxebbiṛen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi yeḥkem deg wayen i d-iqqaṛ ,
46014033	axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi mačči d Ṛebbi n ussexṛeb , meɛna d win iḥemmlen lehna .
46014034	Am akken xeddmen di tejmuyaɛ n wid iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi , ilaq tilawin ad ssusment di tejmaɛt , ur ilaq ara a d-grent iman-nsent ; meɛna ad qadṛent tajmaɛt , ad aɣent awal akken i t-id-tenna ccariɛa .
46014035	Ma yella bɣant ad steqsint ɣef wayen ur fhiment ara , ad steqsint irgazen-nsent deg wexxam ; axaṭer ur yesse ara i tmeṭṭut a d-ger iman-is di tejmaɛt .
46014036	Eɛni s ɣuṛ-wen i d-yekka wawal n Ṛebbi ? Neɣ ɣuṛ-wen kan i gella ?
46014037	Ma yella yiwen deg-wen iwala iman-is yețweḥḥi-yas-d Sidi Ṛebbi neɣ yețxebbiṛ-ed s ɣuṛ-es , ilaq ad iɛqel belli ayen akka i wen-d-uriɣ d lameṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi ;
46014038	meɛna ma yella inkeṛ-it , iban belli ur yețwaqbel ara ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
46014039	Akka ihi ay atmaten , ssirmet a d-tețxebbiṛem s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi . Ur qeṭṭɛet ara i win yebɣan ad immeslay s tutlayin ur nețwassen ara ,
46014040	acu kan xḍut i ussexṛeb , xedmet kullec s țțawil .
46015001	Ay atmaten , bɣiɣ a wen-d smektiɣ tura lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wen-d-ssawḍeɣ , win akken i tqeblem yerna tḥerzem-t ;
46015002	s Lexbaṛ agi n lxiṛ i tețwasellkem ma yella tettebɛem-t akken i wen-t-id-nniɣ , neɣ m'ulac liman-nwen am akken d aḍu .
46015003	Slemdeɣ-awen di tazwara ayen i lemdeɣ nekkini : Lmasiḥ yemmut ɣef ddnubat-nneɣ akken yura ;
46015004	yețwamḍel , yuɣal-ed ɣer tudert ass wis tlata , akken i t-id-nnant tira iqedsen .
46015005	Iwala-t Buṭrus , walan-t daɣen ṛṛusul di tnac yid-sen .
46015006	Rnan walan-t daɣen akteṛ n xemsmeyya n watmaten deg yiwet n teswiɛt ; aṭas deg-sen mazal-iten ddren ar tura , ma d kra deg-sen mmuten .
46015007	Yerna iwala-t Yeɛqub akk-d ṛṛusul meṛṛa .
46015008	Mi t-walan akk , walaɣ-t idheṛ-iyi-d daɣen i nekkini yellan d ulac .
46015009	Nekk , yellan d aneggaru akk di ṛṛusul , ur uklaleɣ ara ad țțusemmiɣ d ṛṛasul axaṭer lliɣ țqehhiṛeɣ tajmaɛt n warraw n Ṛebbi .
46015010	S ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi i wwḍeɣ ɣer wayen akka i lliɣ tura ; ṛṛeḥma i yi-d-ifka ur tṛuḥ ara deg ulac , lameɛna uɣaleɣ xedmeɣ akteṛ-nsen meṛṛa , mačči s yiman-iw , meɛna s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi yellan yid-i .
46015011	S wakka ihi , ama d nekk ama d nutni , atah wayen i nețbecciṛ yerna d ayen s wayes i tumnem .
46015012	Ma neqqaṛ belli Lmasiḥ yeḥya-d si ger lmegtin , amek ihi kra deg-wen qqaṛen ulac ḥeggu n lmegtin ?
46015013	Ma yella ulac ḥeggu n lmegtin , ihi Lmasiḥ daɣen ur d-iḥyi ara .
46015014	Ma yella ihi Lmasiḥ ur d-iḥyi ara , ayen i nețbecciṛ d aḍu , ayen s wayes tumnem daɣen d aḍu .
46015015	Lemmer ț-țideț lmegtin ur d ḥeggun ara , neskaddeb ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi nukni i d-icehden belli yesseḥya-d Lmasiḥ si ger lmegtin . Lemmer ur t-id-isseḥyi ara , ihi lmegtin ur d-ḥeggun ara ;
46015016	axaṭer ma yella lmegtin ur d-ḥeggun ara , Lmasiḥ daɣen ur d-iḥyi ara .
46015017	Ma yella Lmasiḥ ur d-iḥyi ara , ihi liman-nwen am akken d aḍu , mazal-ikkun di ddnub-nwen ,
46015018	ula d imasiḥiyen yemmuten negren , liman-nsen iṛuḥ d ulac .
46015019	Ma yella asirem-nneɣ di Lmasiḥ di ddunit-agi kan i gella , d nukni i gețɣiḍen akteṛ n yemdanen n ddunit meṛṛa .
46015020	Meɛna Lmasiḥ iḥya-d si lmut , d nețța i d amezwaru i d-iḥyan ɣef wid akk yemmuten ;
46015021	axaṭer , am akken i d-tekcem lmut ɣer ddunit s yiwen wergaz , s yiwen wergaz daɣen i d-yusa ḥeggu n lmegtin .
46015022	Am akken i weṛten meṛṛa yemdanen lmut imi d-kkan s ɣuṛ Adam , akken daɣen wid akk yumnen s Lmasiḥ a d-ḥyun si ger lmegtin imi umnen yis ,
46015023	ḥeggu-agi ilaq a d-idṛu di lweqt-is : Lmasiḥ iḥya-d d amezwaru , ass n tuɣalin-is a d-ḥyun meṛṛa wid yellan d ayla-s .
46015024	Imiren a d-taweḍ taggara , Lmasiḥ ad issenger tizmar , lḥekmat d wid iḥekmen ; ad yerr tagelda i Sidi Ṛebbi Baba-tneɣ .
46015025	Axaṭer ilaq Lmasiḥ ad yeḥkem alamma yerra iɛdawen-is seddaw iḍaṛṛen-is .
46015026	Aɛdaw aneggaru ara yessenger , d lmut .
46015027	Axaṭer am akken yura : Sidi Ṛebbi yerra kullec seddaw yiḍaṛṛen-is + . Meɛna mi gura belli kullec yuɣal seddaw yiḍaṛṛen-is , iban belli Win yerran kullec seddaw yidaṛṛen-is ur ițekki ara .
46015028	M'ara yuɣal kullec ger ifassen n Lmasiḥ , imiren nețța yellan d mmi-s , ad yuɣal seddaw n lḥekma n win i s-d-yefkan kullec ; iwakken Sidi Ṛebbi ad yeḥkem ɣef kullec .
46015029	Kra n yemdanen țnadin ad țwaɣedṣen ɣas lukan ad awḍen ɣer lmut , f+ lemmer ț-țideț lmegtin ur d-ḥeggun ara , acuɣeṛ ihi i țnadin ad țwaɣedṣen ?
46015030	I nukni , acimi i nețqabal lmut kull ass ?
46015031	Ay atmaten , yal ass țwaliɣ lmut ger wallen-iw ; s tideț i wen-d-nniɣ ayagi axaṭer tellam d sebba n zzux-iw imi tedduklem d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
46015032	Ma yella ɣef ddemma n ccan n yemdanen i nnuɣeɣ d lewḥuc di temdint n Ifasus , acu n lfayda i sɛiɣ ? Ihi m'ur d-ḥeggun ara lmegtin : a nṛuḥ kan a nečč , a nsew axaṭer azekka a nemmet akken i t-id-iqqaṛ yiwen n lemtel .
46015033	Ḥadret aț-țețwakellxem , axaṭer tikli d yemcumen tessufuɣ i webrid .
46015034	Uɣalet-ed ɣer leɛqel nwen , xḍut i yir abrid ; axaṭer kra deg-wen țeddun am akken ur ssinen ara Ṛebbi ; ayagi nniɣ-t-id iwakken aț-țenneḥcamem .
46015035	Meɛna alebɛaḍ a d-yini : « amek ara d-ḥyun lmegtin ? Amek ara tili lǧețța s wayes ara d-uɣalen ? »
46015036	A win ur nefhim ! Ayen ara tzerɛeḍ m'ur yemmut ara deg wakal , ur d-ițamɣay ara .
46015037	Ayen akken i tzerɛeḍ mačči d ayen i d-yemɣin meɛna d aɛeqqa kan n yired neɣ n zerriɛa nniḍen .
46015038	Imiren Sidi Ṛebbi a s-ye lǧețța akken yebɣa , yal zzerriɛa a s-ye ṣṣifa i s-ilaqen .
46015039	Seg wayen akk yețțidiren ur sɛin ara irkul yiwet n ṣṣifa ; ṣṣifa n wemdan weḥd-es , tin n lmal weḥd-es , tin n yefṛax weḥd-es , tin n iselman daɣen weḥd-es .
46015040	Llant daɣen ṣṣifat n igenwan akk-d ṣṣifat n ddunit , yal yiwet s tafat-is ;
46015041	tafat n yiṭij weḥd-es , tafat n waggur weḥd-es , tafat n yitran daɣen weḥd-es ; ula seg itri ɣer wayeḍ temxalaf tafat-nsen .
46015042	Akka ara tedṛu asm'ara d-ḥyun lmegtin . Lǧețța m'ara tekcem akal , trekku ; meɛna m'ara d-teḥyu ur tețțuɣal ara aț-țerku .
46015043	M'ara ț-țerren ɣer wakal tețțuɣal d ulac , meɛna m'ara d-teḥyu , a d-teḥyu s ccan d ameqqran . M'ara ț-țerren ɣer wakal teffeɣ-iț tezmert , m'ara d-teḥyu a d-teḥyu s lǧehd d ameqqran .
46015044	Tekcem ɣer wakal s yiwet n ṣṣifa , a d-teḥyu s ṣṣifa nniḍen ; akken tella lǧețța n wemdan , tella daɣen lǧețța n Ṛṛuḥ .
46015045	Daymi i d-nnant tira iqedsen : Adem yellan d amdan amezwaru yuɣal d amdan yeddren , meɛna Adam aneggaru , d Ṛṛuḥ i d-yețțaken tudert .
46015046	Mačči d amdan n ṛṛuḥ i d-yusan d amezwaru , meɛna d amdan n ddunit , amdan n ṛṛuḥ yerna-d deffir-es .
46015047	Amdan amezwaru yekka-d seg wakal , d amdan n ddunit ; amdan wis sin yusa-d seg igenni .
46015048	Akken yella wemdan n ddunit , ara yilin yemdanen n ddunit ; daɣen akken yella wemdan n igenwan ara yilin yemdanen n igenwan .
46015049	Akken i ncuba ɣer wemdan n ddunit ara ncabi ɣer wemdan n igenwan .
46015050	Ay atmaten , atan wayen bɣiɣ a d-iniɣ : lǧețța n weksum d idammen ur tweṛṛet ara tageldit n Ṛebbi . Ayen ara yemten ur yezmir ara ad yewṛet ayen ur nețmețțat ara .
46015051	A wen-d-iniɣ yiwet n lbaḍna : ur nețɛedday ara akk si lmut meɛna lǧețțat-nneɣ ad nbeddalent .
46015052	Deg yiwet n teswiɛt , qqen tiṭ-ik teldiḍ-ț , m'ara d-inṭeq lbuq aneggaru , axaṭer lbuq a d-inṭeq , lmegtin a d-ḥyun ur țțuɣalen ara ad mmten , ma d wid i d-yufa lḥal mazal-iten ddren , ad beddlen ṣṣifa .
46015053	Ilaq lǧețța-yagi irekkun aț-țels ayen ur nrekku ara , lǧețța ara yemten aț-țels ayen ur nețmețțat ara .
46015054	Asm'ara tels lǧețța-agi irekkun ayen ur nrekku , asmi ara tels lǧețța-agi ara yemten ayen ur nețmețțat , ad yedṛu wawal-nni yuran di tira iqedsen : Tazmert n Sidi Ṛebbi teɣleb lmut , tessebleɛ-iț .
46015055	A lmut , anida-ț tezmert-im ? A lmut , anda-ț tsiqest-im + ?
46015056	Tisiqest n lmut , d ddnub ; ma d ddnub , d ccariɛa i d-isbeggnen tazmert-is .
46015057	A neḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-d-yefkan tazmert-is s Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ !
46015058	S wakka ay atmaten eɛzizen , ǧehdet ur ɣellit ara . Țnernit kul ass di lecɣal n Ssid-nneɣ , ẓret belli leɛtab-nwen ɣef ddemma n Ssid-nneɣ ur yețțili ara mbla lfayda .
46016001	Ɣef wayen yeɛnan ajmaɛ n yedrimen i watmaten n temdint n Lquds yellan di lexṣaṣ , xedmet akken i weṣṣaɣ ad xedmen di tejmuyaɛ n tmurt n Galasya .
46016002	Mkul ass amezwaru n dduṛt , ilaq yal yiwen deg-wen ad yerr di rrif ayen iwumi yezmer n yedrimen , ur țṛaǧut ara a n-awḍeɣ d wamek ara ten-id jemɛem .
46016003	M'ara n-awḍeɣ , ad ceggɛeɣ wid ara d-textiṛem , a sen-fkeɣ tibṛatin , ad ṛuḥen ad awin ayen akken i d-tjemɛem ɣer temdint n Lquds .
46016004	Ma yella twalam ilaq ad ṛuḥeɣ nekk s yiman-iw , ad ddun yid-i .
46016005	Ad zegreɣ qbel tamurt n Masidunya d wamek ara n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen , axaṭer ilaq-iyi a n-ɛeddiɣ syenna .
46016006	Ad qqimeɣ kra n wussan , neɣ ahat ad sɛeddiɣ ccetwa ɣuṛ-wen , s wakka aț-țzemrem a yi-tɛiwnem iwakken ad kemleɣ abrid-iw .
46016007	Tikkelt-agi , ur bɣiɣ ara a n-ɛeddiɣ d abrid kan , meɛna ssarameɣ ad qqimeɣ kra n lweqt ɣuṛ-wen , ma yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi .
46016008	Tura , aql-i ad qqimeɣ dagi di temdint n Ifasus , alamma d ass n lɛid n wass wis xemsin .
46016009	Axaṭer ldint iyi-d tewwura iwakken ad xedmeɣ yiwen ccɣel d ameqqran , ɣas akken aṭas n yeɛdawen i gellan .
46016010	M'ara n-iɛeddi ɣuṛ-wen gma tneɣ Timuti , lhit-ed yid-es a s-ikkes ukukru axaṭer d aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi i gella am nekk .
46016011	Ḥadret ad yili win ara t-iḥeqṛen . Ɛiwnet-eț ad ikemmel abrid-is iwakken a d-yaweḍ ɣuṛ-i di lehna ; aql-aɣ nețṛaǧu-t nekk d watmaten .
46016012	Ma d gma-tneɣ Abulus , nhiɣ-t aṭas iwakken a n-iddu d watmaten nniḍen ara n-yuɣalen ɣuṛ-wen , meɛna ur yebɣi ara a n-iṛuḥ tura ; a n-yas m'ara s-iserreḥ lḥal .
46016013	Ɛasset , ṭṭfet di liman , ilit d irgazen , ǧehdet .
46016014	Xedmet kullec s leḥmala .
46016015	Tessnem Stifanas ț-țwacult-is , teẓram belli di tmurt n Akaya d nutni i gumnen d imezwura , yerna uɣalen d iqeddacen ɣef wegdud n Sidi Ṛebbi . Ad ssutreɣ deg-wen ay atmaten ,
46016016	aț-țaɣem awal i yergazen am wigi , aț-țqadṛem wid akk yețțekkin di leqdic yid-sen .
46016017	Aql-i feṛḥeɣ mi d-usan Stifanas , Furtunatus akk-d Axaykus ; feṛḥeɣ yis-sen am akken d kunwi .
46016018	axaṭer hednen ul-iw d wulawen nwen . Ilaq a nissin a ne lqima i yergazen am wigi .
46016019	Tijmuyaɛ n tmura n Asya țselliment-ed fell-awen . Akilas akk-d Brisila d wid yețnejmaɛen deg wexxam-nsen țsellimen-d fell-awen s yisem n Ssid-nneɣ .
46016020	Atmaten akk yellan dagi țsellimen-d fell-awen . Msalamet wway gar-awen s sslam n tegmaț .
46016021	Nekk Bulus , s ufus-iw i d-uriɣ imeslayen-agi n sslam .
46016022	Win ur nḥemmel ara Ssid-nneɣ atan ad yețwanɛel ! Marana-ta , Ssid-nneɣ iteddu-d .
46016023	Ṛṛeḥma n Sidna Ɛisa aț-țili fell-awen !
46016024	Ḥemmleɣ-kkun meṛṛa s yisem n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
47001001	Nekk Bulus amceggeɛ n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi , akk-d gma-tneɣ Timuti , i watmaten n tejmaɛt n Sidi Ṛebbi yellan di temdint n Kurintus akk-d wid meṛṛa i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi di mkul amkan n tmurt n Akaya .
47001002	Ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi Baba tneɣ akk-d Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
47001003	Ad ițțubarek Sidi Ṛebbi , Baba-s n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yellan di yal taswiɛt d Bab n leḥnana d ṣṣbeṛ .
47001004	Ițṣebbiṛ-aɣ di lemḥayen-nneɣ iwakken s ṣṣbeṛ i ɣ-d-ifka , a nizmir ula d nukni a nṣebbeṛ wid yellan di lemḥayen .
47001005	Axaṭer am akken i d-țeɣlayent fell-aɣ lemḥayen ɣef ddemma n Lmasiḥ , akken daɣen i ɣ-d-ițțas ṣṣbeṛ s ɣuṛ-es .
47001006	Nukni ma nenɛețțab di lmeḥnat , nțenɛețțab iwakken aț-țețțusebbṛem yerna aț-țețțuselkem . Ma nețțuṣebbeṛ nukni , aț-țețțuṣebbṛem ula d kunwi iwakken aț-țesɛum ṣṣbeṛ di lemḥayen i deg tețɛeddayem am nukni .
47001007	Ihi ɣef wayen i kkun-yeɛnan nețkel , nekkes anezgum , axaṭer neẓra akken i tețțekkim di lemḥayen-nneɣ , ara tețțekkim daɣen di ṣṣbeṛ i ɣ-d ițțunefken .
47001008	Nebɣa aț-țeẓrem ay atmaten lmeḥna i nesɛedda di tmurt n Asya ; ɣlint-ed fell-aɣ lemḥayen iwumi ur nezmir , neɛteb armi nɣil a nemmet .
47001009	Nețwali deg iman-nneɣ belli ḥekmen fell-aɣ s lmut , iwakken ur nețkal ara ɣef yiman-nneɣ lameɛna a nețkel ɣef Ṛebbi i d-iḥeggun lmegtin .
47001010	D nețța i ɣ-d-isellken si lmut am tagi yerna nețkel belli mazal a ɣ-isellek sya ɣer zdat .
47001011	Ula d kunwi tețɛawanem-aɣ m'ara tdeɛɛum ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi fell-aɣ . S wakka , ɣef ddemma n tẓallit n waṭas n watmaten , a ɣ-d-țțunefkent lbaṛakat s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ; imiren aṭas ara iḥemden Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef ddemma nneɣ .
47001012	Ațah sebba s wayes i nefṛeḥ s yiman-nneɣ yerna ulawen-nneɣ thennan : nelḥa d yemdanen meṛṛa s wul yeṣfan d neyya , abeɛda yid wen kunwi . Ayagi yusa-yaɣ-d s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi , axaṭer mačči s lɛeqliya n yemdanen i nțeddu meɛna d ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-ițwellihen .
47001013	Ayen i wen-nura di tebṛatin-nneɣ , nenna-t-id s wul yeṣfan d neyya , ulac deg-sent lmeɛna nniḍen anagar ayen i teɣṛam d wayen i tfehmem deg-sent . Ssarameɣ aț-țfehmem ayagi akken ilaq am akken i tebdam tfehmem-t , yeɛni ass n tuɣalin n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ a nili d sebba n lfeṛḥ-nwen , kunwi aț-țilim d sebba n lfeṛḥ-nneɣ .
47001014	
47001015	Imi tḥeqqeqeɣ belli akka i gella lḥal , ssarmeɣ a n-ɛeddiɣ di tazwara ɣuṛ-wen iwakken aț-țfeṛḥem snat n tikkal .
47001016	Qesdeɣ ad ɛeddiɣ fell-awen m'ara ṛuḥeɣ ɣer tmurt n Masidunya , syinna a d-uɣaleɣ ɣuṛ-wen iwakken a yi-tɛiwnem ad kemmleɣ abrid-iw ɣer tmurt n Yahuda .
47001017	Mi qesdeɣ ad xedmeɣ annect-agi , eɛni ur xemmemeɣ ara ? Neɣ m'ara qesdeɣ ad xedmeɣ kra , ma nniɣ-ed anɛam neɣ ala uɣaleɣ beddleɣ ṛṛay , eɛni d lebɣi-inu i țnadiɣ ?
47001018	Ṛebbi yeẓra belli ayen i wen-d-neqqaṛ mačči d anɛam akk-d ala ɣef yiwet n tikkelt ;
47001019	axaṭer Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i nbecceṛ gar-awen nekk d watmaten Silwan akk-d Timuti , ur d-yusi ara iwakken ad yili d anɛam akk-d ala , meɛna anagar anɛam i gellan deg-s .
47001020	Axaṭer yis i d-iqqaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi anɛam i wayen meṛṛa i gewɛed . Ihi s yisem n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i d-neqqaṛ daɣen amin i Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a t-neḥmed a t-ncekkeṛ .
47001021	D Sidi Ṛebbi s yiman-is i ɣ isǧehden yid-wen di tikli-nneɣ akk-d Lmasiḥ , d nețța i ɣ-ixtaṛen .
47001022	Yessers fell-aɣ ṭṭabeɛ-ines yerna yefka-yaɣ-d deg ulawen-nneɣ Ṛṛuḥ-is iqedsen yellan d aɛeṛbun n lbaṛakat i ɣ-iwɛed .
47001023	Atan Sidi Ṛebbi yeẓra belli ț-țideț i d-qqaṛeɣ : mi qesdeɣ ur țțuɣaleɣ ara ɣer temdint n Kurintus , d aḥader i bɣiɣ a kkun-ḥadreɣ .
47001024	Ur nețnadi ara a wen-d-nesken ayen s wayes ara tamnem axaṭer neẓra tǧehdem di liman , lameɛna nebɣa a nexdem yid-wen iwakken a ndukkel di lfeṛḥ .
47002001	Ihi qesdeɣ ur n-țuɣaleɣ ara ɣuṛ wen , imi ur bɣiɣ ara a kkun sḥezneɣ daɣen .
47002002	Axaṭer ma sḥezneɣ kkun , anwa ara yi-isfeṛḥen ma yella mačči d kunwi ?
47002003	Uggadeɣ a yi-isḥeznen kra seg wid i glaq a yi-isfeṛḥen , daymi i wen-d-zzewreɣ tabṛaț-nni , axaṭer ẓriɣ ma yella feṛḥeɣ aț-țfeṛḥem ula d kunwi .
47002004	Uriɣ-awen tabṛaț-nni s imeṭṭawen d leḥzen ameqqran akk-d wul yetqelqen , mačči iwakken aț țḥeznem lameɛna iwakken aț-țeẓrem acḥal i kkun-ḥemmleɣ .
47002005	Ma yella gar-awen win yellan d sebba n leḥzen , mačči d nekk i gesseḥzen lameɛna d kunwi meṛṛa i gesseḥzen , yeɛni bɣiɣ a d-iniɣ amur ameqqran deg-wen .
47002006	Amdan-agi tlumm-it meṛṛa tejmaɛt , beṛka-t !
47002007	Tura , ilaq-awen kan a s-tsamḥem yerna a t-tesǧehdem , neɣ m'ulac a d iɣli fell-as leḥzen d ameqqran ara t-isfeclen .
47002008	Ihi a kkun-nhuɣ a s-d-beggnem belli tḥemmlem-t .
47002009	Uriɣ-awen ayagi iwakken ad ẓreɣ ma tețțaɣem awal di kullec .
47002010	Win iwumi ara tsamḥem , a s-samḥeɣ ula d nekk ; ma yella wayen i ɣef ara samḥeɣ i yiwen , ɣef ddemma-nwen i s-sumḥeɣ zdat Lmasiḥ ;
47002011	s wakka ur nețțaǧa ara Cciṭan a ɣ-iɣleb , axaṭer nessen lmeqṣud-is .
47002012	Mi wwḍeɣ ɣer temdint n Truwas iwakken ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ , Sidi Ṛebbi yeldi-yi-d tiwwura iwakken ad beccṛeɣ .
47002013	Lameɛna ur yethenna ara wul-iw imi ur ufiɣ ara dinna gma-tneɣ Tit ; daymi ǧǧiɣ atmaten n temdint n Truwas , imiren ṛuḥeɣ ɣer tmurt n Masidunya .
47002014	A neḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi a t-ncekkeṛ imi s Lmasiḥ i nɣelleb kullec yerna yerra-yaɣ d iqeddacen-is iwakken a nbecceṛ Lmasiḥ di mkul amkan am rriḥa taẓiḍant .
47002015	? er Sidi Ṛebbi , d nukni i d rriḥa taẓiḍant n Lmasiḥ ger wid ițwasellken yellan deg webrid n Sidna Ɛisa akk-d wid iḍaɛen .
47002016	I wid iḍaɛen , d ṛṛiḥa n lmut i d-ițțaken lmut ; i wid yellan deg webrid n leslak , d rriḥa n tudert i d ițțaken tudert . Anwa ihi i gzemren ad ixdem ccɣel am wagi ?
47002017	Nukni ur nețḥerrif ara awal n Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a netjaṛ yis am akken xeddmen waṭas n yemdanen , lameɛna zdat Sidi Ṛebbi , ț-țideț i d-neqqaṛ mi nețbecciṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ i ɣ-d-yekkan s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
