47003001	D acekkeṛ i nebɣa a d-ncekkeṛ iman-nneɣ mi d-nenna imeslayen agi ? Eɛni neḥwaǧ ula d nukni a wen-nawi tibṛatin n lewṣaya neɣ a tent-id-nawi s ɣuṛ-wen am akken xeddmen kra n yemdanen ?
47003002	Tabṛaț-nneɣ , d kunwi s yiman nwen ; ț-țabṛaț yuran deg ulawen nneɣ , tețwassen yerna ɣṛan-ț akk yemdanen .
47003003	Iban belli tabṛaț-agi yura-ț Lmasiḥ s yiman-is mi wen-d nbecceṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ; mačči s lmidad i ț-yura lameɛna s Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi yeddren , mačči ɣef teblaḍin n wezṛu i ț-ijerred lameɛna deg ulawen-nwen .
47003004	Lețkal-agi i nesɛa deg wayen i d-nenna , yekka-d s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , s Lmasiḥ .
47003005	Ur nezmir ara a d-nini belli d nukni i gxeddmen ccɣel-agi s tezmert-nneɣ lameɛna d Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-d-ițțaken tazmert deg wayen akk i nxeddem .
47003006	D nețța i ɣ-d-ifkan tazmert s wayes i nuɣal d iqeddacen n leɛqed ajdid . Leɛqed-agi ur d-yekki ara seg wayen yuran di ccariɛa lameɛna s ɣuṛ Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen . Axaṭer ccariɛa tețțawi ɣer lmut , ma d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yețțak-ed tudert .
47003007	Ccariɛa yețwajerden ɣef teblaḍin n wezṛu tesban-ed tamanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi deg udem n Sidna Musa , yețfeǧǧiǧ wudem-is almi ur zmiren ara wat Isṛail ad muqlen ɣuṛ-es ; ɣas akken , afeǧǧeǧ-nni ur ițdum ara .
47003008	Ma yella ccariɛa i gețțawin ɣer lmut tban-ed s lɛaḍima am tin , acḥal ihi ara tili meqqṛet tmanegt i d-yewwi Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-ițakken tudert !
47003009	Ma yella leqdic ɣef ccariɛa yețțawin ɣer lmut yesɛa ccan , acḥal meqqeṛ akteṛ ccan n leqdic ɣef Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i gețțarran imdanen d iḥeqqiyen .
47003010	Nezmer a d-nini : anda ara d tban tmanegt icceɛceɛen zik-nni zdat tin n tura ? Tuɣal d ulac !
47003011	Ma yella ayen ur nețdum ara yesɛa ccan , acḥal ihi i t-yugar di ccan wayen yețdumun .
47003012	? ef ddemma n wusirem-agi , i nesɛa lețkal d ameqqran ;
47003013	nukni ur nelli ara am Sidna Musa yețɣummun udem-is iwakken ur țwalin ara wat Isṛail lɛaḍima-nni ur nețdum ara .
47003014	Ar ass-a qquṛen iqeṛṛay-nsen , gguman ad fehmen ; imi leḥjab-nni ur yekkis ara m'ara d-ɣṛen di tira iqedsen n leɛqed aqdim , axaṭer leḥdjab-agi itekkes anagar s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
47003015	Ar ass-a , leḥjab-agi ițɣummu ulawen-nsen m'ara qqaṛen ccariɛa n Musa ;
47003016	meɛna m'ara d-yuɣal wul n wemdan ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , leḥjab-nni itekkes ;
47003017	axaṭer Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , d Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi . Anda yella Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi , tella tlelli .
47003018	Nukni ur nesɛi ara leḥjab ɣef wudmawen-nneɣ , tamanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi tețban-ed deg-nneɣ am akken di lemri , Sidi Ṛebbi yețbeddil-aɣ dayem iwakken a necbu ɣuṛ-es s tmanegt yețnernin .
47004001	Ihi , ur ilaq ara a nefcel imi s Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-d ițțune leqdic-agi ɣef Lmasiḥ .
47004002	Ur neqbil ara ayen yellan d lɛib d wayen yețwaxedmen s tuffra , ur nteddu s tḥila , ur nețḥerrif awal n Ṛebbi . Meɛna nețbeggin-ed awal n Sidi Ṛebbi s tideț , iwakken imdanen meṛṛa ad slen i wawal n Ṛebbi , a t-fehmen akken yella .
47004003	Ma mazal lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wen nbecceṛ ur ițwafhem ara , lmeɛna-ines tețwaffer kan ɣef wid iḍaɛen ,
47004004	ur numin ara s Ṛebbi ; axaṭer Cciṭan yerran iman is d ṛebbi n ddunit-agi , yesderɣel ixemmimen nsen , daymi ur walan ara tafat yellan di lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan tamanegt n Lmasiḥ , nețța yellan d ṣṣifa n Sidi Ṛebbi .
47004005	Axaṭer mačči ɣef yiman-nneɣ i nețbecciṛ , lameɛna nețbecciṛ ɣef Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ ; ma d nukni , nuɣal d iqeddacen-nwen ɣef ddemma n Sidna Ɛisa .
47004006	Ṛebbi i d-yennan : Tafat aț-țecceɛceɛ di ṭṭlam , d nețța daɣen i d-ifkan tafat tfeǧǧeǧ deg ulawen-nneɣ iwakken a ɣ-d ibeggen tamanegt-is yețfeǧǧiǧen ɣef wudem n Lmasiḥ .
47004007	Nukni yețțawin deg iman-nneɣ agerruj-agi , necba ticmuxin n wakal , iwakken tazmert-agi tameqqrant a d-tban belli tusa-d s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi mačči s ɣuṛ-nneɣ .
47004008	Nețwaḥṛes si mkul tama meɛna ur nefcil ara ; nella di teswiɛt n ṭṭiq meɛna ur neɣli ara ;
47004009	nețwaqheṛ meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ur aɣ-yeǧǧi ara ; nețwarkeḍ meɛna ur aɣ-nɣin ara .
47004010	Nețțawi daymen di lǧețțat-nneɣ lmut n Sidna Ɛisa iwakken a d-tban daɣen deg-nneɣ tudert-is .
47004011	Nukni yeddren , nețqabal daymen lmut ɣef ddemma n Sidna Ɛisa , iwakken a d-tban tudert n Sidna Ɛisa di lǧețțat nneɣ ifennun .
47004012	S wakka lmut txeddem deg-nneɣ , ma ț-țudert txeddem deg-wen .
47004013	Am akken yura di tira iqedsen : umneɣ , daymi i d-hedṛeɣ ; nukni daɣen nesɛa liman-agi , daymi i d nheddeṛ .
47004014	Axaṭer neẓra belli Sidi Ṛebbi i d-isseḥyan Sidna Ɛisa si ger lmegtin , a ɣ-d-isseḥyu ula d nukni akk-d Sidna Ɛisa , iwakken a ɣ issemlil yid-wen m'ara nuɣal ɣuṛ-es .
47004015	Ayen akk ideṛṛun yid-nneɣ , ideṛṛu ɣef ddemma-nwen , iwakken ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țaweḍ ɣer waṭas n yemdanen ; s wakka aṭas ara iketṛen di leḥmada n Sidi Ṛebbi , a t-cekkṛen ɣef tmanegt-is .
47004016	Daymi ur ilaq ara a nefcel ; axaṭer ɣas akken lǧețța-nneɣ tfennu seg wass ɣer wayeḍ , ṛṛuḥ yellan deg-nneɣ yețnerni seg wass ɣer wayeḍ .
47004017	Leɛtab-agi i nesɛedday tura xfif yerna ur ițdum ara ; ițheggi-yaɣ-ed tamanegt tameqqrant ur nfennu .
47004018	Axaṭer nukni ur nețnadi ara ɣef wayen țwalint wallen , lameɛna nețnadi ɣef leḥwayeǧ ur țwalint ara ; axaṭer leḥwayeǧ i țwalint wallen fennunt , ma d ayen ur țwalint ara , yețdumu i dayem .
47005001	Lǧețțat i nesɛa di ddunit-agi am iqiḍunen ara yefnun , meɛna neẓra belli Sidi Ṛebbi ihegga-yaɣ deg igenwan tinezduɣin n dayem , mačči d ayen yexdem ufus n wemdan , meɛna d ayen yexdem nețța s yiman-is .
47005002	Aql-aɣ nenɛețțab zdaxel uqiḍun agi , nețṛaǧu s lḥir melmi ara naweḍ ɣer tnezduɣin n dayem yellan deg igenwan ;
47005003	lameɛna ilaq a nili nhegga iman-nneɣ di ddunit-agi , mačči alamma tusa-d lmut a ɣ-tawi .
47005004	Skud mazal-aɣ deg uqiḍun n ddunit-agi , yeɛni lǧețțat-nneɣ , nețnazaɛ am akken nbub taɛekkumt ẓẓayen ; mačči d lmut i nebɣa a nemmet , lameɛna nessaram a nels lǧețța n igenwan iwakken ad yețwakkes seg-neɣ wayen ifennun .
47005005	D Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-iheggan ɣer tudert-agi , ifka-yaɣ-d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen d aɛeṛbun n lbaṛakat ara ɣ-d ițțunefken .
47005006	S wakka nesɛa daymen lețkal deg wulawen-nneɣ . Neẓra belli skud mazal-aɣ di lǧețța n ddunit-agi , aql-aɣ mazal nebɛed ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi ;
47005007	axaṭer tura aql-aɣ nțeddu s liman , werɛad nwala s wallen .
47005008	S tideț nesɛa lețkal deg wulawen nneɣ , lameɛna a wi-yufan a neffeɣ si ddunit-agi iwakken a nili ɣer tama n Sidi Ṛebbi .
47005009	Ama nella di ddunit-agi ama neffeɣ seg-s , nețnadi kan a neɛǧeb i Sidi Ṛebbi .
47005010	Axaṭer a nɛeddi meṛṛa di ccṛeɛ n Lmasiḥ , iwakken mkul yiwen ad ițțuḥaseb ɣef lxiṛ neɣ cceṛ i gexdem asmi yella di ddunit .
47005011	Neẓra d acu i d lmeɛna n tugdi n Sidi Ṛebbi , daymi i nețnadi a d nehdu wiyaḍ . Sidi Ṛebbi yessen ulawen-nneɣ akken ilaq , ssarameɣ ula d kunwi tessnem-aɣ , teẓram ayen yellan deg ulawen-nneɣ .
47005012	Mačči d zzux i nebɣa a nzux s yiman-nneɣ ɣuṛ-wen , nebɣa kan a nili d sebba n lfeṛḥ-nwen . S wakka aț-țissinem amek ara terrem awal i wid ixedmen ccan i wayen i d ițbanen s ufella kan , mačči i wayen yellan deg wulawen .
47005013	Ma yella llant teswiɛin i deg nɛedda tilas deg uselmed-nneɣ , nɛedda tilas iwakken a d-tban tmanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi ; m'ara netɛqqel , i nnfeɛ-nwen i netɛeqqel .
47005014	Nețwaḥṛes s leḥmala n Lmasiḥ yeččuṛen ulawen-nneɣ , axaṭer neẓra imi yemmut yiwen wemdan ɣef yemdanen meṛṛa , ihi mmuten meṛṛa .
47005015	Yemmut ɣef medden meṛṛa , iwakken wid yeddren ur țɛicin ara i yiman nsen , lameɛna ad ɛicen i win yemmuten yerna yeḥya-d ɣef ddemma-nsen .
47005016	Sya d asawen ur nețwali yiwen s lɛeqliya n yemdanen ; ɣas akken zik-nni uqbel a namen nella nețwali Lmasiḥ s lɛeqliya n yemdanen , tura mačči akenni i t-nețwali .
47005017	Ihi win iteddun deg webrid n Lmasiḥ , iɛawed ed talalit , yuɣal d amdan ajdid : ayen yellan d aqdim iɛedda , kullec yuɣal d ajdid .
47005018	Ayagi meṛṛa yekka-d s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i gessemṣalaḥen imdanen yid-es s Lmasiḥ , yerna iweṣṣa-yaɣ-ed a nbecceṛ amṣaleḥ-agi i yemdanen meṛṛa n ddunit ,
47005019	axaṭer s Lmasiḥ i gessemṣaleḥ Sidi Ṛebbi imdanen yid-es mbla ma imuqel ɣer ddnubat-nsen yerna iweṣṣa-yaɣ a nbecceṛ amṣaleḥ-agi .
47005020	Ihi nukni d imceggɛen n Lmasiḥ , am akken d Ṛebbi s yiman-is i wen-d-issawalen yis nneɣ : Nețḥellil-ikkun s yisem n Lmasiḥ aț-țemṣalaḥem akk-d Ṛebbi .
47005021	Win akken yellan d azedgan leɛmeṛ yednib , Sidi Ṛebbi yeḥkem fell-as deg umkan-nneɣ am akken d amednub i gella iwakken s tikli-nneɣ akk-d Lmasiḥ , a nili d iḥeqqiyen zdat Sidi Ṛebbi .
47006001	Imi d iqeddacen n Sidi Ṛebbi i nella , bɣiɣ a kkun-nenhu ur tețḍeggiɛem ara ṛṛeḥma i wen-d ițțunefken s ɣuṛ-es .
47006002	Axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d : Di lweqt ilaqen , qebleɣ-ed taẓallit-ik , di lweqt n leslak , sellkeɣ-k . Ihi tura , atan yewweḍ-ed lweqt ilaqen , yewweḍ-ed wass n leslak .
47006003	Di yal lḥaǧa , ur nebɣi ara a nili d ugur ula i yiwen deg-wen iwakken ur d-tețțekksem ara kra n diri di lxedma-nneɣ ,
47006004	meɛna nețbeggin-ed belli d iqeddacen n Sidi Ṛebbi i nella deg wayen akk nxeddem : nṣebbeṛ i teswiɛin n ceddat , i lḥif , i tugdi ,
47006005	i tiytiwin ; neṣbeṛ mi nella di leḥbus , di teswiɛin n ccwal , leɛtab , aɛawez akk-d laẓ ;
47006006	nedda s wul yeṣfan , s tmusni , s ṣṣbeṛ , s leḥnana , s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , s leḥmala n ṣṣeḥ ,
47006007	s wawal n tideț , s tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi , s leslaḥ n lḥeqq s wayes nețnaɣ yerna nețdafaɛ ɣef yiman-nneɣ ;
47006008	ama di teswiɛin n ccan neɣ n lɛaṛ , ama mi heddṛen fell-aɣ medden s lxiṛ neɣ s cceṛ . Nețwaḥseb d ikeddaben ɣas akken ț-țideț i d neqqaṛ ,
47006009	nețwankeṛ , ɣas akken nețwassen ɣer yemdanen meṛṛa ; ḥesben-aɣ nemmut , nukni nedder ; țqehhiṛen-aɣ lameɛna ur nemmut ara ;
47006010	sseɣlayen-d fell-aɣ leḥzen , lameɛna nețțili daymen di lfeṛḥ . ? esben-aɣ d igellilen , lameɛna nesserbaḥ aṭas n yemdanen , ɣilen ur nesɛi acemma , lameɛna nukni ur aɣ-ixuṣṣ ula d kra .
47006011	Ay imezdaɣ n temdint n Kurintus , nemmeslay-awen-d , neldi-yawen mliḥ ulawen-nneɣ ,
47006012	ur ten-neɣliq ara ɣuṛ wen , d kunwi i gɣelqen ulawen-nwen ɣuṛ-nneɣ .
47006013	? meslayeɣ-awen-d am akken d arraw-iw i tellam : xedmet am nukni , swesɛet ulawen-nwen ula d kunwi !
47006014	Ur cerrket ara d wid ur nețțamen ara s Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken aț-țxedmem am nutni . Eɛni lḥeqq d lbaṭel , zemren ad cerken ? Tafat akk-d ṭṭlam , zemren ad ddukklen ?
47006015	Amek ! Yezmer Lmasiḥ ad imsefham akk-d Cciṭan ? Acu n tdukli yellan ger win yețțamnen s Ṛebbi d win ur nețțamen ara ?
47006016	D acu icerken lǧameɛ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d lmeṣnuɛat ? Axaṭer d nukni i d lǧameɛ iqedsen n Ṛebbi yeddren . Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-t-id di tira iqedsen : Ad zedɣeɣ yerna ad lḥuɣ gar-asen , A d iliɣ d Illu-nsen , ad ilin d agdud iw
47006017	? ef wannect-agi i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi : Mfaṛaqet d yemdanen-agi , beɛdet fell-asen ; ur țnalet ara ayen iḥeṛmen , nekk ad sṭerḥbeɣ yis-wen ;
47006018	ad iliɣ d baba-twen , kunwi aț-țilim d arraw-iw , d yess-i ; akka i d-yenna Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert .
47007001	A wid eɛzizen , imi i ɣ-d țțunefkent lemɛahdat-agi , ilaq a nessizdeg iman-nneɣ seg wayen akk issenǧasen lǧețța-nneɣ akk-d wulawen-nneɣ iwakken a nkemmel tezdeg n tikli-nneɣ akk-d Sidi Ṛebbi , s ṭṭaɛa d wannuz .
47007002	Qeblet-aɣ deg wulawen-nwen ! Ur neḍlim yiwen , ur nexdim cceṛ ula i yiwen , ur nečči lḥeqq n yiwen .
47007003	Ur d-nniɣ ara annect-agi iwakken a kkun-sḍelmeɣ ; axaṭer nniɣ-awen t-id yakan : ama nedder ama newweḍ ɣer lmut , tellam deg wulawen-nneɣ .
47007004	Lețkal-iw fell-awen meqqeṛ , țzuxxuɣ aṭas yis-wen ; yethedden wul-iw yerna yeččuṛ d lfeṛḥ ɣas akken nesɛedda aṭas n leɛtab .
47007005	Seg wasmi i d-nekcem tamurt n Masidunya ur nesteɛfa , nețwaḥṛes si mkul tama : ccwal di beṛṛa , tugdi deg ulawen-nneɣ .
47007006	Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yețṣebbiṛen wid yețwaḥeqṛen , iṣebbeṛ aɣ s gma-tneɣ Titus mi d-yewweḍ .
47007007	Mačči kan mi d-yewweḍ gma tneɣ Titus i nețțuṣebbeṛ , lameɛna nețțuṣebbeṛ daɣen s ṣṣbeṛ i d-yewwi s ɣuṛ-wen . Yeḥka-yaɣ-d acḥal tețmennim a yi-teẓrem , acḥal tḥeznem d wamek tebɣam a yi-tɛiwnem seg ul . ? ef wayagi i gzad lfeṛḥ-iw .
47007008	? riɣ belli sḥezneɣ-kkun s tebṛaț iw tamezwarut , lameɛna ur ndimeɣ ara ; ɣas akken ndemmeɣ , ndemmeɣ kan mi ẓriɣ sḥezneɣ-kkun kra n lweqt .
47007009	Tura aql-i feṛḥeɣ , mačči imi i kkun-sḥezneɣ , meɛna imi s leḥzen-agi tettubem yerna tbeddlem tikli . Axaṭer leḥzen-nni i d-yeɣlin fell awen yusa-d s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , s wakka ur d-yekki wacemma n diri s ɣuṛ-nneɣ .
47007010	Leḥzen i d-itekken s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ițbeddil tikli n wemdan , yețțawi ɣer leslak yerna ur nțendemmay ara deg-s ; ma d leḥzen i d-itekken si ddunit , yețțawi ɣer lmut .
47007011	Leḥzen-agi-nwen yeɛǧeb aṭas Sidi Ṛebbi , walit acḥal i gexdem deg-wen : acḥal i tenneḥcamem d wamek i tḍelbem ssmaḥ ! Acḥal tendemmem , tekcem-ikkun tugdi n Sidi Ṛebbi ; acḥal tcedham a yi teẓrem yerna tebɣam a yi tɛiwnem ; amek daɣen tɛuqbem wid ixeddmen cceṛ ! Deg wayagi meṛṛa tesbeggnem-d belli teṣfam di taluft-agi .
47007012	Ihi ma uriɣ-awen-d , mačči ɣef ddemma n win iḍelmen neɣ win yețwaḍelmen , lameɛna iwakken a d-iban gar-awen zdat Sidi Ṛebbi , acḥal meqqeṛ leḥmala-nwen ɣuṛ-nneɣ .
47007013	? ef wannect-agi i theddnen wulawen-nneɣ . Sennig ṣṣbeṛ-agi , lfeṛḥ-nneɣ yennerna mi nwala acḥal yefṛeḥ yis-wen gma-tneɣ Titus , axaṭer tekksem-as anezgum .
47007014	? ideț zuxxeɣ yis-wen zdat-es , lameɛna ur nneḥcameɣ ara , axaṭer anagar tideț i wen-d-nheddeṛ yal ass imi ayen akken s wayes nzuxx yis-wen zdat gma-tneɣ Titus , iban-ed belli ț-țideț ;
47007015	lemḥibba-s ɣuṛ-wen tețnerni mkul m'ara d-immekti amek i tesṭerḥbem yis s leqdeṛ d wannuz .
47007016	Feṛḥeɣ imi zemreɣ ad țekleɣ fell-awen di kullec .
47008001	Nebɣa a kkun-nesseɛlem ay atmaten ɣef wayen yeɛnan ṛṛeḥma i d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n imasiḥiyen yellan di tmurt n Masidunya ;
47008002	țwajeṛben s waṭas n lmeḥnat , lameɛna lfeṛḥ-nsen yețnerni . ? as akken d igellilen i llan yerna xuṣṣen aṭas , seddqen mbla cceḥḥa ;
47008003	fkan-d ayen iwumi zemren ; aql-iyi d inigi , zemreɣ a d-iniɣ fkan-d nnig n tezmert-nsen yerna xedmen ayagi s lebɣi-nsen .
47008004	Ssutren-aɣ-d s uḥellel iwakken a sen-nexdem lemziya a d-fken ula d nutni amur-nsen n ssadaqa-agi i njemmeɛ iwakken a ț-țnawi i watmaten n tmurt n Yahuda yellan di lexṣas .
47008005	Zwaren deg iman-nsen mi fkan tudert-nsen i Ṛebbi , imiren s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi , rnan qeddcen fell-aɣ seg ul ; ayagi sennig wayen nessaram !
47008006	S wakka ihi , nweṣṣa gma-tneɣ Titus ad ikemmel lxedma-nni i gebda ɣuṛ-wen ɣef wayen yeɛnan ssadaqa agi .
47008007	Am akken i tẓewṛem di kullec , ama di liman neɣ deg wawal , ama di tmusni neɣ di lemḥibba i tesɛam ɣuṛ-nneɣ , ẓewṛet daɣen di temsalt yeɛnan ssadaqa .
47008008	Mačči d lameṛ i bɣiɣ a wen-d fkeɣ ; ḥkiɣ-awen amek i zewṛen wiyaḍ , iwakken a kkun-jeṛṛbeɣ ma tesɛam leḥmala n tideț neɣ ala .
47008009	Tessnem ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yellan d Bab n lerbaḥ n ddunit meṛṛa , yuɣal d igellil ɣef ddemma-nwen iwakken a kkun isserbeḥ s tigellelt-ines .
47008010	A wen-d-fkeɣ ṛṛay-iw deg wayagi axaṭer d ayen i wen-ilhan : aseggas iɛeddan , d kunwi i d imezwura i gebɣan aț-țɛiwnem atmaten n tmurt n Yahuda yellan di lexṣaṣ , d kunwi daɣen i d imezwura i gebdan tjemmɛem-d ssadaqa-agi ;
47008011	ihi tura kemmlet ccɣel-agi i tebdam , s wayen iwumi tzemrem ; am akken i t-tebdam seg ul , kemmlet-eț s wul .
47008012	Sidi Ṛebbi iqebbel ssadaqa-nneɣ , lameɛna s wakken tella tezmert-nneɣ , mačči sennig wayen nezmer .
47008013	Ur nebɣi ara a d-nini xlut ixxamen-nwen iwakken aț-țɛiwnem wiyaḍ , lameɛna iwakken aț-țemɛadalem ;
47008014	ayen tesɛam d zzyada ad yenfeɛ wid ixuṣṣen tura , iwakken asm'ara txuṣṣem kunwi , a kkun-ɛiwnen s wayen sɛan d zzyada ; s wakka ihi aț-țemɛadalem ,
47008015	akken yura di tira iqedsen : Win yesɛan aṭas ur yesɛi ara zzyada , ma d win yesɛan cwiṭ ur t-ixuṣṣ kra .
47008016	A neḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef gma tneɣ Titus imi yețḥebbiṛ fell-awen am nukni .
47008017	Yeqbel mi t-in-nceggeɛ , yerna uqbel a s-nini yella iqsed a n-iruḥ ɣuṛ wen s lfeṛḥ d ameqqran .
47008018	A nceggeɛ yid-es yiwen seg watmaten-nneɣ i cekkṛent akk tejmuyaɛ n watmaten ɣef lxedma-ines deg ubecceṛ n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ;
47008019	ur yețwaxtaṛ ara kan d aṛfiq , lameɛna ț-țijmuyaɛ n watmaten i t-ixtaṛen iwakken a ɣ-iɛiwen di ccɣel agi yeɛnan ssadaqa ɣef ddemma n tmanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi , s wakka daɣen a d-nbeggen acḥal nebɣa a nɛiwen wiyaḍ .
47008020	Nețḥadar iman-nneɣ iwakken ur heddṛen ara fell-aɣ lɣaci ɣef wayen yeɛnan aḍebbeṛ i nețḍebbiṛ di ssadaqa agi , axaṭer aṭas n yedrimen i d nejmeɛ ;
47008021	nețqellib ayen yelhan ama zdat Sidi Ṛebbi ama zdat yemdanen .
47008022	Nceggeɛ yid-sen gma-tneɣ agi i njeṛṛeb acḥal d abrid di yal taswiɛt , nwala amek yebɣa ad iqdec seg ul ; tikkelt-agi ẓẓwaṛa-ines di leqdic ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi tban-ed akteṛ , axaṭer yețkel fell-awen .
47008023	? ef wayen yeɛnan gma-tneɣ Titus , d arfiq-iw yerna ixeddem yid-i ɣef ddemma-nwen , ma d atmaten nniḍen , d imceggɛen n tejmuyaɛ n watmaten ; qeddcen iwakken a d tban tmanegt n Lmasiḥ .
47008024	Sbeggnet-ed ihi belli tḥemmlem ten s tideț iwakken tijmuyaɛ n watmaten ad ẓrent belli nesɛa lḥeqq imi nețzuxxu yis-wen .
47009001	? ef wayen yeɛnan lemɛawna n watmaten , fiḥel ma uriɣ awen-d .
47009002	? riɣ acḥal tebɣam aț țqedcem , daymi i țzuxxuɣ yis-wen zdat n tejmuyaɛ n Masidunya qqaṛeɣ asen : atmaten n tmurt n Akaya heggan iman-nsen ad ɛiwnen seg useggas iɛeddan . ? ẓwaṛa-nwen di leqdic tessaki aṭas deg-sen .
47009003	Ceggɛeɣ atmaten-agi iwakken ad iban belli ț-țideț , tuklalem a nzux yis-wen yerna theggam iman-nwen am akken i t-id-nniɣ .
47009004	Ma yella ddan yid-i kra seg watmaten n Masidunya ilaq a kkun-in-afen theggam iman nwen iwakken zzux-nni i țzuxxuɣ yis wen ur iyi-țțuɣal ara d lḥecma , bɣiɣ a d-iniɣ d lḥecma nwen kunwi !
47009005	? ef ddemma n wannect-agi i wen-ceggɛeɣ kra seg watmaten a n-zwiren ɣuṛ-wen iwakken a d jemɛen ssadaqa-nni i ɣ-tweɛdem . S wakka m'ara n-awḍeɣ ad afeɣ theggam kullec yerna a d-iban belli ayen i tseddqem tefkam-t-id seg ul , ur kkun-iḥettem yiwen .
47009006	Ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli win i gzerɛen cwiṭ a d-imger cwiṭ ; ma d win izerɛen aṭas , a d-imger aṭas .
47009007	Mkul yiwen ilaq ad iseddeq akken yenwa deg ul-is , mačči s uḥettem neɣ s nndama axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi iḥemmel win ițseddiqen s lfeṛḥ .
47009008	Sidi Ṛebbi yesɛa tazmert a kkun id yeṛzeq s lbaṛakat n mkul ṣṣenf , ur kkun-ițxaṣṣa wacemma deg wayen akk teḥwaǧem yerna aț-țesɛum s zzyada iwakken aț-țizmirem aț-țseddqem .
47009009	Axaṭer yura di tira iqedsen : Yețțak-ed lbaṛakat-is mbla cceḥḥa , irẓeq-ed imeɣban , ṛ ṛeḥma-ines tețdumu i dayem .
47009010	Win i d-yețțaken i ufellaḥ zzerriɛa akk-d weɣṛum ara yečč , a wen-d-ye ula i kunwi s lketṛa yerna ad issefti lbaṛakat n wayen tețseddiqem .
47009011	Sidi Ṛebbi ad issefti leṛzaq-nwen , s wakka aț-țizmirem aț-țseddqem mbla cceḥḥa ; imiren aṭas ara iḥemden Sidi Ṛebbi a t-cekkṛen ɣef wayen i sen-tseddqem .
47009012	Axaṭer ssadaqa-agi , ur tețțili ara kan d lemɛawna i watmaten , lameɛna iwakken a d-ilin daɣen waṭas n yemdanen ara iḥemden Sidi Ṛebbi .
47009013	Imi i d-tbeggnem belli tqeddcem ɣef lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ yerna tfeṛṛqem ayen akk tesɛam akk-d watmaten nniḍen , țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi țcekkiṛen-t ɣef liman d ṭṭaɛa nwen .
47009014	Deɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen ɣef ddemma n ṛṛeḥma tameqqrant i wen-ițțunefken s ɣuṛ-es , axaṭer ḥemmlen-kkun .
47009015	Ad ițțubarek Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef ṛṛeḥma-ines ur nesɛi lemtel !
47010001	Nekk Bulus i ɣef qqaṛen țsetḥiɣ m'ara iliɣ zdat-wen meɛna m'ara beɛdeɣ fell-awen weɛṛeɣ ɣuṛ-wen , bɣiɣ a kkun-nhuɣ s leḥnana d ṛṛeḥma n Lmasiḥ .
47010002	Di leɛnaya-nwen , ur iyi-ḥeṛṛset ara ad iwɛiṛeɣ m'ara iliɣ yid-wen ! Axaṭer lewɛaṛa-inu a ț-id-sbeggneɣ s lețkal yerna mbla lḥecma ɣer wid i ɣ-iḥesben nțeddu s lɛeqliya n ddunit .
47010003	? - țideț d imdanen i nella , lameɛna ur nețnaɣ ara s leslaḥ s wayes țnaɣen yemdanen ;
47010004	axaṭer leslaḥ-nneɣ , mačči d wid i ssexdamen yemdanen lameɛna nețnaɣ s leslaḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi i gzemren ad hudden ula d leswaṛ iǧehden .
47010005	Nețṛuẓu awal n kra n wid yebɣan a d-kken sennig n tmusni n Sidi Ṛebbi ; nebɣa a nessiweḍ imdanen meṛṛa ad beddlen ixemmimen-nsen iwakken ad ḍuɛen Lmasiḥ .
47010006	Asm'ara tessawḍem ṭṭaɛa-nwen ɣer lekmal-is , imiren a nɛaqeb kra n win iɛuṣan Sidi Ṛebbi .
47010007	Walit tideț akken ilaq lḥal : ma yella win itḥeqqeqen belli d ayla n Lmasiḥ i gella , ilaq ad iẓer belli akken yella nețța d ayla n Lmasiḥ i nella ula d nukni .
47010008	? as ma zuxxeɣ s tissas i yi-d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi , ur ssetḥaɣ ara axaṭer tissas-agi ur sseɣlayent ara , lameɛna ad ssemɣuṛent tijmuyaɛ n watmaten di liman .
47010009	Ur bɣiɣ ara aț-țɣilem belli bɣiɣ a kkun-sxelɛeɣ s tebṛatin-iw .
47010010	Axaṭer llan wid yeqqaṛen : tibṛatin n Bulus qeṛṛḥent , sɛant tissas lameɛna m'ara yili gar-aneɣ ur yesɛi lhiba ur yesɛi tissas di lehduṛ-is .
47010011	Win i d-yennan annect-a , ilaq ad iẓer belli akken newɛeṛ m'ara wen naru tibṛatin ara newɛeṛ daɣen m'ara nili gar-awen .
47010012	Ur nezmir ara a nesseɛdel neɣ a nmettel iman-nneɣ ɣer wid yețcekkiṛen iman-nsen . ? mettilen iman-nsen ɣer yiman-nsen , ḥesben ulac win yellan sennig-nsen ; xuṣṣen di lefhama .
47010013	Nukni , ur netzuxxu ara sennig wayen ilaqen , lameɛna nețzuxxu kan s ccɣel i ɣ-d-iwekkel Sidi Ṛebbi ; d ccɣel-agi i ɣ-issawḍen armi d ɣuṛ wen .
47010014	Asmi i d-nusa ɣuṛ-wen , ur nɛedda ara tilas n ccɣel-nneɣ axaṭer d nukni i wen-ibeccṛen d imezwura lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ .
47010015	Ur nețzuxxu ara sennig wayen ilaqen , ur nețțawi ara ccan n lxedma n wiyaḍ lameɛna nessaram d kunwi ara yessimɣuṛen ccan n lxedma-nneɣ m'ara timɣuṛem di liman ;
47010016	iwakken mbla ma nɛedda i tlisa n ccɣel-nneɣ , a nbecceṛ daɣen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i tmura nniḍen , mačči d zzux ara nzuxx s ccɣel i xedmen wiyaḍ . Yura di tira iqedsen :
47010017	Win yebɣan ad izuxx , ad izuxx s wayen ixeddem Sidi Ṛebbi .
47010018	Axaṭer mačči d win yețzuxxun s yiman-is i gețwaqeblen lameɛna d win yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
47011001	Ah ! A lukan aț-țqeblem kra n timmuhbelt si lǧiha-w ! Lameɛna qeblet-eț kan !
47011002	Imi i kkun-ḥemmleɣ , țțasmeɣ fell-awen s tismin i d-yekkan s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ; axaṭer xeḍbeɣ-kkun i yiwen n yesli kan : d Lmasiḥ ; iwakken a kkun-qeddmeɣ ɣuṛ-es am tlemẓit leɛmeṛ nezwiǧ leɛmeṛ .
47011003	Uggadeɣ a wen-sxeṛben ixemmimen nwen , aț-țettixṛem i neyya d ṣṣfa n wul-nwen di Lmasiḥ , aț-țedṛu yid-wen am ? ewwa i gexdeɛ wezrem s tḥila-ines .
47011004	Amek armi tḥessem i wid i wen-ibeccṛen Ɛisa nniḍen ur nelli d win akken i wen-nbecceṛ nukni ; amek tqeblem ṛṛuḥ iqedsen nniḍen ur nelli ara d win s wayes i tesṭerḥbem di tazwara neɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ nniḍen ixulfen win akken i wen-nbecceṛ ?
47011005	Akken walaɣ , ṛṛusul-nni i tḥesbem d imeqqranen ur iyi-yifen deg wacemma .
47011006	? as akken ur ssineɣ ara ad mmeslayeɣ , lameɛna ssneɣ Sidi Ṛebbi akken ilaq yerna nbeggen awen-t-id acḥal n tikkal di mkul lḥaǧa !
47011007	Asmi i wen-beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ , eɛni ḍelmeɣ mi ssanzeɣ iman-iw iwakken a kkun ssaɛliɣ kunwi ?
47011008	Ɛerraɣ tijmuyaɛ nniḍen imi i yi-d-țceggiɛen idrimen iwakken ad qedceɣ fell-awen .
47011009	Asmi lliɣ ɣuṛ-wen , ɣas akken xuṣṣeɣ ur lliɣ ț-țaɛkumt ɣef yiwen , axaṭer atmaten i d-yusan si tmurt n Masidunya fkan-iyi-d ayen akk i ḥwaǧeɣ . Di yal lḥaǧa , ḥudreɣ iman-iw iwakken ur țțiliɣ ara ț-țaɛekkumt fell-awen , yerna mazal ad ḥadreɣ iman-iw .
47011010	S tideț n Lmasiḥ yellan deg-i , a d-iniɣ : yiwen ur iyi-tekkes sebba agi n zzux i sɛiɣ di tmura n Akaya .
47011011	Acuɣeṛ ? Eɛni ur teɛzizem ara fell-i ? Atan Sidi Ṛebbi yezṛa !
47011012	Ayen akka xeddmeɣ , mazal a t-xedmeɣ iwakken ur sen-țaǧǧaɣ ara abrid i wid yebɣan ad zuxxen belli xeddmen am nukni .
47011013	Imdanen-agi , d ṛṛusul n lekdeb , d ixeddaɛen , țțaran iman-nsen d imceggɛen n Lmasiḥ .
47011014	Annect-a mačči d ayen issewhamen , imi ula d Cciṭan yezmer ad yerr iman-is d lmelk yețfeǧǧiǧen am tafat .
47011015	Ihi daɣen , mačči d ayen yessewhamen ma yella iqeddacen-is țțaran iman-nsen d iqeddacen n webrid n lḥeqq ; lameɛna taggara-nsen aț-țili akken llan lecɣal nsen .
47011016	A t-id-ɛiwdeɣ , ɣuṛ-wat a yi tḥesbem d amehbul ; neɣ qeblet-iyi am akken d amehbul iwakken ula d nekk ad zuxxeɣ cwiṭ .
47011017	Ayen akka ara d-iniɣ , mačči s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-yekka lameɛna a d-hedṛeɣ s timmuhbelt , yerna țekleɣ axaṭer sɛiɣ ayen s wayes ara zuxxeɣ .
47011018	Imi aṭas i gețzuxxun s lɛeqliya n ddunit-agi , ula d nekk ad zuxxeɣ .
47011019	Axaṭer tṣebṛem i yimehbal kunwi yesɛan leɛqel !
47011020	? as akken ḥesben-kkun am aklan , ččan lḥeqq-nwen , ɛerran-kkun , bbehdlen-kkun , ḥeqṛen-kkun , meɛna tṣebṛem-asen .
47011021	Ssetḥaɣ a t-id-iniɣ meɛna a t-id iniɣ : nukni ur nezmir ara a nexdem akka , meɛna s timmuhbelt zemreɣ a d-iniɣ : ma yella win yesɛan sebba s wayes ara izuxx , ula d nekk ad zuxxeɣ :
47011022	d iɛebṛaniyen i llan ? Ula d nekk d aɛibṛani ; seg wat Isṛail i llan ? Ula d nekk n wat Isṛail ; ț-țarwa n Sidna Ibṛahim ? Ula d nekk si tarwa-s ;
47011023	d iqeddacen n Lmasiḥ i llan ? ? ef wannect-agi daɣen a d hedṛeɣ am umdan yeffeɣ leɛqel : nekk ugareɣ-ten s waṭas , xedmeɣ akteṛ-nsen , kecmeɣ leḥbus acḥal n tikkal , țewwteɣ akteṛ-nsen , acḥal d abrid i wwḍeɣ ɣer lmut !
47011024	Xemsa yiberdan i ččiɣ tiyita s ɣuṛ wudayen ; mkul tikkelt s ṛebɛin tiyita ɣiṛ yiwet ;
47011025	tlata iberdan i yi-wten iṛumaniyen s ujelkaḍ ; yiwen webrid qṛib i yi-nɣan s weṛjam ; ɣeṛqeɣ tlata iberdan di lebḥeṛ , sɛeddaɣ yiwen wass d yiwen yiḍ deg waman .
47011026	Mmugreɣ-ed acḥal n wuguren m'ara tsafaṛeɣ : isaffen iweɛṛen , imakaren deg iberdan , lxuf di temdinin , deg imukan yexlan , m'ara zegreɣ i lebḥuṛ ; lxuf ger wat n tmurt-iw akk-d wid ur numin ara s Ṛebbi , lxuf ger watmaten n lekdeb .
47011027	Xedmeɣ yerna nneɛtabeɣ aṭas , acḥal d abrid țțuẓumeɣ , zgiɣ deg uɛawez , di laẓ akk-d fad , deg usemmiḍ akk-d ɛerru .
47011028	Mbla ma nniɣ-ed ayen nniḍen : aḥebbeṛ yal ass ɣef tejmuyaɛ n watmaten ,
47011029	anwa i gfeclen di liman ur iyi-issefcel ara ? Anwa i geɣlin di ddnub ur tecɛil deg-i tmes ?
47011030	Ma ilaq ad zuxxeɣ , ad zuxxeɣ s wayen i d-ițbegginen belli ur sɛiɣ ara tazmert .
47011031	Sidi Ṛebbi yellan d baba-s n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , yețțubarken i dayem , yeẓra belli ur skiddibeɣ ara !
47011032	Di temdint n Dimecq , ameqqran n ineɣlafen n ugellid Ariṭas yesbedd taɛessast ɣef tewwurt n temdint iwakken a yi-ṭṭfen ,
47011033	lameɛna ṣubben iyi-d si ṭṭaq , zdaxel uḍellaɛ , lḥiḍ lḥiḍ ; s wakka i d-menɛeɣ seg ifassen-is .
47012001	Eɛni ilaq ad zuxxeɣ ? Ayagi ur infiɛ ara ! Lameɛna a d-ḥkuɣ ɣef kra n leḥwayeǧ i yi-d-iweḥḥa Sidi Ṛebbi .
47012002	Ssneɣ yiwen wergaz yumnen s Lmasiḥ , yețwarfed alamma d igenni wis tlata ṛbeɛṭac iseggasen aya ; ur ẓriɣ ma yella yețwarfed nețța s yiman is neɣ d aweḥḥi kan i s-d-ițțuweḥḥa , anagar Sidi Ṛebbi i geẓran .
47012003	? riɣ belli argaz-agi yețwarfed ɣer lǧennet , meɛna ur ẓriɣ ma yella yețwarfed nețța s yiman-is neɣ d aweḥḥi kan i s-d-ițțuweḥḥa , anagar Sidi Ṛebbi i geẓran ; yesla i yimeslayen iwumi ur yezmir yiwen a ten-id-yini , axaṭer ur ilaq i wemdan a ten-id-iɛawed .
47012004	
47012005	Argaz am wagi zemreɣ ad zuxxeɣ yis , ma d nekk ur sɛiɣ ara s wayes ara zuxxeɣ anagar s lqella n lǧehd-iw .
47012006	Lemmer bɣiɣ ad zuxxeɣ , ur țțiliɣ ara d amehbul axaṭer anagar tideț ara d-iniɣ ; lameɛna ad ssusmeɣ , imi ur bɣiɣ ara imdanen a yi-ssalin ccan sennig n wayen țwalin xeddmeɣ-t neɣ ayen sellen qqaṛeɣ t-id .
47012007	Yenta-yi yiwen usennan s wayes i yi-țmeḥḥin Cciṭan iwakken ur ssimɣuṛeɣ ara iman-iw yerna ur țzuxxuɣ ara s uweḥḥi-nni yesteɛǧiben i yi-d-ibeggen Sidi Ṛebbi .
47012008	Tlata iberdan i dɛiɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ad issebɛed fell-i lmeḥna-agi ,
47012009	lameɛna yenna-yi-d : « steqneɛ kan s ṛṛeḥma-inu , axaṭer m'ara tfecleḍ imiren i d-tețban deg-k tezmert-iw » . Ihi bɣiɣ ad zuxxeɣ axiṛ s lqella n tezmert-iw iwakken tazmert n Lmasiḥ aț-țezdeɣ deg-i .
47012010	? ef wannect-agi , feṛḥeɣ m'ara fecleɣ , m'ara iliɣ di lḥeṛs , di leqheṛ , di leḥzen , di ceddat neɣ m'ara yi-regmen ɣef ddemma n Lmasiḥ , axaṭer m'ara fecleɣ imiren i ǧehdeɣ .
47012011	D kunwi i yi-ḥeṛsen armi heddṛeɣ am umehbul ; d kunwi i glaqen a yi-tcekkṛem , axaṭer ɣas akken ur swiɣ acemma , ur iyi-ifen deg wacemma wid iḥețțben iman-nsen d ṛṛusul .
47012012	Ayen akk i d-ițbegginen belli d ṛṛasul i lliɣ , yedṛa-d gar-awen : s ṣṣbeṛ ameqqran , s tezmert , s beṛhanat d licaṛat .
47012013	D acu i xedmeɣ i tejmuyaɛ nniḍen ur wen-t-xdimeɣ ara i kunwi , anagar imi ugiɣ ad iliɣ ț-țaɛkumt fell-awen ? Semmḥet-iyi ɣef wannect agi !
47012014	Aql-iyi țedduɣ a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ wen tikkelt tis tlata , yerna ur țțiliɣ ara ț-țaɛekkumt fell-awen . Mačči d idrimen-nwen i bɣiɣ lameɛna d kunwi ; axaṭer mačči d dderya i glaqen ad jemɛen i lwaldin-nsen , lameɛna d lwaldin i glaq ad jemɛen i dderya-nsen .
47012015	Ma d nekkini , zemreɣ ad ṣeṛṛfeɣ fell-awen seg ul ayen sɛiɣ , ad rnuɣ ad sebbleɣ ula ț-țudert-iw ɣef ddemma-nwen . Eɛni leḥmala-nwen ɣuṛ-i aț-țenqes imi i kkun-ḥemmleɣ aṭas ?
47012016	? - țideț ur a wen-lliɣ ara ț țaɛekkumt , lameɛna kra deg-wen qqaṛen , imi ḥeṛceɣ , ṭṭfeɣ-kkun s tḥila !
47012017	Eɛni kellxeɣ-awen mi wen-ceggɛeɣ kra seg watmaten ?
47012018	Asmi ḥelleleɣ Tit a n-yas ɣuṛ-wen akk-d gma-tneɣ nniḍen , yella wayen i d-istenfeɛ seg-wen Titus ? Eɛni ur neddi ara nekk yid-es s yiwet n lɛeqliya akk d yiwet n tikli ?
47012019	Acḥal aya kunwi tɣilem nețnadi amek ara ndafeɛ ɣef yiman-nneɣ zdat-nwen . Lameɛna zdat Sidi Ṛebbi , nukni nheddeṛ-awen-d s lebɣi n Lmasiḥ . Annect-agi meṛṛa a wid eɛzizen fell-aɣ , nxeddem-it iwakken aț-țennernim di liman .
47012020	Axaṭer uggadeɣ m'ara n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen , ur kkun-țțafeɣ ara akken bɣiɣ , kunwi daɣen ur iyi-tețțafem ara akken tenwam ; uggadeɣ a n-afeɣ gar-awen amennuɣ , tismin , zzɛaf , amḥezwer , zzux , ccwal , aqeṛṛeḍ , wid yekkaten deg wiyaḍ .
47012021	Uggadeɣ m'ara n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen , ad ssetḥiɣ yis-wen zdat Sidi Ṛebbi ; uggadeɣ ad țruɣ ɣef waṭas deg-wen iɛacen zik-nni di ddnub yerna ar ass-a ur tuben , ur rrin aḍar ɣef lefsed-nsen , ɣef yir tikli-nsen akk-d ticmatin i xeddmen .
47013001	Atan a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen tikkelt tis tlata , mkul talu aț-țefru s sin neɣ tlata inigan akken yura di tira iqedsen .
47013002	Asmi i n-usiɣ ɣuṛ-wen tikkelt tis snat nniɣ-awen-t-id , tura daɣen ɣas ur lliɣ ara yid-wen , a t-id-ɛiwdeɣ ama i wid-nni yeɣlin di ddnub deg wayen iɛeddan , ama i wiyaḍ : asm'ara n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen ur țqileɣ ula d yiwen ,
47013003	imi tebɣam aț-țetḥeqqeqem belli d Lmasiḥ i d-iheddṛen seg-i ; nețța ur nelli ara d win ifeclen ɣuṛ-wen lameɛna isbeggen-ed tazmert-is gar awen .
47013004	? - țideț yețwaṣleb ɣef ddemma n wefcal-ines , lameɛna yedder s tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi ; ula d nukni nefcel imi nella di Lmasiḥ lameɛna a nidir yid-es s tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi di leqdic-nneɣ gar-awen .
47013005	Jeṛṛbet tmeyyzem deg iman-nwen iwakken aț-țwalim ma tețțeddum s liman neɣ ala ; eɛni ur teɛqilem ara belli Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yella deg-wen ? Neɣ ahat tfeclem mi tețțujeṛbem ?
47013006	Lameɛna ssarameɣ aț-țestɛeṛfem belli nukni nbeggen-ed liman-nneɣ di teswiɛt n ujeṛṛeb !
47013007	Ndeɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ur txeddmem ara cceṛ , mačči iwakken a d-nbeggen belli nesɛa lḥeqq , lameɛna nebɣa kan aț-țxedmem lxiṛ , ɣas ma nban-ed belli nefcel deg ujeṛṛeb .
47013008	Axaṭer ur nesɛi ara tazmert iwakken a nxalef tideț , lameɛna nesɛa kan tazmert s wayes ara neqdec ɣef tideț .
47013009	Nfeṛṛeḥ s wefcal-nneɣ ma yella kunwi tǧehdem ; m'ara ndeɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen , nessaram aț-țennernim di liman .
47013010	Atah iwacu i wen-țaruɣ akkagi m'ara beɛdeɣ fell-awen , iwakken asm'ara iliɣ gar-awen , ur țiwɛiṛeɣ ara ɣuṛ-wen s tezmert i yi-d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi , iwakken a kkun-sǧehdeɣ mačči iwakken a kkun-sseɣliɣ .
47013011	Tura ay atmaten ilit di lfeṛḥ , ssimɣuṛet liman-nwen , nadit amek ara tawḍem ɣer lekmal , mseǧhadet wway gar-awen , msefhamet , ɛicet di lehna , imiren Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n talwit akk-d leḥmala ad yili yid-wen .
47013012	? emsalamet wway gar-awen s sslam n tegmaț . Atmaten meṛṛa țsellimen fell-awen .
47013013	
47013014	Ṛṛeḥma n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , leḥmala n Sidi Ṛebbi ț-țdukli i d-ițțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ad ilin yid-wen meṛṛa !
48001001	Nekk Bulus , yellan d ṛṛasul , mačči s ufus neɣ s lebɣi n yemdanen , lameɛna s lebɣi n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d Baba Ṛebbi i t-id isseḥyan si ger lmegtin .
48001002	Uriɣ tabṛaț-agi nekk d watmaten meṛṛa yellan yid-i , i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten n tmurt n Galasya :
48001003	ṛṛeḥma d lehna a wen-d-țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi akk-d Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
48001004	Lmasiḥ isebbel iman-is ɣef ddnubat-nneɣ , iwakken a ɣ-isellek si yir lǧil-agi , s lebɣi n Baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi .
48001005	I nețța tamanegt si lǧil ɣer lǧil ! Amin !
48001006	Wehmeɣ imi twexxṛem s lemɣawla ɣef win i wen-d-issawlen s ṛṛeḥma n Lmasiḥ , iwakken aț-țḍefṛem lexbaṛ n lxiṛ nniḍen .
48001007	Ur wen-d-nniɣ ara akka am akken yella lexbaṛ n lxiṛ nniḍen , lameɛna qqaṛeɣ-awen-d akka , axaṭer llan kra lɣaci i kkun-icewwlen yerna bɣan ad sɛewjen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan Lmasiḥ .
48001008	? as a lukan d nukni , neɣ d lmelk ara d-yasen seg igenni a wen-d ibbecceṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yemxalafen ɣef win i wen-d-nbecceṛ si tazwara , atan ad yețwanɛel !
48001009	Nenna-yawen-t-id si zik , a s-d ɛiwdeɣ tura : yețwanɛel win ara wen-d ibeccṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yemxalafen ɣef win i tqeblem !
48001010	Ihi tura , eɛni d lemziya n yemdanen i țnadiɣ ? Xaṭi ! D lemziya n Sidi Ṛebbi i țnadiɣ . Neɣ eɛni țnadiɣ ad ɛeǧbeɣ i yemdanen ? Lemmer i mazal țnadiɣ ad ɛeǧbeɣ i yemdanen , tili ur țțilliɣ ara d aqeddac n Lmasiḥ .
48001011	A wen-d-iniɣ ay atmaten belli lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ i wen-d-beccṛeɣ mačči s ɣuṛ wemdan i d-yekka ;
48001012	axaṭer , nekk s yiman-iw mačči d amdan i yi-t-id-issawḍen neɣ i yi t-islemden , lameɛna d Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i yi-t-id-iweḥḥan .
48001013	Teslam ɣef tikli-inu n zik asmi lliɣ ttabaɛeɣ ddin n wat Isṛail ; teslam amek i qehṛeɣ tajmaɛt n imasiḥiyen d wamek bɣiɣ a ten-snegreɣ .
48001014	Asmi lliɣ ḍefṛeɣ ddin d leɛwayed n wat Isṛail , ifeɣ akk tizyiwin-iw akk-d wid n laṣel-iw , axaṭer ṭṭfeɣ di leɛwayed n lejdud-iw akken ilaq .
48001015	Lameɛna s ṛṛeḥma-s , Sidi Ṛebbi ixtaṛ-iyi-d uqbel a d-laleɣ yerna yessawel-iyi-d iwakken ad qedceɣ fell-as .
48001016	Asmi i yi-d-ibeggen Sidi Ṛebbi Mmi-s iwakken ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i t-iɛnan ger wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail , ur cawṛeɣ ula d yiwen ;
48001017	yerna ur uliɣ ara ɣer temdint Lquds ɣer wid yellan d ṛṛusul uqbel-iw , lameɛna ṛuḥeɣ ɣer tmurt n waɛṛaben ; syenna uɣaleɣ-ed daɣen ɣer temdint n Dimacq .
48001018	Mi ɛeddan tlata iseggasen , uliɣ ɣer temdint Lquds iwakken ad issineɣ Buṭrus , qqimeɣ ɣuṛ-es xemseṭṭac wussan .
48001019	Lameɛna ur ẓriɣ ula d yiwen nniḍen si ṛṛusul , anagar Yeɛqub , gma-s n Ssid-nneɣ .
48001020	Ayen i wen-d-uriɣ akka ț-țideț , zdat Ṛebbi ur skiddibeɣ ara .
48001021	Syenna , ṛuḥeɣ ɣer tmura n Surya d Silisya ;
48001022	kra wayen kkiɣ dinna , imasiḥiyen n tejmuyaɛ n tmurt n Yahuda leɛmeṛ ẓrin udem-iw .
48001023	Slan kan qqaṛen fell-i : win akken yellan ițqehhiṛ deg-nneɣ , atan tura ițbecciṛ liman i gebɣa zik-nni a t-issenger .
48001024	Dɣa țḥemmiden Ṛebbi ɣef ddemma-w .
48002001	Mi ɛeddan ṛbeɛṭac iseggasen , ɛawdeɣ uliɣ ɣer temdint n Lquds akk-d Barnabas , wwiɣ daɣen yid-i gma-tneɣ Tit .
48002002	Uliɣ , axaṭer d Sidi Ṛebbi i yi-t-id yumṛen deg uweḥḥi . Sfehmeɣ-asen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i țbecciṛeɣ ger wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail ; mliɣ-asen-t weḥḥed-sen i yimeqqranen n tejmaɛt iwakken ayen xedmeɣ armi d ass-a ur ițṛuḥ ara baṭel .
48002003	Tit , aṛfiq-iw yellan d ayunani , yiwen ur iḥettem fell-as ad iḍheṛ ,
48002004	ɣas akken llan yir watmaten i d-ikecmen gar-aneɣ s tuffra , bɣan a t-ḥeṛsen ad iḍheṛ . Kecmen-d gar-aneɣ iwakken ad walin tilelli i nesɛa di tikli-nneɣ akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , bɣan a ɣ-rren d aklan-nsen .
48002005	Ula d yiwet n tikkelt ur nekni zdat-sen , iwakken tideț yellan di lexbaṛ n lxiṛ aț-țeqqim gar-awen .
48002006	Ma d wid yesɛan lqima gar-awen , [ ur iyi-tewqiɛ ara lmeɛna d acu i llan zik , axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ur ixeddem ara lxilaf ger yemdanen ] ; wid-nni yesɛan lqima ur ḥețțmen ara fell-i ad xedmeɣ ayen nniḍen .
48002007	Lameɛna walan belli Sidi Ṛebbi iwekkel-iyi iwakken ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail , am akken i gceggeɛ Buṭrus ad ibecceṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wat Isṛail .
48002008	Axaṭer , Sidi Ṛebbi i gerran Buṭrus d ṛṛasul n wid yellan n wat Isṛail , yerra-yi ula d nekk d ṛṛasul n wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail .
48002009	Yeɛqub , Buṭrus akk-d Yuḥenna yețwaḥesben d imeqqranen n tejmaɛt , setɛeṛfen belli d Sidi Ṛebbi i yi-d ifkan ccɣel-agi , dɣa selmen fell-aneɣ afus deg ufus iwakken a ɣ-d-beggnen belli qeblen ayagi . Imiren nemsefham : nutni ad ṛuḥen ad beccṛen i wat Isṛail , ma d nekk akk-d Barnabas , a nṛuḥ a nbecceṛ i wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail ;
48002010	acu kan , weṣṣan-aɣ iwakken ur ntețțu ara igellilen n tejmuyaɛ-nsen yellan di temdint n Lquds , ayagi ur stehzaɣ ara deg-s , xedmeɣ-t seg-wul .
48002011	Asmi i d-yusa Buṭrus ɣer temdint n Antyuc , qubleɣ-t ɣer wudem-is zdat lɣaci , axaṭer yeɣleḍ .
48002012	Uqbel a d-asen kra n yemdanen i d-iceggeɛ Yeɛqub , yella itețț akk-d watmaten ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail , lameɛna akken kan i d-wwḍen , iḥbes lmakla yid-sen iwexxeṛ fell-asen , axaṭer yuggad wid iṭṭfen di lɛaddat n wat Isṛail .
48002013	Atmaten nniḍen n wat Isṛail xedmen am nețța , wexxṛen ula d nutni , yuɣal armi ula d Barnabas iɛuned-iten .
48002014	Mi walaɣ ur teddun ara akken ilaq am akken i d-yeqqaṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , nniɣ i Buṭrus zdat lɣaci meṛṛa : ma yella kečč yellan seg wat Isṛail tețɛiceḍ am wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail , amek ara tḥeṛṣeḍ wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail ad ɛicen am wat Isṛail ?
48002015	Nukni ur nelli ara d imednuben am leǧnas nniḍen , laṣel-nneɣ seg wat Isṛail .
48002016	Lameɛna neẓra belli amdan yețțuɣal d aḥeqqi zdat Sidi Ṛebbi s liman-ines di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , mačči imi gxeddem ayen i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa ; daymi ula d nukni numen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , iwakken a nuɣal d iḥeqqiyen zdat Sidi Ṛebbi s liman di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , mačči imi nxeddem ayen i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa n Musa . Axaṭer ula d yiwen ur izmir ad yuɣal d aḥeqqi zdat Ṛebbi imi i gettabaɛ ccariɛa n Musa .
48002017	Nukni nețnadi a nuɣal d iḥeqqiyen s liman di Lmasiḥ ; ma nufa iman-nneɣ d imednuben ula d nukni am leǧnas nniḍen , eɛni d Lmasiḥ i ɣ-ițțawin ɣer ddnub ? Xaṭi !
48002018	Axaṭer ma uɣaleɣ ɣer ccariɛa nni i ǧǧiɣ , ihi rriɣ iman-iw d amɛaṣi ;
48002019	ɣef wayen yeɛnan ccariɛa aql-iyi mmuteɣ , yerna d nețțat i yi-wwin ɣer lmut ; ayagi yedṛa-d iwakken ad sɛuɣ tudert di Sidi Ṛebbi ; aql-iyi țwasemmṛeɣ ɣef wumidag akk-d Lmasiḥ .
48002020	Tura mačči d nekk i gețțidiren , d Lmasiḥ i gețțidiren deg-i ; axaṭer tudert-iw di ddunit , țɛiceɣ-ț s liman di Mmi-s n Sidi Ṛebbi i yi-ḥemmlen yerna isebbel iman-is fell-i .
48002021	Ur sseɣlayeɣ ara lqima n ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi , axaṭer ma nezmer a nuɣal d iḥeqqiyen zdat Ṛebbi s ccariɛa n Musa , ihi Lmasiḥ yemmut ɣef wulac !
48003001	Ay at Galasya ur nessin leṣlaḥ nsen ! Anwa i kkun-iseḥḥren kunwi iwumi i d-nessefhem akken ilaq lmut n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ɣef wumidag ?
48003002	? ef wayagi kan i bɣiɣ a kkun steqsiɣ : amek i wen-d-ițțune Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , imi i txeddmem ayen i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa neɣ imi teslam yerna tumnem s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ ?
48003003	Eɛni ixuṣṣ-ikkun leɛqel ? Amek , di tazwara tețțeklem ɣef Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , tura tebɣam aț-țețțeklem ɣef yiman-nwen ?
48003004	Eɛni ayen akk i tenɛețțabem iṛuḥ baṭel ? Ur ḥsiɣ ara iṛuḥ baṭel !
48003005	Win i wen-d-ifkan Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , ixeddmen lbeṛhanat gar-awen , eɛni ixeddem-iten imi i tettabaɛem ccariɛa neɣ imi tumnem s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ iwumi teslam ?
48003006	Akken yura : Ibṛahim yumen s Ṛebbi , yețkel fell-as , daymi i t-iḥseb Sidi Ṛebbi d aḥeqqi .
48003007	Ilaq aț-țfehmem ihi , wid iteddun s liman , d nutni i d arraw n tideț n Sidna Ibṛahim .
48003008	Si zik i d-ixebbeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi di tira iqedsen belli ad yerr leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail d iḥeqqiyen ɣef ddemma n liman nsen , mi genna i Sidna Ibṛahim lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ : Leǧnas meṛṛa n ddunit ad țțubarken yis-ek ;
48003009	ihi kra n win yumnen s Ṛebbi akken yumen yis Ibṛahim , ad ițțubarek am nețța .
48003010	Axaṭer wid yettabaɛen ccariɛa iwakken ad țwaqeblen ɣer Ṛebbi , deɛwessu tezga fell-asen imi yura : ad ițwanɛel kra n win yettabaɛen ccariɛa , ur nxeddem ara ayen akk yuran deg-s .
48003011	Ula d yiwen ur izmir ad yuɣal d aḥeqqi zdat Ṛebbi s ccariɛa , ayagi d ayen ibanen imi yura : Aḥeqqi ad yidir s liman .
48003012	Abrid n ccariɛa d webrid n liman mxalafen , imi yura : d win ara ixedmen ayen akk i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa ara yesɛun tudert n dayem .
48003013	Lmasiḥ icufeɛ-aɣ-d si deɛwessu n ccariɛa , d nețța i gețwaneɛlen deg umkan-nneɣ ; axaṭer yura : ițwanɛel kra n win ițwaɛelqen ɣer ttejṛa .
48003014	Ayagi yedṛa-d iwakken s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail ad weṛten lbaṛaka i gefka Sidi Ṛebbi i Ibṛahim ; s liman ara ɣ-d ițțune Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i ɣ-iwɛed Sidi Ṛebbi .
48003015	Ay atmaten , a wen-d-fkeɣ lemtel yellan di lɛaddat-nneɣ : m'ara yexdem yiwen leɛqed akken ilaq , yiwen ur izmir a t-inkeṛ neɣ a s-yernu kra .
48003016	Ihi , Sidi Ṛebbi yefka lemɛahda i Ibṛahim akk-d win ara d-ilalen seg-s , ( ur d-yenni ara : i wid ara d-ilalen seg-s am akken aṭas i gellan ) . Di tira iqedsen yura : i win ara d-ilalen seg-k ; win i ɣef yura wayagi , d Lmasiḥ .
48003017	Atah wayen bɣiɣ a d-iniɣ : di tazwara Sidi Ṛebbi yesbedd leɛqed akken ilaq , ccariɛa i d-yusan ṛebɛa meyya utlatin iseggasen deffir-es , ur tezmir ara aț-țemḥu leɛqed-agi , neɣ m'ulac aț-țeɣli lqima n lemɛahda n Sidi Ṛebbi .
48003018	Lemmer si ccariɛa ara newṛet leslak , acuɣeṛ lemɛahda ? Axaṭer s lemɛahda-agi i d-ibeggen Sidi Ṛebbi ṛṛeḥma-s i Ibṛahim .
48003019	Acuɣeṛ ihi i d-tețțune ccariɛa ? Tețțunefk-ed iwakken a d-tesbeggen belli nɛuṣa lumuṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi , alamma yusa-d win akken ara d ilalen si dderya n Ibṛahim iwumi d tețțune lemɛahda . D lmalayekkat i d-yewwin ccariɛa ɣer ufus n Sidna Musa iwakken a ț-id-issiweḍ i yemdanen .
48003020	Sidi Ṛebbi iceggeɛ-ed amdan iwakken a d-yessiweḍ ccariɛa i wiyaḍ , meɛna ur iḥwaǧ ara amdan iwakken ad isbedd leɛqed yid-sen .
48003021	Eɛni ccariɛa txulef lemɛahdat n Sidi Ṛebbi ? Xaṭi ! Lemmer ccariɛa tezmer a d-te tudert i wemdan , tili yezmer wemdan ad yuɣal d aḥeqqi zdat Ṛebbi s ccariɛa .
48003022	Lameɛna tira iqedsen nnant-ed : ddunit meṛṛa tella seddaw tezmert n ddnub ; iwacu ? Iwakken lemɛahda n Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țețțune i yemdanen meṛṛa ɣef ddemma n liman-nsen di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
48003023	Uqbel a d-yas lweqt i deg ara namen s Lmasiḥ , nella seddaw leḥkum n ccariɛa , armi d ass i deg i d-yedheṛ webrid n liman .
48003024	S wakka , nețțuṛebba-d s ccariɛa armi d asmi d-yusa Lmasiḥ iwakken a ɣ-yerr d iḥeqqiyen zdat Ṛebbi s liman .
48003025	Tura yusa-d lweqt i deg ara namen s Lmasiḥ , ifuk fell-aneɣ leḥkum n ccariɛa .
48003026	Axaṭer tuɣalem akk d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi s liman di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
48003027	Kunwi akk yețwaɣeḍsen s yisem n Lmasiḥ , tețɛicim tudert tajḍiṭ yellan di Lmasiḥ .
48003028	Tura ulac lxilaf ger wat Isṛail d iyunaniyen , ger waklan d iḥeṛṛiyen , ger yergazen ț-țilawin , axaṭer kunwi akk tuɣalem d yiwen di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
48003029	Yerna ma tellam d ayla n Lmasiḥ , aql-ikkun si dderya n Ibṛahim , wid ara iweṛten akken i t-id-iwɛed Sidi Ṛebbi .
48004001	Atah wayen i bɣiɣ a t-id-iniɣ : qqaṛeɣ-awen skud win ara iweṛten mazal-it meẓẓi , ur yemxalaf ara nețța d win yellan d akli , ɣas akken d nețța ara yuɣalen d bab n kullec ;
48004002	lameɛna ilaq-as ad yaɣ awal i wid ițelhayen yid-es , iseddayen lecɣal-is , alamma yessaweḍ leɛmeṛ akken i d-iweṣṣa baba-s .
48004003	Akken daɣen ula d nukni asmi nella meẓẓiyit , nɛac seddaw leḥkum n leqwanen n ddunit ,
48004004	meɛna asmi i d-yewweḍ lweqt i ɣ-iweɛɛed Sidi Ṛebbi , iceggeɛ-ed Mmi-s i d-ilulen si tmeṭṭut , iɛac seddaw leḥkum n ccariɛa ,
48004005	iwakken a d-ifdu wid yellan seddaw leḥkum n ccariɛa , iwakken a nuɣal d arraw-is .
48004006	Tura imi nuɣal d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi , ifka-yaɣ-d ɣer wulawen-nneɣ Ṛṛuḥ n Mmi-s s wayes i nessawal i Ṛebbi : « Abba » ! Yeɛni : a Baba !
48004007	S wakka , ikkes fell-awen uzaglu n tkelwa , tuɣalem seg warraw-is ; ma tellam seg warraw-is , d kunwi ara iweṛten ayen i wen-iwɛed Sidi Ṛebbi s ṛṛeḥma-ines .
48004008	Zik-nni ur tessinem ara Ṛebbi yerna tețɛebbidem lemqamat d ssadaț deg umkan n Ṛebbi .
48004009	Lameɛna tura mi tessnem Ṛebbi , yerna nețța iḥseb ikkun d arraw-is , amek armi tebɣam aț-țuɣalem ɣer lɛaddat n zik ur nesɛi lmeɛna iwakken aț-țilim seddaw uzaglu-nsent ?
48004010	Tețțakem lqima i leɛyudat n kra wussan , kra wagguren , kra lewqat d kra yiseggasen !
48004011	Uggadeɣ ayen i nɛețțabeɣ akk fell-awen iṛuḥ baṭel .
48004012	Ay atmaten di leɛnaya-nwen , uɣalet am nekkini , imi ula d nekk lliɣ am kunwi . Ur iyi-texdimem acemma n diri .
48004013	Ur tecfim ara belli d lehlak i yi-ṭṭfen ɣuṛ-wen mi wen-beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ass amezwaru .
48004014	? as akken lehlak-iw yeɛfen , ur teɛyim deg-i , ur iyi-teḥqiṛem , lameɛna telham yis-i am akken d lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi neɣ d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ s yiman-is i lliɣ .
48004015	Anda-t lfeṛḥ-nni-nwen n zik ? Acu i gedṛan yid-wen ? Zemreɣ ad cehdeɣ fell-awen belli , lemmer d ayen iwumi tzemrem a t-txedmem , tili tekksem-d allen-nwen iwakken a yi-tent-id-tefkem .
48004016	Eɛni uɣaleɣ awen tura d aɛdaw imi i wen-d qqaṛeɣ tideț ?
48004017	Imdanen-agi țbegginen-awen-d belli ḥemmlen-kkun , lameɛna nutni ččuṛen ț-țiḥila ; bɣan kan a kkun sbeɛden fell-i iwakken a ten-tettebɛem nutni .
48004018	Yelha ma ixeddem yiwen lxiṛ , mačči kan m'ara iliɣ gar-awen lameɛna di mkul lweqt .
48004019	Ay arraw-iw , aql-i nɛețțabeɣ tura daɣen ɣef ddemma-nwen am tmeṭṭut yeṭṭfen addud , alamma iban-ed Lmasiḥ deg-wen .
48004020	Acḥal mennaɣ ad iliɣ gar-awen di teswiɛt-agi i wakken a wen-d mmeslayeɣ akken nniḍen , axaṭer aql-iyi tḥeyyṛeɣ ɣef ddemma-nwen .
48004021	Init-iyi-d , kunwi yebɣan aț-țilim seddaw leḥkum n ccariɛa , eɛni ur teslim ara i wayen i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa ?
48004022	Atah wayen i d-teqqaṛ : Sidna Ibṛahim yesɛa sin warraw-is , yiwen seg Haǧiṛa yellan ț-țaklit , wayeḍ seg Saṛa yellan ț-țaḥeṛṛit .
48004023	Lameɛna mmi-s n taklit-nni , ilul-ed s lebɣi n wemdan , ma d mmi-s n tḥeṛṛit-nni , ilul-ed ɣef ddemma n lemɛahda n Sidi Ṛebbi .
48004024	Taqsiṭ-agi tesɛa lmeɛna nniḍen : snat n tilawin-agi țusemmant d sin leɛqud : yiwen n leɛqed d win n wedrar n Sinay i d-ițaǧǧan aklan , yeɛni : d Haǧiṛa .
48004025	Haǧiṛa , d adrar n Sinay yellan di tmurt n waɛṛaben , tețmettil-ed tamdint n Lquds n tura , i gellan ț-țaklit s nețțat s warraw-is .
48004026	Lameɛna tamdint n Lquds yellan deg igenwan ț-țaḥeṛṛit , d nețțat i d yemma-tneɣ .
48004027	Axaṭer yura : Efṛeḥ kemm a tiɛiqeṛt ur nețțarew ara ! Ɛeggeḍ s lfeṛḥ kemm ur nessin lewjaɛ n tarrawt ! Axaṭer tameṭṭut yețwaḥeqṛen , aț-țes ɛu dderya akteṛ n tin yesɛan argaz-is .
48004028	Ma d kunwi ay atmaten , d arraw n lemɛahda i tellam am Isḥaq .
48004029	Zik-nni , win i d-ilulen s lebɣi n wemdan ițqehhiṛ win i d-ilulen s lebɣi n Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi , akka i gella lḥal ar ass-a .
48004030	Lameɛna d acu yuran di tira iqedsen ? Enfu taklit d mmi-s ; axaṭer mmi-s n taklit ur ilaq ara ad iwṛet akk-d mmi-s n tmeṭṭut taḥeṛṛit .
48004031	Akka ay atmaten , ur nelli ara d arraw n taklit lameɛna d arraw n tmeṭṭut taḥeṛṛit .
48005001	Ɛisa Lmasiḥ isellek-aɣ iwakken a nesɛu tilleli n tideț . Ihi ḥerzet tilelli-agi , ḥadret aț-țuɣalem d aklan !
48005002	? esset-iyi-d ! Nekk Bulus , nniɣ awen-d : ma yella tḍehṛem , Lmasiḥ ur kkun-infiɛ ara .
48005003	Yerna ad ɛawdeɣ a d-iniɣ i yal argaz i gḍehṛen , belli ilzem ad ixdem ayen akk i d-tenna ccariɛa .
48005004	Kunwi yețnadin aț-țuɣalem d iḥeqqiyen zdat Ṛebbi s ccariɛa , ur d-yeqqim wacemma gar-awen d Lmasiḥ , tețwaḥeṛmem si ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi .
48005005	Ma d nukni , nessaram a ɣ-yerr Sidi Ṛebbi d iḥeqqiyen zdat-es ; ayagi nețṛaǧu-t s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen akk-d liman .
48005006	Axaṭer , di tikli-nneɣ akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , neḍheṛ neɣ ur neḍhiṛ ara , ayagi ur yesɛi ara azal ; ayen yesɛan azal , d liman i d-țbegginen lecɣal i nxeddem s leḥmala .
48005007	Di tazwara tewwim abrid ilaqen , anwa i kkun-issufɣen i webrid n tideț ?
48005008	Ṛṛay-agi ur d-yekki ara s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i wen-d-issawlen .
48005009	Akken qqaṛen : « Ciṭṭuḥ n temtunt ( iɣes n temtunt ) yessalay akk arukti . »
48005010	Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ihedden ul-iw fell-awen , țekleɣ belli ur tețxemmimem ara akken nniḍen . Lameɛna win i kkun-icewwlen , akken ibɣu yili , a t-iɛaqeb Sidi Ṛebbi .
48005011	Lemmer mazal nehhuɣ ar tura ɣef ṭṭhaṛa , iwacu i yi-mazal țwaqehṛeɣ ? Tili lexbaṛ i nețbecciṛ ɣef Lmasiḥ ițwasemmṛen ɣef wumidag , ur yețțili d ugur ula i yiwen .
48005012	Wid-nni i kkun-icewwlen ɣef ṭṭhaṛa ad ṛuḥen ihi ad ɛegben iman-nsen .
48005013	Ay atmaten , Sidi Ṛebbi ifka yawen tilelli , ur d-țafet ara sebba s wayes ara txedmem s tlelli-agi lebɣi n tnefsit-nwen ; lameɛna beggnet-ed lmaḥibba yellan gar-awen .
48005014	Axaṭer lameṛ i gesdukklen meṛṛa ccariɛa d wagi : ḥemmel lɣiṛ-ik am yiman-ik .
48005015	Ma yella tețțemkerracem am lewḥuc yerna wa itețț wa , ḥadret iman-nwen neɣ m'ulac yiwen ad issenger wayeḍ .
48005016	Ddut ihi s lebɣi n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , iwakken ur txeddmem ara lebɣi n tnefsit-nwen .
48005017	Axaṭer lebɣi n tnefsit ixulef lebɣi n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , akken daɣen lebɣi n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ixulef lebɣi n tnefsit ; d iɛdawen wway gar-asen , daymi ur tezmirem ara aț-țxedmem akken tebɣam .
48005018	Lameɛna ma yella tleḥḥum s lebɣi n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , atan ihi ur tellim ara seddaw leḥkum n ccariɛa .
48005019	Axaṭer , lefɛayel n tnefsit țbanen : zzna , leḥṛam , lefsad ,
48005020	zzyaṛa n lemqamat , ssḥur , lkeṛh , ccwal , tismin , zzɛaf , wid yebɣan a d-kken sennig wiyaḍ , assexṛeb , wid ifeṛqen ț-țirebbaɛ ,
48005021	ṭṭmeɛ , ssekṛan , at iɛebbaḍ ur nesɛi lqaɛ d wayen akk ițemcabin ɣer wayagi meṛṛa . Ɛeggneɣ-awen-d am akken i wen-d-nniɣ yakan : wid i gxeddmen lecɣal-agi ur seɛɛun ara amkan di tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi .
48005022	Lameɛna atan wayen i d-itekken si Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen : leḥmala , lfeṛḥ , lehna , ṣṣbeṛ , lehhu , leḥnana , liman ,
48005023	ul yeṣfan , aɣlab n tnefsit ; eɛni ccariɛa tugi annect-agi ?
48005024	Wid yellan n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , semmṛen ɣef wumidag lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen , s ccehwat-is d umenni ines .
48005025	Imi d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i ɣ-d ifkan tudert , ilaq-aɣ ihi a neddu di lebɣi ines .
48005026	Ur ilaq a nessimɣuṛ iman nneɣ , ur ilaq a nețnaɣ neɣ a nețțemyasam wway-gar-aneɣ .
48006001	Ay atmaten , kunwi ileḥḥun s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , ma teṭṭfem yiwen yeɣleḍ , erret-ț-id ɣer webrid s leḥnana ; ḥadret ɣef yiman-nwen , axaṭer tzemrem aț-țeɣlim ula d kunwi deg ujeṛṛeb .
48006002	? emɛawanet deg unerfud n tɛekkmin nwen , s wakka ara tḍuɛem ayen i d-tenna ccariɛa n Lmasiḥ .
48006003	Ma yeḥseb yiwen iman-is yesɛa lqima nețța ur yeswi kra , ɣef yiman-is i gețkellix .
48006004	Ilaq mkul yiwen ad imeyyez tikli-ines , imiren ma yufa ayen s wayes ara izux , ad izux i yiman-is kan mačči alamma imettel iman-is ɣer wiyaḍ .
48006005	Axaṭer mkul yiwen ad yerfed taɛkumt-is weḥd-es .
48006006	Win iwumi sselmaden awal n Ṛebbi ilaq ad yeǧǧ amur deg wayen akk yesɛa i win i t-isselmaden .
48006007	? adret aț-țɣelṭem : yiwen ur yezmir ad istehzi ɣef Ṛebbi ; ayen yezreɛ wemdan , a t-id-imger .
48006008	Win yettabaɛen lebɣi n tnefsit-is , a t-tessiweḍ ɣer lmut ; ma d win iteddun s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ad isɛu tudert n dayem .
48006009	Ilaq a nxeddem lxiṛ mbla ɛeyyu ; axaṭer m'ur nefcil ara , a d-nemger m'ara d-yaweḍ lweqt .
48006010	Ihi , skud yella wamek , a nexdem lxiṛ i yemdanen meṛṛa , abeɛda atmaten di liman !
48006011	Walit tira-agi : s ufus-iw i wen tent-id-uriɣ .
48006012	Wid meṛṛa i gebɣan ad ḥețțmen fell-awen ṭṭhaṛa , bɣan a d-sbeggnen iman-nsen zdat imdanen belli ṭṭfen di leɛwayed , iwakken ur țwaqehhaṛen ara ɣef ddemma n umidag n Lmasiḥ .
48006013	Widak-agi iḍehṛen , nutni s yiman nsen ur ttabaɛen ara ccariɛa ; lameɛna bɣan aț-țḍehṛem iwakken ad zuxxen imi ḥettmen fell-awen ṭṭhaṛa-agi .
48006014	Ma d nekk ur bɣiɣ ad zuxxeɣ s wacemma , anagar s lmut n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ɣef wumidag ; axaṭer s lmut n Lmasiḥ ɣef wumidag uɣaleɣ ur ḥsibeɣ ara ddunit-agi , akken daɣen ddunit ur iyi-teḥsib ara ula d nekk .
48006015	Axaṭer ayen yesɛan azal , mačči d ṭṭhaṛa , lameɛna ț-țalalit tajḍiṭ i d-itekken s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
48006016	I wid akk itebɛen abrid-agi , a sen-iniɣ : lehna d ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi a wen-d țțunefkent i kunwi d wegdud n Sidi Ṛebbi meṛṛa !
48006017	Sya ɣer zdat , ur ḥwaǧeɣ yiwen a yi-isseḥzen ; axaṭer ccwami yellan di lǧețța-w țbegginent-ed belli d aqeddac n Sidna Ɛisa i lliɣ .
48006018	Ay atmaten , ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ aț-țili yid-wen meṛṛa ! Amin !
49001001	Nekk Bulus yellan d amceggeɛ n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi , uriɣ-ed tabṛaț-agi i watmaten yellan di temdint n Ifasus i gumnen s Ɛisa Lmaṣiḥ .
49001002	Ṛṛeḥma d lehna a wen-d țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ akk-d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
49001003	Ad ițțubarek Sidi Ṛebbi , baba-s n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , i ɣ-d-ifkan deg igenwan mkul lbaṛakat n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
49001004	Yis i ɣ-d-ixtaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi uqbel a d-ixleq ddunit , iwakken a nili zdat-es d izedganen mbla lɛib .
49001005	Sidi Ṛebbi iḥemmel-aɣ , daymi i geqsed si zik s lebɣi-ines a ɣ-yerr d arraw-is s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ,
49001006	iwakken a t-neḥmed a t-ncekkeṛ ɣef ṛṛeḥma-s tameqqrant i ɣ-d-ifka s Mmi-s eɛzizen .
49001007	S lmut n Sidna Ɛisa i ɣ-d-icufeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi , s idammen-is yuzzlen i ɣ-țwaɛfan ddnubat-nneɣ ; s wakka isbeggen-aɣ-d acḥal meqqṛet ṛṛeḥma ines
49001008	i d-issers fell-aɣ s tugeț yerna ifka-yaɣ-d lefhama ț-țmusni .
49001009	Sidi Ṛebbi isbeggen-aɣ-ed lebɣi-s yellan d lbaḍna , lemziya-nni i geqsed a ț-ixdem si tazwara s Lmasiḥ ,
49001010	ara yessiweḍ ɣer lekmal-is di lweqt i gextaṛ : ad isdukkel ayen akk yellan ama deg igenwan ama di lqaɛa , seddaw lḥekma n Lmasiḥ .
49001011	S Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i ɣ-yerra Sidi Ṛebbi d ayla-s , am akken i t-iqsed si tazwara di lebɣi-ines ,
49001012	iwakken nukni yessarmen di Lmasiḥ d imezwura , a neḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef tmanegt-is .
49001013	Kunwi daɣen mi teslam s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wen-d-yewwin leslak , tumnem s Lmasiḥ ; dɣa Sidi Ṛebbi iḍbeɛ-ikkun s ṭṭabeɛ-ines yellan d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i gewɛed a wen-t-id ye .
49001014	Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen d aɛeṛbun n lweṛt-nneɣ , alamma yewweḍ ɣer lekmal-is leslak n wid akk yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi . A neḥmed ihi Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef tmanegt-agi-ines ( lɛaḍima-s ) .
49001015	Daymi mi sliɣ s liman-nwen yeṛsan di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ d wamek i tḥemmlem wid akk i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ,
49001016	kull ass țḥemmideɣ rennuɣ Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef ddemma-nwen , țțadreɣ-kkun-id dayem di tẓallit-iw
49001017	iwakken Sidi Ṛebbi , Illu n Ssid nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yellan d bab n tmanegt , a wen-d-ye s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen tamusni d lefhama s wayes ara t-tissinem akken ilaq ;
49001018	a wen-ildi leɛqel iwakken aț țfehmem d acu n usirem i ɣer wen-d issawel , d acu n lbaṛakat timeqqranin i ghegga i wid yumnen yis ;
49001019	aț-țwalim tazmert-is tameqqrant i ɣ-d-ibeggen i nukni s wid yumnen yis .
49001020	Tazmert nni i d-ibeggen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , mi t-id-yesseḥya si ger lmegtin , yerna yesɣim-it ɣer tama-s tayeffust deg igenwan iwakken ad yeḥkem ,
49001021	sennig igelliden meṛṛa n ddunit , sennig imdebbṛen ț-țnezmarin , sennig tgeldiwin akk-d yismawen meṛṛa yellan mačči kan di lǧil-agi meɛna ula di lǧil i d-iteddun .
49001022	Sidi Ṛebbi yerra kullec seddaw iḍaṛṛen n Lmasiḥ , yerra-t daɣen d aqeṛṛuy n tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen
49001023	yellan d lǧețța n Lmasiḥ ; deg-s i gețțili yerna d nețța i d kullec di ddunit meṛṛa .
49002001	Zik-nni , tellam am wid yemmuten ɣef ddemma n tuccḍa-nwen akk-d ddnubat-nwen ;
49002002	tețɛicim di ddnub , tewwi-kkun ddunit , tḍefṛem Cciṭan , sselṭan n ddunit-agi i gțekellixen ar tura wid ur nḍuɛ ara Sidi Ṛebbi .
49002003	Nukni daɣen , zik-nni am nutni i nella ; nettabaɛ ixemmimen-nneɣ , ccehwat-nneɣ , nxeddem lebɣi n tnefsit-nneɣ , nella nuklal urrif n Sidi Ṛebbi am wiyaḍ .
49002004	Lameɛna imi i geččuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi d ṛṛeḥma , yerna leḥmala-ines ɣuṛ-nneɣ ț-țameqqrant ,
49002005	yerra-yaɣ-d ɣer tudert akk-d Lmasiḥ , nukni yellan am wid yemmuten ɣef sebba n ddnubat-nneɣ . S ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi i tețwasellkem .
49002006	S tdukli-nneɣ akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , Sidi Ṛebbi isseḥya-ɣ-ed akk-d Lmasiḥ yerna yesɣim-aɣ yid-es deg igenwan ,
49002007	iwakken di leqṛun i d-iteddun , a d-tban acḥal meqqṛit ṛṛeḥma-ines akk-d leḥnana-s i ɣ-d-isbeggen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
49002008	S ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi kan i tețwasellkem , mi tumnem . Ayagi mačči d ayen i d-ikan s ɣuṛ-wen lameɛna ț-țukci n Sidi Ṛebbi .
49002009	Mačči s lḥasanat-nwen i tețwasellkem akken yiwen ur ițzuxxu s yiman is ;
49002010	axaṭer ayen i nella tura s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-d-yekka , ixleq-aɣ-ed di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ iwakken a nexdem di tudert-nneɣ lecɣal yelhan i-ɣ-d ihegga si tazwara .
49002011	Kunwi ur nelli ara seg wegdud n wat Isṛail , iwumi qqaṛen wat Isṛail : « A wid ur neḍhiṛ » axaṭer nutni ḥesben iman-nsen ḍehṛen ɣef ddemma n ṭṭhaṛa-nni i sɛan di lɛadda-nsen ,
49002012	mmektit-ed amek i tellam zik : di lweqt-nni tellam tbeɛdem ɣef Lmasiḥ , d ibeṛṛaniyen ur nelli ara seg ugdud i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , ur tețțekkam di lemɛahdat i sen-iwɛed , ur tesɛim asirem , ur tessinem Sidi Ṛebbi .
49002013	Meɛna imi tumnem s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , kunwi yellan zik tbeɛdem fell-as , tura tqeṛṛbem-d ɣuṛ-es s idammen-is yuzzlen ɣef ddemma-nwen .
49002014	Axaṭer d Lmasiḥ s yiman-is i d lehna-nneɣ , imi i gesdukkel at Isṛail d leǧnas nniḍen yerra-ten d yiwen n wegdud . Mi gefka iman-is d asfel , ihudd lḥiḍ-nni i ten-ifeṛqen , i ten-yerran d iɛdawen ;
49002015	yesseɣli tazmert n ccariɛa yerna lewṣayat akk-d leqwanen-ines , iwakken a d-issufeɣ si snat ccetlat-agi , yiwen kan n wegdud ajdid ara yamnen yis ; s wakka i d-issers lehna .
49002016	S lmut-is ɣef wumidag i ten-issemṣaleḥ d Sidi Ṛebbi , ikkes tiɛdawit yellan gar-asen , isdukkel sin leǧnas-agi yerra-ten d yiwen wegdud .
49002017	Yusa-d a wen-ibecceṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , yewwi-awen-d lehna ama i kunwi yellan tbeɛdem ɣef Ṛebbi , ama i wat Isṛail iqeṛben ɣuṛ-es ;
49002018	axaṭer yis i nezmer am kunwi am nukni , a nqeṛṛeb meṛṛa ɣer Baba Ṛebbi , s yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
49002019	Ihi tura , kunwi ur nelli ara seg wat Isṛail , ur tellim ara d ibeṛṛaniyen neɣ d imsebriden , meɛna tețțekkam di tejmaɛt n wegdud n Sidi Ṛebbi , tuɣalem d iɛeyyalen n twacult-is .
49002020	Tuɣalem d axxam yebnan ɣef lsas i ssersen ṛṛusul akk-d lenbiya , Ɛisa Lmasiḥ s yiman-is i d azṛu alemmas yeṭṭfen lebni .
49002021	D nețța i gessalayen lebni , yesseǧhad-it iwakken ad yuɣal d lǧameɛ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi .
49002022	S tdukli-nwen akk-d Lmasiḥ , ula d kunwi tețțekkam di lebni-agi , iwakken aț-țilim d axxam anda yezdeɣ Sidi Ṛebbi s Ṛṛuḥ-is .
49003001	Daymi nekk Bulus , aql-i d ameḥbus n Lmasiḥ ɣef ddemma nwen kunwi ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail .
49003002	Ahat teslam s lxedma i yi-d ițțunefken s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wayen i kkun-yeɛnan .
49003003	Sidi Ṛebbi ildi-yi-d allen iwakken ad fehmeɣ lbaḍna-ines , am akken i t-id-uriɣ s kra imeslayen ;
49003004	m'ara ten-teɣṛem , aț-țeẓrem ayen fehmeɣ ɣef lbaḍna n Lmasiḥ .
49003005	Sidi Ṛebbi ur d-ibeggen ara lbaḍna-agi i lejdud-nneɣ , lameɛna tura ibeggen-iț-id s Ṛṛuḥ-is iqedsen i imceggɛen-ines akk-d lenbiya .
49003006	Ațah lbaḍna-agi : imi umnen leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ i sen-d ițțubeccṛen , ad țekkin di lɛahed i d-ițțunefken i wat Isṛail , ad weṛten yid-sen lbaṛakat yerna ad uɣalen meṛṛa d yiwet n lǧețța .
49003007	Uɣaleɣ d aqeddac n lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi ț-țezmert-is ixeddmen deg-i ;
49003008	nekk yellan d ulac ger imasiḥiyen meṛṛa , yețțunefk-iyi-d s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi ad beccṛeɣ i wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail , lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan lbaṛakat ur nkeffu yellan di Lmasiḥ
49003009	yerna a d-sfehmeɣ lmeɛna n lbaḍna agi i geffer Sidi Ṛebbi si lebda , nețța i gxelqen kullec .
49003010	S wakka , lḥekmat ț-țnezmarin n igenwan ad issinent tamusni n Sidi Ṛebbi di mkul ṣṣifat-ines , s tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen
49003011	akken yella di leqsed n Sidi Ṛebbi si lebda ; leqsed-agi yessaweḍ-it ɣer lekmal-is s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ .
49003012	S liman-nneɣ di Sidna Ɛisa i nezmer a nqeṛṛeb ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s lețkal .
49003013	Daymi i wen-qqaṛeɣ tura : ur țțaǧat ara uguren i d-țmagareɣ ɣef ddemma-nwen a kkun-sfeclen axaṭer d ayen ara kkun-iqeṛṛben ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
49003014	Ɣef wayagi i kerfeɣ tigecrar , seǧǧdeɣ zdat Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ ,
49003015	seg i d-tekka yal tawacult yellan ama deg igenwan ama di lqaɛa ,
49003016	ṭṭalabeɣ-as iwakken s lɛaḍima-s tameqqrant , a kkun-isseǧhed s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ-is iqedsen .
49003017	Ssutureɣ-as ad izdeɣ Lmasiḥ deg wulawen-nwen s liman , aț-țesɛum izuṛan ara iṛeṣṣin di leḥmala ,
49003018	iwakken kunwi akk-d wid yumnen meṛṛa , aț-țzemrem aț-țfehmem acḥal hraw , acḥal ɣezzif , acḥal lqay , acḥal ɛlay leḥmala n Lmasiḥ ,
49003019	yerna aț-țissinem leḥmala-agi yugaren yal tamusni yellan di ddunit , alamma yezdeɣ Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi deg-wen s lekmal .
49003020	Sidi Ṛebbi ixeddem deg-nneɣ s tezmert-is , yețțak-aɣ-d akteṛ n wayen akk i s-neṭṭalab d wayen akk i nețxemmim ;
49003021	ad ițțubarek yisem-is si lǧil ɣer lǧil di tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i dayem , Amin !
49004001	Nekk yellan d aqeddac n Lmasiḥ , a kkun-nhuɣ ihi aț-țeddum akken yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi mi wen-d-issawel .
49004002	Ddut s lḥenna d wannuz akk-d ṣṣbeṛ , țemyawit wway gar-awen s lmaḥibba .
49004003	Ḥeṛset iman-nwen aț-țeṭṭfem di tdukkli n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , s lehna wway gar-awen .
49004004	Yiwet n lǧețța kan akk-d yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i gellan , am akken daɣen i wen-d-issawel Sidi Ṛebbi ɣer yiwen usirem kan .
49004005	Yiwen kan i d Ssid-nneɣ , yiwen n liman akk-d yiwen n weɣḍas i gellan ,
49004006	yiwen n Ṛebbi kan i gellan , d nețța i d baba-tneɣ meṛṛa ; yella sennig kullec , yella ger yemdanen meṛṛa , yella daɣen deg-sen meṛṛa .
49004007	Meɛna mkul yiwen deg-nneɣ tețțunefk-as-d ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi s wakken yella umur i s-d-yefka Lmasiḥ .
49004008	Akken yura di tira iqedsen + : Mi yuli ɣer igenwan , + yewwi yid-es imeḥbas , ifka-d tikciwin i yemdanen .
49004009	D acu i d lmeɛna : « Yuli ɣer igenni ? » Ayagi , yeɛni : uqbel ad yali Lmasiḥ ɣer igenni , iṣubb ɣer imukan lqayen n ddaw tmurt .
49004010	D win akken iṣubben , i gulin daɣen ɣer igenwan iwakken ad yeɛmeṛ ddunit meṛṛa ;
49004011	d nețța i d-ifeṛqen tukciwin i yemdanen : kra yefka-yasen ad ilin d ṛṛusul , kra d lenbiya , kra nniḍen ad beccṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , wiyaḍ d imeksawen n tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen neɣ d wid yesselmaden agdud n Sidi Ṛebbi .
49004012	S tukciwin-agi , Sidna Ɛisa ad iheggi wid yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , ad sɛun tazmert s wayes ara xedmen ccɣel i sen-d-ifka iwakken aț-țegmu tejmaɛt n watmaten yellan d lǧețța n Lmasiḥ ;
49004013	s wakka a ndukkel deg yiwen n liman akk-d yiwet n tmusni ɣef wayen yeɛnan Mmi-s n Sidi Ṛebbi , alamma nuɣal d imeqqranen di liman , imiren s tdukli-nneɣ a naweḍ ɣer lekmal yellan di Lmasiḥ .
49004014	S wakka ur nețɣimi ara d arrac imeẓyanen i țțawint lemwaji , i gekkat waḍu ɣer mkul lǧiha , iwumi țkellixen yemdanen s tḥila-nsen d uselmed-nsen .
49004015	Meɛna m'ara d-nini tideț s lmaḥibba , a nennerni di kullec di tikli-nneɣ akk-d Lmasiḥ yellan d aqeṛṛuy n tejmaɛt n watmaten .
49004016	Lǧețța tebna s leɛḍam i cuddent lemfaṣel yal yiwen deg umkan-is ; s Lmasiḥ i tețțimɣuṛ tețnerni di lmaḥibba m'ara xeddmen leɛḍam ccɣel-nsen akken ilaq .
49004017	Atah ihi wayen i d-nniɣ d wayen i d-qqaṛeɣ s yisem n Lmasiḥ : ur țɛicit ara am wid ur nessin ara Sidi Ṛebbi , imi nutni ttabaɛen ixemmimen-nsen ur nesɛi lmeɛna .
49004018	Lefhama-nsen iɣumm-iț ṭṭlam , sbeɛden iman-nsen ɣef tudert i d ițțak Sidi Ṛebbi axaṭer jehlen , qquṛen wulawen-nsen .
49004019	Ur țsetḥin ur țneḥcamen , xeddmen anagar leɛṛuṛ yerna ur sɛin ara leqniɛa .
49004020	Meɛna kunwi , mačči d ayagi i tlemdem ɣef wayen yeɛnan Lmasiḥ .
49004021	Ma yella d ṣṣeḥ teslam yis yerna slemden awen tideț yeɛnan Lmasiḥ ,
49004022	eǧǧet ihi tikli d lɛeqliyat-nwen tiqdimin i ssefsadent ccehwat-nni yețɣuṛṛun ,
49004023	iwakken aț-țesɛum lefhama tajdiṭ i d-yețțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ;
49004024	aț-țuɣalem d imdanen ijdiden akken yella di lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi , iwakken aț-țeddum deg webrid n lḥeqq akk-d ṣṣfa i ɣer tessufuɣ tideț .
49004025	Daymi , xḍut i lekdeb , ilaq mkul yiwen deg-wen ad immeslay s tideț i lɣiṛ-is , axaṭer d leɛḍam n yiwet n lǧețța i nella .
49004026	Ma yella terfam ur dennbet ara , ilaq a wen-yekkes wurrif uqbel ad yeɣli yiṭij ;
49004027	ur țțaǧat ara abrid i Cciṭan ad ikcem ulawen nwen .
49004028	Win yellan yețțakar ilaq ad yeǧǧ tukerḍa , ad ixdem s iɣallen-is iwakken a d-isewweṛ aɣṛum-is s leḥlal , s wakka ad izmir ad iɛiwen wid yeḥwaǧen .
49004029	Ur ilaq ara a d-iffeɣ yir wawal seg imi nwen , meɛna init-ed kan imeslayen iṣelḥen s wayes ara sfaydin wid ara sen-islen yerna ad nnernin di liman .
49004030	Ur sseḥzanet ara Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , axaṭer yis i kkun-iḍbeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi i wass i deg ara innekmal leslak-nwen .
49004031	Ekkset si gar-awen : ddɣel , taɛdawit , zzɛaf , urrif , leɛyaḍ , rregmat d wayen akk n diri .
49004032	Ilit d iḥninen msamaḥet wway gar-awen , akken i wen-isemmeḥ Sidi Ṛebbi s Lmasiḥ .
49005001	Cbut Sidi Ṛebbi baba-twen imi tellam d arraw-is eɛzizen ;
49005002	ddut di tudert-nwen s leḥmala am akken i ɣ-iḥemmel Lmasiḥ i gefkan iman-is ɣef ddemma-nneɣ d asfel i Sidi Ṛebbi , am lweɛda yesɛan rriḥa iɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi .
49005003	Kunwi s imasiḥiyen xḍut i zzna , i wayen ur neṣfi ara , i ṭṭmeɛ ; ayagi meṛṛa ur ilaq ara a d-ițwabdar gar-awen ulamma d abdar ;
49005004	ur qebbḥet , ur d-qqaṛet imeslayen ur nesɛi lmeɛna , ur stehzayet ara ɣef wiyaḍ , ayagi d ayen n diri ; meɛna d imeslayen ara iḥemden Sidi Ṛebbi i glaqen a d-ffɣen seg imi-nwen ;
49005005	axaṭer ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli wid izennun neɣ wid ixeddmen ayen ur neṣfi akk-d wid ur nesteqniɛ ara , imi wid ur nesteqniɛ ara cban wid iɛebbden lmeṣnuɛat , widak-agi meṛṛa ur țekkayen ara di tgeldit n Lmasiḥ akk-d Sidi Ṛebbi .
49005006	Ḥadret ad yili win ara kkun-ikellxen s lehduṛ ur nesɛi lmeɛna ; axaṭer ɣef wayagi i d-ițrusu wurrif n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wid i t ițɛuṣun .
49005007	Ɣuṛ-wat ad yili wayen ara kkun icerken yid-sen .
49005008	Ț-țideț , zik-nni tellam di ṭṭlam , meɛna tura s tikli nwen deg ubrid n Lmasiḥ , teffɣem ɣer tafat . Ddut ihi di tafat imi tellam d arraw n tafat ;
49005009	axaṭer tafat tețțawi ɣer wayen yelhan , ɣer lḥeqq akk-d tideț .
49005010	Meyyzet aț-țfehmem ayen iɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi ;
49005011	ur țekkayet ara di lecɣal n ṭṭlam ur nesɛi lfayda , meɛna kecfet-ed lecɣal-agi ɣer tafat .
49005012	S tideț ayen xeddmen imdanen agi s tuffra , d lḥecma a t-id-nebder ;
49005013	lameɛna m'ara d-nekcef ayen xeddmen , lecɣal-nsen țbanen-d di tafat imi anda tella tafat , kullec yețban di tafat .
49005014	Axaṭer yura : Ddekwal a kečč yeṭṭsen , ekker-ed si ger lmegtin , imiren a d-tecṛeq fell-ak tafat n Lmasiḥ .
49005015	Ihi ḥadret mliḥ tikli-nwen , ur leḥḥut ara am imehbal , meɛna am wid itɛeqlen ;
49005016	faṛset lweqt axaṭer ussan d ixeddaɛen .
49005017	Daymi , ur smuhbulet ara , meɛna nadit aț-țissinem lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi .
49005018	Ur sekkṛet ara , axaṭer ssekṛan yessufuɣ i webrid , lameɛna ǧǧet Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ad iččaṛ ulawen-nwen ;
49005019	țemseǧhadet wway-gar-awen s isefra n Zabuṛ , cnut ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi , țḥemmidet-eț s wulawen-nwen .
49005020	Ḥemmdet Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ ɣef kullec , di mkul lweqt , s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
49005021	Țemqadaṛet wway gar-awen i lmend n Lmasiḥ .
49005022	A tilawin , ḍuɛemt irgazen-nkunt am akken i glaq aț țḍuɛemt Sidi Ṛebbi !
49005023	Axaṭer argaz d aqeṛṛuy ɣef tmeṭṭut-is , am akken yella Lmasiḥ d aqeṛṛuy ɣef tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen ; Lmasiḥ d amsellek n tejmaɛt-agi yellan d lǧețța-s .
49005024	Am akken i tețḍuɛu tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen Lmasiḥ , tilawin daɣen ilaq ad ḍuɛent irgazen-nsent di kullec .
49005025	Ay irgazen , mkul yiwen deg-wen ilaq ad iḥemmel tameṭṭut-is akken iḥemmel Lmasiḥ tajmaɛt n imasiḥiyen yerna isebbel tudert-is fell-as ;
49005026	s weɣḍas n waman d wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi yerra-ț teṣfa iwakken a ț-iqeddem i Sidi Ṛebbi ;
49005027	yebɣa a d-tban tejmaɛt-agi n imasiḥiyen zdat-es , teṣfa mbla ccwami , mbla akmac , mbla lɛib , aț-țili ț țimqeddest , ulac deg-s ayen ara s-d-nessukkes .
49005028	Akken daɣen , irgazen ilaq ad ḥemmlen tilawin-nsen am lǧețțat-nsen . Win iḥemmlen tameṭṭut-is d iman-is i gḥemmel .
49005029	Ulac win ikeṛhen lǧețța-s , lameɛna ițɛeyyic-iț , ițḥadar-iț am akken i gxeddem Lmasiḥ i tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen ,
49005030	axaṭer d leɛḍam n lǧețța-s i nella ; am akken yura :
49005031	daymi argaz ilaq ad yeǧǧ baba-s d yemma-s iwakken ad iɛic ț-țmeṭṭut-is , dɣa di sin yid-sen ad uɣalen d yiwen .
49005032	Bɣiɣ a wen-d-iniɣ belli ayagi d lbaḍna tameqqrant yeɛnan Lmasiḥ akk-d tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen .
49005033	Ihi , mkul yiwen deg-wen ilaq ad iḥemmel tameṭṭut-is am yiman-is , ma ț-țameṭṭut ilaq aț-țqadeṛ argaz-is .
49006001	A dderya , ḍuɛet imawlan-nwen akken yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi , axaṭer ayagi d ayen yellan d lḥeqq .
49006002	Di ccariɛa i d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi i Sidna Musa , d wagi i d lameṛ amezwaru yesɛan lemɛahda :
49006003	Qadeṛ baba-k d yemma-k iwakken aț-țɛiceḍ di lehna yerna ad yiɣzif leɛmeṛ-ik di ddunit .
49006004	Ma d kunwi ay imawlan , ur sserfayet ara dderya-nwen , meɛna ṛebbit-țen akken i kkun-id-iweṣṣa Sidi Ṛebbi .
49006005	Ay aklan , ḍuɛet imɛellmen n ddunit-agi , s leqdeṛ , s wul yeṣfan d neyya am akken d Lmasiḥ i tețḍuɛum .
49006006	Ayagi ur t-xeddmet ara kan m'ara kkun-țɛassan am akken tețnadim aț-țɛeǧbem i yemdanen , lameɛna ilit am iqeddacen n Lmasiḥ i gxeddmen lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi seg ul .
49006007	Qedcet fell-asen am akken d Lmasiḥ s yiman-is i ɣef tqeddcem mačči ɣef yemdanen .
49006008	Teẓram belli win ixedmen lxiṛ , ama d akli neɣ d aḥeṛṛi , a t-yaf ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
49006009	Ma d kunwi ay imɛellmen , xedmet daɣen i iqeddacen-nwen akken yella di lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi ; ur xeddmet ara deg-sen lbaṭel , imi teẓram belli amɛellem-nsen yellan daɣen d amɛellem-nwen , deg igenwan i gella yerna nețța ur ixeddem ara lxilaf ger yemdanen .
49006010	Sǧehdet ihi iman-nwen s tezmert tameqqrant n Sidi Ṛebbi .
49006011	Refdet leslaḥ meṛṛa i d-yețțak Sidi Ṛebbi , iwakken ur kkun-iɣelleb ara Cciṭan s tḥila-ines ;
49006012	axaṭer imenɣi-nneɣ mačči akk d yemdanen i gella , lameɛna nețnaɣ ț-țgeldiwin akk-d tnezmarin n ṭṭlam iḥekmen di ddunit-agi , akk-d leṛwaḥ imcumen yellan deg igenwan .
49006013	Ɣef wayagi , refdet leslaḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi , iwakken aț-țizmirem aț-țqablem tiswiɛin iweɛṛen , s wakka ɣer taggara n umenuɣ a kkun-id-yaf lḥal mazal tbeddem .
49006014	Heggit iman-nwen am iɛsekṛiwen , beggset tideț , lset lḥeqq ɣef yidmaren-nwen am tidemmar n wuzzal .
49006015	Sɛut zzwaṛa am warkasen deg yidaṛṛen-nwen , daymen theggam i ubecceṛ n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ .
49006016	Di yal taswiɛt , sɛut liman am tseddarit s wayes ara tizmirem aț-țsensem isufa n tmes n Cciṭan ;
49006017	cuddet leslak am tcacit n wuzzal ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-nwen , sxedmet asekkin n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yellan d awal n Sidi Ṛebbi .
49006018	Di yal taswiɛt deɛɛut ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen s yal taẓallit d uḥellel . Ɛiwzet ihi , kettṛet di tẓallit , deɛɛut ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef watmaten meṛṛa ;
49006019	deɛɛut daɣen fell-i iwakken a yi-d-ye Sidi Ṛebbi imeslayen s wayes ara beccṛeɣ lbaḍna n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ mbla tugdi .
49006020	Țțuceggɛeɣ-d ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ; ɣef ddemma-s i lliɣ d ameḥbus ; dɛut ihi iwakken a t-beccṛeɣ akken ilaq , mbla tugdi .
49006021	Bɣiɣ aț-țeẓrem ula d kunwi ayen i yi-yeɛnan d wayen i xeddmeɣ , daymi i n-ceggɛeɣ gma-tneɣ ameɛzuz Tucik iqeddcen seg ul ɣef Sidna Ɛisa , d nețța ara kkun-isɛelmen ɣef kullec .
49006022	Ceggɛeɣ-t-in iwakken aț-țeẓrem ayen akk i ɣ-iɛnan , yerna ad isseǧhed ulawen-nwen .
49006023	Ay atmaten , lehna , leḥmala akk-d liman a wen-d-țțunefken s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ akk-d Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
49006024	Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi a d-ters ɣef wid akk iḥemmlen Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ s lmaḥibba ur nfennu !
50001001	S ɣuṛ Bulus akk-d Timuti iqeddacen n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , i watmaten yumnen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , i imeqqranen n tqeḍɛit akk-d wid i ten-ițɛassan yellan di temdint n Filibus .
50001002	Ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d țțunefkent s ɣuṛ baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ !
50001003	? ḥemmideɣ țcekkiṛeɣ Sidi Ṛebbi mkul tikkelt m'ara kkun-id-mmektiɣ .
50001004	Yal ass deɛɛuɣ fell-awen s lxiṛ di tẓallit-iw s lfeṛḥ d ameqqran ,
50001005	ɣef ddemma n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i deg tețțekkim seg wass amezwaru armi ț-țura .
50001006	Umneɣ s tideț belli win yebdan deg-wen ccɣel-agi yelhan , a t-ikemmel alamma d ass n tuɣalin n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
50001007	D lḥeqq imi țxemmimeɣ akkagi fell-awen axaṭer tezgam deg ul-iw yerna tețțekkim irkulli di tejmilt i yi-d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi , ama mi lliɣ di lḥebs ama mi țbecciṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ s tezmert ț-țissas .
50001008	Atan Ṛebbi d inigi , acḥal i kkun ccedhaɣ axaṭer ḥemmleɣ-kkun s leḥnana n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ;
50001009	yerna ayen i ssutureɣ di tẓallit-iw d anerni n leḥmala-nwen di tmusni akk-d lefhama .
50001010	S wakka aț-țissinem amek ara textiṛem ayen ifazen , iwakken aț-țilim teṣfam , ulac ayen ara wen-ssukksen i wass n tuɣalin n Lmasiḥ ;
50001011	yerna tudert-nwen aț-țeččaṛ s wayen yellan d lḥeqq i gxeddem yis-wen Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , i tmanegt akk-d lḥemd n Sidi Ṛebbi .
50001012	Ay atmaten , bɣiɣ aț-țeẓrem belli ayen idṛan yid-i , d ayen i gesnernan abecceṛ n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ .
50001013	Axaṭer deg ufrag n ccṛeɛ akk-d imukan nniḍen meṛṛa , ẓran akk ɣef ddemma n Lmasiḥ i țwaḥebseɣ .
50001014	Aṭas n watmaten i gțeklen ɣef Ssid-nneɣ , yerna ɣas akken ẓran-iyi țwarzeɣ s snasel ur kukran ara , țbecciṛen awal n Ṛebbi mbla tugdi .
50001015	S tideț , llan kra țbecciṛen Lmasiḥ s ṭṭmeɛ akk-d zzux ; meɛna wiyaḍ țbecciṛen s wul yeṣfan d neyya .
50001016	Widak-agi xeddmen ayagi s lmaḥibba , imi ẓran țwaxtaṛeɣ iwakken ad dafɛeɣ ɣef lexbaṛ n lxiṛ .
50001017	Ma d wiyaḍ , țbecciṛen Lmasiḥ s wul yeččuṛen ț-țiḥila ; ixemmimen nsen ur ṣfin ara , ɣilen s wakka ara rnun lqeṛḥ i wul-iw m'akka lliɣ di lḥebs .
50001018	Ur i yi-tewqiɛ ara , axaṭer akken yebɣu yili lḥal , ama s tḥila ama s wul yeṣfan Lmasiḥ yețwabecceṛ ; ɣef wayagi feṛḥeɣ yerna mazal ad feṛḥeɣ ,
50001019	axaṭer ẓriɣ ayagi meṛṛa i nnfeɛ inu , s tẓallit-nwen akk-d lemɛawna n Ṛṛuḥ n Sidna Ɛisa .
50001020	Bɣiɣ yerna ssarameɣ ur d-yețțili wacemma s wayes ara ssetḥiɣ ; meɛna am ass-a am uzekka , s lețkal ameqqran , a d-tban deg-i tmanegt n Lmasiḥ ama s tudert-iw ama s lmut-iw ;
50001021	axaṭer ɣuṛ-i , Lmasiḥ ț-țudert-iw ma d lmut d rrbeḥ .
50001022	Meɛna ma yella tudert-iw di ddunit , d lfayda ɣef ddemma n leqdic-iw ɣef lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , d acu ara xtiṛeɣ ? Ur ẓriɣ ara !
50001023	Di snat lǧihat-agi ɛewqeɣ : deg yiwet n tama , bɣiɣ ad ṛuḥeɣ iwakken ad iliɣ akk-d Lmasiḥ , axaṭer d ayen ifazen aṭas ,
50001024	di tama nniḍen , ɣef ddemma-nwen yenfeɛ axiṛ ad idireɣ di ddunit ; ayagi tḥeqqeqeɣ deg-s .
50001025	? riɣ ad idireɣ yerna ad qqimeɣ gar-awen meṛṛa , iwakken aț-tennernim yerna aț-țfeṛḥem di liman .
50001026	Tuɣalin-iw ɣuṛ-wen , a wen-d-te sebba tajḍiṭ , s wayes ara tzuxxem s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ɣef ddemma-inu .
50001027	Acu kan , ddut s tikli yuklal lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ iwakken ad sleɣ fell-awen , ama usiɣ-ed a kkun-ẓreɣ ama ɣabeɣ fell-awen , tǧehdem , tedduklem s yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ , tețḥarabem s yiwen wul ɣef liman i d-ițțak lexbaṛ n lxiṛ .
50001028	? uṛ-wat aț-țeǧǧem iɛdawen a kkun-ssagden , ayagi ad yili i nutni d țbut n nnger-nsen , i kunwi d țbut n leslak-nwen ; annect-agi s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-yekka ;
50001029	axaṭer tețțunefk-awen-d ṛṛeḥma mačči kan iwakken aț-țamnem s Lmasiḥ , meɛna iwakken aț-țenɛețțabem daɣen ɣef ddemma-ines
50001030	m'ara tețḥarabem akken twalam țḥarabeɣ nekkini , yerna mazal țḥarabeɣ ar tura am akken i teslam yis .
50002001	Eɛni ur tufim ara ṣṣbeṛ di Lmasiḥ , asseǧhed di leḥmala , tagmaț di Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen wway-gar-awen , ur tufim ara leḥnana d ṛṛeḥma ?
50002002	Kemmlet ihi lfeṛḥ-iw , sɛut yiwen uxemmem , sɛut yiwet n leḥmala , ddukklet s yiwen n ṛṛuḥ , d yiwen uxemmem .
50002003	Ur xeddmet acemma s umḥizwer neɣ iwakken aț-țesɛum ccan ur nesɛi lqima , meɛna anzet , ḥesbet wiyaḍ am akken sɛan lqima akteṛ-nwen .
50002004	Ilaq yal yiwen deg-wen ur ițnadi ara kan ɣef nnfeɛ-ines , lameɛna ilaq ad inadi ɣef nnfeɛ n wiyaḍ .
50002005	Sɛut deg ulawen nwen ixemmimen yellan di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ :
50002006	Nețța yellan d ṣṣifa n Ṛebbi , ur inuda ara ad isseɛdel iman-is akk-d Ṛebbi .
50002007	Meɛna isellem kullec s yiman-is mi guɣal d aqeddac . Isseɛdel iman-is d yemdanen mi d-iban s ṣṣifa n wemdan ;
50002008	yessanez iman-is mi gedda s ṭṭaɛa armi d lmut , lmut ɣef wumidag .
50002009	Daymi Sidi Ṛebbi issuli-t sennig n kra wayen yellan yerna ifka-yas isem yellan sennig n yismawen meṛṛa ,
50002010	iwakken s yisem n Ɛisa , yal tagecrirt aț-țeknu deg igenwan , di lqaɛa , ddaw lqaɛa ,
50002011	iwakken yal iles a d-icehhed belli Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , d nețța i gellan sennig kullec i tmanegt n Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ .
50002012	A wid eɛzizen fell-i , yal ass tețțaɣem awal ; sbeggnet-ed ihi leslak-nwen s lecɣal , s ṭṭaɛa d wannuz , mačči am asm'akken lliɣ yid-wen , meɛna tura akteṛ imi ɣabeɣ fell-awen .
50002013	Axaṭeṛ d Ṛebbi i wen-d-ițțaken lebɣi akk-d tezmert s wayes ara txedmem lebɣi-s yelhan .
50002014	Xedmet kullec mbla asmermeg neɣ asṭuqqet n wawal ,
50002015	iwakken yiwen ur kkun-ițlumu , aț-țilim teṣfam , d arraw n Ṛebbi , ur tseɛɛum ara lɛib ger lǧil-agi n ixeddaɛen , aț-țfeǧǧeǧem gar-asen am teftilin di ddunit
50002016	aț-țețbecciṛem awal n tudert ; s wakka , ass n tuɣalin n Lmasiḥ , ayagi ad yili d sebba n ccan-iw imi ur uzzileɣ ur nɛețțabeɣ baṭel .
50002017	? as akken ad țțusebbleɣ d asfel ara yernun ɣef wesfel n liman-nwen yețțunefken d lweɛda i Sidi Ṛebbi , d ayen i yi isfeṛḥen yerna feṛḥeɣ yid-wen meṛṛa .
50002018	Ula d kunwi feṛḥet am nekk , feṛḥet yid-i .
50002019	S lețkal i sɛiɣ di Sidna Ɛisa , ssarameɣ qṛib a wen-ceggɛeɣ Timuti iwakken a yi-issefṛeḥ s lexbaṛ ara yi-d-yawi s ɣuṛ-wen .
50002020	Ur sɛiɣ ula d yiwen ara yi-iɛawnen deg ixemmimen-iw , iwakken ad iḥebbeṛ fell-awen seg ul ;
50002021	axaṭer akken ma llan țnadin ɣef nnfeɛ-nsen , mačči ɣef nnfeɛ n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
50002022	Tessnem tikli n Timuṭi , am weqcic ɣer baba-s , yefka tudert-is yid-i i ubecceṛ n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ .
50002023	Ihi akken kan ara tefru temsalt-iw , a wen-t-in-ceggɛeɣ
50002024	yerna sɛiɣ lețkal di Ssid-nneɣ belli qṛib a n-aseɣ s yiman-iw ɣuṛ-wen .
50002025	Walaɣ ilaq-iyi a wen-ceggɛeɣ gma-tneɣ Ebafrudit , amdakkul-iw di lxedma d uḥareb ɣef ddemma n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , win akken i yi-d-tceggɛem yewwi-yi-d s ɣuṛ-wen ayen akk ḥwaǧeɣ ;
50002026	iccedha-kkun meṛṛa yerna yeḥzen aṭas imi teslam yis yehlek .
50002027	? - țideț ihlek armi yewweḍ lmut ; meɛna iɣaḍ Sidi Ṛebbi yerna mačči kan d nețța i t-iɣaḍen , ɣaḍeɣ-t ula d nekk iwakken ur d-iɣelli ara fell-i leḥzen ɣef wayeḍ .
50002028	Ceggɛeɣ-t-in s lemɣawla , iwakken aț-țfeṛḥem m'ara t-twalim yerna ula d nekk leḥzen-iw ad yifsus .
50002029	Sṭerḥbet yis s lfeṛḥ d ameqqran , s wakken yuklal yal yiwen yellan deg ubrid n Lmasiḥ ; qadṛet imdanen am wigi
50002030	axaṭer ɣef ddemma n leqdic ɣef Lmasiḥ i gewweḍ ɣer lmut , mi gsebbel ṛṛuḥ-is iwakken ad ixdem ayen akken ur tezmirem ara a yi-t-txedmem kunwi .
50003001	Ihi ay atmaten , feṛḥet imi tedduklem akk-d Ssid-nneɣ . Ur ɛeyyuɣ ara di tira n wayen i wen-n-uriɣ yakan , yerna ayagi a wen-yili d ṭṭmana i liman-nwen .
50003002	? adret iman nwen deg wuccanen , ḥadret iman nwen ɣef yemcumen-nni iḍehṛen s lekdeb .
50003003	Axaṭeṛ d nukni i gesɛan ṭṭhara n ṣṣeḥ imi nɛebbed Sidi Ṛebbi s Ṛṛuḥ-is ; yerna nețzuxxu s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ nețkel fell-as , ur nețkil ara ɣef limaṛat n yemdanen .
50003004	Ula d nekk zemreɣ ad țekleɣ ɣef limaṛat n yemdanen . Ma yella win i gɣilen izmer ad ițkel ɣef limaṛat agi , nekk zemreɣ ad țekleɣ akteṛ !
50003005	Axaṭer dehṛeɣ ass wis tmanya , kkiɣ-ed si ccetla n wat Isṛail , n wedrum n Benyamin , d aɛibṛani mmi — s n uɛibṛani .
50003006	? ef wayen yeɛnan ccariɛa , d afarizi , ma d zzwaṛa , d win ițqehhiṛen tajmaɛt n imasiḥiyen ; ɣef wayen yeɛnan lqanun n ccariɛa n Sidna Musa , ur yelli wayen i yi-ixuṣṣen .
50003007	Meɛna ayen akken i yi-illan d lfayda , ḥesbeɣ-t tura d lexṣara ɣef ddemma n Lmasiḥ .
50003008	Zemreɣ a d iniɣ : ḥesbeɣ kullec d lexṣara ɣef ddemma n wayen ifazen , yellan ț-țamusni n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-iw . ? ef ddemma-s qebleɣ a yi-iṛuḥ kullec , ḥesbeɣ kullec d afṛaden , iwakken a d-rebḥeɣ Lmasiḥ
50003009	yerna ad sɛuɣ amkan ɣuṛ-es , ad uɣaleɣ d aḥeqqi mačči mi ḍuɛeɣ ccariɛa n Sidna Musa , meɛna imi uɣaleɣ d aḥeqqi s liman yellan di Lmasiḥ , s lḥeqq-nni i d-yețțak Sidi Ṛebbi i wid yesɛan liman deg-s .
50003010	S wakka ad issineɣ Lmasiḥ , ad issineɣ tazmert n ḥeggu-ines , ad țekkiɣ di leɛtab-is , ad iliɣ am nețța di lmut-is iwakken
50003011	akken yebɣu yili lḥal ad awḍeɣ s wayagi ɣer ḥeggu si ger lmegtin .
50003012	Ur d-nniɣ ara tikli-inu di Lmasiḥ tennekmal neɣ wwḍeɣ ɣer lmeqsud , meɛna mazal țțazzaleɣ iwakken a t-awḍeɣ , imi ula d nekk yewwi-yi Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
