50003013	Ay atmaten , ur ḥsibeɣ ara iman-iw wwḍeɣ ɣer lmeqṣud-agi ; lameɛna tella yiwet lḥaǧa xeddmeɣ-ț : tețțuɣ ayen iɛeddan , ssarameɣ ɣer wayen yellan ɣer zdat ,
50003014	țțazzaleɣ ɣer lmeqṣud-agi iwakken ad awḍeɣ ɣer wayen i ɣ-ihegga Sidi Ṛebbi deg igenwan s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
50003015	Nukni yellan d imdanen meqqṛen di liman ilaq a nesɛu akk axemmem-agi ; ma yella tesɛam axemmem yemxalafen ɣef kra n temsalin , d Sidi Ṛebbi ara kkun-d-isfehmen ɣef wayagi .
50003016	S wakka , imi newweḍ di tudert-nneɣ ɣer tegniț-agi , ilaq a nkemmlet tikli-nneɣ s tdukli .
50003017	Ɛandet-iyi ay atmaten , țmuqulet ɣer wid i twalam leḥḥun di liman am nukni ,
50003018	axaṭer aṭas i gteddun am iɛdawen n umidag n Lmasiḥ ; nniɣ-awen-t-id acḥal d abrid , tura daɣen a wen-t-id ɛiwdeɣ s imeṭṭawen :
50003019	Taggara-nsen d nnger ; ṛebbi-nsen d iɛebbaḍ-nsen , țzuxxun s wayen i glaq ad nneḥcamen , țxemmimen anagar ɣef leḥwayeǧ n ddunit .
50003020	Ma d nukni tanezduɣt-nneɣ deg igenwan , syenna i nețṛaǧu s lḥir amsellek-nneɣ Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
50003021	ara ibeddlen lǧețțat-nneɣ timeḥquṛin , a tent-yerr am lǧețța-s yeččuṛen d lɛaḍima , s tezmert s wayes ițțarra kullec seddaw lḥekma-s .
50004001	Daymi , ay atmaten-iw eɛzizen fell-i , kunwi i ccedhaɣ a kkun ẓreɣ , kunwi yellan d lfeṛḥ-iw , d ccan-iw , akka i glaq aț-țeṭṭfem s lǧehd di Ssid-nneɣ , a wid eɛzizen fell-i !
50004002	Bɣiɣ ad weṣṣiɣ tiyessetmatin nneɣ Iwudya akk-d Sinticya , iwakken ad ddukklent deg yiwen uxemmem di Ssid-nneɣ .
50004003	Ula d kečč a gma Sizugus unṣiḥ , ḍelbeɣ-ak a tent-tɛiwneḍ nutenti i ḥurben yid-i ɣef ddemma n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , akk-d Klimun d imdukkal-iw nniḍen di leqdic iwumi uran yismawen nsen di tektabt n tudert .
50004004	Ilit dayem di lfeṛḥ imi tedduklem akk-d Ssid-nneɣ ; a wen-t-id-ɛiwdeɣ : ilit dayem di lfeṛḥ .
50004005	Ilaq aț-țiḥninem ɣer yemdanen meṛṛa , Ssid-nneɣ qṛib a d-yuɣal .
50004006	Ur țḥebbiṛet ɣef wacemma , meɛna di yal lḥaǧa , ssutret ayen teḥwaǧem i Sidi Ṛebbi s tẓallit , s uḥellel akk-d leḥmadi ;
50004007	imiren lehna n Sidi Ṛebbi i gugaren yal tamusni , aț-țeḥrez ulawen-nwen d ixemmimen nwen di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
50004008	Taggara ay atmaten a wen-d iniɣ : ayen akk yellan d ṣṣeḥ , d lḥeṛma , d lḥeqq , d ṣṣfa , ayen akk yuklalen leḥmala d wayen yuklalen leqdeṛ akk-d leḥmadi , ad ilin d sebba n ixemmimen-nwen .
50004009	Ayen tlemdem s ɣuṛ-i yerna tqeblem-t , ayen twalam xeddmeɣ-t d wayen teslam nniɣ-t-id xedmet-eț ula d kunwi , dɣa Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n lehna ad yili yid-wen .
50004010	Feṛḥeɣ aṭas am akken ț-țukci i yi-d-ifka Ssid-nneɣ mi walaɣ ul-nwen iɛawed iǧǧuǧeg-ed ɣuṛ-i , tețḥebbiṛem fell-i ; ẓriɣ tețḥebbiṛem fell-i , lameɛna ur wen-d-teɣli ara teswiɛt iwakken a yi-t-id-tbeggnem .
50004011	Ur d-nniɣ ara ayagi imi xuṣṣeɣ , axaṭer lemdeɣ ad steqniɛeɣ di yal taswiɛt i deg lliɣ .
50004012	Ssneɣ ad ɛiceɣ di lexṣaṣ , am akken ssneɣ ad ɛiceɣ di tawant . Di yal amkan , di kullec lemdeɣ leqnaɛa d lexṣaṣ , lemdeɣ tawant d laẓ .
50004013	Zemreɣ i kullec s win i yi-sseǧhaden .
50004014	Lameɛna d ayen ilhan i txedmem imi tețțekkim di leɛtab-iw .
50004015	Kunwi teẓram ay atmaten n temdint n Filibus belli asmi bdiɣ abecceṛ n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , mi ṛuḥeɣ si tmurt n Masidunya . Ula d yiwet n tejmaɛt ur temḥasab yid-i deg wayen i ț-id ikeččmen d wayen i tețțak d lemɛawna i wiyaḍ , anagar tajmaɛt-nwen ;
50004016	anagar kunwi i gxedmen ayagi , yerna mi lliɣ di temdint n Tisalunikya , snat n tikkal i yi-d-tceggɛem ayen akk ḥwaǧeɣ .
50004017	Mačči ɣef lweɛda i țnadiɣ , meɛna țnadiɣ ɣef lfayda tameqqrant ara yilin di nnfeɛ-nwen .
50004018	Yewweḍ-iyi-d kullec , aql-i di tawant , ur iyi-ixuṣṣ wacemma imi i yi-d-iwweḍ wayen i d-tefkam i gma tneɣ Ibafrudit ; ayen i d-yusan s ɣuṛ-wen am leɛṭeṛ n rriḥa yelhan , am wesfel i geqbel Sidi Ṛebbi yerna iɛǧeb-as .
50004019	Sidi Ṛebbi a wen-d-ye ayen akk teḥwaǧem s wakken tella lɛaḍima n lbaṛakat-is , di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
50004020	Tamanegt i Sidi Ṛebbi baba tneɣ , si lǧil ɣer lǧil , amin !
50004021	Sellmet ɣef wegdud n Sidi Ṛebbi , wid akk yumnen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
50004022	Atmaten akk yellan yid-i țsellimen fell-awen . Wid akk yellan seg ugdud n Sidi Ṛebbi țsellimen fell-awen , abeɛda wid yellan d iqeddacen n Qayṣer .
50004023	Ṛṛeḥma n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ aț-țili yid-wen .
51001001	Nekk Bulus , amceggeɛ n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d gma-tneɣ Timuti ,
51001002	i watmaten yellan di temdint n Kulus , wid iteddun s ṣṣfa deg webrid n Lmasiḥ . Ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d-țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi Baba-tneɣ !
51001003	Nețḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi Baba-s n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yerna ndeɛɛu fell-awen ;
51001004	axaṭer nesla s liman i tesɛam di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ d wamek i tḥemmlem agdud n Sidi Ṛebbi ,
51001005	ɣef ddemma n usirem i wen-ițțuheggan deg igenwan , asirem nni i wen-d-ițțuxebbṛen s wawal n tideț n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ .
51001006	Lexbeṛ-agi n lxiṛ yewḍen armi d ɣuṛ-wen , yețnerni di ddunit meṛṛa ; akken daɣen i gețnerni deg-wen ula d kunwi seg wasmi i teslam yerna tessnem tideț ɣef ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi ,
51001007	akken i wen-ț-isselmed Ibafras , aṛfiq-nneɣ eɛzizen di leqdic ; nețța iqeddcen ɣef Lmasiḥ s wul yeṣfan ,
51001008	ixebbeṛ-aɣ-ed ɣef leḥmala s wayes i kkun-yeččuṛ Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
51001009	Daymi nezga ndeɛɛu fell-awen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi seg wasmi nesla yis-wen , nessutur-as a wen-d-ye amek ara tissinem akken ilaq lebɣi ines , s lɛeqliya d lefhama i d-ițțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
51001010	S wakka , aț-țleḥḥum s tikli yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a s tɛeǧbem di kullec , a d-tefkem lfakya yelhan , yerna aț-țnernim di tmusni n Sidi Ṛebbi ,
51001011	Ndeɛɛu ɣer Ṛebbi akken a kkun-isseǧhed s tezmert-is tameqqrant iwakken aț-tṣebṛem i kullec alamma ț-țaggara .
51001012	Ḥemmdet , cekkṛet s lfeṛḥ Sidi Ṛebbi Baba-tneɣ i wen-d-yefkan amur di lweṛt i d-ihegga i warraw n tafat .
51001013	Ikkes-aɣ-d si tezmert n ṭṭlam , iwakken a ɣ-yessiweḍ ɣer tgelda n Mmi-s eɛzizen ,
51001014	s wayes nețwasellek yerna nesɛa leɛfu n ddnubat-nneɣ .
51001015	Lmasiḥ , d ṣṣifa n Sidi Ṛebbi ur nezmir a nwali , d nețța i d amezwaru n txelqit meṛṛa .
51001016	Yis i gețwaxleq wayen nețwali d wayen ur nețwali ara ama deg igenwan ama di lqaɛa , tigeldiwin d igelliden , lḥekmat akk-d tezmar yellan deg igenwan ; kullec yețwaxleq yis , kullec yețwaxleq i nețța .
51001017	Yella-d uqbel a d-yețwaxleq kra yellan , d nețța i d lsas n txelqit ,
51001018	d aqeṛṛuy n tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen yellan d lǧețța-s . Yella si tazwara , d nețța i d amenzu i d-iḥyan si ger lmegtin iwakken ad yili d amezwaru di kullec .
51001019	Axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yufa lfeṛḥ-is s lekmal di Mmi-s ,
51001020	s Lmasiḥ i gemṣalaḥ akk-d txelqit , yessers-ed lehna ama di lqaɛa ama deg igenwan s idammen n Mmi-s yuzzlen ɣef wumidag .
51001021	Kunwi yellan zik-nni d ibeṛṛaniyen , d iɛdawen n Sidi Ṛebbi s ixemmimen-nwen d yir lecɣal nwen
51001022	Tura issemṣaleḥ-ikkun yid-es s lmut n Mmi-s iwakken a d-tbanem zdat-es teṣfam , mbla lɛib .
51001023	Ma yella teṭṭfem di liman-nwen s tideț , ma yella tbeddem , tṛeṣṣam . Ɣuṛ-wat aț-țțwexxṛem ɣef wusirem i wen-d-yewwi lexbaṛ n lxiṛ iwumi teslam , lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ i gețțubeccṛen i yemdanen n ddunit meṛṛa , i ɣef uɣaleɣ nekk d aqeddac .
51001024	Tura feṛḥeɣ aṭas imi nɛețțabeɣ fell-awen , axaṭer țkemmileɣ ayen ixuṣṣen i leɛtab n Lmasiḥ ɣef ddemma n imasiḥiyen meṛṛa , yellan d lǧețța-s , i ɣef uɣaleɣ d aqeddac .
51001025	Iceggeɛ-iyi-d Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a wen-d-beccṛeɣ awal-is s lekmal .
51001026	Lbaḍna yeffren si zik , si lǧil ɣer lǧil , ibeggen-iț-id tura i wid yellan d ayla-s .
51001027	Yebɣa a d-yesken ccan n lbaḍna agi ifazen i leǧnas nniḍen ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail , iwakken ad walin Lmasiḥ deg-wen , nețța yellan d lsas n lɛaḍima i ɣer nessaram .
51001028	D Lmasiḥ agi i nețbecciṛ i yemdanen , nețweṣṣi-ten , nesselmad iten s tmusni d leɛqel , iwakken yal amdan ad innekmal di Lmasiḥ zdat Sidi Ṛebbi .
51001029	Ɣef wayagi i qeddceɣ s tezmert n Lmasiḥ yellan deg-i .
51002001	Bɣiɣ aț-țeẓrem acḥal meqqeṛ imenɣi i deg lliɣ ɣef ddemma nwen , ɣef watmaten n temdint n Ludikus akk-d wid meṛṛa i geslan yis-i meɛna leɛmeṛ ur ẓrin udem-iw .
51002002	Qebleɣ imenɣi-agi iwakken ad theddnen wulawen-nsen , ad ddukklen s leḥmala , ad ččaṛen d lefhama iwakken ad issinen lbaḍna n Sidi Ṛebbi Ṛebbi yellan di Lmasiḥ ;
51002003	deg-s i ffren igerrujen n lefhama ț-țmusni .
51002004	Nniɣ-d akka iwakken ur kkun ițkellix yiwen s imeslayen yețɣuṛṛun .
51002005	Ɣas akken ur lliɣ ara yid-wen , leɛqel-iw atan ɣuṛ-wen ; feṛḥeɣ aṭas mi ẓriɣ acḥal i teṭṭfem di liman-nwen di Lmasiḥ yerna tsedduyem kullec akken ilaq .
51002006	Ihi imi tqeblem Ɛisa Lmasiḥ d Ssid-nwen , ddut di lebɣi-ines .
51002007	Sbeddet lsas n tudert-nwen fell-as , sǧehdet liman-nwen akken i kkun nesselmed , țḥemmidet daymen Sidi Ṛebbi .
51002008	Ḥadret a kkun-kellxen wid ițfelsifen , wid yessexdamen tiḥila ț-țiḥeṛci ; ayagi d lekdubat i gebnan ɣef leɛwayed n yemdanen akk ț-țizemmar n ddunit , mačči ɣef uselmed n Lmasiḥ .
51002009	Axaṭer ayen akk yellan di Sidi Ṛebbi yezdeɣ s lekmal di Lmasiḥ ,
51002010	kunwi tesɛam kullec deg-s , nețța yellan sennig lḥekmat ț-țzemmar .
51002011	Sṭhaṛa-nwen tekka-d si tikli nwen akk-d Lmasiḥ , mačči am tin yețwaxedmen s ufus n wemdan , lameɛna s ɣuṛ Lmasiḥ i d-tekka iwakken a kkun-isellek si tezmert n lǧețța tamednubt .
51002012	S weɣḍas-nwen tețwameḍlem akk-d Lmasiḥ , lameɛna teḥyam-d daɣen yid-es si lmut imi tumnem s tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi i t-id-isseḥyan si ger lmegtin .
51002013	Kunwi ur neḍhiṛ ara , tellam temmutem ɣef ddemma n ddnubat nwen ; tura Sidi Ṛebbi yerra-kkun-id ɣer tudert s Lmasiḥ . Sidi Ṛebbi yeɛfa-yaɣ ddnubat-nneɣ meṛṛa .
51002014	Yemḥa leɛqed-nni i ɣ-isseḍlamen , imi ur nezmir ara a nexdem ayen d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa ; yemḥa-t mi t-isemmeṛ ɣef wumidag .
51002015	Sidi Ṛebbi yekkes tazmert i lḥekmat ț-țzemmar n igenwan , ikcef itent-id zdat txelqit meṛṛa , iɣleb-itent s lmut n Mmi-s ɣef wumidag .
51002016	Ihi ur țțaǧat ara win ara kkun-iḥasben ɣef wayen ara teččem d wayen ara teswem neɣ imi ur tettabaɛem ara ayen yeɛnan leɛyudat , talalit n waggur d wussan n westeɛfu ;
51002017	ayagi akk yezwar-ed d lemtel kan n wayen i d-iteddun , axaṭer tideț di Lmasiḥ i tella .
51002018	Ɣuṛ-wat a wen-kellxen yemdanen ițțarran iman-nsen d wid yunzen , țɛebbiden lmalayekkat , a kkun-id-awin ɣer webrid-nsen iwakken ur tețțawḍem ara ɣer lmeqṣud-nwen ; imdanen am wigi ttabaɛen kan ixemmimen-nsen yerna xeddmen ccan i yiman-nsen .
51002019	Ur qbilen ara ad ṭṭfen di Lmasiḥ yellan d aqeṛṛuy , i gesdukklen lǧețța s lemfaṣel meṛṛa d iẓuran i d-icudden ɣuṛ-es ; yis i tețnerni lǧețța , i tețțimɣuṛ s wakken yella di lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi .
51002020	Ma yella temmutem akk-d Lmasiḥ , teṭṭaxṛem ɣef wayen akk yeɛnan tudert n ddunit , acimi ihi am akken di ddunit i tellam , tqebblem ad ḥețțmen fell-awen leɛwayed n ddunit m'ara wen-qqaṛen :
51002021	« Ur teddmet ara neɣ ur ɛeṛṛdet ara neɣ ur țnalet ara ! »
51002022	Lumuṛat-agi meṛṛa i nxeddem d ayen ara yefnun , d leqwanen d uselmed n yemdanen ;
51002023	ț-țideț , lumuṛat-agi sselmaden leɛbada , annuz akk-d uɛețțeb n lǧețțat nneɣ , țbanen-d amakken d ayen yelhan , lameɛna d ayen ur nezmir ad iɛawen bunadem ad iṭṭef iman-is .
51003001	Kunwi ihi , imi i d-teḥyam akk-d Lmasiḥ , nadit ɣef leḥwayeǧ n igenwan anda yella Lmasiḥ i gḥekmen ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi .
51003002	Țḥebbiṛet ɣef wayen yellan deg igenwan mačči ɣef wayen yellan di ddunit-agi ,
51003003	axaṭer ɣer ddunit tețțusemmam temmutem , meɛna ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi tudert-nwen teffer akk-d Lmasiḥ .
51003004	M'ara d-iban Lmasiḥ yellan ț-țudert-nwen , kunwi daɣen a d tbanem yid-es .
51003005	Ɣef ddemma n wayagi , xḍut i yir tikli n ddunit-agi s wayes tețțeddum zik : leḥṛam , ayen iɛefnen , lebɣi n tnefsit , ccehwat n diri akk-d ṭṭmeɛ , ayagi meṛṛa am win ițɛebbiden ayen ixulfen Sidi Ṛebbi .
51003006	D annect-agi i d-isseɣlayen urrif n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wid i t-ițɛaṣin .
51003007	Ula d kunwi akka i tellam zik-nni mi tețɛicim di ddnub .
51003008	Meɛna tura sbeɛdet iman-nwen ɣef wannect-agi meṛṛa : urrif , zzɛaf , ddɣel ; ḥadret a d-ffɣen seg imawen-nwen rregmat neɣ yir lehduṛ .
51003009	Ur skiddibet ara wway gar-awen imi tura teǧǧam yir tikli-nwen n zik .
51003010	Tuɣalem d ijdiden , tețnernim di tmusni n Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken aț țemcabim ɣuṛ-es , nețța i kkun-d-ixelqen .
51003011	Di tudert-agi tajdiṭ ulac lxilaf ger wat Isṛail d leǧnas nniḍen , ger win iḍehṛen d win ur neḍhiṛ , ger wid itqeddmen d wid ur netqeddem , neɣ ger wakli d uḥeṛṛi , imi d Lmasiḥ i gellan d kullec di mkul yiwen .
51003012	Sidi Ṛebbi iḥemmel-ikkun , yextaṛ-ikkun aț-țilim d agdud-is . Sɛut ihi ṛṛeḥma deg wulawen-nwen , leḥnana , lxiṛ , ṣṣbeṛ d wannuz .
51003013	Țemyawit wway gar-awen , ma yella win yesɛan accetki ɣef wayeḍ msamaḥet axiṛ wway gar-awen , akken i wen-isemmeḥ Lmasiḥ , msamaḥet ula d kunwi .
51003014	Nnig n wayagi meṛṛa sɛut leḥmala , ț-țin i gesdukkulen ulawen .
51003015	Sɛut lehna n Lmasiḥ deg ulawen nwen iwakken aț-țilim d yiwen , ḥemmdet Sidi Ṛebbi imi ɣer lehna-agi i wen-d-yessawel .
51003016	Awal n Lmasiḥ ad izdeɣ gar-awen s lbaṛakat-is meṛṛa iwakken wa ad isselmad wa , wa ad inehhu wayeḍ s ṣṣwab . Ccnut s wulawen-nwen , ḥemmdet Sidi Ṛebbi s isefra n Zabuṛ akk-d ccnawi i d-ițțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
51003017	Ama deg imeslayen ama di lecɣal ara txedmem , xedmet kullec s yisem n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa , s yisem-is țḥemmidet Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ .
51003018	A tilawin , ḍuɛemt irgazen-nkunt , ayagi d ayen ilaqen i tid i gețḍuɛun Sidi Ṛebbi .
51003019	Ma d kunwi ay irgazen , ilaq aț-țḥemmlem tilawin-nwen , ur seɛɛut ara ulawen iqesḥen ɣuṛ-sent .
51003020	Ay arrac țțaɣet awal i imawlan nwen di kullec , axaṭer akka ara tɛeǧbem i Sidi Ṛebbi .
51003021	Lameɛna kunwi ay imawlan ur sserfuyet ara dderya-nwen neɣ m'ulac ad feclen .
51003022	Ma d kunwi ay iqeddacen , țțaɣet awal i imɛellmen-nwen di ddunit-agi mačči kan zdat-nsen akken a sen tɛeǧbem meɛna ɣas ulac-iten xedmet ccɣel-nwen seg wul , am akken i Sidi Ṛebbi .
51003023	Kra n wayen ara txedmem , xedmet-eț s wul yeṣfan am akken i Sidi Ṛebbi i t-txeddmem mačči i yemdanen ,
51003024	mmektit-ed lweṛt i kkun ițṛaǧun s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi akken i t-id-yewɛed ; axaṭer amɛellem n tideț i ɣef tqeddcem , d Lmasiḥ .
51003025	Win ixeddmen cceṛ a d-iɣellet ayen yexdem ; axaṭer ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ulac lxilaf .
51004001	Ay imɛellmen ddut s lḥeqq , ur xeddmet ara lxilaf ger iqeddacen nwen , axaṭer teẓram belli ula d kunwi tesɛam amɛellem deg igenwan .
51004002	Ur ɣefflet ara , meɛna deɛɛut țḥemmidet daymen Sidi Ṛebbi .
51004003	Deɛɛut daɣen fell-aɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a ɣ-d-ildi tiwwura a nbecceṛ awal-is , a nxebbeṛ ɣef lbaḍna n Lmasiḥ i ɣef lliɣ di lḥebs ,
51004004	dɛut iwakken ad sfehmeɣ akken ilaq lbaḍna-agi i yemdanen .
51004005	Ddut s ṣṣwab zdat wid ur numin ara s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ; faṛset tagniț , țbecciṛet awal n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
51004006	Sɛut iles aẓidan , imeslayen yesɛan lfayda , iwakken aț-țețțarram awal i yal yiwen s ṣṣwab .
51004007	Tucik , gma-tneɣ eɛzizen i ɣef țekleɣ , aṛfiq-nneɣ di leqdic ɣef Ssid-nneɣ , a wen-n-yawi lexbaṛ-iw .
51004008	Ɣef wannect-agi i wen-t-in ceggɛeɣ iwakken a wen-n-yawi lexbaṛ-nneɣ yerna ad ihedden ulawen-nwen .
51004009	A d-yas nețța d gma-tneɣ eɛzizen Unizim i ɣef nețkel , yellan d yiwen seg-wen ; d nutni ara wen-n-yawin lexbaṛ ɣef wayen meṛṛa ideṛṛun dagi .
51004010	Ițsellim-ed fell-awen Arisṭark aṛfiq-iw yellan yid-i di lḥebs akk-d Maṛqus yețțilin i Barnabas , win i ɣef kkun-weṣṣaɣ aț-țesterḥbem yis ma yusa-d ɣuṛ-wen .
51004011	Ițsellim-ed daɣen fell-awen Ɛisa iwumi qqaṛen Yustus . Ger wat Isṛail anagar tlata watmaten-agi i gxeddmen yid-i i tgeldit n Sidi Ṛebbi , d nutni kan i yufiɣ ɣer tama-w .
51004012	Gma-tneɣ Ibafras n tmurt-nwen , yellan d aqeddac n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ițsellim-ed fell-awen ; yezga ideɛɛu ɣer Ṛebbi fell-awen iwakken aț-țeṭṭfem , aț-țennernim di liman yerna aț-țilim twejdem aț-țxedmem lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi .
51004013	A d-cehdeɣ fell-as acḥal inɛețțab fell-awen , ɣef watmaten n tejmaɛt n Ludikus akk-d wid n Yirabulis .
51004014	Luqa aḥbib-nneɣ eɛzizen yellan d ṭṭbib akk-d Dimas , țsellimen-d fell-awen .
51004015	Sellmet ɣef watmaten yellan di Ludikus , ɣef Nimfa akk d wid ițnejmaɛen deg wexxam-is .
51004016	M'ara teɣṛem tabṛaț-agi , fket-eț i watmaten n tejmaɛt n Ludikus a ț-ɣṛen , kunwi daɣen ɣṛet tabṛaț ara kkun-id-yawḍen s ɣuṛ-sen .
51004017	Init i Arcibus ad ibedd i ccɣel nni i ɣef t-iwekkel Ssid-nneɣ , a t-ixdem akken ilaq .
51004018	Nekk Bulus , s ufus-iw i wen-n uriɣ . Sslam fell-awen ! Ur tețțut ara belli d ameḥbus i lliɣ . Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țili yid-wen .
52001001	Nekk Bulus , Silwan akk-d Timuti , i tejmaɛt n watmaten yellan di temdint n Tiṣalunik yumnen s Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ akk-d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa lmasiḥ . Ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a d-ersent fell-awen .
52001002	Yal ass nețḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen ; mkul m'ara nedɛu ɣuṛ-es , nețțader-ikkun-id di tẓallit-nneɣ .
52001003	Nețmektay-ikkun-id zdat Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ , ɣef wayen akk txeddmem seg wasmi tumnem s Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ; tqeblem aț-țenneɛtabem ɣef ddemma n yisem-is imi tḥemmlem-t yerna lețkal-nwen fell-as d ameqqran .
52001004	Ay atmaten eɛzizen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , neẓra belli d nețța i kkun-id ixtaṛen .
52001005	Lexbeṛ-agi n lxiṛ i wen-d newwi mačči d imeslayen kan , lameɛna s țțeḥqiq i wen-d-nbecceṛ lexbaṛ-agi n tideț , s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen . Teẓram amek i nedda gar-awen , asm'akken i nella ɣuṛ-wen ; nexdem ayagi iwakken a kkun-nɛiwen di tikli-nwen .
52001006	Ula d kunwi tuɣalem tețțeddum am nukni deg webrid n Ssid-nneɣ , imi di teswiɛt iweɛṛen i tqeblem awal-is s lfeṛḥ i d-ițțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
52001007	S wakka tuɣalem d lemtel i wid akk yumnen , i gellan di tmura n Masidunya akk-d Akaya .
52001008	Axaṭer s ɣuṛ-wen , lexbaṛ n lxiṛ iwweḍ mačči kan ɣer tmura-agi , meɛna slan s liman-nwen di Sidi Ṛebbi di mkul amkan . Daymi fiḥel a d-nemmeslay fell-awen .
52001009	Imdanen meṛṛa ḥekkun amek i tesṭerḥbem yis-nneɣ , amek i d-tuɣalem ɣer webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi , teǧǧam aɛbad n ssadaț , iwakken aț-țḍuɛem Sidi Ṛebbi n tideț , Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren .
52001010	Yerna tețṛaǧum a d-yuɣal Ssid nneɣ Ɛisa seg igenwan , Mmi-s-nni i d-isseḥya si ger lmegtin ; d nețța ara ɣ-isellken ass n lḥisab .
52002001	Ay atmaten , kunwi s yiman-nwen teẓram mačči mbla lmeɛna i d-nusa ɣuṛ-wen .
52002002	Teẓram daɣen nenneɛtab , nețwargem di temdint n Filibus , meɛna neṭṭef di liman-nneɣ di Sidi Ṛebbi , nkemmel abecceṛ n wawal-is gar-awen ɣas akken nețwaqehheṛ .
52002003	Lexbeṛ-agi n lxiṛ i wen-d newwi ur ibni ara ɣef lekdeb neɣ ɣef tḥila d lexdeɛ .
52002004	Sidi Ṛebbi ițkel fell-aɣ , daymi i ɣ-iceggeɛ iwakken a nbecceṛ awal-is . Axaṭer iẓra nețmeslay mačči iwakken a neɛǧeb i yemdanen , meɛna iwakken a s-neɛǧeb i nețța yessnen ulawen-nneɣ .
52002005	Teẓram belli leɛmeṛ ur nemmeslay s usqizzeb neɣ neḍmeɛ kra deg yiwen , atan Sidi Ṛebbi d inigi !
52002006	Leɛmeṛ ur nqelleb ad yali ccan-nneɣ ama ɣuṛ-wen ama ɣer wiyaḍ ; yerna lemmer nebɣi , nezmer a nḥettem iman-nneɣ fell-awen imi d imceggɛen n Lmasiḥ i nella !
52002007	Meɛna asmi nella gar-awen , neččuṛ d leḥnana am tyemmaț ițḥadaren ɣef warraw-is .
52002008	Imi tellam deg wulawen-nneɣ , mačči kan d lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi i nebɣa a wen-nbecceṛ , meɛna nezmer a nsebbel ula ț-țiṛwiḥin-nneɣ fell-awen , axaṭer teɛzizem fell-aɣ aṭas .
52002009	Ma tecfam ay atmaten ɣef wussan nni mi i wen-d-newwi lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , nenneɛtab , nxeddem iḍ d wass akken ur nețțili ț-țaɛkumt ula i yiwen deg-wen .
52002010	Ṛebbi yeẓra , kunwi teẓram belli tikli-nneɣ teṣfa , nedda s lḥeqq , yiwen ur aɣ-d-issukkes lɛib gar-awen kunwi s wid yumnen .
52002011	Teẓram daɣen nella i mkul yiwen deg-wen am ubabat ɣer warraw-is .
52002012	Nenha-kkun , nesseǧhed-ikkun , nḥellel-ikkun iwakken aț-țeddum akken yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi i wen-d issawlen ɣer tgeldit-is d lɛaḍima-s .
52002013	S wakka nețḥemmid dayem Sidi Ṛebbi imi tqeblem awal-is i wen-d newwi . Tqeblem-t mačči am akken d awal n wemdan , meɛna tqeblem-t imi d awal n Sidi Ṛebbi . D awal-agi i gxeddmen deg-wen tura , kunwi s wid yumnen .
52002014	Ay atmaten , tedṛa yid-wen am tejmuyaɛ n imasiḥiyen yellan di tmurt n Yahuda : akken i kkun-qehṛen warraw n tmurt-nwen akken daɣen i ten-qehṛen wudayen .
52002015	D udayen-agi i genɣan Ssid nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d lenbiya , d nutni daɣen i ɣ-iqehṛen . Ɛuṣan Sidi Ṛebbi yerna d iɛdawen n yemdanen .
52002016	Rnan kemmlen di ddnubat-nsen , axaṭer ur ɣ-ǧǧin ara a nbecceṛ leslak n Sidi Ṛebbi i leǧnas nniḍen ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail . S wakka i d-yeɣli lɛiqab n Sidi Ṛebbi fell-asen .
52002017	Ma d nukni ay atmaten seg wasmi i d-nṛuḥ s ɣuṛ-wen , ɣas akken ur kkun-ẓerrent ara wallen , tellam deg wulawen-nneɣ ; nxaq fell-awen aṭas , daymi i neɛṛeḍ a d-nas iwakken a kkun-nẓer .
52002018	Acḥal n tikkal i nebɣa a nuɣal ɣuṛ-wen , nekk s yiman-iw , yiwet neɣ snat n tikkal i ɛerḍeɣ a n-ruḥeɣ , meɛna Cciṭan ur aɣ yeǧǧi ara , iqḍeɛ-aɣ abrid .
52002019	D kunwi i d sebba n usirem d lfeṛḥ-nneɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , yis-wen ara nzuxx zdat Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa asm'ara d-yuɣal .
52002020	Ț-țideț , d kunwi i d can nneɣ i d lfeṛḥ-nneɣ .
52003001	Imi ur nezmir ara a neṣbeṛ fell-awen nnig wannect-a , nufa-d yiwen ṛṛay : nukni a neqqim di temdint n Atinya ,
52003002	ma d gma-tneɣ Timuti , aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi , ițbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ , a wen-t-in-nceggeɛ a kkun isseǧhed yerna a kkun-inhu di liman nwen ,
52003003	iwakken yiwen ur ifeččel di teswiɛt-agi n uqehheṛ . Teẓram belli ayagi d ayen i ɣ-ițṛaǧun .
52003004	Asmi nella yid-wen nenna-yawen yakan belli a d-yas wass i deg ara nețwaqehheṛ . Atan tura twalam belli d ayen ideṛṛun .
52003005	Imi xaqeɣ fell-awen , ur zmireɣ ara ad ṣebṛeɣ , ceggɛeɣ-awen gma tneɣ Timuti iwakken a yi-d-yawi lexbaṛ ma mazal teṭṭfem di liman nwen ; axaṭer uggadeɣ a kkun iɣuṛṛ Cciṭan , aț-țețțum ayen akk i wen-nesselmed , uggadeɣ lxedma nneɣ aț-țuɣal d ulac .
52003006	Mi d-yuɣal Timuti s ɣuṛ-wen , yewwi-yaɣ-d lexbaṛ yelhan fell-awen : iḥka-yaɣ-d amek tḍuɛem Sidi Ṛebbi , d leḥmala yellan wway gar-awen ; yenna-yaɣ-d daɣen amek i ɣ-d țmektayem , ur aɣ-tețțum ara , tḥarem melmi ara ɣ-teẓrem am akken i nxaq fell-awen ula d nukni .
52003007	Ay atmaten , ɣas akka nella di lmeḥna d iɣeblan , theddnen wulawen nneɣ ɣef wayen yeɛnan liman-nwen .
52003008	Tura yuɣal-aɣ-d ṛṛuḥ imi neẓra teṭṭfem di Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
52003009	Lfeṛḥ-nneɣ d ameqqran zdat Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef ddemma-nwen . Akken nebɣu neḥmed-it fell-awen drus .
52003010	Nețḥellil Sidi Ṛebbi am iḍ am ass , a ɣ-d-ye tagniț i deg ara kkun-nẓer , iwakken a wen-nkemmel aselmed n wayen i kkun-ixuṣṣen di liman-nwen .
52003011	Nessutur Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa a ɣ-d-ldin iberdan iwakken a n-nas ɣuṛ-wen .
52003012	Ad isnerni Ṛebbi leḥmala i tesɛam wway gar-awen , aț-țḥemmlem daɣen imdanen meṛṛa am akken i kkun nḥemmel nukni .
52003013	Ad isseǧhed Ṛebbi ulawen nwen , iwakken aț-țeṣfum , aț-țilim mbla lɛib zdat Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ i wass i deg ara d-yuɣal Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ nețța d lmalayekkat .
52004001	Ay atmaten , tlemdem s ɣuṛ-nneɣ amek ara teddum iwakken aț-țɛeǧbem i Sidi Ṛebbi ; a kkun nenhu s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ kemmlet ɣer zdat iwakken aț țimɣuṛem .
52004002	Ay atmaten teẓram belli lewṣayat i wen-nesselmed , kkant-ed s ɣuṛ Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
52004003	D ṣṣfa n wulawen-nwen i gebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi ; yebɣa aț-țḥadrem iman nwen si lefsad ,
52004004	yal yiwen deg-wen ur ițțak ara lebɣi i tnefsit-is deg wayen icemten ; ad iddu s ṣṣfa d lḥeṛma ,
52004005	ur ițmenni ara ayen icemten am akken xeddmen imejhal ur nessin ara Sidi Ṛebbi .
52004006	Deg wannect-agi ilaq yiwen ur ițkellix gma-s di tlufa yeɛnan idrimen . Acḥal n tikkal i kkun-nweṣṣa iwakken aț-țḥadrem iman-nwen axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ad yerr țțar akken i wen-t-id-nenna !
52004007	Sidi Ṛebbi ur aɣ-d-inni ara a neddu di lefsad meɛna iweṣṣa-yaɣ-d a neddu s ṣṣfa .
52004008	S wakka win ur neqbil ara lewṣayat-agi , mačči d amdan i gɛuṣa , meɛna iɛuṣa Sidi Ṛebbi i wen-d-ițțaken Ṛṛuḥ-is iqedsen .
52004009	Ɣef wayen yeɛnan tagmaț , fiḥel ma nemmeslay-awen-d fell-as , imi temyeḥmalem wway gar-awen akken i tlemdem s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
52004010	Akken daɣen i tḥemmlem atmaten yellan di tmurt n Masidunya meṛṛa . Di leɛnaya nwen ay atmaten , kemmlet deg webrid-agi .
52004011	Nadit aț-țɛicem di talwit , ur țɛassat ara d acu i xeddmen wiyaḍ . Xedmet s ifassen-nwen , ur ṭṭamaɛet ara aɣṛum-nwen deg wiyaḍ , akken i kkun-nweṣṣa yakan
52004012	iwakken a kkun-qadṛen medden ɣef ddemma n tikli nwen yeṣfan , yerna ur tețțilim ț-țaɛkumt ula i yiwen .
52004013	Ay atmaten , ur nebɣi ara a kkun-neǧǧ di ccekk ɣef wayen yeɛnan wid yemmuten , iwakken ur tețțilim ara di leḥzen am wid ur nesɛi ara asirem n leslak n Sidna Ɛisa .
52004014	Axaṭer akken numen belli Sidna Ɛisa yemmut yuɣal yeḥya-d , numen daɣen belli Sidi Ṛebbi a d-isseḥyu wid yemmuten , imi umnen s Sidna Ɛisa .
52004015	Atah wayen ara wen-d-nini akken i t-id-isselmed Ssid-nneɣ : ma yella mazal-aɣ nedder asm'ara d-yuɣal , ur nețțili ara d imezwura ɣef wid yemmuten .
52004016	Axaṭer m'ara d-iffeɣ lameṛ , m'ara d-tenṭeq taɣect n lmelk akk-d ṣṣut n lbuq n Sidi Ṛebbi , Sidna Ɛisa s yiman-is a d-iṣubb seg igenni , imiren widak-nni yemmuten , llan umnen yis , a d-ḥyun d imezwura si ger lmegtin .
52004017	Ma d nukni ma yella mazal-aɣ nedder , a nețwarfed yid-sen ɣef wusigna , a nemmager Sidna Ɛisa deg igenwan , iwakken a nili yid-es i dayem .
52004018	Ihi mseǧhadet , mṣebbaṛet wway gar-awen s yimeslayen-agi .
52005001	Ɣef wayen yeɛnan ussan akk d lweqt , fiḥel ma nura-yawen fell-asen .
52005002	Teẓram s yiman-nwen belli ass-nni , Sidna Ɛisa a d-yuɣal am umakar deg iḍ .
52005003	M'ara yinin yemdanen : « aql-aɣ di lehna ț-țalwit , » ass-nni ur țfiqen ara alamma yeɣli-d fell-asen nnger , am lewjaɛ m'ara ṭṭfen tameṭṭut yellan s tadist , yernu yiwen ur imenneɛ .
52005004	Ma d kunwi ay atmaten , ur tellim ara di ṭṭlam iwakken a d-iɣli wass-nni fell-awen am umakar ;
52005005	axaṭer kunwi d arraw n tafat , tețțeddum deg wass ; nukni ur nelli ara d arraw n ṭṭlam iteddun deg yiḍ .
52005006	Ihi ur ilaq ara a neɣfel am wiyaḍ , meɛna ilaq a nɛass iman-nneɣ yerna a nɛiwez .
52005007	Wid yegganen gganen deg yiḍ , wid iṣekkren țṣekkiren deg yiḍ .
52005008	Ma d nukni yellan d arraw n tafat , a nɛass ɣef yiman-nneɣ : a nesɛu liman d leḥmala am llebsa n wuzzal ițlusu uɛeskṛi , a nesɛu asirem n leslak , am tcacit n wuzzal ɣef wuqeṛṛuy .
52005009	Axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ur aɣ-ixtaṛ ara iwakken a nețwaɛaqeb , meɛna yebɣa a nesɛu leslak s Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
52005010	i gemmuten fell-aɣ , iwakken ama nedder ama nemmut a nili yid-es .
52005011	S wakka ihi , țemseǧhadet , țemṣebbaṛet wway gar-awen akken i txeddmem yakan .
52005012	Di leɛnaya-nwen ay atmaten , qadṛet wid iqeddcen gar-awen , axaṭer s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i kkun nehhun , i kkun-sselmaden .
52005013	Ɛuzzet țen tḥemmlem-ten ɣef ddemma n lxedma-nsen , ɛicet di lehna wway gar-awen .
52005014	Di leɛnaya-nwen ay atmaten : nhut wid iteddun s yir tikli , ṣebbṛet wid iwumi ɣlin ifadden , refdet wid ifeclen , swesɛet ulawen-nwen ɣuṛ-sen meṛṛa .
52005015	Ḥadret iman-nwen ur țțarat ara țțaṛ , qellbet ɣef wayen yelhan ama gar-awen ama ɣer imdanen meṛṛa .
52005016	Ilit dayem di lfeṛḥ ,
52005017	yal ass deɛɛut ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ,
52005018	ḥemmdet-eț ɣef kullec . D ayagi i gețṛaǧu Sidi Ṛebbi deg-wen , di tikli-nwen akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
52005019	Ur snusut ara tafat n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ;
52005020	ur ḥeqqṛet ara ayen i d-ițweḥḥi Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i yemdanen .
52005021	Meɛna meyzet , qeblet ayen yelhan ,
52005022	ḥadret iman-nwen ɣef wayen n diri .
52005023	Sidi Ṛebbi bab n talwit , ad iṣeffi ṛṛuḥ-nwen , lǧețțat nwen ț-țeṛwiḥin-nwen , iwakken aț țeqqimem d izedganen i wass i deg ara d-yuɣal Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
52005024	Win i kkun-ixtaṛen , deg-s laman , d nețța ara kkun-iṣṣiwden ɣer wannect agi .
52005025	Ay atmaten , deɛɛut ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi fell-aneɣ .
52005026	Sṣiwḍet sslam-iw i watmaten meṛṛa .
52005027	Di leɛnaya-nwen , s yisem n Ssid-nneɣ , sseɣṛet tabṛaț-agi i watmaten meṛṛa .
52005028	Ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ a d-ters fell-awen .
53001001	Nekk Bulus , Silwan akk-d Timuti , i tejmaɛt n watmaten n temdint n Tiṣalunik yumnen s Sidi Ṛebbi d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
53001002	Ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
53001003	Ay atmaten eɛzizen , imi liman-nwen simmal yețnerni , simmal tețțemyeḥmalem wway gar-awen , eɛni mačči d lḥeqq ma nețḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen am iḍ am ass ?
53001004	Newweḍ armi nețzuxxu yis-wen di yal tajmaɛt n watmaten , nețțawi-kkun d lemtel axaṭer ɣas akken tenneɛtabem tețwaqehṛem , tṣebrem , teṭṭfem di liman-nwen .
53001005	Sidi Ṛebbi d bab n lḥeqq , ma yella iɛemmed aț-țenneɛtabem akkagi , yebɣa a kkun-yerr d wid yuklalen tagelda-ines ; ț-țagelda-agi i ɣef tenneɛtabem .
53001006	Axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yellan d Bab n lḥeqq , a d-yerr leqheṛ ɣef wid i kkun-ițqehhiṛen ,
53001007	a kkun-iṣebber yid-nneɣ , kunwi yețwaqehṛen . Ayagi a d-idṛu asm'ara d-yuɣal Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , m'ara d-iṣubb seg igenwan nețța d lmalayekkat-is
53001008	di tlemmast n uḥeǧǧaǧu n tmes iwakken ad iɛaqeb wid iɛuṣan Sidi Ṛebbi , ur neqbil ara lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Sidna Ɛisa .
53001009	Lɛiqab ara ten-id-yasen , ț-țawaɣit ur nețfaka , Sidi Ṛebbi a ten-iḥeṛṛem ɣef udem-is , ur țwalin ara lɛaḍima-s .
53001010	Ayagi a d-idṛu asm'ara d-yas Sidna Ɛisa ; ass-nni wid yumnen yis ad tɛeǧǧben deg-s , a t-ḥemden m'ara t-walin di lɛaḍima-s ! Ula d kunwi aț-țilim gar-asen axaṭer tumnem s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wen-nbecceṛ .
53001011	? ef ayagi i ndeɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen am iḍ am ass , iwakken a kkun-yerr d wid yuklalen tudert i ɣer wen-d-issawel . Nessutur-as daɣen a wen-d-i tazmert , iwakken aț-țxedmem ayen akken tessaramem n wayen yelhan , yerna ad ibarek lecɣal txeddmem deg webrid n Sidna Ɛisa .
53001012	S wakka imdanen ad ḥemden isem-is ɣef ddemma n tikli-nwen yelhan , kunwi daɣen aț-țwaɛuzzem s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
53002001	? ef wayen yeɛnan tuɣalin n Ssid nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ț-țemlilit-nneɣ yid-es , di leɛnaya-nwen ay atmaten :
53002002	ḥadret a kkun-iffeɣ leɛqel neɣ a wen-ikcem ukukru , ma yella win i wen-d-yennan belli ass n tuɣalin n Sidna Ɛisa yewweḍ-ed ; yezmer lḥal ad yili win i wen-t-id-yennan neɣ win i t-iwalan deg uweḥḥi , neɣ daɣen a wen-arun tabṛaț am akken d nukni i wen-țin-yuran .
53002003	Akken yebɣu yili lḥal ur țțaǧat yiwen a kkun-ikellex , axaṭer ass-nni ur d-ițaweḍ ara uqbel ussan n tijehli , uqbel a d-iban wemcum ijehlen i gețṛaǧu nnger .
53002004	Win akken ara yessimɣuṛen iman is sennig wayen meṛṛa iɛebbden yemdanen , ad yekcem ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen n Ṛebbi ad yerr iman-is deg wemkan n Ṛebbi . f+
53002005	Ur tecfim ara belli xebbṛeɣ kkun id yakan ɣef ayagi asm'akken lliɣ yid-wen ?
53002006	Teẓram acu i t-iṭṭfen ur d-ițban ara tura alamma yewweḍ-ed lweqt-is !
53002007	Tazmert n cceṛ yellan d lbaḍna , tebda ccɣel-is , ilaq kan ayen i ț-iṭṭfen ar tura ad ițwakkes .
53002008	Imiren amcum-nni amejhul a d-ban , dɣa Sidna Ɛisa a t-iṣuḍ s nnefs-is a t-issenger , a t-imḥu s ufeǧǧeǧ n lɛaḍima-s asm'ara d-yuɣal .
53002009	Amcum-agi amejhul a d-yas s tezmert n Cciṭan , ad ixdem leɛǧubat d lbeṛhanat s wayes ara ikellex ,
53002010	ad issexdem lekdeb d lbaṭel iwakken ad ikellex wid iḍaɛen , axaṭer ur qbilen ara leḥmala n tideț s wayes ara țwaselken .
53002011	Daymi Sidi Ṛebbi iceggeɛ-asen-d tazmert n ṭṭlam aț-țexdem deg-sen , iwakken ad amnen s wayen yellan d lekdeb .
53002012	S wakka wid akk ur numin ara s tideț , ad țțuɛaqben imi țțafen lfeṛḥ-nsen anagar di lbaṭel .
53002013	Ay atmaten ɛzizen ɣer Ṛebbi , ilaq-aɣ a nețḥemmid kull ass Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen , axaṭer ixtaṛ-ikkun d imezwura iwakken aț-țețțusellkem s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i kkun-iṣeffan s liman di tideț .
53002014	Sidi Ṛebbi issawel-awen-d aț țekkim di tmanegt n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , s lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ i wen-d newwi .
53002015	Ihi ay atmaten ḥerzet , ṭṭfet deg uselmed i wen-d-newwi , ama s yimi nneɣ ama s tebṛatin-nneɣ .
53002016	Nessutur di Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi i ɣ-iḥemmlen , i ɣ-d-ifkan s ṛṛeḥma ines ṣṣbeṛ d usirem ițdumun ,
53002017	ad țțuṣebbṛen wulawen-nwen , a wen-d-tețțune tezmert s wayes ara txeddmem anagar ayen yelhan ama di lecɣal-nwen ama deg imeslayen-nwen .
53003001	? ef wayen nniḍen ay atmaten , dɛut Sidi Ṛebbi fell-aneɣ iwakken awal-is ad ițțubecceṛ , ad yaweḍ ɣer yal amkan , ad ițwaɛuzz am akken i t-tɛuzzem kunwi .
53003002	Dɛut daɣen iwakken a ɣ-isellek si ger ifassen n yemcumen i ɣ-ibɣan cceṛ , axaṭer llan wid ur nețțamen ara .
53003003	Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi d bab n lețkal , a kkun-isseǧhed , a kkun iḥader ɣef wemcum .
53003004	Nesɛa laman ɣuṛ-es fell-awen belli txeddmem yerna aț-țkemlem aț-țxedmem ayen i ɣef i kkun-nweṣṣa .
53003005	Ndeɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ad iččaṛ ulawen-nwen s leḥmala-ines , iwakken aț-țesɛum ṣṣbeṛ n Lmasiḥ . f+
53003006	Ay atmaten a kkun-nenhu s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ : sbeɛdet iman-nwen ɣef atmaten imeɛdazen , ițɛicin akken bɣan , mačči am akken i wen-t-nesselmed .
53003007	Teẓram s yiman nwen amek i glaq a ɣ-tɛandem , axaṭer nukni ur nɛac ara deg ussexṛeb asmi nella yid-wen .
53003008	Ur neḍmiɛ ula deg yiwen aɣṛum-nneɣ , lameɛna nețɛețțib iman-nneɣ di lxedma iḍ d wass , iwakken ur nețțili ț-țaɛekkumt ula i yiwen .
53003009	Yerna lemmer nessuter-awen a ɣ-tɛiwnem , d lḥeqq fell-aɣ ; meɛna nexdem akkenni iwakken a wen-nili d lemtel .
53003010	Asmi nella gar-awen nweṣṣa kkun belli « win ur nebɣi ara ad ixdem ur ilaq ara ad yečč . »
53003011	Axaṭer nesla belli llan gar-awen imeɛdazen ur nebɣi ara ad xedmen meɛna ggaren iman-nsen di lecɣal i ten-ixḍan .
53003012	Imdanen-agi a ten-nweṣṣi s yisem n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ : ad xedmen akken ilaq iwakken a d-ḥeṛṛen aɣṛum nsen .
53003013	Ma d kunwi ay atmaten xedmet lxiṛ , ur ɛeggut ara !
53003014	Win ur neqbil ara ayen i d-nenna di tebṛaț-agi , jebdet iman-nwen fell-as , ur țeddut ara yid-es iwakken ad inneḥcam , ad issetḥi .
53003015	Ur t-ḥețțbet ara d aɛdaw , meɛna nhut-eț am yiwen seg watmaten-nwen .
53003016	Nessutur di Sidi Ṛebbi bab n talwit a wen-d-ye lehna kull ass , di yal tagniț ! Sidi Ṛebbi ad yili yid-wen meṛṛa !
53003017	Nekk Bulus , uriɣ-awen sslam-agi s ufus-iw , ț-țagi i ț-țira-inu di yal tabṛaț i wen-ceggɛeɣ .
53003018	Ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ a d-ters fell-awen meṛṛa !
54001001	Nekk Bulus amceggeɛ n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi amsellek-nneɣ akk-d lebɣi n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i deg yella usirem-nneɣ ,
54001002	i gma-tneɣ Timuti f+ i d-ṛebbaɣ di liman am mmi n tideț , lbaṛaka , ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a k-d-țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi Baba-tneɣ akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ .
54001003	Akken i k-nhiɣ uqbel ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer tmurt n Masidunya qqim di temdint n Ifasus f+ iwakken ur tețțaǧǧaḍ ara kra n yemdanen ad slemden ayen i gxulfen tikli di liman ,
54001004	ini-asen ad xḍun i tmucuha f+ d umeslay n zzux ɣef yizuṛan n tjaddit ur nețfaka , ayagi yețțawi-d lehduṛ ur nesɛi lfayda i ɣ-issebɛaden ɣef liman d lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi .
54001005	A sen-tiniḍ annect-agi iwakken a d-tessakiḍ deg wulawen-nsen leḥmala yeṣfan , ad ithedden lxaṭer-nsen yerna ad sɛun liman n tideț ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
54001006	Llan kra n yemdanen ffɣen i webrid , țmeslayen kan ɣef wayen ur nesɛi lmeɛna .
54001007	Bɣan ad slemden i wiyaḍ ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi , nutni s yiman-nsen ur fhimen d acu i d qqaṛen ur fhimen ayen i sselmaden .
54001008	Neẓra belli ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi d ayen yelhan ma yella netbeɛ-iț akken ilaq ,
54001009	meɛna ilaq daɣen a nẓer belli ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi ur d-tețțune ara ɣef ddemma n iḥeqqiyen meɛna tețțunefk-ed ɣef ddemma n yemcumen , i wid iɛuṣan Ṛebbi , i imejhal , i imednuben akk-d wid ur nețțak ara lqima i wayen iqedsen , wid ur nețqadaṛ ara Ṛebbi , wid ineqqen imawlan-nsen akk-d iqettalen ,
54001010	i wid yeffɣen i webrid , i wat lɛaṛ , i wid itjaṛen deg waklan akk-d i ikeddaben , i wid ur nețțaṭṭaf ara deg wawal-nsen neɣ wid yețxalafen aselmed n tideț i wen-d yețțunefken .
54001011	Akka i gella di lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i yi-d-ițțunefken , i d-isbegginen tamanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi ameɣlal .
54001012	Ad ḥemdeɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ i yi-isǧehden , i yi-fkan laman iwakken ad iliɣ d aqeddac-is , yextaṛ-iyi-d ad iliɣ d aqeddac-is
54001013	ɣas akken zik regmeɣ-t yerna qehṛeɣ wid yumnen yis . Meɛna iɛfa-yi axaṭer imiren ur ẓriɣ ara d acu xeddmeɣ imi mazal ur sɛiɣ ara liman deg ul-iw .
54001014	Tura ṛṛeḥma-s tameqqrant ters-ed fell-i s liman d leḥmala yellan deg-s .
54001015	Awal-agi d awal n tideț yuklalen ad ițwaqbel s lekmal-is : « Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yusa-d ɣer ddunit iwakken ad isellek imednuben » .
54001016	Iḥunn-ed fell-i nekk yellan d amednub ameqqran iwakken a d-isbeggen ṛṛeḥma-s yerna ad iliɣ d lemtel sya ɣer zdat i wid ara yamnen yis ad sɛun tudert n dayem .
54001017	I ugellid n dayem , ameɣlal ur țwalint wallen , win yellan d yiwen , i nețța tamanegt d lɛezz si lǧil ɣer lǧil ! Amin !
54001018	A Timuti a mmi , a k-weṣṣiɣ ɣef wayen i d-caren fell-ak s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi si zik . Eṭṭef deg imeslayen-nni , sseǧhed iman-ik di liman s wul yeṣfan tedduḍ akken ilaq ,
54001019	axaṭer kra n yemdanen nniḍen wexxṛen i tikli yeṣfan armi i sṛuḥen liman-nsen .
54001020	Llan gar-asen ? imni d Alixandru f+ sellmeɣ-ten i Cciṭan iwakken ad ẓren amek i tdeṛṛu d wid ireggmen Sidi Ṛebbi .
54002001	Ayen i ɣef ara kkun-weṣṣiɣ di tazwara , ḥemmdet cekkṛet Sidi Ṛebbi , ssuturet di tẓallit , deɛɛut ɣuṛ-es ɣef yemdanen meṛṛa .
54002002	Deɛɛut ɣef yigelliden d wid akk yeṭṭfen imukan n lḥekma iwakken a nɛic di lisser ț-țalwit , a nḍuɛ Sidi Ṛebbi s lḥeṛma d leqdeṛ .
54002003	Ayagi d ayen yelhan , d ayen iɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi amsellek-nneɣ ,
54002004	axaṭer yebɣa imdanen meṛṛa ad issinen tideț yerna ad țțuselken .
54002005	Yiwen n Ṛebbi i gellan , yiwen umcafeɛ daɣen i gellan ger yemdanen d Ṛebbi ; amcafeɛ-agi , d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
54002006	i gefkan iman-is d asfel i leslak n yemdanen meṛṛa . D wagi i d țțbut i d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi di lweqt-is ;
54002007	daymi i d-țțuceggɛeɣ iwakken ad beccṛeɣ , ad slemdeɣ i leǧnas ibeṛṛaniyen ayen yeɛnan liman ț-țideț . Ayen akka i d-qqaṛeɣ ț-țideț mačči d lekdeb .
54002008	Bɣiɣ ihi ad ilin di mkul amkan yergazen ireffden ifassen ɣer Ṛebbi s wul yeṣfan , mbla lɣecc d yir axemmem .
54002009	Akken daɣen i glaq ad xedment tilawin , ad ilint s llebsa isseṭren , ad sɛunt lḥeṛma d neyya , ur țzewwiqent acebbub-nsent , ur țcebbiḥent iman-nsent s ddheb , s tɛeqcin akk-d llebsa ifazen ,
54002010	meɛna ad cebbḥent iman-nsent s lecɣal yelhan , akken ilaq ad xedment tilawin yețḍuɛun Sidi Ṛebbi .
54002011	Ilaq-as i tmeṭṭut aț-țḥesses i uselmed s tsusmi d wannuz .
54002012	Ur qebbleɣ ara aț-țesselmed tmeṭṭut neɣ aț-țdebbeṛ ɣef wergaz meɛna aț-țețsusum ( ur d-teggar ara iman-is ) .
54002013	Axaṭer d Adem i d-yețwaxelqen d amezwaru d wamek i d-terna ? ewwa ; f+
54002014	mačči d Adem i geɣwa Cciṭan meɛna d ? ewwa i wumi ikellex f+ armi i tɛuṣṣa Sidi Ṛebbi ,
54002015	lameɛna aț-țețțusellek s tarwa-s f+ ma tețțeddu s ṣṣfa d neyya di liman d leḥmala .
54003001	? - țideț mi qqaṛen : « ma yella win yebɣan ad yuɣal d amdebbeṛ di tejmaɛt d ayen yelhan i gețmenni » .
54003002	Lameɛna amdebbeṛ di tejmaɛt ur ilaq ara ad afen deg-s lɣaci wayen ara s-d-ssukksen , ilaq ad yesɛu yiwet n tmeṭṭut kan , ad yili d win iḥekkmen deg iman-is , d aɛeqli , d win iteddun s ṣṣwab . Ilaq ad yili d win yesṭerḥiben deg wexxam-is , d win izemren ad isselmed awal n Ṛebbi ;
54003003	ur yețțili ara d asekṛan neɣ d amčaqlal meɛna ad yili d aḥnin d imhenni . Ur ilaq ara ad iḥemmel idrimen ;
54003004	ilaq daɣen ad yissin amek ara idebbeṛ ɣef wexxam-is , arraw-is ad ilin d wid yețțaɣen awal yerna a t-țqadaṛen .
54003005	Axaṭer ma yella walebɛaḍ ur yezmir ara ad idebbeṛ ɣef wexxam is , amek ara idebbeṛ di tejmaɛt n Sidi Ṛebbi ?
54003006	Amdebbeṛ di tejmaɛt ur ilaq ara ad yili d ajdid di liman di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , m'ulac a t-yekcem zzux , aț-țedṛu yid-es akken tedṛa d Cciṭan . f+
54003007	Ilaq ula d wid ur numin ara s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ a d-cehden fell-as s lxiṛ ur țțafen ara deg-s wayen ara s-d ssukksen , iwakken ur iɣelli ara di tecṛektin n Cciṭan .
54003008	Iqeddacen n tejmaɛt daɣen ilaq ad sɛun leqdeṛ , ad ilin d irgazen iteṭṭfen deg awal-nsen , ad xḍun i tissit n ccṛab akk-d rrbeḥ n lexdeɛ .
54003009	Ilaq ad ḥerzen s wul yeṣfan lbaḍna n liman i d-yețwakecfen .
54003010	Ilaq ula d nutni ad țwajeṛben di leqdic-nsen , m'ur ufin ara ayen ara sen-d-ssukksen imiren zemren ad qedcen di tejmaɛt .
54003011	Ula ț-țiqeddacin n tejmaɛt ilaq ad sɛunt lḥeṛma , ur țmeslayent ara cceṛ ɣef wiyaḍ , ad ilint ț-țiɛeqliyin , ț-țid i ɣef yella lețkal ɣef kullec .
54003012	Iqeddacen n tejmaɛt ilaq ad sɛun yiwet n tmeṭṭut kan yerna ad ḍebbṛen ɣef yexxamen-nsen d warraw-nsen akken ilaq .
54003013	Axaṭer wid iqeddcen ɣef tejmaɛt akken ilaq , ad yali leqdeṛ-nsen ad nnernin di liman yerna ad sɛun lețkal d ameqqran di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
54003014	Uriɣ-ak-n meṛṛa annect-agi ɣas akken ssarameɣ a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-ek ,
54003015	iwakken ma ɛeṭṭleɣ ur n-usiɣ ara aț-țissineḍ amek i glaq aț-țedduḍ deg wexxam n Sidi Ṛebbi i gellan ț-țajmaɛt n Ṛebbi yeddren . Tajmaɛt-agi , ț-țigejdit i ɣef ters tideț .
54003016	S tideț acḥal meqqṛet lbaḍna n Lmasiḥ yellan d sebba n liman-nneɣ : win akken i d-yusan s ṣṣifa n wemdan , i ɣef d-icehhed Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , tɛeǧǧbent deg-s lmalayekkat , yețwabecceṛ i leǧnas , umnen yis di ddunit meṛṛa , yețwarfed s tmanegt tameqqrant ɣer igenwan .
54004001	Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ixebbeṛ-ed ɛinani belli deg ussan ineggura , aṭas ara iwexxṛen ɣef liman di Lmasiḥ , ad tebɛen wid i ten-ițɣuṛṛun s uselmed i d-yețțasen s ɣuṛ leǧnun .
54004002	A ten-ɣuṛṛen wat sin wudmawen yețbecciṛen lekdeb , wid iwumi yemmut wul am akken yețwaqqed s useffud .
54004003	Imdanen-agi bɣan ad ḥeṛṛmen zzwaǧ akk-d kra n leṣnaf n lmakla , lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ixleq-ed kullec iwakken wid yumnen yis yessnen tideț , a t-ḥemden a t-cekkṛen .
54004004	Ayen akk i d-ixleq Sidi Ṛebbi yelha , ur ilaq ara a nerr kra di rrif , acu kan ilaq a t-ncekkeṛ ɣef wayen i ɣ-d-ițțak ,
54004005	axaṭer ayen akk i d yețwaxelqen iṣeffu-t wawal n Ṛebbi akk-d țẓallit .
54004006	Ssefhem-asen ayagi i watmaten iwakken aț-țiliḍ d aqeddac yelhan n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , sseǧhed iman-ik di liman s wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi d uselmed n tideț i ttebɛeḍ s wul yeṣfan .
54004007	Ma ț-țimucuha n temɣaṛin ur nesɛi ara lmeɛna i gxulfen liman , ḍeggeṛ-itent akkin fell-ak . Issin amek ara telḥuḍ deg ubrid n Sidi Ṛebbi .
54004008	Tazzla deg wannar d ayen yelhan meɛna tenfeɛ i lǧețța kan , ma ṭṭaɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi tenfeɛ i kullec axaṭer deg-s i tella tudert n tura akk-d ț-țin i d-iteddun i ɣ-iwɛed Sidi Ṛebbi .
54004009	Awal-agi d awal n tideț yuklalen ad ițwaqbel ɣer yemdanen meṛṛa .
54004010	Ma d nukni nețɛețțib iman-nneɣ iwakken a neǧhed di liman , imi nețkel ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ yeddren yellan d amsellek n yemdanen meṛṛa abeɛda wid yumnen yis .
54004011	Atan wayen i ɣef ara tweṣṣiḍ imdanen d wayen ara sen-teslemḍeḍ .
54004012	? uṛ-ek a k-iḥqeṛ yiwen imi meẓẓiyeḍ di leɛmeṛ , meɛna ili-k d lemtel ger wid yumnen s yimeslayen-ik , s tikli-inek , s leḥmala-inek , s liman-inek ț-țezdeg n wul-ik .
54004013	Sɛedday lweqt-ik di leqṛaya d ubecceṛ d uselmed n wawal n Ṛebbi i wiyaḍ , alamma usiɣ-en .
54004014	Ur țțaǧa ara di rrif tikci i k-d-ițțunefken s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi d yimeslayen s wayes i d-caren fell-ak di tejmaɛt mi ssersen ifassen-nsen fell-ak imeqqranen n tejmaɛt .
54004015	Err ddehn-ik ɣer wayagi txedmeḍ-t akken ilaq , iwakken imdanen meṛṛa ad walin amek i tețnerniḍ di tikli-inek di Lmasiḥ .
54004016	? ader ɣef yiman-ik d wayen i tesselmadeḍ i wiyaḍ , ma tkemmleḍ akken , d leslak ara d-tawiḍ i keččini akk-d wid i k-yesmeḥsisen .
54005001	Ur țlummu ara ɣef wemɣaṛ s leɛyaḍ , meɛna nhu-t am akken d baba-k ; enhu daɣen ilmeẓyen am akken d atmaten-ik ,
54005002	tamɣaṛt am yemma-k , tilmeẓyin am yessetma-k , s wul yeṣfan .
54005003	Qadeṛ tuǧǧal f+ telhuḍ ț-țid yeḥwaǧen lemɛawna .
54005004	Ma ț-țid yesɛan dderya neɣ dderya n warraw-nsent , ilaq d nutni ara d-yelhun yid-sent , akka ara d-sbeggnen ṭṭaɛa-nsen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi m'ara rren lxiṛ i imawlan-nsen , ayagi d ayen i gɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi .
54005005	Taǧǧalt i gellan weḥd-es ur nesɛi win ara ț-țirefden tețkel ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi tdeɛɛu ɣuṛ-es tețḥellil-it am yiḍ am ass .
54005006	Ma ț-țaǧǧalt yeṭṭafaṛen zzhu n ddunit , tinna temmut ɣas mazal-iț tedder .
54005007	Atah wayen i ɣef ara tweṣṣiḍ tuǧǧal iwakken ur d-yețțili ara wayen ara sent-d-ssukksen .
54005008	Ma yella win ur nɛawen ara at wexxam-is abeɛda imawlan-is , atan yeǧǧa liman , yuɣal akteṛ n win ijehlen .
54005009	Taǧǧalt ilaq aț-țesɛu sețțin n iseggasen di leɛmeṛ-is iwakken a ț-tɛawen tejmaɛt , ilaq aț-țili tezweǧ yiwet n tikkelt kan .
54005010	Ilaq aț-țili tețwassen s lecɣal-is yelhan , ț-țin iṛebban arraw-is akken ilaq , isṭerḥiben deg wexxam-is , issarden iḍaṛṛen n iqeddacen n Sidi Ṛebbi ; treffed imeɣban , txeddem lxiṛ .
54005011	Meɛna ur qebbel ara i tejmaɛt aț-țɛawen tuǧǧal meẓẓiyen di leɛmeṛ , axaṭer m'ara bɣunt ad ɛawdent zzwaǧ zemrent ad ǧǧent abrid n Lmasiḥ ;
54005012	s wakka ad xedɛent lɛahed-nni i fkant i Sidi Ṛebbi .
54005013	Yerna m'ur sɛint ara ayen ara xedment , ad țcalint seg wexxam ɣer wayeḍ mačči kan imi ur sɛint ara ccɣel , meɛna ad kettṛent deg yimeslayen ur nesɛi lmeɛna , ad ggarent iman-nsent deg wayen i tent-yexḍan .
54005014	Ihi bɣiɣ ad nhuɣ tuǧǧal meẓẓiyen di leɛmeṛ ad ɛawdent zzwaǧ , ad sɛunt dderya , ad lhint d yexxam-nsent iwakken iɛdawen ur țțafen ara ayen n diri ara hedṛen fell-asent .
54005015	Axaṭer llant seg-sent tid i geffɣen i webrid n Ṛebbi tebɛent abrid n Cciṭan .
54005016	Ma tella tin yumnen tesɛa tuǧǧal i s-yețțilin , d nețțat i glaq a tent tɛiwen iwakken ur țțilint ara ț țaɛkumt i tejmaɛt , akken daɣen tajmaɛt aț-țizmir aț-țɛiwen tid ur nesɛi ara win ara tent-irefden .
54005017	Imdebbṛen n tejmaɛt ixeddmen ccɣel-nsen akken ilaq uklalen ad țwaxelṣen s zzyada abeɛda wid yenneɛtaben deg ubecceṛ d uselmed .
54005018	Axaṭer tira iqedsen nnant-ed : Ur țțara ara takmamt i wezger yesserwaten , f+ yura daɣen : Axeddam yuklal lexlaṣ-is . f+
54005019	Ur qebbel ara win ara iccetkin ɣef wemdebbeṛ n tejmaɛt anagar ma ḥedṛen sin neɣ tlata inagan ara d-icehden fell-as .
54005020	Ma d wid idenben , lumm-iten zdat medden meṛṛa iwakken ula d wiyaḍ ad aggaden .
54005021	Di leɛnaya-k ɣef wudem n Ṛebbi d Sid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d lmalayekkat yețwaxtaṛen , deg wannect-agi meṛṛa ur xeddem ara lxilaf ger yemdanen .
54005022	Ur țɣawal ara aț-țesserseḍ ifassen ɣef yiwen , ur țekki ara di ddnubat n wiyaḍ ; ḥader iman-ik , qqim d azedgan .
54005023	? ef ddemma n weqṛaḥ n tɛebbuṭ-ik i k-issefcalen , ur tess ara kan aman lameɛna sew ciṭṭuḥ n ccṛab .
54005024	Llan kra n yemdanen ddnubat-nsen țbanen-d uqbel ad țțuḥasben , llan wiyaḍ ddnubat-nsen ur d-țbanen ara imiren kan .
54005025	Akken daɣen i d-țbanen lecɣal lɛali , ma d lecɣal n diri ur zmiren ara ad qqimen ffren .
54006001	Wid yellan d aklan yumnen s Lmasiḥ ilaq ad ẓren belli imɛellmen-nsen uklalen leqdeṛ , iwakken ur ițwargam f+ ara yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi , ur kkaten ara medden deg wayen i nesselmad .
54006002	Wid yesɛan imɛellmen i gețțamnen s Lmasiḥ ur ilaq ara ad kksen fell-asen leqdeṛ imi d atmaten-nsen i llan , lameɛna ad qedcen fell-asen seg ul imi d wid yumnen s Lmasiḥ , d wid eɛzizen ara yesfayden si leqdic-nsen . Atah wayen ara tweṣṣiḍ d wayen ara teslemdeḍ :
54006003	win ara yeslemden ayen ixulfen liman-nneɣ , ur neqbil ara awal imqeddes n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ,
54006004	yeččuṛ d zzux ur yessin kra ; iḥemmel ad ikețțeṛ awal , yețnaɣ ɣef ddemma n yimeslayen . Seg wannect-agi i d-itekk umennuɣ , tismin , lekfeṛ d ccekk ,
54006005	imeslayen nsen ur țfakan ara axaṭer ččuṛen s yir ixemmimen teɛṛeq-asen tideț , ɣilen s ṭṭaɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi ara uɣalen d imeṛkantiyen .
54006006	? - țideț abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi yețțawi-d rrbeḥ ameqqran , meɛna ma yella nesteqniɛ s wayen nesɛa .
54006007	Axaṭer ur d-newwi yid-nneɣ acemma ɣer ddunit , akken daɣen ur nezmir a nawi acemma yid-nneɣ m'ara nemmet .
54006008	Ihi ma yella nesɛa ayen ara nečč d wayen ara nels , ilaq a nesteqneɛ .
54006009	Ma d wid yettabaɛen cci n ddunit ɣellin deg ujeṛṛeb akk-d tfextin n yir ccehwat n tnefsit-nsen , i gețțawin imdanen ɣer txeṣṣart akk-d nnger .
54006010	Axaṭer ṭṭmeɛ n idrimen d sebba n kra n wayen yellan diri-t . Llan kra i gtebɛen cci-yagi n ddunit , ffɣen i webrid n Lmasiḥ , ḍuṛṛen tiṛwiḥin nsen , sseɣlin-d lhemm ɣef yiman nsen .
54006011	Ma d kečč ay aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi ssebɛed iman-ik ɣef wannect agi meṛṛa , nadi ɣef lḥeqq d ṭṭaɛa , liman , lmaḥibba , ṣṣbeṛ d wannuz .
54006012	Sseǧhed iman-ik deg umenɣi ɣef liman , eṭṭef di tudert n dayem i ɣer k-d-issawel Sidi Ṛebbi , asm'akken i d-cehdeḍ s wayen tumneḍ zdat yemdanen meṛṛa .
54006013	A k-weṣṣiɣ zdat Sidi Ṛebbi i d-yețțaken tudert , zdat Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i gcehden ɣef liman akken ilaq zdat Bunṭus Bilaṭus .
54006014	Tbeɛ lewṣayat-agi , iwakken aț-țeqqimeḍ d azedgan , ur a k-d-issukus yiwen kra alamma d ass n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
54006015	ara d-yuɣalen di lweqt i d-ihegga Sidi Ṛebbi awḥid Bab n tezmert , Agellid n igelliden d Ssid n ssyadi ,
54006016	win yeddren i dayem , i gellan di tafat ur yezmir yiwen aț-țyaweḍ , ulac win i t-iwalan neɣ i gzemren a t-iwali . I nețța tamanegt ț-țezmert i dayem ! Amin .
54006017	Weṣṣi imeṛkantiyen n ddunit-agi iwakken ur ssemɣaṛen ara iman-nsen , ur țkalayen ara ɣef cci n ddunit ur nesɛi laman , meɛna ad țeklen ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-d-ițțaken lxiṛ s tugeț iwakken a nili di lfeṛḥ .
54006018	Weṣṣi-ten ad xeddmen lxiṛ , ad ilin d imeṛkantiyen s lecɣal lɛali , ad țseddiqen mbla cceḥḥa , ad bḍun d wiyaḍ ayen sɛan .
54006019	S wakka , ad jemɛen i yiman-nsen agerruj yelhan i wussan i d-iteddun iwakken ad sɛun tudert n tideț .
54006020	A Timuti eɛzizen , eḥrez ayen i tlemdeḍ , ssebɛed iman-ik ɣef yimeslayen ur nesɛi lmeɛna , ɣef yimennuɣen yeɛnan tamusni n lekdeb .
54006021	Wid i gtebɛen tamusni-agi , sṛuḥen liman-nni i sɛan di Lmasiḥ . Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țili yid-wen !
55001001	Nekk Bulus aqeddac n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi , țwaceggɛeɣ ad beccṛeɣ tudert i ɣ-iwɛed Sidi Ṛebbi di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
55001002	A Timuti a mmi eɛzizen : leɛfu , ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a k-d-țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ .
55001003	? ḥemmideɣ Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣef qeddceɣ s wul yeṣfan akken qedcen fell-as lejdud-iw , deɛɛuɣ fell-ak am yiḍ am ass ;
55001004	m'ara d-mmektiɣ imeṭṭawen-ik , țḥiriɣ melmi ara k-ẓreɣ iwakken ad iliɣ di lfeṛḥ .
55001005	? mektayeɣ-ed neyya-nni i tesɛiḍ di liman , akken i ț-tesɛa sețți-k Luiza akk-d yemma-k Anisa ; tḥeqqeqeɣ belli ar ass-a mazal-iț deg wul-ik .
55001006	Daymi bɣiɣ a k-weṣṣiɣ a d tessakiḍ tikci-nni i k-d-yețțunefken s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi asm'akken i sserseɣ ifassen-iw fell-ak .
55001007	Axaṭer mačči d Ṛṛuḥ n ukukru i ɣ-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi meɛna d Ṛṛuḥ yeččuṛen ț-țazmert d leḥmala akk-d leɛqel .
55001008	Ihi ur țsetḥi ara aț-țcehdeḍ ɣef Ssid-nneɣ , ur țsetḥi ara daɣen yis-i nekk yellan d ameḥbus ɣef ddemma-s . Meɛna eqbel leɛtab yid-i ɣef ddemma n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , țkel ɣef tezmert i d-yețțak Sidi Ṛebbi .
55001009	D nețța i ɣ-isellken , i ɣ-d-issawlen ɣer tudert iqedsen , ayagi mačči ɣef ddemma n lecɣal-nneɣ meɛna d nețța i gebɣan s ṛṛeḥma-ines i ɣ-d yețțunefken s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ uqbel a d-texleq ddunit .
55001010	Ṛṛeḥma-agi tban-ed tura s tisin n wemsellek-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , i gɣelben lmut , ibeggen-ed tafat n tudert ur nețfaka s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ .
55001011	? ef ddemma n lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ i d-țțucegɛeɣ d ṛṛasul iwakken ad beccṛeɣ , ad slemdeɣ .
55001012	Daymi i țenɛețțabeɣ tura , meɛna ur ssetḥaɣ ara axaṭer ẓriɣ anwa s wayes umneɣ , yerna țekleɣ fell-as yesɛa tazmert ad yeḥrez ayen akken i ɣef iyi-iwekkel alamma d ass n tuɣalin-is .
55001013	? rez imeslayen iqedsen i tlemdeḍ s ɣuṛ-i , eddu yis-sen s liman d leḥmala i nesɛa di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
55001014	? rez mliḥ deg ul-ik ayen akken i tlemḍeḍ , s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i gzedɣen deg-nneɣ .
55001015	Teẓriḍ belli wid akk yellan yid-i di tmurt n Asya ǧǧan-iyi weḥd-i , llan gar-asen Figilus d ? irmujinus .
55001016	Ad ibarek Sidi Ṛebbi axxam n gma-tneɣ Unisifur axaṭer daymen yețṣebbiṛ-iyi , ur yessetḥa ara yis-i imi di lḥebs i lliɣ ;
55001017	lameɛna akken kan i d-yusa ɣer temdint n Ṛuma inuda fell-i armi i yi-yufa .
55001018	Teẓriḍ acḥal i yi-iɛawen asmi lliɣ di temdint n Ifasus . A d-yessers Ṛebbi fell-as ṛṛeḥma-s deg ass n tuɣalin n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
55002001	Ihi kečč a mmi , sseǧhed iman-ik s ṛṛeḥma i gellan di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
55002002	Ayen tesliḍ s ɣuṛ-i zdat waṭas inigan , sseḥfeḍ-it i wid yeṭṭfen di liman di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ iwakken nutni daɣen ad izmiren a t-slemden i wiyaḍ .
55002003	Awi amur-ik n leɛtab am uɛsekṛi n Lmasiḥ .
55002004	Aɛsekṛi i gebɣan ad yeɛǧeb i lqebṭan-is ur ilaq ara ad ixemmem ɣef lecɣal n ddunit .
55002005	Ulac daɣen win ara irebḥen timzizla ma yella ur yuzzil ara akken i d-yenna lqanun .
55002006	Afellaḥ ițenɛețțaben , d nețța i gezwar lḥal ad iɣellet .
55002007	Efhem ayen akka i k-d-nniɣ axaṭer d Sidi Ṛebbi ara k-iɛawnen aț-țfehmeḍ kullec .
55002008	Mmekti-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i d-iḥyan si ger lmegtin , win akken i d-iffɣen seg uẓaṛ n Sidna Dawed akken i t-id-yenna lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ i ɣ ɣ ecciṛeɣ ;
55002009	lexbaṛ-agi i ɣef nneɛtabeɣ armi țwarzeɣ s snasel am akken d amcum i lliɣ , meɛna awal n Sidi Ṛebbi ur yețwacekkal ara .
55002010	Daymi ṣebṛeɣ i kullec ɣef ddemma n wid yețwaxtaṛen iwakken ula d nutni ad sɛun leslak i gellan di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d țmanegt n dayem .
55002011	Atah wayen yuklalen lețkal : ma nemmut yid-es , a nidir daɣen yid-es ;
55002012	ma yella neṭṭef di liman , a neḥkem yid-es ; ma yella nenkkeṛ-it ula d nețța a ɣ-yenkeṛ ;
55002013	ma yella nexdeɛ-it , nețța ur a ɣ-ixeddeɛ ara axaṭer ur yezmir ara ad yenkeṛ ayen i d-yenna .
55002014	Atah wayen ara sen-d-smektiḍ : nhu-ten zdat Ṛebbi ur țemčeqlalen ara ɣef yimeslayen ur nesɛi lmeɛna , yessufuɣen i webrid wid i sen ismeḥsisen .
55002015	Exdem lmeǧhud-ik zdat n Ṛebbi , aț-țiliḍ d aqeddac ibedden ɣer ccɣel-is , ur nețsetḥi ara deg wayen i gxeddem , i gețbecciṛen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi s lḥeqq .
55002016	Xḍu i yimeslayen ur nesɛi lmeɛna i gxulfen liman axaṭer wid i ten itebɛen simmal țzaden teffɣen i webrid n Ṛebbi .
55002017	Imeslayen-nsen am lehlak i teddun di lǧețța armi yečča-ț meṛṛa . Llan gar-asen ? imnayus d Filitus
55002018	i gwexxṛen ɣef webrid n tideț , qqaṛen belli ḥeggu n lmegtin dayen yedṛa-d , s wakka ssufuɣen aṭas n yemdanen seg webrid n liman .
55002019	Lameɛna d lsas i gessers Sidi Ṛebbi ara idumen : Ssid-nneɣ yeẓra wid yellan d ayla-s ; f+ yura daɣen win ara yinin nekk d ayla-s , ilaq ad yexḍu i wayen n diri . f+
55002020	Deg wexxam n imeṛkantiyen mačči d iqbucen n ddheb neɣ n lfeṭṭa kan i gellan meɛna llan daɣen wid n wesɣaṛ d wid n wakal ; wid n ddheb d lfeṭṭa țțaǧan-ten i leqdic n wussan n tmeɣṛa ma d wiyaḍ i leqdic n mkul ass .
55002021	Win ara yessizdgen iman-is yexḍa i lecɣal-agi n diri , ad yili am weqbuc-nni n ddheb neɣ n lfeṭṭa i sseqdacen deg wass n tmeɣṛa , yewjed ad yenfeɛ i wass m'ara t-yeḥwiǧ umɛellem-is .
55002022	Exḍu i ccehwat n temẓi i gețɣuṛṛun , kečč akk-d wid ideɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s wul yeṣfan , nadi ɣef lḥeqq , liman , leḥmala ț-țalwit , .
55002023	Ur ggar ara iman-ik di lketṛa n lehḍur ifeṛɣen ur nesɛi lmeɛna , xḍu-k seg-sen ; teẓriḍ belli țțawin-d anagar amennuɣ .
55002024	Ur s-ilaq ara i uqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi ad ițnaɣ . Ilaq ad yili d aḥnin ɣer medden , ad isselmed s ṣṣwab yerna ad isɛu ṣṣbeṛ ;
55002025	ilaq ad issefhem s leɛqel wid i t-yețxalafen , ahat Sidi Ṛebbi a ten-id-yerr ɣer webrid iwakken ad issinen tideț ,
55002026	a d-ldint wallen-nsen a d-snesren iman-nsen si tifextin n Cciṭan i ten-yeṭṭfen ad xedmen lebɣi-s .
55003001	Ilaq aț-țeẓred belli ɣer taggara n ddunit a d-asen wussan iweɛṛen .
55003002	Imdanen ad țxemmimen ɣef yiman-nsen kan , ad ṭṭamaɛen deg idrimen , ad ssemɣuṛen iman-nsen , ad țzuxxun , ad reggmen di Ṛebbi , ad țɛaṣin imawlan-nsen , ad nekkṛen lxiṛ , ad tekksen sser ɣef wayen yesɛan lḥeṛma ,
55003003	ur seɛɛun ṛṛeḥma ur seɛɛun leḥnana deg ulawen-nsen , ad skiddiben ɣef wiyaḍ , ur zemmren ara ad ḥekmen deg iman-nsen , ulawen nsen qquṛen , d iɛdawen n lxiṛ ,
55003004	d ixeddaɛen , a ten-isderɣel zzux , ad ḥemmlen lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen wala lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi ;
55003005	ad tebɛen abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi s wawal kan meɛna ad nekkṛen tazmert yellan deg-s . Ihi xḍu-k i yemdanen am wigi .
55003006	Kra seg-sen keččmen ɣer kra n yexxamen , țkellixen tilawin ur nesɛi ara lḥeṛma i gețțawi zzhu n ddunit ;
55003007	țqellibent daymen ad fehment , lameɛna leɛmeṛ țțawḍent ɣer tmusni n tideț .
55003008	Am akken i xulfen Yanes d Yambris Sidna Musa , f+ akken daɣen ara xalfen tideț yemdanen-agi , aț-țeɛwej lefhama-nsen , ad ffɣen i webrid n liman .
55003009	Meɛna ur țțawḍen ɣer wacemma axaṭer imdanen meṛṛa a ten-ɛeqlen belli ffɣen i webrid am akken tedṛa d Yanes d Yambris .
55003010	Ma d kečč tettebɛeḍ akken ilaq ayen i k-slemdeɣ , tikli-inu , ixemmimen-iw , liman-iw , ṣṣbeṛ-iw , leḥmala-inu d ẓẓwara-inu ,
55003011	leqheṛ i țwaqehṛeɣ akk-d leɛtab-iw . Teẓriḍ lemḥayen i gɛeddan fell-i di temdinin n Antyuc , n Ikunyum d Listra ? Anwa leqheṛ iwumi ur ṣbiṛeɣ ara ? Meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi isellek-iyi seg-sen meṛṛa .
55003012	Kra n win yebɣan ad iddu di liman n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ad ițțuqehheṛ .
55003013	Ma d imcumen ixeddaɛen , ad țkemmilen dayem di cceṛ-nsen , ad ɣuṛṛen wiyaḍ , ad rnun iman-nsen .
55003014	Ma d kečč eḥrez ayen i tlemdeḍ s wayes i tesqenɛeḍ ; teẓriḍ anwa i k-islemden .
55003015	Seg asmi telliḍ d ameẓyan i tessneḍ tira iqedsen ; yis-sent ara tesɛuḍ lefhama yețțawin ɣer leslak s liman di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
55003016	Yal tira iqedsen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-tekka yerna twulem i uselmed , i usefhem , i nehhu akk-d țṛebga deg webrid n lḥeqq ,
55003017	iwakken yal aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi ad yili d amdan ikemlen i gwulmen i yal ccɣel yelhan .
55004001	A k-n-ssutreɣ ɣef wudem n Ṛebbi d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ara iḥasben wid yeddren d wid yemmuten , i lmend n wass n tuɣalin-is ț-țgeldit-is .
55004002	Becceṛ awal n Sidi Ṛebbi ama di teswiɛt yelhan ama di teswiɛt iweɛṛen , ssefhem , lumm , enhu , sselmed s ṣṣbeṛ d leɛqel .
55004003	Axaṭer a d-yaweḍ lweqt anda kra n yemdanen ur zemmren ara ad slen i uselmed n tideț , lameɛna ad tebɛen lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen , a d-sbedden lecyux ara sen-d-ihedṛen ayen kan i sen-iɛeǧben ;
55004004	ad sɛuẓẓgen iman nsen ɣef tideț , ad rren ddehn-nsen ɣer tmucuha .
55004005	Ma d kečč ḥekkem deg iman-ik di kullec , ṣṣbeṛ i cedda d leɛtab , becceṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , txedmeḍ lwaǧeb-ik n uqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi akken ilaq .
55004006	Ma d nekk yewweḍ-ed lweqt i deg ilaq ad sebbleɣ iman-iw , yewweḍ-ed lweqt i deg ara ṛuḥeɣ .
55004007	Kfiɣ ccɣel-iw yerna ṭṭfeɣ di liman ar tura , nnuɣeɣ imenɣi n tideț armi ț-țaggara .
55004008	Tura yețṛaǧu-yi lḥeqq n lxedma-w ara yi-d-ye Bab n lḥeqq deg ass n lḥisab , yerna mačči i nekk kan , lameɛna i wid meṛṛa i t-iḥemmlen yețṛaǧun ass n tuɣalin-is .
55004009	Exdem lmeǧhud-ik iwakken ur tețɛeṭṭileḍ ara a d-taseḍ ɣuṛ-i .
55004010	Gma-tneɣ Dimas yeǧǧa-yi , yewwi-t zzhu n ddunit , iṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Tisalunik . Gma-tneɣ Krisis iṛuḥ ɣer tmurt n Galasya , ma d gma-tneɣ Tit iṛuḥ ɣer tmurt n Dalmasya .
55004011	Anagar gma-tneɣ Luqa i geqqimen yid-i . Awi-d yid-ek gma tneɣ Maṛqus iwakken ad iyi-iɛawen di lxedma-w .
55004012	Ma d gma-tneɣ Ticik atan ceggɛeɣ-t ɣer temdint n Ifasus .
55004013	M'ara d-taseḍ , awi-d yid-ek abeṛnus-nni i ǧǧiɣ deg wexxam n Karbus di temdint n Truwas , awi-d yid-ek daɣen idlisen , abeɛda wid yețwaxedmen s weglim .
55004014	Alixandru aḥeddad iḍuṛṛ-iyi , ixdem-iyi aṭas n cceṛ meɛna ayen yexdem a t-yaf ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
55004015	Ula d kečč ḥader iman-ik seg-s , axaṭer yețxaṣam-aɣ-d daymen deg wayen i nețbecciṛ .
55004016	Ass amezwaru i deg d-beddeɣ ɣer ccṛeɛ ur ufiɣ ula d yiwen ɣer tama-w , ǧǧan-iyi akk ; lameɛna a wer ten-iḥaseb Ṛebbi ɣef wayagi !
55004017	D Sidi Ṛebbi i yi-iɛawnen , i yi-isǧehden , iwakken lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ad ițțubecceṛ s lekmal-is i leǧnas nniḍen meṛṛa yerna isellek-iyi-d seg imi n yizmawen .
55004018	Sidi Ṛebbi mazal a yi-iḥader ɣef wayen akk n diri yerna ad iyi-isellek iwakken ad kecmeɣ tagelda-ines yellan deg igenwan . I nețța tamanegt si lǧil ɣer lǧil ! Amin !
55004019	Sellem ɣef Briska d Akilas akk-d țwacult n Unisifur .
55004020	Gma-tneɣ Irast yeqqim di temdint n Kurintus , ma d Trufim ǧǧiɣ-t di temdint n Milet mazal-it yehlek .
55004021	Exdem lmeǧhud-ik iwakken a d taseḍ uqbel ccetwa . Bulus , Buden , Linus , Kludya d watmaten akk nniḍen țsellimen-d fell-ak .
55004022	Sidi Ṛebbi ad yili yid-ek ! Ṛṛeḥma-s a d-ters fell-awen ! Amin .
56001001	Nekk Bulus aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi , i d-iceggeɛ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ iwakken ad ssiwleɣ i wid akk yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid-is yerna ad issinen tideț ,
56001002	akken ad țeklen belli sɛan tudert n dayem , tudert i gewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi uqbel a d-tețwaxleq ddunit nețța ur neskiddib ara .
56001003	Yefka-d awal-is di lweqt ilaqen , ibeggen-it-id di lexbaṛ i yi-d yețțunefken s lameṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi amsellek-nneɣ .
56001004	Uriɣ-ed tabṛaț-agi i kečč , a Tit a mmi n tideț di liman i ɣ-yesdukklen : ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a k-d-țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ amsellek-nneɣ !
56001005	? ǧiɣ-k di tegzirt n Kritus iwakken aț-țkemmleḍ ccɣel-nni ur nfuk ara , yerna aț-țesbeddeḍ di yal tamdint imeqqranen n tejmuyaɛ n imasiḥiyen akken i k-n-umṛeɣ .
56001006	Yal yiwen deg-sen ilaq ad yili d amdan iwumi ur d-ssukksen acemma , ad yesɛu yiwet tmeṭṭut kan , arraw-is ad ilin d wid iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi , ad sɛun tikli yelhan , ad țțaɣen awal iwakken ur sen-d-ssukkusen ara wiyaḍ kra n diri .
56001007	Ilaq ameqqran n tejmaɛt ad yili yeṣfa di tikli-ines , imi d nețța i geṭṭfen lecɣal n Sidi Ṛebbi , ur ilaq ad yili d win yessimɣuṛen iman-is , ur ilaq ad ireffu , ur ilaq ad yili d asekṛan , ur ilaq ad yeskker ccwal , ur ilaq daɣen a t-ɣwun yedrimen n leḥṛam .
56001008	Lameɛna ilaq-as ad yili d win yețqabalen s wudem lɛali , d bab lxiṛ , d aɛeqli , d aḥeqqi , d win yețḍuɛun Sidi Ṛebbi , d win iḥekkmen deg iman-is ;
56001009	ilaq ad yeṭṭef deg awal n Sidi Ṛebbi yellan ț-țideț akken i t-yelmed , iwakken ad yizmir ad isselmed , ad inhu wiyaḍ yerna a d-isbeggen i wid i d-yekkaten deg awal-agi , belli ɣelṭen .
56001010	Aṭas seg wat Isṛail i gɛuṣan Sidi Ṛebbi yerna țkellixen medden s imeslayen-nsen ,
56001011	ilaq a sen-terrem tikmamin i yimawen-nsen . Skarayen lhul deg yexxamen m'ara sselmaden ayen ur nlaq ara , iwakken ad rebḥen leḥṛam .
56001012	Yiwen seg-sen i ḥesben d nnbi , yenna-d : « at țegzirt n Kritus si zik-nsen d imeskaddaben , d lewḥuc iweɛṛen , d ifenyanen yețxemmimen kan ad ččen ' ' ;
56001013	ayagi i d-yenna ț-țideț . Daymi , ilaq a ten-tenhuḍ s lewɛaṛa , iwakken ad sɛun liman iseḥḥan ;
56001014	ur ilaq ara ad țḥessisen i tmucuha n wudayen akk-d lewṣayat n yemdanen ur neqbil ara tideț .
56001015	Kullec zeddig i wid zeddigen , meɛna ulac ayen zeddigen i wid ur nzeddig ara , ur nețțamen ara s Ṛebbi ; imi xemmimen-nsen d wulawen-nsen neǧsen yerna ur țendemmayen ara .
56001016	Imdanen-agi qqaṛen nessen Ṛebbi , meɛna cceṛ i xeddmen yesbeggin-ed belli ur t-ssinen ara , ɛuṣan Sidi Ṛebbi xeddmen anagar wayen yekṛeh , ur zmiren ara ad xedmen ayen yelhan .
56002001	Ma d kečč sselmed ayen yellan ț-țideț n Sidi Ṛebbi .
56002002	Ini i yemɣaṛen ad setqenɛen , ad fken leqdeṛ i yiman-nsen , ad sɛun leɛqel , ad amnen s Sidi Ṛebbi s tideț , ad ḥemmlen wiyaḍ seg wul , ad ṣebṛen i leɛtab .
56002003	Ini daɣen i temɣarin ad sɛunt tikli yeṣfan , ur ilaq ara ad ilint ț-țiqeṛṛaḍin , ur ilaq ara ad țḥawalent tissit n ccṛab meɛna ilaq ad nehhunt ɣer wayen yelhan ,
56002004	ad țweṣṣint tilawin ad ḥemmlent irgazen-nsent d warraw nsent ,
56002005	ad ilint ț-țiɛeqliyin , ad ddunt s ṣṣfa , ad lhint d lecɣal n wexxam , ad lhunt , ad țțaɣent awal i yergazen-nsent iwakken awal n Sidi Ṛebbi ur yețwargam ara .
56002006	Nhu daɣen ilmeẓyen ad sɛun leɛqel ;
56002007	kečč s yiman-ik ilaq aț-țiliḍ d lemtel s lecɣal-ik yelhan , sselmad seg wul akk-d țideț ,
56002008	s imeslayen iṣeḥḥan i deg ur yezmir yiwen a d iwwet , iwakken ixṣimen-ik ur țțafen ara ayen n diri ara hedṛen fell-aneɣ yerna ad nneḥcamen .
56002009	Iqeddacen daɣen ilaq-asen ad țțaɣen awal yerna ad ɛeǧben bab-nsen , ur sen-țeddun ara di nneqma ,
56002010	ilaq ur ten-țțakren ara meɛna ad ilin d wid imeɛnen i deg yella laman , iwakken aselmed n Sidi Ṛebbi amsellek-nneɣ ad yesɛu ccan .
56002011	Sidi Ṛebbi isbeggen-ed ṛṛeḥma-s i d-yewwin leslak i yemdanen meṛṛa .
56002012	Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi tesselmad-aɣ a neṭṭixeṛ ɣef lecɣal-nneɣ ur nelhi d wayen akk n diri yellan di ddunit , a nɛic di ddunit-a s ṣṣwab , s lḥeqq d ṭṭaɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi ;
56002013	akka ihi ara neṛǧu lfeṛḥ n wass i nessaram i deg ara d-tban tmanegt n Yillu-nneɣ ameqqran , amsellek nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
56002014	Yefka iman-is fell-aneɣ iwakken a ɣ-isellek si ddnub yerna a ɣ-yerr d agdud-is yeṣfan , iwejden i lecɣal yelhan .
56002015	Akka i glaq aț-țețmeslayeḍ , aț-țnehhuḍ , aț-țețweṣṣiḍ s lewɛaṛa , ur țțaǧa yiwen a k-yeḥqeṛ .
56003001	Smekti-ten-id ad qadṛen wid iḥekkmen , ad țțaɣen awal , ad ilin wejden ad xedmen lecɣal yelhan :
56003002	ur kkaten deg yiwen , ad ilin d imhenniyen d imawlan n tifrat , yeččuṛen d leḥnana ɣer yemdanen meṛṛa .
56003003	Axaṭer ula d nukni zik txuṣṣ-aɣ tmusni , ur nețțaɣ ara awal ; nella nḍaɛ , nella d aklan n zzhu d wayen akk s wayes i ɣ-tesseḍmeɛ ddunit , nella d imcumen , nɛac di tismin , nekṛeh wiyaḍ , wiyaḍ keṛhen-aɣ .
56003004	Meɛna asmi i d-ibeggen Sidi Ṛebbi leḥnana-s d leḥmala-s i yemdanen ,
56003005	isellek-aɣ mačči axaṭer d iḥeqqiyen i nella meɛna isellek-aɣ s ṛṛeḥma-s tameqqrant ; yessared-aɣ si ddnub-nneɣ s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen iwakken a d-nlal d ijdiden ;
56003006	Sidi Ṛebbi yeččuṛ-aɣ s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ amsellek-nneɣ ,
56003007	iwakken s ṛṛeḥma-ines a nuɣal d iḥeqqiyen zdat Sidi Ṛebbi , a ɣ-d tețțune tudert n dayem i nețṛaǧu .
56003008	Awal-agi ț-țideț yerna bɣiɣ a d tesmektayeḍ ayagi kull-as iwakken wid yumnen s Ṛebbi , ad xeddmen anagar ayen yelhan , d ayagi kan i gelhan yerna yeṣleḥ i yemdanen !
56003009	Ur sṭuqqutet ara awal mbla lmeɛna ɣef wayen yeɛnan izuṛan n lejdud neɣ čaqlalat d umenɣi ɣef ddemma n ccariɛa , axaṭer d ayen ur nesɛi azal , ur neṣliḥ .
56003010	Ma yella tenhiḍ tikkelt neɣ snat win i d-yeskaren ccwal , ur k-d-ismeḥses ara , ssebɛed-it fell-ak ;
56003011	amdan am wagi yeṭṭaxeṛ i webrid n tideț , ddnub i yiri-s .
56003012	M'ara k-n-ceggɛeɣ gma-tneɣ Artimas neɣ Tucik , ilaq-ak a d-ṛuḥeḍ a nemlil di temdint n Nikubulis , dinna ara sɛeddiɣ ccetwa .
56003013	Eɛṛeḍ aț-țɛiwneḍ Zennac yellan d abugaṭu yesnen ccariɛa akk-d Abulus m'ara ṛuḥen ad safṛen , tefkeḍ-asen ayen ara ḥwiǧen .
56003014	Axaṭer ilaq daɣen atmaten-nneɣ ad lemden ad xedmen i wiyaḍ lecɣal yelhan , iwakken ad sɛun ayen ara ḥwiǧen , ur țțilin ara mbla lfayda .
56003015	Wid akk yellan yid-i țsellimen-d fell-ak . Sellem ɣef wid i ɣ-ihemmlen i gḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi . Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi a d-ters fell-awen !
57001001	Nekk , Bulus yellan di lḥebs ɣef ddemma n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , akk-d d gma-tneɣ Timuti , i kečč a Filimun eɛzizen , amdakkel-nneɣ di leqdic ,
57001002	i weltma-tneɣ Abya , i Arxibus aṛfiq-nneɣ di lecɣal n Lmasiḥ akk-d tejmaɛt i gețțilin deg wexxam-ik ;
57001003	ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d-tețțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ akk-d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
57001004	Mkul m'ara dɛuɣ ɣer Ṛebbi țmektayeɣ-k-id , țḥemmideɣ Sidi Ṛebbi fell-ak ;
57001005	axaṭer sliɣ ɣef liman-ik meqṛen di Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d leḥmala i tesɛiḍ ɣer yemqedsen meṛṛa .
57001006	Ssutureɣ di Ṛebbi iwakken a d tesbeggneḍ liman-inek di Lmasiḥ s lecɣal yelhan , yerna aț-țɛeqleḍ ayen meṛṛa i ɣ-yelhan i nukni deg webrid n Lmasiḥ .
57001007	Feṛḥeɣ , yethedden wul-iw ɣef ddemma n leḥmala-inek axaṭer yis-ek a gma theddnen wulawen n yemqedsen .
57001008	? as Lmasiḥ iserreḥ-iyi iwakken ad ḍebbṛeɣ fell-ak ɣef wayen i glaq aț-țxedmeḍ ,
57001009	bɣiɣ axiṛ a k-ssutreɣ s leḥmala imi nekk Bulus yellan d amɣaṛ yerna tura d ameḥbus ɣef ddemma n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ,
57001010	A k-ḥelleleɣ ɣef ddemma n gma-tneɣ Unizim , i guɣalen d mmi axaṭer wwiɣ-t-id ɣer webrid n Lmasiḥ dagi di lḥebs .
57001011	Zik ur k-yenfiɛ ara , meɛna tura infeɛ-aɣ di sin am kečč am nekk .
57001012	Nețța yeɛzizen ɣuṛ-i aṭas , atan a k-t-in-erreɣ ihi .
57001013	Acḥal bɣiɣ ad iqqim dagi ɣuṛ-i iwakken ad iyi-iqdec deg umkan-ik , m'akka țwaḥebseɣ ɣef ddemma n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ .
57001014	Meɛna ur bɣiɣ ara ad xedmeɣ ayagi mbla ṛṛay-ik , iwakken ayen ara yi-txedmeḍ n wayen yelhan ur t-txeddmeḍ ara s uḥettem , lameɛna a t-txedmeḍ s wul-ik d lebɣi-k .
57001015	Anwi yeẓran ? Ahat yemfaṛaq yid-ek i kra n lweqt kan iwakken asm'ara temlilem ur tețțuɣalem ara aț-țemfaṛaqem ,
57001016	imiren ur yețțili ara d akli meɛna axiṛ n wakli imi guɣal d yiwen seg watmaten eɛzizen , abeɛda ɣuṛ-i , ilaq ad yiɛziz fell-ak akteṛ imi tura mačči d aqeddac-ik kan i gella , meɛna d gma-tneɣ di Lmasiḥ .
57001017	Ma yella ț-țidet tḥesbeḍ-iyi d aḥbib-ik tḥemmleḍ-iyi , sṭerḥeb yis am akken ara tesṭerḥbeḍ yis-i .
57001018	Ma yella iḍlem-ik neɣ tețțalaseḍ-as lḥaǧa , ḥaseb-iyi-d nekkini .
57001019	Uriɣ-ak-n ayagi s ufus-iw : « d nekk Bulus ara k-ixellṣen deg wayen i s-tețțalaseḍ » yerna mbla ma smektaɣ-k-id belli d nekk i k-id yewwin ɣer webrid n leslak .
57001020	A gma , xdem-iyi lemziya-agi ɣef ddemma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akken ad yethedden wul-iw di Lmasiḥ .
57001021	Uriɣ-ak-n tabṛaț-agi imi țekleɣ ad iyi-taɣeḍ awal , yerna ẓriɣ aț-țxedmeḍ nnig wayen i k-n-ssutreɣ .
57001022	Heggit-iyi taxxamt , axaṭer ssarameɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi qṛib a-yi-n yerr ɣuṛ-wen akken i s-tessuturem kull-as di tẓallit-nwen .
57001023	Gma-tneɣ Ibafras , yețțuḥebsen yid-i ɣef ddemma n Lmasiḥ yețsellim fell-ak aṭas .
57001024	? sellimen-d daɣen fell-ak atmaten ixeddmen yid-i : Maṛqus , Arisṭark , Dimas akk-d Luqa .
57001025	Ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ aț-țili fell-awen .
58001001	Zik-nni , acḥal iberdan i d-ihdeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi seg yimi n lenbiya s țebcirat yemxalafen ;
58001002	ma deg ussan-agi yellan d ussan ineggura , yemmeslay-aɣ-d s Mmi-s , yerra kullec ger ifassen-is , yis i d-ixleq ddunit meṛṛa .
58001003	D nețța i d-isbeggnen ccbiha n tideț akk-d tmanegt tameqqrant n Sidi Ṛebbi akken tella , s tezmert n wawal-is i gbedd lsas n ddunit meṛṛa . Mi gessazdeg imdanen si ddnubat-nsen , yeṭṭef amkan n lḥekma deg igenwan ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi ;
58001004	yekka-d sennig n lmalayekkat , axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yefka-yas isem yugaren isem-nsent .
58001005	Anwa lmelk iwumi yenna Sidi Ṛebbi : Kečč d Mmi , d nekk i k-id-yefkan ɣer ddunit ass-a . Anwa lmelk i ɣef i d-yenna : Nekk ad iliɣ d Baba-s , nețța ad yili d Mm i .
58001006	Asmi i d-yefka amenzu ɣer ddunit yenna-d : L malayekkat meṛṛa n Sidi Ṛebbi ad seǧǧdent zdat-es a t-ɛebdent .
58001007	Yenna-d daɣen ɣef lmalayekkat : Yesseqdac lmalayekkat-is am aḍu , iqeddacen-is am uḥeǧǧaǧu n tmes .
58001008	Ma ɣef Mmi-s yenna-d : Amkan n lḥekma-k a Ṛebbi ibedd i dayem , t azmert n tgeldit-ik , ț-țazmert taḥeqqit .
58001009	Tḥemmleḍ lḥeqq tkeṛheḍ lbaṭel , daymi a Ṛebbi , Illu-inek , idhen aqeṛṛuy-ik s zzit n lfeṛḥ , isbedd-ik d agellid , d k ečč i gextaṛ ger yeṛfiqen-ik .
58001010	Yerna yenna : D kečč a Ṛebbi i gessersen lsas n ddunit si tazwara , d ifassen-ik i gfeṣṣlen igenwan ;
58001011	nutni ad fnun ma d kečč aț-țdumeḍ , ad uɣalen meṛṛa d iqdime n am llebsa taqdimt ,
58001012	a ten-tbeddleḍ a m akken tețwabeddal llebsa , a ten-tețleḍ am ubeṛnus , ma d kečč ur tețbeddileḍ ar a , ussan-ik ur țfakan ara .
58001013	Anwa lmelk iwumi yenna : ? ṭef amkan n lḥekma ɣer tama-w tayeffust , alamma rriɣ-ed iɛdawen-ik seddaw n iḍaṛṛen-ik ?
58001014	D acu-tent lmalayekkat ? D leṛwaḥ iqeddcen ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi , i d-ițceggiɛ iwakken ad ɛiwnent wid iwumi i d-yețțune leslak n Sidi Ṛebbi , d lweṛt !
58002001	? ef wayagi , ilaq a neṭṭef deg uselmed n tideț i nesla , a t neḥrez iwakken ur nțeffeɣ ara i webrid .
58002002	Imeslayen i d-wwint lmalayekkat sɛan azal , kra n win ur neqbil ara , ur netbiɛ ara imeslayen-agi yuklal lɛiqab ,
58002003	amek ara nemneɛ ma yella ur neḥsib ara leslak ameqqran yecban wagi ? Leslak-agi i d-ibecceṛ Ssid-nneɣ si tazwara , ɛawden-aɣ-t-id daɣen wid i s-yeslan .
58002004	Sidi Ṛebbi ibeggen-ed tideț n cchada-nsen s licaṛat d lbeṛhanat d waṭas n leɛǧayeb akk-d tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , akken yella di lebɣi-ines .
58002005	Mačči i lmalayekkat iwumi yefka Sidi Ṛebbi lḥekma ɣef ddunit i d-iteddun i ɣef d-nețmeslay .
58002006	Yella win i d-icehden ɣef wayagi di tira iqedsen , yenna-d : D acu-t wemdan iwakken a t-id-temmektiḍ , a d-terreḍ ddehn-ik ɣuṛ-es ; d acu-t mmi-s n wemdan iwakken a d-telhiḍ yid-es ?
58002007	Terriḍ-t seddaw n lmalayekkat i kra n lweqt , mbeɛd tefkiḍ-as lqima d lɛezz ,
58002008	terriḍ kullec seddaw iḍaṛṛen-is . Mi gerra Sidi Ṛebbi kullec seddaw iḍaṛṛen-is , yefka-yas ad iḥkem ɣef kullec ; ladɣa urɛad nwala tura yeḥkem ɣef kullec .
58002009	Lameɛna Ɛisa , win akken yerra Sidi Ṛebbi seddaw n lmalayekkat i kra n lweqt , nețwali-t tura di tmanegt-is yeččuṛ d lɛezz ɣef ddemma n leɛtab n lmut-is ; s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi i gemmut ɣef yemdanen meṛṛa .
58002010	Sidi Ṛebbi i d-ixelqen kullec yerna kullec d ayla-s , yehwa-yas ad issiweḍ ccan n Ɛisa amsellek n yemdanen ɣer lekmal , mi t-id isɛedda si leɛtab ameqqran , iwakken a d-yawi aṭas n yemdanen ɣer lɛaḍima-s ;
58002011	axaṭer Sidna Ɛisa i gṣeffun si ddnub akk-d wid i gețwaṣeffan , yiwen i ten-id-ifkan . Daymi ur yessetḥa ara yis-sen , isemma-yasen « atmaten-is »
58002012	mi genna : A d beccṛeɣ isem-ik i watmaten-iw , a k-ḥemdeɣ di tlemmast n tejmaɛt n watmaten .
58002013	Yenna daɣen : Ad țekleɣ ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi . Yerna yenna : Aql-iyi nekk d warrac i yi-d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi .
58002014	Imi arrac-agi țwaxelqen s weksum d idammen , ula d nețța yusa-d s ṣṣifa n wemdan iwakken ad iɣleb s lmut-is Cciṭan , win akken iḥekkmen ɣef lmut ,
58002015	ad ikkes lxuf i wid akk yezgan d aklan seddaw uzaglu n lmut , a ten-isellek ;
58002016	axaṭer ur d-yusi ara ad iɛiwen lmalayekkat meɛna yusa-d ad iɛiwen tarwa n Sidna Ibṛahim .
58002017	Daymi i s-ilaq a d-yas s ṣṣifa n wemdan am atmaten-is iwakken ad yuɣal d lmuqeddem ameqqran i ɣef yella lețkal , yeččuṛen d ṛṛeḥma , ad iqdec ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi seg ul yerna ad ikkes ddnubat n yemdanen meṛṛa .
58002018	Imi nețța s yiman-is yenneɛtab deg ujeṛṛeb , yezmer ad iɛiwen wid ara yețțujeṛben .
58003001	Ihi ay atmaten yețwaxtaṛen , a wid iwumi i d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țweṛtem tageldit n igenwan , sserset tamuɣli-nwen ɣef Ɛisa , lmuqeddem ameqqran i d-iceggeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣef nețcehhid .
58003002	Yexdem lebɣi n win i t-id iceggɛen am akken i gexdem Sidna Musa i wexxam n Sidi Ṛebbi .
58003003	? - țideț Sidna Ɛisa yesɛa ccan akteṛ n Sidna Musa , imi win yebnan axxam , d nețța i gesɛan ccan akteṛ n wexxam yebna .
58003004	Axaṭer yal axxam yella win i t-yebnan , ma d win i d-ixelqen kra yellan , d Sidi Ṛebbi .
58003005	Sidna Musa yexdem ayen i glaqen a t-yexdem , yella am uqeddac ɣef wexxam n Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a d ibeggen ayen ara d-ițțubeccṛen sya ɣer zdat .
58003006	Ma d Lmasiḥ yexdem ayen i glaq a t-yexdem , yesbedd-it am Mmi-s , d aqeṛṛuy n wexxam-is ; d nukni i d axxam-is ma yella neṭṭef , neṣbeṛ yerna nețkel deg wayen i nessaram .
58003007	? ef wannect-a i d-yenna Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen : Ass-a ma yella teslam i taɣect n Sidi Ṛebbi ,
58003008	ur sɣaṛayet ara ulawen-nwen am wasmi i jehlen lejdud-nwen m'akken i yi-sserfan deg unezṛuf
58003009	anda ɛeṛden ad iyi-jeṛṛben ɣas akken walan lecɣal akk i xedmeɣ di ṛebɛin iseggasen .
58003010	? ef wayagi i rfiɣ ɣef lǧil-agi , dɣa nniɣ : Ulawen-nsen beɛden fell-i , zgan ɛeṛqen , ugin ad fehmen iberdan-iw .
58003011	Seg wakken i rfiɣ , gulleɣ ur kcimen asteɛfu-inu .
58003012	Ay atmaten , ḥadret ad yili gar-awen win ara yesseɣṛen ul-is , ara yeǧǧen cceṛ ad izdeɣ deg-s alamma issufeɣ-it i webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren .
58003013	? emyenhut wway gar-awen yal ass , skud nezmer a d-nini « ass-a » am akken i gura di tira iqedsen iwakken yiwen deg-wen ur t-ițkellix ddnub , ur yesɣaṛay ul-is .
58003014	Ma yella neṭṭef alamma ț-țaggara di liman-nni i nesɛa di tazwara , akka ara nțekki di Lmasiḥ ,
58003015	akken yura di tira iqedsen : Ass-a ma yella teslam i taɣect n Sidi Ṛebbi , ur sɣaṛayet ara ulawen-nwen am asmi i jehlen lejdud-nwen deg unezṛuf .
58003016	Anwa-ten wid i gjehlen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi mi slan i taɣect-is , mačči d wid i d-yessufeɣ Sidna Musa si tmurt n Maṣer ?
58003017	Anwi i ɣef yerfa Sidi Ṛebbi azal n ṛebɛin n iseggasen , mačči d wid idenben i gessenger deg unezṛuf ?
58003018	Anwa-ten wid i ɣef yeggul ur kcimen amkan anda ara steɛfun , mačči d wid i t-iɛuṣan ?
58003019	Nwala ur kcimen ara ɣer westeɛfu n Sidi Ṛebbi axaṭer ugin ad amnen yis .
58004001	Skud mazal nezmer a nekcem ɣer westeɛfu i ɣ-yewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi , ilaq a naggad ur aɣ-ițfat ara lḥal , iwakken yiwen deg-wen ur s-yeqqaṛ ḍelmeɣ , iɛedda lweqt ur zmireɣ ara ad kecmeɣ .
58004002	Axaṭer lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ i ɣ-d ițțubeccṛen , d lexbaṛ-nni i d ițțubeccṛen i lejdud-nneɣ , lameɛna ur stenfɛen ara seg-s axaṭer mi s-slan ur t-qbilen ara .
58004003	Ma d nukni i t-iqeblen a nekcem ɣer westeɛfu-yagi i ɣef d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi : Deg wurrif i deg lliɣ , gulleɣ ur kcimen asteɛfu-inu . Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d akka ɣas akken ifuk lecɣal-is seg wasmi i gexleq ddunit ,
58004004	akken yura di tira iqedsen ɣef wass wis sebɛa : Sidi Ṛebbi yesteɛfa deg wass wis sebɛa seg wayen akk yexdem .
58004005	Yura daɣen : D lmuḥal ad kecmen ɣer westeɛfu-inu .
58004006	Imezwura i geslan i lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ ur kcimen ara ɣer westeɛfu yagi axaṭer ur t-qbilen ara , meɛna yella wamek ara kecmen wiyaḍ .
58004007	Aṭas n leqṛun mbeɛd , Sidi Ṛebbi yemmeslay-ed ɣef wass nniḍen iwumi i gsemma « ass-a » mi d-yenna seg yimi n Sidna Dawed : ( am akken yura iwsawen ) Ass-a ma yella teslam i taɣect-is ur sɣaṛayet ara ulawen-nwen .
58004008	Lemmer nnbi Yacuɛa yessaweḍ lejdud-nneɣ ɣer wemkan n westeɛfu , tili Sidi Ṛebbi ur d-yețmeslay ara ɣef wass nniḍen n westeɛfu .
58004009	Ar ass-a yeqqim-ed wass n westeɛfu i wegdud n Sidi Ṛebbi .
58004010	Axaṭer win ara ikecmen deg westeɛfu n Sidi Ṛebbi ad isteɛfu daɣen si lecɣal-is am akken yesteɛfa nețța .
58004011	A newwet ihi amek ara nekcem ɣer westeɛfu-agi , a nḥader akken ur iɣelli yiwen am wegdud n wat Isṛail iɛuṣan Sidi Ṛebbi deg unezṛuf .
58004012	Axaṭer awal n Sidi Ṛebbi d awal n tudert yesɛan tazmert , qeṭṭiɛ akteṛ n ujenwi yesɛan snat n leǧwahi qeṭṭiɛen , ikeččem armi d lqaɛ n teṛwiḥt d ṛṛuḥ , armi d ger lemfaṣel d wadif , yețbeggin-ed ixemmimen n wul d wayen yețḥussu wemdan .
58004013	Ulac ayen yeffren zdat Sidi Ṛebbi deg wayen akk i d-ixleq , kullec iban-ed ɛinani zdat win ara ɣ-iḥasben .
58004014	Imi d Ɛisa Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i nesɛa d lmuqeddem ameqqran , nețța i gzemren i kullec , i gzegren igenwan ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , ilaq-aɣ ihi a neḥrez ayen i nețbecciṛ ɣef liman-nneɣ .
58004015	Axaṭer lmuqeddem ameqqran i nesɛa mačči d win ur nezmir ara a d-yiḥnin fell-aneɣ m'ara ɣ-iwali necceḍ , imi nețța daɣen yețțujeṛṛeb deg wayen yellan , am nukni , meɛna ur yeɣli ara di ddnub .
58004016	A nețkel ihi , a nqeṛṛeb ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi anda tella ṛṛeḥma iwakken a naf ssmaḥ , a ɣ-iɛiwen di lweqt ilaqen .
58005001	Yal lmuqeddem ameqqran yețwaxtaṛ-ed iwakken ad iqdec ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef ddemma n yemdanen , ad yețqeddim lewɛadi d iseflawen ɣef ddemma n ddnubat nsen .
58005002	Yezmer ad ifhem wid ur nessin ara akk-d wid iḍaɛen , imi ula d nețța s yiman-is ur yeǧhid ara , yezmer ad yeɣleḍ .
58005003	Ihi ɣef lǧehd-agi i t-ixuṣṣen i glaq ad ye iseflawen ɣef yiman-is nețța akk-d yemdanen nniḍen ɣef ddemma n ddnubat-nsen .
58005004	Yiwen ur izmir ad yeṭṭef amkan n lmuqeddem ameqqran ma yella mačči d Sidi Ṛebbi i t-id-isbedden , am akken i gesbedd nnbi Haṛun .
58005005	Akka daɣen Lmasiḥ , mačči d nețța i gesbedden iman-is d lmuqeddem ameqqran lameɛna d Sidi Ṛebbi i t-isbedden mi s-yenna : Kečč d Mmi , d nekk i k-id-yefkan ɣer ddunit ass-a .
58005006	Yenna-yas daɣen : Sbeddeɣ-k aț-țiliḍ d lmuqeddem i dayem am akken i sbeddeɣ Malxisadeq .
58005007	Asm'akken yella Lmasiḥ di ddunit s ṣṣifa n wemdan , acḥal i gedɛa , acḥal i gḥellel s nnhati d imeṭṭawen Sidi Ṛebbi i gzemren a t-isellek si lmut . ? ef ddemma n ṭṭaɛa-ines , yețwaqbel .
58005008	? as akken d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i gella , yelmed ṭṭaɛa s leɛtab i gɛeddan fell-as .
58005009	S wakka i gewweḍ ɣer tmanegt tameqqrant , yuɣal d abrid n leslak n dayem i wid akk i s-yețțaɣen awal .
58005010	Sidi Ṛebbi isbedd-it ad yili d lmuqeddem ameqqran am akken i t-yella Malxisadeq .
58005011	Nezmer a d-nernu aṭas ɣef wannect-agi meɛna d ayen i weɛṛen i wsefhem , axaṭer tweɛṛem i lefhama .
58005012	Ilaq acḥal ayagi segmi i tuɣalem d iselmaden , kunwi atan mazal teḥwaǧem win ara wen-islemden lumuṛ imezwura n wawal n Ṛebbi ; ur tezmirem ara i weɣṛum , mazal-ikkun teḥwaǧem ayefki .
58005013	S kra n win mazal i teṭṭeḍ , d llufan i gella , ur yessin ara ad yextiṛ ger wayen yelhan d wayen n diri .
