58005014	Ma d win meqqren yezmer ad yečč ayen yeseḥḥan , imi i gjeṛṛeb , yessen ad yextiṛ ger wayen yelhan d wayen n diri .
58006001	Ur ilaq ara a neqqim kan deg wayen nelmed di tazwara ɣef wawal n Lmasiḥ . Ilaq-aɣ a neddu ɣer zdat a nesnekmal almud-nneɣ , mbla ma nɛawed-ed i lsas s wadda ɣef wayen yeɛnan : nndama ɣef lecɣal n diri i gețțawin ɣer lmut , liman di Sidi Ṛebbi ,
58006002	ayen yeɛnan aɣḍas akk-d țrusi n ifassen , ḥeggu n lmegtin neɣ lḥisab aneggaru .
58006003	D ayen ara nexdem ma iserreḥ-aɣ Sidi Ṛebbi .
58006004	Ma d wid i d-yusan ɣer tafat , i gessefhem Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , i gɛerḍen lbaṛakat n Ṛebbi ,
58006005	lbenna n wawal-is akk-d tezmert n ddunit i d-iteddun ,
58006006	ma yella ṭṭaxṛen i webrid n Ṛebbi ulamek ara d-uɣalen imi țɛawaden asemmeṛ i Mmi-s n Ṛebbi , sseɣlayen di lqima-s zdat yemdanen .
58006007	Akal yeṛwan aman i d-yețțaken lerẓaq i wid i t-izerɛen , lbaṛaka n Sidi Ṛebbi tețrusu-d fell-as .
58006008	Meɛna ma yella yefka-d isennanen d ubuneqqaṛ , d akal ur nesɛi azal , ad ițwanɛel yerna qṛib a s-ceɛlen times .
58006009	? as ma nețmeslay-ed akka a wid eɛzizen , nețkel fell-awen d abrid yelhan i tewwim , d win ara kkun isellken .
58006010	Sidi Ṛebbi d bab n lḥeqq , ur itețțu ara lecɣal-nwen d leḥmala nwen ɣef ddemma n yisem-is akk-d lxiṛ i mazal txeddmem-t i watmaten di liman .
58006011	Nebɣa ihi yal yiwen deg-wen ad iṭṭef deg webrid-agi alamma ț-țaggara iwakken aț-țawḍem ɣer wayen i tessaramem .
58006012	Ur țțilit ara d imeɛdazen meɛna ɛandet wid iweṛten s liman d ṣṣbeṛ nsen lweṛt i gewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi .
58006013	Asmi i gefka Sidi Ṛebbi lɛahed i Sidna Ibṛahim , yeggul s yixef-is , axaṭer ulac win yellan sennig-es ,
58006014	dɣa yenna : Gulleɣ a k-barkeɣ , ad sseftiɣ dderya-k .
58006015	Akka ihi Sidna Ibṛahim yeṣbeṛ yuṛǧa armi i t-id-yewweḍ wayen i s-yewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi .
58006016	Imdanen țgallan s wayen i ten-yugaren , s limin i ferrun tilufa ;
58006017	daymi i geggul Sidi Ṛebbi i wid ara iweṛten ayen i sen-yewɛed , iwakken a d-ibeggen belli ur yețbeddil ara ṛṛay .
58006018	Lɛahed-agi i d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d limin i geggul d ayen ur nețbeddil yerna ur yezmir ara a ten-inkkeṛ . Ma d nukni yeddurin ɣuṛ-es , d annect-agi i ɣ-isseǧhaden a neṭṭef mliḥ deg usirem i ɣ-d ițțunefken .
58006019	Asirem-agi d ayen yeṭṭfen tudert-nneɣ am umextaf ( tnejga ) yeṭṭfen lbabuṛ , yețɛedday akkin i leḥjab ɣer wemkan iqedsen ,
58006020	anda akken yekcem Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa d amezwaru , ɣef ddemma-nneɣ yuɣal d lmuqeddem ameqqran i dayem akken yella Malxisadeq .
58007001	Malxisadeq-agi yella d agellid n Salem , d lmuqeddem n Sidi Ṛebbi ɛlayen . D nețța i gemmugren Sidna Ibṛahim mi d-yuɣal seg umenɣi i deg yeɣleb igelliden nniḍen , iwakken a t-ibarek .
58007002	I nețța i gefka Sidna Ibṛahim amur wis ɛecṛa n wayen akk i d-yerbeḥ seg umenɣi . Malxisadeq lmeɛna n yisem-is « agellid n lḥeqq » , yețțusemma daɣen agellid n Salem yeɛni « agellid n lehna » .
58007003	Ur neẓri ara anwa i d baba-s neɣ anta i d yemma-s , ur nessin tajaddit-is , ur neẓri melmi i glul neɣ melmi i gemmut . Yella d lemtel n Mmi-s n Ṛebbi , yeqqim d lmuqeddem i dayem .
58007004	Walit acḥal meqqeṛ ccan n win iwumi yefka Sidna Ibṛahim leɛcuṛ seg wayen i d-yerbeḥ deg umenɣi .
58007005	At Lewwi yellan d lmuqedmin , țțawin leɛcuṛ ɣef wat Isṛail yellan d atmaten-nsen akken i d-tenna ccariɛa , ɣas akken ula d nutni ț-țarwa n Sidna Ibṛahim .
58007006	Ma d Malxisadeq ur nelli ara n at Lewwi , yewwi leɛcuṛ s ɣuṛ Sidna Ibṛahim yerna iburek-it .
58007007	Mbla ccekk win yețbaraken yugar win yețțubarken .
58007008	At Lewwi-agi yețțawin leɛcuṛ , d imdanen yețmețțaten , ma d Malxisadeq d win i ɣef d-nnant tira iqedsen : Mazal idder .
58007009	Nezmer ihi a d-nini belli Lewwi yețțawin leɛcuṛ ɣef wat Isṛail , yefka leɛcuṛ i Malxisadeq uqbel a d-ilal s ufus n Sidna Ibṛahim yellan si lejdud-is ;
58007010	axaṭer asmi yemmuger Malxisadeq Sidna Ibṛahim , Lewwi urɛad d-ilul .
58007011	Ccɣel i xeddmen lmuqedmin n at Lewwi , d lsas n ccariɛa yețțunefken i wegdud n wat Isṛail ; meɛna lemmer yennekmal ccɣel-agi , acuɣeṛ ihi ara d-yili lmuqeddem nniḍen am Malxisadeq mačči am Haṛun n at Lewwi ?
58007012	Ma yella ccɣel i xeddmen lmuqeddmin n at Lewwi yuɣal di rrif , ihi ula d ccariɛa aț-țuɣal di rrif .
58007013	Axaṭer Ssid-nneɣ , ur d-yekki ara seg wedrum n at Lewwi , meɛna yekka-d seg wedrum nniḍen . Adrum-nni ulac deg-s ula d yiwen n lmuqeddem i gqedcen deg wudekkan n iseflawen .
58007014	Ihi neẓra belli Ssid-nneɣ yeffeɣ ed seg wedrum n Yahuda , yerna Sidna Musa ur d-yenni ara a d-yeffeɣ lmuqeddem seg wedrum agi .
58007015	Yella wayen i d-ibeggnen annect agi , axaṭer yeffeɣ-ed lmuqeddem nniḍen yecban Malxisadeq .
58007016	Mačči d ccariɛa i t-yerran d lmuqeddem meɛna yuɣal d lmuqeddem s tezmert n tudert ur nețfaka ;
58007017	imi yura fell-as : Kečč d lmuqeddem i dayem am Malxisadeq .
58007018	Lameṛ aqdim yeɛnan lmuqedmin yețwabeddel , axaṭer ixuṣṣ yerna ur yenfiɛ ara .
58007019	Ccariɛa n Musa ur tezmir ara a ɣ-terr d iḥeqqiyen zdat Sidi Ṛebbi , meɛna yella yiwen usirem s wayes ara nqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es ;
58007020	yerna ayagi yedṛa-d s limin n Sidi Ṛebbi , mačči am at Lewwi yuɣalen d lmuqedmin mbla limin ;
58007021	ma d Sidna Ɛisa yesbedd-it Sidi Ṛebbi s limin mi s-yenna : Sidi Ṛebbi yeggul ur yeḥnit aț-țiliḍ d lmuqeddem i dayem .
58007022	Ɛisa , d nețța i ɣ-iḍemnen lɛahed yifen amezwaru .
58007023	Aṭas seg wat Lewwi i gellan d lmuqedmin axaṭer lmut ur ten-tețțaǧa ara ad dumen di ccɣel-nsen ;
58007024	ma d Sidna Ɛisa , d win yețdumun , ur yuḥwaǧ ara a d-yeǧǧ lxedma-s n lmuqeddem i wayeḍ .
58007025	Daymi i gezmer ad isellek di mkul lweqt wid akk yețqeṛṛiben ɣer Ṛebbi s yisem-is , imi nețța yedder i dayem , ideɛɛu fell-asen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
58007026	D wagi i d lmuqeddem ameqqran i ɣ-ilaqen , d imqeddes , d azedgan , ur yesɛi ara lɛib , yemxalaf d imdanen idenben yerna ițwarfed sennig igenwan .
58007027	Ur yeḥwaǧ ara ad ye iseflawen am lmuqedmin nniḍen ɣef ddnubat-is neɣ ɣef wid n wegdud , lameɛna yefka iman-is d asfel yiwet n tikkelt kan ɣef ddemma n ddnubatnneɣ .
58007028	Lmuqedmin imeqqranen i d tesbeddad ccariɛa , d irgazen ixuṣṣen di lǧehd , ma d win i gesbedd Sidi Ṛebbi s limin deffir ccariɛa , d Mmi-s i gessaweḍ ɣer tezmert tameqqrant i dayem .
58008001	Deg wayen akk i d-nenna atan wayen yesɛan azal : Lmuqeddem nneɣ ameqqran yeṭṭef amkan n lḥekma ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi di tgelda n igenwan .
58008002	Ixeddem ccɣel-is n lmuqeddem ameqqran deg wemkan iqedsen n tideț i gebna Sidi Ṛebbi , mačči d win i bnan yemdanen .
58008003	Yal lmuqeddem sbedden-t iwakken ad yețqeddim lewɛadi d iseflawen , daymi i s-ilaq ula d nețța ad yesɛu ayen ara iqeddem ;
58008004	lemmer Lmuqeddem-nneɣ ameqqran di ddunit i gella , ur yezmir ara ad yili d lmuqeddem nețța ur nelli ara seg wat Lewwi , imi llan wid yețqeddimen lewɛadi akken i d-tenna ccariɛa .
58008005	Ccɣel i xeddmen lmuqedemin agi d lemtel , d ccbiha n wayen yellan deg igenwan . Mi gekker Sidna Musa ad isbedd aqiḍun n temlilit , Sidi Ṛebbi yenna yas : — Muqel ! Xdem kullec am lemtel i k-d-ssekneɣ deg wedrar .
58008006	Meɛna tura Lmasiḥ yețțune as-d ccɣel yugaren wagi s waṭas , d nețța i d amcafeɛ-nneɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi di leɛqed yifen amezwaru , ibedden ɣef lweɛd iṣeḥḥan .
58008007	Lemmer leɛqed amezwaru ur ixuṣṣ ara tili ur d-yețțili ara wayeḍ .
58008008	Axaṭer asmi i glum Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wegdud-is yenna : A d-asen wussan i deg ara sbeddeɣ leɛqed ajdid akk-d wegdud n Isṛail d wegdud n Yahuda .
58008009	Ur yețțili ara am leɛqed-nni i xedmeɣ d lejdud-nsen asmi i sen-ṭṭfeɣ afus s sufɣeɣ-ten-id si tmurt n Maṣer , imi nutni ur ṭṭifen ara di leɛqed-inu ula d nekk ǧǧiɣ-ten .
58008010	Atan leɛqed ara sbeddeɣ gar-i d wegdud n Isṛail . A wen-iniɣ : M'ara ɛeddin wussan-agi , a sen-sfehmeɣ lumuṛat-inu , a ten-skecmeɣ deg wulawen-nsen , ad iliɣ d Illu-nsen , ad ilin d agdud-iw .
58008011	Deg ussan-nni , yiwen ur yeqqaṛ i wayeḍ neɣ i gma-s « issin Sidi Ṛebbi » axaṭer ad iyi-issinen meṛṛa seg umeẓyan ar umeqqran .
58008012	A sen-semmḥeɣ ddnubat-nsen , ur ten-id-țmektayeɣ ara .
58008013	Imi d-yehdeṛ ɣef leɛqed ajdid , leɛqed amezwaru yuɣal d aqdim ; ayen yellan d aqdim qṛib ad ițwakkes .
58009001	Leɛqed amezwaru yesɛa leqwanen yesɛan daɣen amkan anda ɛebbden Ṛebbi .
58009002	Axaṭer sbedden yiwen uqiḍun n temlilit i deg llan sin imukan : Deg umkan amezwaru yețțusemman amkan iqedsen , yella lmeṣbeḥ akk-d ṭṭabla anda yețrusu weɣṛum yețțunefken d lweɛda .
58009003	Deg umkan-agi iqedsen yella yiwen n leḥjab ifeṛqen amkan iqedsen d umkan iqedsen nezzeh ,
58009004	tella dinna lḥila n ddheb i deg sseṛɣayen lebxuṛ akk-d usenduq n leɛqed iṛuccen s ddheb . Zdaxel n usenduq-agi yella uɛekkaz-nni n Haṛun yeǧǧuǧgen , illa daɣen aqbuc iččuṛen ț-țamanna akk-d teblaḍin i deg uran lumuṛat n Sidi Ṛebbi .
58009005	Sufella n usenduq-agi rsent snat n lmeṣnuɛat imetlen lmalayekkat , ɣumment s tili n wafriwen-nsent amkan-nni i țṛuccun s idammen n iseflawen i leɛfu n ddnubat . Mačči tura i d lweqt i deg ara d-nemmeslay ɣef wayagi meṛṛa .
58009006	Akka i gers kullec deg wemkan-agi iqedsen , lmuqedmin keččmen ɣuṛ-es mkul lweqt iwakken ad xedmen ccɣel-nsen ;
58009007	ma d amkan iqedsen nezzeh , anagar lmuqeddem ameqqran i gkeččmen ɣuṛ-es yiwet n tikkelt i useggas , iwakken ad iqeddem idammen n iseflawen ɣef ddemma n ddnubat-is akk-d wid n wegdud .
58009008	Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen issefhem-aɣ-d belli ulac abrid ɣer wemkan iqedsen nezzeh skud mazal aqiḍun n temlilit .
58009009	Ayagi yella d lemtel i lweqt-agi i deg nella ; lewɛadi d iseflawen i țțaken medden i Sidi Ṛebbi ur zmiren ara ad ssiwḍen ɣer ṣṣfa n wul .
58009010	D ayen yeɛnan kan lɛaddat n ccariɛa ɣef wučči ț-țissit akk-d luḍu ; lɛaddat-agi llant-ed d lemtel kan armi d asmi yerra Sidi Ṛebbi kullec d ajdid .
58009011	Lmasiḥ yusa-d d lmuqeddem ameqqran n lxiṛ i d-iteddun , yezger i wemkan iqedsen yugaren kra n wayen yebna wemdan , yesɛan azal meqqṛen , ur nelli ara n ddunit-agi .
58009012	Yekcem yiwet n tikkelt kan ɣer wemkan iqedsen nezzeh , mačči d idammen n iɛejmiyen neɣ n iqelwacen i gewwi yid-es lameɛna d idammen-is nețța , s wannect-a i ɣ-d-yefda i dayem .
58009013	Axaṭer ma yella idammen n iɛejmiyen d iqelwacen akk-d yiɣed n tgenduzt yeṛɣan d asfel țṣeffin lǧețța n wid idenben m'ara ten ṛuccen yis-sen ,
58009014	amek ur aɣ-țṣeffin ara idammen n Lmasiḥ yefkan iman-is i Ṛebbi d asfel s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ n dayem , nețța ur nesɛi lɛib ? Amek ur yessizdig ara ulawen-nneɣ si lecɣal ur nemɛin yețțawin ɣer lmut iwakken a nuɣal d iqeddacen n Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren .
58009015	? ef wannect-agi i gella d amcafeɛ gar-aɣ d Ṛebbi s leɛqed agi ajdid , iwakken wid iwumi d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi ad weṛten lxiṛat n dayem i sen-yewɛed . Zemren ad weṛten ayagi s lmut-is i d-yedṛan , lmut-is i gtekksen ɣef yemdanen ddnubat-nsen n wasmi i llan seddaw n leɛqed amezwaru .
58009016	Ma yella walebɛaḍ yeǧǧa-d lewṣaya weqbel ad yemmet akken ad feṛqen ayla-s , ilaq ad aṛǧun alamma yemmut .
58009017	Lewṣaya-agi ur tṣeḥḥa ara ma yella mazal bab-is yedder lameɛna m'ara yemmet aț-țuɣal tṣeḥḥa .
58009018	Daymi leɛqed amezwaru daɣen yebda s tazzla n idammen .
58009019	Ula d Sidna Musa mi i d-yeɣṛa lumuṛ akken llan di Tawṛat , yeddem-ed taciṭa akk-d taḍuṭ tazeggaɣt , yebbeɣ-iten deg idammen n iɛejmiyen d iqelwacen akk-d waman , iṛucc yis-sen taktabt iqedsen akk-d wegdud meṛṛa ,
58009020	yenna : Wigi d idammen n leɛqed i gesbedd Sidi Ṛebbi yid-wen .
58009021	Iṛucc daɣen s idammen-nni aqiḍun akk-d wayen yellan deg-s .
58009022	Axaṭer ccariɛa teqqaṛ-ed kullec ad yeṣfu s idammen , ulac leɛfu mbla tazzla n idammen .
58009023	Imi ayagi akk i gmetlen ayen yellan deg igenwan ilaq ad ițwaṣeffi s idammen n iseflawen , ula d ayen yellan deg igenwan ilaq ad ițwaṣeffi s idammen n wesfel yifen iseflawen imezwura .
58009024	Axaṭer Lmasiḥ ur yekcim ara ɣer wemkan iqedsen i bnan ifasen n yemdanen , yellan d lemtel n win n tideț , meɛna yuli ɣer igenni anda yella tura d amcafeɛ-nneɣ zdat Sidi Ṛebbi .
58009025	Lmuqeddem ameqqran ikeččem mkul aseggas ɣer wemkan iqedsen nezzeh , iwakken ad iqeddem idammen n lmal , ma d Lmasiḥ ur ikcim ara iwakken ad isebbel iman-is aṭas n tikkal ;
58009026	neɣ m'ulac , yili yeɛteb aṭas n iberdan seg wasmi i d-texleq ddunit . Lameɛna yusa-d di zzman-agi aneggaru yiwet n tikkelt kan , isebbel iman-is d asfel iwakken ad ikkes ddnub .
58009027	Lmut tețțawi imdanen yiwet n tikkelt kan imiren a d-yili lḥisab .
58009028	Ula d Lmasiḥ yefka iman-is yiwet n tikkelt kan iwakken ad iɛebbi ddnubat n waṭas n yemdanen , a d yuɣal tikkelt tis snat , mačči iwakken ad yekkes daɣen ddnubat n yemdanen meɛna iwakken ad isellek wid i t-yețṛaǧun
58010001	Ccariɛa n Musa ur d-țbeggin ara tideț akken tella , meɛna d lemtel n lxiṛat i d-iteddun , daymi ur tezmir ara aț-țessiweḍ ɣer tezdeg ikemlen wid yețqeṛṛiben ɣer Ṛebbi s iseflawen i țqeddimen seg useggas ɣer useggas .
58010002	Ihi tura lemmer wid yețqeddimen iseflawen-agi , țwaṣeffan si ddnubat nsen , tili ur țțuɣalen ara ad fken iseflawen ɣef ddnubat-nsen , imi ad ḥṣun deg wulawen-nsen belli ṣfan .
58010003	Meɛna s iseflawen-agi țmektayen-d yal aseggas belli mazal-iten d imednuben .
58010004	Imi d lmuḥal idammen n iɛejmiyen d iqelwacen ad kksen ddnubat .
58010005	Daymi mi i gțeddu a d-yas Lmasiḥ ɣer ddunit yenna i Sidi Ṛebbi : Ur tebɣiḍ iseflawen , ur tebɣiḍ lewɛadi ; lameɛna tefkiḍ-iyi-d ɣer ddunit s ṣṣifa n wemdan .
58010006	Ur teqbileḍ iseflawen n lmal i tețțeț tmes , ur teqbileḍ iseflawen itekksen ddnub ;
58010007	Dɣa nniɣ : Aql-iyi-n ay Illu-yiw , usiɣ-ed ad xedmeɣ lebɣi-k , akken yura fell-i di tektabt iqedsen .
58010008	Teslam d acu i d-yenna Lmasiḥ ! Yenna : Ur tebɣiḍ iseflawen d lewɛadi , ur teqbileḍ iseflawen n lmal i tețțețtmes ur teqbileḍ iseflawen itekksen ddnub , ɣas akken iseflawen-agi țțunefken akken yura di ccariɛa .
58010009	Yerna yenna : Aql-iyi usiɣ-ed iwakken ad xedmeɣ lebɣi-k . S wakka Sidi Ṛebbi yekkes akk iseflawen imezwura , yerra-d deg wemkan-nsen asfel n Lmasiḥ .
58010010	Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yexdem lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi , isebbel iman-is d asfel , iṣeffa-yaɣ si ddnub ɣef yiwet n tikkelt .
58010011	Lmuqedmin țqeddimen mkul ass iseflawen n lmal ur nezmir ad kksen ddnub .
58010012	Ma d nețța yefka yiwen wesfel kan i dayem ɣef ddemma n ddnubat ; dɣa yeṭṭef amkan n lḥekma ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi ,
58010013	alamma uɣalen yeɛdawen-is seddaw iḍaṛṛen-is .
58010014	S yiwen wesfel kan yessazdeg i dayem wid yețwaxtaṛen .
58010015	Ula d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ibeggen-it-id imi gura di tira iqedsen :
58010016	Sidi Ṛebbi yenna : atan leɛqed ara sbeddeɣ gar-i yid-sen , M'ara ɛeddin wussan-agi ad skecmeɣ lumuṛ-inu deg wulawen-nsen , a ten-aruɣ di lɛeqliya-nsen
58010017	Yenna daɣen : Ur d-țmektayeɣ ara ddnubat akk-d yir lecɣal-nsen .
58010018	Ma yella Sidi Ṛebbi yeɛfa-yaɣ ddnubat-nneɣ , acuɣeṛ ihi i neḥwaǧ tura iseflawen n lmal ɣef ddnub .
58010019	Ay atmaten , imi uzzlen idammen n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ fell-aneɣ , nețkel a nekcem ɣer wemkan iqedsen ,
58010020	axaṭer yeldi-yaɣ abrid ajdid ɣer tudert mi gcerreg leḥjab , yeɛni lǧețța-s ițțusemmṛen .
58010021	Nesɛa lmuqeddem ameqqran yellan d aqeṛṛuy ɣef wexxam n Sidi Ṛebbi .
58010022	A nqeṛṛeb ihi ɣer Ṛebbi s wul d liman ikemlen , s wulawen-nneɣ zeddigen seg yir ixemmimen , s lǧețțat-nneɣ yuraden s waman yeṣfan .
58010023	Ilaq a neṭṭef deg usirem-nneɣ s wayes i nețcehhid , axaṭer win i ɣ-iɛuhden iteṭṭef deg wawal-is .
58010024	A nțemḥadar wway gar-aneɣ , a nțemweṣṣi ɣef leḥmala d lecɣal yelhan .
58010025	Ur ilaq ara a neṭṭixeṛ si tejmaɛt n watmaten akken uɣen tannumi kra nniḍen , meɛna a nțemyenhut wway gar-aneɣ imi ass n tuɣalin n Ssid nneɣ iqeṛṛeb-ed .
58010026	Ma yella nețkemmil nețɛici di ddnub s lebɣi-nneɣ yili nukni nessen tideț , ur d-yeqqim ara wesfel ara ɣ-yekksen ddnub-nneɣ ,
58010027	yeqqim-aɣ-ed kan a neṛǧu s lxuf ameqqran lḥisab i d-ițeddun ț-țmes iṛeqqen ara yeččen wid iɛuṣan Ṛebbi .
58010028	Kra n win i gxulfen ccariɛa n Musa , ma yella cehden-d fell-as sin neɣ tlata inigan belli yuklal lmut ad immet mbla ṛṛeḥma ;
58010029	amek ihi ara tedṛu d win ara yewten di Mmi-s n Ṛebbi , ur neḥsib ara idammen n leɛqed i t-iṣeffan , ara iregmen Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i ɣ-d-yewwin ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi .
58010030	Axaṭer neẓra anwa i d-yennan : ? țaṛ d ayla-w , d nekk ara ten-ixelṣen akken uklalen Yenna daɣen : D nețța ara iḥasben agdud-is .
58010031	A nnger n win ara d-yeɣlin ger ifassen n Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren !
58010032	Mmektit-ed ussan imezwura i deg twalam tafat n Sidi Ṛebbi d wamek tqublem leɛtab di tegniț n ccedda :
58010033	seg yiwet n tama reggmen-kkun , kksen fell-awen sser , si tama nniḍen tbeddem ɣer wid iwumi yedṛa wayagi .
58010034	? - țideț tḥunnem ɣef yimeḥbas yerna tqeblem s lfeṛḥ a wen-kksen ayla nwen , axaṭer teẓram belli tesɛam ayen yugaren ayagi yerna d ayen yețdumun .
58010035	Ihi ḥadret a wen-iṛuḥ laman i tesɛam ɣer Ṛebbi axaṭer a wen-d-yawi rrbeḥ d ameqqran .
58010036	Ilaq-awen aț-țesɛum ṣṣbeṛ iwakken aț-țxedmem lebɣi n Ṛebbi iwakken a wen-d-ye ayen i wen yewɛed .
58010037	Drus i mazal , di kra n lweqt a d-yaweḍ win akken ara d-yasen , ur yețɛeṭṭil ara .
58010038	Aḥeqqi ɣer ɣuṛ-i d win i gțeklen fell-i , yesɛan liman deg wul-is meɛna ma iwexxeṛ fell-i ad zziɣ udem-iw fell-as .
58010039	Ma d nukni ur nelli ara seg wid yeṭṭixiṛen i webrid n Ṛebbi , ur nelli ara seg wid yețțuɣalen ɣer deffir , yețḍiɛen , lameɛna nukni seg wid yesɛan liman , nețțeddu deg ubrid n leslak .
58011001	Liman ɣer Ṛebbi , d lețkal nesɛa belli a ɣ-d-yaweḍ wayen i nețṛaǧu , ɣas ur t-nwala ara s wallen-nneɣ neẓra ț-țideț yella .
58011002	Si zik wid i gɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi , d wid yesɛan liman deg-s .
58011003	S liman i nefhem belli ddunit tețwaxleq s wawal n Ṛebbi ; ihi ayen nețwali yekka-d seg wayen ur nețwali ara .
58011004	S liman i gqeddem Habil asfel i Sidi Ṛebbi axiṛ n wesfel n gma-s Kahin , ɣef ddemma n liman-ines Sidi Ṛebbi yeqbel asfel-ines yerna iḥseb-it d aḥeqqi ; daymi ɣas yemmut yeqqim-ed d lemtel ɣef liman .
58011005	S liman , Hanux yețwarfed ɣer igenni mbla ma tɛedda fell-as lmut , iɣab ɣef wallen , ur d-iban ara axaṭer irfed-it Sidi Ṛebbi ɣuṛ-es . Uqbel ad yețwarfed yeẓra belli yeɛǧeb i Sidi Ṛebbi .
58011006	Ihi , mbla liman d lmuḥal ad yeɛǧeb yiwen i Ṛebbi , axaṭer win ara iqeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es ilaq ad yamen belli yella yerna iqebbel-ed wid yețnadin fell-as .
58011007	S liman , i gumen nnbi Nuḥ ayen i s-d-iweḥḥa Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wayen ara yedṛun , ɣas akken mazal ur iwala acemma s wallen-is , yebna lbabuṛ iwakken ad isellek at wexxam-is . S wakka i gḥuseb at ddunit imi yuɣ awal i Sidi Ṛebbi , yuɣal d aḥeqqi ɣuṛ-es ɣef ddemma n liman yesɛa .
58011008	S liman i guɣ Ibṛahim awal i Sidi Ṛebbi mi s-d-yessawel ad iṛuḥ ɣer yiwet n tmurt ara s-ye d lweṛt ; iṛuḥ ɣas akken ur yeẓri ara ɣer wanda ițeddu .
58011009	S liman daɣen i gɛac am ubeṛṛani di tmurt i s-yewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi , yezdeɣ deg iqiḍunen am nețța am warraw-is Isḥaq akk-d Yeɛqub iweṛten yid-es ayen akken i s-yewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi .
58011010	Yețṛaǧu tamdint ibedden ɣef lsas iǧehden , tin akken yebna Sidi Ṛebbi s yiman-is .
58011011	S liman , ? ara tesɛa-d dderya ɣas akken ț-țiɛiqeṛt yerna meqqeṛt di leɛmeṛ , tumen belli win i s-yefkan lɛahed , ad iṭṭef deg wawal-is .
58011012	Daymi seg yiwen wergaz iwumi kkawen ifadden teffeɣ-ed dderya s waṭas dderya n dderya-k ad ilin am yitran n igenni , am ṛṛmel yellan ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ , ur yezmir yiwen a ten yeḥseb .
58011013	Di liman , i mmuten akk yemdanen-agi uqbel a ten-id-yaweḍ wayen i sen-yewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi , lameɛna walan-t si lebɛid feṛḥen yis yerna setɛeṛfen belli d ibeṛṛaniyen , d imsebriden di ddunit .
58011014	Wid iheddṛen akka , iban țnadin tamurt i yiman-nsen .
58011015	Lemmer ndemmen imi ǧǧan tamurt-nsen tili uɣalen ɣuṛ-es ,
58011016	meɛna nutni țqelliben ɣef tmurt ifazen yeɛni tin n igenwan , daymi Sidi Ṛebbi ur issetḥa ara ad ițțusemmi d Illu-nsen axaṭer ihegga yasen tamurt .
58011017	S liman i gefka Ibṛahim mmi-s Isḥaq d asfel mi i t-ijeṛṛeb Sidi Ṛebbi , nețța iwumi d-țunefkent lemɛahdat , yeqbel ad ye mmi-s awḥid d asfel ,
58011018	nețța iwumi i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi : Seg Isḥaq ara k-d-fkeɣ dderya ara irefden isem-ik .
58011019	Yețkel ɣef Ṛebbi bab n tezmert belli yezmer a d-isseḥyu ula si ger lmegtin daymi i s-d-yerra mmi-s : ayagi yella-d d lemtel .
58011020	S liman , Isḥaq iburek arraw-is Yeɛqub akk-d Icaɛu ɣef ddemma n wayen i d-iteddun .
58011021	S liman daɣen i gburek Yeɛqub arraw n Yusef uqbel ad yemmet , s liman i gsenned ɣef wuɛekkaz iwakken ad iɛbed Ṛebbi .
58011022	S liman i gcar Sidna Yusef uqbel ad immet ɣef tuffɣa n wat Isṛail si tmurt n Maṣer , i gweṣṣa ad awin iɣsan-is yid-sen .
58011023	S liman , imawlan n Sidna Musa ffren-t tlata n wagguren mi d-ilul axaṭer walan aqcic yecbeḥ dɣa ur uggaden ara lameṛ n ugellid .
58011024	S liman , mi meqqeṛ Sidna Musa ur yeqbil ara ad ițțusemmi d mmi-s n yelli-s n Ferɛun ,
58011025	yextaṛ ad yeɛteb d wegdud n Ṛebbi wala ad iqqim di zzhu n ddunit-agi yețțawin ɣer ddnub .
58011026	Yefhem belli leɛtab n Lmasiḥ , d sɛaya tameqqrant yugaren igerrujen n tmurt n Maṣer axaṭer iwala ɣer zdat lerbaḥ i t-yețṛaǧun .
58011027	S liman i d-iffeɣ si tmurt n Maṣer ur yuggad ara agellid iweɛṛen , yeṭṭef di liman am win iwalan win akken ur yețwali yiwen .
58011028	S liman i gefka lameṛ ad zlun izimer n leslak , i gṛucc tiwwura s idammen n izimer-nni iwakken m'ara d-iɛeddi win yessengaren ur yețnal ara imenza i d-ilulen ɣer wat Isṛail .
58011029	S liman , agdud n Isṛail yezger ɣef wuḍar i lebḥeṛ azeggaɣ , ma d imaṣriyen mi ɛeṛden ad zegren am nutni , yečča-ten .
58011030	S liman i ɣlin leswaṛ n temdint n Yeriku mi i s-yezzi wegdud n Isṛail sebɛa wussan .
58011031	S liman , Ṛaḥab yellan d yir tameṭṭut ur temmut ara akk-d wid ur numin ara s Ṛebbi axaṭer testeṛḥeb akken ilaq s wid i d-yusan ad ssiwḍen lexbaṛ i wat Isṛail a sen-awin lexbaṛ .
58011032	D acu ara d-iniɣ daɣen ? Aṭas n lweqt i glaqen iwakken a d-hedṛeɣ ɣef Gidɛun , ɣef Baraq , ɣef Samsun , ɣef Jifti , ɣef Sidna Dawed , ɣef Camwil neɣ ɣef lenbiya meṛṛa .
58011033	Wid i grebḥen deg umenɣi tigeldiwin nniḍen s liman , xedmen anagar lḥeqq , țțunefkent-asen-d lemɛahdat , zemmemen imawen n yizmawen ,
58011034	ɣelben tazmert n tmes , menɛen i ujenwi qeṭṭiɛen , ḥlan si lehlakat-nsen , zewṛen deg umenɣi , lɛeskeṛ n tmura nniḍen rewlen zdat-sen .
58011035	Kra n tilawin walant wid i sent-yemmuten uɣalen-d si ger lmegtin , wiyaḍ țwaqehṛen meɛna ur qbilen ara ṛṛeḥma n yemdanen iwakken ad sɛun ḥeggu n tideț .
58011036	Wiyaḍ daɣen țwaqehṛen s ustehzi , s ujelkkaḍ , s snasel d leḥbus .
58011037	? waṛejmen , țwajeṛben , țwagezmen s umencaṛ , mmuten s ujenwi , teddun sya ɣer da , llebsa nsen d ibḍanen n wulli ț-țɣeṭṭen , yețwakkes-asen kullec , țwaḥeqṛen , țwaqehṛen .
58011038	Nutni ur tuklal ara ddunit , țmenṭaren deg unezṛuf , deg idurar , deg ifran d mkul amkan n ddunit .
58011039	Widak-agi meṛṛa yețwaqeblen ɣer Ṛebbi s liman-nsen urɛad i ten-id yewweḍ wayen i sen-yewɛed ,
58011040	Axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ihegga-yaɣ ayen yifen ayen akken i sen-yewɛed i nutni , iwakken ur țțawḍen ara ɣer wayen akken ikemlen mbla ma nțekka yid-sen .
58012001	Ula d nukni ihi imi i ɣ-d zwaren waṭas inagan agi , a nḍeggeṛ taɛkumt-nneɣ akk-d ddnub i ɣ-iɣummen , a nexdem s ṣṣbeṛ ccɣel-agi i ɣ-d-ițțunefken .
58012002	A nṛeṣṣi tamuɣli-nneɣ di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , nețța i ɣ-d-ildin abrid n liman yerna yessawaḍ-it ɣer lekmal ; mi geẓra lfeṛḥ i t-yețṛaǧun , yeqbel leɛtab ɣef wumidag , yeqbel tamḥeqṛanit akk-d lḥecma , dɣa yeṭṭef amkan n lḥekma ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi .
58012003	Xemmemet ihi ɣuṛ-es aț-țwalim amek i geqbel leɛtab n yemdanen imednuben , iwakken ur tɛeggum ara , ur tfeččlem ara ;
58012004	axaṭer kunwi mazal ur tennuɣem ara akk-d ddnub armi d lmut ,
58012005	yerna tețțum lewṣayat i wen-d-ițțak am warraw-is . A mmi ur ḥeqqeṛ ara tiyita n Sidi Ṛebbi , ur feččel ara m'ara d-izzem fell-ak
58012006	axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yețqassa wid i gḥemmel , yețțak tiɣṛit i wid i geḥseb d arraw-is .
58012007	Qeblet leɛtab , imi Sidi Ṛebbi iḥseb-ikkun d arraw-is ; axaṭeṛ ulac argaz ur nețqassa ara mmi-s ;
58012008	lameɛna ma yella tmenɛem i tiyita-agi i gețḥazen imdanen meṛṛa , atan ihi ur tellim ara d dderya n leḥlal , meɛna tețțusemmam d arraw n leḥṛam .
58012009	Imi ibabaten-nneɣ i ɣ-d-isɛan țțaken-aɣ tiyita yerna nqudeṛ-iten , amek ur nețqadaṛ ara Ṛebbi yellan d Baba-tneɣ s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , iwakken a nesɛu tudert ?
58012010	Imawlan-nneɣ țṛebbin-aɣ dagi di ddunit akken i sen yehwa , lameɛna Baba-tneɣ n igenwan yețțak-aɣ tiɣṛit di nnfeɛ-nneɣ iwakken a nuɣal d izedganen am nețța .
58012011	S tideț m'ara ɣ-țṛebbin yețɣiḍ aɣ lḥal lameɛna m'ara tɛeddi teswiɛt-nni , a naf belli d ayen yelhan i tudert-nneɣ .
58012012	Sǧehdet ihi iɣallen-nwen yeɛyan akk ț-țgecrar-nwen ifeclen .
58012013	Ṛeṣṣit iḍaṛṛen-nwen , ddut deg ubrid n lewqam , iwakken win isquḍuṛen ur iɣelli ara meɛna ad ibedd .
58012014	Nadit amek ara tilim di lehna d medden meṛṛa , nadit ɣef ṣṣfa axaṭer win ur neṣfi ara ur izmir ara ad iwali Sidi Ṛebbi .
58012015	? adret ad yili gar-awen win ara yeṭṭixṛen ɣef ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi , ara yesɛun lɣecc , a t-yeǧǧ ad ye ixulaf deg wul-is alamma yuɣal d ugur ara iḍuṛṛen wiyaḍ .
58012016	? uṛ-wat ad yili gar-awen win ara ijehlen , ad iffeɣ i iberdan n Ṛebbi am Icaɛu yezzenzen lḥeqq-is n umenzu s uḍebsi n lmakla .
58012017	Teẓram mbeɛd , mi gebɣa ad iwṛet lbaṛaka s ɣuṛ baba-s ur yețwaqbel ara ɣas akken yețḥellil-it s imeṭṭawen , ur s-yufi ara abrid amek ara s-ibeddel ṛṛay .
58012018	Kunwi ur tqeṛṛbem ara am wegdud n Isṛail ɣer wedrar i gezmer wemdan a t-yennal , i deg tecɛel tmes ; ur twalam ara am nutni asigna d ṭṭlam akk-d țbuciḍant ,
58012019	ur teslim ara am nutni i ṣṣut n lbuq neɣ i ṛṛɛud n lehḍur-nni armi eɛnan ɣer Ṛebbi ur sen-d-irennu ula d yiwen n wawal .
58012020	Axaṭer ur qbilen ara imeslayen-agi : ? as d yiwen si lmal ara d-iqeṛṛben ɣer wedrar-agi , ad immet s weṛjam .
58012021	Ayagi d ayen yessexlaɛen armi ula d Sidna Musa yenna : Tekcem-iyi tugdi armi i țergigiɣ .
58012022	Lameɛna kunwi tqeṛṛbem ɣer wedrar n Siyun , ɣer temdint n Sidi Ṛebbi bab n tudert , ɣer temdint n Lquds yellan deg igenwan anda llant luluf n lmalayekkat .
58012023	Tqeṛṛbem ɣer tejmaɛt n wid yextaṛ Ṛebbi d imezwura yesɛan ismawen-nsen uran deg igenwan . Tqeṛṛbem ɣer Ṛebbi nețța i gḥekkmen ɣef yemdanen meṛṛa , tqeṛṛbem ɣer leṛwaḥ n iḥeqqiyen i gewwḍen ɣer lekmal .
58012024	Tqeṛṛbem daɣen ɣer Ɛisa i ɣ-ildin abrid ɣer Ṛebbi s lemɛahda tajdiṭ akk-d idammen-is yuzzlen , yesɛan azal akteṛ n wid n Habil .
58012025	? uṛ-wat ihi , smeḥsiset i win i wen-d-ițmeslayen , ur xeddmet ara am wat Isṛail yugin ad semḥessen i win i sen-d-iceggeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi akken a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid , axaṭer ma yella nutni yeɣli-d fell-asen lɛiqab n Ṛebbi amek ara nemneɛ seg-s nukni , m'ur nuɣ ara awal i win i ɣ-d-ițweṣṣin seg igenwan .
58012026	Zik-nni , s ṣṣut-is yessenhez lqaɛa , ma ț-țura yefka-d lemɛahda-agi : Tikkelt nniḍen ad senhezzeɣ daɣen mačči kan ddunit meɛna ula d igenwan .
58012027	Imeslayen-agi « tikkelt nniḍen daɣen » sbeggnen-d belli ayen yețwaxelqen ad yenhezz ad yenger iwakken a d-yeqqim kan wayen yețdumun .
58012028	? ef wannect-agi imi i ɣ-d tețțune tgeldit ibedden ɣef lsas iṣeḥḥan a neḥmed a ncekkeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi s weɛbad i s-iɛeǧben , s liman ț-țugdi .
58012029	Axaṭer Illu-nneɣ am tmes itețțen .
58013001	Kemmlet myeḥmalet wway gar-awen am atmaten ,
58013002	ur tețțut ara daɣen belli ilaq-awen aț-țesṭreḥbem s ibeṛṛaniyen axaṭer aṭas i gesṭṛeḥben s lmalayekkat mbla ma ẓran .
58013003	Xemmemet ihi ɣef yimeḥbas am akken yid-sen i tețwaḥebsem , mmektit-ed wid yenneɛtaben am akken ula d kunwi tenneɛtabem yid-sen .
58013004	Ilaq-awen aț-țefkem azal i zzwaǧ , argaz ț-țmeṭṭut-is ur țemyexdaɛen ara axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ad iɛaqeb wid izennun ileḥḥun deg yir abrid .
58013005	Ur țaǧǧat ara iman-nwen a kkun ɣuṛṛen yedrimen , setqenɛet s wayen tesɛam . Sidi Ṛebbi s yiman-is yenna d : U r k-țaǧǧaɣ ara , ad iliɣ yid-ek .
58013006	Daymi i nețkel , nezmer a d-nini : Sidi Ṛebbi d amɛawen-inu , ulac ayen ara aggadeɣ ; d acu i gezmer a yi-t-ixdem wemdan ?
58013007	Mmektit-ed wid i wen-yemlan abrid , i wen d-ibeccṛen awal n Ṛebbi ; meyzet amek tekfa tudert nsen , sɛut liman am nutni .
58013008	Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , d win yellan iḍelli , i gellan ass-a , ara yilin i dayem .
58013009	? uṛ-wat aț-tebɛem ddyanat tibeṛṛaniyin ; axaṭer d ul yeččuṛen d ṛṛeḥma i gelhan mačči d win yeččuṛen d leqwanen yeɛnan lmakla ; wid yettabaɛen ayagi ur stenfɛen acemma .
58013010	? uṛ-nneɣ adekkan n tmezliwt anda ur zmiren ara lmuqedmin iqeddcen deg uqiḍun n temlilit ad ččen ayen i d yețțunefken d asfel .
58013011	Teẓram belli lmuqeddem ameqqran ikeččem ɣer wemkan iqedsen nezzeh , yețțawi yid-es idammen n lmal iwakken a ten iqeddem ɣef ddnub , ma d lǧețțat yesseṛɣay-itent beṛṛa n uqiḍun .
58013012	? ef wayagi Sidna Ɛisa daɣen yemmut beṛṛa n temdint iwakken s idammen-is , ad yessizdeg agdud meṛṛa .
58013013	A nṛuḥet ihi ɣuṛ-es ɣer beṛṛa , a neqbel a nețwakṛeh am nețța .
58013014	Imi dagi di ddunit ur nesɛi ara tamezduɣt n dayem , nețnadi ɣef tmezduɣt n igenwan .
58013015	A neḥmed Ṛebbi di mkul lweqt , s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa ; d wagi i d asfel ara s-nqeddem i Sidi Ṛebbi , m'ara nețberriḥ isem-is .
58013016	Ur stehzayet ara , xedmet ayen yelhan , țemɛawanet : d wigi i d iseflawen iɛeǧben Sidi Ṛebbi .
58013017	Aɣet awal i wid i wen-immalen abrid , ḍuɛet-țen axaṭer țɛassan fell awen , ẓran a d-yas wass deg ara ten-iḥaseb Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef lxedma nsen . Akka ara xedmen ccɣel-nsen akken ilaq s lfeṛḥ mačči s leḥzen neɣ m'ulac ur tseɛɛum ara lfayda .
58013018	Deɛɛut ɣer Ṛebbi s lxiṛ fell aneɣ , axaṭer neẓra nesɛa ul yethennan , nḥemmel a neddu akken ilaq di mkul taswiɛt .
58013019	Ad ssutreɣ deg-wen aț-țedɛum ɣer Ṛebbi fell-i iwakken ur țɛeṭṭileɣ ara a n-uɣaleɣ ɣuṛ-wen .
58013020	Ad ssutreɣ di Sidi Ṛebbi bab n talwit i d-isseḥyan Ssid-nneɣ yellan d Ameksa ameqqran s idammen-is yuzzlen , i ɣef tbedd lemɛahda n dayem ,
58013021	a kkun-yawi d webrid yelhan , aț-țxedmem kra yellan d lebɣi-s . Ad yexdem deg-neɣ lebɣi-s s yisem n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , nețța yesɛan tamanegt i dayem . Amin .
58013022	Ay atmaten , a wen-ssutreɣ aț-țqeblem s ṣṣbeṛ ayagi akk i ɣef kkun-weṣṣaɣ ; atan tabṛaț-agi i wen-uriɣ ț-țamecṭuḥt .
58013023	A kkun xebbṛeɣ belli gma-tneɣ Timuti yeffeɣ-ed si lḥebs , ma yella ilḥeq-ed zik , atan a d-nṛuḥ ɣuṛ-wen nekk yid-es .
58013024	Sellmet ɣef yimeqqranen akk n tejmaɛt d watmaten meṛṛa . Atan țsellimen-d fell-awen watmaten n ? elyan .
58013025	Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țili yid-wen meṛṛa .
59001001	Nekk Yeɛqub aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , sslam-iw i tnac leɛṛac n wegdud n Sidi Ṛebbi yenwezzaɛen di ddunit meṛṛa !
59001002	Ay atmaten , feṛḥet m'ara țɛeddayent fell-awen teswiɛin ujeṛṛeb ,
59001003	axaṭer teẓram belli ajeṛṛeb n liman nwen yețțawi-d ṣṣbeṛ .
59001004	Meɛna ilaq ṣṣbeṛ-nwen a kkun issiweḍ aț-țxedmem lecɣal yelhan iwakken aț-țilim d wid yennekmalen , aț-țǧehdem ur kkun-yețxaṣṣa ula d acemma .
59001005	Ma yella yiwen deg-wen ixuṣṣ di lefhama , a ț-yessuter i Sidi Ṛebbi i d-yețțaken i yemdanen meṛṛa mbla cceḥḥa d ulummu , a s-ț-id-ye .
59001006	Lameɛna Ilaq a ț-yessuter s liman mbla ccekk ; axaṭer win yețcukkun icuba ɣer lemwaji n lebḥeṛ i greffed yesrusu waḍu .
59001007	Amdan am wagi ɣas ur iṭṭamaɛ ara di Sidi Ṛebbi a s-d-ye kra ,
59001008	axaṭer d amdan ur nesɛi ara yiwen n ṛṛay , lecɣal-is ur seḥḥan ara .
59001009	Lameɛna igellil ilaq ad ifṛeḥ imi i t-irfed Sidi Ṛebbi ;
59001010	ma d ameṛkanti ad ifṛeḥ imi t-id-issers Sidi Ṛebbi axaṭer ad ifnu akken ifennu ujeǧǧig n lexla .
59001011	M'ara d-yali yiṭij s leḥmu-ines yesseṛɣayen , imɣi ad iqqaṛ , ajeǧǧig-is ad iɣli , ccbaḥa-ines a s-tṛuḥ . Akka ara tedṛu d umeṛkanti , ad iṛuḥ a d-yeǧǧ deffir-es wayen akk yesɛa .
59001012	D aseɛdi wemdan i gteṭṭfen deg ujeṛṛeb ur iɣelli ara ; axaṭer m'ara iɛeddi seg ujeṛṛeb , a s-d-tețțune tɛeṣṣabt n tudert i gewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi i wid i t-iḥemmlen .
59001013	M'ara tețwaɣuṛṛem , ɣuṛ-wat aț-ținim : d Ṛebbi i ɣ-iɣuṛṛen axaṭer Ṛebbi ur yezmir ara a t-iɣuṛṛ wemcum yerna Nețța s yiman-is ur yețɣuṛṛu ula yiwen .
59001014	Lameɛna yal yiwen deg-nneɣ yețɛedday deg ujeṛṛeb axaṭer d ccehwat n tnefsit-nneɣ i ɣ-ițɣuṛṛun .
59001015	Lebɣi n tnefsit yețțawi-d ddnub , ddnub mi gețwaxdem , yețțawi-d lmut .
59001016	Ay atmaten-iw eɛzizen ur ɣellṭet ara deg wayagi :
59001017	kra n tikci yelhan tețțas-ed seg igenwan , s ɣuṛ baba Ṛebbi i d-ixelqen tafat n igenwan , win akken ur nețbeddil , ur nețɣab am yiṭij iwakken a d-yeǧǧ ṭṭlam .
59001018	Yehwa-yas a ɣ-d-ye tudert s wawal-is n tideț , iwakken a nili d imezwura deg wayen akk i d-yexleq .
59001019	Ay atmaten-iw eɛzizen , teẓram belli yal yiwen deg-wen ilaq ad yesmeḥsis , ur ilaq ara ad ireffu neɣ ad yețḥawal ameslay ;
59001020	axaṭer amdan ireffun ur ixeddem ara ayen yellan d lḥeqq ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
59001021	Daymi i glaq aț-țḍeggṛem seg ulawen-nwen ayen akk ur nzeddig ara , d wayen yellan d cceṛ deg-wen ; meɛna qeblet s wannuz awal i geẓẓan deg-wen i gzemren ad isellek lerwaḥ nwen .
59001022	Mačči d asmeḥses kan n wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣer tella , lameɛna sbeggnet-ț-id di lecɣal-nwen ; neɣ m'ulac ț-țikellax kan i tețkellixem iman-nwen .
59001023	Axaṭer win yesmeḥsisen i wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi ur t-yexdim ara , icuba ɣer wemdan yețwalin udem-is di lemri akken yella .
59001024	Mi gwala iman-is , iṛuḥ , yețțu imiren kan amek akken i gella .
59001025	Ma d win yețmeyyizen akken ilaq ccariɛa iṣeḥḥan , ccariɛa i d yețțaken tilelli , iteṭṭfen deg-s mačči s usmeḥses kan ad yuɣal a ț-yețțu , meɛna ixeddem ayen i d-tenna , wagi ad yili d aseɛdi di lecɣal-is meṛṛa .
59001026	Ma yella win iḥesben iman-is yetbeɛ abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi yili ur yețțaṭṭaf ara iles-is , yesseɣlaḍ deg iman-is , abrid-agi i gewwi ur iṣeḥḥa ara .
59001027	Atan webrid iṣeḥḥan yellan ț-țideț zdat Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ : d m'ara terzum ɣef igujilen ț-țuǧǧal m'ara ilin di lmeḥna , d uḥader n yiman-nwen ɣef wayen n diri ara d-yekken si ddunit .
59002001	Ay atmaten , ur xeddmet ara lxilaf ger watmaten , d ayen ur nlaq ara ad yili ɣer wid yețțamnen s Ssid-nneɣ ameqqran , Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
59002002	Yezmer lḥal a d-kecmen ɣer tejmaɛt-nwen sin yemdanen , yiwen d ameṛkanti yelsa llebsa ifazen yeqqen taxatemt n ddheb , wayeḍ d igellil llebsa-ines tcerreg ;
59002003	ma yella tuzzlem ɣer umeṛkanti-nni yelsan llebsa ifazen tefkam-as lqima tennam-as : eyya-d aț-țeqqimeḍ dagi , d amkan n lɛali ; ma d igellil-nni tennam-as : kečč bedd kan dagi neɣ qqim-ed dagi ɣer iḍaṛṛen-nneɣ .
59002004	Ma yella akka , atan txeddmem lxilaf wway gar-awen , eɛni mačči d lbaṭel i d itekken seg yir ixemmimen-nwen ?
59002005	Ay atmaten-iw eɛzizen , ḥesset-ed : Sidi Ṛebbi yextaṛ igellilen n ddunit agi iwakken a ten-yerr d imeṛkantiyen di liman , yerna ad weṛten tagelda i gweɛɛed i wid akk i t-iḥemmlen .
59002006	Ma d kunwi tḥeqṛem igellil ! Tqudṛem imeṛkantiyen , wid i kkun yeṭṭalamen i kkun-yeẓẓuɣuṛen ɣer yexxamen n ccṛeɛ .
59002007	D nutni daɣen i greggmen isem eɛzizen s wayes i tneddhem ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
59002008	Ma yella txeddmem ayen i d-tenna ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi : ? emmel wiyaḍ am yiman-ik , d ayen yelhan i txedmem .
59002009	Meɛna ma yella txeddmem lxilaf ger yemdanen , tdenbem yerna ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi teḥkem fell-awen axaṭer tɛuṣam-ț .
59002010	Ma yella win i gteddun deg webrid n ccariɛa , ixulef ulamma d yiwen si lumuṛat-is , ihi yerẓa akk lumuṛat n ccariɛa .
59002011	Win i d-yennan : Ur zennu ara , yenna-d daɣen : Ur tneqqeḍ ara tamgeṛṭ . Ihi ma yella ur tezniḍ ara meɛna tenɣiḍ tamgerṭ , atan teṛẓiḍ ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi .
59002012	Ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli Sidi Ṛebbi a kkun-iḥaseb s ccariɛa-ines yețțaken tilelli ɣef kra n wayen i tețmeslayem d wayen i txeddmem ;
59002013	Sidi Ṛebbi ur yețḥunnu ara ɣef win ur nețḥunnu ɣef wiyaḍ meɛna win yețḥunnun ɣef wiyaḍ , ur yețțagad ara ass n lḥisab .
59002014	Ay atmaten , d acu n lfayda ara yesɛu wemdan ma yenna-d umneɣ s Ṛebbi , m'ur t-id-isbeggen ara s lecɣal-is ? Eɛni liman am wagi a t-isellek ?
59002015	Yezmer lḥal ad yili yiwen seg watmaten neɣ si tyessetmatin xuṣṣen di llebsa , lluẓen ur sɛin ara ayen ara ččen ;
59002016	ma yella yiwen deg-wen yenna-yasen kan : « qqimet di lehna , sseḥmut teččem aț-țeṛwum » yili nețța ur sen-yefki ara ayen ḥwaǧen , d acu n lfayda yellan deg imeslayen-agi ?
59002017	Liman ɣer Ṛebbi akka i gella : ma yella ur t-id-sbeggnen ara lecɣal nwen , liman-agi yemmut
59002018	Meɛna ma yenna walebɛaḍ : kečč tesɛiḍ liman ma d nekk xeddmeɣ lecɣal ; nekk a s-rreɣ i wagi : sken-iyi-d liman-inek mbla lecɣal , nekk a k-ed ssekneɣ liman-iw s lecɣal-iw yelhan .
59002019	Tumneḍ belli yiwen n Ṛebbi kan i gellan ? d ayen yelhan ; ula d ccwaṭen umnen yis yerna țergigin seg-s .
59002020	Teggumam aț-țfehmem ay imdanen ! Ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli liman mbla lecɣal n lɛali , ur infiɛ ara .
59002021	Mmektit-ed Ibṛahim baba-tneɣ yețwaḥesben d aḥeqqi ɣef ddemma n lecɣal-is m'akken i d-iddem mmi-s Isḥaq a t-yezlu d asfel i Sidi Ṛebbi .
59002022	Twalam belli liman-is d lecɣal is ddukklen , s lecɣal-is i gennekmal liman-is .
59002023	Akka i gedṛa wayen d-nnant tira iqedsen fell-as : Ibṛahim yesɛa liman di Ṛebbi , daymi yenneḥsab d aḥeqqi ; yețțusemma d aḥbib n Ṛebbi .
59002024	Twalam ihi ! Amdan yețban-ed d aḥeqqi zdat Sidi Ṛebbi s lecɣal yelhan mačči kan s liman-is .
59002025	Ula d Raḥab yellan d yir tameṭṭut , tețwaḥseb ț-țaḥeqqit zdat Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef ddemma n ccɣel-nni n lɛali i texdem asm'akken i tesṭerḥeb s yemceggɛen n at Isṛail mi sen-temla abrid nniḍen ara yawin iwakken ad ṛuḥen .
59002026	Lǧețța ur nesɛi ara Ṛṛuḥ , temmut , akken daɣen , liman ur nesɛi ara lecɣal yelhan yemmut .
59003001	Ay atmaten-iw , ur țnadit ara aț-țuɣalem meṛṛa d wid yesselmaden , axaṭer teẓram belli d nukni s wid yesselmaden , ara yețțuḥasben akteṛ n wiyaḍ ,
59003002	axaṭer nɣelleḍ meṛṛa , yal yiwen deg-nneɣ amek i gɣelleḍ . Win ur nɣelleḍ ara deg umeslay-is d amdan ikemlen , ula d lǧețța-s yezmer ad iḥkem deg-s .
59003003	Ma yella nerra aleggam deg yimi n uɛewdiw iwakken a ɣ-yaɣ awal , lǧețța-ines meṛṛa txeddem akken nebɣa .
59003004	Walit daɣen lbabuṛ , ɣas d ameqqran , yețsuḍu deg-s waḍu iǧehden , meɛna s yiwen ujeggu d ameẓyan , lqebṭan-ines issedduy-it ɣer wanda yebɣa .
59003005	Akken daɣen ula d iles ; ɣas mecṭuḥ deg yiman-is , yețzuxxu s lecɣal imeqqranen . Walit times tamecṭuḥt i gzemren aț-țesseṛɣ tiẓgi tameqqrant .
59003006	Iles daɣen ț-țimes , d bab n lbaṭel , yesɛa amkan di lǧețța-nneɣ yerna yessamas akk taṛwiḥt-nneɣ , yesseṛɣay akk tudert-nneɣ s tmes n ǧahennama i seg d-yuɣ aẓar .
59003007	Amdan yezmer ad iḥeṛṛeb yal ṣṣenf n lewḥuc : ama d wid iteddun ɣef ṛebɛa iḍaṛṛen , ama d ifṛax , ama d izerman ama d lewḥuc n lebḥeṛ yerna ț-țideț iɣleb-iten meṛṛa .
59003008	Ma d iles , ulac amdan i gzemren a t-yeɣleb . Yeččuṛ d ssem ineqqen ; d lehlak ur nesɛi ddwa .
59003009	Yis i nḥemmed Sidi Ṛebbi baba tneɣ , yis daɣen i nenneɛɛel imdanen i d-ixleq Sidi Ṛebbi ɣer ccbiha-s .
59003010	Seg yimi-agi i d-țeffɣent ddeɛwat n lxiṛ d nneɛlat . Ay atmaten-iw , ur ilaq ara ad yili wakka .
59003011	Eɛni yezmer yiwen n lɛinseṛ a d-ye aman ḥlawen akk-d wid ṛẓagen ?
59003012	Ay atmaten-iw , ulac taneqleț ara d-yefken azemmur , neɣ tara ara d-yefken tibexsisin , lɛinseṛ meṛṛiɣen ur yezmir ara a d-ye aman yelhan .
59003013	Ma yella yiwen deg-wen yefhem yetɛeqqel , ilaq a t-id-isbeggen s tikli-ines yelhan akk-d lecɣal i gxeddem s tmusni d wannuz .
59003014	Meɛna ma yella ul-nwen yeččuṛ ț-țismin tirẓaganin yerna tebɣam a d-tekkem sennig wiyaḍ ; ur xeddmet ara ccan i yiman-nwen , ur skiddibet ara , ur nekkṛet ara tideț .
59003015	Lefhama am tagi ur d-tekki ara s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi meɛna d lefhama n ddunit akk-d yemdanen , tekka-d daɣen s ɣuṛ Cciṭan .
59003016	Axaṭer anda llant tismin d wemḥizwer , yella ussexṛeb d mkul ccɣel n diri yellan .
59003017	Lefhama n bab igenwan uqbel kullec teṣfa , ț-țamhennit , ț-țuṛẓint , teččuṛ d leḥnana akk-d lecɣal yelhan , ur tesɛi timrurit ur tesɛi sin wudmawen .
59003018	Imawlan n lehna țeẓẓun s lehna ayen i d-issemɣayen ayen yellan d lḥeqq ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
59004001	Seg uxemmem i tețxemmimem ɣef yiman-nwen kan i d-itekk umennuɣ akk-d imenɣi gar-awen .
59004002	Tețmennim aṭas leḥwayeǧ lameɛna ur tezmirem ara tent-tesɛum ; tneqqem , tețțasmem ur d-tețțawim ayen tebɣam ; tețnaɣem yerna tețțemyenɣam , ur kkun-id-ițțaweḍ ara wayen tebɣam axaṭer ur tessuturem ara ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
59004003	M'ara tessutrem kra ur a wen-d - țune ara , axaṭer ur tessutrem ara akken ilaq , tessutrem kan wayen yellan d nnfeɛ-nwen .
59004004	Ay at leɛṛuṛ ! Ur teẓrim ara belli win iḥemmlen ddunit yekṛeh Sidi Ṛebbi ? Ihi , win iḥemmlen ddunit-agi d aɛdaw n Sidi Ṛebbi .
59004005	Tɣilem ayen akken yuran di tira iqedsen ur yesɛi ara lqima : belli Sidi Ṛebbi iḥemmel Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-iceggeɛ ad izdeɣ deg-wen armi yețțasem seg win ara iṭṭfen amkan-is ?
59004006	Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yețțak-ed ṛṛeḥma tameqqrant , akken yura di tira iqedsen : S idi Ṛebbi ur iqebbel ara wid yessemɣaṛen iman-nsen meɛna yețțak-ed ṛṛeḥma-s i wid yessanazen iman-nsen .
59004007	Ihi ḍuɛet Sidi Ṛebbi , ur țaǧǧat ara Cciṭan a kkun-yeɣleb dɣa ad yerwel fell-awen .
59004008	Qeṛṛbet ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , nețța a d-iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-wen . Ssizdeget ifassen-nwen ay imednuben , ṣṣfut ulawen-nwen , ay at sin udmawen .
59004009	Walit lɣelṭat-nwen , meǧdet , ilaq taḍsa-nwen aț-țuɣal d imeṭṭi , lfeṛḥ nwen ad yuɣal d leḥzen .
59004010	Anzet i Sidi Ṛebbi , nețța a kkun yerfed .
59004011	Ay atmaten , ur kkatet ara wa deg wa , win ara yewten di gma-s neɣ iḥuseb-it , yewwet-ed di ccariɛa yerna iḥuseb-iț . Ihi ma yella tewtem di ccariɛa , ur tellim ara seg wid ixeddmen wayen i d-tenna , meɛna seg wid yekkaten deg-s .
59004012	Kečč yețḥasaben gma-k d acu i tḥesbeḍ iman-ik ? D Sidi Ṛebbi kan i gețḥasaben i d-yefkan ccariɛa , d nețța kan i gețselliken i gețțaǧan i lmut .
59004013	Slet-ed tura kunwi i geqqaṛen : ass-a neɣ azekka a nṛuḥ ɣer temdint ihina , a neqqim aseggas , a netjaṛ iwakken a d-nerbeh idrimen !
59004014	Kunwi ur neẓri ara d acu ara wen-yedṛun azekka ! Kunwi yecban tagut i d-ițalin tɣelli !
59004015	Meɛna ilaq aț-țeqqaṛem : ma yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi , a nɛic am akka , ma yebɣa daɣen , a nexdem aya neɣ aya .
59004016	Meɛna kunwi tesɛam ixemmimen n zzux deg ulawen-nwen . Kra yellan d zzux am wagi diri-t .
59004017	Ma yella win yessnen ad ixdem ayen yelhan ur t-yexdim ara , yedneb .
59005001	Slet-ed tura ula d kunwi ay imeṛkantiyen : meǧdet ɣef ddemma n txeṣṣarin ara d-yeɣlin fell-awen !
59005002	Cci-nwen yerka , llebsa-nwen tečča-ț tumeṭ !
59005003	Ddheb d lfeṭṭa-nwen ṣeddeḍen ; d ṣḍiḍ-nsen ara icehden fell-awen , ara kkun-iččen am tmes . Tjemmɛem cci deg ussan-agi ineggura n ddunit !
59005004	Teččam lḥeqq n wid imegren igran-nwen , slet-asen i wigi ițcetkin ɣef lbaṭel-nwen , Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert yesla-d i leɛyaḍ-nsen .
59005005	Ddunit-nwen tesɛeddam-ț di lxiṛ , txedmem ayen akk mennan wulawen nwen ; tṛebbam tassemt i wass aneggaru .
59005006	Tḥekmem , tenɣam iḥeqqiyen yerna ur kkun-xuṣmen ara .
59005007	Ay atmaten , ṣebṛet ihi alamma d asm' ara d-yuɣal Ssid-nneɣ . Walit amek i gețṛaǧu ufellaḥ lɣella n wakal-is , iṣebbeṛ alamma yewwet-ed ugeffur n lexṛif ț-țefsut .
59005008	Ula d kunwi ṣebṛet , sǧehdet iman nwen , axaṭer tuɣalin n Ssid-nneɣ teqṛeb-ed .
59005009	Ur țemcetkayet ara wway gar-awen iwakken ur kkun-ițḥasab ara Sidi Ṛebbi ; axaṭer Bab n lḥisab , ibedd-ed ɣer tewwurt !
59005010	Ay atmaten-iw , mmektit-ed lenbiya i d-iceggeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi tecbum-d ṣṣbeṛ akk-d liman i sɛan di teswiɛin n leɛtab .
59005011	Ihi amarezg n wid yeṭṭfen ur fcilen ara . Teslam ayen i d-qqaṛen ɣef ṣṣbeṛ n Sidna Yub , yerna twalam daɣen d acu i geqsed Sidi Ṛebbi a s-t-id-ye , axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yeččuṛ d leḥnana akk-d ṛṛeḥma .
59005012	Ay atmaten-iw , ur țgallat s igenni , ur țgallat s lqaɛa neɣ s wayen nniḍen , meɛna init kan ih neɣ ala , iwakken ur kkun-ițḥasab ara Sidi Ṛebbi .
59005013	Ma yella yenneɛtab yiwen deg-wen , ad yedɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi . Ma yella win yellan di lfeṛḥ , ad yeḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi s ccnawi .
59005014	Ma yella yiwen deg-wen yehlek , ad issiwel i imeqqranen n tejmaɛt , ad dɛun ɣer Ṛebbi fell-as , ad dehnen aqeṛṛuy-is s zzit s yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi ;
59005015	ma yella dɛan ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s liman , țeklen fell-as , amuḍin-nni ad yețțusellek ; Sidi Ṛebbi a t-yesseḥlu yerna a s-isemmeḥ ddnubat-is .
59005016	? emqiṛit ddnubat-nwen wway gar-awen , wa ad yedɛu i wa s lxiṛ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken aț-țeḥlum . Ddeɛwat n win yellan d aḥeqqi zdat Sidi Ṛebbi , sɛant tazmert tameqqrant .
59005017	Nnbi Ilyas yella d argaz am nukni : meɛna mi gessuter ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s wul-is iwakken ur d-tɣelli ara lehwa , ur d-teɣli ara tlata iseggasen d sețța waguren
59005018	Yessuter daɣen a d-teɣli lehwa dɣa teɣli-d , lqaɛa tefka-d leṛẓaq-is .
59005019	Ay atmaten-iw , ma yella yiwen deg-wen iɛṛeq-as webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi , yerra-t-id wayeḍ ɣer webrid ,
59005020	ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli win ara d-yerren yiwen umednub ɣer webrid , isellek-it-id si lmut yerna aṭas si ddnubat-is ara yețțusemḥen .
60001001	Nekk Buṭrus , amceggeɛ n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , i yeɣṛiben ițɛicin di tmurt n Galasya , n Kafadusya , n Asya , n Bitinya akk-d wid yellan di tmurt n tqenṭert .
60001002	Akken i t-iqsed Baba Ṛebbi , tețwaxtaṛem si tazwara s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen iwakken aț-țḍuɛem Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , a kkun-iṣfu s idammen-is yuzzlen . Ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d tețțunefkent s tugeț .
60001003	Ad ițțubarek Ṛebbi , Baba-s n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i ɣ-d-ifkan s ṛṛeḥma-ines tudert tajḍiṭ s ḥeggu n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ si ger lmegtin , s wakka i nesɛa asirem ameqqran ,
60001004	iwakken a newṛet ayen ur nrekku , ur nețțames , ur nfennu . D annect-agi i kkun-ițṛaǧun deg igenwan kunwi yumnen yis .
60001005	Sidi Ṛebbi ițḥadar fell-awen s tezmert-is alamma iban-ed leslak nwen di taggara .
60001006	D ayagi i kkun-issefṛaḥen ɣas akken tura sseḥzanent-kkun teswiɛin agi deg ilaq a d-tɛeddim seg ujeṛṛeb .
60001007	D uguren-agi ara d-isbeggnen lǧehd n liman-nwen i gesɛan azal akteṛ n ddheb ; ɣas akken ddheb-agi ifennu , ilaq-as ad iɛeddi di tmes iwakken ad iṣfu . Akken daɣen ula d liman-nwen ilaq ad ițțujeṛṛeb ; s wakka a wen-yili d sebba n ccan , n ucekkeṛ , akk-d tmanegt asm'ara d-yuɣal Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
60001008	Tḥemmlem-t mbla ma twalam-t , tumnem yis ɣas akken ar tura ur t-teẓrim ara . Daymi lfeṛḥ-nwen d ameqqran armi ur tezmirem ara a t-id-tesfehmem s imeslayen .
60001009	Axaṭeṛ lfayda n liman-nwen , d leslak n teṛwiḥin-nwen .
60001010	Lenbiya caren-d ɣef wayen yeɛnan leslak i wen-d-ihegga Sidi Ṛebbi . Meyzen , qellben a d-afen lawan d wamek ara d-idṛu wayen i d-ixebbeṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Lmasiḥ yellan deg-sen ; axaṭer d Ṛṛuḥ-agi n Lmasiḥ i d-ixebbṛen ɣef wayen ara inneɛtab Lmasiḥ akk-d tmanegt ara d-yasen deffir leɛtab-agi .
60001011	
60001012	Ițțubeggen-asen-d belli mačči i nutni , meɛna i kunwi i d-xebbṛen ayagi . D ayen i wen-d-xebbṛen tura wid ițbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-ițțucegɛen seg igenni . Ula d lmalayekkat bɣant ad walint annect-agi .
60001013	Daymi , sǧehdet leɛqel-nwen , ur ɣefflet ara , ɛasset iman-nwen , sɛut asirem iṣeḥḥan di leslak ara wen d-ițțunefken asm' ara d-yuɣal Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
60001014	Ilit am arrac ițțaɣen awal , ur xeddmet ara ayen akk i txeddmem asm' akken werɛad i kkun-tekcim tmusni ,
60001015	meɛna ilit teṣfam di tikli-nwen am akken iṣfa Sidi Ṛebbi i wen-d issawlen .
60001016	Imi yura : Ilit teṣfam axaṭer nekk ṣfiɣ .
60001017	Ma tnedhem ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi am akken d Baba-twen , sbeggnet-ed di tudert-nwen belli tḍuɛem-t s leqdeṛ ameqqran , deg wussan i wen-d iqqimen di ddunit-agi ; nețța ur nxeddem lxilaf ger yemdanen , yețḥasaben yal yiwen s wakken llan lecɣal-is .
60001018	Teẓram belli mačči s idrimen neɣ s ddheb neɣ s lfeṭṭa ur nețdum ara i tețwacafɛem si yir tikli i wen-d-ǧǧan lejdud-nwen ,
60001019	meɛna s idammen ɣlayen n Lmasiḥ , i gefkan iman-is d asfel am izimer ur nesɛi lɛib , ur nesɛi ccama .
60001020	Ihegga-t-id Sidi Ṛebbi uqbel a d-texleq ddunit , meɛna armi d ussan-agi ineggura i t-id-isbeggen ɣef ddemma-nwen .
60001021	Imi yis i tesɛam liman ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi i t-id-isseḥyan si ger lmegtin , i s-ifkan tamanegt tameqqrant , iwakken lsas n usirem-nwen akk-d liman-nwen ad ilin di Sidi Ṛebbi .
60001022	Imi tessazdgem ulawen-nwen , teddam di tideț , akken aț-țḥemmlem seg wul atmaten-nwen , myeḥmalet ihi wway gar-awen s wul yeṣfan
60001023	axaṭer tɛawdem-d talalit ɣer tudert tajḍiṭ . Talalit-agi mačči seg wemdan ițmețțaten i d-tekka , meɛna seg wawal n tudert ițdumun n Sidi Ṛebbi .
60001024	Akken yella di tira iqedsen : Amdan am leḥcic , + ccan-is meṛṛa am ujeǧǧig n lexla , + leḥcic ițɣaṛ , ajeǧǧig iɣelli ,
60001025	ma d awal n Sidi Ṛebbi + ițdumu i dayem + . Awal-agi , d awal n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wen-d-ițțubecṛen .
60002001	Kkset seg ulawen-nwen cceṛ , tiḥila , tismin ; ur seɛɛut ara sin wudmawen , ur țmeslayet ara ayen n diri ɣef wiyaḍ .
60002002	Am llufan illuẓen ayefki n yemma-s , nadit ula d kunwi aț-țeṛwum awal n Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken aț-țimɣuṛem , aț-tețțuselkem ,
60002003	ma yella tjeṛbem acḥal yelha Sidi Ṛebbi !
60002004	Qeṛṛbet ɣuṛ-es nețța yellan d-azṛu nni yeddren i ḍeggṛen yemdanen , meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ixtaṛ-it , axaṭer azal-is meqqeṛ .
60002005	Ula d kunwi yellan am izṛa yeddren , dduklet iwakken ad ibedd wexxam i deg ara izdeɣ Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi . Aț-țilim ț-țajmaɛt n lmuqedmin ara iqeddmen s yisem n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , iseflawen iqedsen ara iɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi .
60002006	Axaṭer atan wayen yuran di tira iqedsen : Xtaṛeɣ-ed azṛu + yesɛan azal d ameqqran + , sserseɣ-t deg udrar n Siyun , + d nețța i geṭṭfen lebni , + win ara yamnen yis ur ineddem ara .
60002007	Amarezg-nwen kunwi yumnen yis . Ma d wid ur numin ara : Adɣaɣ-nni ḍeggṛen wid ibennun , + d nețța i guɣalen d azṛu alemmas , + Win yeṭṭfen lebni .
60002008	D wagi i d azṛu + i guɣalen d ugur i yemdanen , + d azṛu i ten-isseɣlayen + . Imi ugin ad amnen s wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi , ayen i ten-ițṛaǧun d ugur-agi ara ten-iɣeḍlen .
60002009	Kunwi d arraw n laṣel ițwaxtaṛen , d lmuqedmin n ugellid , d lǧens iṣfan , d agdud i d-ițwacefɛen . Tețwaxtaṛem iwakken aț-țbecṛem lecɣal yelhan n Sidi Ṛebbi , i kkun-id issufɣen si ṭṭlam yewwi-kkun-id ɣer tafat-is isteɛǧiben .
60002010	Zik-nni ur tewwiḍem ara ula d lǧens , ma ț-țura tuɣalem d agdud n Sidi Ṛebbi ; tellam zik-nni ur tesɛim ara ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi ma ț-țura tețțunefk-awen-d .
60002011	A wid eɛzizen ! Kunwi yellan d ibeṛṛaniyen , d imsebriden di ddunit a kkun-nhuɣ aț-țettixṛem i lebɣi n tnefsit i gețnaɣen d ṛṛuḥ-nwen .
60002012	Sɛut tikli ilhan ger wid ur nessin ara Sidi Ṛebbi , iwakken ɣas a d-skidben fell-awen , neɣ xedmen awen cceṛ ; m' ara walin lecɣal-nwen ilhan ad ḥemden Sidi Ṛebbi asm' ara d-yerzu ɣuṛ-sen .
60002013	Ɣef ddemma n Sidi Ṛebbi qadṛet wid iḥekmen . Qadṛet agellid imi d nețța i gḥekmen ,
60002014	qadṛet ineɣlafen-is imi d nețța i ten-isbedden iwakken ad ɛaqben imcumen , ad cekkṛen wid i gțeddun s lḥeqq .
60002015	Xedmet ayen yelhan iwakken aț-țerrem takmamt i imejhal ur nefhim ; d wagi i d lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi .
60002016	Ilit d ilelliyen , meɛna ur ssexdamet ara tilelli-nwen iwakken aț-țɣummem cceṛ i txeddmem , ilit d iqeddacen n Sidi Ṛebbi .
60002017	Qadṛet imdanen meṛṛa ; ḥemmlet atmaten nwen , ḍuɛet Sidi Ṛebbi , qadṛet agellid .
60002018	Ay iqeddacen ! Ilaq aț-qadṛem imɛellmen nwen , aɣet-asen awal ama i wid ilhan ḥninen , ama i wid iweɛṛen .
60002019	D ayen ilhan i win iṣebbṛen m' ara iɛeddi fell-as lbaṭel ilmend n ṭṭaɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi .
60002020	Ma tețwaɛaqbem imi txedmem kra n diri , ma tṣebṛem i wannect-agi , anwa ara kkun-icekkṛen ? Meɛna ma iɛedda fell-awen lbaṭel , mi txedmem ayen yelhan , tṣebṛem , d ayen yelhan ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi .
60002021	Ɣer wannect-agi i wen-d-issawel Sidi Ṛebbi , axaṭer Lmasiḥ s yiman-is inneɛtab fell-awen , iǧǧa-yawen-d lemtel iwakken aț țeddum di lateṛ-is .
60002022	Nețța ur nednib , leɛmeṛ ur d-iffiɣ lekdeb seg imi-s .
60002023	Nețța ițwaregmen ur d-yerri rregmat , qehṛen-t ur d-irfid afus-is ɣer yiwen ; lameɛna yerra kullec ger ifassen n win i gḥekmen s lḥeqq .
60002024	Nețța i gɛebban ddnubat-nneɣ , ițwasemmeṛ ɣef wumidag iwakken a nili am wid yemmuten ɣef wayen yeɛnan ddnub axaṭer ddnub ur isɛi ara tazmert ɣef wid immuten . S wakka , tura ur nețɛici ara di ddnub meɛna di lḥeqq , akken yura : Di leǧruḥ-is i tufam ḥellu .
60002025	Zik tellam am ulli iɛeṛqen , ma ț-țura , tuɣalem ɣer umeksa ițɛassan ɣef teṛwiḥin-nwen .
60003001	Kunemti daɣen a tilawin ḍuɛemt irgazen-nkunt , iwakken ɣas ma llan kra n yergazen ur uminen ara s wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi , s tikli ilhan n tilawin-nsen ,
60003002	ad amnen mbla imeslayen m' ara walin tikli-nsent teṣfa , tesɛa leqdeṛ .
60003003	Ur țzewwiqemt ara iman-nkunt s ufella kan , ama s ddheb , neɣ s llebsa ifazen , neɣ s wemcaḍ n ucekkuɛ nkunt ,
60003004	meɛna ccbaḥa-nkunt ilaq aț-țili deg wulawen-nkunt ; axaṭer ayen yesɛan azal ameqqran ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi : ț-țezdeg n wul , lehna d leḥnana , imi ayagi d ayen ițdumun .
60003005	Akka i țcebbiḥent iman-nsent tilawin iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi , yețqadaṛen irgazen-nsent ;
60003006	am Saṛa iḍuɛen argaz-is Ibṛahim , tessawal-as « A Sidi . » Aț-țuɣalemt d yessi-s ma txeddmemt ayen yelhan mbla tugdi .
60003007	Ma d kunwi ay irgazen , ḥadret tilawin-nwen imi teẓram ur ǧhident ara am kunwi . Ilaq a tent-tqadṛem axaṭer nutenti daɣen ad weṛtent yid-wen ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi ; s wakka ur d-ițili ara ẓẓeṛb i tẓallit-nwen .
60003008	Ihi sɛut akk yiwet n lɛeqliya , myeḥmalet wway gar-awen . Sɛut tagmaț , iḥninet , ddut s wannuz .
60003009	Ur țțarat ara țțaṛ , ur țarrat ara rregmat i wid i kkun-iregmen ; meɛna ddɛut s lxiṛ i wiyaḍ axaṭer d annect-agi i gețṛaǧu deg-wen Sidi Ṛebbi , iwakken aț-țweṛtem lbaṛaka-ines .
60003010	Win iḥemmlen tudert , + ibɣan ad yili d aseɛdi deg ussan-is : + + + Ad iḥader iles-is ɣef wayen n diri + d yimi-s seg yimeslayen ițɣuṛṛun + .
60003011	Ad issebɛed iman-is ɣef cceṛ , + ad ixeddem ayen yelhan , + ad ițnadi amek ara yili dayem di talwit ,
60003012	axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ṛeṣṣant wallen-is ɣef yiḥeqqiyen , + + isell-ed i tiɣṛi-nsen ; + meɛna ițeffer udem-is + ɣef wid ixeddmen cceṛ .
60003013	Anwa ara wen-ibɣun cceṛ ma yella tḥemmlem aț-țxedmem anagar ayen yelhan ?
60003014	Yerna ma yella tețwaḍelmem ɣef lḥeqq , feṛḥet ! Ur țțagadet ara imdanen , ur tḥeyyiṛet ara .
60003015	Ɛuzzet deg ulawen-nwen Lmasiḥ yellan d Ssid-nwen . Ilit dayem twejdem aț-țǧawbem s leɛqel d leqdeṛ i kra n wid i kkun-id-isteqsan ɣef wusirem nwen di Sidi Ṛebbi , iwakken ad ithedden wul-nwen ;
60003016	imiren wid i d-iskiddiben ɣef tikli-nwen ilhan deg ubrid n Lmasiḥ , ad nneḥcamen .
60003017	Axiṛ aț-țenṭaṛṛem ma txedmem ayen yelhan di lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi , wala aț-țenṭaṛṛem ma txedmem ayen n diri .
60003018	Lmasiḥ s yiman-is immut ; s lmut-agi-ines i gefra tamsalt n ddnub n yemdanen . Nețța yellan d aḥeqqi , immut ɣef ddemma n imednuben meṛṛa iwakken a kkun-yawi ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi . Nɣan lgețța-s meɛna yuɣal-ed ɣer tudert s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
60003019	S tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i gṛuḥ ad ibecceṛ i leṛwaḥ ițwaḥebsen ,
60003020	yugin ad amnen , asm' akken i ten-ițṛaǧu Sidi Ṛebbi s ṣṣbeṛ akken a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid-is ; asmi i gexdem Sidna Nuḥ lbabuṛ i ɣer kecmen anagar tmanya yemdanen i gmenɛen si lḥemla n waman .
60003021	Aman-agi , d lemtel n weɣḍas i kkun-ițselliken ass-a ula d kunwi . Aɣḍas-agi n waman mačči d ayen i gessizdigen lǧețța n wemdan , lameɛna ițbeggin-ed belli nefka tudert-nneɣ i Sidi Ṛebbi s wul yeṣfan . Ayagi yezmer a d-yedṛu i lmend n ḥeggu n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
60003022	i gulin ɣer igenni , yeṭṭef amkan n lḥekma ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi , sennig n lmalayekkat , sennig n tezmar d lḥekmat meṛṛa .
60004001	Am akken inneɛtab Lmasiḥ di lǧețța-s , kunwi daɣen ilaq-awen aț-țheggim iman-nwen ; axaṭer win i genneɛtaben di lǧețța-s iṭṭaxeṛ ɣef ddnub ;
60004002	iwakken ussan i s-d-iqqimen di tudert-is , ad iddu s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi , mačči akken ibɣa nețța .
60004003	Beṛka-kkun tura ! Tellam tețțeddum d wid ijehlen , ur nessin Sidi Ṛebbi : tellam d isekṛanen , tețțeddum deg webrid n lefsad d zzhu , tɛebdem lemqamat , ulawen nwen ččuṛen d ṭṭmeɛ .
60004004	Tura wehmen imi teṭṭaxṛem fell-asen ur tețțeddum ara deg webrid nsen i gețțawin ɣer nnger , daymi i kkaten deg-wen .
60004005	Lameɛna a ten-iḥaseb Sidi Ṛebbi , nețța yețḥasaben wid iddren d wid yemmuten .
60004006	S wakka , lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ițțubecceṛ ula i wid yemmuten iwakken ɣas țțuḥasben am imdanen n ddunit meṛṛa , ad idiren s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen akken ibɣa Sidi Ṛebbi .
60004007	Taggara n ddunit tețțeddu-d ! Ɣef wannect-a , sɛut leɛqel , ɛasset ɣef yiman-nwen iwakken aț-țizmirem aț-țeẓẓallem .
60004008	Lḥaǧa tamezwarut , myeḥmalet wway gar-awen seg wul , axaṭer leḥmala tețsamaḥ aṭas n ddnubat .
60004009	Țmesṭerḥabet wway gar-awen s wul iṣfan .
60004010	Mkul yiwen deg-wen d acu n tikci i s-d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi , ihi sxedmet-eț iwakken ad sfaydin wiyaḍ seg-s .
60004011	Win i wumi i d-yețțune ad ihḍeṛ , ilaq ad ihḍeṛ s imeslayen i s-d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi . Akken daɣen ma yella wayeḍ ițțunefk-as-ed ad iqdec , ad iqdec ɣef wiyaḍ s tezmert i s-d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi . Iwakken di yal ccɣel , ad ițwaḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi s yisem n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , bab n tezmert ț-țmanegt si lǧil ɣer lǧil . Amin !
60004012	A wid eɛzizen ! Ur wehhmet ara ɣef wujeṛṛeb i d-iɣellin fell-awen am tmes , ur xellɛet ara , axaṭer ayagi ilaq a d-idṛu .
60004013	Lameɛna feṛḥet imi i tețțekkim di leɛtab n Lmasiḥ , axaṭer asm' ara d-tban tmanegt-is , aț-țfeṛḥem yid-es lfeṛḥ d ameqqran .
60004014	Amarezg-nwen ma yella iɛedda fell-awen lbaṭel imi tumnem s Lmasiḥ ! Axaṭer Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen iččuṛen ț-țamanegt , Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi yella deg-wen !
60004015	Ḥadret a d-yili gar-awen win ara ițwaqehṛen axaṭer yenɣa tamgeṛṭ neɣ yuker , neɣ iger iman-is di lecɣal n wiyaḍ ;
60004016	lameɛna ma yella ițwaqheṛ imi yumen s Lmasiḥ , ur ilaq ara ad inneḥcam ; ilaq ad iḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef yisem-agi .
60004017	Yewweḍ-ed lweqt n lḥisab n Sidi Ṛebbi ; yerna ad ibdu seg wat wexxam-is . Ihi ma yella seg-neɣ ara ibdu lḥisab , amek ara tili taggara n wid ur numin ara s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi ?
60004018	Ma yella iwɛeṛ-as i uḥeqqi iwakken ad ițwasellek , amek ara tedṛu ihi d wemcum ur numin ara s Sidi Ṛebbi ?
60004019	Ma yella s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi i genneɛtab yiwen ; ilaq ad yerr kullec ger ifassen n win i t-id-ixelqen , ad ițkel fell-as , ad ikemmel di lecɣal-is ilhan .
60005001	Ad nhuɣ tura imeqqranen di liman yellan gar-awen . Nekk yellan d ameqqran am nutni , nekk iḥedṛen i leɛtab n Lmasiḥ , ițekkan di tmanegt-is ara d-ibanen ; a ten weṣṣiɣ :
60005002	Ḥadret wid i wen-d-iwekkel Sidi Ṛebbi akken ițḥadar umeksa ɣef qeḍɛit-is ; lhit ihi yid-sen s lebɣi-nwen , mačči sennig n wulawen-nwen , xedmet ayagi ɣef wudem n Sidi Ṛebbi mačči s ṭṭmeɛ .
60005003	Ur ssimɣuṛet ara iman-nwen ɣef wid i wen-d-iwekkel Sidi Ṛebbi , meɛna ilit d lemtel ara tebɛen .
60005004	Imiren asm' ara d-iban win yellan sennig imeqqranen meṛṛa , a wen d-tețțune tɛeṣṣabt n tmanegt ur nfennu .
60005005	Ula d kunwi daɣen ay ilmeẓyen , qadṛet imeqqranen di liman ! Ddut s leqdeṛ d wannuz , axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ur iqebbel ara wid ițzuxxun , meɛna ițțak ṛṛeḥma-s i wid ițțanzen .
60005006	Anzet ihi seddaw ufus iǧehden n Sidi Ṛebbi , iwakken a kkun-irfed di teswiɛt ilaqen .
60005007	Rret akk iɣeblan-nwen ger ifassen-is , axaṭer ițḥebbiṛ fell-awen .
60005008	Ḥadret , Ɛasset iman-nwen axaṭer aɛdaw-nwen d Cciṭan , ițezzi iṛeɛɛed am yizem , ițqellib anwa ara issebleɛ .
60005009	Ur s-țaǧǧat ara abrid , sɛut liman iǧehden ; axaṭer teẓram belli atmaten nwen di ddunit meṛṛa , akka i tdeṛṛu yid-sen am kunwi .
60005010	M'ara tenneɛtabem kra n wussan , Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n mkul ṛṛeḥma i kkun-ixtaṛen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ iwakken aț-țilim di tmanegt-is ițdumun , a kkun-iheggi , a kkun iseggem , a kkun-isseǧhed , iwakken ur tɣellim ara .
60005011	I nețța lḥekma si lǧil ɣer lǧil . Amin !
60005012	S ufus n gma-tneɣ eɛzizen Silwan i ɣef nețkel , i wen-d-uriɣ kra n imeslayen-agi iwakken a kkun-nhuɣ yerna ad cehdeɣ belli ț-țagi i d ṛṛeḥma n tideț n Sidi Ṛebbi s wayes tumnem .
60005013	Tajmaɛt n watmaten yumnen s Lmasiḥ , yellan di temdint n Babilun țsellimen-d fell-awen ; ula d mmi Maṛqus ițsellim fell-awen .
60005014	Msalamet wway gar-awen am atmaten ; talwit a d-ters fell-awen kunwi yumnen s Lmasiḥ .
61001001	Nekk Semɛun Buṭrus , d aqeddac , d amceggeɛ n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , i wid akk yesɛan liman am nukni , s lḥeqq n Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ akk-d umsellek nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
61001002	Ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d tețțunefkent s tugeț , s tmusni n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa .
61001003	Tazmert n Sidi Ṛebbi tefka yaɣ-ed ayen akk ilaqen i tudert d ṭṭaɛa ; yis i ɣ-d-isbeggen win akken i ɣ-ixtaṛen s ṛṛeḥma-s ț-țmanegt-is .
61001004	Yis-sent daɣen i ɣ-d-tețțunefkent lemɛahdat yesɛan azal d ameqqran , iwakken s tmanegt-agi-ines akk-d ṛṛeḥma-s , aț-țekkim di lecɣal n Sidi Ṛebbi , aț-țbeɛdem ɣef ṭṭmeɛ ițțawin ɣer lefsad n ddunit .
61001005	Ɣef ayagi , ǧehdet , ẓewṛet iwakken aț-țernum i liman-nwen tikli yeṣfan , i tikli yeṣfan tamusni ;
61001006	i tmusni rnut ḥekmet deg yiman nwen , ṣebṛet , i ṣṣbeṛ rnut ṭṭaɛa ,
61001007	i ṭṭaɛa tagmaț , i tegmaț leḥmala .
61001008	Ma yella wannect-agi deg-wen s tugeț , ur tețțilim ara d imeɛdazen , yerna ur tețɣimim ara mbla tamusni n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
61001009	Ma d win ixuṣṣen deg wannect-agi , am uderɣal isferfuden , ur ițwali ara , ițțu akk ddnubat-is iɛeddan i s-isemmeḥ Sidi Ṛebbi .
61001010	Ay atmaten , ẓewṛet , sǧehdet iman-nwen deg wannect-agi imi d Sidi Ṛebbi i wen-d-issawlen , d nețța i kkun-ixtaṛen . Ma txedmem ayagi , ur tɣellim ara .
61001011	S wakka daɣen ara wen-teldi tewwurt iwakken aț-țkecmem ɣer tgeldit ițdumun n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , amsellek-nneɣ .
61001012	A wen-d-țɛawadeɣ dayem annect-agi meṛṛa ɣas akken tesnem tideț-agi yerna teṭṭfem deg-s .
61001013	Skud mazal-iyi ddreɣ , ilaq-iyi a kkun-nhuɣ iwakken ur tɣeflem ara .
61001014	Axaṭer ẓriɣ belli qṛib ad ṛuḥeɣ si ddunit-agi , am akken i yi-d-ixebbeṛ Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ;
61001015	daymi i xeddmeɣ ayen iwumi zemreɣ iwakken ɣas mmuteɣ , a d-temmektim ayen akk i wen slemdeɣ .
61001016	Mačči ț-țimucuha i wen-d newwi mi i wen-d-neḥka ɣef tezmert n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ț-țuɣalin-is , meɛna s wallen-nneɣ i nwala tamanegt-is .
61001017	Nella yid-es asm' akken i s-d isbeggen Baba Ṛebbi ccan ț-țezmert , asm' akken i d-inṭeq Bab n tmanegt s imeslayen-agi : Wagi d Mmi eɛzizen deg-s i gella lfeṛḥ-iw .
61001018	Sṣut-agi i d-ikkan seg igenni , nesla-yas s yiman-nneɣ mi nella yid-es deg udrar iqedsen ,
61001019	yerna numen s wayen i ɣ-d xebbṛen lenbiya di tira iqedsen belli ț-țideț ; nenha-kkun aț-țerrem ddehn nwen ɣuṛ-sent , axaṭer ț-țaftilt iceɛlen di ṭṭlam alamma yuli wass , alamma ifeǧǧeǧ yitri n ṣṣbeḥ deg ulawen nwen .
61001020	Uqbel kullec , ẓret belli imeslayen akk i d-nnan lenbiya , yuran di tektabt iqedsen , ur d-kkin ara s ɣuṛ-sen ;
61001021	axaṭeṛ ulac ayen i d-xebbṛen s tmusni-nsen nutni , meɛna s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-nnan imeslayen i d-ikkan s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
61002001	Si zik llan lenbiya n lekdeb ger lɣaci , akken daɣen ara d-kkren gar-awen wid ara kkun-iɣuṛṛen s uselmed-nsen . A d-skecmen tamusni-nsen n lekdeb d usexṛeb , ad nekṛen ula d amsellek i ten-id-icufɛen ; s wakka ara d-sseɣlin ɣef yiman-nsen tawaɣit ur bnin fell-as .
61002002	Ɣas akken ffɣen i webrid , aṭas ara ten-iḍefṛen , ɣef ddemma-nsen ara ițwargem webrid n tideț ;
61002003	a ten-yawi ṭṭmeɛ , a wen kellxen s imeslayen n lekdeb ; meɛna nnger-nsen ur ițɛeṭṭil ara , tawaɣit tețṛaǧu-ten .
61002004	Teẓram belli Sidi Ṛebbi ur iḥunn ara ɣef lmalayekkat yeffɣen i webrid , meɛna iḍeggeṛ-iten ɣer tesra lqayen n ṭṭlam anda țwaqnent , țṛaǧunt lḥisab .
61002005	Ur iḥunn ara daɣen ɣef yemdanen n zzman aqdim asm' akken i sen-d iceggeɛ lḥemla n waman i lɣaci amcum ; issemneɛ seg-sen anagar Sidna Nuḥ ițbecciṛen lḥeqq n Sidi Ṛebbi , akk-d sebɛa n yemdanen yid-es .
61002006	Iɛuqeb timdinin n Sudum d Gumuṛ , issenger-itent , isxeḍ-itent s tmes , yerra-tent d iɣed ; ifka-d ayagi d lemtel i yemcumen iwakken ad ẓren d acu i ten-ițṛaǧun .
61002007	Issemneɛ anagar Luṭ yellan d aḥeqqi , yemmuɣbnen ɣef yir lecɣal n lɣaci amcum yellan di zzman-is .
61002008	Argaz-agi aḥeqqi ițɛicin gar-asen , itețț-it wul-is ɣef ayen i gsell d wayen țwalint wallen-is yal ass , ɣef yir tikli nsen d yir lecɣal-nsen .
61002009	S wakka Sidi Ṛebbi yeẓra amek ara isellek di teswiɛin iweɛṛen imdanen i gțeklen fell-as ; ma d imcumen a ten-yerr ɣer rrif i lɛiqab i d-iteddun ass n lḥisab .
61002010	Ad iɛaqeb widak-nni i gxeddmen lefsad , ițnadin anagar lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen , imi ur țțaken ara lqima i lhiba n Sidi Ṛebbi . Ur țqadaṛen ara , qebbḥen , ur uggaden ara ad regmen ula d lmalayekkat .
61002011	Ma d lmalayekkat yesɛan lqeḍra ț-țezmert sennig wid yesselmaden lekdeb , ur sen-țarrant ara rregmat zdat Sidi Ṛebbi .
61002012	Meɛna imdanen-agi țɛicin am lmal n lexla , lhan kan i ṣṣyada , ur țxemmimen ara , reggmen ayen ur ssinen ; ad ɣlin di tesra n ddnubat nsen , ad mmuṛdsen akken ițmuṛdus lmal .
61002013	D lbaṭel zerɛen ara d-megren , țțafen lfeṛḥ-nsen mi xeddmen ɛinani lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen . Sčuṛen d lɛib akk-d lḥecma , yerna m' ara qqimen yid-wen ɣer lmakla , ur țsetḥin ara s lehduṛ-nsen d ukellex-nsen .
61002014	Sṭamaɛen anagar yir tilawin iwakken ad znun yid-sent ; ur ɛeggun ara di ddnubat i xeddmen , țɣuṛṛun imdanen ur neǧhid ara di liman , ččuṛen d ṭṭmeɛ , ț-țarwa n deɛwessu .
61002015	Sǧan abrid n lewqam , ɛeṛqen mi tebɛen abrid i gewwi Belɛam mmi-s n Biɛuṛ i gḥemmlen ad yerbeḥ idrimen s lexdeɛ .
61002016	Lameɛna iḥeccem-it Sidi Ṛebbi , mi d-issenṭeq ɣuṛ-es taɣyult tagugamt s ṣṣut n wemdan ; s wakka i t-iḥbes , iwakken ur ițkemmil ara di yir ccɣel-is .
61002017	Imdanen-agi am tliwa iqquṛen , am usigna y
61002021	Axiṛ-asen i yemdanen-agi lemmer ur ssinen ara abrid n lḥeqq , wala imi i t-ssnen uɣalen ṭṭaxṛen i lameṛ iqedsen i sen-d-ițțucegɛen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
61002022	Yedṛa yid-sen am akken yella di lemtul : Ițțuɣal weqjun ɣer iriran-is ; qqaṛen daɣen : Ilef iwumi ssarden , yuɣal imiren kan ad ixnunes deg waluḍ .
61003001	Ay iḥbiben , ațah tebṛaț-iw tis snat i wen-d-uriɣ . Di snat yid-sent nudaɣ amek ara d-ssakiɣ di leɛqel nwen ixemmimen iṣfan s uselmed-agi i wen-d-smektaɣ .
61003002	Bɣiɣ a d temmektim imeslayen i d-nnan lenbiya iqedsen akk-d lameṛ n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ amsellek nneɣ , i wen-slemden yakan imceggɛen n Sidi Ṛebbi .
61003003	Tazwara , ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli deg ussan ineggura a d-kkren yemdanen ara iɛicen s lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen , yerna ad tmesxiṛen fell-awen ;
61003004	a wen-d-qqaṛen : anaɣ yenna-yawen a d-uɣaleɣ , ihi anda yella tura ? Lejdud-nneɣ ɛeddan mmuten , ulac ayen i gbeddlen seg wasmi i d-texleq ddunit .
61003005	Țțun belli di zzman aqdim asmi i d-ixleq Sidi Ṛebbi igenwan d lqaɛa ; s wawal-is i d-issufeɣ lqaɛa seg waman ;
61003006	S wawal-is daɣen i gessenger ddunit s lḥemla n waman .
61003007	Ula d igenwan d lqaɛa n tura s wawal-is daɣen i ten-ihegga iwakken a ten-issenger s tmes ass n lḥisab asm' ara iɛaqeb wid ur nḍuɛ ara Sidi Ṛebbi .
61003008	Ay iɛzizen ! Ɣuṛ-wat aț-țețțum ayagi : ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi alef n iseggasen am yiwen wass , yiwen wass am alef n iseggasen .
61003009	Sidi Ṛebbi ur ițɛeṭṭil ara ad ixdem ayen i d-yenna ; ɣas akken kra n yemdanen ɣilen iɛeṭṭel ; meɛna nețța d ṣṣbeṛ i wen-iṣebbeṛ iwakken ur inegger ula yiwen deg-wen , yebɣa a d-tuɣalem akk ɣer ubrid-is .
61003010	Ass n Sidi Ṛebbi a d-yas akken i d-ițțas umakar . Igenwan ad negren s yiwen zzhir d ameqqran , ayen yellan deg igenwan a t-tečč tmes , lqaɛa d wayen i ț-iɛemmṛen ad fnun .
61003011	Imi ayagi meṛṛa ad ifnu , acḥal i wen-ilaq aț-țḍuɛem Sidi Ṛebbi , aț-țeṣfum di tikli-nwen !
61003012	Aṛǧut , xedmet lmeǧhud-nwen iwakken a d-yeɛjel wass n Sidi Ṛebbi . Ass-nni i deg ara tekker tmes deg igenwan , i deg ara yefsi kra n wayen yellan deg-sen .
61003013	Meɛna nețṛaǧu am akken i ɣ-t-id-iɛuhed Sidi Ṛebbi : Igenwan d lqaɛa imaynuten ( ijdiden ) , i deg ara izdeɣ lḥeqq .
61003014	Daymi ay iɛzizen , deg uṛaǧu-agi tețṛaǧum ḥeṛset iman-nwen iwakken a kkun-id-yaf di lehna , zeddigit , mbla lɛib .
61003015	Ḥṣut belli ṣṣbeṛ ameqqran n Sidi Ṛebbi , d leslak-nwen ! Am akken i wen-t-id-yura gma-tneɣ eɛzizen Bulus s tmusni i s-d-ițțunefken .
61003016	D ayen i wen-d-iqqaṛ daɣen di mkul tabṛaț i deg i d-immeslay ɣef temsalin-agi . Llan deg-sent imeslayen iweɛṛen i lefhama , daymi imdanen ur neǧhid ara di liman , ixuṣṣen di lefhama , sseɛwajen lmeɛna-nsen akken i sseɛwajen ula ț-țira nniḍen , ayagi xeddmen-t i nnger-nsen .
61003017	A wid eɛzizen , kunwi yeslan s wannect-agi meṛṛa , ḥadret ɣef yiman-nwen , ɣuṛ-wat a kkun-ɣuṛṛen yemcumen ur numin ara s Sidi Ṛebbi , a kkun-sbeɛden ɣef ubrid-is i deg teṭṭfem .
61003018	Lameɛna nnernit di tmusni d ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , Amsellek-nneɣ . I nețța tamanegt am ass-a am ussan i d-iteddun i dayem . Amin !
62001001	Ɣef wayen yeɛnan win yellan d awal n tudert , i gellan si tazwara : nesla-yas yerna neẓra-t s wallen-nneɣ , nnulent ifassen-nneɣ yerna nerra ddehn-nneɣ ɣuṛ-es .
62001002	Tudert tban-ed , nwala-ț , nețcehhid fell-as , yerna nețbecciṛ-awen-d tudert n dayem yellan ɣer tama n Sidi Ṛebbi , tura tban-aɣ-ed .
62001003	Ayen nwala d wayen nesla nxebbeṛ-awen-t-id , iwakken ula d kunwi aț-țekkim di tdukkli-nneɣ , akken nella nukni d Baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi akk-d Mmi-s , Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
62001004	Uriɣ-awen ayagi iwakken lfeṛḥ nneɣ ad innekmal .
62001005	Ayen nesla s ɣuṛ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ newwi-yawen-t-id : Sidi Ṛebbi ț-țafat , ur yelli ara deg-s ṭṭlam .
62001006	Ma neqqaṛ deg webrid n Ṛebbi i nella yili mazal-aɣ nteddu di ṭṭlam , neskaddeb nexḍa i webrid n tideț .
62001007	Meɛna ma yella nteddu di tafat am akken i gella nețța di tafat , ad ddukklen wulawen-nneɣ , yerna ddnubat-nneɣ ad iriden s idammen n Mmi-s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
62001008	Ma neqqaṛ ur yelli deg-nneɣ ddnub , atan neskaddeb ɣef yiman-nneɣ , tideț ur telli deg-nneɣ .
62001009	Meɛna ma nețqiṛṛi s ddnubat-nneɣ i Sidi Ṛebbi , nețța yellan d aḥeqqi , nezmer a nețkel fell-as a ɣ-isameḥ ddnubat-nneɣ , a ɣ-isellek si lbaṭel .
62001010	Ma neqqaṛ mačči d imednuben i nella , nerra Sidi Ṛebbi d akeddab , awal-is ur yelli ara deg-nneɣ .
62002001	Ay arraw-iw imeẓyanen , uriɣ awen ayagi iwakken aț-țexḍum i ddnub , meɛna ma yeɣli yiwen di ddnub , nesɛa win yețḥuddun fell-aɣ ɣer Baba Ṛebbi , d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yellan d aḥeqqi .
62002002	Mačči ɣef ddemma n ddnubat nneɣ kan i gefka iman-is d asfel meɛna ula ɣef ddemma n ddnubat n yemdanen n ddunit meṛṛa .
62002003	Ihi ma nețțaɣ awal i Sidi Ṛebbi yerna nḥerrez lumuṛat-is , d ayagi ara d-isbeggnen belli nessen-it .
62002004	Win ara yinin : ssneɣ Ṛebbi yili ur yeṭṭif ara di lumuṛat-is , d akeddab , ulac deg-s tideț .
62002005	Ma d win yețțaɣen awal-is , iḥemmel Sidi Ṛebbi seg-wul-is . S wakka ara d-iban belli d ayla n Sidi Ṛebbi i nella .
62002006	Win ara yinin ṭṭfeɣ di Sidi Ṛebbi , ilaq ad ilḥu am akken yelḥa Lmasiḥ .
62002007	A wid eɛzizen , di tebṛaț-agi mačči d lameṛ ajdid i wen-d-wwiɣ , meɛna d lexbaṛ-nni i kkun-id-iwḍen si tazwara ; lameṛ-agi d awal-nni i wumi teslam yakan .
62002008	Meɛna zemreɣ a d-iniɣ belli lameṛ-agi d ajdid . Tideț-agi tban-ed di Lmasiḥ , tban-ed daɣen deg-wen ; imi ṭṭlam ițwexxiṛ , tafat n tideț tfeǧǧeǧ yakan .
62002009	Win yeqqaṛen leḥḥuɣ di tafat , yili nețța yekṛeh gma-s , mazal-it di ṭṭlam .
62002010	Win iḥemmlen gma-s , di tafat i gețțili , ur yelli ara deg-s wayen ara t-isseɣlin .
62002011	Ma d win ikeṛhen gma-s , di ṭṭlam i gella ; iteddu di ṭṭlam ur yeẓri anda ileḥḥu , axaṭer ṭṭlam isderɣel-as allen .
62002012	Uriɣ-awen ayagi ay ilmeẓyen imi i wen-țwaɛfan ddnubat-nwen ɣef ddemma n yisem-is .
62002013	Uriɣ-awen ay ibabaten , axaṭer tesnem win yellan si tazwara . Uriɣ-awen ay ilmeẓyen , axaṭer tɣelbem amcum . Akken i wen-d-nniɣ yakan ay ilmeẓyen , uriɣ-awen axaṭer tesnem Baba Ṛebbi .
62002014	Uriɣ-awen ay ibabaten , axaṭer tesnem win yellan si tazwara . Uriɣ-awen ay ilmeẓyen , axaṭer tǧehdem , awal n Sidi Ṛebbi yezdeɣ deg-wen yerna tɣelbem amcum .
62002015	Ur ḥemmlet ara ddunit d wayen yellan deg-s . Ma yella walebɛaḍ ihemmel ddunit , leḥmala n baba Ṛebbi ur telli ara deg-s ;
62002016	axaṭer ayen akk yellan di ddunit , lebɣi n tnefsit , ṭṭmeɛ di kra n wayen i gɛeǧben i wallen akk-d zzux i d ițekken si cci n ddunit , mačči s ɣuṛ Baba Ṛebbi i d-kkan lameɛna si ddunit .
62002017	Ddunit d wayen yellan deg-s ad iɛeddi , kullec ad ikfu ; ma d win ixeddmen lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi ad yidir i dayem .
62002018	Ay arrac imeẓyanen , ț-țaswiɛt taneggarut ; am akken teslam belli aɛdaw n Lmasiḥ iteddu-d , atan tura aṭas n yeɛdawen n Lmasiḥ i d-ibanen ; s wakka ara neɛqel belli d lweqt aneggaru .
62002019	Sṭaxṛen fell-aɣ axaṭer ur llin ara seg-neɣ ; lemmer llin seg-neɣ , tili qqimen yid-nneɣ ; ṭṭaxṛen fell-aneɣ iwakken a d-iban belli ur llin ara seg-neɣ .
62002020	Ma d kunwi , yesmar-ed fell awen Lmasiḥ Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , yerna tessnem akk tideț .
62002021	Uriɣ-awen mačči imi ur tessinem ara tideț , lameɛna imi ț-tesnem axaṭer ulac lekdeb i d itekken si tideț .
62002022	Anwa i d akeddab anagar win inekkṛen belli Ɛisa d Lmasiḥ . Aɛdaw n Lmasiḥ , d winna i gnekkṛen Baba Ṛebbi akk-d Mmi-s .
62002023	Win ara inekṛen Mmi-s n Ṛebbi yenkeṛ daɣen Baba Ṛebbi , ma d win iqeblen Mmi-s n Ṛebbi yeqbel Baba Ṛebbi .
62002024	Ma d kunwi , ayen teslam si tazwara ilaq aț-țeṭṭfem deg-s ; ma yella tjemɛem-t deg ulawen-nwen , ula d kunwi aț-țilim di tdukkli akk-d Baba Ṛebbi d Mmi-s .
62002025	Atan lweɛd i ɣ-d-ifka Lmasiḥ : ț-țudert yețdumun .
62002026	Uriɣ-awen ayagi ɣef wid yețnadin a kkun-ɣuṛṛen .
62002027	Ma d kunwi , Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-yesmar fell-awen Lmasiḥ yezga deg-wen , ur teḥwaǧem ara win ara kkun-islemden ; axaṭer d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-immaren fell-awen i kkun-isselmaden . Ayen i wen-yesselmad ț-țideț , ur yeskiddib ara . Sṭfet ihi di Lmasiḥ am akken i wen-t-isselmed Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
62002028	Ihi tura ay arrac imeẓyanen ṭṭfet di Lmasiḥ iwakken asm'ara d-iban a nesɛu lețkal , ur nțeffer ara fell-as si lḥecma ass n tuɣalin-is .
62002029	Imi teẓram belli Lmasiḥ d aḥeqqi , ilaq aț-țeẓrem daɣen kra n win ixeddmen lḥeqq s ɣuṛ-es i d-ikka .
62003001	Walit acḥal i ɣ-iḥemmel Baba Ṛebbi , armi nețțusemma d arraw-is ! yerna ț-țideț d arraw-is i nella . Ddunit ur aɣ-teɛqil ara d arraw n Ṛebbi imi ur tessin ara Sidi Ṛebbi .
62003002	A wid eɛzizen , aql-aɣ tura d arraw n Ṛebbi , ayen akken ara nuɣal werɛad i d-yedṛi , lameɛna neẓra belli m'ara d-yedṛu , a nili am nețța , axaṭer a t-nwali akken yella .
62003003	Kra n win yessaramen deg-s ad yeṣfu akken yeṣfa Lmasiḥ .
62003004	Kra n win idenben yerẓa ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi , axaṭer ddnub ț-țaṛuẓi n ccariɛa .
62003005	Teẓram belli Lmasiḥ yusa-d iwakken ad ikkes ddnub nețța ur nesɛi ddnub .
62003006	Kra n win yeṭṭfen deg-s ixeṭṭu i ddnub ; kra n win yețɛicin di ddnub ur t-iwala ur t-yessin .
62003007	Ay arrac imeẓyanen , ɣuṛ-wat win ara kkun-iɣuṛṛen . Win iteddun s lḥeqq d aḥeqqi akken yella Sidna Ɛisa d aḥeqqi .
62003008	Win yețɛicin di ddnub yedda d Cciṭan , axaṭer d nețța i d amednub amezwaru . Ɣef ddemma n wayagi i d-yusa Mmi-s n Ṛebbi iwakken ad yessenger lecɣal n Cciṭan .
62003009	Kra n wid yellan d arraw n Ṛebbi ur țɛicin ara di ddnub , axaṭer tudert i d-itekken s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi tella deg-sen ; ur zmiren ara ad ɛicen di ddnub imi s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-ɛawden talalit .
62003010	Atah wayen i d-ițbegginen lxilaf yellan ger warraw n Sidi Ṛebbi d wid n Cciṭan : kra n win ur nteddu ara s lḥeqq neɣ ur nḥemmel ara gma-s ur yelli ara si tarwa n Sidi Ṛebbi .
62003011	Atan lameṛ i wumi teslam si tazwara : ilaq a nemyeḥmal wway gar-aneɣ .
62003012	Mačči am Kahin yellan d amcum yenɣa gma-s , yezla-t axaṭer nețța lecɣal-is diri-ten , ma d gma-s iteddu s lḥeqq . f+
62003013	Ur wehhmet ara ay atmaten ma yella keṛhen-kkun wat ddunit .
62003014	Nukni nɛedda-d si lmut ɣer tudert axaṭer nḥemmel atmaten . Win ur nḥemmel ara , mazal-it di lmut .
62003015	Kra n win ikeṛhen gma-s d aqettal , yerna teẓram belli win ineqqen , ulac deg-s tudert n dayem .
62003016	Leḥmala n tideț , nessen-iț s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yefkan tudert-is fell-aneɣ . Ilaq-aɣ ula d nukni , a ne tudert nneɣ ɣef watmaten-nneɣ .
62003017	Ma yella walebɛaḍ yesɛan cci , iwala gma-s di lexṣaṣ ur d-iḥunn ara fell-as , amek ara tezdeɣ leḥmala n Sidi Ṛebbi deg wul-is .
62003018	Ay arrac imeẓyanen , ur ḥemmlet ara s wawal kan d yiles aẓidan , lameɛna leḥmala n tideț a d-tban s lecɣal-nwen .
62003019	S wakka ara nẓer belli di tideț i nella , yerna ad yethedden wul-nneɣ zdat Sidi Ṛebbi ,
62003020	ɣas yesseḍlem-aɣ wul-nneɣ : Sidi Ṛebbi sennig wul nneɣ i gella yerna yeẓra kullec .
62003021	A wid eɛzizen , ma yella ur aɣ-isseḍlem ara wul-nneɣ , nesɛa lețkal zdat Sidi Ṛebbi .
62003022	Kra n wayen ara nessuter , ițțak-aɣ-t-id axaṭer neḥrez lumuṛat-is yerna nxeddem lebɣi-s .
62003023	Atan wayen i ɣ-d-yumeṛ : a namen s yisem n Mmi-s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yerna a nemyeḥmal wway gar-aneɣ am akken yella di lameṛ i ɣ-d-yefka . f+
62003024	Win yețțaṭṭafen di Sidi Ṛebbi , iḥerzen lumuṛat-is , Sidi Ṛebbi yețțili deg wul-is ; yerna a neɛqel belli Sidi Ṛebbi yella deg ul-nneɣ s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i ɣ-d-yefka .
62004001	A wid eɛzizen , ḥadret iman-nwen ɣef kra n win ara wen-d-yinin heddṛeɣ s Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi , lameɛna jeṛṛbet-țen iwakken aț-țeẓrem ma yella s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i d-kkan axaṭer , aṭas n lenbiya n lekdeb i gellan di ddunit .
62004002	Atan wamek ara tɛeqlem ma yella yiwen yesɛa Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi : kra n win ara icehden belli Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yusa-d ɣer ddunit s ṣṣifa n wemdan , s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i d-yusa .
62004003	Ma d win ara inekkṛen ayagi ɣef Sidna Ɛisa , mačči s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-yekka lameɛna yekka-d si Ṛṛuḥ n weɛdaw n Lmasiḥ i ɣef teslam a d-yas ɣer ddunit , atan tura yella yakan di ddunit .
62004004	Kunwi ay arrac imeẓyanen , d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi i tellam , tɣelbem wid yesselmaden lekdeb , axaṭer Ṛṛuḥ yellan deg-wen yugar win yellan di ddunit .
62004005	Nutni n ddunit , daymi i țmeslayen s lɛeqliya n wat ddunit , yerna at ddunit smeḥsisen-asen .
62004006	Nukni d ayla n Sidi Ṛebbi ; win yebɣan ad yissin Sidi Ṛebbi yesmeḥsis-aɣ-d ; win ur nelli ara n Sidi Ṛebbi ur a ɣ-d-ismeḥsis ara : s wakka ara neɛqel Ṛṛuḥ n tideț akk-d Ṛṛuḥ n lekdeb .
62004007	A wid eɛzizen , ilaq a nemyeḥmal wway gar-aneɣ axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi s yiman-is , d leḥmala ; kra n wid yesɛan leḥmala deg ulawen-nsen , d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi i llan yerna ssnen Sidi Ṛebbi .
62004008	Kra n win ur nesɛi ara leḥmala deg wul-is ur yessin ara Sidi Ṛebbi , axaṭer leḥmala s ɣuṛ-es i d-tekk .
62004009	Atah wamek i d-isban Sidi Ṛebbi belli iḥemmel-aɣ : Sidi Ṛebbi iceggeɛ-ed Mmi-s awḥid ɣer ddunit iwakken yis a nesɛu tudert .
62004010	Ațah d acu i d leḥmala : mačči d nukni i gḥemmlen Sidi Ṛebbi lameɛna d nețța i ɣ-iḥemmlen armi i d iceggeɛ Mmi-s ad ye iman-is d asfel i leɛfu n ddnubat-nneɣ .
62004011	A wid eɛzizen , ma yella Sidi Ṛebbi iḥemmel-aɣ annect-agi , ilaq ula d nukni a nemyeḥmal wway gar-aneɣ .
62004012	Ulac win iwalan Sidi Ṛebbi s wallen-is , meɛna ma yella nemyeḥmal wway gar-aneɣ , Baba Ṛebbi yețțili deg-nneɣ , leḥmala-s tețban-ed deg-nneɣ .
62004013	Atah wamek ara neɛqel nukni nețțili deg-s nețța yețțili deg-nneɣ : imi i ɣ-d-yefka Ṛṛuḥ-ines .
62004014	Nukni s yiman-nneɣ netɛeǧǧeb deg-s , daymi nezmer a d-neched belli Baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi iceggeɛ-ed Mmi-s , i leslak n ddunit .
62004015	Kra n win ara icehden belli Ɛisa d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi , Ṛebbi ad yețțili deg wul-is , nețța ad iṭṭef di Sidi Ṛebbi .
62004016	Nukni nessen leḥmala i ɣ-iḥemmel Sidi Ṛebbi , yerna numen yis . Sidi Ṛebbi , d leḥmala ; win yesɛan leḥmala deg wul-is yeṭṭef di Sidi Ṛebbi , Sidi Ṛebbi yezdeɣ deg ul-is .
62004017	Ma yella tennekmal leḥmala deg ulawen-nneɣ , a nesɛu lețkal i wass n lḥisab , axaṭer ayen yețɛeddin fell-aɣ di ddunit-a , d ayen yesɛedda Lmasiḥ s yiman-is .
62004018	Win yesɛan leḥmala n tideț ur t-tkeččem ara tugdi ; leḥmala n tideț tessufuɣ tugdi , axaṭer tugdi tețțas-ed si lxuf n lɛiqab , win yețɛicin di tugdi werɛad yessaweḍ ɣer leḥmala n tideț .
62004019	Ma d nukni , nḥemmel Sidi Ṛebbi axaṭer d nețța i ɣ-iḥemmlen d amezwaru .
62004020	Kra n win yeqqaṛen : ḥemmleɣ Sidi Ṛebbi yili yekṛeh gma-s , d akeddab , axaṭer win ur nḥemmel ara gma-s i gețwali , ur izmir ara ad iḥemmel Sidi Ṛebbi ur yețwali ara .
62004021	Atan ihi lameṛ i ɣ-d-iǧǧa Lmasiḥ : win iḥemmlen Sidi Ṛebbi ad iḥemmel daɣen gma-s . f+
62005001	Kra n wid yumnen belli d Ɛisa i d Lmasiḥ , uɣalen d arraw n Ṛebbi ; daɣen wid iḥemmlen Baba Ṛebbi , ḥemmlen ula d arraw-is .
62005002	Atah wamek ara nẓer belli nḥemmel arraw n Ṛebbi : ma nḥemmel Sidi Ṛebbi yerna nxeddem lumuṛat-is .
62005003	Axaṭer ma nḥemmel Sidi Ṛebbi ilaq a neḥrez lumuṛat-is ; lumuṛat-is ur ẓẓayit ara ,
62005004	axaṭer arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣelben ddunit , ayen s wacu i neɣleb ddunit , d liman-nneɣ di Sidna Ɛisa .
62005005	Anwa i gɣelben ddunit ? D wid yumnen belli Ɛisa d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi .
