62005006	Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , d win akken i d-yusan ɣer ddunit s waman d idammen , mačči kan s waman n weɣḍas-is lameɛna s waman akk-d idammen-is yuzzlen mi gemmut fell-aneɣ ; yerna d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-icehden fell-as axaṭer Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , d Ṛṛuḥ n tideț .
62005007	Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen , aman d idammen , di tlata yid-sen beggnen-d tideț-agi .
62005008	
62005009	Ma yella cchada n yemdanen tețwaqbel , cchada n Sidi Ṛebbi tugar tin n yemdanen ; axaṭer d Sidi Ṛebbi s yiman-is i d-icehden ɣef Mmi-s .
62005010	Win yumnen s Mmi-s n Ṛebbi , yesɛa țbut deg wul-is , ma d win ur numin ara , yerra Sidi Ṛebbi d akeddab imi ur yumin ara s wayen i d-iched Ṛebbi ɣef Mmi-s .
62005011	Cchada-yagi ț-țudert n dayem i ɣ-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi , tudert-agi di Mmi-s i tella .
62005012	Win yumnen s Mmi-s n Ṛebbi yesɛa tudert ; win ur numin ara s Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ur yesɛi ara tudert .
62005013	Ayagi uriɣ-awen-t-id iwakken aț-țeẓrem belli tesɛam tudert n ṣṣeḥ yețdumun , kunwi yumnen s Mmi-s n Ṛebbi .
62005014	Tura atah lețkal i nesɛa ɣuṛ-es : ma nessuter-as kra yellan di lebɣi-s , yețḥessis-aɣ-d ;
62005015	ma yella neẓra belli yețḥessis-aɣ-d , kra n wayen ara s nessuter , neḥsa belli yewweḍ-aɣ-d .
62005016	Ma yella win yeẓran gma-s yedneb yili ddnub-is ur yețțawi ara ɣer lmut , ilaq ad yedɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , nețța a s-d-ye tudert ; nniɣ-ed ayagi ɣef wid ixeddmen ddnub ur nețțawi ara ɣer lmut . Yella ddnub yețțawin ɣer lmut lameɛna mačči ɣef wid ixeddmen ddnub-agi i wen-d-nniɣ aț-țedɛum .
62005017	Kra yellan d lbaṭel , d ddnub , meɛna llan ddnubat ur nețțawi ara ɣer lmut .
62005018	Neẓra belli kra n wid yellan d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi ur țɛicin ara di ddnub ; meɛna Mmi-s n Ṛebbi yețɛassa fell-asen yerna Cciṭan ur yezmir ara a ten-yennal .
62005019	Neẓra belli d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi i nella , ma d ddunit teɣli ger ifassen n wemcum .
62005020	Neẓra daɣen Mmi-s n Ṛebbi yusa-d ɣer ddunit yefka-yaɣ-d lefhama s wayes ara nissin Ṛebbi n țideț . Deg-s i neṭṭef s yisem n Mmi-s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ; d nețța i d Ṛebbi n ṣṣeḥ , i ț-țudert yețdumun .
62005021	Ay ilmeẓyen , ḥadret aț-țɛebdem iṛebbiten n lekdeb .
63001001	Nekk yellan d ameqqran n tejmaɛt , i Kirya i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d warraw-is i ḥemmleɣ s tideț . Mačči d nekk kan i kkun iḥemmlen , meɛna ula d wid akk yesnen tideț ;
63001002	ɣef ddemma n tideț yellan deg-nneɣ ara yeqqimen deg-nneɣ i dayem .
63001003	Ssmaḥ , ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a ɣ-d țțunefken s ɣuṛ Baba Ṛebbi d Mmi-s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , iwakken a nɛic di tideț akk-d leḥmala .
63001004	Acḥal feṛḥeɣ imi ufiɣ kra seg warraw-im teddun deg webrid n tideț , akken i ɣ-t-id-yumeṛ Baba Ṛebbi .
63001005	Ihi tura a tajmaɛt n Kirya , ayen i nețṛaǧu deg-wen : a nemyeḥmal wway gar-aneɣ , mačči d lameṛ ajdid i wen-d-wwiɣ lameɛna d lameṛ yellan yakan si tazwara .
63001006	Leḥmala , d m'ara nțeddu deg webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi nḥerrez lumuṛat-is . S lameṛ-agi i teslam si tazwara i glaq aț-țeddum .
63001007	Aṭas n wid yesselmaden lekdeb i d-innulfan di ddunit , ur setɛeṛfen ara belli Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yusa-d ɣer ddunit s ṣṣifa n wemdan . D wigi i gețɣuṛṛun , i d iɛdawen n Lmasiḥ .
63001008	? adret iman-nwen iwakken ur a wen-yețṛuḥu ara wayen akk i wen-nesselmed lameɛna aț-țɣelltem lfayda tameqqrant .
63001009	Kra n win ara iɛeddin tilas deg wayen yesselmed Lmasiḥ , ur yeṭṭif ara di Ṛebbi ; ma d win yeṭṭfen deg uselmed n Lmasiḥ yeṭṭef di Baba Ṛebbi akk-d Mmi-s .
63001010	Kra n win ara d-yasen ɣuṛ-wen m'ur wen-d-yewwi ara aselmed-agi n Lmasiḥ ur sṭerḥibet ara yis ɣer yexxamen-nwen , ur țsellimet ara ula d sslam fell-as !
63001011	Axaṭer win i gesṭerḥben yis , yețțekki di lecɣal-is n diri .
63001012	Mazal-iyi aṭas n lecɣal i ɣef bɣiɣ a wen-d-hedṛeɣ lameɛna mačči di tebṛaț , ssarameɣ a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen , a wen-mmeslayeɣ s yimi-w , iwakken lfeṛḥ-nneɣ ad innekmal .
63001013	Arraw n weltma-m yextaṛ Ṛebbi , țsellimen fell-am .
64001001	Nekk yellan d ameqqran n tejmaɛt , i Gayus , f+ eɛzizen fell-i , i ḥemmleɣ s tideț .
64001002	Ay aḥbib-iw , ssarameɣ ṣṣeḥa-inek bxiṛ i tella , am tikli-inek deg webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi .
64001003	Feṛḥeɣ aṭas asm'akken i d-usan watmaten , mi d-ḥkan ɣef tideț yellan deg-k , d wamek i teṭṭfeḍ di tideț-agi s wul-ik .
64001004	Ulac lfeṛḥ ara yecbun m'ara sleɣ s warraw-iw teddun di tideț .
64001005	A win eɛzizen , d ayen yelhan i txedmeḍ seg wul yeṣfan i watmaten , ɣas d ibeṛṛaniyen i llan ;
64001006	ḥkan-d zdat n tejmaɛt ɣef leḥmala-inek . ayen yelhan daɣen ma terniḍ tɛawneḍ-ten s wayen i tzemreḍ iwakken ad kemmlen abrid-nsen ;
64001007	axaṭer ɣef ddemma n yisem n Lmasiḥ i ṛuḥen , yerna ugin ad qeblen lemɛawna n wid ur numin ara s Sidi Ṛebbi .
64001008	Ilaq-aɣ ihi a nesṭerḥeb yerna a nɛiwen imdanen yecban wigi , iwakken a nili d iqeddacen ara yemɛawanen yid-sen ɣef ddemma n tideț .
64001009	Uriɣ kra yimeslayen i tejmaɛt , meɛna Diutrif iḥemmlen ad idebbeṛ ɣef wiyaḍ , yegguma a ɣ-d-iḥess ur aɣ-yeḥsib ara .
64001010	Daymi m'ara n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen a d-sbeggneɣ akk ayen ixeddem ! Iheddeṛ fell-aneɣ yir imeslayen akk-d lekdub , ula d atmaten yugi ad yesṭerḥeb yis-sen , wid yebɣan ad sṭerḥben yis-sen , yețțaggi-yasen yerna yessufuɣ-iten si tejmaɛt .
64001011	Ay aḥbib , ur țɛanad ara wid ixeddmen cceṛ meɛna ɛaned wid ixeddmen lxiṛ . Win ixeddmen ayen yelhan , n Ṛebbi ; ma d win ixeddmen cceṛ ur yessin ara Ṛebbi .
64001012	Ma d Dimitriyus țcekkiṛen-t akk medden , yerna tideț tețban-ed deg-s , ula d nukni nenna-t-id yerna teẓriḍ ayen i d-neqqaṛ ț-țideț .
64001013	Aṭas i mazal a k-t-id-iniɣ lameɛna ur bɣiɣ ara a k-t-id-aruɣ di tebṛaț .
64001014	Ssarameɣ qṛib a nemẓer iwakken a nehḍer .
64001015	Qqim di lehna ! Atmaten meṛṛa țsellimen-d fell-ak . Ula d kečč sellem ɣef watmaten akk , mkul yiwen s yisem-is .
65001001	Nekk Yuda yellan d gma-s n Yeɛqub , aqqedac n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , i wid i wumi d-issawel Sidi Ṛebbi Baba-tneɣ , yerna ihegga-ten i Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ;
65001002	ṛṛeḥma , talwit d leḥmala a wen-d-tețțunefkent s tugeț !
65001003	A wid eɛzizen , acḥal aya segmi i bɣiɣ a wen-n-aruɣ ɣef wayen yeɛnan leslak i ɣ-icerken , walaɣ belli ilaq-iyi a kkun-nhuɣ iwakken aț-țesɛum tazmert aț-țḥadrem ɣef liman , liman i d-yețțunefken yiwet n tikkelt i wid i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
65001004	Axaṭer kra n yemdanen skecmen-d iman-nsen gar-awen , sseɛwajen lmeɛna n ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ad ffren yir tikli-nsen , nekṛen ula d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , win yellan d Ssid-nneɣ ; lɛiqab i ten-yețṛaǧun d ameqqran akken i d-ițwaxebbeṛ si zik di tira iqedsen .
65001005	? as akken teẓram ayagi meṛṛa , bɣiɣ a kkun-id-smektiɣ belli asmi i d-isellek Sidi Ṛebbi agdud-is si tmurt n Maṣer yessenger gar-asen wid akk yugin ad amnen yis ;
65001006	daɣen , lmalayekkat-nni ur neṭṭif ara di ccan i sent-id-ițțunefken , meɛna ǧǧant imukan-nsent eɛlayen , Sidi Ṛebbi yeqqen-itent di ṭṭlam i dayem alamma d ass ameqqran n lḥisab .
65001007	Akken daɣen i tedṛa d imezdaɣ n temdinin n Sudum d Gumuṛ akk-d tudrin i sent-id-yezzin , ixeddmen anagar ticmatin d zzna , qqiment-ed d lemtel mi tent-yessenger Sidi Ṛebbi s tmes yecban times n ǧahennama ;
65001008	imdanen-agi daɣen i d-ikecmen gar-aneɣ xeddmen am nutni , tirga-nsen ssawaḍent-țen ad xedmen ticmatin , ur setɛeṛfen ara s lḥekma n Sidi Ṛebbi , reggmen ula d lmalayekkat yellan deg igenwan .
65001009	Ula d lmelk Mixayel ur yexdim ara annect-agi asm'akken i gennuɣ akk-d Cciṭan ɣef lǧețța n Sidna Musa ; yegguma a t-yergem ula d rregmat meɛna yenna-yas kan : a k-iɛaqeb Sidi Ṛebbi .
65001010	Meɛna imdanen-agi reggmen ayen ur ssinen ara , ula d ayen akken ssnen i gessen ula d lmal ur nefhim ara , yețțawi-ten anagar ɣer nnger-nsen .
65001011	A tawaɣit-nsen ! Axaṭer tebɛen lǧeṛṛa n Kahin , sṛuḥen iman-nsen di leɣlaḍ , yewwi-ten ṭṭmeɛ n yedrimen am Belɛam , negren am akken yenger Kuri asm'akken i d-yekker ɣer ccwal .
65001012	D ugur ameqqran m'ara ṭṭfen imukan gar-awen ɣer imensi n tegmaț , zehhun mbla lḥecma , țxemmimen kan ɣef yiman-nsen . Cban asigna yețțawi waḍu , ur d-yețțak lehwa ; cban ttjuṛ ur d-nețțak ara lfakya di lawan-nsent , mmutent , qquṛent dɣa țwaqelɛent .
65001013	Akken i d-ṭṭeggiṛent lemwaji timeqqranin tikufta-nsent n lewsex , i d-ssufuɣen nutni tikufta n leɛṛuṛ-nsen . Cban itran ixețțin , iɣellin ɣer dderb n ṭṭlam i sen ițwaheggan .
65001014	Fell-asen i d-icar Hinux iɛacen di lǧil wis sebɛa deffir Adem , mi d-yenna : atan a d-yas Sidi Ṛebbi nețța d luluf n lmalayekkat-is
65001015	iwakken ad iḥaseb imdanen meṛṛa , ad iɛaqeb imcumen ur ten-tḍuɛ ara , ɣef yir lecɣal-nsen , ɣef rregmat i d-ssufuɣen yemcumen-agi seg yimawen-nsen .
65001016	Imdanen-agi ur steqniɛen ara deg wayen xeddmen , teddun s lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen ; imeslayen-nsen ččuṛen d zzux , sqizziben i yemdanen ɣef ddemma n nnfeɛ-nsen .
65001017	Ma d kunwi a wid eɛzizen , mmektit-ed ayen i wen-d-nnan yakan ṛṛusul n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
65001018	asm'akken i wen-d-qqaṛen : di zzman aneggaru ad ilin wid ara yețmesxiṛen fell-awen , ara ilḥun s lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen .
65001019	Ihi , d wigi i d-yețțawin lxilaf ger yemdanen , țxemmimen anagar ɣef wayen yeɛnan ddunit , ur sɛin ara Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi deg wulawen-nsen .
65001020	Ma d kunwi ay iḥbiben-iw , snernit liman-nwen yeṣfan , deɛɛut s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen .
65001021	? ṭfet di leḥmala n Sidi Ṛebbi , țeklet ɣef ṛṛeḥma n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , ara wen-d-yefken tudert yețdumun .
65001022	? unnet ɣef wid yețcukkun sfehmetțen
65001023	iwakken ad țțuselken , jebdet-țen-id si tmes . Llan daɣen wiyaḍ ilaq aț-țḥunnem fell-asen meɛna ɣuṛ-wat aț-țennalem ulamma d llebsa-nsen i tessenǧes lǧețța-nsen .
65001024	Tanemmirt tameqqrant i win yesɛan tazmert ad iḥader fell-awen iwakken ur tețțecḍem ara , a kkun-id isbedd zdat-es mbla lɛib di tmanegt-ines s lfeṛḥ ameqqran .
65001025	Tamanegt tameqqrant i Sidi Ṛebbi awḥid i gellan d amsellek-nneɣ s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ ; i Yillu nneɣ lhiba , tazmert , lḥekma akk-d lɛaḍima , uqbel a d-texleq ddunit , di lweqt-agi akk-d lweqat i d-iteddun ! Amin !
66001001	Wagi d aweḥḥi n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , i s-d-ifka Ṛebbi iwakken ad ixebbeṛ iqeddacen-is ɣef wayen ara d-yedṛun ; leḥwayeǧ-agi i d-ițeddun ixebbeṛ-itent-id s lmelk i d-iceggeɛ i uqeddac-is Yuḥenna .
66001002	Yuḥenna yeḥka-d ayen akk yeẓra . Iched-ed ɣef wawal n tudert akk ț-țideț i d-yewwi Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ .
66001003	D iseɛdiyen wid ara yeɣṛen , ara yessemḥessen i lehḍuṛ n uweḥḥi-agi yerna ḥerzen-ten , axaṭer lweqt i deg ara yedṛu wannect-agi iqeṛṛeb-ed .
66001004	S ɣuṛ Yuḥenna , i sebɛa tejmuyaɛ yellan di tmurt n Asya : ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d-țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Win yellan si tazwara , yellan ass-a , ara d-yuɣalen , s ɣuṛ sebɛa leṛwaḥ n Ṛebbi yețțilin zdat wemkan n lḥekma-ines ,
66001005	s ɣuṛ Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ inigi n ṣṣeḥ , amezwaru i d-iḥyan si ger lmegtin , agellid n igelliden n ddunit ! Nețța i ɣ-iḥemmlen , i ɣ-isellken si ddnubat nneɣ s idammen-is yuzzlen fell-aneɣ ,
66001006	yerra-yaɣ d lmuqedmin iqeddcen ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi , Baba-s . Tamanegt tameqqrant d lḥekma i Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i dayem ! Amin !
66001007	Ataya , iteddu-d ɣef wusigna , mkul tiṭ a t-twali , ula d wid i t-ifetken a t-walin ; dɣa igduden n ddunit meṛṛa ad meǧǧden fell-as . ? - țideț , akka ara tedṛu !
66001008	Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d : d nekk i d amezwaru i d aneggaru , d Win yellan si tazwara , yellan ass-a , ara d-yuɣalen ; d nekk i d Bab n tezmert . .
66001009	Nekk Yuḥenna gma-twen , yellan yid-wen ama di lmeḥna ɣef wayen yeɛnan tagelda n Sidi Ṛebbi , ama ɣef tuṭṭfa di liman di Sidna Ɛisa , lliɣ di tegzirt n Batmus ɣef demma n wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi yerna ad cehdeɣ ɣef Sidna Ɛisa .
66001010	Deg wass n westeɛfu iweḥḥa yi-d Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi , sliɣ i yiwet n taɣect ɛlayen i d-yekkan deffir-i am akken d ṣṣut n lbuq ,
66001011	teqqaṛ-ed : Ayen akka i tețwaliḍ aru-t di tektabt tceggɛeḍ-ț i sebɛa tejmuyaɛ agi n watmaten : i tejmaɛt n Ifasus , n Smirnus , n Birɣamus , n Tyatir , n Sardas , n Filadilfya akk-d țin n Ludikus .
66001012	Muqleɣ ɣer deffir iwakken ad ẓreɣ anwa i yi-d-ițmeslayen , walaɣ sebɛa teftilin n ddheb ,
66001013	di tlemmast nsent yella yiwen lxelq icuban amdan ; yelsa ajellab yerna yebges tabagust n ddheb .
66001014	Ccɛeṛ-is d amellal am taḍuṭ tacebḥant , am udfel , allen-is ceɛlent am tmes ,
66001015	iḍaṛṛen-is țfeǧǧiǧen am nnḥas yefsin di tmes , ṣṣut-is yecba zzhir n waman yețseqsiqen deg udrar .
66001016	Yeṭṭef sebɛa yetran deg ufus-is ayeffus , seg imi-s yeffeɣ-d ujenwi yesɛan sin imawen iqeḍɛen , udem-is yețfeǧǧiǧ am yiṭij m'ara d-icceɛceɛ deg uzzal .
66001017	Mi t-walaɣ , fecleɣ , ɣliɣ ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is . Yessers fell-i afus-is ayeffus yenna : Ur țțagad ara ! D nekk i gellan si tazwara alamma ț-țaggara ,
66001018	nekk d Win yeddren ; lliɣ mmuteɣ , meɛna ḥyiɣ-ed si lmut , tura aql-iyi ddreɣ i dayem . D nekk i geṭṭfen tisura n lmut akk-d tid n laxeṛt .
66001019	Ayen akka i tețwaliḍ , ɣef wayen ideṛṛun tura d wayen i d-iteddun , aru-t di tektabt .
66001020	? ef wayen yeɛnan lbaḍna n sebɛa yitran-agi i twalaḍ deg ufus-iw ayeffus , akk-d sebɛa teftilin-agi n ddheb : sebɛa yitran-agi d lmalayekkat n sebɛa tejmuyaɛ n imasiḥiyen , ma d sebɛa teftilin-agi , d sebɛa-nni tejmuyaɛ .
66002001	Aru ayagi i lmelk n tejmaɛt n temdint n Ifasus : atah wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Win yeṭṭfen sebɛa yetran deg ufus-is ayeffus , Win yețțilin di tlemmast n sebɛa teftilin n ddheb :
66002002	ssneɣ tikli-inek d lecɣal-ik , ẓriɣ leɛtab-ik d ṣṣbeṛ i tṣebṛeḍ ; ẓriɣ ur tezmireḍ ara aț-țawiḍ i yemcumen , tjeṛbeḍ wid ițțarran iman-nsen d ṛṛusul ur llin , tkecfeḍ-ten-id belli d ikeddaben i llan .
66002003	Tṣebṛeḍ , tɛetbeḍ ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw , ur tefcileḍ ara .
66002004	Lameɛna tella yiwet lḥaǧa i ɣef ara k-lumeɣ : leḥmala i tesɛiḍ ɣuṛ-i tura mačči am leḥmala n wussan imezwura .
66002005	Mmekti-d seg wansi i d-teɣliḍ , endem deg wayen txedmeḍ tuɣaleḍ ɣer lecɣal-ik imezwura , ma yella ur tendimeḍ ara , atan a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-ek , ad kkseɣ taftilt-ik seg umkan-is .
66002006	Lameɛna atan wayen i yi-iɛeǧben deg-k : tkeṛheḍ lecɣal n inikulaten , akken i ten-keṛheɣ ula d nekk .
66002007	Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen , ad ismeḥses i wayen i d-iqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten : win ara yeṭṭfen deg-i alamma ț-țaggara , a s-fkeɣ ad yečč si ttejṛa n tudert yellan di lǧennet .
66002008	Aru ayagi i lmelk n tejmaɛt n temdint n Smirnus : atah wayen i d-iqqaṛ Win yellan si tazwara alamma țaggara , Win yemmuten yuɣal-ed ɣer tudert :
66002009	? riɣ lmeḥna akk-d leɣben i deg telliḍ , lameɛna ɣer Ṛebbi d ameṛkanti ; ẓriɣ cceṛ i heddṛen fell-ak wid iḥesben iman-nsen d agdud n Ṛebbi ur llin , lameɛna nutni si tejmaɛt n Cciṭan .
66002010	Ur țțagad ara leɛtab i d-ițeddun ɣuṛ-ek . Atan Cciṭan ad yerr kra deg-wen ɣer lḥebs iwakken aț-țujeṛbem , aț-țilim di leɛtab ɛecṛa wussan . Eṭṭef di liman-inek alamma d lmut , a k-d-fkeɣ taɛeṣṣabt n tudert .
66002011	Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen , ad ismeḥses i wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten : win ara yeṭṭfen deg-i alamma ț-țaggara , ur t-tețțawi ara lmut tis snat .
66002012	Aru ayagi i lmelk n tejmaɛt n temdint n Birɣamus : atah wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Win yesɛan ajenwi iqeḍɛen di snat leǧwahi :
66002013	? riɣ anda i tzedɣeḍ , dinna i gella wemkan n lḥekma n Cciṭan . Teṭṭfeḍ deg isem-iw , ur tenkiṛeḍ ara liman i tesɛiḍ deg-i ula deg ussan i deg nɣan Antibas , inigi-inu n ṣṣeḥ , dinna ɣuṛ-wen anida yeṭṭef Cciṭan amkan .
66002014	Lameɛna atan wayen yellan deg-ek ur iyi-neɛǧib ara : llan ɣuṛ-ek kra yemdanen mazal-iten ṭṭfen deg uselmed n Belɛam : isselmad i ugellid Balak ayen ara yilin d sebba n tuccḍa n warraw n wat Isṛail , isselmad-asen ad ččen aksum yețțunefken d iseflawen i ssadaț yerna a ten-tawi ccehwat n tnefsit-nsen .
66002015	Llan daɣen ɣuṛ-ek kra yemdanen yeṭṭfen deg uselmed n inikulaten .
66002016	Endem ihi ! Neɣ m'ulac ur țɛeṭṭileɣ ara a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-ek , a ten-ḥarbeɣ s ujenwi n yimi-w .
66002017	Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen , ad ismeḥses i wayen i d-iqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten ! Win yeṭṭfen deg-i alamma ț țaggara , a t-id-ṛezqeɣ s tmana-nni yețwaḥerzen , a s-fkeɣ daɣen ablaḍ acebḥan i ɣef yura isem ajdid ur yessin yiwen , anagar win iwumi ara d-yețțune ublaḍ-nni .
66002018	Aru i lmelk n tejmaɛt n temdint n Tyatir : atah wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Mmi-s n Ṛebbi Win yesɛan allen iceɛɛlen am tmes , iḍaṛṛen-is țfeǧǧiǧen am nnḥas :
66002019	? riɣ lecɣal-ik , leḥmala d liman i tesɛiḍ akk-d wayen i txeddmeḍ s wul yeṣfan d ṣṣbeṛ . ? riɣ daɣen tura txeddmeḍ akteṛ n wussan imezwura .
66002020	Lameɛna tella yiwet lḥaǧa ur iyi-neɛǧib ara deg-k : teǧǧiḍ Yisabil yerran iman-is d nnbi aț-țkellex iqeddacen-iw s uselmed-ines , iwakken ad ččen aksum yețțunefken d iseflawen i ssadaț yerna a ten-awint ccehwat n tnefsit-nsen .
66002021	Eǧǧiɣ-as lweqt ɣileɣ aț-țendem , lameɛna ur tebɣi ara aț-țerr aḍar ɣef tecmatin i txeddem .
66002022	Usu-nni i ɣef txeddem ticmatin , dinna ara d-sseɣliɣ fell-as lehlak icemten nețțat d wid yeznan yid-es anagar ma yella beddlen tikli .
66002023	A d-ceggɛeɣ lmut i warraw-is ; s wakka tijmuyaɛ n watmaten meṛṛa ad setɛeṛfen belli ẓriɣ ayen yellan deg yixemmimen d wulawen n yemdanen , ad rreɣ i mkul yiwen ayen yuklal .
66002024	Ma d kunwi akk-d wid meṛṛa yellan si tejmaɛt n Tyatir ur neqbil ara aselmed-agi , yugin aț-țkecmem di lbaḍna lqayen yeɛni tin n Cciṭan , a wen-iniɣ : ur wen-sbabbayeɣ ara taɛkumt nniḍen ;
66002025	d acu kan , ṭṭfet di liman i tesɛam alamma uɣaleɣ-ed .
66002026	Wid yeṭṭfen deg-i ur fcilen ara , wid ḥerzen yerna ḍuɛen lumuṛat-iw alamma ț-țaggara , a sen-fkeɣ lḥekma ɣef leǧnas .
66002027	A sen-fkeɣ lḥekma i yi-d ițțunefken s ɣuṛ Baba , ad ḥekmen fell-asen s uɛekkaz n wuzzal , a ten ṛzen am akken țṛuẓun ibuqalen n talaxt . A sen-fkeɣ tafat n yitri n ṣṣbeḥ .
66002028	
66002029	Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen , ad ismeḥses i wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten .
66003001	Aru i lmelk n tejmaɛt n temdint n Sardas : atah wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Win yesɛan sebɛa leṛwaḥ , yeṭṭfen sebɛa yitran : ? riɣ lecɣal-ik , qqaṛen belli teddreḍ , lameɛna kečč temmuteḍ .
66003002	Ddekwal-ed , sseǧhed ayen i k-d yeqqimen neɣ m'ulac ad yemmet , axaṭer lecɣal-ik xuṣṣen ɣer Ṛebbi .
66003003	Mmekti-d ihi amek tesliḍ d wamek tqebleḍ awal n Ṛebbi , tbeɛ ayen akka i tlemdeḍ , tuɣaleḍ-ed ɣer webrid . Ma tɣefleḍ , a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-ek am umakar , ur teẓẓareḍ ara anta ssaɛa i deg ara d-kecmeɣ .
66003004	Lameɛna llan ɣuṛ-ek kra yemdanen ur sneǧsen ara llebsa-nsen ; ad ilin yid-i s llebsa tamellalt axaṭer uklalen-ț .
66003005	Win ara yeṭṭfen deg-i alamma ț-țaggara , ad yels llebsa tamellalt , d lmuḥal ad mḥuɣ isem-is seg udlis n tudert , yerna zdat Baba Ṛebbi d lmalayekkat-is , a d-cehdeɣ belli d ayla-w .
66003006	Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen , ad ismeḥses i wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten .
66003007	Aru ayagi i lmelk n tejmaɛt n watmaten yellan di temdint n Filadelfya : atah wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Win yeṣfan , yellan ț-țideț , Win yeṭṭfen tasaruț n Dawed , ayen ara yeldi ur yezmir yiwen a t-iɣleq , ayen ara yeɣleq ulac win izemren a t-ildi :
66003008	Ssneɣ lecɣal-ik , atan ldiɣ tawwurt zdat-ek , ulac win izemren a ț-țiɣleq , axaṭer ẓriɣ tḥerzeḍ awal-iw ur tenkiṛeḍ ara isem-iw , ɣas akken lḥekma-inek ț-țamecṭuḥt ;
66003009	atah wayen ara xedmeɣ i wid yellan si tejmaɛt n Cciṭan , ikeddaben-nni yețțaran iman-nsen d agdud n Ṛebbi ur llin ; a ten-i-d-awiɣ ɣuṛ-ek ad seǧǧden zdat-ek , ad setɛeṛfen belli ḥemmleɣ-k , deg-k i gella lfeṛḥ-iw .
66003010	Imi teṭṭfeḍ deg awal-iw s ṣṣbeṛ ur tefcileḍ ara , ula d nekk a k-ḥadreɣ di teswiɛt n ujeṛṛeb ara d-yasen ɣef ddunit meṛṛa iwakken ad țțujeṛben imezdaɣ-is .
66003011	Qṛib a d-uɣaleɣ . Eṭṭef di liman i tesɛiḍ deg-i iwakken yiwen ur ițizmir a k-yekkes taɛeṣṣabt n tudert i k-yețṛaǧun .
66003012	Win yeṭṭfen deg-i alamma ț-țaggara , a t-sbeddeɣ am tgejdit di lǧameɛ n Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-yiw , ad yili dinna i dayem . Ad jerdeɣ fell-as isem n Illu-yiw , isem n temdint n Illu-yiw , win n temdint n Lquds tajdiṭ ara d-iṣubben seg igenni s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , ad aruɣ daɣen fell-as isem-iw ajdid .
66003013	Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen , ad ismeḥses i wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten .
66003014	Aru ayagi i lmelk n tejmaɛt n watmaten n temdint n Ludikus : Atah wayen i d-iqqaṛ Win yețțusemman Amin , inigi n ṣṣeḥ ț-țideț , Win s wayes i d-ițwaxleq kra wayen yellan :
66003015	Ssneɣ lecɣal-ik , ur terkimeḍ ur tṣemḍeḍ , a wi yufan aț-țrekmeḍ neɣ aț-țismiḍeḍ !
66003016	Imi temmuzeɣleḍ ur teḥmiḍ , ur tsemmḍeḍ , atan a k-id-erreɣ seg imi-w ;
66003017	axaṭer teqqaṛeḍ : srebḥeɣ iman-iw , aql-iyi d ameṛkanti , ur uḥwaǧeɣ ula d acemma , ur d-tewwiḍ ara s lexbaṛ belli tețɣiḍeḍ am umeɣbun , ur tesɛiḍ acemma , aqli-k d aɛeryan , d aderɣal .
66003018	Daymi ad debbṛeɣ fell-ak aț-țaɣeḍ ɣuṛ-i ddheb yeṣfan , iwakken aț-țuɣaleḍ s tideț d amerkanti , aɣ daɣen llebsa tamellalt iwakken lḥecma n ɛerru-inek ur d-tețban ara , ternuḍ lekḥul s wayes ara teddawiḍ allen-ik iwakken aț-țwaliḍ .
66003019	D wid ḥemmleɣ i țɛaqabeɣ i țṛebbiɣ . Sendekwal-ed ihi iman-ik ; endem tbeddleḍ tikli !
66003020	Atan beddeɣ ɣer tewwurt sṭebṭbeɣ , ma yella win i d-yeslan i taɣect-iw yeldi-yi-d tawwurt , ad kecmeɣ ɣuṛ-es , ad ččeɣ imensi yid-es , nețța yid-i .
66003021	Win yeṭṭfen deg-i alamma ț-țaggara , a t-sɣimeɣ yid-i deg umkan n lḥekma-inu , akken i ṭṭfeɣ nekk di Baba Ṛebbi alamma ț-țaggara , tura aql-i qqimeɣ yid-es deg umkan n lḥekma-ines .
66003022	Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen , ad ismeḥses i wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten !
66004001	Walaɣ daɣen deg uweḥḥi nniḍen tawwurt n igenni teldi . Taɣect-nni yecban ṣṣut n lbuq iwumi sliɣ tikkelt tamezwarut , tenna-yi-d : Ali-d ɣer dagi a k-d-sekneɣ ayen ara yeḍrun sya ɣer zdat .
66004002	Imiren kan irfed-iyi Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi . Walaɣ yiwen ukersi n lḥekma deg igenni , Win yeqqimen fell-as , yețfeǧǧiǧ am iɛeqcan ɣlayen iwumi qqaṛen azṛu n jasb akk-d sardwan . Tislit n wanẓar tezzi-yas-d i ukersi-nni n lḥekma tețfeǧǧiǧ am tizegzewt n wezṛu n zemṛud .
66004003	Ma d win ara inekkṛen ayagi ɣef Sidna Ɛisa , mačči s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-yekka lameɛna yekka-d si Ṛṛuḥ n weɛdaw n Lmasiḥ i ɣef teslam a d-yas ɣer ddunit , atan tura yella yakan di ddunit .
66004004	Akersi-nni n lḥekma , zzin-as-d ṛebɛa uɛecrin ikursiyen nniḍen i ɣef qqimen ṛebɛa uɛecrin n lecyux yelsan llebsa tamellalt , sɛan ɣef yiqeṛṛay-nsen tiɛeṣṣabin n ddheb .
66004005	Seg ukersi-agi n lḥekma țeffɣen-d lebruq , tuɣac akk-d ṛṛɛud . Zdat-es ceɛlent sebɛa teftilin ireqqen yellan d sebɛa n Leṛwaḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi .
66004006	Zdat ukersi-nni , yella daɣen am akken d lebḥeṛ n djaj icuban ɣer wezṛu n lekristal . Di tlemmast-is akk-d leryuf-ines , bedden ṛebɛa lxuluq yeddren ččuṛen d allen ɣer zdat ɣer deffir .
66004007	Lxelq amezwaru ițemcabi ɣer yizem , lxelq wi sin yecba agenduz , lxelq wis tlata yesɛa udem am win n wemdan , lxelq wis ṛebɛa icuba ɣer igider yețferfiren .
66004008	Ṛebɛa lxuluq-nni mkul yiwen seg-sen yesɛa sețța wafriwen , yerna ččuṛen d allen s wadda s ufella , am yiḍ am ass ur țsusumen ara qqaṛen : D imqeddes , d imqeddes , d imqeddes i gella Yillu , Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert , Win yellan si tazwara , yellan ass-a , ara d-yasen !
66004009	Lxuluq-nni , mkul m'ara țcekkiṛen țḥemmiden Win yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma , Win yeddren si lǧil ɣer lǧil ,
66004010	ṛebɛa uɛecrin n lecyux-nni țseǧǧiden daɣen zdat-es , srusun tiɛeṣṣabin-nsen zdat Win yeddren , țɛebbiden-t qqaṛen :
66004011	Tuklaleḍ a Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ , tamanegt d ccan akk-d lḥekma , imi d kečč i d Bab n txelqit , kra yellan s lebɣi-k i d-yețwaxleq .
66005001	Imiren , walaɣ deg ufus ayeffus n Win yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma , yiwen wedlis yețwakteb si beṛṛa si zdaxel , yețwalṣeq s sebɛa ṭṭwabeɛ .
66005002	Walaɣ yiwen lmelk yesɛan tazmert tameqqrant , yeqqaṛ-ed s ṣṣut ɛlayen : Anwa yuklalen ad yeldi adlis-agi , yerna a d-iqleɛ ṭṭwabeɛ-ines ?
66005003	Lameɛna ur ufin ula d yiwen deg igenni neɣ di lqaɛa neɣ ddaw lqaɛa i gzemren ad ildi adlis-nni neɣ a t-iɣeṛ .
66005004	Dɣa țruɣ aṭas mi ẓriɣ ulac win yuklalen ad ildi adlis-nni neɣ a t-iɣeṛ .
66005005	Yiwen si lecyux-nni yenna yi-d : Ur țru ara , atan Yizem n lɛeṛc n Yahuda , si dderya n Dawed , yuklal ad ildi adlis-nni yerna ad iqleɛ sebɛa ṭṭwabeɛ-ines , axaṭer d nețța i gɣelben kullec .
66005006	Walaɣ daɣen di tlemmast n ukersi-nni n lḥekma , ger lxuluq-nni , ger lecyux-nni , yiwen Izimer ibedden , iban-ed am akken yemzel . Yesɛa sebɛa wacciwen akk-d sebɛa wallen yellan d sebɛa leṛwaḥ n Ṛebbi yețțuceggɛen i ddunit meṛṛa .
66005007	Izimer-agi iqeṛṛeb ɣer Win yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma iwakken a d-iṭṭef seg ufus-is ayeffus adlis-nni .
66005008	Mi d-iṭṭef adlis-nni , ṛebɛa lxuluq akk-d ṛebɛa uɛecrin n lecyux nni seǧǧden zdat-es , mkul yiwen seg-sen yeṭṭef snitra d iqbucen n ddheb iččuṛen d leɛṭeṛ i d ițmettilen ddeɛwat n wegdud n Ṛebbi .
66005009	Cennun yiwen ucewwiq d ajdid qqaṛen : tuklaleḍ aț-țedmeḍ adlis , aț-țeldiḍ ṭwabeɛ-ines , axaṭer temmezleḍ , iwakken aț-țcafɛeḍ s idammen-ik yuzzlen , imdanen si mkul lɛeṛc , si mkul tutlayt , si mkul agdud , si mkul tamurt .
66005010	Terriḍ-ten am igelliden , d lmuqedmin i Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ , ad ḥekmen ɣef ddunit .
66005011	Walaɣ daɣen , yerna sliɣ i ṣṣut n waṭas n lmalayekkat i d-izzin i ukersi n lḥekma , i lxuluq akk-d lecyux-nni , leḥsab-nsen d ilulufen , d ayen ur nezmir a neḥseb .
66005012	Qqaṛen s ṣṣut ɛlayen : Izimer yemmezlen yuklal tazmert d lekyasa , lerbaḥ d lǧehd , ccan d lɛaḍima akk-d ucekkeṛ .
66005013	Ayen akk i d-ițwaxelqen deg igenni , di lqaɛa , ddaw lqaɛa , di lebḥeṛ d wayen akk yellan deg-sen , sliɣ-asen qqaṛen : A neḥmed a neckkeṛ Win yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma akk-d Izimer , i nutni lɛaḍima d lḥekma si lǧil ɣer lǧil !
66005014	Ṛebɛa lxuluq-nni qqaṛen : Amin ! Ma d lecyux-nni țseǧǧiden zdat-sen .
66006001	Walaɣ daɣen mi gcerreg Izimer nni ṭṭabeɛ amezwaru . Sliɣ i taɣect n yiwen si ṛebɛa lxuluq-nni tenṭeq-ed am ṛṛɛud tenna-d : As-ed !
66006002	Walaɣ yiwen uɛewdiw d amellal . Win i t-id irekben yeṭṭef lqus deg ufus-is ; tețțunefk-as tɛeṣṣabt , iṛuḥ s tezmert tameqqrant iwakken ad iɣleb .
66006003	Mi gcerreg ṭṭabeɛ wis sin , sliɣ i lxelq wi sin yenna-d : As-ed !
66006004	Yeffeɣ-ed yiwen uɛewdiw nniḍen d azeggaɣ am tmes . Win i t-id-irekben , tețțunefk-as tezmert ad ikkes lehna si ddunit iwakken ad țnaɣen yemdanen wway gar-asen ; yețțunefk-as-d yiwen ujenwi d ameqqran .
66006005	Mi gcerreg Izimer-nni ṭṭabeɛ wis tlata , sliɣ i lxelq wis tlata yenna-d : As-ed ! Ataya daɣen yiwen uɛewdiw d aberkan . Win i t-id-irekben yeṭṭef lmizan deg ufus-is .
66006006	Imiren kan sliɣ i yiwet taɣect ger ṛebɛa lxuluq-nni teqqaṛ : Kilu n yirden d ssuma i gețțaɣ ufellaḥ i yiwen wass n lxedma , tlata kilu n temẓin daɣen d ssuma n yiwen wass n lxedma ; ma d zzit akk-d ccṛab ad qqimen akken llan .
66006007	Mi gcerreg ṭṭabeɛ wis ṛebɛa , sliɣ i taɣect n lxelq wis ṛebɛa tenna-d : As-ed !
66006008	Walaɣ yiwen uɛewdiw d aḥcici . Win i t-id-irekben isem-is lmut , tetbeɛ-it-id laxeṛt ; tețțunefk-asen-d tezmert ɣef ṛṛbeɛ n ddunit , iwakken ad snegren imdanen s ujenwi , s laẓ , s lehlak akk-d lewḥuc n lexla .
66006009	Mi gcerreg ṭṭabeɛ wis xemsa , walaɣ seddaw n udekkan i deg srusun iseflawen i Sidi Ṛebbi , leṛwaḥ n wid yemmezlen imi ugin ad nekṛen awal n Ṛebbi yerna cehden fell-as .
66006010	? ɛeggiḍen s taɣect ɛlayen , qqaṛen : A Ssid-nneɣ imqeddes , a Bab n tideț , d acu i tețṛaǧuḍ aț-țḥasbeḍ , aț-țerreḍ țțaṛ i imezdaɣ n ddunit ɣef yidammen-nneɣ i ssazlen ?
66006011	Mkul yiwen deg-sen yețțune as uqenduṛ d ammellal ; nnan-asen ad rnun ad ṛǧun kra lweqt alamma rnan-d ɣuṛ-sen yeṛfiqen-nsen di leqdic d watmaten-nsen ara nɣen am nutni .
66006012	Walaɣ daɣen mi gcerreg Izimer nni ṭṭabeɛ wis sețța ; tewwet zzelzla tameqqrant di lqaɛa , iṭij yuɣal d aberkan ; agur yuɣal am idammen ,
66006013	ma d itran n igenni ɣellin-d ɣer lqaɛa am tbexsisin n tenqelț m'ara ț-țihuzz waḍu iǧehden .
66006014	Igenni yenneḍ am tẓeṛbit yețțlen , idurar ț-țegzirin meṛṛa ḥerrken seg imukan-nsen .
66006015	Igelliden akk-d imeqqranen n ddunit , wid iḥekkmen ɣef lɛeskeṛ , imeṛkantiyen , wid yesɛan lḥekma , aklan akk-d iḥuṛṛiyen , ulin meṛṛa ɣer idurar iwakken ad ffren zdaxel n lɣiṛan d iceṛfan ,
66006016	qqaṛen i idurar d iceṛfan : ɣlit-ed fell-aɣ , ffret-aɣ zdat wudem n Win yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma , zdat wurrif n Izimer ;
66006017	axaṭer yusa-d wass ameqqran n wurrif-nsen , anwa ara imenɛen ?
66007001	Mbeɛd ayagi , walaɣ ṛebɛa n lmalayekkat beddent di ṛebɛa tɣemmaṛ n ddunit ; sḥebsent aḍu n ṛebɛa tɣemmaṛ n ddunit iwakken ur d-ițṣuḍu ara waḍu ɣef lqaɛa d lebḥur , neɣ ula ɣef yiwet ttejṛa .
66007002	Walaɣ lmelk nniḍen i d-yulin si lǧiha n cceṛq , yeṭṭef deg ufus-is ṭṭabeɛ n Ṛebbi yeddren ; iɛeggeḍ s ṣṣut ɛlayen ɣer ṛebɛa lmalayekkat-nni iwumi yefka Sidi Ṛebbi tazmert iwakken ad ḍuṛṛent lqaɛa d lebḥur , yenna-yasen :
66007003	Ur țḍuṛṛut ara lqaɛa d lebḥuṛ neɣ ttjuṛ , alamma neḍbeɛ tiwenziwin n iqeddacen n Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ .
66007004	Imiren sliɣ i leḥsab n wid yețwaḍebɛen , meyya uṛebɛa uṛebɛin alef si leɛṛac n wat Isṛail :
66007005	si lɛeṛc n Yahuda țwaḍebɛen tnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Ruben , țwaḍebɛen ṭnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Gad , ṭnac n alef ;
66007006	si lɛeṛc n Azer , tnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Naftali , ṭnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Manasi , ṭnac n alef ;
66007007	si lɛeṛc n Semɛun , ṭnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Lewwi , ṭnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Isakaṛ , ṭnac n alef ;
66007008	si lɛeṛc n Zabulun , ṭnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Yusef , ṭnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Benyamin , țwaḍebɛen ṭnac n alef .
66007009	Mbeɛd ayagi , walaɣ izumal n lɣaci , ur yezmir yiwen a sen-d issufeɣ leḥsab , d imdanen n mkul lǧens , n mkul tamurt , n mkul agdud , n mkul tutlayt . Bedden zdat ukersi n lḥekma zdat Izimer-nni , lsan llebsa tamellalt , wwin-d tiseḍwa n tezdayin deg ifassen-nsen .
66007010	? ɛeggiḍen s taɣect ɛlayen qqaṛen : Leslak-nneɣ yekka-d s ɣuṛ Izimer , s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma .
66007011	Lmalayekkat meṛṛa zzin-t-ed i ukersi-nni n lḥekma , i lecyux akk-d ṛebɛa lxuluq-nni ; uɣalent ɣef wudem zdat ukersi-nni n lḥekma țɛebbident Sidi Ṛebbi ,
66007012	qqaṛent : s tideț , a neḥmed , a neckkeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ , i nețța lɛaḍima , lekyasa , ccan d lḥekma si lǧil ɣer lǧil ! Amin !
66007013	Yiwen si lecyux-nni yenṭeq-ed yenna-yi-d : Wid yelsan ijellaben icebḥanen , anwa-ten ? Ansi i d-usan ?
66007014	Rriɣ-as : D kečč i geẓran a Sidi . Yerra-yi-d : Wigi , d wid yesɛeddan leqheṛ d ameqqran ; ssarden ijellaben-nsen , ssazdgen-ten deg idammen n Izimer .
66007015	Daymi i bedden zdat ukersi n lḥekma n Sidi Ṛebbi , țɛebbiden-t iḍ d wass deg wexxam-is . Win yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma , a ten-iḥader ;
66007016	ur țțuɣalen ad llaẓen , ur țțuɣalen ad ffaden , ur ten-yețḥaz yiṭij neɣ l eḥmu .
66007017	Imi Izimer yellan di tlemmast n ukersi n lḥekma , d nețța ara yilin d ameksa-nsen , a ten-yawi ɣer wanda țazzalen waman n lɛinṣer , Sidi Ṛebbi a sen-yesfeḍ imeṭṭawen seg wallen nsen .
66008001	Mi gcerreg ṭṭabeɛ wis sebɛa , ters-ed yiwet tsusmi deg igenni azal wezgen n ssaɛa .
66008002	Walaɣ sebɛa lmalayekkat beddent zdat Sidi Ṛebbi , mkul yiwet deg-sent yețțunefk-as yiwen lbuq .
66008003	Yiwen lmelk nniḍen yusa-d , ibedd zdat udekkan n ddheb i deg țqeddimen iseflawen , yeṭṭef timbexxeṛt n ddheb ; efkan-as-d aṭas n lǧawi a t-isseṛɣ ɣef wudekkan-nni yellan zdat ukersi n lḥekma iwakken rriḥa-ines aț-țali ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d ddeɛwat n yimqedsen meṛṛa .
66008004	Dexxan n lebxuṛ-nni yuli akk-d ddeɛwat n yimqedsen yeṣfan , seg ufus n lmelk ibedden zdat Ṛebbi .
66008005	Lmelk-nni yeddem-ed timbexxeṛt nni n ddheb , yeččuṛ-iț-id ț-țirgin iṛeqqen yellan ɣef wudekkan-nni n ddheb , ideggeṛ-iț ɣer ddunit ; tebṛeq , terɛeḍ , sliɣ i tuɣac , tezlez lqaɛa .
66008006	Sebɛa lmalayekkat-nni yeṭṭfen sebɛa lbuqat , heggant iman-nsent ad wwtent lbuq .
66008007	Lmelk amezwaru yewwet lbuq , imiren kan yeɣli-d ɣef lqaɛa webruri akk ț-țmes ixelḍen d idammen , times nni tečča țelt n lqaɛa , țelt n ttjuṛ , d kra wayen yellan d leḥcic azegzaw .
66008008	Lmelk wis sin yewwet lbuq . Yiwet n lḥaǧa annect-ilaț am akken d adrar ameqqran i deg tecɛel tmes yețțuḍeggeṛ ɣer lebḥeṛ , țelt n lebḥeṛ yuɣal am idammen ,
66008009	țelt n wayen yețɛicin di lebḥeṛ yemmut , țelt daɣen n lbabuṛat negren .
66008010	Lmelk wis tlata yewwet lbuq . Yeɣli-d seg igenni ɣer lqaɛa yiwen yitri d ameqqran i gṛeqqen am uḥeǧǧaǧu n tmes , itri-nni isem-is : Terẓeg ; țelt n isaffen d leɛwanseṛ n waman uɣalen d irẓaganen am ilili , aṭas n yemdanen i gemmuten imi swan seg waman-nni rẓagen .
66008011	
66008012	Lmelk wis ṛebɛa yewwet lbuq . Iṭij , agur d yetran , tenqeṣ țelt n tafat-nsen s wakka tenqeṣ țelt n tafat n wass d țelt n tafat n yiḍ di ddunit .
66008013	Walaɣ yerna sliɣ i yiwen lbaz yețțafgen di tlemmast n igenni yeqqaṛ s taɣect ɛlayen : A tawaɣit , a tawaɣit , a nnger n imezdaɣ n ddunit , ɣef wayen ara yedṛun m'ara wten lbuq tlata n lmalayekkat tineggura !
66009001	Lmelk wis xemsa yewwet lbuq . Walaɣ yiwen yetri yeɣli-d seg igenni ɣer lqaɛa . Tețțunefk-as tsaruț n tesra lqayen .
66009002	Yeldi tasraft-nni lqayen , yuli-d seg-s yiwen dexxan d aberkan am win n uḥeǧǧaǧu n tmes , ddunit Ṛebbi tuɣal akk ț-țaberkant si dexxan-nni , ula d iṭij ur d-iban ara .
66009003	Si dexxan-nni yeffeɣ-ed wejṛad ɣer ddunit , tețțunefk-as tazmert am tezmert sɛant tɣerdmiwin n lqaɛa .
66009004	Yețțunefk-asen lameṛ ur țḍuṛṛun ara leḥcic , ttjuṛ d wayen akk zegzawen di lqaɛa , lameɛna ad ḍuṛṛen imdanen ur nesɛi ara ṭṭabeɛ n Ṛebbi ɣef twenza-nsen .
66009005	Tețțunefk-asen tezmert , mačči iwakken a ten-nɣen , lameɛna iwakken a ten-qehṛen azal n xemsa waguren , leqheṛ ara d-yeɣlin fell-asen , am lqeṛḥ n wemdan m'ara t-teqqes tɣirdemt .
66009006	Deg ussan-nni imdanen ad nadin ɣef lmut ur ț-țafen ara , ad bɣun ad mmten lameɛna lmut aț-țerwel fell asen .
66009007	Ajṛad-nni yecba iɛewdiwen iheggan i umenɣi , sɛan ɣef yiqeṛṛay nsen am akken ț-țiɛeṣṣabin n ddheb , udmawen-nsen am wid n yemdanen ,
66009008	acebbub-nsen am win n tilawin , tuɣmas-nsen am tid n yizmawen .
66009009	Sɛan ɣef yidmaren-nsen am tseddariyin n wuzzal , zzhir n iferrawen-nsen am zzhir n ikeṛṛusen zzuɣuṛen waṭas n iɛewdiwen m'ara țțazzalen ɣer imenɣi .
66009010	Sɛant tijeḥnaḍ ț-țsuqas am tid n tɣerdmiwin ; di tjeḥnaḍ-agi i tella tezmert ara iḍuṛṛen imdanen azal n xemsa wagguren .
66009011	Agellid-nsen , d lmelk-nni iḥekkmen ɣef tesra lqayen , yețțusemma s tɛibṛanit « Abadun » , ma s tyunanit « Abulyun » yeɛni « win yessexṛaben » .
66009012	Tawaɣit tamezwarut tɛedda . Mazal snat n twaɣyin nniḍen țeddunt-ed deffir-es .
66009013	Lmelk wis sețța iwwet lbuq . Sliɣ i yiwet taɣect i d-yekkan si ṛebɛa wacciwen yellan ɣef ṛebɛa tɣemmaṛ n udekkan n ddheb i gellan zdat Ṛebbi ,
66009014	taɣect-agi tenna i lmelk wis sețța i geṭṭfen lbuq : Efsi-yasen ccedd i ṛebɛa lmalayekkat-nni yellan ɣef rrif n wasif ameqqran , iwumi qqaṛen « Lufrat » .
66009015	Ṛebɛa lmalayekkat-nni i gețțuheggan i ssaɛa-nni , i wass , i wagur d useggas-nni , țwaserḥent-ed iwakken ad snegrent țelt n yemdanen .
66009016	Sliɣ i leḥsab n yemnayen , llan di mitin imelyunen yid-sen .
66009017	Atan wamek i walaɣ deg uweḥḥi iɛewdiwen d wid i ten-irekben : imnayen-nni lsan tiseddariyin n wuzzal ț-țizeggaɣin am tmes , wiyaḍ ț-țizegzawin am lebḥeṛ , kra nniḍen am ukubri . Iqeṛṛay n iɛewdiwen-nni am akken d iqeṛṛay n izmawen ; seg imawen-nsen tețțeffeɣ-ed tmes , dexxan akk-d ukubri .
66009018	? elt n yemdanen mmuten s tlata n twaɣyin-agi , s tmes , s dexxan akk-d ukubri-nni i d-ițeffɣen seg imawen-nsen .
66009019	Axaṭer tazmert n iɛewdiwen-nni tella deg imawen-nsen akk-d ijeḥnaḍ-nsen ; tijeḥnaḍ-agi-nsen cubant izerman ; sɛant iqeṛṛay , yis-sen i țḍuṛṛun .
66009020	Imdanen nniḍen ur nemmut ara s twaɣyin-agi , ur ndimen ara seg yir tikli-nsen ; kemmlen ɛebbden leǧnun țṛuḥun ɣer ssadaț anda ɛebbden lmeṣnuɛat yețwanejṛen s ufus n wemdan , s ddheb , s lfeṭṭa akk-d nnḥas , s wezṛu akk-d wesɣaṛ . ? as akken lmeṣnuɛat-nni ur țwalin , ur sellen , ur leḥḥun ,
66009021	imdanen-agi ur ndimen ara ɣef tmegṛaḍ i neqqen , ɣef ssḥur ɣef tukeṛdiwin akk țecmatin i xeddmen , lameɛna țkemmilen di lecɣal-agi .
66010001	Walaɣ daɣen yiwen lmelk nniḍen iǧehden , iṣubb-ed seg igenni , tețțel-it-id tagut ; tislit n wanẓar tezzi ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-is , udem-is yețfeǧǧiǧ am yiṭij , iḍaṛṛen-is am iḥeǧǧuǧa n tmes .
66010002	Yeṭṭef deg ufus-is yiwet tektabt tamecṭuḥt yeldin . Yessers aḍar-is ayeffus ɣef lebḥeṛ , ma d aḍar azelmaḍ yessers-it ɣef lqaɛa ,
66010003	iɛeggeḍ s taɣect ɛlayen am akken d izem i gesreɛreɛen . Mi gesreɛreɛ lmelk-nni , nesla i useqseq n tuɣac n sebɛa ṛṛɛudat .
66010004	Mi sliɣ i tuɣac n sebɛa ṛɛudat nni țedduɣ ad aruɣ ayen i d-nnan , lameɛna sliɣ i yiwet taɣect i d-yekkan seg igenni tenna-yi-d : Eǧǧ di lbaḍna ayen akka i d-nnan sebɛa ṛɛudat-agi , ur tețțaru ara .
66010005	Lmelk-nni i walaɣ ibedd ɣef lebḥeṛ akk-d lqaɛa , yerfed afus-is ayeffus ɣer igenni ,
66010006	yeggul s Win yeddren si lǧil ɣer lǧil , Win i d-ixelqen igenni , lqaɛa d lebḥeṛ d wayen yellan deg-sen , a d-yedṛu kullec mbla leɛḍil .
66010007	M'ara d-yaweḍ wass i deg ara nsel i ṣṣut n lbuq n lmelk wis sebɛa , imiren kra wayen yellan di lbaḍna n Sidi Ṛebbi ad yețwakemmel akken i t-id yenna i lenbiya .
66010008	Taɣect-nni i d-yekkan seg igenni , terna tenna-yi-d : Ṛuḥ , eddem-ed taktabt tamecṭuḥt yeldin deg ufus n lmelk-nni ibedden ɣef lqaɛa d lebḥeṛ .
66010009	Ṛuḥeɣ ɣer lmelk-nni , ssutreɣ-as a yi-d-ye taktabt-nni tamecṭuḥt . Yenna-yi-d : Eddem-iț , sebleɛ-iț ; deg imi-k aț-țili ț-țaẓidant am tammemt , meɛna m'ara taweḍ ɣer uɛebbuḍ-ik , aț-țuɣal ț-țarẓagant .
66010010	Eddmeɣ-d taktabt-nni tamecṭuḥt seg ufus n lmelk iwakken aț-țeččeɣ , mi ț-greɣ deg imi-w ufiɣ-ț ț-țaẓidant , lameɛna mi tewweḍ ɣer uɛebbuḍ-iw , ččuṛen iẓerman-iw ț-țeṛzeg .
66010011	Nnan-iyi-d : Ilaq aț-țcireḍ daɣen ɣef wayen twalaḍ i waṭas n yegduden d leǧnas d igelliden n mkul tutlayt .
66011001	Fkan-iyi-d aɣanim s wayes țektilin , nnan-iyi-d : — Ekker fell-ak , ektil lǧameɛ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi , ktil daɣen adekkan i deg srusun iseflawen , tḥesbeḍ wid yețɛebbiden di lǧameɛ-agi .
66011002	Lameɛna afrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen , eǧǧ-it ur t-țektili ara , axaṭer yețțune i leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail , ara iṛekḍen tamdint n Lquds azal n tnin uṛebɛin wagguren .
66011003	Ad ceggɛeɣ sin inigan-iw ad sburren ticekkaṛin , iwakken ad ciren s wawal n Ṛebbi azal n tnin uṛebɛin wagguren .
66011004	Sin inigan-agi d snat n tzemrin akk-d sin n lemṣabeḥ i gbedden zdat Yillu Bab n lqaɛa n ddunit .
66011005	Ma yeɛṛeḍ yiwen a ten-iḍuṛṛ , tețțeffeɣ-ed tmes seg imawen-nsen tețțeț iɛdawen-nsen , akka ara yemmet kra win ara iɛerḍen a ten-iḍuṛṛ .
66011006	Sin inigan-agi sɛan tazmert ad ɣelqen tiwwura igenwan iwakken ur d-yekkat ara ugeffur deg ussan i deg ara țcirin awal n Ṛebbi ; sɛan daɣen tazmert ad rren aman d idammen , ad sexḍen lqaɛa s mkul lebla mkul tikkelt i deg ara bɣun .
66011007	M'ara faken aciri nsen , llafɛa ara d-yalin si tesra lqayen , aț-țennaɣ yid-sen a ten teɣleb , yerna a ten-tneɣ .
66011008	Lǧețțat-nsen ad qqiment ḍelqent deg ubṛaḥ n temdint tameqqrant , i gețțumetlen s temdint n Sudum ț-țmurt n Maṣer , tamdint anda yețwaṣleb Ssid-nsen .
66011009	Lɣaci n mkul agdud , n mkul lǧens , n mkul tutlayt , n mkul tamurt , ad țfeṛṛiǧen deg-sen tlata wussan d wezgen , ur qebblen ara ad țwameḍlen .
66011010	Imdanen n ddunit meṛṛa ad ilin di lfeṛḥ ameqqran imi mmuten . Ad țemceggaɛen tirezfin wway gar-asen , axaṭer sin inigan-agi ḍuṛṛen-ten aṭas .
66011011	Mi ɛeddan tlata wussan-nni d wezgen , Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi yesseḥya-d lǧețțat n lmegtin-nni , bedden ɣef yiḍaṛṛen-nsen . Kra wid yellan țfeṛṛiǧen deg-sen , tekcem-iten lxelɛa ț-țameqqrant .
66011012	Yiwet n taɣect ɛlayen i d-yekkan seg igenni tenna i sin inigan-nni : Alit-ed ɣer dagi ! Ulin deg usigna ɣer igenni , iɛdawen-nsen țmuqulen deg-sen .
66011013	Di teswiɛt-nni tewwet zzelzla tameqqrant , amur wis ɛecṛa n temdint yegrurej , mmuten sebɛa alaf yemdanen . Wid i gmenɛen si zzelzla-nni tekcem-iten tugdi , imiren setɛeṛfen s tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n igenwan , ḥemden-t .
66011014	Tawaɣit tis snat tɛedda , ataya tețțeddu-d twaɣit tis tlata .
66011015	Lmelk wis sebɛa yewwet lbuq . Kra n tuɣac ɛlayen țɛeggiḍent deg igenni qqaṛent-ed : Lḥekma n ddunit tuɣal ɣer ifassen n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Lmasiḥ ines ; ad yeḥkem si lǧil ɣer lǧil .
66011016	Ṛebɛa uɛecrin-nni n lecyux yellan zdat Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef yimukan nsen n lḥekma , țseǧǧiden zdat Sidi Ṛebbi , țɛebbiden-t
66011017	qqaṛen : Nḥemmed-ik a Sidi Ṛebbi , a Bab n tezmert yellan si tazwara , yellan ar ass-a , imi tesxedmeḍ tazmert-ik tameqqrant yerna tesbeddeḍ lḥekma-inek .
66011018	Leǧnas llan kkren-d ɣuṛ-ek , lameɛna tura d urrif-ik i d-yewḍen , yusa-d lweqt i deg ara tḥasbeḍ lmegtin , ass i deg ara tkafiḍ iqeddacen-ik lenbiya , wid textaṛeḍ akk-d wid yețqadaṛen isem-ik , ama d imeẓyanen ama d imeqqranen s wayen uklalen ; ma d wid yessexṛaben ddunit a ten-tesnegreḍ .
66011019	Lǧameɛ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi yellan deg igenwan yeldi-d , dɣa iban-ed zdaxel-is usenduq n leɛqed . Tebṛeq , terɛeḍ , nesla i tuɣac , tezlez lqaɛa , yeɣli-d webruri .
66012001	Tban-ed licaṛa ț-țameqqrant deg igenni : walaɣ yiwet tmeṭṭut tesburr-ed iṭij am llebsa , aggur seddaw iḍaṛṛen-is , tesɛa ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-is taɛeṣṣabt n tnac yitran .
66012002	Tella s tadist , yewweḍ-ed lweqt i deg ara d-tarew , tebda tețɛeggiḍ seg weqṛaḥ n tarrawt .
66012003	Tban-ed licaṛa nniḍen deg igenni : walaɣ yiwet llafɛa tazeggaɣt am tmes , tesɛa sebɛa iqeṛṛay akk-d ɛecṛa wacciwen , mkul aqeṛṛuy ters fell-as tɛeṣṣabt .
66012004	Ajelkkiḍ-is yezzuɣeṛ-ed țelt n yitran n igenni , ideggeṛ-iten-id ɣer ddunit . Llafɛa-nni tbedd zdat tmeṭṭut-nni ara d-yarwen , iwakken aț-țessebleɛ lṭufan-ines akken kan ara d-ilal .
66012005	Tesɛa-d aqcic ara yeksen leǧnas meṛṛa s tɛekkazt n wuzzal . Aqcic-nni yețwarfed ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi , ɣer wemkan n lḥekma-ines .
66012006	Tameṭṭut-nni terwel ɣer lexla anda i s-ihegga Sidi Ṛebbi amkan iwakken aț-țečč azal n walef umitin usețțin n wussan .
66012007	Yedṛa-d umenɣi deg igenni , Mixayel akk-d lmalayekkat-is nnuɣen akk-d llafɛa-nni . Llafɛa-nni d lmalayekkat-is nnuɣen-ten ula d nutni ,
66012008	lameɛna ur ten-ɣliben ara , daymi i sen-yețwakkes wemkan-nsen deg igenni .
66012009	Llafɛa-nni tameqqrant tețțuḍeggeṛ ɣer ddunit nețțat d lmalayekkat-is , tin akken yellan d azrem-nni n zik yețțusemman Iblis , Cciṭan , tin i gxedɛen ddunit meṛṛa .
66012010	Sliɣ deg igenni i yiwen ṣṣut ɛlayen yeqqaṛ : tura yewweḍ-ed leslak , Nḥemmed-ik a Sidi Ṛebbi , lḥekma ț-țezmert i Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ , lḥekma n ddunit tuɣal ɣer ifassen n Lmasiḥ-ines , axaṭer win i gesseḍlamen atmaten-nneɣ , win yețcektayen fell-asen iḍ d wass zdat Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ , yețțuḍeggeṛ seg igenni .
66012011	? elben-t watmaten-nneɣ s idammen n Izimer i ten-id-yefdan akk-d cchada-nsen fell-as yerna ur ɛuzzen ara tudert-nsen lameɛna sebblen-ț fell-as .
66012012	? ef wayagi feṛḥet ay igenwan , a wid i gzedɣen igenwan ! A nnger-im a lqaɛa ! A nnger-ik a lebḥeṛ ! Imi i d-iṣubb ɣuṛ-wen Cciṭan s wurrif ameqqran , axaṭer yeẓra drus n lweqt i s-d-iqqimen .
66012013	Llafɛa-nni , mi twala iman-is tețwaḍeggeṛ ɣer lqaɛa , tetbeɛ tameṭṭut nni i d-yesɛan aqcic .
66012014	Imiren kan țțunefken-as i tmeṭṭut-nni sin wafriwen n lbaz ameqqran iwakken aț-țafeg ɣer unezṛuf anda ara tɛic tlata iseggasen d wezgen , mebɛid ɣef wezrem .
66012015	Azrem-nni yessufeɣ-ed seg uqemmuc-is aman , feggḍen-d am asif deffir n tmeṭṭut-nni iwakken aț-țyawi uḥemmal .
66012016	Lameɛna lqaɛa tsellek tameṭṭut nni , tessebleɛ aman-nni i d-ifeggḍen seg uqemmuc n llafɛa-nni .
66012017	Llafɛa terfa ɣef tmeṭṭut-nni , tṛuḥ aț-țeskker imenɣi akk-d wid i d yeqqimen si dderya-s , wid i gḍuɛen lumuṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi yerna ṭṭfen di tideț n Sidna Ɛisa .
66013001	Llafɛa-nni tbedd ɣef ṛṛmel n lebḥeṛ . Walaɣ yiwet leɛqiṛa tuli-d si lebḥeṛ , tesɛa sebɛa iqeṛṛay d ɛecṛa wacciwen , tesɛa ɣef wacciwen-is ɛecṛa tɛeṣṣabin , ma ɣef yiqeṛṛay-ines uran yismawen n rregmat .
66013002	Leɛqiṛa i walaɣ tecba aɣilas , iḍaṛṛen-is am wid n wersel , axenfuc is am uxenfuc n yizem . Llafɛa-nni tefka-yas tazmert aț-țeḥkem deg umkan-is s lḥekma tameqqrant .
66013003	Walaɣ yiwen seg iqeṛṛay-ines am akken yețwamzel , lameɛna lǧerḥ n tmezliwt-nni yeḥla . Imezdaɣ n ddunit meṛṛa dehcen ɣef wannect-agi , dɣa tebɛen leɛqiṛa-nni .
66013004	? seǧǧiden-as i llafɛa-nni , axaṭer tefka lḥekma-s i leɛqiṛa ; țseǧǧiden daɣen zdat leɛqiṛa qqaṛen : anwa yellan am leɛqiṛa , anwa i gzemren ad yennaɣ yid-es ?
66013005	Yețțunefk-as uxenfuc i seg i d-țeffɣen imeslayen iqebḥen akk-d rregmat ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi . Tețțunefk-as tezmert aț-țeḥkem azal n tnin uṛebɛin n wagguren .
66013006	Teldi axenfuc-is , tețqabaḥ Sidi Ṛebbi , treggem isem-is d wemkan i deg yețțili akk-d kra wid i gzedɣen deg igenni .
66013007	Serrḥen-as aț-țeskker imenɣi akk-d wid yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi yerna a ten-teɣleb . Tețțunefk-as lḥekma ɣef mkul lɛeṛc , ɣef mkul agdud , d mkul lǧens n mkul tutlayt .
66013008	Kra win ur nețwajerred ara di tektabt n tudert yellan seg wasmi tebda ddunit , di tektabt n Izimer immezlen , ad seǧǧden zdat-es .
66013009	Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen isel-ed !
66013010	Win i gețṛaǧu nnfu , ad yețwanfu ; ma d win yețṛaǧu ujenwi , ad yemmet s ujenwi . Daymi i glaq i wid yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ad ṭṭfen di liman-nsen , ad sɛun ṣṣbeṛ .
66013011	Walaɣ daɣen yiwet leɛqiṛa nniḍen teffeɣ-ed seddaw n tmurt . Tesɛa sin wacciwen am wid n izimer , tețmeslay am llafɛa .
66013012	Tessexdam tazmert n leɛqiṛa tamezwarut ɣer tama-ines , teṣṣaweḍ armi terra imezdaɣ n ddunit meṛṛa țseǧǧiden zdat leɛqiṛa-nni tamezwarut i geḥlan si lǧerḥ-is .
66013013	Txeddem lbeṛhanat imeqqranen zdat yemdanen , tesseɣlay-ed times seg igenni ɣer lqaɛa .
66013014	Tețɣuṛṛu imezdaɣ n ddunit s lbeṛhanat i s-yețțunefken a ten texdem seddaw lḥekma n leɛqiṛa-nni tamezwarut , teqqaṛ asen : sbeddet yiwen lmeṣnuɛ ɣef ṣṣifa n leɛqiṛa-nni yețțewten s ujenwi tuɣal teḥla .
66013015	Leɛqiṛa tis snat , tețțunefk-as tezmert a s-te ṛṛuḥ i lmeṣnuɛ n leɛqiṛa-nni tamezwarut , iwakken lmeṣnuɛ-nni ad yizmir a d-yenṭeq , yerna ad ineɣ meṛṛa wid yugin a t-ɛebbden .
66013016	Leɛqiṛa-nni tḥețțem ɣef yemdanen , meẓẓi neɣ meqqeṛ , d igellil neɣ d ameṛkanti , d akli neɣ d aḥeṛṛi , ad wwten ticṛaḍ deg ufus ayeffus neɣ deg unyir-nsen ,
66013017	yerna ula d yiwen ur izemmer ad yaɣ neɣ ad yezzenz , anagar win yesɛan ticṛaḍ-agi n yisem n leɛqiṛa neɣ numṛu n yisem-is .
66013018	Win iḥeṛcen yesɛan tamusni d leɛqel , a d-yaf lmeɛna n numṛu n leɛqiṛa yellan d isem n yiwen wergaz , numṛu-agi : d sețțemeyya usețța usețțin .
66014001	Walaɣ Izimer-nni ibedd ɣef wedrar n Siyun , llan yid-es meyya uṛebɛa uṛebɛin alef n yemdanen yesɛan isem n Izimer-nni akk-d isem n Baba-s țwaketben ɣef yinyiren-nsen .
66014002	Sliɣ i ṣṣut n tuɣac i d-yekkan seg igenni , am akken d ṣṣut n lebḥeṛ m'ara yekker , am tiyita n ṛṛɛud ; ṣṣut n tuɣac-nni , yecba ṣṣut i d-ițeffɣen seg waṭas n snitrat .
66014003	? ɣennin yiwen ccna ajdid zdat wemkan n lḥekma , zdat ṛebɛa lexluq zdat lecyux-nni . Yiwen ur izmir ad yeḥfeḍ ccna-nni anagar meyya uṛebɛa uṛebɛin alef-nni i d-yețțuselken si ddunit .
66014004	Wigi , d wid ur nezni ara , qqimen ṣfan ; anda iṛuḥ Izimer ad ddun yid-es . ? țuselken si ger yemdanen iwakken ad țțuqeddmen d imezwura i Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Izimer .
66014005	Ur d-yeffiɣ lekdeb seg imawen nsen , ur yelli deg-sen wayen ara sen-d yețwassukksen .
66014006	Walaɣ yiwen lmelk yețțafgen deg igenni ; yewwi-d yid-es yiwen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yețdumun i dayem iwakken a t-ibecceṛ i imezdaɣ n ddunit , i mkul lǧens , i mkul tamurt , i mkul agdud n mkul tutlayt .
66014007	Yeqqaṛ ed s taɣect ɛlayen : Aggadet Ṛebbi , ḥemmdet-eț axaṭer yewweḍ-ed wass n lḥisab . Seǧǧdet , ɛebdet Win i d-ixelqen igenni d lqaɛa , lebḥeṛ akk-d leɛwanseṛ n waman .
66014008	Lmelk wis sin yetbeɛ amezwaru yeqqaṛ : Teɣli , teɣli temdint-nni n Babilun tameqqrant , tin i gesderɛen ( yessenṭḍen ) i leǧnas meṛṛa leḥṛam ines .
66014009	Lmelk wis tlata , yetbeɛ-iten yeqqaṛ s ṣṣut ɛlayen : Win ara iseǧden zdat leɛqiṛa akk-d lmeṣnuɛ-ines yerna yeqbel ticṛeṭ ɣef wunyir-is neɣ ɣef wufus-is ,
66014010	a d-yemmir fell-as wurrif n Sidi Ṛebbi , ad isew lemṛaṛ , ad inɛețțab di tmes d ukubri zdat lmalayekkat iqedsen , zdat Izimer .
66014011	Dexxan n tmes s wayes ara nɛețțaben ad yeqqim si lǧil ɣer lǧil ; wid yețseǧǧiden zdat leɛqiṛa d lmeṣuɛ ines akk-d kra win iqeblen ticṛeṭ n isem-is , ur steɛfayen ara iḍ d wass .
66014012	Deg wannect-agi i d-yețban ṣṣbeṛ n wid yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , wid i gḍuɛen lumuṛ-is yerna ṭṭfen di liman i sɛan di Lmasiḥ .
66014013	Sliɣ i yiwet taɣect i d-yekkan seg igenni teqqaṛ : Aru ayagi , d iseɛdiyen si tura wid ara yemten yili nutni umnen s Lmasiḥ ! Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yenna : ? - țideț , tura zemren ad steɛfun si leɛtab-nsen axaṭer lecɣal-nni yelhan i xedmen a ten-afen .
66014014	Walaɣ asigna d amellal , ɣef wusigna-nni yeqqim yiwen lxelq ițemcabi i wemdan . Yesɛa taɛeṣṣabt n ddheb ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-is , yeṭṭef amger iqeḍɛen deg ufus-is .
66014015	Yiwen lmelk nniḍen yeffeɣ-ed si lǧameɛ iqedsen , yețɛeggiḍ s ṣṣut ɛlayen i win yeqqimen ɣef wusigna yeqqaṛ-as : Ssexdem amger-ik tmegreḍ , axaṭer yewweḍ-ed lweqt n tmegra , imi ddunit tewjed i tmegra .
66014016	Win akken yeqqimen ɣef wusigna yesɛedda amger-is ɣef ddunit dɣa ddunit meṛṛa tețwamger .
66014017	Yeffeɣ-ed lmelk nniḍen si lǧameɛ iqedsen yellan deg igenni ; ula d nețța yesɛa amger iqeḍɛen .
66014018	Lmelk nniḍen iḥekkmen ɣef tmes , yeffeɣ-ed seg wemkan anda yella udekkan n iseflawen , yenna s ṣṣut ɛlayen i lmelk-nni yesɛan amger iqeḍɛen : Ssexdem amger-ik tgezmeḍ iguza n tfeṛṛant n ddunit , axaṭer wwant tẓuṛin .
66014019	Lmelk-nni yesɛedda amger-is ɣef ddunit , igzem iguza n tfeṛṛant n ddunit , iḍeggeṛ tizuṛin-nni zdaxel n teḥḍunt n wurrif n Sidi Ṛebbi , wwin-ț ɣer beṛṛa n temdint , iwakken ad ṛekḍen tizuṛin-nni , ffɣen-d seg-s idammen , ulin lqedd n lmitra d wezgen , uzzlen d leḥmali azal n telt-meyya n kilumitrat .
66014020	
66015001	Walaɣ daɣen deg igenni licaṛa nniḍen tameqqrant yesteɛǧiben ; sebɛa n lmalayekkat ṭṭfent sebɛa n lmuṣibat tineggura , axaṭer yis-sent ara innekmal wurrif n Sidi Ṛebbi .
66015002	Walaɣ am akken d lebḥeṛ n djaj ixelḍen akk-d tmes , wid iɣelben leɛqiṛa d lmeṣnuɛ-is akk-d numṛu n isem-is , bedden ɣef lebḥeṛ-nni n djaj . ? ṭfen snitrat i sen-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi ,
66015003	țcewwiqen acewwiq n Sidna Musa , aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d ucewwiq n Izimer , qqaṛen : Lecɣal-ik meqqeṛ-it steɛǧiben a Sidi Ṛebbi a Bab n tezmert ! Iberdan-ik , d iberdan n lḥeqq ț-țideț ay Agellid n leǧnas .
66015004	Anwa ur nețțaggad , ur nețḥemmid isem-ik a Sidi Ṛebbi ? Axaṭer d kečč kan i d imqeddes . Leǧnas meṛṛa a d-asen ad seǧǧden zdat-ek , imi tḥekkmeḍ s lḥeqq a Bab n lḥeqq .
66015005	Deffir wayagi , walaɣ lǧameɛ iqedsen anda yella uqiḍun n temlilit yeldi deg igenni .
66015006	Sebɛa n lmalayekkat-nni yeṭṭfen sebɛa n lmuṣibat , ffɣent-ed si lǧameɛ-nni s llebsa n leḥrir yeṣfan yețfeǧǧiǧen , beggsent-ed s wagusen n ddheb ɣef yidmaren-nsent .
66015007	Yiwen si ṛebɛa lxuluq-nni , yefka i sebɛa-nni n lmalayekkat sebɛa n teqbucin n ddheb ččuṛent s wurrif n Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren si lǧil ɣer lǧil .
66015008	Lɛaḍima akk-d lḥekma n Sidi Ṛebbi ččuṛen lǧameɛ iqedsen s dexxan , yiwen ur izmir ad yekcem ɣer lǧameɛ-nni alamma nnekmalent lmuṣibat n sebɛa lmalayekkat-nni .
66016001	Sliɣ i yiwen ṣṣut ɛlayen i d-yekkan si lǧameɛ iqedsen yeqqaṛ i sebɛa-nni n lmalayekkat : — Ṛuḥemt , smiremt ɣef ddunit sebɛa teqbucin n wurrif n Sidi Ṛebbi !
66016002	Lmelk amezwaru iṛuḥ , yesmar taqbuct-is ɣef ddunit . Yiwen udeddi iweɛṛen iqerriḥen , yenṭeḍ imdanen meṛṛa yesɛan ticṛeṭ n leɛqiṛa yerna țseǧǧiden zdat lmeṣnuɛ-ines .
66016003	Lmelk wis sin yesmar taqbuct-is ɣer lebḥeṛ , yuɣal d idammen am idammen n lmegget , imiren kra wayen yețɛicen di lebḥeṛ yemmut .
66016004	Lmelk wis tlata yesmar taqbuct-is ɣef yisaffen d leɛwanṣer n waman , uɣalen meṛṛa d idammen .
66016005	Sliɣ i lmelk iḥekkmen ɣef waman yeqqaṛ : Ay Imqeddes , a Bab n lḥeqq , kečč yellan si zik , yellan ass-a , tḥekkmeḍ s lḥeqq .
66016006	Axaṭer nutni ssazlen idammen n yimqedsen akk-d lenbiya , daymi i sen-tefkiḍ ula d kečč ad swen idammen , axaṭer d ayen uklalen .
66016007	Sliɣ i yiwet taɣect i d-yekkan seg udekkan n iseflawen teqqaṛ : Anɛam a Sidi Ṛebbi a Bab n tezmert , lḥekma-inek ț-țideț yerna d lḥeqq .
66016008	Lmelk wis ṛebɛa yesmar taqbuct-is ɣef yiṭij , yețțunefk-as i yiṭij ad yesseṛɣ imdanen ,
66016009	dɣa imdanen meṛṛa ṛɣan s yiṭij . Reggmen Sidi Ṛebbi i gḥekmen ɣef lmuṣibat-agi , ugin ad tuben , ad setɛeṛfen yis , akken a t-ḥemmden .
66016010	Lmelk wis xemsa yesmar taqbuct-is ɣef wukersi n lḥekma n leɛqiṛa-nni . Yeɣli-d ṭṭlam ɣef tgelda-s ; imdanen țkerricen ilsawen-nsen seg weqṛaḥ ,
66016011	reggmen Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n igenwan ɣef lqeṛḥ d ideddiyen-nsen , ur bɣin ara ad tuben seg yir lecɣal-nsen .
66016012	Lmelk wis sețța yesmar taqbuct is ɣef wasif ameqqran n Lufrat . Yesɣeṛ asif-nni iwakken ad iheggi abrid i igelliden i d-ițeddun si cceṛq .
66016013	Walaɣ ffɣen-d seg uxenfuc n llafɛa , seg uxenfuc n leɛqiṛa , seg yimi n nnbi n lekdeb , tlata leṛwaḥ iɛefnen i gțemcabin ɣer imqerqaṛ .
66016014	Widak-nni , d leṛwaḥ n leǧnun i gxeddmen licaṛat , țṛuḥun ɣer igelliden n ddunit meṛṛa , iwakken a ten-id-snejmaɛen i wumenɣi n wass ameqqran n Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert .
66016015	Aql-in a n-aseɣ am umakar . D aseɛdi win iɛussen ɣef yiman-is ur yekkis ara llebsa-ines , iwakken ur ițeddu ara ɛeryan , ur ițneḥcam ara m'ara t-id-walin !
66016016	Leṛwaḥ-nni n leǧnun snejmaɛen-d igelliden n ddunit deg yiwen wemkan iwumi qqaṛen s tɛibṛanit « Harmagidun » .
66016017	Lmelk wis sebɛa yesmar taqbuct is ger igenni d lqaɛa . Teffeɣ-ed si lǧameɛ iqedsen yiwet taɣect ɛlayen , i d-yekkan seg ukersi n lḥekma teqqaṛ : Dayen kullec yețwakemmel !
66016018	Tebṛeq , terɛeḍ , nesla i tuɣac , tezlez lqaɛa , seg wasmi i d-țwaxelqen imdanen ɣer ddunit ur d-tedṛi zzelzla tameqqrant am tagi .
66016019	Tamdint tameqqrant tebḍa ɣef tlata . Timdinin n tmura ɣlint , Sidi Ṛebbi yemmekta-d Babilun tameqqrant iwakken a s-ye aț-țsew lemṛaṛ si teqbuct n wurrif-is ameqqran .
66016020	Tigzirin zedrent meṛṛa , ula d idurar ur d-banen ara .
66016021	Yeɣli-d igedrez d ameqqran ɣef yemdanen , mkul aɛeqqa yewzen azal n ṛebɛin kilu ; imdanen regmen Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef lmuṣiba n igedrez-nni , axaṭer tegla-d s waṭas n lexṣaṛa .
66017001	Mbeɛd ayagi , yiwen si sebɛa lmalayekkat-nni yeṭṭfen sebɛa teqbucin yusa-d yenna-yi-d : — As-ed a k-d-sneɛteɣ amek ara yețwaḥkem ɣef tmenɛult tameqqrant i gebnan ɣef yisaffen imeqqranen .
66017002	Yid-es i zennun igelliden n ddunit , ɣef ddemma-s i ffɣen imezdaɣ n ddunit seg ubrid n Sidi Ṛebbi .
66017003	Deg uweḥḥi ufiɣ-ed iman-iw deg unezṛuf . Walaɣ yiwet tmeṭṭut teqqim ɣef yiwen lweḥc , rric-is d azeggaɣ , țwaketben fell-as yismawen n rregmat , yesɛa sebɛa iqeṛṛay akk-d ɛecṛa wacciwen .
66017004	Tameṭṭut-nni telsa llebsa ifazen țțazeggaɣt , tcebbeḥ iman-is s ddheb d yedɣaɣen ɣlayen akk-d iɛeqcan . Teṭṭef deg ufus-is taqbuct n ddheb yeččuṛen ț-țicmatin , yeɛni ayen ineǧsen d wayen iɛefnen n yir lecɣal is .
66017005	Yețwakteb ɣef wunyir-is yiwen yisem iwumi yețwaffer lmeɛna-s : Babilun tucmiț tameqqrant i seg d-kkant tecmatin akk-d leḥṛamat meṛṛa n ddunit .
66017006	Walaɣ tameṭṭut-nni teskeṛ s idammen n wid yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , d idammen n inigan n Lmasiḥ . Mi ț-walaɣ , wehmeɣ deg-s .
66017007	Yekker lmelk-nni yenna-yi-d : Acuɣeṛ i twehmeḍ ? Atan a k-d sfehmeɣ lbaḍna n tmeṭṭut-agi akk-d lweḥc i ț-yețbibbin , win akken yesɛan sebɛa iqeṛṛay d ɛecṛa wacciwen .
66017008	Lweḥc-nni twalaḍ , zik yella yedder , tura ulac-it . A d-yali si tesra lqayen lameɛna iwakken ad iṛuḥ ɣer nnger . Imezdaɣ n ddunit iwumi ur yețwajerred ara yisem-nsen seg wasmi i d-tebda ddunit di tektabt n tudert , ad tɛeǧǧben m'ara walin lweḥc-nni , axaṭer lweḥc-nni yellan zik yuɣal ulac-it , ițeddu a d-yuɣal .
66017009	Dagi , tlaq tmusni d lefhama iwakken ad țwafehment lbaḍnat-agi : sebɛa iqeṛṛay-nni țmettilen-d sebɛa idurar i ɣef tesbedd lḥekma-s tmeṭṭut-nni ; țmettilen-d daɣen sebɛa igelliden :
66017010	xemsa deg-sen ɣlin , yiwen mazal-it , wayeḍ urɛad ur d-yusi , yerna asm'ara d-yas ad yeḥkem kra n lweqt kan .
66017011	Lweḥc-nni yellan zik yuɣal ulac-it , d nețța i d agellid wis tmanya , yella daɣen d yiwen si sebɛa-nni ara iṛuḥen ɣer nnger .
66017012	Ɛecṛa wacciwen nni i twalaḍ , țmettilen-d ɛecṛa igelliden urɛad nesɛi lḥekma , lameɛna a d-yas lweqt i deg ara ḥekmen azal n ssaɛa akk-d lweḥc .
66017013	Msefhamen s yiwen ṛṛay , ad ɛawnen lweḥc s tezmert-nsen akk-d lḥekma-nsen .
66017014	Ad sekkren imenɣi akk-d Izimer meɛna a ten-yeɣleb imi d nețța i d Ssid n Ssyadi , i d agellid n igelliden ; wid i gextaṛ daɣen iwumi i d-yessawel , i t-iḍuɛen a ten-ɣelben ula d nutni .
66017015	Lmelk yenna-yi-d daɣen : Aman-agi n isaffen i twalaḍ i ɣef tesbedd lḥekma-s tmeṭṭut-nni tucmiț , țmettilen-d igduden , lɣaci d leǧnas n mkul tutlayt .
66017016	Ɛecṛa wacciwen-nni i twalaḍ akk-d lweḥc , ad uɣalen ad keṛhen tameṭṭut-nni tucmiț , a ț-ɛerrin ad ččen aksum-is , imiren ad sseṛɣen ayen i d-yeqqimen seg-s .
66017017	D Sidi Ṛebbi i ten-iwellhen akken ad xedmen lebɣi-s , ddukklen ɣef yiwen ṛṛay iwakken ad fken lḥekma i lweḥc alamma yedṛa-d lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi .
66017018	Ma ț-țameṭṭut-nni tucmiț i twalaḍ , tețmettil-ed tamdint tameqqrant i gḥekmen ɣef yigelliden n ddunit .
66018001	Deffir wayagi walaɣ lmelk nniḍen i d-yusan seg igenni , yesɛa lḥekma tameqqrant , ddunit meṛṛa tfeǧǧeǧ s tmanegt-is .
66018002	Iɛeggeḍ s ṣṣut ɛlayen yenna : Teɣli ! Teɣli temdint-nni tameqqrant n Babilun ! Tuɣal ț-țamezduɣt n ccwaṭen , d amkan anda țnejmaɛen leṛwaḥ imeɛfan , anda xeddmen leɛcuc-nsen leṭyuṛ iɛefnen .
66018003	Axaṭer tewwi leǧnas meṛṛa ɣer leǧhel s yir tikli-ines , igelliden n ddunit jehlen yid-es , wid yețțaɣen znuzun uɣalen d imeṛkantiyen s sselɛa ifazen i s-znuzun .
66018004	Sliɣ i yiwet taɣect i d-yekkan seg igenni teqqaṛ : Effɣet seg-s ay agdud-iw , iwakken ur tɣellim ara di ddnub-is , iwakken ur kkun-id-țawḍent ara lmuṣibat ara d-yeɣlin fell-as .
66018005	Axaṭer ddnubat-is ɛeddan tilas wwḍen ɣer igenni , amek ara yețțu Sidi Ṛebbi lbaṭel i texdem .
66018006	Xedmet as akken i wen-txeddem , ɛețțbet-eț akteṛ wayen i kkun-tɛețțeb , taqbuct nni n lemṛaṛ i tessew i wiyaḍ , ɛemmṛet-as-ț d lemṛaṛ yugaren win tessew nețțat .
66018007	Akken tefka i yiman-is ccan , tɛac di lerbaḥ , ara s-tesseṛwum leɛtab d leḥzen , axaṭer teqqaṛ : Aql-iyi am ugellid , ur lliɣ ț-țaǧǧalt , ur țissineɣ leḥzen .
66018008	Daymi , deg yiwen wass ara d-ɣlint fell-as lmuṣibat : lmut , leḥzen , laẓ akk-d tmes ara ț-yeččen . Axaṭer d Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert i ț-iɛuqben .
66018009	Igelliden n ddunit meṛṛa i gɛacen deg-s di zzhu d zzna , ad țrun , ad meǧden fell-as , m'ara walin dexxan i gețțalin si tmes iceɛlen deg-s .
66018010	Imi uggaden a ten-taweḍ txeṣṣart , bedden mebɛid qqaṛen : A tawaɣit-im , a tawaɣit-im a tamdint n Babilun , tamdint tameqqrant yesɛan tazmert , deg yiwet n ssaɛa kan yeɣli-d fell-am lɛiqab .
66018011	Wid yețțaɣen znuzun ad ilin di leḥzen ameqqran ad țrun , axaṭer ulac win ara yaɣen sselɛa-nsen ,
66018012	sselɛa-nni n ddheb d lfeṭṭa , idɣaɣen ɣlayen d iɛeqcan , lkețțan n lfina akk-d lkețțan azeggaɣ d leḥrir , sselɛa n yal asɣaṛ i d-yețțaken rriḥa taẓiḍant , leḥwayeǧ akk ineǧṛen s wacciwen n lfil , s wesɣaṛ ɣlayen d wayen yețwaxedmen s nnḥas d wuzzal akk-d eṛxem ;
66018013	ulac daɣen win ara yaɣen lqeṛfa , leɛqaqeṛ , leɛṭeṛ , lmuṛ , lebxuṛ , ccṛab , zzit , awren eṛqiqen akk-d yirden , izgaren , ulli , iɛewdiwen , ikeṛṛusen n umenɣi akk-d yemdanen i rran d aklan .
66018014	A tamdint n Babilun , ayen akken tețmenniḍ iṛuḥ-am ibɛed fell-am , lerbaḥ-im d wayen akk mucaɛen ɣuṛ-em , ṛuḥen-am ur tețțuɣaleḍ ara a ten-tafeḍ .
66018015	Wid yețțaɣen znuzun leḥwayeǧ di temdint-agi yuɣalen d imeṛkantiyen , ad qqimen mebɛid ad aggaden a ten-taweḍ twaɣit , ad țrun , ad ilin di leḥzen ;
66018016	ad inin : A tawaɣit ! A tawaɣit ! Tamdint nni yellan am tmeṭṭut yețlusun lkețțan eṛqiqen d llebsa tazeggaɣt ifazen , yețɛelliqen iɛeqcan ɣlayen , idɣaɣen n lyaman n mkul ṣṣenf akk-d ddheb ,
66018017	deg yiwet n ssaɛa kan , kullec yuɣal d iɣed ! Lqebṭanat n lbabuṛat d ixeddamen nsen , ibeḥṛiyen akk-d wid yețsafaṛen di lebḥuṛ ɣer tmurt-nni qqimen mebɛid ,
66018018	țɛeggiḍen mi walan dexxan n tmes yeččan tamdint-nni , qqaṛen : Anta tamdint yecban tamdint agi ?
66018019	Bdan ṭeggiṛen aɣebbaṛ ɣef yiqeṛṛay-nsen , țrun țmeǧǧiden , țɛeggiḍen qqaṛen : A tawaɣit-im ! A tawaɣit-im a tamdint tameqqrant , isrebḥen wid akk yesɛan lbabuṛat di lebḥur , deg yiwet teswiɛt kan tnegreḍ tuɣaleḍ d iɣed .
66018020	A wid yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , a wid i d-iceggeɛ ad beccṛen awal-is , a lenbiya , ay igenwan , ilit di lfeṛḥ ɣef wayen yedṛan yid-es , axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi iɛuqeb-iț ɣef wayen i wen texdem .
66018021	Imiren yiwen lmelk yesɛan tazmert tameqqrant , yeddem-ed tablaṭ annect n uɣaṛef n tsirt , iḍeggeṛ-iț ɣer lebḥeṛ yenna : Akka ara tețțuḍeggeṛ temdint tameqqrant n Babilun , ur tețțuɣal a d-tban ;
66018022	ur nețțuɣal a nsel i ṣṣut n wid yekkaten snitra d wid i gcennun akk-d wid yekkaten ajewwaq d lbuq . Ur d-yețɣimi deg-em ṣṣaneɛ , ur nețțɣal a nsel i iɣuṛaf n tessirt .
66018023	Ur tețțuɣal a d-tban deg-em tafat , ur nețțuɣal a nsel i taɣect n yesli ț-țeslit . Aț-țwaɛaqbeḍ a tamdint n Babilun imi imestujaṛ-im , d nutni i gellan d imeqqranen di ddunit ; leǧnas meṛṛa țwaxedɛen s ssḥur i txeddmeḍ ;
66018024	axaṭer deg-em i yuzzlen idammen n lenbiya d wid yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d wid meṛṛa yemmezlen di ddunit .
66019001	Imiren sliɣ i yiwen ṣṣut eɛlayen deg igenni , d ṣṣut n luluf n yemdanen , qqaṛen : Halliluya lḥemd i Ṛebbi ! Leslak , tamanegt ț-țezmert i Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ ,
66019002	axaṭer yeḥkem s lḥeqq ț-țideț ɣef tucmiț-nni tameqqrant i gɣuṛṛen imezdaɣ n ddunit , yerra-d țțaṛ n iqeddacen-is yemmezlen .
66019003	Nnan daɣen : Halliluya ! . . . Times yesseṛɣen tamdint tameqqrant ur txețți ara , aț-țeqqim i dayem .
66019004	Ṛebɛa uɛecrin-nni lecyux akk-d ṛebɛa lxuluq seǧǧden zdat Sidi Ṛebbi i geqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma , țcekkiṛen-t qqaṛen : Amin ! Halliluya !
66019005	Yeffeɣ-ed yiwen ṣṣut seg ukersi nni n lḥekma , yeqqaṛ-ed : ? emmdet Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ , kunwi meṛṛa yellan d iqeddacen-is , kunwi i t-ițḍuɛun am umeqqran am umeẓyan .
66019006	Rniɣ sliɣ i luluf n yemdanen am akken d ṣṣut n lebḥeṛ m'ara yekker , am tiyita n ṛṛɛud , i geqqaṛen : Halliluya ! Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ Bab n tezmert yesbedd lḥekma-s .
66019007	A nezhu , a nefṛeḥ , a t-neḥmed axaṭer tewweḍ-ed tmeɣṛa n Izimer , tislit thegga iman-is ,
66019008	yețțunefk-as aț-țels lkețțan aṛqaq yețfeǧǧiǧen . Lkețțan-agi imettel-ed lecɣal yelhan n wid yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
66019009	Lmelk yenna-yi-d : Aru ayagi : d iseɛdiyen wid i d-yețwaɛerḍen ɣer imensi n tmeɣṛa n Izimer . Yenna-yi-d daɣen : Imeslayen-agi , d imeslayen n tideț n Sidi Ṛebbi .
66019010	Dɣa ɣliɣ ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is iwakken a t-ɛebdeɣ , meɛna yenna-yi-d : ? ader a d-seǧǧdeḍ zdat-i , axaṭer nekk d aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi am kečč am atmaten-ik i geṭṭfen di lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , d Sidi Ṛebbi kan ara tɛebdeḍ . Tideț-agi i d-ibeggen Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , ț-țin i gețwellihen lenbiya .
66019011	Walaɣ daɣen igenni yeldi , iban-ed yiwen uɛewdiw d amellal . Win i t-irekben isem-is « Aḥeqqi ț-țideț » , iḥekkem s lḥeqq , yețnaɣ ɣef tideț .
66019012	Allen-is am uḥeǧǧaǧu n tmes ; yesɛa aṭas n tɛeṣṣabin ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-is . Yesɛa yiwen yisem yiwen ur t-yessin anagar nețța .
66019013	Yelsa abeṛnus yeččuṛ d idammen . Ma d nețța isem-is : « Awal n Ṛebbi » .
66019014	Lɛeskeṛ n igenwan lsan llebsa tamellalt n lfina yețfeǧǧiǧen yerna ttabaɛen-t ɣef yiɛewdiwen imellalen .
66019015	Yeffeɣ-ed seg imi-s yiwen ujenwi qeṭṭiɛen , iwakken ad yewwet leǧnas ; ad yeḥkem fell-asen s tɛekkazt n wuzzal . A ten-yeṛkeḍ am akken ṛekkḍen tiẓurin zdaxel n lemɛinsṛa , akka ara d-ibeggen urrif n Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert .
66019016	Yura ɣef wubeṛnus-is akk-d umeṣṣaḍ-is : « Agellid n igelliden , Ssid n Ssyadi . »
66019017	Walaɣ daɣen yiwen lmelk ibedd ɣef yiṭij , yessawel s taɣect eɛlayen i leḍyuṛ meṛṛa yețferfiren deg igenni : Aset-ed , nnejmaɛet-ed aț țeččem imensi ameqqran i d-ihegga Sidi Ṛebbi ,
66019018	iwakken aț-țeččem aksum n igelliden , aksum n lɛeskeṛ d wid iḥekkmen fell-asen , aksum n iɛewdiwen d wid i ten-irekben , aksum n yemdanen , ama d iḥeṛṛiyen ama d aklan , s umeqqran s umeẓyan .
66019019	Walaɣ leɛqiṛa akk-d igelliden n ddunit snejmaɛen-d lɛeskeṛ-nsen iwakken ad nnaɣen d Win irekben ɣef wuɛewdiw akk-d lɛeskeṛ-is .
66019020	Leɛqiṛa tețwaṭṭef nețțat d nnbi nni n lekdeb i gxeddmen lbeṛhanat seddaw n lḥekma-s , s wayes ikellex imdanen meṛṛa yețwaḍebɛen s ṭṭabeɛ n leɛqiṛa yerna țseǧǧiden zdat lmeṣnuɛ ines . ? waḍeggṛen i sin d imuddiren ɣer temda tameqqrant n tmes i deg iṛeqq ukubri .
66019021	Wiyaḍ mmuten s ujenwi-nni i d-yeffɣen seg yimi n Win irekben aɛewdiw , leḍyuṛ n igenni ččan seg uksum-nsen armi ṛwan .
66020001	Walaɣ daɣen yiwen lmelk iṣubb-ed seg igenni , yewwi-d deg ufus-is tasaruț n tesra lqayen akk-d yiwet ssnesla tameqqrant .
66020002	yeṭṭef-ed llafɛa yellan d azrem nni n zik , yellan d Cciṭan d Iblis , yeqqen-iț s ssnesla iwakken a t yeḥbes alef iseggasen .
66020003	Iḍeggeṛ-it ɣer tesraft-nni lqayen , yerra-yas aɣummu izemmem-iț iwakken ur ițkellix ara leǧnas alamma ɛeddan walef iseggasen , imiren a d-yețwaserreḥ i kra n lweqt .
66020004	Mbeɛd ayagi , walaɣ ikursiyen n lḥekma , yețțune i wid yeqqimen fell-asen ad ḥasben ; walaɣ leṛwaḥ n wid iwumi țwakksen iqeṛṛay ɣef ddemma n tideț n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi . Walaɣ daɣen wid ur neqbil ara ad seǧǧden zdat leɛqiṛa akk-d lmeṣnuɛ-is , wid ur neqbil ara ticṛeṭ-ines ɣef wunyir-nsen neɣ ɣef yifassen-nsen . Uɣalen-d ɣer tudert , ad ḥekmen akk-d Lmasiḥ alef iseggasen .
66020005	D wagi i d ḥeggu amezwaru . Ma d lmegtin nniḍen ur d-țuɣalen ara ɣer tudert alamma ɛeddan walef iseggasen .
66020006	Amarezg-nsen wid ara d-iḥyun d imezwura ; lmut tis snat ur sen tzemmer ara , ad ilin d lmuqedmin n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Lmasiḥ , ad ḥekmen akk-d Lmasiḥ alef n iseggasen .
66020007	M'ara ɛeddin walef iseggasen agi , Cciṭan a d-yețwaserreḥ si lḥebs ,
66020008	iwakken ad ikellex leǧnas meṛṛa yellan di ṛebɛa yixfawen n ddunit , Haǧuǧ Maǧuǧ yeɛni wid yellan d iɛdawen n Ṛebbi , a ten-id-ijmeɛ i umenɣi ț-țirebbaɛ ur nezmir a neḥseb , am ṛṛmel n lebḥeṛ .
66020009	Steɛmṛen akk ddunit , zzin i wegdud n Sidi Ṛebbi ț-țemdint i gḥemmel . Lameɛna yeɣli-d fell-asen uḥeǧǧaǧu n tmes seg igenni yečča ten .
66020010	Imiren yețwaḍeggeṛ Cciṭan-nni i ten-iɣuṛṛen ɣer daxel n temda-nni n tmes d ukubri anda tella leɛqiṛa d nnbi n lekdeb , ad țwaɛedben am yiḍ am wass i dayem .
66020011	Walaɣ daɣen yiwen ukersi n lḥekma ɛlayen d amellal akk-d Win yeqqimen fell-as , igenni d lqaɛa rewlen zdat-es ur sen-d-yeqqim ara wemkan .
66020012	Dɣa walaɣ lmegtin bedden zdat ukersi-nni n lḥekma am umeqqran am umeẓyan , ldint tektabin , teldi daɣen tektabt nniḍen yellan ț-țaktabt n tudert . Lmegtin țțuḥasben mkul yiwen ɣef leḥsab n wayen yexdem d wayen yuran di tektabin-agi .
66020013	Lebḥeṛ iḍeggeṛ-ed akk wid yečča , lmut d laxeṛt serrḥent-ed akk i lmegtin . Mkul yiwen yețțuḥaseb akken llan lecɣal-is .
66020014	Lmut d laxeṛt țwaḍeggṛent ɣer temda n tmes , țamda-agi n tmes i d lmut tis snat .
66020015	Kra n win ur nețwajerred ara di tektabt n tudert yețwaḍeggeṛ ɣer temda n tmes .
66021001	Walaɣ igenni d lqaɛa ijdiden , igenni aqdim d lqaɛa taqdimt xfan , lebḥur ur d-qqimen ara .
66021002	Walaɣ tamdint iqedsen tṣubb-ed seg igenni tekka-d s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi , ț-țagi i ț-țamdint n Lquds tajdiṭ , thegga am teslit icebbḥen iman-is i yesli .
66021003	Sliɣ i yiwet taɣect tenṭeq-ed s ṣṣut eɛlayen seg ukersi-nni n lḥekma tenna-d : Tura Sidi Ṛebbi yezdeɣ ger yemdanen , nutni ad ilin d agdud-is nețța s yiman-is ad yili yid-sen .
66021004	A sen-yesfeḍ imeṭṭawen , ur tețțili lmut , ur yețțili leḥzen , ur yețțili umeǧǧed ur yețțili lqeṛḥ axaṭer leḥwayeǧ timezwura ɛeddant ur țɛawadent ara a d-țuɣalent .
66021005	Win akken yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma yenna : Tura rriɣ-ed kullec d ajdid . Yenna daɣen : Aru imeslayen-agi , axaṭer imeslayen-iw ṣeḥḥan yerna deg-sen lețkal .
66021006	Yerna yenna-yi-d : Dayen ! Kullec yețwakemmel ! D nekk i d alfa d nekk i d umiga yeɛni d nekk i d lḥeṛf amezwaru , d nekk i d lḥeṛf aneggaru . Lliɣ si tazwara alamma ț-țaggara . Win iffuden , a s-d-fkeɣ aman si lɛinseṛ n tudert yerna baṭel .
66021007	Win yeṭṭfen deg-i ur yeɣli ara a t-kafiɣ s wayen yuklal ; nekk ad iliɣ d Illu-ines , nețța ad yili d mmi ;
66021008	ma d ixeddaɛen , wid ur nețțamen ara , imejhal akk-d wid ineqqen timegṛaḍ , wid ixeddmen ticmatin akk d iseḥḥaren , wid iɛebden lmeṣnuɛat d ssadaț , imeskaddaben , wigi meṛṛa ad yili umur-nsen di temda n tmes ireqqen d ukebri . ? - țagi i d lmut tis snat .
66021009	Yiwen si sebɛa lmalayekkat-nni yeṭṭfen sebɛa teqbucin yeččuṛen d sebɛa lmuṣibat tineggura yusa-d yenna-yi-d : Eyya-d a k-d-sekneɣ tislit , tameṭṭut n Izimer .
66021010	Imiren irfed-iyi Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi , ufiɣ-ed iman-iw ɣef yiwen wedrar ɛlayen . Isken-iyi-d tamdint n Lquds tețṣubbu-d seg igenni s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi .
66021011	Tecceɛceɛ am lyaman yeṣfan yețṛeqṛiqen am djaj , ț-țamanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi i gersen fell-as .
66021012	Zzin-as-d leswaṛ ɛlayen yesɛan tnac tewwura , mkul yiwet ibedd zdat-es yiwen lmelk , uran ɣef tewwura-agi yismawen n tnac leɛṛac n wat Isṛail .
66021013	Tlata tewwura wehhant ɣer cceṛq , tlata ɣer lɣeṛb , tlata ɣer usammer , tlata nniḍen ɣer umalu .
66021014	Leswaṛ-nni ersen ɣef tnac lsisan i ɣef uran tnac yismawen n ṛṛusul n Izimer n Ṛebbi .
66021015	Win akken i yi-d-ițmeslayen yeṭṭef aɣanim n ddheb iwakken ad yektil tamdint , tiwwura-ines d leswaṛ-is .
66021016	Tuɣzi ț-țehri n leḥyuḍ n temdint-nni ɛedlen . Yektal tamdint-nni , yufa lqis n tnac alef n wannaren ama di tuɣzi-ines , ama di tehri-ines , ama di leɛli-ines .
66021017	Lmelk yektal daɣen leɛli n leswaṛ n temdint s uɣanim-nni , yufa meyya uṛebɛa uṛebɛin alef n iɣallen .
66021018	Leswaṛ-is bnan s lyaman , ma ț-țamdint tebna s ddheb iṣfan yecban djaj yețṛeqṛiqen .
66021019	Lsisan n leswaṛ-is ṛeqqmen s yezṛa ɣlayen n mkul ṣṣenf . Amezwaru s Lyaman n Jasb , wis sin n Safir , wis tlata s lyaman n Agat , wis ṛebɛa n ? umṛud ,
66021020	wis xemsa n Sardwan , wis sețța n Kurnalin , wis sebɛa n Krizulit , wis tmanya n Biril , wis tesɛa n Tubaz , wis ɛecṛa n Krisubraz , wis ḥdac n Turkwaz , wis tnac n Amitist .
66021021	Tnac n tewwura-nni țwaxedment s tɛeqcin , mkul tawwurt ț-țaɛeqquct tameqqrant . Abṛaḥ n temdint-nni yessa s ddheb yeṣfan am djaj yețṛeqṛiqen .
66021022	Ur walaɣ ara lǧameɛ di temdint-nni axaṭer d Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert s yiman-is akk-d Izimer i d lǧameɛ-ines .
66021023	Tamdint-agi ur teḥwaǧ iṭij , ur teḥwaǧ agur iwakken a s-d-fken tafat axaṭer ț-țamanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi i ț-ițnewwiṛen , yerna d Izimer i d lmeṣbeḥ-ines .
66021024	Leǧnas meṛṛa ad lḥun di tafat-is , igelliden n ddunit a d-asen ad seǧǧden , ad anzen zdat-es .
66021025	Tiwwura-ines ur ɣelqent ara maḍi axaṭer dinna ur d-yețțili ara yiḍ .
66021026	Leǧnas meṛṛa yesɛan ccan a d-asen ad seǧǧden zdat-es .
66021027	Ur ikeččem ɣuṛ-es wayen ineǧsen , ur ikeččem ɣuṛ-es win ixeddmen cceṛ neɣ win yeskiddiben ; anagar wid yețțujerden di tektabt n tudert n Izimer ara ikecmen ɣer dinna .
66022001	Lmelk-nni yesken-iyi-d daɣen asif anda țazzalen waman n tudert , yeṣfan am djaj yețṛeqṛiqen , i d-ițfeggiḍen seg ukersi n lḥekma n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Izimer .
66022002	Di tlemmast n ubṛaḥ n temdint tella ttejṛa n tudert iwumi d-yezzi wasif tețțak-ed tnac n lɣellat , mkul agur tețțak-ed lfakya . Iferrawen-is d ddwa yesseḥlayen leǧnas .
66022003	Ur tețțuɣal ara a d-ili deɛwessu , akersi n lḥekma n Sidi Ṛebbi d Izimer ad yili di temdint , iqeddacen-is a t-ɛebbden ,
66022004	ad walin udem-is , yerna ad sɛun isem-is ɣef yinyiren-nsen .
66022005	Ur yețțuɣal a d-yili ṭṭlam ur țeḥwiǧin tafat n teftilt , ur țeḥwiǧin tafat n yiṭij axaṭer d Sidi Ṛebbi s yiman-is ara ten-inewwṛen s tafat-is , yerna ad ḥekmen yid-es i dayem .
66022006	Lmelk-nni yenna-yi-d : Imeslayen-agi , d imeslayen iṣeḥḥan yerna deg-sen lețkal ; Sidi Ṛebbi yețwellihen lenbiya iceggeɛ-ed lmelk-is iwakken a d-isken i iqeddacen-is ayen ur nețɛeṭṭil ara a d-yedṛu .
66022007	Atan ihi , qṛib a n-aseɣ ! Amarezg n win ara iḥerzen imeslayen i d-yețțuweḥḥan di tektabt agi .
66022008	D nekk Yuḥenna i geslan yerna walaɣ ayagi meṛṛa ; mi sliɣ yerna walaɣ annect-agi , ɣliɣ ɣer iḍaṛṛen n lmelk i yi-ten-id-yesseknen iwakken a t-ɛebdeɣ ;
66022009	meɛna yenna-yi-d : ? ader aț-țseǧdeḍ zdat-i axaṭer nekk d aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi am kečč am atmaten-ik lenbiya akk-d wid iḥerzen imeslayen n tektabt-agi , d Sidi Ṛebbi kan ara tɛebdeḍ !
66022010	Yenna-d daɣen : Ur țeffer ara imeslayen i k-d yețțuweḥḥan di tektabt-agi , axaṭer lweqt i deg ara d-dṛun qṛib a d-yaweḍ .
66022011	Win ixeddmen lbaṭel ad ikemmel di lbaṭel-ines , win ineǧsen ad ikemmel di nǧasa-ines , aḥeqqi ad ikemmel ad iteddu s lḥeqq , win iwumi yeṣfa wul ad ikemmel tikli-ines s wul yeṣfan .
66022012	Atan ihi qṛib a n-aseɣ , ad fkeɣ i mkul yiwen akken yuklal .
66022013	D nekk i d alfa d nekk i d umiga yeɛni d nekk i d lḥeṛf amezwaru , d nekk i d lḥeṛf aneggaru , lliɣ si tazwara alamma ț-țaggara .
66022014	Amarezg n wid yessarden tijellabin-nsen axaṭer a sen-yețțune ad ččen si ttejṛa n tudert yerna ad kecmen si tewwura n temdint ;
66022015	ma d iɛdawen n Sidi Ṛebbi , iseḥḥaren , wid ixeddmen cceṛ , wid ineqqen timegṛaḍ , wid iɛebden lmeṣnuɛat d ssadaț , wid ixeddmen ticmatin d wid yeskiddiben ama s imeslayen nsen ama s lecɣal-nsen , ur keččmen ara ɣer temdint .
66022016	Nekk Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ceggɛeɣ-ed lmelk-iw iwakken ad ixebbeṛ tijmuyaɛ n imasiḥiyen s wayagi meṛṛa . Nekk seg iẓuṛan n ugellid Dawed , d axalaf i d-ikkan si lǧedra-ines , d itri yețfeǧǧiǧen taṣebḥit .
66022017	Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ț-țeslit qqaṛen : As-ed ! Kra n win ara yeslen i yimeslayen agi a d-yini : As-ed ! Win yeffuden a d-yas . Win yebɣan aman yessidiren , ad issew baṭel !
66022018	Ad ɛeggneɣ i kra win ara d yeslen i yimeslayen i d yețțuweḥḥan di tektabt-agi , ma yella win i gzegden imeslayen , Sidi Ṛebbi a d-yesseɣli fell-as tiwaɣyin yuran di tektab-agi .
66022019	Ma yella win i gesneqsen seg wayen i d-yețțuweḥḥan di tektabt-agi , Sidi Ṛebbi a s-ikkes amur-is si ttejṛa n tudert , ur ikeččem ara ɣer temdint iqedsen i ɣef d-țmeslay tektabt-agi .
66022020	Win i d-iweḥḥan annect-agi meṛṛa yenna-d : ? - țideț qṛib a n-aseɣ ! As-ed a Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa ! Amin !
66022021	Ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa a d ters ɣef mkul yiwen .
